Ngendatshana kaDaniela Baumann. 
Ishicilelwe ngesikhathi sombukiso eThe Walther Collection, Neu-Ulm, Germany, 2017. 
Homeland, Market Photo Workshop, eGoli, 2011 Nakhu kwenye indawo, iHayward Gallery, eLondon, 2019. 
Izithombe ezivela ochungechungeni iHomeland (2009-2011), Domestic (2012), Second Transition (2012), Running, Amman (2013) neParadise (2013) [1] [2] [3] [5] 
Ngo-2010: ITierney Fellowship, eNew York City 
Sekgala wazalwa ngo eSoweto, a elokishini e- Iphandle Johannesburg . Wakhuliswa ngugogo wakhe endaweni eseduze naseHammanskraal, endaweni eyayiyiBantustan yasemakhaya (noma "izwe lakubo") laKwaNdebele,40 km enyakatho yedolobha lasePitoli . 
Ufundele ukuthatha izithombe eMarket Photo Workshop eGoli kusuka ngo-2007 kuya ku-2008. 
Izithombe zakhe, ngamazwi kaHannah Abel-Hirsch ebhala kwiBritish Journal of Photography , "zihlanganiswe ukuhlola kwabo umbono wekhaya, kanye nezimo zenhlalo, ezepolitiki, noma ezomnotho ezingabumba ubudlelwano bethu nayo." 
Ngo-2012 uSekgala noPhilippe Chancel "bahambela eMagopa ukuyophenya inkinga yokubuyiselwa komhlaba wanamuhla endaweni ebizwa ngokuthi amaBlack Spots, lapho abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abamnyama baxoshwa khona ngaphansi kohlelo lwangesikhathi sobandlululo" uhlelo lokususwa ngenkani ". Ngo-2013 ubehlala eKreuzberg eBerlin ehlala unyaka wonke eKünstlerhaus Bethanien futhi wahlala izinyanga ezimbili eHIWAR / Durant Al Funun e- Amman, eJordani . 
Uzibulale ngomhlaka 15 Okthoba 2014, eneminyaka engama-33, ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ngemuva kokushona kukagogo wakhe.Wayenendodana nendodakazi. 
IPharadesi. 
IDortmund: UKettler, 2014. 
Kuhlelwe nguNicola Müllerschön noChristoph Tannert. . 
Ngezindatshana zikaSimon Njami noMatthew Alexander Post (Abazalwane Abathumile). 
Ikhathalogu eyashicilelwa ngesikhathi sombukiso eKünstlerhaus Bethanien, eBerlin. 
Ezikhathini eziningi ezithathe isikhathi esingaphezu kwekhulu leminyaka, abaholi beChurch of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church) bafundise ukuthi abalandeli akufanele bashaye indlwabu njengengxenye yokulalela ikhodi yokuziphatha eyaziwa njengomthetho wobumsulwa . [1] : 80–127 [2] [3] Isonto le-LDS ligcizelela kakhulu umthetho wobumsulwa. 
Ukuzibophezela ukuphila ngomthetho wobumsulwa kuyadingeka ukuze ubhapathizwe, [4] futhi ukunamathela kuyadingeka ukuthola imvume yasethempelini, [5] futhi kuyingxenye yomcimbi wokunikezelwa kwethempeli izivumelwano abazinikele ababambiqhaza abathembisa ngesifungo sokuzigcina. [6] [7] Ngenkathi esebenza njengomongameli wesonto, uSpencer W. Kimball wafundisa ukuthi umthetho wobumsulwa uhlanganisa "ukushaya indlwabu ... nazo zonke izono ezifihliwe nezisithekile nayo yonke imicabango nemikhuba engcolile." [8] Ngaphambi kokusebenzela ukuthunywa ngokugcwele, abantu abadala abancane kudingeka ukuthi bayeke lo mkhuba njengoba kukholakala ukuthi yisono esangweni esinciphisa ukuzwela ekuqondisweni koMoya oNgcwele .[9] Okokuqala okukhulunywe esidlangalaleni ngokushaya indlwabu ngumholi webandla jikelele kuzethameli ezibanzi kwaba ngo-1952 ngumphostoli uJ. Reuben Clark, [10] [11] futhi okushiwo kamuva okuphawulekayo kufaka phakathi ngo-2013,2016, no isibuyekezo se-2019 kwi- Missionary Handbook . 
1871 - Ilungu LikaMongameli Wokuqala uDaniel H. Wells utshele iqembu labaholi besonto ukuthi iningi lezinsizwa zabo belinomkhuba wokushaya indlwabu (obizwa ngokuthi "ukuzilimaza", "ukuzingcolisa", kanye ne- "onanism") okuyisono esikhulu futhi kungavimbela umshado futhi kuholele ekusanganisweni nasekufeni ngaphambi kwesikhathi.: 415 1883 - UMongameli Wokuqala kanye nabaphostoli bakhulume isikhathi eside nabongameli besiteki "ngokungcoliswa kwabo bobabili abesilisa nabesifazane" lapho kukhulunywa khona okokuqala ngamaMormon mayelana nokushaya indlwabu kwabesifazane.:418 
UMandisa Sibongile Mashego (owazalwa ngomhla ka-26 Agasti 1973) ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika futhi ulwela amalungelo abesifazane.Owake waba yilungu le-Economic Freedom Fighters, ubenguSihlalo weqembu esifundazweni eGauteng kusuka ngo-2018 kuya ku-2020. 
Ubuye waba yilungu lesiShayamthetho sesiFundazwe saseGauteng kusuka ngonyaka wezi-2014 kuya kowezi-2020. 
NgoDisemba 2019 engqungqutheleni yokukhetha ubuholi be-EFF kuzwelonke, uMashego waphikisana noMarshall Dlamini esikhundleni sikaNobhala-Jikelele. 
Ukuphikisana kwakhe noDlamini kudale ukungezwani phakathi kwakhe nomholi weqembu uJulius Malema . Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi uMalema uphakamise ku-tweet, nokwadala ukuqagela, ukuthi uMashego uhlela ukuhlubuka eqenjini lowabe eyiMeya yaseGoli, uHerman Mashaba . 
NgoFebhuwari 2020, iphephandaba iSunday World labika ukuthi uMashego usulile esikhundleni sokuba nguSihlalo wesifundazwe nokuba yilungu lesiShayamthetho sesiFundazwe saseGauteng . 
I-EFF isiphikisile lesi simangalo futhi uMashego ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ukuphikile ukuthi usesulile. 
Ngomhlaka 31 Mashi 2020, uMashego wesula njengoSihlalo we-EFF esifundazweni waphinde washiya nakuSishayamthetho sesifundazwe.IPhini likaSihlalo u-Itani Mukwevho uqokelwe esikhundleni sakhe.Ngo-Agasti 2020, uMashego wavela ethula iqembu lezepolitiki likaMashaba, i-ActionSA. 
NgoJanuwari 2021, uMashego wamemezela ukuthi usejoyine i- Abantu Batho Congress . 
UMashego akakashadi futhi unendodakazi eyodwa. 
UMashego wazalelwa eKing William's Town, esifundazweni saseKapa, kumama omnyama nobaba omhlophe. 
Ukhulele elokishini laseMayfern eNelspruit . 
Uthole iB-Tech in Public Relations eDurban University of Technology . 
UMashego wajoyina i- African National Congress (ANC) esafunda. 
Ushiye i-ANC ngo-2012 wajoyina iqembu i-EFF. 
Wakhethwa njengeLungu lesiShayamthetho sesiFundazwe saseGauteng ngo-2014 kwathi ngonyaka olandelayo waqokwa njengosihlalo obambile wesifundazwe we-EFF ngemuva kokusula kukaZorro Boshielo . 
UMashego wakhethwa waba nguSihlalo wesifundazwe isikhathi esigcwele ngo-2018 futhi ngenxa yalokho waba nguSihlalo wesibili wesifazane esifundazweni. 
UMashego uzichaza njengowesifazane futhi ophikisana nobukhokho . 
Uthe ngesikhathi enengxoxo neMail & Guardian, ukuthi isikhundla sikasihlalo wokuqala wesifazane esifundazweni, uBetty Diale, "kumphathe kabi". 
Ngo-Ephreli 2020, uMashego wamemezela ukuthi uyakweseka ukubuyiselwa kwesigwebo sentambo eNingizimu Afrika . 
UMandisa Monakali uyisikhulumi esidlangalaleni, uthisha, usonhlalonhle, umcwaningi, ummeli, ummeli, umphathi wephrojekthi, umhleli wamasu, umhlangano wokusebenzela nomhleli womphakathi.Ungumsunguli noMqondisi oMkhulu we- Ilitha Labantu . [1] [2] [3] 
UMandisa Monakali noLitha Musyimi-Ogana onguMqondisi Wesifunda we-The African Centre for Empowerment eKenya bahlele iSitimela Sokuthula Kwabesifazane ngesikhathi seNgqungquthela Yomhlaba Yokubamba Intuthuko Esimeme (WSSD) ngo-2002, ngo-Agasti 27-Septhemba 4, 2002. 
Isitimela Sokuthula Kwabesifazane sisuke eRwanda siya eNingizimu Afrika. 
Abesifazane abavela emazweni amaningana ase-Afrika baphelekezela iSitimela Sokuthula ukuyonxenxa nokufuna ukuthi kuphele izimpi nodweshu emazweni abo. 
Inhloso Yesitimela Sokuthula njengoba kushiwo ezimemweni abazithumele; "Ukudlulisa umyalezo oqinile kubaholi bamazwekazi, abaphehli bezimpi, amabutho, abashokobezi, abathengisi bezikhali nabathengisi ezwenikazi i-Afrika ukuthi abesifazane bafuna ukuthula nokuzinza kwezingane zabo nezizukulwane ezizayo futhi bacele abaholi bezindandatho nabenzi balokhu. izimpi zokubaqeda ngokushesha. " 
Umlayezo oya ku-WSSD bekungukuthi kungaba nentuthuko eqhubekayo ngaphandle kokubhekana nokuthula. 
I-Africa Women Peace Train yethulwe eKampala, e-Uganda ngo-Agasti 15 ngomcimbi lapho kwamukelwa khona iSibani Sokuthula. 
I-Peace Train yadabula iKenya, Tanzania, Malawi, Zambia, Mozambique, Botswana futhi yaphelela eGoli, eNingizimu Afrika engqungqutheleni yomhlaba ebibizwa nge-Sustainable Development (WSSD) ngomhlaka 25 Agasti 2002.[2]Uyilungu le-Women's Environment and Development Organisation (WEDO), futhi wahlela iTende Lokusebenza Lwabesifazane Engqungqutheleni Yomhlaba Yentuthuko Eqhubekayo. 
UMandisa ubamba iqhaza minyaka yonke kwiNgqungquthela Yezizwe Ezihlangene Yesimo Sabesifazane abamele iNingizimu Afrika kule ngqungquthela yomhlaba ebanjwa minyaka yonke.Ingqungquthela yango-2015 Yesimo Sabesifazane i-CSW59 yaphawula isikhumbuzo seNgqungquthela yaseBeijing. 
Ingqungquthela yaseBeijing eyabanjwa ngo-1995. 
Uthe ku-CSW59; “Kithina iBeijing +20 ibingakhulumi nge-UN, ibimayelana nezimpilo zethu zansuku zonke njengabesifazane baseNingizimu Afrika futhi ububona okwakwenzeka manje ezweni.Isibalo sabesifazane esinabo kwezokwakha ngokwesibonelo sikhuphukile, ”kusho uMandisa Monakali. Ubambe iqhaza ezingqungqutheleni zaseBeijing zango-2005 nango-2015. 
Ingqungquthela ka-1995 eyayiseBeijing yayiyiNgqungquthela Yesine Yomhlaba Yezabesifazane eyayixhaswe yiNhlangano Yezizwe. 
Ingqungquthela yokuqala yomhlaba yabesifazane yabanjelwa eMexico City ngo-1975, eyesi-2 ngo-1980 eCopenhagen, ingqungquthela yesithathu yabanjelwa eNairobi ngo-1985, eyesine yaba seBeijing ngo-1995. 
Ingqungquthela enochungechunge lwezibuyekezo zeminyaka emihlanu. 
INgqungquthela Yomhlaba Yesine Yabesifazane eBeijing yango-1995 yakha isimemezelo kanye nePlatform for Action. 
Owesifazane Wonyaka WaseKapa UFemina Owesifazane wonyaka I-SAA Women of the Year Umklomelo We-UN Wamalungelo Abantu Umklomelo We-New York Women Watch 
I-Ilitha yinhlangano yezenhlalakahle yaseNingizimu Afrika nenhlangano yezemfundo, inhlangano engenzi nzuzo / inhlangano engekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni (NGO). 
Kuyinhlangano esebenza futhi enikezela ngezinsizakalo kwimiphakathi eyayincishwe amathuba eGugulethu, emalokishini (eNingizimu Afrika) kuyo yonke iNtshonalanga Kapa. 
UMandisa ubamba iqhaza emhlabeni jikelele ezingqungqutheleni nasemicimbini emele i-Ilitha neNingizimu Afrika.I-Ilitha Labantu yasungulwa ngo-1989. 
Yabhaliswa njenge-Not for Profit eNingizimu Afrika noMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi ngo-2003. 
Yinhlangano ekhuthaza ukuthula nentuthuko igxile ekufukuleni umnotho, nokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane. [3] [4] 
Education. 
UThomas wasungula iBlack Nonbelievers, Inc. e2011, njengenhlangano engenzi nzuzo, ubudlelwano bezwe.Izinhloso zayo zifaka phakathi ukuqeda ukucwaswa, ukwandisa ukubonakala, nokunikeza ukwesekwa kanye namathuba okuxhumana nabantu ngokungekholelwa emphakathini wase-Afrika-waseMelika. Ubuholi benhlangano ikakhulu ngabesifazane, futhi buhlanganisa ukumelwa kwe- LGBTQ futhi inezahluko emadolobheni ayishumi ase-US.Isebenzisana nezinye izinhlangano zezwe ezibandakanya i- African American for Humanism, Openly Secular kanye neFreedom From Religion Foundation . 
UMandisa Lateefah Thomas (owazalwa ngo-1976)ungumsunguli nomongameli we-Black Nonbelievers Inc. 
Uke wakhuluma ezingqungqutheleni nasemicimbini yezwe, futhi wakhuthaza i-ajenda yeqembu emithonjeni yezindaba. 
Ukukhuliswa kukaThomas bekusemkhayeni ongahlangene nenkolo, onomzali oyedwa, kepha uchaza ugogo wakhe njengomuntu “okholwayo okholwayo”.Ngesikhathi eneminyaka engamashumi amabili nanye, uThomas wathuthela e- Atlanta nomyeni wakhe, lapho amasiko enza ukuthi kube nzima ukuphila impilo yezwe.Lesi sehlakalo samholela ekutholeni Abangakholwa Abamnyama. 
Ubheka inkolo, futhi ubuKristu ikakhulukazi, ukuthi buye bangena ebuntwini base-Afrika-baseMelika ngenkani. 
UThomas ukhulume eMhlanganweni Kazwelonke Wama-American Atheists ka-2013 .Ngawo lowo nyaka wahlela iBlackout Secular Rally eNew York, umcimbi wokuqala ongaphandle wase-United States owawuholwa ngabangabonakali ngokwebala, kanye nomhlangano wokuqala wezwe owawugubha ukwehluka ngokobuhlanga. Ubonga u-Ayanna Watson ngokusiza ekuthuthukiseni umqondo ngemuva kokuphumelela kweReason Rally ka-2012. 
Ku-2017, uThomas waziwa ngegama kumthethosivivinywa (i-SCR-79) owethulwe yiSenator kahulumeni uRichard Pan, futhi wamukelwa yiCalifornia State Senate, ememezela u-Okthoba 15, 2017 njengomgubho waminyaka yonke we-16 weCalifornia Freethought Day. 
UThomas wenze ukubonakala kwezingxoxo emithonjeni yezindaba kubandakanya i- CBS News, i -Closer Look [14] WABE FM 90.1, i -Code Switch podcast ye-NPR kanye nohlelo lwe- Freedom From Religion Foundation lwe- Freethought Radio . Uboniswe ezincwadini ezibandakanya umagazini iJet ne- Playboy , futhi ubhale izingcezu zemibono yezitolo ezibandakanya i- CNN . Amakhredithi akhe okulingisa afaka phakathi i-Mythicist Milwaukee Show, kanye nama-documentary Contradiction (2013), [16] Racial Taboo (2013),kanye ne- My Week in Atheism (2014). 
UNxumalo wazalelwa wakhulela eThekwini, eNingizimu Afrika. 
Ngo-1977 wajoyina uMkhonto weSizwe (noma "MK"),uphiko lwezempi lwe- African National Congress . 
Ngonyaka olandelayo waboshwa, wabekwa icala lokuvukela umbuso nokuzama ukubulala, wagwetshwa iminyaka engama-22 ejele laseRobben Island, lapho aboshwa khona kusukela ngomhlaka 30 Novemba 1978 kuya kumhlaka 27 Ephreli 1991. [1] 
UNosipho Dumisa ungumbhali nomqondisi waseNingizimu Afrika. 
Ubhale futhi waqondisa ifilimu yakhe yokuqala, i-the thriller crime Nommer 37 (2014, ngesiBhunu ).Uphinde waqondisa uhlelo lweNetflix iGazi Namanzi (2020).Usebenza namaGambit Films, awasungula ngokubambisana.Ubuye wakhiqiza nemisebenzi, njenge-opera yolimi lwesiBhunu iSuidooster. 
Imisebenzi yakhe ikhonjiswe eNingizimu neNingizimu-ntshonalanga futhi yawina imiklomelo yamazwe omhlaba. 
UDumisa ungumZulu, kodwa ufunde isiBhunu esikoleni.Imisebenzi yakhe ijwayele ukufaka iKapa, iNingizimu Afrika njengesizinda. 
Wayengumngane ilungu -African National Congress (ANC), Ntwanambi kwaba-ANC USotswebhu ku kuNational Council of Provinces, owesifazane wokuqala ukuba babe noSotswebhu abasha, isikhundla wayemhlonipha waze ehla ngo 2014. Wakhonza njengephayona lesikhathi ilungu weNational Council of Provinces, endlini engenhla Iphalamende South Africa, kusukela ngo-2008 kuze kube yilapho 2014.UNtwanambi wayesebenza njengephini likamengameli we- African National Congress Women's League (ANCWL) ngesikhathi sokushona kwakhe. 
UNtwanambi wayeyilungu lokuqala leSouth African Democratic Teachers Union (SADTU) kanye ne-United Women Organisation (UWO).Wayephinde abe yilungu leNational Executive Committee ye-ANC. 
UNosipho Ntwanambi ushone kulandela ukugula isikhathi eside ngoLwesibili, ngoJulayi 8, 2014, eneminyaka engama-54. 
UNosipho Makamba-Botya ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika osebenza njengelungu lePhalamende Lesifundazwe saseNtshonalanga Kapa le- Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF).Ube yi-MPP ngoMeyi 2019 futhi usebenza njengosotswebhu weqembu. 
UMakamba-Botya ubuye abe yiphini likasihlalo we-EFF esifundazweni. 
Kungekudala ngemuva kokuvalwa kwamaqembu ezepolitiki kanye nabalweli benkululeko ababengumbutho wenkululeko ngo-1990,uNosipho wakhethwa njengosihlalo we- African National Congress Women's League (ANCWL) esifundeni sase-Uitenhage. 
Uqhubeke nomsebenzi wakhe wokuba yisishoshovu futhi wasebenzela abantu nomphakathi wase-Uitenhage futhi ngo-1994 wakhethwa njengekhansela lokuqala ngaphansi kwesigatshana somkhandlu wasendaweni omusha owakhiwa ngokwentando yeningi isikhathi esiyiminyaka emihlanu kuya ku-1999. 
Ngemuva kwalokhu,uthathe isikhathi empilweni yakhe yezepolitiki ngenxa yokugula kodwa waqhubeka nokuvolontiya njengothisha enkulisa iRuth Dano e-Uitenhage. 
Wabe esedlula emhlabeni ngoMeyi 2009 eneminyaka engama-71.Wabekwa ngokuthula phakathi kwabantu bakubo ngomhla ka-23 Meyi 2009 emathuneni eKwanobuhle emathuneni e- ANC . [1] 
Amahhovisi esifunda e-ANC ePort Elizabeth, e-Eastern Cape aqanjwa njengeFlorence Matomela House. [1] Umculi uNombulelo Dassie udale umfanekiso oqoshwe ngoFlorence Matomela.[2]Umbukiso ononyaka owenganyelwe nguNomabaso Bedeshe ububanjelwe eRed Location Museum ehlonipha uFlorence Matomela, uNontuthuzelo Mabala, uVeronica Sobukwe, uLilian Diedricks noNosipho Dastile.Embukisweni bekukhona nemilando yabantu kanye nezithombe zabesifazane abahlanu. 
Amajikijolo ejikelezo ajwayele ukufaka into yokuncintisana, lapho "owinile" eba umhlanganyeli okwazi ukukhipha umjovo kuqala, owokugcina, noma okude kakhulu ngokuya ngemithetho esungulwe ngaphambilini.Zingasebenza njengesingeniso ebudlelwaneni bezocansi nabanye abesilisa, noma njengezindawo zokuya ocansini eminyakeni noma esimweni lapho ukwenza ucansi njalo nomunye umuntu kungenzeki. 
Ngenkathi ama-jerks wombuthano enesici se- homoerotic, abanye abahlaziyi bahumusha imisebenzi yeqembu labafana abasebasha njengama-circle jerks njengomzamo wokusungula ubungqingili, ubukhosi besilisa ngaphakathi kweqembu.Kodwa-ke, isazi sezenhlalo saseMelika uBernard Lefkowitz uqinisekisa ukuthi empeleni okugqugquzela ukubamba iqhaza yisifiso sokuba abangane babone futhi bavume amandla abo ocansi, okusiza ekulweni nemizwa yentsha yokungazethembi ehlobene nokwenziwa kocansi. 
Isihlahla sikaKhisimusi sihlotshiswe ngamathoyizi ocansi, eMilan, e-Italy, ngo-2013 
Ama-vibrator we-anal aklanyelwe ukufakwa ku-rectum, engahle ivuse i- prostate emadodeni. 
Eziphephe kakhulu zinesisekelo esine-flared esihlala ngaphandle komzimba, esivimbela ithoyizi ukuthi lingabuyiseki. 
Ama-vibrator enhlamvu amancane, ama-vibrator amise okwenhlamvu angasetshenziselwa ukukhuthaza ngqo noma ukufakwa kwamanye amathoyizi ezocansi ukukhuthaza ukukhuthazeka. 
Amanye athengiswa ngamaluphu anwebekayo wokunamathiselwa njengethoyizi lomunwe noma iringi yeqhude. 
Ama-vibrator we-G-spot agobile ngakolunye uhlangothi ukwenza lula ukuvuselelwa kwe- G-spot yabesifazane. 
Ama-vibrator we-P-spot agobile ngakolunye uhlangothi ukwenza lula ukuvuselelwa kwe- P-spot yesilisa. 
Ama-vibrator okunethezeka agxile kakhulu ekwakhiweni nasekusebenziseni izinto ezibizayo ezikhanga emakethe yezemfashini esezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu. 
Isidlidlizi sonogwaja, okuhlukahluka kuso okuningana, iyithoyizi lowesifazane elidumile lezocansi elithandwa kakhulu nguchungechunge lwethelevishini iSex and the City . Iqukethe i-shaft engafakwa evame ukusebenza ngokungeziwe, njengokujikeleza kanye nobuhlalu bangaphakathi noma isenzo esikhanyayo. 
Okunamathiselwe kushaft kuyisidlidlizi clitoral stimulator. 
Kwabaningi abadlidliza onogwaja lokhu kuza ngesimo "sezindlebe zonogwaja" ezihlala ohlangothini ngalunye lwe- clitoris . 
Ama-vibrator wands, afana ne- Hitachi Magic Wand, angama-vibrator amakhulu ngokuvamile axhumeka esitolo sikagesi (uma kuqhathaniswa nokusebenza kwamandla ebhethri) futhi avame ukuthengiswa njengama-massager emuva.Bayakwazi ukukhiqiza ukudlidlizela okunamandla amakhulu kunama-vibrator amaningi anikwe amandla ngebhethri. [1] Okunamathiselwe okuhlukahlukene okwenziwe nge-silicone noma okokusebenza kwenjoloba kuvumela ithoyizi ukuthi lisetshenziswe ngokungena, noma linikeze ithoyizi ukuthungwa okuthakazelisa ngokwengeziwe. [2] AmaSybia izidlidliza ezinendawo ezimbili ngendlela yesikhuthazi se-clitoral kanye ne-stimulator yesitho sangasese sowesifazane, eklanyelwe ukuvuselela lezi zindawo ezimbili ezinobungozi ngasikhathi sinye nangokuzimela. 
I-Womanizer: i-clitoral stimulator isebenzisa ukudlidliza komoya nokumunca. [2] [3] 
Ama-dildos amaGrikhi ayevame ukwenziwa ngesikhumba esigxishwe uboya ukuze sibunikeze ngamazinga ahlukahlukene okushuba nokuqina. 
Babevame ukugcotshwa ngamafutha omnqumo, futhi basetshenziselwe ukwenza ucansi neminye imisebenzi. 
AmaGrikhi nawo ayengamaqembu okuqala ukusebenzisa igama elithi "ithoyizi" uma kubhekiswa kudilidi. UDildos angabonakala kwezinye zezibonelo zobuciko be- vase yasendulo yamaGrikhi . 
Ezinye izingcezu zibonisa ukusetshenziswa kwazo eqenjini lezocansi noma ekushayeni indlwabu yabesifazane bodwa.Omunye umkhumbi, cishe wekhulu lesithupha BCE, uveza indawo lapho owesifazane egoba khona ukuze enze ucansi lomlomo endodeni, kuyilapho enye indoda isizofaka idilidi endunu yayo . [1] isitolo. 
UPage DuBois, ongumbhali wezinto zakudala nowesifazane, uphakamisa ukuthi ama-dildos ayekhona kwezobuciko bamaGrikhi ngoba imicabango yakudala yamaGreki yakuthola kunzima ukukhulelwa ucansi lwenzeka ngaphandle kokungena. 
Ngakho-ke, ukushaya indlwabu kwabesifazane noma ucansi phakathi kwabesifazane kudinga ukuthi kusetshenziswe i-phallus yokufakelwa. Ama-dildos amaGrikhi ayevame ukwenziwa ngesikhumba esigxishwe uboya ukuze sibunikeze ngamazinga ahlukahlukene okushuba nokuqina. 
Babevame ukugcotshwa ngamafutha omnqumo, futhi basetshenziselwe ukwenza ucansi neminye imisebenzi. 
AmaGrikhi nawo ayengamaqembu okuqala ukusebenzisa igama elithi "ithoyizi" uma kubhekiswa kudilidi. 
IMETRO Ngiyakuncenga, ungaqambi amanga, othandekayo uCorrioto: ngubani indoda eyayikuthungatha leli dildo elibomvu elikhanyayo? 
Ekugcineni uthola ukuthi umenzi abe yindoda ebizwa ngokuthi yiKerdon, ofihla ukuhweba kwakhe ngaphambili kokuba ngumthungi wezinwele,ashiye amfune. 
IMetro neKerdon ngabalingiswa abaphambili emdlalweni olandelayo ngokulandelana, uMime VII, lapho evakashele esitolo sakhe. 
Ngasekuqaleni kweminyaka yama-1590, umbhali wemidlalo yamaNgisi uThomas Nashe wabhala inkondlo eyaziwa ngokuthi yiThe Choise of Valentines, uNashe's Dildo noma uThe Merrie Ballad kaNashe uDildo wakhe . 
Lokhu kwakungashicilelwanga ngaleso sikhathi, ngenxa yamanyala kodwa kwakusatshalaliswa kabanzi nokwenze igama likaNashe laziwa kab.Le nkondlo ichaza ukuvakashela indawo yezifebe ngumuntu obizwa ngo "Tomalin"; uthungatha isithandwa sakhe, uFrancis, osephenduke isifebe. 
Ukuphela kwendlela angambona ngayo ukumqasha. 
Kodwa-ke, usebenzisa i-glass dildo njengoba ezithola engakwazi ukwenza ucansi ukuze aneliseke. 
Enye indlela yamathoyizi ocansi abesilisa nabesifazane yilezo ze- electrostimulation evusa inkanuko . 
I-erotic electrostimulation isho isenzo sokusebenzisa ugesi ukukhuthaza ezocansi. Maphakathi nawo-1970, imishini yezokwelapha ye-transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation (TENS) yayitholakala kabanzi. 
Imishini isebenza ngokuvuselela ukuphela kwezinzwa ngogesi, ithumele izimpawu zokuvuselela ebuchosheni.I-Electrostimulation isebenza ngalesi simiso esifanayo, lapho ubuchopho buthola isignali yokuvuselela ezithweni zangasese, kukhishwa ama-hormone wobumnandi. 
Ifenisha evusa inkanuko iyifenisha eyakhelwe ngokukhethekile induduzo, amazinga wokungena,nokukhuthaza. 
Eyaziwa nangokuthi ifenisha yocansi, yinoma yiluphi uhlobo lwefenisha olungaba lusizo emisebenzini yezocansi . 
Yize cishe noma yini ingasetshenziselwa le njongo,ifenisha evame kakhulu esetshenziselwa ezocansi umbhede, kepha osofa namasofa beza ngomzuzwana osondele.Le akuyona ifenisha evusa inkanuko,ngoba ukusetshenziswa kwayo okuyinhloko akuyona inkanuko. 
Njengoba i-frot iyisenzo socansi esingangeni, ingozi yokudlulisa isifo esithathelwana ngocansi (STI / STD) esidinga ukuthintana ngqo phakathi kwezingqamuzana ze-mucous kanye ne- pre-ejaculate noma isidoda kuyehla. 
I-HIV iphakathi kwezifo ezidinga ukuthintana ngqo, kanti ucwaningo lukhombisa ukuthi abukho ubungozi bokudluliswa kwe-HIV nge-frot.[1] Kodwa-ke, i-frot isengadlulisa ezinye izifo ezithathelwana ngocansi, njenge- HPV (engadala izinsumpa zangasese ) nezintwala ze-pubic (izinkalankala). [2]Imithi yokugoma iyatholakala uma ulwa ne-HPV. 
Frot noma frotting ( sidolobha ngoba frottage ;. Ult kusukela French isenzo frotter, "ukuze deda") iyinhlangano non-penetrative uhlobo umsebenzi wocansi besilisa-to-besilisa ukuthi ngokuvamile kuhilela ngqo umthondo Lokudlulisa umthondo contact.Leli gama lathandwa kakhulu yizishoshovu zamadoda angama-gay ezahlambalaza umkhuba wobulili bendunu, kodwa selokhu lavela ukuhlanganisa izinhlobonhlobo zezinto ezithandwayo ngalesi senzo, okungahle noma kungasho izimo ezithile mayelana neminye imisebenzi yezocansi . 
Ngenxa yesimo sayo esingangeni, i-frot inenzuzo ephephile yocansi yokunciphisa ingozi yokudlulisela i- HIV / AIDS ; kodwa-ke, kusenengozi yokutheleleka ngocansi kwesikhumba nesikhumba, njenge- HPV nezintwala ze-pubic (izinkalankala), zombili ezingadluliselwa noma ngabe izilonda zingabonakali. 
Ucwaningo lwango-2011 lwabesilisa abathandana nabesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abenza ucansi i-Journal of Sexual Medicine luthole ukuthi ezinhlanganisweni ezingaphezu kuka-1,300 ezahlukahlukene zezenzo zocansi ezenziwayo, okuvame kakhulu, okuyi-16% yakho konke ukuhlangana,"bekubambe umlingani wabo ngothando, beqabulana nomlingani wabo emlonyeni, ukushaya indlwabu ngamehlo,ukushaya indlwabu, nokushaya indlwabu umlingani, nokuthinta izitho zangasese. " [1] 
Ukuhlikihla ezithweni zobulili kuye kwabonwa naphakathi kwabesilisa bezinye izilwane.Phakathi kwama- bonobos, i-frottage ivame ukwenzeka lapho abesilisa ababili belenga esihlahleni somuthi futhi behlanganyela ocingweni lobudoda; kwenzeka futhi ngenkathi abesilisa ababili besesimweni sobufundisi . [1] 
Incazelo yesimanje ye- frot yavela kumongo wengxoxo mpikiswano ngesimo sobulili bendunu ngaphakathi komphakathi wesilisa oyisitabane; abanye abasenkanjini yokulwa nezidunu, abamelene nobungqabavu baphikelela ekutheni ucansi lwendunu kufanele lugwenywe ngokuphelele.Umbono owodwa wathi ukuthandwa kobulili bendunu kuzokwehla, mhlawumbe ngokwehla okuhambisanayo kwamazinga e-HIV, uma amadoda athandana namanye angancengwa ngandlela-thile ukuba ayeke ukucabanga ngocansi lwangasese njengomkhuba "we- vanilla ", kodwa kunokuthile "kinky" hhayi -ihlonipheke impela-njengoba kwenzeka kuma-1950s naku-1960s, lapho abesilisa abayizitabane ababekhetha ukwenza indlwabu kuphela kanye ne- fallatio kwesinye isikhathi basebenzisa igama elichazayo le-slang term brownie for aficionados of anal sex. 
Isishoshovu sezitabane uBill Weintraub waqala ukugqugquzela kakhulu futhi watusa incazelo eqondene nobulili yokuthi "ukugcotshwa umthondo kuya epipi" njengeqhaza kwizithangami ze-Intanethi ngesinye isikhathi ngasekupheleni kweminyaka yama-1990, wathi wasungula leli gama. 
"Angilisebenzisi igama elithi 'frottage," ngoba yigama lesi-ersatz lesiFulentshi elingakhombisa noma yikuphi ukuhlikihla okuvusa inkanuko, "esho. 
"UFrot, ngokuqhathanisa, uhlala enza ucansi lwe-phallus-to-phallus." 
I-Weintraub ikholelwa ukuthi yilokho ucansi lwangempela oluyikho - ukuthintana ngokobulili / isitho sangasese. 
Eminye imigomo ye- frot ifaka phakathi ukungqubuzana, okungabhekisela encazelweni ebanzi yefriji kepha futhi nobulili be-penis-penis ikakhulukazi, ukulwa ngenkemba, isitayela se-Oxford, i- Princeton rub, ne- Ivy League rub. 
Uhlobo lwabesifazane lwe-frotting lubizwa nge- tribbing, okusho nokuthi "ukugcoba [izitho zangasese]" futhi lisuselwa esiGrekini. 
I-Fellatio ingavusa ucansi kubo bobabili ababambiqhaza, futhi abesilisa abathola i-fallatio bavame ukuzwa i- orgasm kanye nokuchithwa kwesidoda ngesikhathi sesenzo.Abantu zingasebenzisa fellatio njengoba foreplay aqhanyelise yabo umlingani ubulili ngaphambi lwesitho sangasese sowesifazane noma bendunu bezoziphatha, noma ezinye umsebenzi wocansi, [1]noma bangase uzisebenzise njengezaba ovusa inkanuko futhi isenzo sokusondelana ngokobulili e kwesokudla lalo. [1] [2] Umlingani ocansini angaba ngowobulili obubili. 
Lapho umthondo is ukwelula emlonyeni kothile, kusengathiwa irrumatio, nakuba leli gama kuyaqabukela asetshenziswa. 
Deep-throating kuyinto socansi lapho umuntu ethatha yonke uzakwethu sika uqonde umthondo phakathi umlomo nomphimbo. 
Le ndlela negama laziwa kakhulu yifilimu yezithombe zocansi yango- 1972 ethi Deep Throat . 
Ngokuvamile, umuntu owamukela i-fallatio uphethe.Ukuze ujulise kakhulu, ipipi kufanele libe lide ngokwanele ukuze likwazi ukufinyelela ngemuva komphimbo womnikezeli. [1] 
Ukudonsa okujulile kungaba nzima, ngenxa ye- gag reflex yemvelo ebangelwe lapho kuthintwa ulwanga oluthambile. Abantu banokuzwela okuhlukile kule reflex, futhi ngokuzijwayeza, abanye abantu bafunda ukuyicindezela. 
Ukudonsa okujulile kuholela ohlotsheni oluhluke ngokuphelele lokuvuselelwa ngomlomo uma kuqhathaniswa ne-fallatio ejwayelekile: ulimi alunamandla ngesikhathi sokujula nokuncela kuba nzima; umthondo we-glans ungashukunyiswa kakhulu ukuqina kwepharynx . 
I-Fellatio kwesinye isikhathi yenziwa lapho ukungena kwe-penile kungadala ubunzima bomzimba kozakwethu ocansini. 
Isibonelo, kungenziwa ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa esikhundleni sokuya ocansini ngemibhangqwana efisa ukuhlanganyela ocansini obuseduze ngenkathi igwema ubunzima bokuya ocansini phakathi nezigaba zakamuva zokukhulelwa. 
I-Fellatio (eyaziwa nangokuthi ukuwa, futhi ku-slang njenge- blowjob, i- BJ, inika ikhanda, noma ukuncela ) isenzo socansi lomlomo esihilela umuntu ovuselela ipipi lomunye umuntu ngokusebenzisa umlomo, umphimbo, noma Kokubili.Ukugqugquzela ngomlomo i- scrotum nakho kungabizwa ngokuthi yi- fellatio,noma ngokuhlangana njenge- teabagging .Uma i-fallatio yenziwa ngokwakho, isenzo sibizwa nge- autofellatio . 
I-Chlamydia, i- human papillomavirus (HPV), i- gonorrhea, i- herpes, i- hepatitis (izinhlobo eziningi), nezinye izifo ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI / ama-STD) zingadluliselwa ngocansi lomlomo.Noma ikuphi ukushintshaniswa ngokocansi kuketshezi lomzimba nomuntu onegciwane lesandulela ngculaza, igciwane elibanga ingculaza, kubeka engcupheni yokutheleleka. 
Ingozi yokutheleleka nge-STI, noma kunjalo, ibhekwa njengephansi kakhulu ocansini lomlomo kunokobulili besitho sangasese sowesifazane noma sangasese, kanti ukudluliswa kwe-HIV kuthathwa njengengozi ephansi kakhulu maqondana nocansi lomlomo. 
Izixhumanisi zibikwe phakathi kocansi lomlomo nomdlavuza womlomo nabantu abane-HPV.Ucwaningo olwenziwe ngo-2005 lwaphakamisa ukuthi ukwenza ucansi lomlomo olungavikelekile kumuntu ophethwe i-HPV kungakhuphula ingozi yomdlavuza womlomo. 
Ucwaningo luthole ukuthi amaphesenti angama-36 eziguli ezinomdlavuza ane-HPV uma kuqhathaniswa nephesenti elilodwa kuphela leqembu elilawula impilo. 
Ubulili bomlomo buvame ukusetshenziswa njengendlela yokugcina ubuntombi, ikakhulukazi phakathi kokubhangqa kwabobulili obuhlukile; lokhu kwesinye isikhathi kubizwa ngobuntombi bobuchwepheshe (obengeza ngokubandakanya ucansi lwendunu, ukushaya indlwabu ngokuhlanganyela kanye nezinye izenzo zocansi ezingangeni, kepha kungafaki ucansi lobulili besitho sangasese sowesilisa).[1]Umqondo "wobuntombi obuchwepheshile" noma ukuzithiba ocansini ngokusebenzisa ucansi lomlomo uthandwa kakhulu phakathi kwentsha e-United States, [3] kufaka phakathi maqondana namantombazane asakhula angagcinanga nje ngokukhipha amasoka awo ukuze alondoloze ubuntombi bawo, kepha futhi ukudala nokugcina ukusondelana noma ukugwema ukukhulelwa. [3] Ezinye izizathu ezinikezwe lo mkhuba phakathi kwamantombazane asakhula ingcindezi yontanga futhi njengesingeniso sabo kwezocansi. [3] Ngokwengeziwe, abesilisa abayizitabane bangabheka i-fallatio njengendlela yokugcina ubuntombi babo, ngokungena kwe-penile-anal kuchazwa njengokuholela ekulahlekelweni ubuntombi, kuyilapho abanye abesilisa abesilisa abathandanayo bengachaza i-fallatio njengendlela yabo eyinhloko yokwenza ucansi. 
Izinhlobo 
I-Heteroflexibility iyindlela yokuthambekela kwezocansi noma indlela yokuziphatha ngokobulili ebonakala ngemisebenzi emincane yobungqingili ngendlela ehlukile ngokobulili obuhlukile, engahle noma ingahlukanisi nobungqingili . 
Ibonakaliswe njenge "iqonde kakhulu". [1] Yize kwesinye isikhathi kulinganiswa ne- bi-ilukuluku lokuchaza ukuqhubeka okubanzi kokuthambekela kwezocansi phakathi kobungqingili nobungqingili, [2] abanye ababhali bahlukanisa ukungahambisani nezimo njengokushoda "kwesifiso sokuzama [3]Isimo esihambisanayo lapho kuqhutshwa khona umsebenzi wobungqingili naso sichaziwe, kubizwa ngokuthi yi-homoflexibility. [4] 
Ucwaningo lukazwelonke e-US naseCanada lukhombisa ukuthi amaphesenti ama-3 kuye kwangama-4 kwentsha yesilisa, uma inikezwa ithuba lokukhetha igama elichaza kahle imizwa yabo yezocansi, izifiso zabo, nokuziphatha kwabo, bakhetha "ikakhulu" noma "ikakhulu" abesilisa nabesifazane. 
Njengoba u- "100% owesilisa nomuntu" kungukucatshangwa okukhulu kunakho konke, "ikakhulukazi-owesilisa nowesifazane" kwaba umgijimi wokuqala ukuzichaza.[1]Kwabesilisa abayi-160 okwaxoxwa nabo ngocwaningo ngo-2008 nango-2009, cishe oyedwa kwabayisishiyagalombili wabika izinto ezihehisa abantu bobulili obufanayo, amaphupho, nokuchoboza. 
Iningi lalinayo le mizwa kusukela esikoleni esiphakeme; abanye abambalwa bazithuthukise muva nje. 
Futhi kusampula kazwelonke yezinsizwa ezineminyaka yobudala emaphakathi engama-22, inani "eliqonde ngqo" lenyuka lapho bephothula ucwaningo olufanayo eminyakeni eyisithupha kamuva. 
Iphesenti eliphakeme kakhulu lamadoda asebekhulile asebekhulile abasesikoleni esiphakeme e-US nakwamanye amazwe ambalwa (kubandakanya iNew Zealand neNorway) enza ukhetho olufanayo. [2] 
Ngokungafani "nobungqingili kuze kube ukuthweswa iziqu" kanye nama-pejoratives afanayo, ukungafani kalula kubhekwa njengokusho okuhle, futhi kuvame ukuba ilebula elizisebenzisayo, noma ngabe ukusetshenziswa kwaleli gama njenge- pop-culture slur kufakazelwe. [1] 
Ososayensi bezenhlalakahle uHoy naseLondon baveza ukuthi amanye amadoda alala namanye amadoda nokho akhomba njengabobulili obuhlukile. 
Bangase babe nomuzwa wokuthi ukuya ocansini nabesilisa ngezikhathi ezithile kungumphumela wokungatholakali kwabesifazane, noma ukuthi ukukhangwa kwabo ngabobulili obufanayo akuvamile ukuba kungaphazamisi ubunikazi babo. 
Bangase bathi nakuba behehwa ngabesifazane ngothando,ngokomzimba nangokomzwelo, ukukhanga kwabo kwabesilisa kungokocansi nje kuphela, abanakho ukukhangwa ngokomzwelo.Isu lokuphatha elinamandla kakhulu lawa madoda ukuhumusha imikhuba yabo yezocansi nabesifazane ukuthi ibaluleke kakhulu kunokuhlangana kwabo ngokocansi nabesilisa. 
Bangazibona futhi njengabesilisa, ngenkathi behlanganisa ubunikazi obuhehwa ngabobulili obufanayo nobufazi. 
Abanye besilisa nabesifazane abahlangabezana nobulili obufanayo ngenkathi bekhomba njengobungqingili benza lokho ukugwema imiphumela emibi yezenhlalo eza nokuzibonakalisa njengelungu lomphakathi we-LGBT. [7] 
Ukukhula kwendoda kokubili ngaphambi kokuzalwa nangesikhathi sobuntwana nokuthomba kuthonywa kakhulu yi- testosterone futhi, ngezinga elincane, i- hormone yokukhula . 
Kodwa-ke, ama-hormone endogenous kamuva anenani elikhulu ekwelapheni i-micropenis ebangelwa ukusilela kwamahomoni, njenge- hypopituitarism noma i- hypogonadism . 
Ukwelashwa kwe-testosterone kuqalwa kabusha ebusheni kubafana abane-hypogonadism kuphela. 
Ukukhula kwePenile kuqedwa ekugcineni kokuthomba, kufana nokuqedwa kokukhula kokuphakama, nokunikezwa kwe-testosterone eyengeziwe kubantu abadala abangemva kokubeletha kuveza ukukhula okuncane noma okungekho okunye. 
Ezimweni ezimbi kakhulu ze-micropenis, awunawo noma yimuphi umphini, futhi i-glans ibonakala ihlala cishe esikhunjeni se-pubic. 
Kusukela ngawo-1960 kuya ngasekupheleni kweminyaka yama-1970, bekuvamile ukuthi kunconywe ukuphinda kunikezwe ucansi nokuhlinzwa. 
Lokhu bekungenzeka ikakhulukazi uma ubufakazi buphakamisa ukuthi impendulo ku-testosterone eyengeziwe ne-pubertal testosterone izoba mpofu. 
Ngokwamukelwa ngumzali, umfana wayezophinde anikezwe kabusha futhi aqanjwe kabusha njengentombazane, futhi kwenziwa ukuhlinzwa ukususa ama-testes nokwakha isitho sangasese sangasese . 
Lokhu kwakususelwa kumqondo osubuzwa manje wokuthi ubunikazi bobulili babunjwe ngokuphelele kusukela ekuhlalisweni komphakathi, nokuthi indoda enepipi elincane ayitholi ndawo eyamukelekayo emphakathini. 
Isibhedlela iJohns Hopkins, isikhungo esaziwa kakhulu ngale ndlela, senze izabelo eziyishumi nambili kusukela ngo-1960 kuya ku-1980, ikakhulukazi owaDavid Reimer (onqenqemeni lwendoda yakhe lwacekelwa engozini yokusoka), enganyelwe nguJohn Money . 
Maphakathi nawo-1990s, ukwabelwa kabusha kwakungavamisile ukunikezwa, futhi womathathu amagceke ayephonswe inselelo. 
Izifundo zangaphambili zokuhlinzwa okunjalo, zizwakalisa ukungagculiseki kwazo ngomphumela wabantu abadala, zabamba iqhaza elikhulu ekuqedeni lo mkhuba. 
Ukunikezwa kabusha kwezocansi akuvamile ukwenziwa namuhla nge-micropenis ebucayi (yize kwesinye isikhathi kusadingidwa ngombuzo wokukhulisa umfana njengentombazane). [1] 
Micropenis kuyinto encane ngokungavamile umthondo . 
A umbandela evamile iyi amaphiko(kulinganiswa phezulu) uqonde penile obuphelele okungenani 2.5 ngeziphambeko ejwayelekile lincane kusho ubukhulu womuntu umthondo, [1]noma umncane kakhulu kunalokho mayelana yomuntu omdala uma kuqhathaniswa nokwakhiwa okumaphakathi kwe- 12.5 cm (5 ku) . 
[2] Isimo sivame ukuqashelwa ngemuva nje kokuzalwa.Leli gama livame ukusetshenziswa kwezokwelapha lapho lonke ipipi, i- scrotum, ne- perineum zingenakho ukungacaci, njenge- hypospadias .I-Micropenis yenzeka cishe ku-0.6% wabesilisa.[2] 
Ezimweni ezingajwayelekile ezihlotshaniswa ne-micropenis, iningi lezimo zokuncishiswa kokukhiqizwa kokubeletha kwe-androgen noma umphumela, njengokuthuthuka okungavamile kwamasende (i-testicular dysgenesis), i- Klinefelter syndrome, i- Leydig cell hypoplasia, amaphutha athile we- testosterone noma i-dihydrotestosterone synthesis ( 17,20-lyase defence, 5α-reductase defence ), androgen insensitivity syndromes, insider pituitary stimulation ( gonadotropin defence), nezinye izinhlobo ze- hypogonadism yokuzalwa. 
I-Micropenis nayo ingenzeka njengengxenye yama-syndromes amaningi we-malformation symromes angafaki ama-chromosomes ocansi. 
Kwesinye isikhathi kuyisibonakaliso sokuntuleka kokukhula kwama-hormone noma i-congenital hypopituitarism .Izakhi zofuzo eziningana ze- homeobox zithinta usayizi wepipi nowedijithi ngaphandle kokungajwayelekile kwe-hormone. 
Ngaphezu kwalokho, ekuvezweni kwe-utero kweminye imishanguzo yokuzala esuselwe ku-estrogen efana ne- diethylstilbestrol (DES) ixhunyaniswe nokungajwayelekile kwezitho zobulili noma ipipi elincane kunejwayelekile. 
Umqondo wakamuva futhi oqondile wegama lobuciko njengesifinyezo sobuciko bokudala noma ubuciko obuhle buvele ekuqaleni kwekhulu le-17. [1]Ubuciko obuhle bubhekisa ekhonweni elisetshenziselwa ukuveza ubuciko bomculi, noma ukubandakanya imizwa yobuhle yezithameli, noma ukudonsela izethameli ekucabangeni ngomsebenzi wobuciko ocijisiswe kakhudlwana noma ocolekile. 
Ngaphakathi kwalo mqondo wakamuva, igama elithi ubuciko lingabhekisa ezintweni eziningana: (i)isifundo sekhono lokudala, (ii) inqubo yokusebenzisa ikhono lokudala, (iii) umkhiqizo wekhono lokudala, noma (iv) isipiliyoni sezithameli ngekhono lokudala.Ubuciko bokudala ( ubuciko njengesiyalo) iqoqo lemikhakha ekhiqiza imisebenzi yobuciko ( ubuciko njengezinto) ephoqelelwa idrayivu yomuntu (ubuciko njengomsebenzi) futhi idlulise umlayezo, imizwa, noma okufanekiselwa ngukuthi oqondayo ahumushe (art as isipiliyoni). 
Ubuciko yinto evuselela imicabango yomuntu, imizwa, izinkolelo, noma imibono yakhe ngezinzwa. 
Imisebenzi yobuciko ingenziwa ngokusobala ngale njongo noma ihunyushwe ngesisekelo sezithombe noma izinto. 
Kwamanye izazi ezinjengo Kant, sciences kanye nobuciko angase zihlukaniswa ngokuthatha isayensi njengoba bemelela esizindeni ulwazi kanye nobuciko njengoba bemelela esizindeni nenkululeko yokukhuluma wobuciko. [1] 
Ubuciko bungabonakala ngokuya nge-mimesis (ukumelwa kwayo kweqiniso), ukulandisa (ukuxoxa izindaba), ukukhuluma, ukuxhumana kwemizwa, noma ezinye izimfanelo. 
Ngesikhathi sobuRoma, ubuciko babonwa "njengobungcweti obukhethekile bengqondo yomuntu obabekwa enkolweni nakwezesayensi". 
Ubuciko uhla olwahlukahlukene (nemikhiqizo) yemisebenzi yabantu efaka umcabango wokudala ukuveza ubuchwepheshe bezobuchwepheshe, ubuhle,amandla ezemizwa , noma imibono yomqondo. 
Ngokombono womlando wobuciko, imisebenzi yobuciko ibikhona cishe isikhathi eside njengesintu: kusukela kubuciko bangaphambi komlando kuya kubuciko besimanje ;kodwa-ke,ezinye izazi zemfundiso yenkolo zinomuzwa wokuthi umqondo ojwayelekile "wemisebenzi yobuciko" awulingani kahle ngaphandle kwemiphakathi yanamuhla yaseNtshonalanga.[2]Umqondo wokuqala wencazelo yobuciko uhlobene kakhulu nencazelo yakudala yesiLatini, ehumusha ngokuqinile ukuthi "ikhono" noma "ubuciko",njengoba kuhlotshaniswa namagama anjengelithi "artisan".Amazwi English kulomthombo incazelo zihlanganisa mshini, yokufakelwa, artifice, ubuciko wezokwelapha, futhi ubuciko ezempi.Kodwa-ke, kukhona okunye ukusetshenziswa okuningi okuvamile kwegama,konke ngokuhlobene ne- etymology yalo. 
Takunda Mafika abadlale Mbira, i-African umculo insimbi, adumile phakathi Shona abantu Zimbabwe .Ufundise abantu imbira, izikole zasendaweni kanye namakolishi futhi wabamba ama-workshops amaningi kanye nemidlalo eZimbabwe, Germany, Switzerland, Austria, Italy, Poland naseNamibia. 
[1] Ngeqembu lakhe alisungulayo, elibizwa ngeTru Bantu, uqophe i-albhamu ethi Dzimwe Nguva, esidayise kuleli nakwamanye amazwe.Ubekade esebenza nabaculi abaningi baseZimbabwe abanjengoWillom Tight, Chiwoniso, Alexio, Mafriq, Sebede, Sam & Selmor Mtukudzi, nabanye. [2] UTakunda Mafika ubengomunye wabasunguli kanye nomphathi weMbira Society Zimbabwe. 
UTakunda (obizwa ngegama elithi TK) wayekade eyiGunoror Governor ngonyaka we-2000 ePhalamende lezingane. 
Wayeneziqu zeMusic and Musicology azithola eMidlands State University eZimbabwe. 
Kusukela ngo-2009 uTaku wasebenza njengomxhumanisi Wezikole ze- UNESCO ngaphansi kohlaka lwezemfundo lwentuthuko esimeme . 
Ngo-2010 uTaku wamenywa ukuba ajoyine uhambo lomculo lwamazwe omhlaba olwaluhlelwe yi-Jesuit Mission Nuremberg, Germany, kanye nabaculi abavela e-Europe, Asia, South America nase Africa. [3] 
Ngomculo wakhe nangemisebenzi yakhe uTaku wayevame ukukhuluma ngezinkinga zomphakathi eZimbabwe kanye nezifundo zentando yeningi nenkululeko. 
Wayengummeli owaziwayo wentuthuko enokuthula nezinzile eZimbabwe. [1]Ngaphandle kokuzibophezela kwakhe njengothisha we-UNESCO [2] wayengumxhumanisi wezwe we-The Global Experience, i-NGO yamazwe omhlaba ezinze eMünster, eJalimane. [3]Ubemenywe kaningi eJalimane ukuthi azobamba iqhaza ezingqungqutheleni nasekuqeqesheni izindaba zokubamba iqhaza kwentsha, ukufunda ngamasiko nokwazi ukusebenza kwabezindaba. 
UTaku waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela ngemuva kokuhlaselwa yisifo sohlangothi ngomhlaka 1 Okthoba 2011. 
Uqale wakhombisa izimpawu zokululama ekusebenzeni kobuchopho ngomhla ka-7 Okthoba, kodwa isimo sakhe sehla ngokushesha ebusuku ngo-11 Okthoba. 
UTaku ushone ngezithuba zasekuseni zango-12 Okthoba 2011. [1]UTaku ushiye indodakazi ehlala eChivhu, okuyidolobha langakubo. 
Tapfuma Gutsa (owazalwa ngo-1956) is a Zimbabwean umqophi . [1] 
Umdabu waseHarare, uGutsa wafunda ukubaza noCornelius Manguma eDriefontein Mission School,kamuva waba ngumuntu wokuqala waseZimbabwe owathola umklomelo woMkhandlu waseBrithani.Umfundaze wamvumela ukuthi afundele eLondon kusuka ngo-1982 kuze kube ngu-1985, lapho athola khona idiploma yokuqoshwa eCity and Guilds yaseLondon School of Art . 
UGutsa akajwayelekile phakathi kwababazi bamatshe baseZimbabwe ngobubanzi bezinto azisebenzisayo emsebenzini wakhe; izithombe zakhe eziqoshiwe zifaka insimbi, iphepha, ukhuni nezinye izinto zangaphandle.[1] Isithombe sakhe esinqobile embukisweni weNedlaw, ngo-1987, sasiqukethe utshani obushunqayo obumboza inyoni yokhuni.Ungumzala kaDominic Benhura, owafunda naye; ubuye waba ngumeluleki wabaculi abaningi abasebasha okubalwa kubo uFabian Madamombe . 
Ngo-2007, uGutsa wayengomunye wabaculi abayishumi nanye bamazwe aphesheya abathunywa yiVictoria and Albert Museum, eLondon, ukukhiqiza umsebenzi wombukiso owawubizwa ngokuthi 'Amaqiniso Angakhululeki: I-Shadow of Slave Trading on Contemporary Art'. 
Umklomelo kaNedlaw wango-1987 wokubaza, iNational Gallery yaseZimbabwe 
UTatenda Marshal Mkuruva (owazalwa ngomhlaka 4 Januwari 1996) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo waseZimbabwe odlala njengonozinti weqembu leNational Independent Soccer Association iMichigan Stars FC kanye neqembu lesizwe laseZimbabwe . 
Ngomhlaka-2 Masingana 2018,iqembu le- MTN / FAZ Super Division iBuildcon FC likuqinisekisile ukuthi bafinyelele esivumelwaneni noMkuruva sokusayinisa unyaka njenge-free agent. [2] [3] [4] 
UMkuruva wathuthela eMelika ngemuva konyaka eZambia.NgoSepthemba 2019, usayine neMichigan Stars ngaphambi kwesizini yabo yokuqala kuNational Independent Soccer Association . [1] [2] [3] [4] [5] 
UMkuruva usemelele iZimbabwe U17, Zimbabwe U20 kanye neZimbabwe U23 . 
Uthole izicoco eziphezulu ezingama-20 eqenjini lesizwe laseZimbabwe .Ubemele iqembu lesizwe laseZimbabwe kwi- Africa Cup of Nations 2017 . [1] [2] [3] [4] [5] [6] 
NgoFebhuwari 2017, wajoyina iklabhu yePremier Soccer League iCape Town City ngenkontileka yeminyaka emithathu. 
UThulisile Nomkhosi " Thuli " Madonsela (owazalwa ngomhlaka 28 Septhemba 1962) [1] [2] ungummeli kanye noprofesa wezomthetho waseNingizimu Afrika, ophethe isihlalo kwezobulungiswa kwezenhlalo eStellenbosch University kusukela ngoJanuwari 2018.Usebenze njengoMvikeli woMphakathi waseNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngomhlaka 19 Okthoba 2009 kuya kumhla ziyi-14 kuMfumfu 2016. 
Ngo-1996, wasiza ekubhaleni umthethosisekelo wokugcina waseNingizimu Afrika owamenyezelwa nguMongameli wangaleso sikhathi uNelson Mandela . 
UMadonsela wakhulisa izingane zakhe ezimbili, umfana nentombazane, njengomzali oyedwa. 
Umyeni wakhe washona izingane zisencane kakhulu. 
Ngo-1980, uMadonsela waqala umsebenzi wakhe wokuba ngumsizi wothisha esikoleni afunda kuso, i-Evelyn Baring High School, eSwazini. 
Ngo-1982 waba yisekela likathisha eNaledi High School eSoweto, esinye sezikole ezazisenkabeni yoQhikithelo lwaseSoweto ngo- 1976.Ngasekupheleni kukaJulayi 2018, kwavela ukuthi uMadonsela wayethembisene umshado noDick Foxton, umxhumanisi wezobudlelwano nomphakathi. 
2011 - IDaily Maverick iqoke uMuntu Wonyaka WaseNingizimu Afrika "ngokusebenza indima yakhe njengo-ombudsman ekusebenziseni amandla okuphatha ngokuzinikela okungantengantengi eqinisweni". 2014 - Isikhathi magazini okuthiwa umuntu wakhe we abantu 100 kunazo enethonya emhlabeni esikhathini Abaholi isigaba bese naye umchaze "njengentatheli isibonelo ugqozi ngalokho izikhulu zomphakathi Afrika ukuba babe". 2014 - Imiklomelo yeGlamour Women of the Year - ebizwa ngeWoman of Courage 2014 - ANN7 waseNingizimu Afrika Wonyaka 2014 - I- Transparency International Integrity Award 2015 - Doctor of Law ( honisis causa ), University of Fort Hare (2013), Stellenbosch University (Mashi), Rhodes University (Ephreli) nase- University of Cape Town (Juni) 2016 - Umklomelo Wokwamukelwa Ngu-FW de Klerk 2016 - Forbes Umuntu Wase-Afrika wonyaka 2016 - Ukhethwe njengomunye wabesifazane be- BBC abangu-100 2016 - Umklomelo wase-Afrika wase-Germany 2018 - I- Order of Merit yeFederal Republic yaseJalimane 
UMadonsela wazalelwa eGoli ngo-1962,uyindodakazi yabadayisi abangahlelekile iBafana neNomasonto, futhi wakhulela eSoweto . Ufunde e-Evelyn Baring High School eNhlangano eSwaziland, lapho avela khona umndeni wakhe.Wathola iziqu ze- BA in Law e- University of Swaziland ngo-1987, ne- LLB yase- University of Witwatersrand ngo-1990.Ngomhlaka 26 Mashi 2015, uMadonsela waklonyeliswa ngeziqu zeDoctor of Laws, uLL. D. 
(Honoris causa) waseNyuvesi yaseStellenbosch . 
Wabuye wanikezwa enye i-Doctor of Laws degree, i-LL. D. ( honisisusa ), waseNyuvesi yaseKapa ; umcimbi wokuklonyeliswa ubuseJameson Hall ngomhlaka 11 Juni 2015. 
Uneziqu zobudokotela ezihloniphekile ezivela eRhodes University nase- University of Fort Hare . 
UMadonsela, kuze kube ngu-2007, wayeyilungu elijwayelekile legatsha lasePitoli le- African National Congress (ANC).Ngesikhathi sobandlululo uMadonsela wayesebenza ku-ANC nasenhlanganweni elwa nobandlululo i -United Democratic Front.Ukholelwa ekutheni ukuphatha isikhundla kwezepolitiki ngeke kube "umnikelo wakhe omkhulu njengomuntu". 
Ngo-1994 wasenqaba isikhundla sokuba yilungu lePhalamende le-ANC ePhalamende lokuqala langemva kobandlululo eNingizimu Afrika. [1] [2] ngo Masingana 2014 kwabikwa ukuthi amagatsha amaningi e-ANC eGauteng ayengamphumelelanga ekuphakamiseni isikhundla sokuba aqokelwe ukumela i-ANC ePhalamende Likazwelonke noma kwesinye sezishayamthetho zezifundazwe okhethweni lukazwelonke lwango-2014 . 
Umkhulumeli wakhe uthe ubengazi ngokuqokwa futhi ubengeke akwamukele. 
Ngemuva kokufika kwakhe eFeyenoord ngo-Agasti 2009, uMokotjo ubolekiswe ngokushesha eqenjini le- Eerste Divisie i- Excelsior ngesizini esele ka- 2009-10 . [1] Wenze ukubonakala okungama-30 futhi washaya igoli elilodwa ngesizini eyimpumelelo,ephele ngokunyuselwa i-Excelsior kwi-Eredivisie ngokusebenzisa ama-playoffs wokuphakanyiswa / ukwehliswa.UMokotjo uqokwe njengomdlali ovelele weqembu. [2] 
Kamohelo Mokotjo (owazalwa 11 Mashi 1991) ungundlali webhola odlalela FC Cincinnati njengoba mdlali ukuzivikela .Ngemuva kokuqala umsebenzi wakhe ezweni lakubo laseNingizimu Afrika, waduma eNetherlands neFC Twente futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wadlalela iBrentford eNgilandi. 
Uyena zamanje South Africa ngamazwe. 
A mdlali ukuzivikela, Mokotjo waqala umsebenzi wakhe e lwakubo South Africa ne Supersport United Academy . Unyuselwe eqenjini lokuqala eneminyaka engu-16 futhi wenza ukubonakala okukodwa eqenjini, [1] esikhundleni sikaShane Poggenpoel ngesikhathi ehlulwa ngo-1-0 yiSantos ngo-20 Disemba 2008.Ubeyibamba elingasetshenziswanga kwezinye izikhathi ezintathu ngesizini ka-2008-09 washiya iqembu ngo-Agasti 2009. 
Ngemuva kwesivivinyo sezinyanga ezintathu esiphumelele, [1] uMokotjo wadlulela eqenjini laseDutch Eredivisie Feyenoord ngomhlaka 28 Agasti 2009. Ngemuva kokuchitha isikhathi esisele sesizini ka -2009 kuya ku-10 ebolekisiwe, [2] waqala ukubonakala ekilabhini ngokuqala emdlalweni wokuhlulwa kowamanqamu wesithathu weKNVB kuRoda JC Kerkrade ngomhla ka-22 Septhemba 2010.Ngesizini ka-2010-11 ethinteke ekulimaleni udlale imidlalo engu-15. 
UPatrein wakhethwa njengesekela likanobhala wesifundazwe we- African National Congress Youth League ngo-2018. 
Ngo- 2019 uPatrein wayemele ukhetho lokuya ePhalamende Likazwelonke laseNingizimu Afrika njengo-7 ohlwini lwe-ANC esifundeni saseWestern Cape. Ekhethweni, uthole isikhundla ephalamende.Ngemuva kokhetho, uPatrein wakhethwa ukuba abe yilungu lePortfolio Committee on Police . 
Ngo-Agasti 2016, uMthethwa wanikezwa inkontileka ngu Amakhosi Esifundazwe SaseMpumalanga esigabeni seNdunankulu yeCurrie Cup yango-2016 . Uqale ukudlala ngesikhathi iqembu lihlulwa ngama-35-49 eqenjini IBlue Bulls ePitoli, iza njengomuntu ozothatha indawo yekota yokugcina yehora.Uqale okokuqala ezinsukwini eziyi-12 kamuva lapho i-Eastern Province ibhekene nayo U-Griquas kumdlalo ohlelwe kabusha maphakathi nesonto,futhi wenza ukubonakala kwakhe kwesithathu futhi kokugcina kwesizini esikhundleni sokulahlekelwa kwabo ngo-0-53 kowe Oshaka .I-Eastern Province Kings ikhuthazelele isizini eshubile, yahlulwa kuyona yonke imidlalo eyisishiyagalombili ukuze iqede isemsileni we-log. 
UMinenhle Lethuxolo Mthethwa (owazalwa ngomhlaka 5 Agasti 1991) ungumdlali webhola lombhoxo waseNingizimu Afrika osanda kudlala ne Amakhosi Esifundazwe SaseMpumalanga .Imvamisa udlala njenge-winger, kepha futhi angadlala njengesikhungo esingaphandle. 
UMthethwa uthuthele eKapa, lapho abhalise khona e- University of the Western Cape, wazimisa eqenjini labo lokuqala. 
Wafakwa eqenjini labo lombhoxo elalibamba iqhaza kwiVarsity Shield ka-2013.Uthole i-try kwi-debut yakhe emncintiswaneni, ekunqobeni okungu-42-4 TUT Vikings, kanye nomzuzwana ekunqobeni kwabo okungu-36-13 I-UKZN Impi ngemuva kwamasonto amathathu.Wenze isamba semidlalo emihlanu eqenjini lakhe ngesikhathi esijwayelekile, ebasiza ukuba babambe indawo yesibili ku-log ukuze balungele umdlalo wamanqamu SIKA Ixias . Ubuye futhi waqala umdlalo wamanqamu, kepha akakwazanga ukuvimba iqembu ukuthi iBloemfontein inqobe u-29-19 ukunqoba lo mncintiswano. 
Ubengumdlali oqavile eqenjini kwiVarsity Shield ka-2014, eqala imidlalo eyisikhombisa kwengu-8. 
Uthole ama-try emidlalweni bedlala SIKA Ixias,UKZN Impi futhi I-TUT Vikings - inani lesibili eliphakeme lokuzama umdlali we-UWC ngemuva kukaJames Verity-Amm - ngesizini edumazayo ye-UWC, ebabone beqeda endaweni yesine emncintiswaneni wamaqembu amahlanu, benqoba emithathu kuphela yemidlalo yabo . 
Wadlala eyisithupha ku-UWC kwiVarsity Shield ka -2015, washaya i-try eyodwa ekunqobeni kwabo u-58-8 UFH Blues njengoba iqembu liqede endaweni yesithathu, laphinde laphuthelwa indawo kowamanqamu.Ubalule kuyo yonke imidlalo yabo eyisishiyagalombili ngesikhathi sesigaba esiyindilinga seVarsity Shield yango-2016 . 
Uthole i-try eyodwa ekunqobeni kwabo u-30-5 i-UFH Blues, ngesikhathi i-UWC iqeda endaweni yesibili ku-log ngemuva I-UKZN Impi idonswe amaphuzu ayishumi nambili ngokufaka umdlali ongafanelekile emidlalweni yabo. [1]UMthethwa uqale owamanqamu, lapho i-UWC iphinde yaphelela ohlangothini olwehlulwayo, nge IWits ngokuwina umdlalo 39-2,futhi laqala ukukhuthazwa play-off meshi nabo eKapa ithimba I-UCT Ikey Tigers . 
I-UWC ilahlekelwe umdlalo 5-40 ukuze ihlale kwiVarsity Shield yango-2017 . 
UMxolisi Lukhele (owazalwa 4 Mashi 1991) umu Swazi umdlali webhola odlalela Royal Leopards FC kule Swazi Premier League . 
Uhlu lwezikolo nemiphumela luqala kuqala. 
UNtombikayise (Ntombi) uPriscilla Kubheka wayeyisishoshovu sangaphambilini sobandlululo saseNingizimu Afrika futhi eyilungu lephiko elihlomile le-ANC, uMkhonto weSizwe . 
Ushone eneminyaka engama-41 ngo-1987 ngemuva kokuthunjwa nokuphenywa ngemibuzo ngabezokuphepha baseNingizimu Afrika ngenxa yeqhaza lakhe lokuba ngumxhumanisi woMkhonto weSizwe (MK). 
Ukushona kukaKubheka kwaphikiswa kakhulu ngesikhathi kulalelwa amacala eKhomishini yamaQiniso nokuBuyisana, lapho izikhulu zamaPhoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika ekuqaleni zazithi azinacala ngokufa kwakhe. 
Isidumbu sakhe sakhishwa ngoMeyi 1997, ngaseKwaDukuza, siveza ukuthi uKubheka ubulawe ngamanxeba okudutshulwa. 
UKubheka ubehlala KwaMashu, ilokishi elisenyakatho neTheku . 
Usebenze njengomxhumanisi wamalungu e-MK angaphandle nangaphandle aqeqeshiwe aKwaMashu. 
Efuna ukuthola ulwazi ukufika amalungu amane MK waseSwazini, Vlakplaas amaphoyisa kuhlanganiswe imithombo zabo yaseThekwini nokuvikeleka legatsha ngesinyenyela inethiwekhi Kubheka sika. 
Ngaphansi kokuyalelwa nguCaptain Adriaan David Baker osebenzisana nePort Natal Security Branch, o-C1 / Vlakplaas askaris ababili, uSimon Radebe noXola Frank 'Jimmy' Mbane, banikwe umsebenzi wokuxhumana naye.Benza sengathi bangamalungu eMK, bathembisa ukumsiza amukele izishoshovu zaseSwazini.NgoMeyi 1987, uMnu Mbane wahambisa uNks Kubheka waya eBattery Beach lapho athunjwa khona yiqembu lasePort Natal.Uvalwe amehlo, waboshwa wayiswa lapho kudutshulwe khona eWinkelspruit, eningizimu yeTheku. 
Esalokhu evale amehlo, wabe esephekwa ngemibuzo ngabophiko lwezokuphepha ePort Natal. 
Leli thimba lalinoColonel Andy Taylor, uCaptain Hentie Botha, uSergeant Laurance 'Laurie' Wasserman, uSergeant Cassie van der Westhuizen, uJoe Coetzer noWarrant Officer 'Bossie' Basson. [1] 
Ngesikhathi kulalelwa ushwele okwenziwe yiKhomishini yeQiniso nokuXolelana, imininingwane ehlukile mayelana nokufa kukaKubheka yanikezwa yilabo ababandakanyeka ekufeni kwakhe. 
UCaptain Botha kushiwo kokuphenywa esasiqhutshwa ngesiZulu ngu uColonel Taylor, phakathi kwesikhathi lapho watshaya Nks Kubheka yonkana emuva nge ngomshiza .Ngokusho kukaCaptain Botha, lokhu bekungekhona ukushaya kanzima kodwa behlose ukudlulisa ubunzima besimo nokumncenga ukuthi asebenzisane nabo.UCaptain Botha uveze ukuthi ukuphenywa kwakhe kuthathe cishe imizuzu eyishumi nanhlanu kuya kwengamashumi amabili nokuthi uTaylor wamshaya cishe izikhathi eziyishumi kuya kweziyishumi nanhlanu nge-sjambok. 
Ubufakazi bukaSergeant van der Westhuizen busikisela ukuthi uphenyo lwathatha ihora lonke.Womabili la ma-akhawunti aphikiswe nguMbane obesola ukuthi ukuphenywa kwakhe kuthathe cishe amahora amabili, okuyilapho ezwa khona ukukhala kwakhe ngobuhlungu buvela ngaphandle.UBotha nabanye abafake izicelo bafakazile ukuthi, ngesikhathi kuphekwa imibuzo,uNkk Kubheka wavuma ukusebenzisana nabo kodwa wavele wabulawa yisifo senhliziyo. 
Bathe wambamba esifubeni wawa, wahlaselwa yisifo senhliziyo ngenxa yokuthi wayekhuluphele. 
Isidumbu sikaNkz Kubheka saphonswa eduze kwemijondolo yaseBhambayi, buqamama nakubo nguSergeants Wasserman noSalman Gerhardus du Preez.UCaptain Botha uveze ukuthi umndeni wakhe ubungazi ngokushona kwakhe futhi kubonakala sengathi uyakholelwa ukuthi wayesekudingisweni. 
Ngemuva kwalokho kwaba namahemuhemu okuthi ushiye leliya lizwe waya eMozambique ngenxa yokunaka kweSecurity Branch. 
UNtombi Lentheng Mekgwe usomlomo njengamanje eSishayamthetho saseGauteng futhi uyilungu le-African National Congress. 
NgoJanuwari 21, 2008,uNgwenya wasayinwa yiqembu lase-Austrian Bundesliga i-SK Austria Kärnten . 
Ngemuva kokuthi uKärnten eqede inkontileka yakhe ehlobo ngo-2008 wathola ithuba lokuziqeqesha neqembu lokuqala leFC Bayern Munich amasonto amathathu. 
NgoJulayi 23, 2008, uNgwenya wavela kwi-T-Home German Supercup engekho emthethweni yeBayern Munich ibhekene neBorussia Dortmund . 
Ngemuva kokuhamba cishe unyaka engenakilabhu ngo-Ephreli 6, 2010, uHouston Dynamo wamemezela ukuthi uNgwenya uzohlolwa isonto elilodwa ukuze kubhekwe ukubuyela eqenjini. 
IDynamo isibonile isidingo sosizo lapho ibheke phambili ngemuva kokuthi uBrian Ching elimale umsipha ngesikhathi evula ikhaya lakhe bedlala neReal Salt Lake. 
Wavumelana nemibandela neHouston ngo-Ephreli 12, 2010. 
UNgwenya uhlale neHouston ngesizini ka-2010 kodwa akazange anikezwe inkontileka yango-2011.Ungene ku- 2010 MLS Re-Entry Draft futhi wakhethwa yiDC United ngokhetho lokuqala. 
Uchithe isizini ka-2011 neDC United, eshaya amagoli angashayi emidlalweni engu-16.Ekupheleni kwesizini, iklabhu yenqabile inkontileka yakhe yango-2012 futhi wangena kwi-2011 MLS Re-Entry Draft .UNgwenya akazange akhethwe kulolu hlaka waba ngumuntu okhululekile. 
UNgwenya usayine neqembu le-USL Pro iRichmond Kickers ngo-Ephreli 11, 2013. 
UNgwenya uqokwe eqenjini laseZimbabwe elizodlala imidlalo yeNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2010, waqala ukudlala neGuinea nomdlalo wakhe wokuqala wabakhaya neNamibia . 
Ngesikhathi seminyaka yakhe yasekolishi waphinde wadlala ku- USL Premier Development League yeCape Cod Crusaders owayihola isicoco se-PDL, washaya amagoli angu-17 emidlalweni engu-13. 
Esikhathini esalandela isizini ka-2006, uNgwenya waya ecaleni eGetafe esigabeni sokuqala saseSpain, kepha wehluleka ukuthola inkontileka. Wathengiswa eHouston Dynamo ngenkathi ka-2007 u-Alejandro Moreno . 
UNgwenya ushaye igoli elibophela umdlalo emdlalweni wamanqamu we-MLS Cup 2007 ngo-2007 iHouston yanqoba ngo 2-1 eRFK Stadium. 
ULuthando Shosha, owaziwa nangokuthi uLoot Love (owazalwa ngoMashi 9, 1989) ungumethuli wezinhlelo zethelevishini waseNingizimu Afrika futhi ungumlingisi, owaziwa kakhulu ngokubamba iqhaza ohlelweni lomculo lwakwaSABC 1 ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku i-Live Amp. 
ULuthando wazalwa ngoMashi 9, 1989, ePort Elizabeth, e- Eastern Cape . 
Ufunde e-Collegiate Girls High School. 
Ngemuva kokuphothula umatikuletsheni uqhubekele phambili wenza izifundo ze-Interior Design e-Design School Southern Africa (DSSA) eGoli, eGauteng . 
Ngo-2012,uLuthando Shosha wangena emncintiswaneni wokusesha we-SABC 1 iLive Presenter awunqoba wagqashuka embonini yezokungcebeleka eNingizimu Afrika. 
Uqale ukubonakala kwiLive Amp ngoMeyi 18, 2012 ngaphandle komuntu ongumabonakude uBonang Matheba . 
Ube esedlala uhlelo lomculo olubizwa nge-Urban Music Experience olukhonjiswa kuSABC 1 njalo ngoLwesihlanu kusihlwa. 
Ngo-2017 waba ngumphathi we-MTVshow The Come Up, Ngawo lowo nyaka wakhethwa njengomunye wamanxusa aseNingizimu Afrika esiqhwaga esikhulu sezimonyo iRevlon ngomkhankaso wabo wokuphila ngesibindi. 
Ubuye futhi wasebenzisana neFootwork SA emkhankasweni wabo wasebusika ka-2017.Uthole umklomelo wesitayela esisha kunazo zonke emiklomelweni yeSitayela ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ngo-2017. 
Ngawo lowo nyaka wabamba ukhaphethi obomvu eLondon emiklomelweni yomculo we-MTV European. 
Useke wavela emaphephabhukwini amaningi akuleli afana ne-ElleSA Magazine, True Love, Bona nokunye.Uyaziwa ngomqondo wakhe wemfashini nangesitayela sesibindi. 
UTumi Morake (owazalwa ngomhlaka-22 Disemba 1981) usomahlaya waseNingizimu Afrika, umlingisi, umlingisi we-TV kanye nomlobi. 
Ubhale incwadi enesihloko esithi And Then Mama Said .

Uyaziwa futhi ukuthi ungowesifazane wokuqala ukuphatha amaComedy Central Presents e-Afrika. 
UMorake wazalelwa eFree State . 
Wathuthela eGauteng ngonyaka ka-2000 futhi lapho, wafunda iDrama eWits University . 
Ngemuva kokuphothula izifundo zakhe zemfundo ephakeme eDUT, uMorake waqala ukusebenza e-Arepp Theatre for Life, okuyinkampani yezivakashi yemidlalo yaseshashalazini.NgoJulayi 2005, wajoyina umkhakha wamahlaya. 
Wayesebenza eParker Leisure Management futhi uyaziwa ngokwenza ama-stand-up gigs njalo eGoli nasePitoli. 
Eminye imikhosi yamahlaya aseke wayenza kuyo ihlanganisa; IHeavyweights Comedy Jam, Abamnyama Kuphela, Banenhliziyo, Just Because Comedy Festival, The Tshwane Comedy Festival, The Lifestyle SA Festival and Old Mutual Comedy Encounters.Uke wabamba imibukiso ehlanganisa; Umshado wethu Ophelele, Ikhekhe Elibomvu ne- WTFTumi (uhlelo lwakhe lwenkulumo).
