UThemba Ndaba (owazalwa ngomhlaka 14 kuNhlolanja 1965) ungumlingisi nomqondisi waseNingizimu Afrika. 
Waziwa kakhulu ngokulingisa kumdlalo we-movie iMishini Gun Preacher nakuchungechunge iZone 14 .Njengamanje ulingisa njengoBrutus Khoza emdlalweni owuchungechunge waseNingizimu Afrika iFerguson Films iThe Queen. 
UMasilela ubuyele eNingizimu Afrika ngemuva kweminyaka emihlanu phesheya kwezilwandle esayine kwiKaizer Chiefs maphakathi nonyaka ka-2012.Uqale ukubonakala ngoNovemba 2012 benqoba ngo 3-2 kuMoroka Swallows . [1] 
UMasilela ube ngumdlali wokuqala ukubizwa ngesikhathi ekhankasela iNational First Division.Kusukela ngo-2006 uke wadlalela iNingizimu Afrika, wabamba iqhaza kwi- 2006 African Nations Cup, 2008 African Nations Cup, 2009 FIFA Confederations Cup, 2010 FIFA World Cup kanye ne- 2013 African Nations Cup . 
Ubaba wakhe, u-Eric Masilela uyingqwele yeWitbank Aces edlale nabadlali abafana noLawrence Siyangaphi, Harris Chueu, Steve Makua noThomas Ngobe, ongubaba kaDumisa Ngobe . Ungumfowabo kayise ka- Innocent Maela . 
UMasilela uqale wadlalela iqembu lasekhaya ebholeni lezemidlalo, iManchester kwathi kamuva walibizela iDisco Makua Academy eyayiphethwe ngowayengumdlali weWitbank Aces uSteve Makua onguyise kaFrank Makua owayedlalela iKaizer Chiefs .Ube esedlulela eqenjini leVodacom League, eSonas Mpumalanga. 
Ekuseni ekuseni ngomhlaka 7 Septhemba 2020, uLorch waboshelwa izinsolo zokushaya intombi yakhe ngaleso sikhathi,uNokuphiwa Mathithibala. 
Lokhu kwenzeke ngemuva kokuthi emvulele icala lokushaywa esiteshini samaphoyisa eMidrand elikhombisa ukuthi uLorch wamklinya ngemuva kokubuza ukuthi ukuphi.NgoJanuwari 2021, icala lokushaya lahoxiswa okwesikhashana umshushisi eyalela amaphoyisa ukuba aphenye ngokuqhubekayo. 
Kusukela ngoJuni 2021, uLorch ubethandana nomlingisi uNatashe Thahane. 
Thembinkosi Lorch (owazalwa 22 July 1993) is a South African professional footballer odlala njengoba phambili ngoba i-Orlando Pirates ne iqembu izinkomba zobuzwe baseNingizimu Afrika . 
Waqokwa njengoMdlali ovelele weSizini waseNingizimu Afrika kanye ne-Players 'Player of the Season ngo-2019. 
UThembinkosi Lorch oteketiswa ngelika "Nyoso" waqala umsebenzi wakhe eMaluti FET College FC kwathi ngemuva komdlalo neJomo Cosmos, wathola ucingo luvela kuScreamer Tshabalala emtshela ukuthi iPirates inentshisekelo ngaye.Umdlalo wakhe wokuqala wePSL wawudlala neFree State Stars, edlalela iChippa United ebolekiswe ku-Orlando Pirates. 
Ingoma kaDJ Maphorisa noKabza De Small ka-2019, esihloko sithi Lorch,yagqugquzelwa futhi yaqanjwa ngaye. 
UThembi Mtshali-Jones (owazalwa 7 November 1949), kuyinto eNingizimu Afrika actress .Uthathwa njengomunye wabaculi abadume kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika, uThembi uphawuleka ngokulingisa emidlalweni eminingi kamabonakude ethandwayo okubalwa kuyo uSgudi 'Snaysi, Stokvel, Silent Witness nethi Imbewu .Ngaphandle kokulingisa, ubuye abe ngumculi odumile, umbhali wemidlalo yeshashalazi kanye ne-Associate Teaching Artist eGlobal Arts Corps eKosovo kanjalo nomqeqeshi eCambodia. 
Ngo-2002, wajoyina isitokofela sethelevishini ngendima ethi 'Hazel'. 
Kamuva waphakanyiselwa i- International Emmy Award ngo-2004 ngale ndima. Ngo-2002 waqokwa emkhakheni we-African Excellence in Entertainment & Arts kwiTribute Achievers Awards Ceremony. Ngo-2006, uThembi wajoyina umkhankaso wamazwe omhlaba i- Truth In Translation owawuqondiswe ngumqondisi waseMelika uMichael Lessac . 
Lo mdlalo wavulwa eRwanda futhi kamuva wadlala e-US, eYurophu nase-Afrika kanye naseBaxter Theatre Centre ngo-2007. 
Ngo-2009, wathola i-Lifetime Achievement Award yeDolobha laseThekwini kanye nesiFundazwe saKwaZulu-Natali. 
Wabe esethola umklomelo we-Lifetime ku-Arts and Culture Trust ngo-2015. 
NgoNovemba 2019, uThembi wahlonishwa nge-The Living Legend Award kuNational Black Theatre Festival eNorth Carolina, e-USA ukuhlukanisa umsebenzi wakhe kumabhayisikobho aseNingizimu Afrika.Ngawo lowo nyaka, walingisa emdlalweni owawuhlonishwa ngokugxeka uMama kuMama kuNational Black Theatre Festival. 
Lo mdlalo ubususelwa kunoveli kaSindiwe Magona . Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi uMagona wabhala incwadi yomlando womuntu ethi 'Theatre Road: My Story i-akhawunti ekhuthazayo kaThembi Mtshali-Jones', eyakhishwa yaqondana nosuku lokuzalwa lukaMtshali-Jones iminyaka engama-70. 
Wazalwa ngomhlaka 7 Novemba 1949 eSabhoza, isigodi esiseduze noLundi, eThekwini, eNingizimu Afrika .Abazali bakhe bahlukanisa ngemuva nje kokuzalwa kwakhe.Kamuva wakhulela elokishini laKwaMashu lapho aqedela khona izifundo zakhe.Ngezikhathi zesikole, wakhulelwa ngakho-ke waphoqeleka ukuba ashiye isikole. 
Ngo-1998, waba nokuhlala eGallaudet University eWashington DC, e-USA kwathi kamuva waba se- University of Louisville, e-USA ngo-2004. 
Nge umnikelo emkhakheni wezobuciko, yena wenziwe Honorary Citizen of Louisville yiMeya futhi wathola emavi ekubonga yi Kentucky iSigele . 
Kamuva uMbusi waseKentucky wamnika isihloko esithi Honorary Kentucky Colonel, udumo oluphakeme eKentucky. 
Unendodakazi eyodwa, uPhumzile wasemshadweni wakhe wokuqala owagcina ngesehlukaniso. 
Kamuva, wayeshade no-Emrys Jones, owayemncane ngeminyaka eyishumi kunoThembi. 
Uhlangane no-Emrys, ngesikhathi ezobuka owesifazane oyedwa kaThembi ekhombisa i- A Woman in Waiting . 
Babenezinyanga eziyisishiyagalombili bethandana futhi ekugcineni bashada. 
U-Emrys wasebenza njengomhlaziyi webhizinisi enkampanini kawoyela ezinze eLondon. 
Bahlala ndawonye iminyaka engu-17, waze washona ngo-2016 kulandela isifo senhliziyo. 
Ithalente lakhe lokulingisa latholwa nguWelcome Msomi lapho uThembi adlala khona emdlalweni wakhe wokuqala uMabatha. 
Wabe esejoyina i-'Musical Ipi Tombi ', waba ngowesifazane oholayo njengo-'Mama Tembu'. 
Wenza izinkambo eziningi zomhlaba wonke ezibandakanya iWest End neBroadway . 
Kamuva waya e-USA ukuze athuthukise umsebenzi wakhe wezomculo lapho ahlangana khona nabaculi abadumile uHugh Masekela noMiriam Makeba .Bavakashela iYurophu ne-Afrika iminyaka eminingana. 
Ngo-1987, uThembi wabuyela eNingizimu Afrika wajoyina iMarket Theatre. 
Etheatre, uthole ithuba lokusebenza noJanice Honeyman kwiBlack And White Follies. 
Kusukela ngawo-1970, ubedlala esiteji ngenombolo yemidlalo ethile. 
NoGcina Mhlophe noMaralin Vanrenen, ubebhalile futhi wadlala umdlalo wasesteji Owake Wambona uZandile . 
Uwine i-Fringe First e- Edinburgh Festival Fringe ngendima ayidlalile kulowo mdlalo. 
Ngaleyo mpumelelo, wabe esehlanganyela ngokubhala umdlalo we- Edeni nezinye izindawo kanye nabesifazane base-Afrika noBarney Simon .Khonamanjalo, wahambela e-UK nase-USA ngomculo weMalcom Purkey ' uMarabi '. 
Ngo-1998, wathola ilungelo lokuculela ingoma kamongameli wangaleso sikhathi uNelson Mandela ngosuku lwakhe lokuzalwa lwama-80 eWashington DC. 
Ingoma yasakazwa bukhoma kwi- CNN . 
Kodwa-ke, waduma ngomdlalo wethelevishini obizwa ngo-1986 uSgudi 'Snaysi ngendima ka'Thoko '.Ngo-1988, wenza ukuba intombazane yakhe ibukeke njengowesifazane ohola phambili eMapantsula . 
Le filimu yaklonyeliswa njengeBest New Film e- Cannes Film Festival ngalowo nyaka. 
Ngo-1999, wabhala ngokubhala umdlalo wesifazane oyedwa othi A Woman in Waiting . 
Lo mdlalo ubususelwa empilweni yangempela kaThambile futhi ubudlalelwa eJoseph Paps Theatre eNew York. 
Umdlalo kamuva wanqoba iFringe First e-Edinburgh Festival. 
Ngo-2001, lo mdlalo wadlalwa eNew Ambassador Theatre, eLondon futhi kamuva eNingizimu Afrika, eTunisia, eCanada, e-US naseBermuda Island.Ngo-1999, uThembi wahlabana ngendondo yeBest Actress Award eThe Carthage Festival eTunisia. 
Kamuva wenza uhlelo lomsakazo i-BBC 4, futhi wawina iSony Gold Award ngo-2002. 
UKhumalo ubelingisa emdlalweni womculo womhlaba wonke kaMbongeni Ngema ngo-4 ekuseni owawunikelwe uMuhammad Ali .Ubuye walingisa komunye umdlalo womculo wakwaNgema, uMama (1996), owawuzungeza i-Europe ne-Australia. 
Ngo-1997, walingisa kuSarafina 2 . 
UKhumalo ujoyine abalingisi bomdlalo owuchungechunge osekudonse isikhathi eside eNingizimu Afrika , iGenerations ngo-2005 njengoBusiswe (Busi) Dlomo, owesifazane ocwengekile nongenamqondo futhi ongazibekile phansi ozenzela owakhe umbuso wokushicilela, ozinze eKapa . 
Umlingiswa wakhe ngudadewabo omncane kaSibusiso Dlomo futhi akanazo izimfanelo zokulangazelela amandla, ezikhukhumezayo nezingenankani yena (uSibusiso) anazo. 
Usebenzise ubuhlakani bakhe nokuqonda kwakhe ukufika lapho ekhona namhlanje, ekuholeni kwenkampani yezokuxhumana eqanjiwe yaseNingizimu Afrika, Ezweni, esebenza nomfowabo nomsunguli wayo uKarabo Moroka. 
Ngo-2015 uKhumalo wajoyina abalingisi be-Uzalo wadlala indawo kaZandile "MaNzuza" Mdletshe. 
Indima le imkhombise ukubonakala kwakhe okokuqala esikrinini ngemuva kwekhefu leminyaka emibili ekusebenzeni ukukhulisa izingane zakhe. 
Yena njengamanje udlala Mazulu ku e.tv ka- Imbewu . 
ULeleti Khumalo (owazalwa ngomhlaka 30 Mashi 1970) ngumlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika owaziwa ngendima yakhe ephambili emdlalweni weshashalazi nakumdlalo wasesiteji uSarafina! nangezindima zakhe kwamanye amafilimu afana neHotel Rwanda, Izolo ne- Invictus,kanye nomdlalo owuchungechunge othi Imbewu: The Seed lapho edlala khona uNokubonga "MaZulu" Bhengu. 
UKhumalo uzalelwe elokishini KwaMashu, enyakatho yeTheku,eNingizimu Afrika. 
Ekhombisa intshisekelo yokunandisa kusukela esemncane,wajoyina iqembu lomdanso wasemakhaya elalibizwa nge-Amajika, elalifundiswa nguTuNokwe . 
UKhumalo udlale indawo kaSarafina ezigabeni zaseNingizimu Afrika nakuBroadway, lapho athola khona ukuqokwa kweTony Award ngo-1988 kwiBest Actress in a Musical. 
Sarafina! ube ne-Broadway run iminyaka emibili, ngemuva kwalokho umkhiqizo waqala uhambo lomhlaba wonke. 
Ngo-1987 uKhumalo wathola i- NAACP Image Award ye-Best Stage Actress. 
Ngo-1992, walingisa eceleni kukaWhoopi Goldberg, uMiriam Makeba noJohn Kani kwinguqulo yeDarrell James Roodt yefilimu kaSarafina!, ebisatshalaliswa umhlaba wonke, futhi yaba ngumkhiqizo wamafilimu omkhulu kunayo yonke ezokhishwa ezwenikazi lase-Afrika.UKhumalo uqokwe kwi- Image Award, ehambisana no- Angela Bassett, Whoopi Goldberg noJanet Jackson . 
Kususelwa ekuvukeleni kwentsha yaseSoweto ngo-1976, iSarafina! ilandisa ngendaba yentombazane yesikole esencane engakwesabi ukulwela amalungelo ayo futhi igqugquzela ontanga bayo ukuba bavuke bebhikisha, ikakhulukazi ngemuva kokuba uthisha wakhe okhuthazayo, uMary Masombuka (Goldberg) eboshiwe futhi wabulawa. 
Ngo-1993, uKhumalo wakhipha i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ethi,Leleti noSarafina . 
ULindokuhle "Linda" Mkhwanazi (owaziwa nangokuthi "Bob") (owazalwa ngomhlaka 12 Julayi 1985 eRichards Bay, eNingizimu Afrika )ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo waseNingizimu Afrika odlala njengomdlali wasesiswini ozivikela kuThanda Royal Zulu kwiPremier Soccer Africa Iligi . 
Kusukela aqala ukudlala ngo-Okthoba 19, 2007 - ngesikhathi iPirates ihlasela, ishaya iBloemfontein Celtic ngo 3–0 emdlalweni we-ABSA Premiership -uMkhwanazi ubelokhu evelele. 
Iqiniso lokuthi useke wabonakala emidlalweni eyisithupha kule kilabhu engu-11 likhuluma kakhulu njengoba iqembu eliqeqeshwa ngu-Owen Da Gama linabadlali abaningi basesiswini abanethalente. 
Impumelelo kaMkhwanazi ngePirates ngesikhathi esesezinhlakeni zayo zentuthuko ifaka phakathi ukumela izwe kowamanqamu weNike Premier Cup ngonyaka odlule e-England ngemuva kokuthi iqembu lakhe lishaye iSupersport United ngo 4-3 sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi ekhaya. 
Lesi sigaba esenzelwe izindatshana ezichaza ubudlelwano phakathi kwezici zomphakathi ezingokwenkolo nezingezona ezenkolo.Bona Isigaba: Izinkolo, amasiko, nokunyakaza kwemiphakathi yezinkolo ezithile. 
y 
Ubulili buxoxa ngezinto zomphakathi zobuntu besifazane nobudoda, ngokungafani nobulili begazi. 
Abantu be-Intersex ngabantu abazalwa benanoma yiziphi izici zobulili ezibandakanya amaphethini we- chromosome , ama-gonads, noma izitho zangasese, ngokusho kwe- Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights, "ezingahambelani nemibono kanambambili yemizimba yabesilisa noma yabesifazane". [1] Yize ububanzi bezici zobulili ezingathandeki bungahle bube sobala kusukela ekuzalweni ngokutholakala kwezitho zangasese eziyindida, kwezinye izimo, izici ezi-atypical zingase zinganakwa, ziveze njengezitho zangaphakathi zokuzala noma ama-chromosomes angama-atypical angahlala engaziwa kumuntu impilo yabo yonke. 
Ukunikezwa kocansi ngesikhathi sokuzalwa kuvame ukuhambisana nobulili bengane yokwakheka kanye ne- phenotype . 
Isibalo sabantwana abazalwa benesitho sangasese esingaqondakali sisebangeni lika-0.02% kuya ku-0.05%. [1] Ezinye izimo zibandakanya ama-chromosomes angama-atypical, ama-gonads, noma ama-hormone. [2] [3] Abanye abantu bangabelwa futhi bakhuliswe njengentombazane noma umfana kepha bese bezibandakanya nobunye ubulili kamuva empilweni, ngenkathi iningi liqhubeka nokuzibandakanya nobulili obabelwe. 
Isibalo sokuzalwa lapho ingane i-intersex ibikwe ngokuhlukile kuye ngokuthi ngubani obikayo nokuthi iyiphi incazelo ye-intersex esetshenziswayo. U-Anne Fausto-Sterling nababhali asebenza nabo basikisela ukuthi ukwanda kokuthuthuka kwezocansi okungenangqondo - kungahle kube ngaphezulu kuka-1.7%, kufaka phakathi nezimo odokotela abangaziboni njenge-intersex.[4] Kulezo zimo sex lapho ucansi lwe-chromosomal lungahambelani nobulili be-phenotypic, noma lapho i-phenotype ingahlukaniswa njengowesilisa noma owesifazane [..] ukwanda kweqiniso kwe-intersex kubonakala kucishe kube ngu-0.018%, cishe izikhathi eziphindwe kalikhulu kunoFausto Isilinganiso sikaSterling sika-1.7% ″, [2]kubika kukaLeonard Sax. 
Amagama asetshenzisiwe ukuchaza abantu be-intersex aphikisiwe, futhi ayashintsha ngokuhamba kwesikhathi nendawo. 
Abantu be-Intersex phambilini babebizwa "ngama- hermaphrodites " noma " abathenwa abazalwa nabo ". [1] [2] Ngekhulu le-19 kanye nelama-20, abanye ochwepheshe bezokwelapha basungula ukuqanjwa kwamagama amasha ngomzamo wokuhlukanisa izici ababezibonile, umzamo wokuqala wokwenza uhlelo lokuhlukaniswa kwentela kwezimo ze-intersex. 
Abantu be-Intersex bahlukaniswa njengabantu abane " hermaphroditism yangempela ", "i- pseudohermaphroditism yabesifazane", noma "i-pseudohermaphroditism yesilisa". [3] Lawa magama awasasetshenziswa, futhi amagama afaka igama elithi "hermaphrodite" athathwa njengalahlekisayo, acwiyisayo, futhi ahloniphekile ngokwesayensi uma kubhekiswa kubantu. [4] ku-bhayoloji, igama elithi hermaphrodite lisetshenziselwa ukuchaza umzimba ongakhiqiza ama-gametes abesilisa nabesifazane. 
Ulimi lwesiTumbuka wulimi lwesiBantu olukhulunywa esifundeni esiseNyakatho neMalawi futhi nasesifundeni iLundazi eZambia . [1] Kuyaziwa nangokuthi Chitumbuka noma Citumbuka - isiqalo se- chi- phambi kweTumbuka sisho "ulimi lwama-", futhi kulokhu kuyaqondakala ukuthi kusho ukuthi "ulimi ( lwabantu baseTumbuka )".Isi-Tumbuka kungokwalabo iqembu elifanayo ulimi ( Guthrie Zone N ) njengoba Chewa futhi Sena . 
". 
Tionanenge = We shall meet again. 
ti-ku-phika sî:ma 'sipheka ipapa 
I-World Almanac (1998) ilinganisela ukuthi kunezikhulumi zesiTumbuka ezibalelwa ku-2 000 000,yize eminye imithombo ilinganisela inani elincane kakhulu. 
Iningi lezikhulumi zesiTumbuka kuthiwa zihlala eMalawi.[1]IsiTumbuka sikhulunywa kakhulu ezilimini zaseNyakatho Malawi, ikakhulukazi ezifundeni zaseRumphi, eMzuzu, naseMzimba . [2] 
ku-limirâ-so ngô:mâ? 'nawe ususa ukhula emmbileni? ' 
Njengenjwayelo ezilimini zeBantu, amabizo esiTumbuka ahlukaniswe ngezigaba ezahlukahlukene zamabizo ngokweziqalo zawo ezisebunyeni nasebuningini. 
Isigaba ngasinye sebizo sineziphawulo zazo, izabizwana, nezivumelwano zezenzo, ezaziwa ngokuthi 'izivumelwano' Lapho izivumelwano zingavumelani nesiqalo, izivumelwano zihamba phambili ekuthathweni kwesigaba sebizo. 
Isibonelo, ibizo katundu 'impahla', yize inesiqalo ka-, ibekwa ekilasini 1, ngoba umuntu uthi katundu uyu 'lezi zinto' kusetshenziswa umboniso we-class 1 uyu . AbaseMalawi uqobo (isib. 
Esichazamazwini seCitumbuka sase-University of Malawi) babhekisa ezigabeni zamabizo ngamagama endabuko anjenge "Mu-isimoa-";Ochwepheshe beBantu, nokho, babhekisa ezigabeni ngezinombolo (1/2 njll.)Ezihambelana nezigaba zamabizo zezinye izilimi zeBantu. 
Ngezikhathi ezithile amabizo awahambelani nezigaba ezingezansi, isb. fumu 'induna' (isigaba 9) ngokungafanele ine- mafumu yobuningi ekilasini 6. 
Kukhona umehluko omkhulu phakathi kohlobo lwesiTumbuka olukhulunywa ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni eMalawi (okuboleka amanye amagama avela esiSwahili naseChewa ) kanye "nomzana" noma "isijulile" isiTumbuka esikhulunywa ezigodini.Ukuhluka kweRumphi kuvame ukubhekwa njenge "msulwa ngokwamalimi", futhi kwesinye isikhathi kubizwa nge- "Tumbuka yangempela". [1] I Mzimba lwesigodi iye kakhulu ukuthonywa Zulu (chiNgoni), [2] ngisho kude ukuze abe ukuchofoza ngamagama afana chitha [ʇʰitʰa] "chama",okungekho kwezinye izilimi. 
Ulimi lwesiTumbuka lwahlupheka ngesikhathi sokubusa kukaMongameli uHastings Kamuzu Banda,lusukela ngo-1968 ngenxa yenqubomgomo yakhe yolimi olulodwa, lwalahlekelwa isikhundla salo njengolimi olusemthethweni eMalawi.Ngenxa yalokho, uTumbuka wasuswa ezifundweni zesikole, emsakazweni kazwelonke, nakwabezindaba abaphrintayo. [1] Ngokufika kwentando yeningi yamaqembu amaningi ngo-1994, izinhlelo zesiTumbuka zaqalwa futhi emsakazweni, kodwa inani lezincwadi nokunye okushicilelwa ngesiTumbuka lisalokhu liphansi. 
Tariro Washe uMnangagwa (owazalwa ngo-1986), kuyinto Zimbabwean actress . Uphawuleka kakhulu ngendima efilimini lika-2020 iGonarezhou. 
Ungomunye wamadodakazi kaMengameli waseZimbabwe njengamanje u- Emmerson Mnangagwa . 
Wazalwa ngo-1986 eZambia eyindodakazi encane emndenini onezelamani eziyisithupha. 
Ubaba wakhe u-Emmerson Mnangagwa ungumongameli wesithathu futhi ophethe njengamanje eZimbabwe . 
Umama wakhe kwakunguJayne Matarise lapho ashonela khona ngomhlaka 31 Januwari 2002 enomdlavuza wesibeletho . 
UTariro unezelamani ezinhlanu: UFarai, uTasiwa, uVimbayi, uTapiwa, no-Emmerson Tanaka. 
Kamuva uyise washada no- Auxillia Kutyauripo futhi waba nezingane ezintathu: u-Emmerson Jr. namawele uSean noCollins. 
UTariro uthole iDiploma in Professional Photography eCapeVarsity yaseKapa. 
Uphinde wathweswa iziqu zeHonours in Sport Management eCape Peninsula University of Technology . 
Ngemuva kokubuyela eZimbabwe, uTariro wajoyina i- Akashinga, uphiko lwabesifazane olwa nokulwa nokuzingela ngokungemthetho. 
Ngemuva kwalokho waba yilungu lophiko lokulwa nokuzingela ngokungemthetho olubizwa nge- International Anti-Poaching Foundation . 
Ngokushesha ngemva kwalokho, naye wamenywa ukuba adlale ifilimu Gonarezhou co-umkhiqizi ifilimu, eSydney Taivavashe .Le filimu ikhiqizwa ngokubambisana neZimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority .Kule filimu uTariro ubedlala indawo ethi 'uSergeant Onai' futhi wakhiqiza nefilimu. 
UTaribo West (owazalwa ngo-26 Mashi 1974) ungumfundisi waseNigeria futhi owayengumdlali webhola oqeqeshiwe owayedlala njengomvikeli . 
Ukhunjulwa kakhulu ngezinwele zakhe ezahlukahlukene ezingavamile nezinemibala. 
Ngokuyinhloko emuva, iWest yayingumvikeli ngokomzimba futhi onamandla. 
Yize entula ijubane elikhulu, iWest yayaziwa ngamakhono akhe wokuwina ibhola, ukuzibophezela, kanye nesitayela sokudlala kanzima, kanye nokugijima kwakhe phambili. 
A ozinikele Christian, West Kuyavunywa esetshenziswa izintelezi phambi imidlalo phakathi nenkonzo yakhe yokuba professional njengoba footballer. Ekugcineni waba ngumfundisi ngemuva kwezinsuku zakhe zebhola.Ku-2014, iWest yasungula isonto elibizwa nge- "Shelter in the Storm Miracle Ministries of All Nation" eLagos. 
Ku-2010, kwabikwa ukuthi iWest namanye amazwe aseNigeria, njengoJay-Jay Okocha, uNwankwo Kanu no- Obafemi Martins, babebadala kakhulu kunalokho ababezibiza ngakho.Ngo-Ephreli 2013, u- oarko Zečević, owayengunobhala jikelele we-FK Partizan, wathi iNtshonalanga imdala ngeminyaka eyi-12 kunaleyo ebekiwe.Ngokushesha ngemuva kwalokho, uWest waliphika leli cala. 
izihlonipho 
Ezingeni international, West wenza 42 ofeleba for Nigeria phakathi kuka-1994 no-2005,onengxenye ezimbili Umhlaba Cups futhi ezimbili Championships Afrika . 
Wabuye wamela izwe lakhe kumaOlimpiki ngo- 1996, wathola indondo yegolide. 
Wazalelwa ePort Harcourt, eNtshonalanga watholakala ngoMsombuluko uSinclair,owamfuna ukuba ayodlalela iSharks .Uqale ukudlala ngobunyoninco ne-Obanta United ngo-1989, ngaphambi kokubuyela kuSharks ngo-1990. 
I-West yabe isidlalela i-Enugu Rangers ngo-1991, ngaphambi kokujoyina uJulius Berger ngo-1992.

UDube-Ncube uke waba yimeya yomkhandlu waseNyakatho Central ngaphambi kokuthi uhlanganiswe noMasipala weTheku ngo-2000. 
Ube esesebenza njengosotswebhu omkhulu womkhandlu weTheku waze waqokwa njengenxusa laseCzech Republic . Uqokelwe esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natali kwathi i-ANC yamqoka njengosotswebhu omkhulu. [1] Wabamba lesi sikhundla kwaze kwaba nguJulayi 2009, lapho uNdunankulu uZweli Mkhize amqoka esikhundleni sokuba nguNgqongqoshe Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana Nezindaba ZoMdabu. 
[1] USenzo Mchunu wakhethwa njengoNdunankulu ngo-2013, wagcinwa esikhundleni sakhe.UDube-Ncube usesikhundleni ngemuva kokukhethwa kukaWillies Mchunu njengoNdunankulu ngoMeyi 2016.

Ubemele izwe lakhe emdlalweni wabo wokuqala wama-Olimpiki kuma- Olimpiki Asehlobo e-2016. 
Emdlalweni wama-Olimpiki uma kuqhathaniswa neGermany kwaba nguMakore owabeka igoli elamangaza unozinti wabo u-Almuth Schult.Ibhola laphinde laphinde laphindeka kodwa uKudakwashe Basopo wakwenza kwaba yigoli elishiya amaphuzu ngo 6-1 bebhekene neZimbabwe. [1] 
ULuthando Mateza (owazalwa 8 Februwari 1998) is a South African umdlali webhola odlala njengoba mdlali ngoba Steenberg United. 
UMajola ubengomunye wabadlali abahamba phambili kwiHowa Bowl;udlale ngokulingana kakhulu kunanoma yimuphi omunye umdlali, wathola ama-runs wesibili, waphinde wathatha amawikhethi wesihlanu.Yize azichaze njengomdlali wekhilikithi, hhayi usopolitiki, uqhubekile nomkhankaso wokulwa nokuthambiswa kwabadlali bekhilikithi abamnyama, futhi wanxenxa ukuvakasha kwamavukelambuso eNingizimu Afrika . 
Kokubili ubandlululo nokuduba kwezemidlalo kwaphela ngo-1991,kwathi ngawo lowo nyaka,uMajola wajoyina i- United Cricket Board phezu kwesisekelo sayo. 
Njengomqondisi wekhilikithi yama-amateur, wayebhekele ukusungula uhlelo lokuthuthukisa izwe, futhi wafuna ukudala izindlela zokuthi abantu abamnyama base-Afrika bakwazi ukudlala ikhilikithi kuwo wonke amazinga omdlalo. 
Ushone ngomdlavuza wamathumbu, eneminyaka engama-47, ngo-2000. 
UKhaya Majola wazalwa ngomhlaka 17 Meyi 1953 elokishini laseNew Brighton ePort Elizabeth, eNingizimu Afrikaizibulo ezinganeni ezinhlanu zika- Eric noMilase Majola. [4] Umndeni wakhe kwakungabantu abamnyama base-Afrika eNingizimu Afrika yobandlululo; ubaba wakhe wayengowohlanga lwakwaZulu, kanti umama wakhe wayenefa elixubekile; IScotland neSotho .Bobabili abazali bakhe basebenza njengothisha, futhi babebambe iqhaza elikhulu kwezemidlalo; U-Eric wadlalela iqembu lesizwe lase-Afrika ebholeni lombhoxo nekhilikithi, futhi babengamakholwa aqinile emphakathini kanye nezinzuzo ezakha abalingiswa zezemidlalo ezinganeni zabo. UMilase ukhumbule ukuthi uKhaya wayedlala ikhilikithi noyise esemncane; "UKhaya uzophuma ngomnyango wangaphambili ngaleli bhethi ebelilikhulu kunaye."Yize abafowabo bakaKhaya babedlala imidlalo enhlobonhlobo, ikakhulukazi ibhola lokuzihlanganisa, ubaba kaKhaya wamgcina egxile kwikhilikithi. 
Ubebhekwa njengonekhono kunabo bonke ezinganeni zikaMajola, kanti kwesinye isikhathi umndeni uvuka ube ngu-5 am to bow at Khaya. 
Njengomuntu osemncane, uKhaya wayedlalela i-New Brighton Cricket Club kayise lapho beswele abadlali. 
UMajola uqale wafunda eJarvis Gqamlana Lower, waphinde wafunda nezikole iJohnson Marwanqa Higher; akekho futhi owayenezinhlelo zemidlalo ezibalulekile, kanti uMajola uqhubekile nokukhulisa ikhono lakhe lekhilikithi ekhaya nomndeni wakhe. 
Ngeminyaka eyi-11, wayesevele echazwa yi- Evening Post "njengenkanyezi ePort Elizabeth"; ngeminyaka yakhe yobusha ukwenza kwakhe kwakuphawuleka ngaphezu kwamasonto. 
Ufunde eCowan High School, lapho badlale khona uhlelo lwekhilikithi phakathi kwezikole nezinye izikole ezinhlanu. 
UKhaya ukhumbule ukuthi ngesikhathi eseCowan, emasontweni amaningi “wayeshaya amawikhethi angamashumi amahlanu noma ethatha amawikhethi,” edlalela isikole nekilabhu. [9] Ngaphandle kwethalente lakhe nempumelelo, uKhaya waqala ukungawuthandi lo mdlalo, ngokwengxenye ngenxa yokuqina kukayise maqondana nokukhula kwakhe. 
NjengoNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha koMphakathi,ukuPhepha nokuXhumana, uShongwe wayeyinhloko yezepolitiki yohlaka lwezokuphepha esifundazweni. [1] [2] [3] [4] 
Ngomhlaka-24 Febhuwari 2021, uShongwe wabuyiselwa esigungwini esiphezulu sezokuphepha komphakathi, ezokuphepha kanye nokuxhumana. [1] 
UShongwe wayesebenza njengoNgqongqoshe wezoLimo, ukuThuthukiswa kweziNdawo zaseMakhaya,ezeMvelo nezeMvelo eMpumalanga,isikhundla asithatha ngemuva kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya lwangomhla ziyi-3 Agasti 2016 lapho uMabuza eshintsha khona iKhabhinethi lakhe futhi emsusa esigungwini sokuphepha waba nguNgqongqoshe omusha wezoLimo. [1] 
Sekuru Kaguvi (Kagubi, [2] Kakubi), kwaba svikiro ( medium ), umholi ubuzwe eZimbabwe pre-koloni, futhi umholi Shona kokuhlubuka kuka-1896-1897 ngokumelene European umthetho, eyaziwa ngokuthi i- Chimurenga Okokuqala . 
I-soubriquet "Kaguvi" wanikwa yona ngoba kwathiwa uzokhulumela umoya wendabuko wamaShona uNkulunkulu . 
Lapho ukuhlubuka kudilika, wabekwa icala lokubulala iphoyisa lase-Afrika elibizwa ngokuthi 'uCharlie', ayelisola ngokusebenzisana neziphathimandla zamakoloni. [2] UKaguvi watholakala enecala futhi walengiswa ngo-1898. 
Ezinye izazi-mlando zamaNdebele zithi igama elithi "Kaguvi" liyisinengiso segama lakhe ngabantu baseYurophu,nokuthi igama lakhe langempela kwakungu "Kakubi Ncube". 
Baphinde bathi ngokubambisana noNehenda, waqinisekisa ukuthi amaShona azovuka kanyekanye namaNdebele eFirst Chimurenga . 
Igama elithi "Kaguvi" liphinde lanikwa owesilisa obizwa ngoGumboreshumba (c1870-1898), owathi ukhulumela umoya wokuqala kaKaguvi.UGumboreshumba wayengomunye wabantu abaningi ababethi bangamadlozi omuntu owaziwayo uFirst Chimurenga ngesikhathi sokubizwa nge-Second Chimurenga. 
Gumboreshumba (elisho ukuthi: "esidladleni sengonyama"), babehlala esigodini Chikwaka ngumhlinzeki Goromonzi Hill, Zimbabwe. 
Wayenabafazi abane, omunye wabo kwakuyindodakazi yenduna uMashonganyika. 
Abanye abafazi abathathu batholwa yinduna egama layo linguGondo. 
Kusolwa ukuthi uGumboreshumba Kaguvi wayaziwa njengomthombo wenhlanhla ekuzingeleni nokuthi wayekwazi ukukhuluma nezihlahla namatshe. 
Wayelethwa okukholakala ukuthi umyeni umoya nezinye ezinkulu Shona svikiro, Nehanda . 
Ucwaningo lwephethini yokuhlala luveza ukuthi izifunda eziseningizimu yizo ezaqala ukuxazululwa, i-emet yase-Aldai entshonalanga kanye ne- emet yaseSoyin empumalanga, yaba eyokuqala ukusungulwa. 
Kucatshangwe ukuthi i- pororosiek yokuqala kwakunguKakipoch e-Aldai naseTuken eSoyiin. 
Kuyinto eyisimanga ukuthi Sirikwa izimbobo (olwaziwa uNandi njengoba mukowanisiek) bacishe lumane ezindaweni lokuqala ixazululwe, yilabo abakhona kuphela uNandi ophakeme uqobo. 
Nokho batholakala ngobuningi ezifundeni ezisenyakatho yeNandi. 
Abafuduki bangaphakathi kanye nokwanda kwenani labantu kucatshangwa ukuthi kuholele ekwandeni ngasenyakatho kobunikazi obukhulayo ngekhulu leshumi nesishiyagalombili. 
Lesi sikhathi kucatshangwa ukuthi sabona ukuhlala nokusungulwa kwe- emotinwek yaseChesume, Emgwen neMasop. 
Ngalesi sikhathi bekuzobuye kusungulwe amanye ama- pororosiek . 
USosten Saina, umzukulu womunye wabaqaphi baka-Arap Samoei uphawula ukuthi "Babengabalelwa kwabangu-22 babo abaya emhlanganweni nomzuzu ngalolo suku. 
UKoitalel Arap Samoei ubelulekwe ngokuthi angaxhawulane ngoba uma enza kanjalo lokho kuzomnikeza njengomholi. 
Kodwa welule isandla wadutshulwa ngokushesha ". 
Kungekudala ngemuva kwalo mcimbi, iNandi Resistance yaphela futhi uNandi wahlanganiswa neBritish East Africa Protectorate. 
Amarekhodi asemthethweni e-KAR akhombisa ukuthi bangu-1,197 sebonke abaqashwe ngesikhathi sempi.Ngaleso sikhathi inani labantu baseNandi lalilinganiselwa kubantu ababalelwa ku-40-50,000.Iningi lalabo ababeqashiwe kwakungelonyaka wakwaNyongi owawusungulwe phakathi neminyaka emine ngaphambi nje kwempi. 
UGreenstein (1978) ngemuva kwezingxoxo nezingqalabutho zempi wathola ukuthi ukubamba iqhaza empini akwenzi mthelela omkhulu kuNyongik, njengabaxhumanisi bezinguquko, maqondana nokuguqula izindlela zasentshonalanga.Futhi nemali etholwayo ayibonanga idala uthando ngomnotho osemthethweni futhi akuzange kwenziwe mzamo wokubamba iqhaza kwinqubo yezepolitiki. 
Ngokwenhlalo, iNyongik yayiqaliwe ngaphambi nje kwezimpi, yingakho bahamba babuya bengashadile.Lokhu akuzange kuphazamise amaphethini ajwayelekile ngoba bekujwayeleke kakhulu kunokungajwayelekile ukuthi izinsizwa zilinde iminyaka embalwa ngaphambi komshado. 
Lesi sikhathi sisetshenziswe ukufuna ingcebo yomakoti, futhi ukukhonza empini kungashiwo ukuthi kufezile le nhloso. 
Kamuva izingxoxo nabomakadebona zikhomba ukuthi bamukelwe ngemfudumalo ngabazali nabantu besikhathi sabo. 
Futhi bebengabathandi abantu asebekhulile ababebalekele ubunzima benkonzo yamasosha, abanye babo ababeshadile futhi bathola izinkomo esikhathini esiphakathi.Empeleni, omakadebona bakubonile ukuthi bazwakalise ukubonga kubona ngokunakekela izinkomo zabo nenye impahla njengoba bebezungeza iTanganyika neMozambique . 
Ngokomnotho, kuyaziwa ukuthi omakadebona abayitholanga impesheni njengoba bebekulindele kodwa babuya nemali yabo abayikhokhela emuva okwathi kwabanye kwabalelwa kumakhulu ezinkulungwane zamarandi, okuyisamba esikhulu impela ngaleso sikhathi.Kuyaziwa ukuthi cishe bonke omakadebona ababebuya basebenzise umholo wabo emuva ukuthenga izinkomo, ezinye zazo kanye nemali kwakusetshenziswa njengomcebo womakoti.kwakunezimo zokuthengwa komhlaba emaphethelweni esiqiwu kepha lokhu kwakuncane.Njengoba uHulumeni ayehlukanise ingxenye yeNandi Reserve ingcindezi yabantu yayingakabi nkulu ngokwanele ukushiya iningi lamadoda lingenelisekile ngenani lomhlaba abangawuthola ngezindlela zendabuko. 
Kubhekwe ukuthi lapho kuthengwa khona kwenziwa kancane ngesisusa sezamabhizinisi kunangesifiso sokwandisa umhlaba wedlelo. [1] 
Kwakukhona nezinguquko ezincane emaphethini wokuqashwa. 
Bambalwa uNandi phambilini abathola ukuthi amathuba emisebenzi ekhokhelwayo aheha ngokwanele ukushiya ayofuna imisebenzi. 
Isibonelo ngo-1914 kuphela i-100 kubantu abangu-45,000 ababeqashwe ngaphandle kwesiFunda. 
Izinombolo zikhuphuke zaya ku-352 ngo-1915/6 kanye no-612 ngo-1916/7, ikakhulu ngenxa yezidingo zesikhathi sempi seProtectorate kodwa ngo-1919 zase zibuyele ku-185. 
Ngenkathi umsebenzi wezempi uqhubeka ukhanga kulezi zinsizwa, inkonzo yomphakathi ayizange.UKhomishani wesiFunda kwakunzima ukuthi abeke ngo-1922 ngokwesibonelo ukukhiqiza izinsizwa ezingama-200 ezinamandla okuzosebenza ekwakhiweni komgwaqo wendawo.Uzophendukela ekubabumbeni ngaphansi kwe-'Native Authority Ordinance ', isekhula lezabasebenzi elidume kabi elabhalwa ngo-1919 ngaleso sikhathi owayengumbusi we-BEA u-Edward Northey. 
Ngokwezepolitiki, kuyabonakala ukuthi iNyongik yabuye yangena ezinhlakeni zamandla endabuko ezindaweni ezifanayo naleyo ababeyishiye eminyakeni emithathu noma emine ngaphambili. 
Ngaphakathi kwalesi sakhiwo, ubudala hhayi izinkanyezi nemivimbo ebalwa njengobukhulu.Izibopho nezibopho abaziphinde zaqala emindenini yabo, kubekwe iminyaka yobudala kanye ne-korotinwek okusho ukuthi izintshisekelo ezijwayelekile zabomakadebona zavumela izinhlangano zendabuko zendoda. 
UGreenstein uphawula ukuthi umqondo wenhlangano esemthethweni yama-veteran kubonakala sengathi awenzekanga noma mhlawumbe awuthandanga kubo.Ngisho nodaba lwempesheni aluzange lubangele iNyongik ukuba yakhe noma yiluphi uhlobo lwenhlangano ebumbene. [1] 
Njengabanye oKalenjin, iNandi ikhiqize inqwaba yabasubathi baseKenya.Lapha kubalwa abagijimi bamabanga amade njengoKipchoge Keino wodumo (Kip Keino), osethole indondo yegolide eMexico (1968) naseMunich (1972) imidlalo yama-Olimpiki noProf. 
UMike Boit, indondo yeBronze eMunich 1972 Olimpiki.Abanye kubalwa uPeter Koech, uBernard Kipchirchir Lagat omele i-USA noWilson Kipketer owagijimela ikhaya lakhe lokutholwa laseDenmark. 
Ngokunjalo, abasubathi abanjengoPamela Jelimo,owesifazane wokuqala waseKenya ukunqoba indondo yegolide yama-Olimpiki, uWilfred Bungei, uRichard Mateelong noSuper Henry Rono, Inxusa Lokuzwana leZizwe Ezihlangene uPeter Rono, uTecla Chemabwai, umdlali waseKenya okhubazekile uHenry Kirwa phakathi kwabanye uNandi.Ubaba wabakwaKeeplechasers baseKenya u-Amos Kipwambok Biwott uqhamuka emphakathini njengoJulius Yego, ongowokuqala waseKenya ukunqoba indondo yegolide yeWorld Championships emcimbini obusenkundleni. 
Abantu bakwaNandi babe nabantu abadumile kwezepolitiki abanjengoJean-Marie Seroney,oyilungu lokuqala lePhalamende likaNandi noTindiret. 
USeroney waboshwa wavalelwa ngaphandle kokuquliswa icala iminyaka emithathu nohhafu ngenxa yokuvikela inkululeko yePhalamende ngesikhathi lapho laliba yingalo yeSigungu Esiphezulu. 
Usebenze kanzima ukwethula iMithethosivivinywa ezosusa noma okungenani ihlole amandla ngokweqile anikezwe uMongameli ngenxa yezichibiyelo eziningi kuMthethosisekelo waseKenya.Uphinde waletha uMthethosivivinywa wokuqala weLungu Elizimele ukusiza ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukhetho lwaseKenya lukhululekile, alunankinga futhi lubandakanya wonke umuntu.Ngokunjalo futhi uNandi ubenabaholi abanjengoHenry Kosgey, elinye lamalungu ePhalamende (MP) asebenze isikhathi eside eKenya, uKimayo Arap Sego,uJoseph Arap Leting owaqala ukusebenza njengenhloko yezemiSebenzi kaHulumeni ngaleso sikhathi njengelungu lePhalamende.USamwel Ngeny, Kipruto Kirwa, Stanley Metto no-Ezekiel Barng'etuny, uDkt Joseph Misoy noWilliam Morogo SainaUGerald Nathaniel Kalya owayeyilungu lePhalamende laseMosop lokuqala futhi elisebenza isikhathi eside, uTamason Barmalel owayeyilungu lePhalamende laseChepalungu no- Isaac Ruto owayeyilungu lePhalamende laseChepalungu futhi kamuva, uMbusi weSifunda saseBomet kanye neNhloko yoMkhandlu Wababusi ngo-2013-2018. 
UWilliam Samoei Ruto njengamanje oyiPhini likaMongameli weRiphabhulikhi yaseKenya ungowokudabuka eKipsigis odabuka esigodini sakwaKomosi nohlu lozalo lwakhe aluthole kuSigowet-Soin . 
Abezombusazwe besifazane bakwaNandi bahlanganisa uPhilomena Chelagat Mutai, isishoshovu sempilo yonke sokufakwa kwabesifazane kwezepolitiki nasemphakathini waseKenya,noSally Kosgei, owayeyilungu lePhalamende lase- Aldai . 
Imithombo 
UNhamo yifilimu emfushane yango-2011 ebhalwe futhi yaqondiswa ngu-Eunice Chiweshe Goldstein. 
Igijima cishe imizuzu eyishumi nanye namasekhondi angamashumi amahlanu nesikhombisa ubude. 
Amazwe okukhiqiza yiMelika, iNingizimu Afrika kanye neZimbabwe.Le filimu iqokwe kuma- Africa Movie Academy Awards Best Short Film . 
Ukudlala kahle kwasekhaya kukaChatara kuholele ekutheni abakhethi baseZimbabwe bamkhethele umdlalo weqembu lekhilikithi elikhulu iTwenty20 International bedlala ne- India, ongukaputeni kaSuresh Raina .Uqale ukubonakala kwi-T20I yesibili lapho ethathe khona i-wicket yakhe yobusha ezingeni eliphakeme lomhlaba ngokuxoshwa kuka- Yusuf Pathan . [1] 
NgoJanuwari 2015, uChatara waqokwa eqenjini labadlali abangu-15 baseZimbabwe kwiNdebe Yomhlaba Yekhilikithi ka-2015 . 
NgoJuni 2018,uChatara waqokwa eqenjini leBhodi XI lokulungiselela imidlalo yokulungiselela ngaphambi kwe- 2018 Zimbabwe Tri-Nation Series . 
NgoMeyi 2021,uChatara waqokwa njengokaputeni eqenjini leZimbabwe A elalizodlala neNingizimu Afrika . 
NgoJulayi 2021, uChatara waqokwa eqenjini labadlali abangama-20 baseZimbabwe abazodlala umdlalo owodwa kwiTest bedlala neBangladesh . 
Kwakungukubuyela kukaChatara eqenjini lamaTest ngemuva kweminyaka emithathu egcine ukudlala iTest ebhekene nabaphikisi abafanayo ngoNovemba 2018 ngaleso sikhathi. 
UTendai Larry Chatara (owazalwa ngomhlaka 28 Nhlolanja 1991) ungumdlali wekhilikithi wamazwe omele iqembu lesizwe lekhilikithi laseZimbabwe . 
A ubude, obuqinile Bowler okusheshayo nge ijubane appreciable futhi ikhono ukuhambisa ibhola kude kwesokudla hander,Chatara uvukile ngokushesha nokuvelela kusukela unqambothi yakhe DEBUT ngoba Mountaineers ngo-2009. 
Yize wayengekho kahle ezifundweni esikoleni, ungomunye wamathemba anamandla kakhulu wezwe lakhe. [1] 
NgoDisemba 2020, uChatara wakhethwa ukuthi azodlalela iMountaineers kwi- Logan Cup ka-2020–21 . 
UMoiloa waqala ubushoshovu bezepolitiki ngesikhathi sakhe sokufunda ngeminyaka yama-1980 kanye nawo-1990. [1] Ubeyisishoshovu se- African National Congress . 
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wajoyina iSouth African Communist Party futhi waba ngumgcinimafa weqembu esifundeni sikaDkt Ruth Mompatsi. 
UMoiloa ubuye wasebenza nasesigungwini esiphezulu se-ANC. 
Waqokelwa esigungwini esiphezulu se-ANC esifundazweni ngo-2011. 
UMoiloa ufungiswe njengelungu lesiShayamthetho sesiFundazwe saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga ngomhlaka 13 Agasti 2013, wangena esikhundleni sikaVeronica Kekesi . [1] Wakhethwa ukuba asebenze ngokugcwele okhethweni lwesifundazwe lowezi-2014 . [2] Ngo-Ephreli 2018, uMoiloa wakhuluma ngokumelene noNdunankulu uSupra Mahumapelo wamnxusa ukuba asule esikhundleni.Ngemuva kokukhethwa kwakhe kabusha okhethweni lwesifundazwe olwalungo-8 Meyi 2019, uNdunankulu uJob Mokgoro waqoka iLungu lakhe loMkhandlu oPhethe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi ngomhlaka 28 Meyi 2019. 
Wafungiswa ngalo lolo suku wathatha izintambo kuFenny Gaolaolwe. 
UThapelo James Morena (owazalwa ngo-6 Agasti 1993) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo waseNingizimu Afrika odlala njengomdlali wasemuva noma umdlali wasesiswini weqembu laseNingizimu Afrika iMamelodi Sundowns. 
UNdunankulu waseNingizimu Afrika Owinile (3):2017-18, 2018-19, 2019-20 Indebe yeNedbank Owinile:2019-20 UTelkom Knockout Owinile:2019 
UThandolwethu Mnyaka (owazalwa ngomhlaka 15 Januwari 1993) ungumdlali wekhilikithi waseNingizimu Afrika odlalela iqembu lekhilikithi lamaWarriors . Nguyena owayehola phambili ngokuthatha ama-wicket ku- 2017-18 Sunfoil 3-Day Cup yeNorthern Cape, ngokuxoshwa okungama-20 emidlalweni eyisishiyagalombili. 
NgoSepthemba 2018, waqokwa eqenjini laseFree State elizodlalela iNdebe ye-Africa T20 ka-2018 .Nguyena owayehola phambili ekuthatheni ama-wicket eFree State ku- 2018-19 CSA 3-Day Provincial Cup ka-2018, ngokuxoshwa okungama-21 emidlalweni eyisikhombisa. NgoSepthemba 2019, waqokwa eqenjini leFree State elizodlalela iNdebe ye-T20 ka-2019-20 CSA Provincial T20 . 
Ngemva Skwatsha ophumelele okhethweni lobuholi, Madikizela nabanye babalandeli Rasool e- eKhayelitsha bathi kokuba ayebandlululwa futhi kamuva ayifakiwe ngangokunokwenzeka-ANC ukhetho for okhethweni lomasipala ngo-2006. 
Ekuqaleni kuka-2006, uMadikizela namanye amalungu e-ANC amaningana, kubalwa namakhansela eqembu, baxoshwa eqenjini ngemuva kokuthi kwaziwe ngenhloso yabo yokungenela ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya njengabantu abazimele. 
Yize engakhethwanga ukuba yikhansela, uMadikizela ugcine esebenza kwezepolitiki, wajoyina i- United Democratic Movement (UDM) ngo-2007. 
Waqokwa njengoNobhala weqembu eKapa wesiFunda eKapa kwaze kwaba yilapho uphenyo lweqembu luthola ukuthi wayekhohlise ngasese amalungu eqembu ukuba ajoyine iDemocratic Alliance. 
Wazalelwa ePort Shepstone, esifundazweni saseNatali, uMadikizela wathuthela eKhayelitsha futhi waba yipolitiki endaweni. 
Ubeyilungu le- African National Congress (ANC) ne- United Democratic Movement (UDM), ngaphambi kokujoyina iDemocratic Alliance (DA) ngo-2008. 
Wakhethwa njengelungu le-DA ePhalamende Lesifundazwe saseWestern Cape ngo-2009. 
UNdunankulu uHelen Zille wamqoka njengoNgqongqoshe wezeziNdlu wesiFundazwe. 
Ngomhlaka 1 Ephreli 2021, obambe njengoMvikeli woMphakathi uKholeka Gcaleka wakhipha umbiko owathola ukuthi uMadikizela wephule ama-Executive Ethics Codes ngokwenza izinkulumo ezilahlekisayo noma ezingekho emthethweni kusishayamthetho mayelana noBrett Herron, oyi-Good MPP. 
UHerron wayefake isikhalazo. 
UMadikizela wenqabile ukuba semthethweni kwalo mbiko wathi uzofuna izeluleko zomthetho.Ngomhlaka-6 Ephreli 2021, uMadikizela wamemezela ukuthi ufake isicelo sokuba yilungu le-DA elizongenela isikhundla sobumeya kwiDolobha laseKapa . 
Ubhekene neMeya ephethe lesi sikhundla uDan Plato kanye nomkhulumeli wezezimali we-DA, uGeordin Hill-Lewis . 
Ngomhlaka 13 Ephreli 2021, iDaily Maverick yabika ukuthi uMadikizela wayengenazo iziqu zeBachelor of Commerce kwiHuman Resource Management njengoba kwakushiwo ngaphambili nokuthi wayekhohlise intatheli ngalokhu.Ngosuku olulandelayo, i-DA yamemezela ukuthi i-Federal Legal Commission izophenya ngezinsolo zokuthi yaqamba amanga ngokuba neziqu ze-BCom.UNdunankulu uWinde umise uMadikizela njengoNgqongqoshe Wezokuthutha Nezemisebenzi Yomphakathi izinsuku eziyi-14 kusukela ngomhla ka-15 Ephreli futhi waqoka uTertuis Simmers njengoNgqongqoshe weSifundazwe obambile.Ngemuva kwamahora, uSihlalo we-DA esifundazweni, uJaco Londt, wathumela incwadi ezinhlakeni zeqembu ebazisa ukuthi uMadikizela "ushiye eceleni ngokuzithandela" njengomholi wesifundazwe emasontweni amabili ezayo nokuthi iphini lomholi u-Albert Fritz uzoba yibamba lomholi wesifundazwe. [1] 
Ngo-2014 waqokwa njengoNgqongqoshe Wezokuhlaliswa Kwabantu esifundazweni.Ngemuva konyaka, ngonyaka ka-2015, uMadikizela wahlalisa iqembu eliqavile uTheuns Botha njengephini lomholi we-DA esifundazweni. 
Umholi we-DA esifundazweni uPatricia de Lille wesule ngoFebhuwari 2017 washiya uMadikizela ephethe njengobamba njengomholi wesifundazwe. 
Uthole ihlandla eligcwele ngo-Okthoba 2017. 
Ngo-2019,uMadikizela waba nguNgqongqoshe Wezokuthutha Nezemisebenzi Yomphakathi esifundazweni. 
Ngemuva kwehlazo leziqu, wasula njengoMholi Wesifundazwe we-DA ngomhlaka-28 Ephreli 2021, izinyanga eziyisithupha ngemuva kokuqokwa kwakhe kabusha ngoNovemba 2020. 
Uphinde wasula kwikhabhinethi yesifundazwe nasephalamende lesifundazwe, kodwa uzohlala eyilungu le-DA. 
Uthe akazange acindezelwe ukuthi asule esikhundleni sokuba ngumholi we-DA esifundazweni. 
UMadikizela wazalelwa ePort Shepstone, eNatal ngomhlaka 15 Mashi 1975. Ubabekazi wakhe wayeyisishoshovu esaziwayo esasilwa nobandlululo uWinnie Madikizela Mandela .Umfowabo wabulawa ngo-1990 wabe esedlulela eChatsworth, ehlala eWelbedacht. 
UMadikizela kanye nomholi womphakathi basungule i-Welbedacht Development Forum ukusiza abahlali abampofu bomphakathi.Ngo-1991, washiya isikole i-Asoka Secondary futhi wasebenza esitolo sefektri sezicathulo eCroftdene. 
Ngo-1998, uMadikizela wathuthela eKapa wayohlala nomfowabo. 
Umfowabo wamsiza ukubhalisa esikoleni samakhompiyutha kanti kungekudala uMadikizela waqala ukufundela ukuphathwa kwabasebenzi e- University of South Africa (UNISA). 
UMadikizela wayesebenza njengonogada wezimoto epaki yetimu. 
Ngokushesha wabuyela eChatsworth futhi waqeda izifundo zokuqeqeshwa ngamakhompyutha. [1] Uphinde waba yilungu lenhlangano yaseChatsworth Child Welfare. 
UMadikizela ubuyele eKapa ngo-2002 futhi waba yingxenye yezepolitiki. [1] 
Uma esekhethiwe,usopolitiki uba yiNhloko kaHulumeni futhi kufanele abhekane nezikhulu zikahulumeni kanye nabasebenzi bakahulumeni . 
Ngokomlando,kube nokushayisana okucashile phakathi kwezinhloso zesikhathi eside zohlangothi ngalunye. [1] Ezinhlelweni ezenzelwe ukusekelwa, njenge-United States ngekhulu le-19, osopolitiki abaphumelelayo bathatha isikhundla sezikhulu zikahulumeni kanye nabasebenzi bakahulumeni abangavikelwe ngaphansi kwabasebenzi bakahulumeni abangenacala nabasekeli babo.Kwakuyi "system spoils". 
Ukuguqulwa kwabaSebenzi bakaHulumeni kwaqalwa ukuze kuqedwe inkohlakalo yezinsizakalo zomphakathi . [2] Kodwa-ke, emazweni amaningi athuthukile, uhlelo lwempango lusebenza ngokugcwele namuhla. [3] 
Abezombusazwe abaningi banobuchule bokukhumbula izinkulungwane zamagama nobuso futhi bakhumbule ama-anecdotes abo ngabantu babo - kuyinzuzo emsebenzini, kunjengokuphakama kwamamitha ayisikhombisa kumdlali we-basketball. 
UMongameli waseMelika uGeorge W. Bush noBill Clinton babedume ngezinkumbulo zabo. 
Usopolitiki ungumuntu osebenza kwezepolitiki yeqembu, noma umuntu ophethe noma ofuna isihlalo esikhethiwe kuhulumeni .Izazi zezepolitiki ziphakamisa, zeseka futhi zakha imithetho elawula umhlaba, futhi ngokwengeza, abantu bayo. 
Ngokubanzi nje, "usopolitiki" angaba yinoma ngubani ofuna ukufeza amandla ezepolitiki kuhulumeni . 
Abezombusazwe ngabantu abasebenza kwezepolitiki, ikakhulukazi kwezepolitiki yeqembu. 
Izikhundla zisukela emahhovisi asendaweni kuya emahhovisi okuphatha aphezulu kanye nawomthetho ohulumeni bezifunda nabazwelonke.Amanye amajaji akhethiwe nabaphathi bezomthetho, njengabaphathi bamaphoyisa, babhekwa njengosopolitiki. 
Abezombusazwe baziwa ngezinkulumo zabo, njengasezinkulumweni noma ezikhangisweni zomkhankaso.Baziwa ikakhulukazi ngokusebenzisa izingqikithi ezivamile ezibavumela ukuthi bathuthukise izikhundla zabo zezepolitiki ngokwemigomo ejwayelekile kubavoti. 
[1] Abezombusazwe okudingeka babe ngabasebenzisi abangochwepheshe bezindaba.[2]Abezombusazwe ngekhulu le-19 basebenzise kakhulu amaphephandaba, omagazini, namapheshana, kanye nezingqwembe. [3] Ngekhulu lama-20,bahlangana baba umsakazo nethelevishini,benza izikhangiso zethelevishini zaba yingxenye eyodwa ebiza kakhulu emkhankasweni wokhetho. [4]Ekhulwini lama-21, sebezibandakanye ngokuya ngokwengeziwe nabezindaba zenhlalo ezisuselwa kwi-Intanethi nakuma-smartphone. 
Uchungechunge lwe-Galaxy Z luwumugqa wama-Smartphones asezingeni eliphezulu, asongekayo.Ulayini uqale ngo-2019 nge- Samsung Galaxy Fold . 
Izingcingo zakamuva ezivela kulolu chungechunge yi- Samsung Galaxy Z Flip ne- Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2, zombili ezikhishwe ngo-2020. 
Uchungechunge lwe-Galaxy A(okusho u-Alpha)ulayini wama-smartphones aphakathi naphakathi we-Android akhiqizwa yi- Samsung Electronics.Uchungechunge lwe-Galaxy A luyafana nochungechunge oluphezulu lwe-Galaxy S, kepha ngezincazelo nezici eziphansi. 
I-Samsung Galaxy ( Korean ), (Eliqoshiwe njengoba SΛMSUNG Galaxy kusukela 2015, ngaphambilini eliqoshiwe njengoba Samsung GALAXY;esifushanisiwe njengoba SG) uchungechunge wekhompyutha kanye Computing mobile amadivayisi zenzelwe, ekhiqizwa futhi imakethwa Samsung Electronics . 
Umugqa umkhiqizo ihlanganisa Samsung Galaxy S uchungechunge ephezulu ekupheleni Smartphones, lo Samsung Galaxy Tab chungechunge of amaphilisi, the Samsung Galaxy Note uchungechunge amaphilisi kanye phablets ne ukusebenza wanezela lokuloba, le foldable Samsung Galaxy Z chungechunge, futhi smartwatches kuhlanganise inguqulo yokuqala ye- Samsung Galaxy Gear, ngezinguqulo zakamuva ezishiya uphawu lwe-Galaxy, kuze kukhishwe i- Samsung Galaxy Watch ngo-2018. 
}} Mukudzeyi Mukombe (owazalwa ngoJulayi 4, 1987), [1] odlala ngaphansi kwesiteji igama elithi Jah Prayzah, ungumculi waseZimbabwe wesimanje futhi oyilungu eliphambili leqembu i-Third Generation . 
Yena Kudume okukhulunywe abalandeli kanye nabezindaba njengoba "Musoja", the Shona igama elisho "ibutho", igama wazakhela ikakhulu ngenxa isignesha band wakhe umfaniswano zobungoma ezempi. 
Igama elithi "Jah Prayzah" livela egameni lakhe, "Mukudzeyi", okusho ukuthi "Mdumiseni". 
UPhilani Zulu (owazalwa ngomhlaka 16 Septhemba 1992) ungumdlali webhola waseNingizimu Afrika odlalela iKaizer Chiefs. 
Ngemuva kokuphumelela kwengoma yakhe eyodwa ethi "AmaBlesser", uMlindo uveze ikhava ye-albhamu yakhe yokuqala nosuku lokukhishwa kwayo njengoba yenziwa yatholaka phambili kuma- iTunes .I-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ethi Emakhaya yakhishwa ngomhlaka 21 Septhemba 2018.Ialbhamu iqinisekiswe i-platinum yi-RiSA futhi yakwazi ukuthola imifudlana ecishe ibe yizigidi ezingama-45 ezweni lonke kusukela ngoMeyi 2019.Owesibili ongashadile "Macala" ukwazile ukuthola indawo yokuqala eNingizimu Afrika, kulandela ukuphumelela kowayehola phambili. 
Le albhamu ithole uMlindo ukuqokwa kathathu emcimbini wama-25 wamaSouth African Music Awards ; Owaqala ukufika onyakeni, i-albhamu ekhiqizwe kahle neBest Afro Pop Album. 
Ngo-2020, wakhipha izingoma ezimbili esihloko sithi "Yekela" ehambisana noMasiano & Vusi Nova kwalandela ethi "Mali" ehambisana noNathi. 
ULindokuhle Magedezi wazalwa ngonyaka we-1995 ePort Shepstone, KwaZulu-Natal. 
Lapho eneminyaka emine, waba yingxenye yesonto lendawo lapho athola khona ikhono lakhe lokukhuluma. 
UMlindo wafunda ePhathwa High School eGcilima, idolobha laseMargate. 
Ngesikhathi ecabanga ukuqala umsebenzi wakhe kwezomculo, ngokuhamba kwesikhathi uMlindo waya e-Eastern Cape lapho ajoyina khona iqembu le- hip hop iFlow Riders ngo-2010. 
Ubambe iqhaza ikakhulukazi emiphakathini.Ngo-2014, wasungula iqembu le-cappella i-White Bread, ngemuva kokuhamba kwakhe ku-Flow Riders. 
I-White Bread ibe yimpumelelo njengoba bewine izindondo eziningi, okubalwa kuzo i- Search for the Stars, ebiseShaka Marine World, eThekwini .Ngo-2017, wawina umncintiswano wamathalente iGolden Search eRichards Bay, okwamnika ithuba lokuthi asebenze nenkampani yokuqopha i-Afrotainment, ephethwe ngumdidiyeli uDJ Tira .Ngalo nyaka, uMlindo lo mculi ubeyinkundla yokuxhumana njengoba efake ama-video ahlanganisa izingoma ezidumile. 
I-video yakhe evelele ehlanganisa ingoma eqoshwe phansi yengoma kaDJ Maphorisa ethi "Midnight Starring" yasabalala.Ngemuva kokutholwa nguDJ Maphorisa kuTwitter, wamsayinisa kulebula lakhe iBlaqBoy Music, kwathi kamuva wasayina ne- Universal Music Africa . 
2018 – manjet: Emakhaya 
Ngomhlaka-6 Febhuwari 2018, uMlindo waqhamuka engomeni kaSun-El Musician ethi “Bamthathile”, waba ngundabuzekwayo emisakazweni eyahlukene yaseNingizimu Afrika, wafinyelela phezulu emashadini endawo. Wabe esededela ingoma yakhe yokuqala ethi "AmaBlesser" eyayidlala futhi yenziwa nguDJ Maphorisa.Le ngoma yagcina isaziwa futhi yaqinisekiswa amahlandla amane yiplatinamu yiRiSA ngomhlaka 10 Meyi 2019.Ngenkathi eqala ukuvelela, uMlindo wasiza umndeni wakhe ngokuqedela izinkinga ababebhekene nazo. 
Wakwazi ukuqashela umfowabo indlu, wasiza nomama wakhe owayengasebenzi. 
Ukhankasele ukulwa nokufa okubangelwe yizingozi zomgwaqo eqaphela izingozi ezithile ezithinta izingane zase-Afrika eseNingizimu yeSahara ezinamathuba aphindwe kabili okubulawa ezingozini zezimoto njengezingane noma ikuphi emhlabeni. 
UZoleka ukhulume ngokuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi ebuntwaneni bakhe. 
Wayebuye abe umlutha wezidakamizwa notshwala isikhashana. 
Ngo-2010, kwashona indodakazi kaZoleka Mandela eneminyaka engu-13 ubudala, uZenani, engozini yemoto eyayisendleleni ebuya ekhonsathini.Ingozi kuthiwa ibidalwa yizidakamizwa futhi, ngaleso sikhathi, uZoleka Mandela ubelulama emzameni wokuzibulala.UMandela washicilela umlando wakhe wezempilo ngo-2013. 
UZoleka Mandela welashelwa umdlavuza webele ngo-2011, owabuya ngo-2016. Usebenzise izinkundla zokuxhumana ukuchaza isimila esisusiwe nemiphumela engemihle yokwelashwa kwakhe ngamakhemikhali. 
Ku-2016, wakhethwa njengomunye we- BBC "Abesifazane Abayi-100" .Uveze ukuthi ukuzisola kwakhe okukhulu ukuthi wayenomuzwa wokuthi wenze izinto ezinhle kuphela selokhu kushona umkhulu wakhe, hhayi ngenkathi esaphila. 
UMasango une-diploma kwiGeneral Management kanti njengamanje wenza izifundo zokuphathwa kwamaphrojekthi eBoston City Campus. 
UMandla Greatful Masango (owazalwa ngo-July 18, 1989) is a South African footballer ngubani asanda kudlalwa njengoba winger kwesokudla ngoba Randers e Denmark . [1]UMasango ubemele iNingizimu Afrika emazingeni ehlukene entsha kanti ubelokhu engumdlali wamazwe aphelele selokhu aqala ukubonakala ezingeni eliphezulu ngo-2013. 
Ngomhlaka 13 Agasti 2015 kwamenyezelwa ukuthi uMasango wafinyelela esivumelwaneni noRanders ngodaba lwamahhala. 
Ngo-30 Agasti 2015, uMasango wenza umdlalo wakhe wokuqala benqoba ngo-2-0 behlula i-AaB lapho athola khona igoli lesibili ngomzuzu wama-82. 
Udlale AmaZulu ngaphambi kokushona kwakhe. 
Ngo-29 Agasti 2015,ujoyine iTroyes AC ngemalimboleko ethathe isizini evela kuRacing Genk ngemuva kokufakwa ebhentshini ngumqeqeshi wakhe omkhulu. 
Ngomhlaka 23 Novemba 2020,u-Anele Ngcongca washona engozini yemoto emgwaqeni omkhulu u-N2 KwaZulu-Natal. 
Izinhlonipho 
Indebe yaseBelgian : 2008-09, 2012-13 IBelgian Pro League : 2010-11 IBelgium Super Cup : 2011 
NgoMashi 2017, uLungisa wacelwa ukuba asule esikhundleni sokuba nguSihlalo we-ANC esifundeni sikaNelson Mandela esehlale kulesi sikhundla isikhathi esingaphansi kwesonto. 
Ngamagama ANC uMthethosisekelo, ULungisa obekumele ukuthi ashiye isikhundla sakhe sokuqala njengoba nekomidi (PEC) ilungu le-ANC e-Eastern Cape yesifundazwe phambi yokumelana ku sezingeni leliphasi. [1] [2]ULungisa wesule njengelungu leKomidi leMeya ngomhlaka 2 Agasti 2020 ngemuva kokuhambela ukulalelwa kwezigwegwe. 
Uhlala eyikhansela likamasipala. 
Ngo-Ephreli 2018,uLungisa watholakala enecala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza ngokushaya ikhansela le-DA,uMnuz Rano Kayser, ekhanda ngejeke yamanzi engilazi ngesikhathi somhlangano womkhandlu oshisayo ngo-Okthoba 2016.Lesi sigameko sabanjwa ngekhamera kwathi uLungisa wagwetshwa iminyaka emibili.Uthe ubezivikela kodwa iJaji uMorne Cannon weNkantolo yeMantshi yasePort Elizabeth,uthe uLungisa ushintshe izinhlobo zakhe ngesikhathi kuqulwa icala futhi ubufakazi bakhe abungethenjwa. 
Uqale ukudonsa isigwebo sasejele ngoSepthemba 2020 ngenkathi iNkantolo Ephakeme Yokudlulisa Amacala ichitha isicelo sakhe [1]Ngomhlaka 25 Septhemba wanikezwa ibheyili yemali engu-R10,000 kusalindwe isicelo seNkantolo Yomthethosisekelo,kodwa wakhetha ukuhlala ejele . 
Ngo-23 Julayi 2021,wavela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMotherwell ukuzobhekana namacala okusolwa ukuthi wephula imithetho ye-COVID-19 yokukhiya ngomhlaka 2 Julayi.Wadedelwa ngesexwayiso, icala lahlehliselwa umhlaka 29 Julayi 2021 
U-Andile igama elinikiwe.Abantu abaziwayo abanegama elinikeziwe bafaka: 
U-Andile Dlamini (owazalwa ngo-1992), umdlali webhola waseNingizimu Afrika U-Andile Fikizolo (owazalwa ngo-1994), umdlali webhola waseNingizimu Afrika U-Andile Jali(owazalwa ngo-1990), umdlali webhola waseNingizimu Afrika U-Andile Jho (owazalwa ngo-1992), umdlali wezinyunyana waseNingizimu Afrika U-Andile Khumalo (owazalwa ngo-1978), umqambi nomqambi wezomculo waseNingizimu Afrika Andile Lili, Ilungu laseNingizimu Afrika lePhalamende Lesifundazwe saseNtshonalanga Kapa U-Andile Lungisa (owazalwa ngo-1979), usopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika futhi owayeyiphini likamengameli we- African National Congress Youth League (ANCYL). 
U-Andile Mbanjwa (owazalwa ngo-1998), umdlali webhola waseNingizimu Afrika osezingeni eliphezulu Andile Mngxitama, usopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika kanye nomongameli weqembu leBlack First Land First U-Andile Mokgakane (owazalwa ngo-1999), umdlali wekhilikithi waseNingizimu Afrika U-Andile Ncobo (owazalwa ngo-1967), umdlali webhola waseNingizimu Afrika U-Andile Ngcaba (owazalwa ngo-1956), ongusomabhizinisi waseNingizimu Afrika U-Andile Phehlukwayo (owazalwa ngo-1996), umdlali wekhilikithi waseNingizimu Afrika U-Andile Witbooi (1991–2019), umdlali wezinyunyana zombhoxo waseNingizimu Afrika U-Andile Yenana (owazalwa ngo-1968), umdlali wopiyano waseNingizimu Afrika 
Ngemuva kokufika komqeqeshi uDesiree Ellis, kwaphakanyiswa ukuthi uDlamini angaba nethuba elingcono lokuba ngunozinti wokuqala ongakhetha kuye, ikakhulukazi ngemuva kokuthi uBarker ededelwe emuva kwesikhathi obekulindelwe emidlalweni yobungani nakumqhudelwano we- Africa Women Cup of Nations ka-2016. 
Dlamini ungumkrestu apiphindafunde iBhayibheli ukuba alungiselele football umentshisi. 
U-Andile Dlamini wazalwa ngomhlaka 2 Septhemba 1992 eTembisa, ilokishi laseGoli, eNingizimu Afrika. 
U-Andile Dlamini uthathe ibhola elikhokhelayo ngemuva kokudlala neqembu lebhola likazwelonke laseNingizimu Afrika labesifazane abaneminyaka engaphansi kwengama-20 ; wabe eseqokelwa iqembu. [1] Uqanjwe ngegama elithi "Sticks", phambilini ubedlalela iPhomolong Ladies, kanti njengamanje usadlalela iMamelodi Sundowns . 
Udlale okokuqala eqenjini lesizwe lebhola labesifazane laseNingizimu Afrika bedlala neBotswana ngo-2011.UDlamini ubevame ukuba ngunozinti ogcinelwe leli qembu, kanti uThokozile Mndaweni noRoxanne Barker bathathe indawo yokuqala. 
Lokhu kusho ukuthi yize uDlamini eqokwe emaqenjini ama- Olimpiki Asehlobo ngo- 2012 eLondon, e-United Kingdom, nakuma- Olimpiki Asehlobo aseRio de Janeiro, eBrazil ngo-2016, akazange adlale noma yisiphi isikhathi nhlobo phakathi kwale midlalo. Waphoxeka ngesikhathi iNingizimu Afrika ikhishwa kuma- All Africa Games ka-2015 emzuliswaneni wokuqala ngomdwebo ngemuva kokuthi iqembu ngalinye esigabeni samaqoqo lidlale yonke imidlalo yalo. 
U-Andile Lucky Phehlukwayo (owazalwa ngomhlaka 3 Mashi 1996) ungumdlali wekhilikithi oseNingizimu Afrika. Ungumuntu oshaya i-batsman we-oda eliphansi ohambisa izitsha zengalo yangakwesokudla ngokushesha okuphakathi. 
Uqale ukubonakala eNingizimu Afrika ngoSepthemba 2016. 
Impilo yakudala 
UPhehlukwayo uzuze umfundaze eGlenwood High School eThekwini ngomkhakha weHockey. 
Waziswa ikhilikithi ngumqaphi wakhe uRosemary Dismore, owayeqashe umama wakhe njengosizi wasendlini. 
NgoJanuwari 2014,uPhehlukwayo waqokwa eqenjini labadlali abangu-15 baseNingizimu Afrika kwiNdebe Yomhlaba Yekhilikithi Yangaphansi Kweminyaka Engu-19 ka-2014. 
UPhehlukwayo ufakwe eqenjini laKwaZulu-Natal leqembu lekhilikithi elizodlala e-Africa T20 Cup ka-2015 . [1] 
Ngo-Agasti 2017, uPhehlukwayo waqokwa eqenjini leJo'burg Giants ngesizini yokuqala yeT20 Global League . Kodwa-ke, ngo-Okthoba 2017, iCricket South Africa yaqala yahlehlisa lo mqhudelwano yaze yafika ngoNovemba 2018, lapho izokhanselwa khona maduze nje. 
NgoSepthemba 2018, uPhehlukwayo waqokwa eqenjini laKwaZulu-Natal elizodlalela iNdebe ye-Africa T20 ka-2018 .Nguyena obehamba phambili ngokuthatha ama-wicket KwaZulu-Natal kulo mqhudelwano, ngokuxoshwa kwabayishumi emidlalweni emine. 
U-Andile Khumalo (owazalwa ngomhlaka 12 Meyi 1978) ungumqambi wezingoma waseNingizimu Afrika futhi ungumfundisi wezomculo e- University of Witwatersrand . 
Ngo-2013, waphothula izifundo zakhe zeDoctor of Musical Arts eColumbia University ngaphansi kweso likaGeorge Lewis .Lapho wafunda noFabien Levy noTristan Murail . 
Ngaphambi kwe-DMA yakhe, uKhumalo wafunda ngaphansi kukaMarco Stroppa eStaatliche Hochschule für Musik und Darstellende Kunst Stuttgart (HMDKS) kanye noJürgen Bräuninger e- University of KwaZulu-Natal . 
Izingoma zikaKhumalo ikakhulukazi zisesitayeleni se-spectral. 
Lokhu kudidiyelwa ngendlela exakile kwenza ngokuvinjelwa ukuvala igebe lesikhashana phakathi kwamagama, elingakhiqiza inethiwekhi yonke yezinhlangano ngokuphazima kweso, nomculo,okuthi noma waziwa kangaka ngokushesha, uthathe isikhathi sawo ukwakha imvelo yawo. 
Ngenkathi abaqambi abaningi behlala bebika intshisekelo yabo "esikhathini" - okubonakala kuyiqiniso-okushiwo ukwakheka kukaKhumalo kudlulela ngale kokuphazamiseka okwejwayelekile nokwenziwa kwemingcele yokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe.I-Shades of Words idlulisa ukuxabana kwezigwegwe futhi ilwela ukuqonda kuya kwirejista ephakeme futhi enamagama amaningi asibuza ukuthi singakuvumelanisa kanjani okuhlangenwe nakho okubili kwesikhathi: okukodwa ukukhumbula, ukukhumbula, kanye nefantasy, lapho ukuhlangana nokuzimela kuhlangana khona, kanti okunye ku (manje kuvame ukubonakala) ikhasi, elisebenza kuma-interstices phakathi kokushesha nokuhlala unomphela. 
I-Shades of Words ka-Andile Khumalo, okuyisimo sezinkondlo sika-Alexandra Zelman-Doring, sabhalwa ngendlela yesimanjemanje yase-European post-second-Viennese- school / Darmstadt modernism.Ukufaneleka kwalo mculo we-Eurocentric esimweni samasiko eNingizimu Afrika kuyaxoxwa, futhi umculo osanda kudalwa ngalesi sisho cishe ususelwa nakanjani.Mhlawumbe uKhumalo, manje osebuyele eNingizimu Afrika ngemuva kweminyaka eminingi yezifundo eJalimane naseMelika, usazothuthukisa ukuthambekela kwaseNingizimu Afrika kulesi sitayela somculo, okuholela ezwini elilodwa. 
mhlawumbe endabeni [kaKhumalo], isize umqambi omnyama waseNingizimu Afrika kahle ukuthi angakhiqizi kabusha [ukushintshwa kobuhle obufinyeleleka], ukuze aphikise imicabango ephikelelayo yama-Afrika njengeyakudala (yemvelo, ithoni) uma iqhathaniswa nentshonalanga njengoba yesimanje (universal, abstract). 
Lapho ngibheka eminye imisebenzi eyenziwa nguKhumalo engiphethe (i-ISO (R) yomtshingo, i-cello nopiyano (2004), i-Ossia ye-clarinet ne-cello (2010) ne-Schaufe (r) nster for piano (2011)), kuyacaca ukuthi uKhumalo akahlosile ukukhomba njalo i-Afrika emisebenzini yakhe. 
UKhumalo wazalelwa eMlazi wakhulela eMlazi, okuyilokishi eliseningizimu-ntshonalanga yeTheku esifundazweni esisogwini lwaKwaZulu-Natali. 
Imfundo yokuqala kaKhumalo yomculo yayihlanganisa nokuqeqeshwa esikhungweni somculo womphakathi waseSiyakhula.Ngo-1998 wabhalisela iziqu zomculo eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natali lapho afundela khona ukwakheka noJürgen Bräuninger, akuqeda ngo-2001. Kusukela ngo-2002 kuze kube ngu-2007, uKhumalo wafunda ukwakheka noMarco Stroppa kanye nomculo we-theory noMatthias Herman eHMDKS. Wabe esethatha isikhundla sokuba yiFakhalthi Fellow eColumbia University, ephothula iziqu zakhe ze-PhD ngeziqu ze-Beat Fur's's FAMA. 
UKhumalo waqashwa njengomfundisi wethiyori yomculo,ukuqamba kanye ne-orchestration e-University of Witwatersrand ngo-2013.Ubuye futhi wasebenza eSterkfontein Composers Meeting futhi waba ngumfundisi weSouth African Society for Research in Music's new meeting. 
Imisebenzi emibili kaKhumalo, iShadades of Words neCry Out, ithole ukwamukelwa okubalulekile.Ukubuyekeza ukusebenza kwe-Festival d'Automne ye- Shades of Words, uMartin Kaltenecker uyabhala, 
NgoJanuwari 2014,uJali usayine eqenjini leBelgian Pro League iKV Oostende . 
Ngesikhathi sakhe sesibili esesizini ka-2015-16,uJali wayehlaba umxhwele ekusizeni u-Oostende ukuba aqede endaweni yesi-5 kuBelgian Pro League . 
Uqale ukubonakala eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2010.Ngo-2010,uJali waqokwa eqenjini lokuqala labadlali abangu-30 baseNingizimu Afrika leNdebe Yomhlaba ye-FIFA ka-2010 kodwa waphuthelwa eqenjini labadlali abangu-23 ngenxa yesimo senhliziyo esasimnene esamkhipha emncintiswaneni. 
Izikolo nemiphumela zibala kuqala imigomo yeNingizimu Afrika. 
Izihlakanipho 
UJali ubeyingxenye yeqembu le- Orlando Pirates eliqophe umlando ebholeni laseNingizimu Afrika ngokunqoba izindebe ezintathu ngesizini eyodwa ngaphansi komqeqeshi waseDutch uRuud Krol .Iqembu elifanayo liqhubeke livikela izindebe zalo ezimbili elinqobe ngonyaka owedlule futhi laphinde lanqoba elinye ukuze likwenze ukubuyela emuva emuva. 
UJali uzimise njengomunye wabadlali ababaluleke kakhulu eqenjini le-Orlando Pirates, ngokunqoba izindebe eziningi ngesikhathi sakhe kule kilabhu. 
Ngokwengxenye ngenxa yempumelelo yakhe neqembu laseSoweto, wabizwa njengokaputeni weqembu lesizwe laseNingizimu Afrika (iBafana Bafana). 
Uthole nokuhlonishwa ngokudlala kwakhe nabanye abahlaziyi bethi unamandla okuzakhela igama ebholeni lase-Europe. 
Andile uKwanele Mbanjwa (owazalwa 30 Mashi 1998) is a South African professional footballer odlala njengoba Unozinti ngoba NFD ohlangothini eRichards Bay,kanye nethimba South Africa U23 kazwelonke . 
UMngxitama ujoyine i- Economic Freedom Fighters ezinsukwini zayo zokuqala ngo-2013 wabekwa endaweni yeshumi ohlwini lwabazongenela ukhetho lukazwelonke okhethweni lwangoMeyi 2014 .Ufungiswe njengoba iLungu kuSigungu Savelonkhe 21 Meyi 2014 futhi wabelwa eKomidi abhekele Wezokuthuthukiswa Kwezindawo Zasemakhaya Nezinguquko Kwezomhlaba ngoJuni 2014. 
Engqungqutheleni yobuholi be-EFF ngoDisemba 2014, uMngxitama wenqaba ukuphakanyiswa kwesikhundla sokuba seCentral Command Team yaleli qembu. Ube eseqala ukungaphatheki kahle ngobuholi obusha beqembu. 
NgoFebhuwari 2015, wasola umholi weqembu uJulius Malema nephini lakhe uFloyd Shivambu ngokwenza isivumelwano ne- African National Congress ukuqeda amalungu e-EFF ayisikhombisa. [1] Ngo-13 Ephreli, uMngxitama waxoshwa ku-EFF futhi walahlekelwa yilungu lobulungu bephalamende ngokuya ngokwesigaba 47 (3) (c) soMthethosisekelo. 
Ngo-Okthoba wonyaka ofanayo, wasungula iqembu leBlack First Land First . 
Iqembu licabangele ukungenela ukhetho lomasipala lwango-2016 . Abazange bayibambe. 
UMngxitama ube ngumsekeli wezwi lomndeni wakwaGupta osenkingeni enkabeni ye- state capture eNingizimu Afrika. 
Ngesikhathi uchungechunge lwama-imeyili olubizwa ngokuthi yiGupta Leaks luphuma lubonisa ngobudlelwano bomndeni obukhohlakele nokubandakanyeka ekusebenziseni ipolitiki yaseNingizimu Afrika, kwavela ukuthi uMngitxama wayecele lo mndeni imali yokuxhasa iBlack First Land First . [2] 
Iqembu laphikisana nokhetho lukazwelonke lwangoMeyi 2019 futhi aluzange lunqunyelwe muntu ePhalamende noma kuzishayamthetho zezifundazwe eziyisishiyagalolunye. NgoJulayi, i-IEC yamemezela ukuthi kuchithwa ukubhaliswa kweqembu, kulandela isicelo se- Freedom Front Plus . Iqembu lisidlulisile lesi sinqumo kodwa lasekelwa ngoNovemba. 
U-Andile Mokgakane (owazalwa ngomhlaka 25 Disemba 1999) ungumdlali wekhilikithi waseNingizimu Afrika. Udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala wamashumi amabili namashumi amabili waKwaZulu-Natal kwiNdebe ye-Africa T20 yango -2017 mhla ziyi-8 kuMandulo 2017. Wenza i- List yakhe yokuqala yaKwaZulu-Natali ku- 2017-18 CSA Provincial One-Day Challenge ngomhla ka-22 Okthoba 2017. 
NgoDisemba 2017, waqokwa eqenjini laseNingizimu Afrika leNdebe Yomhlaba Yekhilikithi Yangaphansi Kweminyaka Engu-19 ka -2018.NgoJanuwari 2019, waqokwa eqenjini lesizwe lakuleli laseNingizimu Afrika labangaphansi kweminyaka engu-19, ngaphambi kohambo lwabo lwase-India.Uqale ukudlala ibanga lokuqala KwaZulu-Natal emqhudelwaneni we-2018-19 CSA 3-Day Provincial Cup ngomhlaka 21 Mashi 2019. 
NgoSepthemba 2019, waqokwa eqenjini laKwaZulu-Natal elizodlalela iNdebe ye- T20 yesiKhwama se-CSA ka-2019-20. Ngo-Ephreli 2021, waqokwa eqenjini laKwaZulu-Natali lase-Inland, ngaphambi kwesizini yekhilikithi ka-2021–22 eyayiseNingizimu Afrika. 
UNcobo phambilini ubengunompempe weFIFA, futhi uyaziwa ukuthi ubephethe imidlalo yeFIFA kusukela ngonyaka ka-2000 [1] kuya ku-2007.Usebenze njengonompempe emidlalweni yokuhlungela iNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2010 . [2] 
U-Andile Jho ungumdlali wenyunyana yombhoxo waseNingizimu Afrika ogcine ukudlala ku Izindlovu Zesifundazwe SaseMpumalanga kwiCurrie Cup nakuRugby Challenge .Isikhundla sakhe esijwayelekile simaphakathi. 
Ngo-2013, wajoyina i- Amakhosi Esifundazwe SaseMpumalanga . 
Wafakwa esikwatini seVodacom Cup sango-2013, lapho ayengasetshenziswanga ukubamba iqhaza U-Pampas XV, kodwa wenza i-debut yakhe ngokumelene IFree State XV . 
Ungumfowabo omdala kaSomila Jho, naye owadlalela umbhoxo wesigaba sokuqala i Amakhosi Esifundazwe SaseMpumalanga .Ngo-14 Meyi 2016, laba bazalwane bobabili badlala ndawonye emdlalweni wekilasi lokuqala okokuqala lapho beqokwa njengendawo yokuqala yokubhangqa ukuhlulwa kwabo kweziqu zeCurrie Cup ngo-2016 Isifundazwe saseNtshonalanga eKapa .U-Andile ushaye i-try yakhe yokuqala enkulu kulo mdlalo ngokuhlulwa ngo-10-50. 
Ungusihlalo,umsunguli nomninimasheya omningi weqembu lotshalo-mali iConvergence Partners futhi uphinde waba nguSihlalo oPhethe weDimension Data Middle East nase-Afrika, inkampani engaphansi kweDimension Data plc Group, esanda kutholwa yiNippon Telegraph kanye neTelefoni Inhlangano (NTT) 1. [2]Ngabalingani beConvergence, uNgcaba ubambe iqhaza ezinhlelweni ezintsha zengqalasizinda yezokuxhumana kulo lonke elase-Afrika kufaka phakathi iSeacom (uhlelo lokuqala lwentambo ye-undersea fiber optic esebenzela i-East Coast yase-Afrika) eyayilungele ukusebenza ngomhlaka 23 Julayi 2009, isathelayithi yokuqala yezinkampani ezizimele e-Afrika (Intelsat INew Dawn) eyethulwe ngomhlaka 22 Ephreli 2011, umsebenzi ohlanganyelwe wokuletha amandla aphezulu, i-fiber yomhlaba omude eNingizimu Afrika (i-FibreCo) futhi muva nje ubambiswano olusha neGoogle lokutshala imali ku-CSquared, inkampani yengqalasizinda ye-broadband ekomkhulu layo eNairobi, EKenya. 
U-Andile Witbooi (owazalwa ngomhlaka 17 Novemba 1991 - 30 Meyi 2019) wayengumdlali webhola lombhoxo waseNingizimu Afrika, owayedlalela Iqembu le-Eastern Province Kings Under-19 ngo-2010 neqembu lika-Under 21 ngo-2011, lapho ayengumdlali ohamba phambili ngokushaya amagoli kwi-Division B.Wafakwa eqenjini leqembu lokuqala laMakhosi emdlalweni wabo owandulela owamanqamu we- Currie Cup First Division ngo-2011 i Okhohlisi . [1] 
U-Andile Eugene Fikizolo (owazalwa ngomhlaka 13 Meyi 1994), owaziwa nangokuthi uCarot, ungumdlali webhola waseNingizimu Afrika odlala njengomdlali wasesiswini,nephiko langakwesokudla. 
Njengamanje udlalela iGolden Arrows kwiSouth African Premier Soccer League. 
Ngo-2013,uLili waxoshwa njengekhansela ngemuva kokuthi ehole ababhikishi ukuba baphonse indle yabantu ezinyathelweni zebhilidi likahulumeni wesifundazwe nasesikhumulweni sezindiza saseKapa . [1] Wabe esesungula iSes'khona People's Rights Movement. [1] Wakhethwa esikhundleni sokuphatha i-ANC esifundazweni ngo-2015. 
U-Andile Yenana ungumshayi wopiyano waseNingizimu Afrika.Wenze uphawu olungacimekiyo ngokuyeka ukufundisa wafundela i-jazz. 
Ukhiqize futhi wasebenza nabaculi abaningi baseNingizimu Afrika kanye nabamazwe aphesheya. 
Uthando lomculo luka-Andile, owazalwa ngo-1968 eKing William's Town, lwaqala esemncane. 
Wakhulela emndenini owawuthandwa kakhulu umculo. 
Ubaba wakhe, uFelix Thamsanqa Yenana, ubeneqoqo elikhulu lomculo, kusuka ku-jazz kuya eMotown, nezinye izinhlobo zomculo omnyama wasedolobheni [1] futhi lokhu kwaba nomthelela omkhulu empilweni ka-Andile. 
U-Andile wenza izifundo zomculo ngaphansi kukaDarius Brubeck eUniversity of Natal 's School of Jazz and Popular Music Kulapho ke aba ngumngani nomculi we-saxophon uZim Ngqawana nomshayi wecilongo uFeya Faku . 
Ujoyine i-quartet kaZim Ngqawana wasebenza noZim Ngqawana kuwo wonke ama-albhamu akhe ama-5, kufaka phakathi iSan Song eqoshwe noBjorn Ole Solburg neSan Ensemble yakhe yaseNorway.Uke wasebenza futhi ne-pan-African music project Mahube nomculi we-saxophonist uSteve Dyer nabanye. 
Ubuye wasebenza njengomhleli weSibongile Khumalo, uGloria Bosman noSuthukazi Arosi . 
Ngo-2005 wakhethwa njengo-2005 Standard Bank Young Artist weJazz. [1] 
UThando igama elinikezwe unisex, elivamile eningizimu ye-Afrika, okusho ukuthi "uthando".Kungabhekisa ku: 
UThando Thabethe (owazalwa ngomhlaka-18 Juni 1990) ungumlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika , umlingisi we- TV kanye no-Radio DJ owayengumsakazi wohlelo lwethelevishini uThando Bares All esiteshini se-TLC kanye nomshayeli wesikhathi sokushayela ku-947.Uyinxusa lokuqala lomkhiqizo likaNivea e-Afrika. 
Ngo-2019, uThando waqokwa njengomunye wabangu-30 abangaphansi kuka-30 beForbes Africa. 
Ungumphathi we-947 Drive With Thando. 
UThabethe uzalelwe eGoli, eGauteng . Ufunde eMondeor High School. 
Ngo-2018, wamenywa yisikole aphothula kuso ukuzokwethula inkulumo kubafundi bebanga le-12 ngaphambi kwezivivinyo zabo zokugcina zikamatikuletsheni. 
Ngemuva kokuphothula izifundo zakhe zamabanga aphakeme, uThando wafunda eNyuvesi yaseGoli, lapho athola khona iziqu zeBachelor of Commerce (BCom. 
Iziqu ze-Accounting ngo-2011. UThabethe wayehlala nomama wakhe yedwa iminyaka eminingi yobusha njengoba ubaba wakhe adlula emhlabeni eneminyaka engu-13. 
UThabethe ubambe iqhaza emidlalweni yeshashalazi ngeminyaka yakhe yobusha ngaphambi kokuthola indima yakhe yokuqala ye-TV eneminyaka engu-14. Ubuye wabamba iqhaza emidlalweni yeshashalazi e-UJ Arts Centre ngenkathi eyunivesithi wasebenza e- UJFM, isiteshi somsakazo somphakathi esizinze e- University of Johannesburg, waqala njengomfundi wezindaba futhi kamuva waba ngu-DJ womsakazo. 
UThando Hopa (owazalwa ngo-1989 eSebokeng ) uyimodeli yaseNingizimu Afrika, isishoshovu kanye nommeli. 
Ungowesifazane wokuqala one- albinism ukuba sembozweni yeVogue .Ngenkathi esebenza njengomshushisi, wahlolisiswa nguGert-Johan Coetzee ukuba asebenze njengesibonelo. 
IHopa ihlose ukuveza ubu-albino ngendlela enhle.Walingiswa njengeNkosazana Yezinhliziyo Kukhalenda likaPirelli lika- 2018, waba ngumuntu wokuqala waseNingizimu Afrika onebala ukuvela kulo. 
Ngo-2018, uHopa wahlonishwa ngomklomelo wabesifazane abayi -100 ovela kwi- BBC ngokuhlukahluka kwakhe kanye nokukhuthaza ukumbandakanya. 
UThando Bula (owazalwa ngomhlaka 7 Januwari 1981) ungumdlali wekhilikithi wokuqala waseNingizimu Afrika.Wafakwa eqenjini leqembu lekhilikithi laseMpumalanga le -Africa T20 Cup ka-2015 . [4] 
Thandolwethu Emily uNomvula Sikwila, eyaziwa mononymously njengo Thando, umculi wengoma kanye nom mlingisi ohlala e Melbourne, Victoria.Ungishiya enhle kakhulu ngoba ukubukeka kwakhe ku uchungechunge yesithathu ka The Voice Australia, futhi ekuvezeni wakhe ka Effie White ekukhiqizeni wokuqala Australia zochwepheshe Dreamgirls eyethulwe StageArt. 
Ama-Single 
UThando Mngomeni (owazalwa ngomhlaka-11 Febhuwari 1983 eKapa, eWestern Cape )ungumdlali wasesiswini webhola lezinyawo laseNingizimu Afrika . 
Udabuka eGugulethu kwiCape Flats futhi ungumfowabo omncane walowo owayengumdlali we-Orlando Pirates nomdlali waphesheya waseNingizimu Afrika uThabo Mngomeni . 
Ubuyele eSantos ngemuva kokuthatha umhlalaphansi kancane futhi wahlabeka umxhwele ngemidlalo ethile emihle ngesizini ka-2007/08.Usayine kwiMamelodi Sundowns wadlulela kwiBidvest Wits ngemuva konyaka nohhafu. 
UMgqolozana ungumbhali we- Hear Me Alone (2011),Indoda Engesona Indoda (2009), inoveli ethokozele impumelelo ebucayi futhi yafakwa ohlwini olude lwe- International Dublin Literary Award, [2] ne- Unimportance ( 2014). 
UMgqolozana ungumbhali osebenza naye we- Inxeba (The Wound) (2017),ifilimu ehlabane ngezindondo ,ephefumulelwe yinoveli yakhe, A Man Who Is Not A Man, ekhuluma ngokuthwasa kwendabuko yamaXhosa ebudodeni. 
USimbaradzo wayezoba nguguquko emsebenzini wakhe kanti uMundikumbuke noAmai VaRubhi baletha udumo kuMacheso.Bekufanele alandele impumelelo yeSimbaradzo ne-Well Zvakadaro.Uyakwazi ukudansa, ukucula nokudlala isigingci - inhlanganisela yamakhono angajwayelekile kubaculi. 
I-Well Yakadaro ilandelwe, ngo-2003, nguZvido Zvenyu Kunyanya. 
Ngo-2011 wasungula umdanso odumile weZora Butter osekuthiwa wuhlelo lukaMacheso. 
UMacheso wazalwa ngo-1968 eShamva, ebangeni elingamakhilomitha angama-90 ukuya enyakatho yeHarare, ngabazali abadabuka eMalawi - okuyinto okwakungamkhuthaza ukuthi akwazi ukukhuluma nokucula ngezilimi ezinhlanu - isiShona, isiChewa, isiSena, isiVenda nesiLingala . 
Ukukhula kwakhe epulazini, ikakhulukazi ngaphambi kwenkululeko yaseZimbabwe evela eBrithani ngo-1980, imvelo ayizange imnikeze amathuba amaningi.Ngo-1983, esemusha eneminyaka eyi-15, washiya amapulazi aseShamva walibhekisa eHarare . 
Bafika enhlokodolobha bemenywe yisihlobo, esasikhuthazwe wukudlala isiginci kukaMacheso ezinkampanini zasepulazini,laba bobabili bahamba nohambo olugqugquzelwe umculo, bajoyina amaqembu amaningi, iningi labo elaliyizingoma ezazidlala izingubo. 
Ngo-1997,wahlukana neKhiama Boys eyayiholwa nguNicholas Zakaria, wasungula elakhe i-Orchestra Mberikwazvo. 
NgoDisemba 4, 2020, u-Alick Macheso wakhipha ingoma ethi "Zero Ndizuro", okuyithrekhi yebhonasi evela ku-albhamu ezayo ngonyaka ka-2021. 
Izingoma 
UMbatha-Raw wadlala izindima ezincane ochungechungeni lwethelevishini olufana neBad Girls (2006) neMarple (2007). 
KuDoctor Who ayebhalwe njengoTish Jones, udadewabo womlingani uMartha Jones, ovelele kakhulu ku- " The Lazarus Experiment " (2007). 
Esinye seziqalo zakhe zedrama kwakuseRomeo noJuliet eRoyal Exchange Theatre, eManchester ngo-2005, edlala uJuliet ebhekene noAndrew Garfield njengoRomeo . UMbatha-Raw uqokwe njengomlingisi ovelele kumaManchester Evening News Theatre Awards ngokulingisa kwakhe uJuliet. 
Uphinde wavela njengo-Octavia e- Antony naseCleopatra enkundleni efanayo yaseshashalazini ngo-2005. 
Ngo-2009, uMbatha-Raw wadlalwa njengo-Ophelia eHamlet eLondon eWest End naseBroadway, okuphambene noJud Law njengendima ephambili NgoSepthemba 2010,wadlalwa emdlalweni kamabonakude kaJJ Abrams i- Undercovers, ngemuva kokumbona eHamlet .Uchungechunge lakhanselwa ezinyangeni ezimbili kamuva. 
Gugulethu Sophia Mbatha-Raw MBE ( /Ɡ U ɡ U əm b AE t ə r ɔː / ;owazalwa ngomhlaka 21 Ephreli 1983) ungumlingisi ongumNgisi. 
Ngemuva kokufunda eRoyal Academy of Dramatic Art, waqala ukulingisa kumabonakude waseBrithani nakwimidlalo yasesiteji, wavela ochungechungeni lwezinganekwane zesayensi uDoctor Who (2007), waqhubeka wabonakala kwifilimu yamahlaya kaTom Hanks uLarry Crowne (2011), nochungechunge lwesikhashana lwethelevishini i- Undercovers (2010) neTouch (2012). 
UGugulethu Sophia Mbatha-Raw wazalwa ngomhlaka 21 Ephreli 1983 e- Oxford, indodakazi kaPatrick Mbatha, ongudokotela waseNingizimu Afrika, kanye no-Anne Raw, umhlengikazi oyiNgisi.Wakhulela eWitney . 
Igama lakhe lokuqala ukusikwa kwe- igugu lethu , okusho ukuthi "umcebo wethu" ngesiZulu nangesiXhosa . 
Unentshisekelo ekulingiseni, emdansweni, nakwithiyetha yomculo kusukela esemncane, uMbatha-Raw wafunda e- Henry Box School futhi wabamba iqhaza kwiNational Youth Theatre . 
Izikweletu zakhe zifaka ukudansa eJudy Tompsett School of Dance, manje esaziwa ngeMarsh Tompsett School of Dance. Ngo-2001, wathuthela eLondon ukuyoziqeqesha eRoyal Academy of Dramatic Art . 
Ngesikhathi sakhe njengomfundi ubesebenza endaweni ekhangayo esanda kuvulwa, iThe London Eye . 
INduna (ubuningi: iziNduna ) iyisihloko sesiZulu / isiXhosa esisho umeluleki, umholi omkhulu, inxusa, induna noma umphathi weqembu lamaqhawe. 
Kungasho futhi ukuthi umkhulumeli noma umlamuleli, njengoba iziNduna zazivame ukusebenza njengebhuloho phakathi kwabantu nenkosi.Isiqu besigcinelwe izikhulu eziphezulu eziqokwe yinkosi noma yinkosi futhi sinikezwa abantu ababhekwe kakhulu ngenxa yezimfanelo zabo zobuholi, isibindi noma ukusebenzela umphakathi. [2] [3]Lezi ziNduna bezihlangana njalo kwi- Indaba kudingidwe izindaba ezibalulekile. 
Phakathi Ndebele ethemini lalisetshenziselwa bebonke ubheke neqembu lamasosha ase-elite ezisebenza ngaphansi Induna ethize. [1] 
Abantu abangamaZulu (isizwe) AmaXhosa (isizwe) Izilimi zaseNingizimu Afrika 
Igama elithi ithole ukusetshenziswa kabanzi e -South African isiZulu kanye nesiBhunu, bese kuba inkomba ezivamile kumqashi noma umuntu phambili. Ezikhathini zanamuhla amagama uSihlalo nezinduna kwesinye isikhathi asetshenziswa ngokungafani. [1] 
INtabazinduna (Intaba Yamakhosi) igama legquma elisenyakatho neBulawayo,eZimbabwe. [1] Leli gama lisuselwa kumkhuba wokujikijela izinDuna ezagijimela inkosi phansi. Induna kwakuyigama lehhashi lomjaho elanqoba i- Derby yaseNingizimu Afrika yango-1930. 
Ingwenya enkulu yaseCanada (ngamamitha ayi-14 ubude, enesisindo esingaphezu kwamakhilogremu ayi-1000) ibizwa ngeNduna .Ihlala eRepilia (zoo) eVaughan, Ontario. 
UMbeki Mwalimu ungumlingisi waseKenya, umkhiqizi nomqondisi oneminyaka engaphezu kwengu-10 yeshashalazi kanye nesipiliyoni se-TV.Uqale umsebenzi wakhe emidlalweni yeshashalazi yaseKenya ngo-2004 kuMbalamwezi Players ngaphambi kokujoyina i-Festival Of Creative Arts (FCA) ngo-2007 futhi selokhu waba ngusaziwayo njengomlingisi wasesteji nomlingisi,umphathi wezokukhiqiza, umphathi wesiteji nophrojusa. 
Udume ngemidlalo yasesiteji ngaphakathi kweFCA nangeqhaza lakhe njengoZoe Mackenzie kwi-Swahili Swahili telenovela Selina kwiMaisha Magic futhi ubuye wabonakala efilimini i-Sincerely Daisy, eyaqala ukukhonjiswa kuNetflix ngo-Okthoba 9, 2020. 
Usungule ingubo yakhe yaseshashalazini i- Back to Basics ngo-2018,ngenhloso yokukhulisa impilo yaseshashalazini eKenya. 
Uwine iBest Theatre Director ngo-2018 - Sanaa Awards. 
UMbeki uyisibongo.Abantu abaphawulekayo abanesibongo bafaka: 
Thabo Mbeki, owayenguMongameli waseNingizimu Afrika UGovan Mbeki,ubaba kaThabo Mbeki U-Epainette Mbeki,uniina kaThabo Mbeki, uMongameli waseNingizimu Afrika UMoeletsi Mbeki, indodana kaGovan nomfowabo kaThabo,iphini likasihlalo weSouth African Institute of International Affairs
