Unikezwe umngcwabo wombuso esifundazweni wangcwatshwa eDutywa. </br> Umngcwabo wakhe ubuhanjelwe yiPhini likaMengameli u- Cyril Ramaphosa, uNdunankulu wase- Eastern Cape uPhumulo Masualle, ongomunye wecala laseRivonia uDkt Andrew Mlangeni, uNgqongqoshe weHhovisi likaMongameli uJeff Radebe, uNgqongqoshe Wezesayensi Nobuchwepheshe uNaledi Pandor, uNgqongqoshe Wezokuvikela kanye namaVeteran Omasosha uNosiviwe Mapisa- UNqakula nomyeni wakhe owayenguNgqongqoshe uCharles Nqakula, uNgqongqoshe Wezokuhlaliswa Kwabantu, Ezamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle uLindiwe Sisulu, indodana ka- OR Tambo uDali Tambo, uBrigalia Bam, uGrace Machel, uWinnie Mandela, umholi we- IFP uMangosuthu Buthelezi, umholi we- EFF uJulius Malema, inkosi yamaXhosa uZwelonke Sigcawu, aba Inkosi yabaThembu uBuyelekhaya Dalindyebo, uMfu. UFrank Chikane, uMbhishobhi Njongonkulu Ndungane, uMbhishobhi Malusi Mpumlwana, uMbhishobhi Thabo Makgoba, uMbhishobhi uMvume Dandala nezinye izivakashi ezihlonishwayo nosopolitiki abaqavile. 
UNomaka Epainette Mbeki ( née Moerane ; 16 Febhuwari 1916 - 7 kuNhlangulana 2014), owaziwa ngelika "MaMbeki", wayengunina woMongameli Wangaphambilini waseNingizimu Afrika uThabo Mbeki futhi engumfelokazi wesishoshovu sezepolitiki kanye nowazama icala laseRivonia uGovan Mbeki .Ubehlala eNgcingwane, idolobhana elisemakhaya eliseduzane naseDutywa, omunye womasipala abampofu kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika. 
Wayaziwa ngezihlobo zakhe ezazinenhlanhla futhi, okubaluleke kakhulu kuye, [1] imizamo yakhe yokuthuthukisa impilo yabahlali. 
UGillian Rennie, kuphrofayli ewina indondo, ucaphune osebenza naye ethi, "Akafani nabanye abantu asebethathe umhlalaphansi, ethola impesheni athi, 'Ake ngidlale igalofu ngidobe kancane.' 
Isalukazi singumuntu othobekile. " [1] 
Wazalelwa eMount Fletcher eDrakensberg, wakhulela ezindaweni ezingaphansi, engowesithupha ezinganeni eziyisikhombisa.Ekuseni njalo ekuseni ngaphambi kwesikole, wayejaha izinyoni emasimini kababa wakhe ngaphambi kokubuya ngemuva kwesikole ukuze aqhubeke nokujaha izinyoni.Ufunde eLovedale School ngaphambi kokuthola iziqu zokuba nguthisha e- Adams College eduzane neTheku. 
UMbeki ushone e- East London esibhedlela iFrere ngoJuni 2014. 
UThabo (Τhα'βω) igama lesilisa nelesifazane lase-Afrika elinikezwe . 
Imfushane ngo- "Lethabo" okusho ukuthi "Injabulo" noma "Injabulo". 
Yigama elijwayelekile labesilisa nabesifazane baseNingizimu Afrika.Isetjentiswa kakhulu elulwimini lweSotho, Setswana kanye neSepedi [noma iSotho saseNyakatfo] kanye nalabanye baNguni [emaZulu, emaXhosa, emaSwati kanye nemaNdebele]. 
UMakgoba uvulekele izingxoxo ngesimo se-Anglican sobu-Orthodox mayelana nobungqingili. 
I-Anglican Diocese yaseKapa, ngemuva kweSinodi ebibanjelwe eKapa, ngomhlaka 20-22 Agasti 2009, iphasise isinqumo esibiza ababhishobhi be-Anglican Church in Southern Africa ukuthi banikeze imihlahlandlela yokwelusa imibhangqwana engqingili ehlala "kubudlelwano obenziwe isivumelwano". 
Ngasikhathi sinye, kwavunywa ukuchibiyelwa kwalesi sinqumo esasinikeza ukuthi imihlahlandlela "ibhekwe kahle ingqondo yeSidlo sase-Anglican." 
UMakgoba uthe lesi sinqumo "yisinyathelo sokuqala esibalulekile sokuthi: 'Nkosi, sisebenza kanjani kulokhu?' 
Ngingumuntu othuthukayo. 
Angikholelwa ekuqhumeni okukhulu. 
Uma uphonsa itshe elincane emanzini, lithumela imibuthano egxilile futhi ngethemba lokuthi ngaleyo ndlela ushintsho luzoqhamuka kulokho. " 
Uphinde wathi "INingizimu Afrika inemithetho evuma inyunyana yabantu kulokhu, kodwa hhayi kwamanye amazwe esifundazweni sethu. 
Maphakathi ne-Afrika nasenyakatho ne-Afrika, iSonto lase-Anglican kanye nohulumeni bathi 'cha' futhi "Isizathu salesi sinqumo yingoba sinamakholwa, futhi umthetho uhlinzekela ukuthi babe kuleso simo, ngakho-ke thina uphendule kulokho? " 
Ngo-2016 uMakgoba wathi waba "buhlungu" ngemuva kokuthi isigungu sesonto sinqabe isiphakamiso sokuvumela ababhishobhi ukuba banikeze abefundisi abathandana nabobulili obufanayo abasebenza emishadweni yabantu bobulili obufanayo ukukhonza ezifundeni futhi basichitha isiphakamiso sokuhlinzekela imithandazo yokubusiswa labo abasemishadweni efanayo yombango. 
Ngemuva kwesinodi, ebibandakanya amasonto avela e-Angola, Lesotho, Mozambique, Namibia, South Africa, St Helena, naseSwaziland, uMakgoba weluleke "odadewethu nabafowethu abathandana nabangqingili: Ngaphatheka kabi kakhulu ngomphumela wale mpikiswano". 
ICross of St Augustine ngonyaka ka-2008, umklomelo wesibili ophakeme emhlabeni wonke wokusebenza ngokugqamile kwiSidlo Sase-Anglican, ngu- Archbishop waseCanterbury . [1] Iziqu zobudokotela eziyisithupha ezihlonishwe ngobunkulunkulu, ezivela eGeneral Theological Seminary (2009) naseHuron University College (2013). [2] USewanee: INyuvesi yaseNingizimu (2015). 
I-Honorary doctorate in Literature evela eWitwatersrand University (2016). 
Kutholwe izindondo zeShansela iYunivesithi yasePitoli (2015). 
Udokotela ohloniphekile eDivinity University yaseStellenbosch (2018). 
I-Honorary degree in Divinity evela e- Amherst College (2019). 
I-Knight of Justice ye- oda elihlonipheke kakhulu lika-Saint John 
Imsebenzi 
Ukukholwa Nesibindi- Ukuthandaza noNelson Mandela (2018); Ingokomoya Emsebenzini (2012? ); Ukuxhuma (2005) kanye izindatshana eziningi zephephabhuku 
UMakgoba uthweswe iziqu e-Orlando High, eSoweto, wenza iziqu ze- BSc eWits University ngaphambi kokuya eSt Paul College, eGrahamstown eyofundela inkonzo yase-Anglican.Washada noLungelwa Manona.Kusukela lapho wathola iziqu ze-MEd kwi-Educational Psychology eWits, lapho abuye wafundisa khona amatoho kusuka ngo-1993 kuya ku-1996. 
Wenziwa umbhishobhi waseQueenstown ( umbhishobhi owayedonsa kanzima eDiocese yaseGrahamstown ) mhla zingama-25 kuNhlaba 2002 futhi waba ngumbhishobhi wesifunda-bhishobhi saseGrahamstown ngo-2004. 
Kuze kube yilapho ethuthela eDayosisi yaseGrahamstown njengombhishobhi okhubazekile, inkonzo kaMakgoba yayisetshenziswe eDiocese yaseGoli, okokuqala njengenduna eSt Mary's Cathedral, eGoli futhi waba ngumfundisi wase-Anglican eWits University.Ngemuva kwalokho wenziwa umphathi we-St Alban's Church, eFerrairasdorp, eGoli [lower-alpha 1] futhi kamuva waba nguChrist the King, eSophiatown. [lower-alpha 2] Waba ngumdikoni omkhulu waseSophiatown ngo-1999.Waba ngumbhishobhi omkhulu waseKapa ngomhlaka 31 Disemba 2007, umuntu omncane kunabo bonke owake wakhethelwa kulesi sikhundla. [2] WayenguProcter Fellow we-Episcopal Divinity School e-United States ngo-2008. 
Kusukela ngo-2012, uMakgoba njengamanje uyishansela le- University of the Western Cape . 
UMakgoba uthweswe iziqu ze- PhD e- University of Cape Town ngoDisemba 2009.Wanikezwa i- Ernest Oppenheimer Memorial Trust Scholarship ukuyofundela ubudokotela. 
Uphinde abe nguprofesa wesikhashana e-Allan Grey School for Values e-UCT. 
Phakathi kwempilo eyeqisayo kanye nokufa ngenxa yendlala noma ukungondleki, kunezifo eziningi zezifo ezingadalwa noma zinciphiswe yizinguquko ekudleni.Ukushoda, ukweqisa, nokungalingani ekudleni kungaveza imithelela emibi kwezempilo, okungaholela ezinkingeni ezahlukahlukene zempilo ezifana nescurvy, ukukhuluphala ngokweqile, noma i- osteoporosis, isifo sikashukela, izifo zenhliziyo kanye nezinkinga zengqondo nezokuziphatha.Isayensi yokudla okunomsoco izama ukuqonda ukuthi kungani futhi kungani izici ezithile zokudla zithonya impilo. 
Izakhamzimba ekudleni zihlelwe zaba izigaba eziningana.Ama-macronutrients anamafutha, amaprotheni nama-carbohydrate. 
Ama-micronutrients amaminerali namavithamini . 
Ngokwengeziwe, ukudla kuqukethe amanzi kanye nefayibha yokudla . 
Ukudla yinoma iyiphi into esetshenziselwe ukunikeza ukwesekwa kokudla okunempilo komzimba.Ukudla ngokuvamile of isitshalo, isilwane noma fungal imvelaphi, futhi iqukethe ebalulekile umsoco, ezifana carbohydrate, amafutha, amaphrotheni, amavithamini, noma amaminerali .Ingqikithi is udle ngumzimba bese kufakwe ngemzimba sika amaseli ukunikeza amandla, sigcine ukuphila, noma ukufukula.Kwezinhlobo ezahlukene izilwane ehlukile ukuziphatha yokudla ukuthi ukwanelisa izidingo zabo esiyingqayizivele metabolisms, ngokuvamile savela ukugcwalisa ethize niche emvelweni ngaphakathi timongcondvo ethize womhlaba. 
Namuhla, iningi lamandla okudla adingeka emphakathini owandayo womhlaba ahlinzekwa yimboni yezimboni yokudla, ekhiqiza ukudla ngezolimo olunzulu futhi ikusabalalise ngokusebenzisa izindlela eziyinkimbinkimbi zokulungisa ukudla kanye nokwabiwa kokudla . 
Lolu hlelo lwezolimo olujwayelekile luthembele kakhulu emafutheni ezimbiwa, okusho ukuthi uhlelo lokudla nolwezolimo lungomunye wababambe iqhaza elikhulu ekuguqukeni kwesimo sezulu, okuphendula ngokufika kwamaphesenti angama-37 okuphelele kokukhishwa kwegesi engcolisa ukushisa . Ukubhekana nokuqina kwekhabhoni kohlelo lokudla kanye nodoti wokudla kuyizindlela zokunciphisa ezibalulekile ekuphenduleni komhlaba wonke ekuguqukeni kwesimo sezulu. 
Ukudla okuningi kunomsuka wazo ezitshalweni. 
Okunye ukudla kutholakala ngqo ezitshalweni; kepha nezilwane ezisetshenziswa njengemithombo yokudla zikhuliswa ngokuzipha ukudla okuvela ezitshalweni. 
Izinhlamvu zokusanhlamvu ukudla okuyisisekelo okunikeza amandla amaningi okudla emhlabeni wonke kunanoma yiluphi olunye uhlobo lwesitshalo.Ummbila (ummbila), ukolweni nelayisi - kuzo zonke izinhlobo zazo - kubalwa ama-87% wakho konke ukukhiqizwa kokusanhlamvu emhlabeni jikelele. [1]Iningi lezinhlamvu ezikhiqizwa emhlabeni wonke zondliwa ngemfuyo. 
Ukuhumusha lezi ziqephu zikaLevitikusi, kubalulekile ukwazi ukuthi le ncwadi yeBhayibheli igxile ekuhlanzekeni kwabakwa-Israyeli, nokubeka izinkombandlela kuma-Israyeli ukuze azihlukanise nomakhelwane babo abangamaqaba, abaseGibhithe nabaseKhanani, ababehlala emazweni ngaphambi zahlaliswa ngamaJuda. 
Lokhu kukhonjiswa kuLevitikusi Izahluko 18 no-20 ngezindatshana zemibhalo ethile (uLevitikusi 18: 2–3, 18:24 no-20: 23) ezithi ama-Israyeli akufanele enze okwenziwa ngabaseGibhithe nabaseKhanani. 
Ngenkathi abaprofethi bamaJuda bekhuluma kuphela ngokusweleka kwesisa senhliziyo njengesono seSodoma,incazelo yezocansi kuphela yanda kakhulu emiphakathini yamaKrestu kangangokuthi igama elithi "Sodoma" laba yisisekelo segama elithi "sodomy", elisengumqondo ofanayo osemthethweni izenzo zocansi zobungqingili nokungazalelisi, ikakhulukazi ucansi lwendunu noma lomlomo. 
Kunezindima eziningana eBhayibhelini lesiHeberu naseTestamenteni Elisha ezichazwe njengokubandakanya izenzo zobulili bobulili obufanayo nezifiso. 
Izindima ezikhuluma ngobungqingili eBhayibhelini lesiHeberu ziqala ekuqaleni kweTorah (izincwadi ezinhlanu zokuqala zeBhayibheli ).Omibhalo eminingana eTestamenteni Elisha nayo ikhuluma ngobungqingili, kufaka phakathi iVangeli ezincwadini zikaMathewu, uLuka, nezincwadi ezahlukahlukene ezivela kuSanta Paul ziya emasontweni okuqala e- Asia Minor . 
Ngenkathi abaprofethi bamaJuda u-Isaya, uJeremia, u-Amose noZefaniya bebhekisa ngokungafanele esonweni saseSodoma, uHezekeli ucacisa ukuthi idolobha labhujiswa ngenxa yokuthunyelwa kwalo kokungabi nabulungiswa kwezenhlalo kanye nokuthunyelwa kwalo "okunengekayo:" [1] 
Amasiko akamuva ngesono saseSodoma, njengamaTestamente Abapristi Abayishumi Nambili, ayithatha njengeyindlela engavumelekile yokuhlangana kwabantu bobulili obuhlukile.KuJuda 1: 7-8 iBhayibheli lithi ngeSodoma neGomora: 
NjengeSodoma neGomora nemizi yangakhona, bazinikela ekuphingeni, balandela inyama engaziwa, babekiwe baba yisibonelo, behlushwa impindezelo yomlilo waphakade. 
Ngokunjalo nalabo baphuphi abangcolisa inyama. . . " 
Lokhu kuhunyushwe njengokukhomba ubungqingili ngabathile kanye nenkanuko yezocansi yabantu abafayo ngemuva kwezingelosi ngabanye. 
[1] Ababhali abangamaJuda uPhilo (d. 
AD 50) noJosephus (37 - c. 100) babengabantu bokuqala ababikiwe abagomela ngokusobala ukuthi ubungqingili babuphakathi kwezono zaseSodoma. [2] Ekupheleni kwekhulu lokuqala AD, amaJuda ajwayele ukukhomba isono saseSodoma ngemikhuba yobungqingili. 
Izahluko 18 no-20 zencwadi kaLevitikusi ziyingxenye yekhodi yobuNgcwele kanye nohlu lwezindlela zokulala ezingavunyelwe,kufaka phakathi amavesi alandelayo: 
"Ungalali nowesilisa njengowesifazane; kuyisinengiso." 
Isahluko 18 ivesi 22 “Uma owesilisa elala nowesilisa njengowesifazane, bobabili benze isinengiso; bobulawa nokubulawa, igazi labo libe phezu kwabo.” 
Isahluko 20 ivesi 13 
La mavesi amabili ngokomlando ahunyushwe amaJuda namaKrestu njengemikhawulo ecacile isiyonke yokulwa nezenzo zobungqingili jikelele.Ukuhumusha kwakamuva kugxila kokuqukethwe yindima njengengxenye yeKhodi yobuNgcwele, ikhodi yokuhlanzeka ehlose ukuhlukanisa indlela ama-Israyeli aziphatha ngayo kumaKhanani anezinkulunkulu eziningi .Enye yalezo zincazelo ivela kuJanet Edmonds, othi: 
Isinengiso (kusuka esiLatin abominare, "ukwehlisa isithunzi esibi") igama lesiNgisi elisetshenziselwa ukuhumusha amagama esiHeberu aseBhayibhelini athi shiqquts sheqets okuyinto zihlobene shâqats noma imigomo tōʻēḇā noma to'e'va (ibizo) noma 'ta'ev (isenzo). 
Isinengiso esiNgisini yilokho okunengekayo ngokuhlukile, okunenzondo, okunesono noma okubi 
Ngo-2014 isibhedlela iNatalspruit esasisanda kwakhiwa savulwa ngokusemthethweni saze sabhabhadiswa njenge "kusasa lezeMpilo eGauteng" nguMakhura.UNgqongqoshe Wezempilo u-Aaron Motsoaledi, naye obehambele ukuvulwa noMakhura, uthe imishini etholwe ngaphakathi esibhedlela phambilini ibitholakala ezibhedlela ezizimele kuphela.Isibhedlela iNatalspruit besibize uR 1.7 billion ukwakhiwa esikhathini esiyiminyaka eyisishiyagalombili futhi sanikezwa imibhede engu-821. 
Ucwaningo luphakamisa ukuthi abantu abangama-69% eGauteng banelisekile ngezinsizakalo zezempilo esifundazweni. 
UMakhura uthe ibinganele ngokwenele kanti bebehlose ukuthola u-80% ezingeni eligculisayo ngo-2019.UMakhura uthe uMnyango wezeMpilo eGauteng uzosebenzisa imali engaphezu kuka-R1.2 billion eminyakeni emithathu ekwenzeni ngcono impilo yomphakathi kanye no-R3 billion kwimishini. 
Ngemuva kokhetho lwangoMeyi 2019, i-ANC yamemezela ukuthi isigcine uMakhura esikhundleni sakhe sokuba nguNdunankulu waseGauteng.Ithemu lakhe lesibili njengoNdunankulu laqala ngomhlaka 22 Meyi 2019, ngemuva kokuthi ehlule uSolly Msimanga weDemocratic Alliance kulesi sikhundla. [1] [2] [3] 
Ngo-10 Julayi 2020,uMakhura wamemezela ukuthi uhlolwe ukuthi une-COVID-19, waba nguNdunankulu wesithathu ngesonto elilodwa ukuthola ukuthi unegciwane. 
UThandi Modise (owazalwa ngomhlaka-25 Disemba 1959, eVryburg) [1] ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika, futhi wayeyigagu elalilwa ne-Anti-Apartheid. 
Njengamanje usebenza njengoSomlomo Wephalamende Likazwelonke laseNingizimu Afrika .Usebenze njengoSihlalo woMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe kusuka ngowezi-2014 kuya kowezi-2019. 
Washiya iNingizimu Afrika ngo-1976 wajoyina i- African National Congress futhi wathola ukuqeqeshwa e-Angola. 
Ubuyele eNingizimu Afrika ngo-1978 njengomsebenzi woMkhonto weSizwe . [1] Waboshwa futhi waboshwa ngo-1979, waba ngowesifazane wokuqala eNingizimu Afrika ukuboshwa ngenxa yemisebenzi ye-MK. 
Ngo-2017, wabanjwa ethatha imali yesibonelelo sokuhamba engaphezulu kuka-R125 000, ayengenalungelo lokuyithola njengosihlalo woMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe. 
Wacelwa ukuba akhokhele lesi sibonelelo esikhathini esiyiminyaka emithathu, kodwa waphikisana nalo myalelo futhi akukaziwa ukuthi wagcina eyikhokhile yini leyo mali. 
NgoJulayi 2014, i- NSPCA yathola inqwaba yezilwane ezifile, ezihlanganisa izinkukhu, izingulube, izimbuzi kanye namahansi, epulazini likaModise eModderfontein, ngaphandle kwasePotchefstroom esifundazweni saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga. 
Bekusobala ukuthi izilwane sezihambe ngaphandle kokudla namanzi isikhathi esingaphezu kwesonto, kanti izingulube ezingama-85 ezisele epulazini sezisebenzise ukudla izingulube ezingama-58 ezifile.Abekho abasebenzi ababekhona kule ndawo. 
Amaphoyisa aseNorth West akuqinisekisile ngomhlaka 7 Julayi ukuthi uzobhekana namacala okuhlukumeza izilwane ngokwephula umthetho i-Animal Protection Act. 
Uphendule kulezi zimangalo wathi "ufunda" indlela yokulima, nokuthi waqoka umphathi wepulazi, kepha wayeka imisebenzi yakhe ukuze abhekane nodaba lomndeni. Cishe ezinyangeni ezine kamuva,kwabikwa ukuthi isimo epulazini sase singcono, ukuthi izinkomo zikaModise zazithola ukudla okwanele futhi "zisesimweni esamukelekayo". 
I-NSPCA ne- AfriForum bavulele uModise icala lokuhlukunyezwa kwezilwane, okusamele liqulwe. 
UDlamini uyisibongo,ujwayelekile Eswatini nasezingxenyeni ezingomakhelwane beNingizimu Afrika . 
Abantu abanesibongo Dlamini bafaka: 
UBheki Dlamini usebenze njengoNdunankulu obambile waseSwazini kusukela ngomhlaka 18 Septhemba 2008 kuya kumhla zingama-23 kuMfumfu 2008. 
UDlamini wayeyinhloko yehhovisi lobukhosi leNkosi u-Mswati III ngo-2006-2013. 
Ngemuva kokuxoshwa kukahulumeni wangaphambilini kaNdunankulu u-Absalom Themba Dlamini, wayengu-18 Septhemba 2008 obambile njengoNdunankulu waseSwazini.Wabamba leli hhovisi kwaze kwaba ngu-Okthoba 23, 2008 wabe esethathwa nguBarnabas Sibusiso Dlamini. 
Ngo-2006, iDirectorate of Special Operations yathinta uDlamini namanye amalungu ePhalamende ayishumi nantathu e-ANC kulokho abezindaba baseNingizimu Afrika bakubiza ngehlazo le- "Travelgate", okuyihlazo elibandakanya ukuhlukunyezwa kwamavawusha okuvakasha ePhalamende. 
I-charge sheet yakhe ibithi uyazi ukuthi ama-voucher okuvakasha angasetshenziselwa ukuhamba emoyeni kuphela kodwa noma kunjalo uwasebenzisela ukukhokhela izindleko zendawo yokuhlala amahhotela, ukuqasha izimoto nezinye izinzuzo. 
Walahlwa yicala lokukhwabanisa ngemuva kokuvuma icala lokuthola imali engu-R245,000 isiyonke ngezicelo zokukhwabanisa zokuhamba. 
UDlamini wabe eselahlekelwa isikhundla sakhe sokuba yilungu lePhalamende. 
Kodwa-ke, engqungqutheleni kazwelonke yama-52 ye-ANC ngoDisemba 2007, uDlamini wakhethwa ukuba abe seNational Executive and National Working Committe kaKhongolose. 
UDlamini waqokwa njengePhini likaNgqongqoshe Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi ngomhlaka 11 Meyi 2009, futhi waba nguNgqongqoshe Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi ngomhlaka 1 Novemba 2010. 
NjengoSihlalo weKomidi LoNgqongqoshe Abahlukahlukene (i-IMC) Elibhekele Udlame Olubhekiswe Kubulili, wahola ukukhishwa kwe-Gender-Based Violence Command Centre, isikhungo sezingcingo esisebenza amahora angu-24 eseseka futhi salule izisulu zodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obufanayo. 
UDlamini ubuye futhi waba ngusihlalo we-IMC ekuLwisaneni nokuSetshenziswa kabi kweMithi kanye ne-IMC yokuThuthukiswa kwabaNtwana basekuqaleni. 
Ngo-2016, uDlamini waphonselwa inselelo yiqembu eliphikisayo iDemocratic Alliance ngemuva kokuthi evikele imali engu-R753 ngenyanga etholwa ngumhlomuli wesibonelelo sikahulumeni "njengokwanele ukuthenga ukudla okwanele kanye nezinye izinto ezingezona ezokudla", kanti yena uqobo wayehlala emahhotela abiza kakhulu R11,000 ngobusuku. Ngasekupheleni kuka-2016 wemukele nemoto kanokusho ebiza u-R1.3 million, nephini lakhe, uHendrietta Bogopane-Zulu, imoto eyi-R1.1 million. 
NjengoNgqongqoshe Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi, uDlamini wehlulekile ukufeza isu likahulumeni lokuthatha imali yokukhokhela izibonelelo zikahulumeni zaseNingizimu Afrika ngomhla zingama-31 kuNdasa 2017, lapho uhlelo olwalukhona neCash Paymaster Services lokusabalalisa izinkokhelo kwakumele luphelelwe yisikhathi. 
Lokhu kudale ukukhathazeka ngokuthi abamukeli bezenhlalakahle ngeke bathole izinkokhelo zesibonelelo kusuka ngomhlaka 1 Ephreli 2017. 
UDlamini wagxekwa ngokungasebenzi kwakhe nokungakwazi kwakhe ukuqinisekisa noma ngabe inkontileka entsha yokusebenza noma ukufakwa komsebenzi. 
Uphinde wagxekwa ngendlela abephatha ngayo abezindaba ngesikhathi kunempikiswano. Ngomhla ka-6 Mashi 2017, inkontileka neCash Paymaster Services yavuselelwa eminye iminyaka emi-2. 
INkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ibambe uDlamini ngokuyinhloko ebhekene nale nkinga,iJaji Elikhulu uMogoeng Mogoeng lathi ayikho incazelo ngokuntula ikhono okwakhonjiswa yena ne-SASSA. Ngokusho kwesazi somthethosisekelo uPierre de Vos, iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ibisiphethe ngokuthi iSASSA noDlamini bebengathenjwa ukuthi bazokwenza umsebenzi abawunikezwe ngokomthethosisekelo wokuqinisekisa ukulethwa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni, futhi ngeke bathembeke ukuthi bangaqambi amanga ezinkantolo ngokuzayo. 
NgoSepthemba ka-2018 iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo yathola ngazwi linye ukuthi uDlamini kumele aziphendulele ngokwakhe ngo-20% wezindleko zecala abekwe lona yiBlack Sash Trust neFreedom Under Law. 
Ngaphezu kwalokho, kutholakale ukuthi udukise inkantolo - okungukuthi, waqamba amanga ngaphansi kwesifungo - ukuze azivikele. 
INational Prosecuting Authority izonquma ukuthi izomkhokhisa amanga noma cha. 
Ngaphandle kokwehluleka kwakhe, uMengameli Jacob Zuma uqhubeke nokweseka uDlamini.Ubuye futhi wasekela ozongenela ukhetho lukaZuma, uNkosazana Dlamini-Zuma, emkhankasweni wakhe wokungena esikhundleni sakhe njengomholi we-ANC kanye noMongameli waseNingizimu Afrika. 
UDlamini wazalelwa eNquthu ngomhlaka 10 Septhemba 1962 futhi wakhulela eNkandla, Matshensikazi naseMbali, eMgungundlovu.Uthole iziqu zeBachelor of Arts Degree kwiSocial Studies e- University of Zululand . 
UDlamini ubesebenza kwezombusazwe kusukela esemncane.Ngo-1983 waba ngomunye wamalungu asungula iMbali Youth Organisation, inxusa le- United Democratic Front, elalisebenza ngokubambisana neSouth African Students Congress kanye neMbali Civic Organisation.Ngo-1985, wajoyina iSouth African National Students Congress njengomunye wabesifazane abambalwa ababamba iqhaza kwezepolitiki. 
Ngo-1989, uDlamini waphothula iziqu zakhe e-University of Zululand wenza iziqu zeBachelor of Arts (Honours) zeSocial Work aziphasa ngamalengiso. 
Ngo-1991 waba yingxenye yobuholi besikhashana obakha izinhlaka ze-African National Congress (ANC) Women's League KwaZulu-Natal . 
Wabe eseqokelwa esigungwini sokuqala seziFunda se-ANCWL. 
Ngo-1992 nango-1993, wasebenza njengoNobhala Wezifunda, futhi wakhethwa njengePhini likaNobhala-Jikelele we-ANCWL ngo-1993.Ngo-1998 wakhethwa njengoNobhala-Jikelele we-ANCWL, futhi wasebenza iminyaka emibili kwaze kwaba ngu-2008. 
Ngomhlaka 7 Agasti 2015, uDlamini wakhethwa njengomholi omusha we-ANCWL, esikhundleni sikaNgqongqoshe Wezemfundo Eyisisekelo ngaleso sikhathi, u-Angie Motshekga . 
Ngo-2017 uDlamini wakhankasela owayenguSihlalo we- African Union uNkosazana Dlamini-Zuma ukuba akhethwe njengomengameli we-ANC. 
ULutfo Ephraim Dlamini (owazalwa ngo-1960) ungusopolitiki waseSwatini. 
Ngemuva kokuqokwa kwakhe, wasekela inqubomgomo yeNkosi uSobhuza II, owachitha umbuso wephalamende ngoMashi 25, 1977.UDlamini ushone esemandleni. 
UMfanzile Dlamini (owazalwa ngomhlaka 18 kuNhlolanja 1983) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo laseSwazini odlala njengomgadli.Kusukela ngomhla ka-Februwari 2010, adlalele Royal Leopards e- Swazi Premier League futhi unqobile 22 ofeleba futhi amagoli amahlanu izwe lakhe. 
UMhiwa Dlamini ungusopolitiki waseSwazini.Uyilungu lePhalamende lasePan-Afrika kanye neNdlu Yomhlangano waseSwazini . [2] 
USotsha Ernest Dlamini (27 Meyi 1940 - 7 Febhuwari 2017) wayenguNdunankulu waseSwazini kusukela ngomhlaka 6 Okthoba 1986 kuya kumhlaka 12 Julayi 1989.Wazalelwa eMankayane . UDlamini ushone ngo-7 Febhuwari 2017, eneminyaka engama-76. [3] 
Impilo 
U-Absalom Themba Dlamini (owazalwa ngomhlaka 1 Disemba 1950 [1] ) wayenguNdunankulu wase - Eswatini kusukela ngoNovemba 2003 kuya kuSepthemba 2008.Ungumqondisi ophethe iTibiyo Taka Ngwane . 
Impilo 
UDlamini waqokwa njengoNdunankulu ngomhlaka 14 Novemba 2003.INkosi uMswati III yamhlonipha "ngeNdondo Yasebukhosini Yomeluleki Ophakeme weSimemezelo Sasebukhosini Senkosi uSobhuza II." 
Wahlala esikhundleni kwaze kwaba ngumhla ziyi-18 Septhemba 2008 lapho uBheki Dlamini aqokwa njengeNdunankulu obambile. 
Ngo-16 Okthoba 2008, walandelwa nguNdunankulu wangaphambili u- Barnabas Sibusiso Dlamini . 
Utatakho bekuwuhlelo lwethelevishini oludidiyelwe yi-Connect TV ngo-2015 olwalukhonjiswa kuMzansi Magic lwethulwa nguZola. 
Esiqeshini ngasinye uZola usize ababambiqhaza ukuthi bathole noma baphinde baxhumane noyise abazizalayo. 
UZola ubephelezela amadodana abamba iqhaza emihlanganweni nobaba wabo futhi enza ukuba kube nezingxoxo. 
Ngokwengeziwe, umeluleki oqeqeshiwe wayekhona ukuzolamula.Njengoba eye enkantolo yezingane ngenxa yokugcinwa kwezingane zakhe, uZola uyakwazi ukuqonda okuqukethwe yilowo mdlalo ezingeni lakhe. 
Ithemba noZola wuhlelo oluyi-docu-reality kuMoja Love. 
Uhlelo luqale ngo-Okthoba 2018 kanti luphethwe nguZola. 
Isiqephu ngasinye siyimizuzu engama-30 futhi sigxile ekunciphiseni izinkinga zomphakathi njengokuntuleka kwentsha, ukushoda kwezindlu noma imitapo yolwazi yomphakathi enganele. Ngokungafani nombukiso wakhe wangaphambili, iZola 7, owawugxile kubantu ngabanye, iThemba ngeZola ikhuluma nemiphakathi kanye nama-aimes ngokukhethekile ngentuthuko esimeme. 
Bonginkosi Dlamini bajabulela impumelelo njengoba indlu enkulu, futhi kungenzeka kakhulu ethandwa kwaito kuleli zwe; ULance Stehr wamarekhodi eGhetto Ruff ubize uZola "njengomkhiqizo wesibili ngobukhulu ezweni eliseduze kukaNelson Mandela ."UZola akagcini ngokucula kodwa ubuye abhale futhi akhiqize omunye umculo wakhe, asayine enkampanini ezimele iGhetto Ruff records. 
UZola uphinde abe ngumnikazi wenkampani yomculo iGuluva Entertainment. 
UDlamini uyingxenye yeMassiv Metro esanda kwethulwa, okuyisiteshi esiku-inthanethi esiphaywe nguDJ Sbu. 
Amafilimu 
Kumabonakude 
Umculo 
UBonginkosi Dlamini wazalwa ngomhlaka-24 Ephreli 1974 futhi wakhulela eZola, ilokishi laseSoweto, elaziwa kakhulu ngezigameko zobugebengu obuphezulu. 
Kuyidolobha lakubo lobuntwana lapho aqamba khona igama lakhe.Ukungasebenzi, ukuphuza ngokweqile, nemindeni yabazali abangabodwa kuvame kakhulu eZola. 
Uyise kaDlamini, okukholakala ukuthi wayeyingxenye yesizwe sakwaMchunu, washiya umndeni, washiya unina ukuba amnakekele yena nomfowabo nodadewabo omdala besebancane.UZola uqobo lwakhe wadonsa ejele njengomuntu osemncane ngokweba izimoto. [3] 
UZola ubedume kakhulu ngendima yakhe njengeqembu lezigelekeqe elidume kabi iPapa Action kwisizini yesibili yochungechunge lwethelevishini iYizo Yizo.Lo mlingisi ubesevele ethandwa kusukela kusizini yokuqala, lapho bekuvezwe khona ngomunye umlingisi. 
UZola wayefana nomculi owedlule, futhi ukudlala kwakhe kwandisa ukuthandwa kwendima. 
Uphinde wadlala futhi wadlala indima efilimini ye -Academy Award- Winning Tsotsi (2005) nakwi-movie iDrum (2004). 
UZola naye ubambe iqhaza elibonakalayo kwi-documentary SHARP! 
SHARP! - Indaba yekwaito (2003) iqondiswe ngu- Aryan Kaganof . 
Ngo-2015 nango-2016 uZola wayenendima encane emdlalweni owuchungechunge wethelevishini Isibaya, nakuZabalaza. 
Umabonakude 
UZola 7 bekuwuhlelo lwethelevishini olwethulwa nguZola oludlala ngo-2002 kuya ku-2010 kuSABC1.Isiqephu ngasinye besigxile kumuntu omusha, othe ngokwesekwa uZola walifeza iphupho lakhe. 
UPhinda Dlamini (owazalwa ngomhlaka 8 Novemba 1984) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo laseSwazini odlala njengomgadli.Kusukela ngomhla ka-Februwari 2010, adlalele Green Mamba ku Swazi Premier League futhi unqobile 10 ofeleba wakora elilodwa umgomo izwe lakhe. 
Uhlu lwezikolo nemiphumela luqala kuqala. 
Ubukhosi bakwaDlamini buzilandela enkosini uDlamini I (obuye aziwe ngoMatalatala), okuthiwa wafuduka nabantu baseSwazini besuka eMpumalanga Afrika bedlula eTanzania naseMozambique .UNgwane III, nokho, uvame ukubhekwa njengeNkosi yokuqala yaseSwatini yanamuhla, eyabusa kusukela ngo-1745 kuya ku-1780. Eminyakeni yokuqala yobukhosi bakwaDlamini, abantu nezwe ababehlala kulo babizwa ngeNgwane, kwathiwa nguNgwane III. 
UTibiyo Taka Ngwane, okusho ukuthi ingcebo yesizwe,yisikhwama sezimali saseSwazini esizimele esasungulwa ngomthetho wobukhosi ngaphansi kokubusa kweNkosi uSobhuza II ngo-1968. 
Le nkampani njengamanje iphethwe yiNkosi uMswati III ngokwethemba isizwe saseSwazini futhi yehlukile kuhulumeni. [2] 
Yasungulwa yiNkosi uSobhuza II ekuzibuseni ngo-1968 yiRoyal Charter ukukhuthaza nokukhuthaza ukuthula nozinzo, ukugcina amasiko namasiko kanye nokukhuthaza izinga eliphakeme lempilo yeSizwe Swazi ngokunikezela ngemisebenzi.Inezigxobo kwezolimo, impahla, inkampani yokuphrinta, futhi iyona kuphela umnikazi we- Eswatini Observer .UTibiyo ungumninimasheya ezinkampanini eziningi ezifana neRoyal Eswatini Sugar Corporation (RES Corporation), Maloma Colliery Limited, Lubombo Sugar, Parmalat Swaziland, Simunye Plaza, Bhuna Mall, Swazi Spar Holdings, Eswatini Beverages, Alexander Forbes, Fincorp, Tibiyo Leisure Resorts Ukuhweba njengeRoyal Villas kanye nezinsizakalo eziningi ezweni lonke. 
Ngo-2009 iqembu lezinhlangano zaseSwazini lacela ukuthi uTibiyo Taka Ngwane aguqulwe abe ngumnyango kahulumeni ozovuleleka ukuthi umphakathi ubhekisise ngawo. 
U-Absalom Dlamini (owazalwa ngo-5 Agasti 1984) ungumdlali webhola waseSwazini neRoyal Leopards neqembu lesizwe laseSwaziland . [1]Udlala endaweni yomdlali wasesiswini ozivikelayo. 
UDlamini wayengusopolitiki waseSwazini owaziwa njengomuntu oxhasa iNingizimu Afrika futhi enenkolelo yamasiko. 
Wakhethwa njengoNdunankulu esikhundleni sikaMntwana uMabandla Dlamini ngemuva kokuba kube nezingxabano phakathi kukaMabandla namanye amalungu engqungquthela eyayiholwa nguMfanasibili Dlamini ngesikhathi sokubusa kweNdlovukazi u-Dzeliwe .U-Dzeliwe wayephikisana nalolu shintsho futhi lokhu kwaholela ekuxoshweni kwakhe esikhundleni sobukhosi yiNdlovukazi uNtombi . 
UBhekimpi waqala ukushushisa labo ababalekela umbuso wobandlululo waseNingizimu Afrika.Ngemuva kwemibhikisho yabafundi, uphinde wavala iNyuvesi yaseSwazini ; konke lokhu kwaqubula ukuvuseleleka kweMovement for Swazi Liberation, ngaleso sikhathi eyayiholwa nguMntwana uClement Dusima Dlamini.Waxoshwa yiNkosi uMswati III waseSwazini, ngemuva kokubamba izintambo zombuso iminyaka emithathu kuphela. 
UMbeki wahlangana noThabo Mbeki esafunda e-University of London futhi babeshade ehhovisi lokubhalisa eLondon ngomhlaka 23 Novemba 1974, kwalandelwa umcimbi wenkolo ekhaya likadadewabo omdala u-Edith, eFarnham Castle eSurrey.Kwakudingeka athole imvume ku-ANC yokuthi ashade futhi kubikwa ukuthi watshela u- Adelaide Tambo "uma uPapa [ Oliver Tambo ] engangivumeli ukuba ngishade noZanele, angisoze, ngiphinde ngishade. 
Futhi angisophinde ngibuze. 
Ngithanda umuntu oyedwa kuphela futhi munye kuphela umuntu engifuna ukwenza impilo yami naye, lowo nguZanele. " Lo mbhangqwana awunazo izingane futhi uvame ukuhlala ngokwehlukana. 
UZanele Dlamini wazalelwa e- Alexandra ngo-1938 lapho ubaba wakhe wayengumfundisi waseWeseli kanti umama wakhe wayengumthungi wezingubo.Unodadewabo abahlanu. 
UMbeki ubehlala ebhodini e-Catholic Inkamana Academy KwaZulu-Natal ngaphambi kokufundela ukuba ngusonhlalakahle e- University of Witwatersrand . 
Ngemuva kokusebenza iminyaka emithathu ku- Anglo American plc njengesisebenzi saseZambia, uMbeki wathuthela eLondon futhi waqeda idiploma yenqubomgomo yezenhlalakahle nokuphatha eLondon School of Economics ngo-1968. [1] Kamuva wazuza umfundaze wokwenza i-PhD yakhe esikhundleni sabesifazane base-Afrika ngaphansi kobandlululo eBrandeis University eMelika, yize ashiya eMelika eyoshada noThabo Mbeki ngaphambi kokukuphothula. 
Ngenkathi eseLondon, uMbeki wasebenza njengonhlalonhle wezifo zengqondo esibhedlela saseGuy, naseMarlborough Day Hospital . 
USibusiso Barnabas Dlamini (owazalwa 1 Septhemba 1980 e Mbabane ) kungumdlali we Swazi football Umgadli ngubani okwamanje adlalele Malanti Chiefs . 
Ubanjelwe Eswatini . 
USihawu Dlamini (owazalwa ngomhlaka 12 Juni 1985) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo laseSwazini odlala njengomvikeli.Kusukela ngo-January 2010, lapho kudlala i- Royal Leopards e- Swazi Premier League futhi unqobile 11 ofeleba izwe lakhe. 
UDlamini III (owaziwa nangokuthi uLadzandzukane noSidvwaba Silutfuli kwakuyinkosi noma i- tiNgwenyama yabantu baseSwazini eyabahola cishe phakathi kuka-1720 kwaze kwaba ngu-1744. Wayenguyise kaNgwane III iNkosi yokuqala yaseSwazini yanamuhla. 
Uthathwa njengesixhumanisi esixhumanisa phakathi kwemijondolo yaseDelagoa Bay Swazi kanye nombuso wamanje waseSwazini. 
UDlamini wabeka abalandeli bakhe eduze komfula uPhongolo lapho unqamula khona ezintabeni zaseLubombo .AbaseSwazini bokuqala bahamba kanye nabakwaNdwandwe abayinzalo ehlobene kakhulu.UDlamini walandelwa nguNgwane III indodana yakhe ngeNdlovukazi uLaYaka Ndwandwe . 
[1] Indodana kaDlamini uNgwane III, wathatha isikhundla sobukhosi futhi wasungula izindawo zokuhlala zaseSwazini eningizimu yoMfula uPhongolo kwathi lapho ephoqeleka ukuba azishiye, wathuthela abalandeli bakhe ukuba bawelele emuva bayohlala emabhange asenyakatho.Lokhu kuphawule ukusungulwa kweSwaziland yanamuhla, kanti inhlokodolobha yokuqala eZombodze yasungulwa kungekudala ngemuva kokwenyuka kwakhe. [2] Abafowabo bakaNgwane uNdlela kanye nomalume bakhe uShabalala noMabuza bahlala eduze. [1] 
I Dlamini King Brothers ungumhleli Awesicathamiya choir kusukela Kennedy Road emjondolo zokuhlala ohlelweni eThekwini, eNingizimu Afrika .Zakhiwa ngo-1999. 
Ngo-27 Septhemba 2007, bashaya amanye amakhwaya ayi-108 ukunqoba umncintiswano we-11th Isicathimiya Competition owawusePlayhouse Theatre eThekwini. 
Lona ngumncintiswano omkhulu futhi obaluleke kakhulu wase-isicathimiya eNingizimu Afrika. 
NgoJanuwari 2009 bakhipha i-albhamu yabo ethi Hlis'uMoya equkethe inhlanganisela yezingoma zezenkolo nezepolitiki. [1] Bavamise ukucula emicimbini ehlelwe yinhlangano yesikwati Abahlali baseMjondolo . 
UMalungisa Dlamini (owazalwa ngomhlaka 3 Ephreli 1978) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo laseSwazini odlala njengomdlali wasesiswini.Kusukela ngomhla ka-Februwari 2010, adlalele Young Buffaloes ku Swazi Premier League futhi unqobile 10 ofeleba wakora elilodwa umgomo izwe lakhe. 
UMaxwell Dlamini unguNobhala-Jikelele weSWAYOCO kanye noMongameli wangaphambilini woMkhandlu Omele Abafundi Wenyuvesi yaseSwaziland. 
Ngesikhathi kubizwa ngokuthi "u-Ephreli 12 Swazi Uprising" ngo-Ephreli 2011, yena nesishoshovu sakhe uMusa Ngubeni baboshwa ngamacala okutholakala neziqhumane ngaphansi kweSigaba 8 no-9 seSwaziland's Explosives Act 4 of 1961. [1] [2][4] [5] Bobabili kuthiwa bahlukunyezwa kwathi ngemuva kwalokho banqatshelwa ibheyili. 
Baboshwe eManzini Remand Centre. [5] [6] [10] [11] 
UMaxwell Dlamini waphakanyiselwa uMklomelo Wokuthula Wabafundi ngo-2013 ngoNovemba 2011, [1] [3] [4] [5] kanye ne-Frontline Defenders Award ka-2012 Yabavikeli Bamalungelo Abantu Abasengozini ngoJanuwari 2012. [6] Ngo-2013, wathola i-All-Africa Students 'Union's Student Student Activist Award ka-2013, ngenxa ”yeqhaza alibambile ezinhlanganweni zaseSwazini nasezinhlanganweni zabafundi base-Afrika.” 
UMaxwell Dlamini noMusa Ngubeni banikezwa ibheyili ngomhlaka-20 Disemba 2011.Ibheyili ibibekelwe amaRandi angama-50 000, okuyibheyili enkulu kunazo zonke ezake zaba khona emlandweni womthetho waseSwazini. 
UMaxwell Dlamini wadedelwa ngebheyili mhlaka 3 Febhuwari 2011. 
Imali yebheyili yaqoqwa nguyise, uNimrod Dlamini, nezinhlangano zobumbano zakuleli nezamazwe omhlaba. 
UMaxwell Dlamini waboshwa ngomhlaka 23 Ephreli 2013 mayelana ne rally yeSWAYOCO eyayingomhlaka 19 Ephreli eMbabane. 
UMaxwell wabekwa amacala amabili okuvukela umbuso. 
Wakhishwa ngebheyili okwesibili ngomhlaka 5 Juni 2013,kodwa waphinde waboshwa ngomhlaka 1 Meyi 2014, okusolwa ukuthi wagxeka uhulumeni waseSwazini nenkosi yakhe ngenkulumo. 
UNhlanhla Dlamini (owazalwa ngomhlaka 4 Januwari 1998) ungumdlali wekhilikithi waseNingizimu Afrika.Uqale ukubonakala ku- List yakhe mhla zi-6 kuMfumfu 2019, waKwaZulu-Natali kwiNselelo Yosuku Olunye lweCSA yesi -2019-20. 
UNhlanhla Dlamini (owazalwa ngo-2 Septhemba 1986) ungumdlali webhola lomnqakiswano waseNingizimu Afrika ne- Vaal University of South Africa yePremier Basketball League .Ubuye futhi abe yilungu leqembu lesizwe lakuleli lebhola lomnqakiswano futhi wavela neqembu ku- African Championship ka-2009 . 
Ungunogada wephoyinti . [1] 
Nhlanhla Brilliant Khuzwayo (owazalwa 9 Febhuwari 1990) is a Afrika eNingizimu umhlala ngamazwe footballer ababedlala njengoba unozinti . 
UKhuzwayo ujoyine AmaZulu esuka kwiDurban Warriors ngo-2010. 
Uqale ukubonakala ngo-22 Septhemba 2010 bedlala nePlatinum Stars ngokulingana ngo 2-2.UKhuzwayo udlale eminye imidlalo emibili yeligi ukuqeda esephelele engu-3. 
Ubolekiswe eqenjini leNational First Division iThanda Royal Zulu . [2] UKhuzwayo ujoyine iChiefs ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2011-12 esayina inkontileka yeminyaka emithathu ephothulwe ngomhlaka-24 Meyi 2012.Ngomhla ka-23 Meyi 2012, ngosuku olwandulela ukusayina kukaKhuzwayo, imenenja jikelele yaMaZulu uPeter O'Connor waphakamisa ukuthi kungokwesifiso salo mdlali ukuthi iqembu livume ukumvumela ajoyine iChiefs. 
"Ngokubona ukuthi uTapuwa Kapini uneminye iminyaka emithathu nathi, kwavunyelwana ngokuthi sizokhipha u-'Casillas '[Khuzwayo] ngoba ubengeke adlale njengonozinti wokuqala. 
Ngakho ukuze akwazi ukuthola kabanzi umdlalo yesikhathi sinqume ukuba amvumele ukuba ujoyine Chiefs sebephumile babeza kithi ngenxa yosizo lwakhe, "he seziqalile ukusetshenziswa wakhe mhlaka 28 Apreli 2013 ngokumelene nePlatinum Stars ngesikhathi ePeter Mokaba Stadium . 
Umdlalo wakhokhiswa njengonquma isihloko kodwa waphela ngo-0-0.Unqobe iligi nenkomishi kabili neChiefs. 
Ngesizini ka-2013-14 wadlala imidlalo emine. 
Udlale ekuwineni okungu-2-0 bedlala neGolden Arrows koweligi, omunye u-2-0 bedlala ne-AS Vita kwiCAF Champions League, benqoba ngo 1-0 kuBlack Leopards kwathi ngo-1-2 beshaya i- FC UBuffalo, bobabili kuNedbank Cup . 
Ngesizini ka-2014-15 wadlala umdlalo wakhe wokuqala weligi benqoba ngo-1-2 behlula i- University of Pretoria bevumela igoli lakhe lokuqala seligi selokhu ejoyine iChiefs. [2] Ngaphambi komdlalo wamanqamu weMTN 8 obhekwe ngabomvu, uKhuzwayo ubeyintandokazi yokuba ngunozinti uma engekho u- Itumeleng Khune . 
Umqeqeshi uStuart Baxter uthe "u-Itu ungomunye wabadlali bethu abaphambili, futhi nakanjani sizomkhumbula. 
Uma iLamborghini yami ingasebenzi namuhla mhlawumbe kufanele ngithathe iPorsche endala. 
Omunye wabagcini bethu manje sekufanele abe yiPorsche, mhlawumbe akayona iLamborghini okwamanje, kepha angaba yiPorsche leyo. 
Ake sibone ukuthi bayasukuma yini. "Emdlalweni wakhe wokuqala weSoweto derby ngomhla ka-20 Septhemba 2014, yize enqanyulwe njengesixhumanisi "esibuthakathaka", uKhuzwayo wenza ama-saves amaningi ngesikhathi iChiefs inqoba ngo-1-0 ku- Orlando Pirates kowamanqamu weMTN 8 eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini, idolobha lakubo, futhi ubonge wonke umuntu osekilabhini, ikakhulukazi uKhune, ngemuva kokuthola indondo yoMdlali oMnandi. 
"Okokuqala futhi ngithanda ukubonga umndeni wami, abafowethu, abangani bami, wonke umuntu obekholelwa kimina, u-Itumeleng Khune, ubengigqugquzela ngaso sonke isikhathi selokhu ngafika kuKaizer Chiefs, uyisikhuthazo nje kimi," 
Ngemuva kokuthi i-ejenti yakhe iqale ukuphika amahlebezi okuthi uzobuya ngenxa yokulimala edolweni ngoJuni 2019, [1] uthathe umhlalaphansi ngenxa yokulimala ngoJulayi 2019, eneminyaka engama-29 futhi engakaze ayimele i-Orlando Pirates emdlalweni weligi. . 
Njengelungu elisha lePhalamende, uNene wasebenza ekomidini lezezimali, elaliphethwe nguBarbara Hogan phakathi kuka-1999 no-2004. 
Uthe ubemhlonipha kakhulu yena nezindlela zakhe "ezingekho mbhedo". 
Phambilini, wayekhulunywe njengomuntu owayengalandela uNgqongqoshe Wezezimali, uMnuz Trevor Manuel, ekuphathweni kwe-ANC okwakunguJacob Zuma ngo-2009. [1] NgoNovemba 2008 uMengameli uKgalema Motlanthe waqoka uNene njengePhini likaNgqongqoshe Wezezimali waseNingizimu Afrika.UNene ungene esikhundleni sikaJabu Moleketi, owesula esikhundleni ngemuva kokubuyiselwa kukaMengameli uThabo Mbeki. 
UNene waqokwa njengoNgqongqoshe Wezezimali omusha ngomhlaka 25 Meyi 2014.Kuphikiswana ngesimo sikaNene sokuthi ngabe unguNgqongqoshe Wezezimali waseNingizimu Afrika wokuqala noma wesibili omnyama yini. 
UNhlanhla Musa Nene ([ntɬantɬa], owazalwa ngomhlaka 5 kuZibandlela 1958) wasebenza njengoNgqongqoshe Wezezimali waseNingizimu Afrika ngaphansi kukaMongameli uJacob Zuma kusukela ngomhlaka 25 Meyi 2014 kwaze kwaba uyasuswa ngempikiswano ngomhlaka 9 Disemba 2015,nangaphansi Mengameli Cyril Ramaphosa kusukela mhla tinge-27 Indlovana 2018 waze wasula mhla tisi-9 Imphala 2018. 
Ubuye futhi wasebenza njengePhini likaNgqongqoshe Wezezimali kuKhabinethi yaseNingizimu Afrika [1] kusuka ngoNovemba 2008 kuya kuMeyi 2014, njengosihlalo weKomidi Lezimali ePhalamende laseNingizimu Afrika,nanjengeLungu lePhalamende I-African National Congress (ANC) iqala ngo-1999. Umuzi wakhe useKranskop, KwaZulu-Natal . 
Usebenze njenge-Regional Administrative Manager yeMetropolitan Life Insurance iminyaka eyi-15.Waba ngumphathi wesitolo sezinyunyana zabasebenzi futhi wahola ithimba elalixoxisana ngezimo ezingcono zokusebenza ngesikhathi sika-1990 kuya ku-1995 futhi wahlela isiteleka sokuqala ngqa emkhakheni wezezimali, ngaphansi kwesibhengezo se-SACAWU, ngenkathi esebenza eMetropolitan Life Insurance Company ngo-1990. 
Nhlanhla Mgaga (owazalwa 3 April 1996) is a South African lezinyawo odlala njengoba phambili ngoba eNingizimu Afrika Premier Division ohlangothini weBaroka . 
Ngemuva kokudlalela uTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila kuNational First Division, wajoyina iBaroka ngenkontileka yeminyaka emithathu ngoJanuwari 2020.Uthole igoli lakhe lokuqala leqembu ngo-24 Okthoba 2020; ibanga elide liqede ipali linqoba ngo 2-1 kuMaritzburg United . 
Ngomhlaka-14 Januwari 2013 i- Ajax Cape Town yamemezela ukuthi uVilakazi wayesayine inkontileka ne- Maritzburg United njengoba angena ezinyangeni eziyisithupha zokugcina ekwiCape kanti ikilabhu labe selithatha isinqumo sokukhetha ukwelula isikhathi sakhe sokuhlala. 
NgoNovemba 2015, uVilakazi wajoyina iFree State Stars . 
NgoMashi 2018 kwavela ukuthi uVilakazi wasayina isivumelwano sangaphambilini naMaZulu FC, futhi uzobajoyina ngesizini ka-2018/2019. 
Izinhlonipho 
Nhlanhla Vilakazi (owazalwa 25 Februwari 1987) is a South African professional footballer, ngubani okwamanje udlala njengokuthengwa mdlali ngakwesokunxele noma emuva ngakwesokunxele -Premier Soccer League club iFree State Stars . 
Indebe yeNedbank 2018 : Ophumelele 
UNhlanhla Vilakazi usayine neGolden Arrows ngomhlaka 1 Ntulikazi 2008, nokho wadlulela kuBay United ngemali engadalulwanga kuleli windi elilandelayo lokuthengiselana. 
Ukudlulisela kuBay United esuka kuGolden Arrows ngomhla ka-28 Januwari 2009 ngemali engadalulwanga maphakathi nesizini, eqeda isizini, futhi edlala ngesizini ka-2009-10, wadlalela iqembu le-6 ngokuphelele. 
Nokho iqembu alihambanga kahle, futhi ukuphela kwesizini kuzokwenza iBay United yehlele kuNational First Division . 
UVilakazi waphinde wadlulisela ngomhlaka 1 Julayi 2010, kulokhu e- Ajax Cape Town, lapho edlala khona njengamanje.Ngomhlaka-14 Masingana 2013 i-Ajax Cape Town yamemezela ukuthi uVilakazi wayesayine inkontileka yangaphambi kweMaritzbur United njengoba angena ezinyangeni eziyisithupha zokugcina esadlalela iqembu laseKapa. 
UNhlanhlakayise Moses Khubisa ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika owake waba yilungu lePhalamende phakathi kukaMeyi 2014 noMeyi 2019.Ubeyilungu leNational Freedom Party futhi esebenza njengoNobhala-Jikelele weqembu. 
UKhubisa ujoyine i- African National Congress ngaphambi kokhetho lwango-2019 kuphela. 
UKhubisa ubeyilungu leNational Freedom Party futhi engunobhala-jikelele weqembu.Ngemuva kokhetho lukazwelonke lwango -2014, wafungiswa njengelungu lePhalamende Likazwelonke laseNingizimu Afrika leqembu. Ubengusotswebhu omkhulu wekhokhasi yeqembu.Ngesikhathi esephalamende, wayeyilungu lamakomidi alandelayo: Ukubusa Ngokubambisana Nezindaba Zomdabu, Imfundo Ephakeme Nokuqeqesha, neSayensi Nobuchwepheshe. 
Ngomhlaka 4 Meyi 2019, uKhubisa wamukelwa kwi- African National Congress nguMongameli weqembu uCyril Ramaphosa .Ushiye iphalamende ngomhlaka 7 Meyi, njengoba isikhathi sephalamende besiphela. 
Wazalelwa eSophiatown, eduze Johannesburg, uNhlanhla abahambele lo Ikage Primary School Alexandra futhi kamuva umatric kusukela Kilnerton Training Institute ngo-1956.Wajoyina uphiko lwentsha lwe-ANC, i- ANC Youth League, ngo-1957. [1] Wakhethwa waba yisikhulu esiphezulu se -ANCYL eTransvaal ngemuva konyaka. [1] Ekuqaleni kuka-1964, waya eSoviet Union eyofunda, waqeda iziqu zeMasters kwezomnotho ngo-1969.Kodwa-ke akakaze asebenze njengesazi sezomnotho. 
[1] 
UNhlanhla Shabalala (owazalwa 16 Disemba 1985) is a wangaphambili South African lezinyawo umdlali ababedlala njengoba mdlali.Udlale i- Ajax Cape Town, AmaZulu neMoroka Swallows . [1] [2] 
UNtombela igama laseNingizimu Afrika elingabhekiswa kulo. 
U-Alfred Ntombela (owazalwa ngo-1972), ongumlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika USisi Ntombela (owazalwa ngo-1957), usopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika USthembiso Ntombela (owazalwa ngo-1982),umdlali wasemuva webhola laseNingizimu Afrika 
U-Alfred Ntombela (owazalwa ngomhla ka-3 Ephreli 1972) ungumlingisi wakudala waseNingizimu Afrika,owaziwa ngendima yakhe kumafilimu ohlobo lomculo waseNingizimu Afrika kanye noLeon Schuster, ukuhleka kwakhe okufana neJoker nokuma kwakhe okuncane njengomuntu omdala. 
Ngemuva kokufuduka ekhaya eyokwenza izifundo zomculo, wasebenza kakhulu njengomculi osekelayo iminyaka engaphezu kwengu-15.Usebenze nabaculi bakuleli okubalwa kubo uDeborah Fraser, Zahara, Lundi Tyamara noNhlanhla Nciza. 
Usayinwe yiGanyani Entertainment, enikeza amaculo ezingoma okubalwa kuzo ethi "NTO", "Jabulile", nethi "Emazulwini", othole ukuqokwa kwiRecord of the Year emiklomelweni yeSAMA . Njengoba wayengeyena umnikazi wezingoma, wayengavunyelwe ukuzicula ngaphandle kwemvume yelebula. 
Njengoba esayine isivumelwano sokurekhoda ne-Open Mic Productions, wazitholela udumo emhlabeni wonke ngemuva kokusebenza noMaster KG engomeni yakhe eyashisa izikhotha ngo-2019 ethi " Jerusalema " futhi kamuva waxutshwa kabusha nguBurna Boy, owakhishwa okokuqala # kumashadi weBillboard Music. 
UNomcebo Nothule Nkwanyana (owazalwa ngomhlaka 28 Okthoba 1985 ), owaziwa nangokuthi uNomcebo Zikode, ungumculi waseNingizimu Afrika futhi umbhali wezingoma.UZikode, owazalelwa eHammarsdale, wayengumculi osizayo iminyaka eminingana. 
Uke wasebenzisana noDJ Ganyani kwi-single yabo ethi "Emazulwini" (2018). 
NgoNovemba 2019, waboniswa ku- "Jerusalem" engashadile nguMaster KG futhi waqala ukusabalala ekuqaleni kuka-2020, uBurna Boy wakhipha i-remix. NgoNtulikazi 11, 2021, uNomcebo waveza ukuthi akazange akhokhelwe ngomculo ayewudlala kule ngoma ngelebuli yakhe i-Open Mic Productions. 
Ngo-2021, uNomcebo wasekela i-Ambassador enhle ye-AIDONIC. 
Njengoba esayine isivumelwano sokuqopha i-Open Mic Production, ubekhonjiswa ku- Master KG 's chart-topping single " Jerusalema " (2019), eyaqala yaba ngu- # 1 kumashadi weBillboard Music nakumashadi we- Apple Music. 
UZikode ushade noSelwyn Fraser futhi unezingane ezimbili. 
UZikode uzalelwe eHammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal . 
Wenza umatikuletsheni e-Ukusa High School, ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wabhalisa eHavatech College, wathola iziqu ze- Information Technology. 
UJessica Nomalanga Shozi (owazalwa ngo-1994) ungumlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika.Uvele kwi-soapie iRhythm City nakuMTV Shuga Alone Together kanjalo nokuba ngumethuli wezinhlelo kwiBET Africa . 
UShozi wazalwa ngo-1994 futhi wakhulela ePort Shepstone lapho ayenabafowabo abali-12.Wafunda eMarburg Secondary School naseRosebank College. [1] Uphothule izifundo zePublic Relations. 
Wayesebenza njengoDJ womsakazo. [2] 
UShozi uqaphele ngesikhathi ejoyina umdlalo owuchungechunge i-e.tv iRhythm City.Wayengumuntu ophumeleleyo okhethwe ekuhlolweni komphakathi okuhehe izicelo ezingama-5 000 ku-inthanethi.Wacelwa ukuba adlale indawo ka-Normalanga.Umlingiswa omusha ubaba wakhe ongumakadebona waphenduka isicukuthwane sezimayini. 
[1] 
UNomalanga Mzilikazi Khumalo ngusopolitiki waseZimbabwe.UKhumalo uyilungu lePhalamende loMovement for Democratic Change ephalamendeUmzingwane futhi ngoSepthemba 2008 wakhethwa njengePhini likaSomlomo weNdlu Yesishayamthetho, [1] ePhalamende lesiKhombisa laseZimbabwe . 
UNomhlangano Beauty Mkhize wayeyisishoshovu saseNingizimu Afrika, usopolitiki, umphathi wezitolo nenkosikazi kaSawule Mkhize ongasekho.Wazalelwa eSophia Town futhi wasuswa ngenkani eMeadowlands eSoweto nokuyilapho ahlangana khona nomyeni wakhe. [1] 
Yena nomyeni wakhe bahola umzabalazo wokulwa nokususwa ngenkani eDriefontein. 
USizwe Mpofu-Walsh (owazalwa ngomhlaka 4 Januwari 1989) ungumbhali, umculi kanye nesishoshovu saseNingizimu Afrika. 
UMpofu-Walsh wayengumongameli woMkhandlu Omele Abafundi Wenyuvesi YaseKapa Une-DPhil in International Relations ayithole e-University of Oxford.NgoSepthemba 2017, uMpofu-Walsh washicilela incwadi yakhe yokuqala, iDemocracy and Delusion: 10 Myths in South Africa Politics.Kanye nencwadi, ukhiphe i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ye-rap, ebizwa nangokuthi iDemocracy kanye neDelusion. 
"Kunokuthile okungahambi kahle kakhulu ngendlela i-Oxford eziveza ngayo, ngendlela enokuchema ngayo nabantu futhi sikuphakamisa lokho futhi okokuqala ngqa siphoqa inyuvesi ukuthi ibhekane naleyo nkinga futhi mhlawumbe yenze umsebenzi ongcono kunanoma isiphi isizukulwane sangaphambilini thina. " 
UMpofu-Walsh uzuze umklomelo weCity Press-Tafelberg Award ngokuthembisa okungekho eqanjiwe ngencwadi yakhe iDemocracy and Delusion: 10 Myths in South African Politics, eyashicilelwa ngoSepthemba, 2017. 
UMpofu-Walsh wazalelwa eGoli, indodana kababa omnyama nomama omhlophe. 
Abazali bakhe babesebenza ngokwezepolitiki emzabalazweni wokulwa nobandlululo . 
Ubaba wakhe nguDali Mpofu ummeli ovelele, owayeyi-CEO ye- SABC futhi engusihlalo weqembu lepolitiki le-Economic Freedom Fighters. Ufunde eSacred Heart College naseSt John's College . 
Ubeyingxenye yeqembu le-hip-hop i-Entity, ehamba nomrepha u-AKA noNhlanhla Makenna. 
Udlale i- Orlando Pirates Youth Academy eneminyaka ephakathi kuka-13 no-16. 
UMpofu-Walsh wachitha unyaka abahlala yasemaphandleni e-Eastern Cape edolobhaneni Qugqwala, ngaphambi othola isiko IsiXhosa Ukuqalwa ngo-2007 . 
UMpofu-Walsh wafunda e- University of Cape Town, wathola iziqu ze-Honours kwi-Politics Philosophy and Economics ngo-2012.WayenguMongameli we-SRC ngo-2010, lapho i-SRC yakhe yaba ngowokuqala ukuphonsela inselelo ngempumelelo ukunyuswa kwemali ekhokhiswa yinyuvesi, wayinciphisa isuka ku-12% yaya ku-8%.E-UCT wasungula ngokubambisana i- InkuluFreeHeid, okuyinhlangano yomphakathi eholwa yintsha.Uthole i-Weidenfeld Scholarship yokuphishekela iziqu ze-master in International Relations e- University of Oxford, ayithola ngokugqama.Njengamanje wenza iziqu zobudokotela kwi-International Relations e-Oxford. 
UMpofu-Walsh ukhiphe ingoma ebizwa ngokuthi 'Mnu Mongameli', egxeka uMengameli waseNingizimu Afrika uJacob Zuma ngenkohlakalo eyenzeka ngo-2013.Ingoma ibivezwe kwiWall Street Journal .Ngalowo nyaka, iMail and Guardian yamqamba njengomunye wabangu-200 abaseNingizimu Afrika abasezingeni eliphezulu. 
Ubhale ngezinto ezithinta ukucwasa nenkohlakalo ephephandabeni laseNingizimu Afrika iCity Press . 
Ngo-2014, i-athikili yakhe eyayibizwa nge- "SA's Three-Way Split" yabikezela ukuthi ezombusazwe zaseNingizimu Afrika zizohlukana zibe yizinti ezintathu. 
UMpofu-Walsh ubelokhu engumsekeli ozwakalayo wemfundo yamahhala eNingizimu Afrika. 
Ushicilele isahluko ngemodeli yemfundo yamahhala esencwadini ethi Fees Must Fall: Student Revolt, Decolonization and Governance, ekhishwe yiWits University Press. 
UMpofu-Walsh ubephinde abe yingxenye yomkhankaso iRhodes Must Fall in Oxford, obekuhloswe ngawo ukugqamisa izinsolo zokucwaswa ngokobuhlanga e-Oxford waphinde wanxusa ukuba kuthuthwe isithombe sikaCecil Rhodes esiku-Oxford High Street.UMpofu-Walsh ucashunwe ethi: 
USizwe Lawrence Ndlovu (owazalwa ngomhlaka 24 Septhemba 1980) ungumgwedli waseNingizimu Afrika. 
Uthole indondo yegolide emcimbini we- Men's lightweight coxless four kuma- Olimpiki asehlobo ka-2012 .Kwakuyindondo yokuqala yegolide yama-Olimpiki yaseNingizimu Afrika yokugwedla.Bonke abanye iqembu bekunguJames Thompson, John Smith noMatthew Brittain . 
UNdlovu wahlupheka kancane kancane ngenxa yokungaguquguquki. 
Uhlangothi olukhulu nolubanzi lweGordon Strachan olutholwe njengefa, luhlonyiswe kahle ngezinketho zokuhlasela, lubone ukuncintisana okunzima kwezindawo ezivela eWhelan, Huckerby, Salako naseTelfer. 
Iligi yePremier League eya ngokuya yanda emhlabeni wonke nayo ekugcineni izobona uCoventry ephendukela kuSteve Froggatt nakwamanye amazwe aseMorocco uMustapha Hadji noYoussef Chippo eminyakeni eyalandela ukuhamba kukaNdlovu. 
Wayaziwa njengo-'Nuddy 'ngabalandeli beCoventry City nezinye izibongo zakhe kungu-'The Bulawayo Bullet' kanye no'Nsukuzonke 'igama lesiNdebele elisho amandla akhe okuvula isitayela njalo / ngosuku kudlalwe. 
UPeter Ndlovu (owazalwa ngomhlaka 25 kuFebhuwari 1973) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo laseZimbabwe futhi njengamanje uyiTeam Manager eMamelodi Sundowns FC ikilabhu yePremier Soccer League eNingizimu Afrika. 
UPeter Ndlovu udabuka esifundeni iBinga eNyakatho Ntshonalanga, eSiabuwa Zimbabwe.Wayelethwa Nokho owazalwa ngo Bulawayo, futhi wadlala efanele njengoba Umgadli kusukela 1988 kuze 2011. 
Udlale iHighlanders yaseZimbabwe, iCoventry City kwiPremier League kanye neFootball League iBirmingham City, Huddersfield Town neSheffield United . 
ENingizimu Afrika ubedlalela iMamelodi Sundowns, Thanda Royal Zulu, Highfield United neBlack Mambas.Ubebanjelwe izwe lakhe amahlandla angama-81, eshaya amagoli angama-37. 
UNdlovu wabonwa okokuqala nguJohn Sillett, ngaphambi kokusayina ngokusemthethweni kuHighlanders nguTerry Butcher ngoNtulikazi 199.Waba nomthelela osheshayo ngokushaya amagoli e-Arsenal wabe esephenduka ithoyizi likaHighfield Road ngokuwina kwezulu bedlala ne-Aston Villa ngoNovemba 1991, kwamenza wathandeka kubalandeli beSky Blues. [1] 
Yize ezoqhubeka nokudlala indima enkulu emakilabhini amaningi kwiChampionship, yisikhathi sakhe kuCoventry waziwa kakhulu ngokunikwa isikhundla esiphezulu sendiza ngaleso sikhathi.Ubezodlala indima enkulu emaqenjini amabili amakhulu, iqembu likaBobby Gould lika-1992/93 kanye neqembu elibanzi maphakathi nasekupheleni kweminyaka yama-1990, ngaleso sikhathi uRon Atkinson noGordon Strachan babephethe ikilabhu. 
Iqembu likaBobby Gould ngo-1992–93 libhekwe ngabaningi njengabangenzi kahle, liqede endaweni ka-15 kusizini yokuqala yePremier League, lisebenzise isikhathi esiningi lisendaweni ephakeme kakhulu. 
Ngo-19 Agasti 1992, uNdlovu waqopha umlando ngokuba ngumdlali webhola wokuqala wase-Afrika ukudlala ku-English Premier League entsha. 
Sebethole umgadli uMicky Quinn ngoNovemba 1992 baqhubeka nalokho obekuvele kuyisiqalo sokuqala, ngokunqoba ekuhambeni eTottenham Hotspur (2–0) eSheffield ngoLwesithathu (2-1) naseWimbledon (2–1) ukunezela kumanqoba asevele ehlaba umxhwele ekhaya ngokumelene neMiddlesbrough (2-1).Ngekwindla yokuqala iSky Blues yaphakamisa i-Premier League kafushane futhi izokwehlulwa kuphela imidlalo emihlanu yeligi ngaphambi kukaKhisimusi. 
Ukwengezwa kukaMicky Quinn eqenjini kuholele ekuwineni eminye imidlalo evelele bedlala ne- Aston Villa (3-0) neLiverpool (5-1).NgoNhlolanja1993, banqoba ama-4-2 bephikisana nesihloko, bechitha imali enkulu iBlackburn Rovers . 
Kodwa-ke, amaviki wokugcina angenalutho wesizini nokugijima okuzobuyisa imidlalo emuva neMan United, iLiverpool, iChelsea neLeeds United kubabone beshibilika kusuka kowesihlanu kuligi ngoFebhuwari kuya ku-15 etafuleni lokugcina. 
Isizini iqede ngomdlalo omnandi ovela kuNdlovu ngokulingana ngo 3-3 bedlala neLeeds United.UNdlovu ubeyingxenye ebalulekile kuyo yonke isizini emdlalweni wejubane osheshayo kaGould obebandakanya uJohn Williams, uKevin Gallacher (kuze kube uya eBlackburn) noRobert Rosario, abenze ubudlelwano obufanele noMicky Quinn.Igoli likaNdlovu bedlala neNorwich City, ngokulingana ngo-1-1 ngasekupheleni kukaSepthemba, kwaba wuphawu lukaNdlovu olwasayinisa olwamenza waba ngumncintiswano weMatch of Day 'Goal of the month'. 
UNdlovu usebenza njengoShansela waseZimbabwe Catholic University . Uphinde wasungula isikole iMother Patrick Primary eWaterfalls . 
Njengoba u-Archbishop eHarare Ndlovu kuyinto uMongameli we Zimbabwe Catholic Bishops 'Conference (ZCBC). 
NgoMeyi 2011, uNdlovu wangcwelisa isikhungo sabakhubazekile iSt Bakhita Catholic eMakumbi. 
UNdlovu wazalwa ngomhlaka-25 Disemba 1955 eTshongokwe, eMatabeleland, eRhodesia . 
Ufundiswe eMarist Brothers Dete eDayosisi yaseHwange ngaphambi kokungena eMajor Seminary eChishawasha.Wagcotshwa waba ngumfundisi ngomhlaka 28 Agasti 1983 eneminyaka engamashumi amabili nesikhombisa eHwange, eZimbabwe . [1] 
UNdlovu usegxeke obala umbuso waseZimbabwe ngokukhishwa kwabantu ngenkani nokunye okwephula amalungelo abantu.Uveze ukuthi "indima kabhishobhi neyebandla lilonke ukumela isithunzi somuntu, futhi kusukela esithunzi sesintu kugeleza amalungelo abantu " .Lokhu kuthukuthelise abanye kuhulumeni abaphendula ngokuthi uMbhishobhi Omkhulu uhlwanyela imbewu yokungezwani kohlanga.Ngo-Agasti 2020 iPapa Nuncio for Zimbabwe yavakashela i-archbisop, futhi yazwakalisa ubumbano ngezikhundla zayo ekwelapheni izakhamizi zaseZimbabwe. 
Sefora Hixsonia "Sisi" Ntombela (owazalwa 16 Apreli 1957) is a South African sezombusazwe ngubani 6th Premier yaseFree State kanye iLunga leNhlangano eFree State ISiShayanthetho . 
Uke wasebenza njengoNgqongqoshe Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana Nezendabuko kanye Nezokuhlaliswa Kwabantu eFree State.Wayephinde abe nguNgqongqoshe Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi eFree State. 
UNtombela uyiPhini likaMengameli we- African National Congress Women's League futhi ungumgcinimafa we-ANC yaseFree State. [1] 
UNtombela ushade nelungu lePhalamende le-ANC, uMadala Louis David Ntombela.Uhlole ukuthi une-COVID-19 ngo-Okthoba 2020. 
Ngenxa yobandlululo kanye nesimo sezombusazwe esasishubile ngaleso sikhathi, wafundisa abafundi bakhe ngasese ngoNelson Mandela.Omunye wabafundi bekuyingane kathishanhloko futhi wambikela ngezifundo eziyimfihlo. 
Washiya umsebenzi wobuthisha ngenxa yalolu daba. [1] 
UNtombela wayesebenzela uMnyango wezeMpilo njengomhleli wezemindeni nongumeluleki wentsha. 
Kamuva, uNtombela waba yilungu le- African National Congress futhi wakhethwa njengosihlalo wegatsha leTweeling African National Congress Women's League.Ngokushesha waba uSihlalo weSifunda.Ngemuva kokhetho lwango-1994, uNtombela waqokwa njengemeya kaMasipala waseTweeling futhi wasebenza kulesi sikhundla waze wakhethwa esiShayamthetho sesiFundazwe saseFree State ngo-1999. 
Uhlale esishayamthetho waze waqokelwa ePhalamende likaZwelonke ngo-2001. 
Ubuyele esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe ngo-2004 waqokwa njengoSihlalo wawo womabili amaKomidi Ezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi kanye Nezempilo. [1] 
NgoMeyi 2009, uNdunankulu omusha waseFree State u- Ace Magashule wamemezela ukuthi uNtombela uzongena esikhundleni sokuba nguNgqongqoshe Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi.UNtombela wakhethwa njengePhini likaMongameli we-African National Congress Women's League ngo-Agasti 2015.[2]UMagashule wenze izinguquko kuMkhandlu oPhethe ngo-Okthoba 2016 waqoka uNtombela esikhundleni somkhandlu wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu nokuHlaliswa kwaBantu woMkhandlu oPhethe. [3] [4] 
NgoMashi 2018, uNtombela wakhethwa yi-African National Congress ukuba angene esikhundleni sika-Ace Magashule njengoNdunankulu waseFree State.Uqale ukusebenza ngomhlaka 27 Mashi 2018 futhi waba nguNdunankulu wesifazane wesine esifundazweni. 
Wakhethwa njengoMgcinimafa wegatsha le-ANC eFree State ngoMeyi 2018.[3]Ngemuva kokhetho lwangoMeyi 2019, i- African National Congress yamemezela ukuthi igcine uNtombela esikhundleni sakhe njengoNdunankulu waseFree State. 
Manje udonsa isikhathi esigcwele esiqale ngomhlaka 22 Meyi 2019. [4] [5] 
Uqale iFerguson Films nonkosikazi, umlingisi uConnie Ferguson. 
Kusukela ngomhla ka-2021, base yayikhiphe Rockville, iGazi, Isipho, The Throne, I Herd, Indlovukazi, The River kany neThe Imposter. 
UFerguson walingiswa kwifilimu ka-2010 uNkk. UMandela . 
UFerguson ongumlingisi oshadile uConnie Masilo ngoNovemba 2001.NgoJuni 2002, bamukela indodakazi yabo okuwukuphela kwayo nengane yabo, u-Alicia Angel. 
Uthole i- Golden Horn Award for Best Actor in a TV Soap and Golden Horn Award for Best Achievement by the Lead Actor in a Made for TV Movie. 
Ngasekupheleni kukaJulayi 2021, ngemuva kokukhononda ngezinhlungu esifubeni wabe esengeniswa esibhedlela iMilpark, uFerguson wahlinzwa inhliziyo. Ntambama ngomhlaka 30 Julayi, ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe ku- akhawunti kaFerguson Film ku-Instagram, ushonile. 
Isizathu sakhe sokufa sanikezwa njengezinkinga ezihlobene ne-COVID-19 . 
U-Aaron Arthur Ferguson (30 Ephreli 1974 – 30 Julayi 2021) wazalwa eBotswanan, engumlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika, umkhiqizi omkhulu futhi engumsunguli weFerguson Films – owaziwa ngoShona Ferguson . 
UFerguson waqala uhambo lwakhe lokuya kwezokungcebeleka eLesotho njengeDJ yeklabhu eThe Palace Hotel Night Club ngo-1992. 
Ngemuva kokubuyela emuva eBotswana ukugxila kwakhe kudlulele emhlabeni wobumbano futhi wagcina ebhizinisini le-IT. 
Njengoba eqale njengomthengisi, wasebenza waze waba ngusomabhizinisi ohlonishwayo lapho athola khona izindondo eziningi zempumelelo, kufaka phakathi iTop Sales Manager Award 1998-99 ngenkathi esebenza e-EDUTECH. 
Yena, kanye nonkosikazi uConnie Ferguson, basungula iFerguson Films futhi bobabili balingisa ochungechungeni lwabo lokuqala lokukhiqiza amafilimu iRockville . 
Ulingise njengoJB kusuka ngo-2013 kuya esiqeshini sokugcina ngo-2016. 
Ubuye walingisa emdlalweni ka-2014 iThe Gift, uchungechunge lweFerguson Films, futhi wadlala indawo kaJerry Maake kuThe Queen, naye owuchungechunge lweFerguson Films oqale ngo-2016. 
Eminye imidlalo abonakale kuyona iTV ihlanganisa Isidingo: Isidingo njengoTyson neScandal! njengo-Alex. 
UConstance Ferguson (née Masilo ; owazalwa ngomhlaka 10 Juni 1970 [1] [2] ) ungumlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika, umenzi wamafilimu, uphrojusa futhi ungusomabhizinisi wesifazane, odume ngelikaConnie Ferguson.Waziwa kakhulu ngendima yakhe njengoKarabo Moroka emdlalweni owuchungechunge owaziwa kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika, iGenerations . 
[3] [4]Walingisa kulo mdlalo kusukela uqala ngo-1994 waze waphuma ngo-2010.Ngo-2014, wavuma ukuphinda abambe iqhaza lakhe kulo mdlalo ngemuva kokungabikho kweminyaka engu-4 bese kushiywe unomphela ngo-2016. [5] 
ULindani Ndwandwe 26 kuNhlolanja 1975)ungumdlali wegalofu osezingeni eliphezulu waseNingizimu Afrika. 
UNdwandwe ukhulele KwaNongoma, KwaZulu-Natal.Waziswa ngalo mdlalo ngumfowabo uMandla owayezosebenzisa izinduku namabhodlela njengezindawo zegalufu namabhola egalufu.Ucije ikhono lakhe lokuba ngumpetha eDurban Country Club naseBeachwood Golf Club. 
Ngo-1997, uNdwandwe wawina imicimbi emibili yezimfundamakhwela, oweNatal Match Play noweNatal Stroke Play.Uguquke waba ngumsebenzi ngemuva kweminyaka emibili walungela iSunshine Tour ngo-2000. 
UNdwandwe unqobe iWestern Cape Classic ngo-2001 ngokushaywa yisifo sohlangothi ngoRichard Kaplan . Ubengumuntu wesibili omnyama ukunqoba kwiSunshine Tour. 
Uqophe inqwaba yabaphume isibili phakathi neminyaka eyishumi kodwa ubengeke anqobe futhi kuze kube yiHighveld Classic yango- 2009. 
UNdwandwe unezingane ezine. 
UKhaya uthole umsebenzi wakhe wokucula esafunda amabanga aphezulu. 
UKhaya Mthethwa uqale ukubonakala njengomculi osekelayo ocula i-albhamu ethi Tenor for Joyous Celebration ongumsunguli we-albhamu kaMthunzi Namba kaMercy. 
Wabe esecelwa ukuba ajoyine iJoyous Celebration ezinsukwini ezimbili ngaphambi kokuqoshwa bukhoma kweJoyous Celebration 15 ngo-2010. 
Ngasekupheleni kuka-2013 waqala ukubamba uhlelo lwezingxoxo zomculo wokholo kuMzansi Magic. 
Ngomhlaka 21 Meyi 2017 waqala ukuphatha uhlelo iBET gospel Rhythm and Gospel kwathi ngomhlaka 25 Juni 2017 wazibonakalisa njengomphathi wohlelo lweSABC1 lwangeSonto ekuseni lweGospel Gospel. 
UKhaya Mthethwa (owazalwa ngomhlaka-25 Novemba 1987) ungumculi-umbhali wezingoma waseNingizimu Afrika, umculi, umqambi, umhleli, futhi ungumdlali wezinsimbi eziningi. 
Waziwa kakhulu ngokunqoba isizini yesi -8 yomncintiswano wokucula iTV Idols South Africa, umuntu wokuqala omnyama ukwenza lokho.Waziwa futhi njengelungu lekhwaya leqembu levangeli iJoyous Celebration, elidume kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika kulo lonke elase-Afrika. 
Uthando lwakhe ngomculo lusukela ekukhuleni kwakhe okuqinile nangesiqondiso asithola kubazali bakhe bezenkolo, abefundisi uThemba noLulu Mthethwa. 
Ngo-2012 uKhaya wavela kwi-albhamu kaNtokozo Mbambo ethi Filled, waphinde waba ngumculi osekelayo. 
Ngo-2012, ungene kuma- Idols South Africa ngenhloso yokuzama uhlobo oluhlukile ukuthuthukisa ikhono lakhe lomculo.Uqhubekile nokuwina lo mncintiswano,uwine ngamavoti omphakathi angaphezu kuka-80%. 
Ngo-2013, wabamba iqhaza komunye umncintiswano we-TV, i- The Clash of the Choirs, kulokhu njengengxenye yekhwaya yaKwa-Zulu Natal; iqembu linqobile.UKhaya uyakwazi ukucula i-gospel, i-pop, i-jazz ne-R & B, futhi ungumculi ozifundisayo okwazi ukudlala ikhibhodi, isiginci, isigubhu nokushaya. 
Uphinde abe ngumbhali wezingoma, futhi wabhala izingoma eziningi kwi-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ethi For You . 
UKhaya Mthethwa ungumphathi wohlelo lweGospel Alive uhlelo lwe-Gospel TV olwaqala ukukhonjiswa ngomhlaka 3 Novemba 2013 esiteshini somlingo iMzansi seMultichoice DSTV, abesebenza kulo nophrojusa wokuqukethwe uTebogo Rameetse. 
Ngo-2015 wagcotshwa njengomfundisi. 
Ngo-2014 wakhipha okuqoshwa bukhoma kwe-DVD esihloko sithi The Uprising.ngo-2016 wakhipha i-The Dawn, kwathi ngo-2018 wakhipha uMkhulumsebenzi. 
U-Adamu no-Eva bangowesilisa nowesifazane wokuqala waseBhayibhelini.Igama lika-Adamu livela kuqala kuGenesise 1 ngomqondo ohlangene, "njengesintu"; emuva kwalokho kuGenesise 2-3 kuphethe umunci ocacile u- ha, olingana nesiNgisi "the", okukhombisa ukuthi lona "yindoda". Kulezi zahluko uNkulunkulu wenza imfashini "umuntu" ( ha adam ) wasemhlabeni ( adamah ), uphefumulela impilo emakhaleni akhe, futhi umenze umbheki phezu kwendalo. Ngokulandelayo uNkulunkulu udalela indoda i- ezer kenegdo, "umsizi ohambelana naye", ohlangothini noma ubambo lwayo.Igama "ubambo" liyipun ngesiSumeriya, njengegama elithi ti kusho zombili "ubambo" kanye "nokuphila". 
Owesilisa nowesifazane bokuqala basensimini kaNkulunkulu yase-Edene, lapho yonke indalo iyimifino futhi kungekho budlova.Bavunyelwe ukuthi badle izithelo zazo zonke izihlahla ngaphandle kwesisodwa, isihlahla sokwazi okuhle nokubi.Owesifazane ulingwa yinyoka ekhulumayo ukuba adle isithelo esenqatshelwe, bese enika owesilisa, naye adle.(Ngokuphikisana nenganekwane edumile akakhohlisi indoda, okubonakala sengathi yayikhona lapho kuhlangana nenyoka).UNkulunkulu uqalekisa bobathathu, owesilisa asebenze kanzima impilo yonke elandelwa ukufa, owesifazane abhekane nobuhlungu bokubeletha nokuzithoba kumyeni wakhe, nenyoka ihambe ngesisu sayo ihlupheke ubutha bobabili indoda owesifazane.UNkulunkulu wabe ezigqokisa nobunqunu bendodakazi kowesilisa kusiya kowesifazana, abaye baba unkulunkulu-like ngokuqondene nokwazi okuhle nokubi, abese uxosha kubo kusukela engadini funa bedla isithelo somuthi yesibili, umuthi wokuphila, aphile kuze kube phakade. 
Indaba iyaqhubeka kuGenesise 3 ngomlando "wokuxoshwa e-Edene". 
A ifomu ukuhlaziywa kaGenesise 3 lembula ukuthi le ngxenye indaba kungenziwa kwachazwa ngokuthi mfanekiso noma "ukuhlakanipha tale" in the isiko ngokuhlakanipha . 
Amakheli asankondlo asesahlukweni angawohlobo lokuhlakanipha olucatshangelwayo olubuza ukuphikisana namaqiniso anzima okuphila. 
Lesi sici sinqunywa ngefomethi yokulandisa, izilungiselelo, nangesakhiwo . 
Uhlobo lukaGenesise 3 nalo lubunjwe ngamagama alo, kusetshenziswa ama-puns ahlukahlukene kanye nokufakwa kabili . 
Ģ 
UGenesise 4 ulandisa ngempilo engaphandle kwensimu, kufaka phakathi ukuzalwa kwezingane zokuqala zika-Adamu no-Eva uKayini no-Abela nendaba yokubulawa kokuqala. 
Indodana yesithathu, uSeti, izalwa u-Adamu no-Eva, kanti u-Adam "wayenamanye amadodana namadodakazi" ( Genesis 5:4 ).UGenesise 5 ubala izinzalo zika-Adamu kusukela kuSeti kuye kuNowa ngeminyaka yazo lapho kuzalwa amadodana abo okuqala kanye neminyaka yabo ekufeni. 
Iminyaka ka-Adam ekufeni inikezwa njengeminyaka eyi-930. 
Ngokwe- Book of Jubilees, uKayini washada nodadewabo u- Awan, indodakazi ka-Adam no-Eve. [1] 
IPrimeval History yakha izahluko zokuqala zeTorah, izincwadi ezinhlanu ezakha umlando wemvelaphi yakwa-Israyeli. 
Lokhu kufinyelele entweni efana nesimo sayo samanje ngekhulu lesi-5 BCE, [30] kepha uGenesise 1-11 ukhombisa ubudlelwano obuncane kulo lonke iBhayibheli: [31] ngokwesibonelo, amagama ezinhlamvu zalo kanye nokuma kwalo - u-Adam (indoda) no-Eve (impilo), iZwe leNodi ("Ukuzulazula"), njalonjalo - kungokomfanekiso kunokuba kube ngokoqobo, futhi cishe akekho noyedwa umuntu, izindawo nezindaba okukhulunywe ngazo kuyo ezake zahlangatshezwa kwenye indawo.Lokhu kuholele ekutheni izifundiswa zicabange ukuthi uMlando wakha ukwakheka okwenziwe sekwedlule isikhathi okunamathiselwe kuGenesise nasePentateuch ukuze kusetshenziswe njengesingeniso.Ukuthi isikhathi sempikiswano sekudlule isikhathi kangakanani: kwesinye isikhathi ngokweqile yilabo abakubona kungumkhiqizo wesikhathi samaGreki, lapho kungenzeki ukuthi kube ngaphambi kwamashumi eminyaka okuqala ekhulu lesi-4 BCE; ngakolunye uhlangothi umthombo weYahwist ukhishwe ezinye izazi, ikakhulukazi uJohn Van Seters, esikhathini sangaphambi kokufika kwasePheresiya (ngekhulu lesi-6 BCE) ngokunembile ngoba iPrimeval History iqukethe ithonya eliningi laseBabiloni ngendlela yenganekwane .[Qaphela 1] Umlando wePrimeval udonsela "emithonjeni" emibili ehlukile, umthombo wobupristi futhi kwesinye isikhathi obizwa ngokuthi ngumthombo weYahwist futhi kwesinye isikhathi umane athi "ongewona owabaPristi"; ngenhloso yokuxoxa ngo-Adam no-Eva eNcwadini kaGenesise amagama athi "okungewona owabaPristi" kanye no- "Yahwist" angathathwa njengokushintshana. 
UAdam ( ngesiHeberu : Isi-Aramu : ܐܕܡ; Arabic ; Greek ; Latin no- Eva ( Arabic ; Greek ; Latin ; ܚܰܘܳܐ Syriac : ܚܰܘܳܐ i- ḥawâ : ḥawâ) ngokwenganekwane yendalo yezinkolo zika -Abrahama,kwakuyindoda nowesifazane bokuqala. 
Zisemqoka enkolelweni yokuthi isintu empeleni siwumndeni owodwa, nawo wonke umuntu wehla kubokhokho ababili bokuqala.Ziphinde zinikeze isisekelo sezimfundiso zokuwa komuntu nesono sokuqala okuyizinkolelo ezibalulekile ebuKristwini, yize zingabanjwanga ebuJudeni noma e- Islam . 
Abanye obaba bokuqala besonto lobuKristu babamba u-Eva enesibopho sokuwa kwendoda nabo bonke abesifazane abalandela ukuba babe yizoni zokuqala ngoba u-Eva walinga u-Adamu ukuthi enze lo mkhuba. 
"Wena uyisango likadeveli" uTertullian watshela abafundi bakhe besifazane, wabe eseqhubeka echaza ukuthi babenecala lokufa kukaKristu: "Ngenxa yehlane lakho [okungukuthi, isijeziso sesono, okuwukuthi, ukufa], ngisho neNdodana kukaNkulunkulu kwakufanele afe. "Ngo-1486, abaseDominican Kramer noSprengler basebenzisa amapheshana afanayo eMalleus Maleficarum ("Isando Sabathakathi") ukuthethelela ukuhlukunyezwa "kwabathakathi". 
Encwadini kaGenesise we- Hebrew Bible, izahluko 1 kuya ku-5, kunezindaba ezimbili zokudalwa ezinemibono emibili ehlukene. 
Kowokuqala, u-Adamu no-Eva ababizwa ngamagama.Esikhundleni salokho, uNkulunkulu wadala isintu ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu futhi wabayala ukuthi bande futhi babe ngabaphathi bakho konke okunye uNkulunkulu akwenzile. 
Ekulandiseni kwesibili, uNkulunkulu wenza u-Adamu ngothuli futhi wambeka eNsimini yase-Edene .U-Adam utshelwa ukuthi angadla ngokukhululeka kuyo yonke imithi engadini, ngaphandle kwesihlahla sokwazi okuhle nokubi . 
Ngemuva kwalokho, u- Eva wenziwa ngolunye lwezimbambo zika-Adamu ukuze abe ngumngane wakhe.Ziyakwazi abangenacala unembarrassed mayelana yabo ubunqunu.Kodwa-ke, inyoka incenga u-Eva ukuba adle isithelo somuthi owenqatshelwe, bese enikeza u-Adamu esinye salezo zithelo.Lezi zenzo zibanikeza ulwazi olwengeziwe, kepha lubanikeza amandla okudala imiqondo engemihle neyonakalisayo efana nehlazo nobubi.Kamuva uNkulunkulu uqalekisa inyoka nomhlabathi.UNkulunkulu ngokwesiprofetho utshela owesifazane nendoda ukuthi iyoba yini imiphumela yesono sabo sokungalaleli uNkulunkulu. 
Bese ebaxosha ensimini yase-Edene. 
Elinye isiko lamaGnostic lalithi u-Adamu no-Eva badalelwa ukusiza ukunqoba uSathane. 
Inyoka, esikhundleni sokuthi ikhonjwe njengoSathane, ibonwa njengeqhawe ngama- Ophites .Futhi amanye amaGnostics ayekholelwa ukuthi ukuwa kukaSathane, nokho, kwenzeka ngemuva kokudalwa kwesintu. 
Njengasesikweni lamaSulumane, le ndaba ithi uSathane wenqaba ukukhothamela u-Adam ngenxa yokuziqhenya. 
USathane wathi u-Adamu wayengaphansi kwakhe njengoba enziwa ngomlilo, kanti u-Adamu wenziwa ngobumba. 
Lokhu kwenqaba kwaholela ekuweni kukaSathane okulotshwe emisebenzini efana neNcwadi ka-Enoke . 
Inganekwane yacaciselwa kabanzi emasikweni akamuva ka-Abraham, futhi yahlaziywa kabanzi yizazi zebhayibheli zesimanje.Ukuhunyushwa nezinkolelo maqondana no-Adamu no-Eva kanye nendaba ezungeze kubo iyahlukahluka kuzo zonke izinkolo namahlelo; isibonelo, inguqulo yamaSulumane yale ndaba ithi u-Adam no-Eva babephethe ngokulinganayo ngezono zabo ze- hubris, esikhundleni sokuthi u-Eva abe ngowokuqala ongathembekile.Indaba ka-Adam no-Eva ivame ukuvezwa kwezobuciko, futhi ibe nomthelela obalulekile ezincwadini nasezinkondlweni. 
Ngo Islam, u-Adamu Ādam Arabic ), indima yakhe engubaba wesintu, ibukwa ngamaSulumane ngenhlonipho. 
U-Eve ( Ḥawwāʼ ; isi-Arabhu : حواء ) "ungumama wesintu". [1] Ukudalwa kuka-Adam no-Eva kubhekiselwa kukho Qurʼān, yize abahumushi abehlukene beQur'an bebeka imibono eyehlukene ngendaba yangempela yendalo (iQurʼan, iSurat al-Nisaʼ, ivesi 1). 
Ku -tafsir ka-al-Qummi engadini yase-Edene, indawo enjalo yayingeyona eyasemhlabeni ngokuphelele. 
Qurʼān, bobabili u-Adamu no-Eva badla isithelo esenqatshelwe e-Edene laseZulwini. 
Ngenxa yalokho, bobabili bathunyelwa eMhlabeni njengabamele bakaNkulunkulu. 
Umuntu ngamunye wathunyelwa esiqongweni sentaba: u-Adam e- al-Safa, no-Eve e- al-Marwah . 
Kuleli siko lamaSulumane, u-Adam wakhala izinsuku ezingama-40 waze waphenduka, ngemuva kwalokho uNkulunkulu wehlisa iBlack Stone, emfundisa iHajj.Ngokwe hadith eyisiprofetho, u-Adam no-Eva baphinde bahlangana ethafeni lase-`Arafat, ngaseMecca.Babenamadodana amabili ndawonye, uQabil noHabil . 
Kukhona nenganekwane yendodana encane, egama linguRocail, eyakha isigodlo namathuna aqukethe izithombe ezizimele ezaziphila izimpilo zabantu ngakho-ke babenephutha lokuthi banemiphefumulo. 
Umqondo "wesono sokuqala" awukho e- Islam ngoba, ngokwe-Islam, u-Adamu no-Eva bathethelelwa nguNkulunkulu. 
Lapho uNkulunkulu eyala izingelosi ukuthi zikhothamele u-Adam, u- Iblīs wabuza, "Kungani kufanele ngikhothamele umuntu? 
Ngenziwe ngomlilo omsulwa yena wenziwe ngomhlabathi. " Ukunyakaza okunenkululeko ngaphakathi kwe-Islam kubuke uNkulunkulu eyala izingelosi ukuba zikhothame phambi kuka-Adam njengokuphakanyiswa kwesintu, futhi njengendlela yokuxhasa amalungelo abantu ; abanye bakubheka njengesenzo sokukhombisa u-Adam ukuthi isitha esikhulu sabantu emhlabeni kuzoba yi-ego yabo. [2] 
Ezincwadini zesiSwahili, u-Eve wadla esihlahleni esenqatshelwe, ngaleyo ndlela wabangela ukuxoshwa kwakhe, ngemuva kokulingwa ngu-Iblis.Ngemuva kwalokho, u-Adam ngeqhawe udla isithelo esenqatshelwe ukuze alandele u-Eva futhi amvikele emhlabeni. 
Okholweni lwamaBaháʼí, u-Adam uthathwa njengokuBonakaliswa kukaNkulunkulu kokuqala.[1]Umlando ka-Adam no-Eva uthathwa njengomfanekiso. 
Kweminye imibuzo ephenduliwe, u-'Abdu'l-Bahá uyakwenqaba ukufundwa kwezwi nezwi futhi uthi le ndaba iqukethe "izimfihlakalo zaphezulu kanye nezincazelo zomhlaba wonke".U-Adam ufanekisela "umoya ka-Adam", u-Eva ufanekisela "isiqu Sakhe", isihlahla solwazi sifanekisela "izwe elibonakalayo", kanti inyoka ifanekisela "ukunamathela ezweni elibonakalayo". [5] Ukuwa kuka-Adamu ngaleyo ndlela kufanekisela indlela isintu esazi ngayo okuhle nokubi. Ngomunye umqondo, u-Adamu no-Eva bamele Intando Nokuzimisela KukaNkulunkulu, izigaba ezimbili zokuqala kweziyisikhombisa ze -Divine Creative Action. 
Ngenkathi umbono owamukelekayo kwaba ukuthi Encwadi KaGenesise lalotshwa uMose kanye iye yabhekwa zomlando ehilela izazi zanamuhla cabanga Genesise ekudalweni lelandzisako njengenye ahlukahlukene lasendulo imvelaphi izinganekwane. 
Izahluko zokuqala zencwadi kaGenesise zinikeza umlando oyinganekwane wokungena kobubi emhlabeni. UNkulunkulu ubeka owesilisa nowesifazane bokuqala (u-Adamu no-Eva) eNsimini yakhe yase-Edene, lapho bexoshwe khona; kulandela ukubulala kokuqala, nesinqumo sikaNkulunkulu sokubhubhisa umhlaba futhi asindise uNowa olungileyo kanye namadodana akhe kuphela; ubuntu obusha bese buyehla kulokhu futhi busabalale umhlaba wonke, kepha noma ngabe umhlaba omusha unesono njengakudala, uNkulunkulu unqume ukuthi ngeke aphinde abhubhise umhlaba ngozamcolo, kanti Umlando uphela ngoTerah, ubaba ka-Abrahama, kusukela ozokwehla abantu bakaNkulunkulu abakhethiwe, ama -Israyeli. [6] Akekho u-Adam noma u-Eva okukhulunywa ngaye kwenye indawo emibhalweni yesiHeberu ngaphandle kohlu olulodwa luka-Adam ohlwini lozalo ku- 1 IziKronike 1: 1, [7] okuphakamisa ukuthi yize indaba yabo yaqala yanikelwa endabeni yamaJuda, kodwa okuncane okufana nakho. 
UDoro angabhekisa ku 
UDoro (umculi),umculi we-rock, owayengumculi weqembu elinamandla laseJalimane iWarlock UDoro (i-albhamu),i-albhamu ka-1990 kaDoro U-AKA (rapper) (owazalwa ngo-1988), umculi waseNingizimu Afrika wokuqopha i-hip hop UDorothy Bush Koch,ovame ukubizwa nge- "Doro", indodakazi kaMongameli wase-US uGeorge HW Bush UDoro (inkampani), inkampani yezokuxhumana yaseSweden I-Doro,elinye igama le-BT Inspiration yocingo i-PBX Doro,le bodiless, ezinjengezikaNkulunkulu uhlamvu eziklamela uhlelo abakhethayo yokuzalanisa ukuthi nezipani amakhulu eminyaka esimweni uchungechunge Patternist amanoveli by Octavia E.Butler IDoRo Productions,okuyinkampani yamafilimu ezinze e-Austria, phambilini eyayaziwa ngamavidiyo ayo omculo SS UDoro,umkhumbi wezimpahla wasePanama owawusebenza ngo-1951–1956 IDoro, eSouth Sudan 
UFikile Mthwalo (owazalwa 13 Apreli 1989), kuyinto Lesotho -born South African actress kanye umbhali iskripthi . Waziwa kakhulu ngokulingisa emdlalweni owuchungechunge odumile i- It's Complicated, Isidingo neGold Diggers . 
Wazalwa ngomhlaka 13 Ephreli 1989 eLesotho kubaba ongumMosotho futhi engumama waseTanzania. 
Unomfowabo omncane ohlala eKapa .Kusukela ngo-2001 kuya ku-2005, wafunda eMachabeng International College ezinze eMaseru . 
Wabe esedlulela eBloemfontein, eNingizimu Afrika waqeda uMatric ngo-2007, eSt Michael Girls School. 
Ngo-2009, wajoyina i-University of Cape Town waphothula iziqu zeBachelor of Arts Film and Video Production. Kamuva ngo-2012, wathola iziqu ze-Film Studies eTisch School of Arts eNew York University. 
Ngemuva kokuthweswa iziqu, wafudukela eGoli . 
Ushade nomunye umlingisi wakuleli u- Atandwa Kani kusukela ngomhlaka-24 Disemba 2015.Uhlangane noKani ngesikhathi somdlalo wethelevishini lapho bethembisana khona futhi bashada ngemuva konyaka.Bahlela umshado wabo wesintu 'uLabolo' ngemuva komshado wabo.U-Atandwa uyindodana kaJohn Kani noMandi Kani. 
Ngaphambi komshado wabo, uKani wayethandana nomuntu wezokuxhumana, uThembisa Mdoda. 
Laba bobabili bahlukana eminyakeni emithathu kamuva. 
Uqale ukulingisa emdlalweni owuchungechunge owudumile, Isidingo. 
Ube ngomunye wabangu-24 abebedlulele kowamanqamu ku-'O Access Presenter Search 'ekhonjiswe esiteshini u-O. Ngo-2015, wenza indima yakhe yokuqala kwezethelevishini ngokudlala umlingisi ka-'Ipeleng' emdlalweni owuchungechunge othi Kuyinkimbinkimbi . 
Ngaphandle kwalokho, ujoyine nezikhangiso eziningi zethelevishini ezibandakanya iMetropolitan, PEP, Omo, Shoprite, Etiselat Nigeria, Ponds, Hi-Malt Nigeria neNivea UK. 
Uvele kwi-telenovela Gold Diggers lapho ayedlala khona indawo 'kaHlengiwe'. 
UFikile igama alinikiwe.Abantu abaziwayo abanegama elinikeziwe bafaka: 
UNqatha wazalwa ngomhlaka 16 Febhuwari 1967. 
Ufunde u-matric eMzoxolo High School (manje osekuyiJongile Nompondo High School) eMlungisi.Uthole idiploma kubudlelwano bezabasebenzi eGlobal Business Solution. 
ERhodes University, uthole isitifiketi sokuphathwa kwezabasebenzi okuthuthukile, isitifiketi esifundweni sokuphathwa kwamaphrojekthi, isitifiketi sokuqeqeshwa kwezobuntatheli nesitifiketi sobudlelwano bezimboni.
