[1] UNqatha uneDiploma yokuphothula iziqu zakhe kwiPublic Management azithola eNyuvesi yaseFort Hare kanti njengamanje ufundela iMaster of Public Administration (MPA) evela enyuvesi. [2] 
Abantu abaphawuleka abanaleli gama bafaka 
UXolani Dlwati, umpristi waseNingizimu Afrika UXolani Mahlaba, umdlali wekhilikithi waseNingizimu Afrika UXolani Mdaki, umdlali webhola waseNingizimu Afrika UXolani Mlambo, umdlali webhola waseNingizimu Afrika UXolani Sotashe,usopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika 
Wazalelwa eSoweto wafunda eNyuvesi yaseNingizimu Afrika .Wayengumuntu Rector weSonto St Monnica sika, eMidrand ke Archdeacon ka Randfontein .Manje usebenza njengo-Dean 18 we-diocese yaseGoli eNingizimu Afrika 
UXolani Ronald Sotashe ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika onguMholi weQembu Eliphikisayo eMkhandlwini Wedolobha laseKapa, uMholi we- African National Congress eMkhandlwini Wedolobha laseKapa, uSihlalo we-African National Congress egatsheni lesifunda laseDullah Omar, Ilungu leKapa UMkhandlu Wedolobha kanye noSihlalo woMkhandlu Ongaphansi 9.Uke wasebenza njengoSotswebhu Omkhulu we-African National Congress eMkhandlwini Wedolobha laseKapa nangoSihlalo woMkhandlu Wesigungu sama-24.Wayeqokelwe isikhundla sobumeya be-African National Congress ngo-2016 nango-2018, ehlulwa nguPatricia de Lille noDan Plato ngokulandelana. 
NgoNovemba 2018, uSotashe wayelilungu le-ANC lesikhundla sokuba yiMeya yaseKapa ngemuva kokusula kukaPatricia de Lille. 
Wabekelwa inselelo yesikhundla nguDan Plato noGrant Haskin .Wehlulwa nguPlato, wathola amavoti angama-53 uma kuqhathaniswa namavoti angu-146 kaPlato. 
Omunye obephikisana naye, uHaskin, uthole amavoti amathathu kuphela. [1] 
Ngo-Agasti 2016, wabe eselahlekelwa yiMeya, uPatricia de Lille, ngobubanzi obukhulu njengoba ukwesekwa kwe-African National Congress edolobheni kwehla.Wabe eseqokwa njengoSihlalo woMkhandlu wesiGungu 9. [1] 
UXolani Mlambo (owazalwa ngomhlaka-24 Juni 1991 eGoli) ungumdlali wasesiswini webhola laseNingizimu Afrika odlalela AmaZulu kuSouth African Premier Division. 
UXolani Mahlaba (owazalwa ngomhlaka 22 Meyi 1998) ungumdlali wekhilikithi waseNingizimu Afrika.Udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala wamashumi amabili namashumi amabili eMpumalanga bedlala neBorder emdlalweni we- 2016 Africa T20 Cup ngomhlaka 9 Septhemba 2016.Uqale ukudlala ibanga lokuqala eKwaZulu-Natali Inland kwiNdebe Yesifundazwe Yesithathu Yezinsuku ezi-3 kuya ku-19 ngomhla ka-14 Mashi 2019. 
Xolani Mdaki (owazalwa 7 Julayi 1992) is a South African footballer odlala njengoba mdlali ngoba Royal Eagles. 
Xolani Maholo (owazalwa 21 Novemba 1996) is a South African lezinyawo odlala njengoba mdlali ngoba eNingizimu Afrika Premier Division ohlangothini , iChippa United. 
UMaholo uzalelwe eNew Brighton, ngasePort Elizabeth . 
Milkha Singh (20 November 1929 – 18 Juni 2021), eyaziwa ngokuthi Flying Sikh, khona-Indian ithrekhi futhi ensimini umsubathi ngubani wethulwa ezemidlalo ngesikhathi esebuthweni Indian Army . 
Nguye kuphela umsubathi owine igolide ngamamitha angama-400 kuma- Asia Games kanjalo nakumaCommonwealth Games .Wabuye wathola izindondo zegolide emidlalweni yase-Asia yango -1958 nango-1962. 
Wayemele i-India kuma- Olimpiki asehlobo e-1956 eMelbourne, ama- Olimpiki asehlobo e-1960 e-Roma kanye nama- Olimpiki Asehlobo e-1964 eTokyo. 
Uklonyeliswe ngePadma Shri, okuyindondo yesine ephezulu kwezomphakathi e-India, ngokuhlonipha impumelelo yakhe kwezemidlalo. 
Ukuvuswa kocansi ( nentokozo yezocansi ) kuchaza izimpendulo zomzimba nezingokwengqondo ekulungiseleleni ukuya ocansini noma lapho kuvezwa inkanuko yezocansi. 
Izimpendulo eziningi zomzimba zenzeka emzimbeni nasengqondweni njengokulungiselela ukuya ocansini futhi kuqhubeke phakathi nalokho. 
Ukuqhanyelwa Male kuzoholela ukwakhiwa, futhi ukuqhanyelwa zesifazane ukusabela komzimba is engorged kwezicubu ngokocansi ezifana izingono, ngemomozi, clitoris, izindonga lwesitho sangasese sowesifazane, futhi Lubrication lwesitho sangasese sowesifazane .Izikhuthazi zengqondo nezishukumisayo zomzimba njengokuthinta, nokushintshashintsha kwangaphakathi kwamahomoni, kungathonya ukuvuswa kocansi. 
Ukuqala kokuvuswa kocansi emzimbeni wowesifazane kuvame ukuphawulwa ngokuthambisa kwesitho sangasese sowesifazane (ubumanzi; yize lokhu kungenzeka ngaphandle kokuvuka ngenxa yokutheleleka noma ukukhiqizwa kwamafinyila womlomo wesibeletho okuzungeze i-ovulation), ukuvuvukala nokuqina kwezitho zangasese zangaphandle, nokwandiswa kwangaphakathi nokwandiswa kwe isitho sangasese sowesifazane.Kube nezifundo zokuthola izinga lokuhlangana phakathi kwalezi zimpendulo zomzimba nokuzizwa kowesifazane ngokuzithoba kokuvuswa ngocansi: okutholakele imvamisa ukuthi kwezinye izimo kunokuhlangana okuphezulu, kanti kwezinye, kuphansi ngokumangazayo. [1] 
Ukuvuswa kocansi kunezigaba eziningana futhi kungahle kungaholeli kunoma yimuphi umsebenzi wangempela wocansi, ngaphezu kokuvuswa kwengqondo kanye nezinguquko zomzimba ezihambisana nakho.Njengoba kunikezwe ukukhuthazwa okwanele ngokocansi, ukuvusa ucansi kubantu kufinyelela kuvuthondaba lwayo ngesikhathi se- orgasm . 
Kungalandelwa futhi ngenxa yayo, noma kungabikho i-orgasm. 
Ngenkathi ukuvusa inkanuko yobulili nokukhuthaza kuqhubeka, kungenzeka ukuthi ubukhazikhazi noma ikhanda lomthondo oqondile lizokhula kakhulu futhi, njengoba izitho zangasese ziqhubeka nokufakwa igazi, umbala wazo uyajula namasende angakhula afike ku-50% omkhulu. 
Njengoba amasende aqhubeka nokukhuphuka, umuzwa wemfudumalo ungakhula ubazungeze kanye ne-perineum. 
Ngokuqhubeka nokuvuselelwa ngokocansi, izinga labo lenhliziyo liyakhuphuka, umfutho wegazi uyakhuphuka futhi ukuphefumula kuyashesha.Ukwanda kokugeleza kwegazi ezithweni zobulili nakwezinye izifunda kungaholela ekuqothulweni kocansi kwamanye amadoda. [1] 
Ngemuva kwe-orgasm kanye ne-ejaculation, amadoda ajwayele ukuhlangabezana nesikhathi sokuphika esivezwa ukulahleka kokwakhiwa kwawo, ukuncipha kunoma yikuphi ukuqhuma kocansi, ukungabi nentshisekelo kwezocansi, kanye nomuzwa wokuphumula ongabangelwa yi-neurohormones oxytocin neprolactin . [1]Amandla nobude besikhathi sokuphikisa bungaba bufushane kakhulu ensizweni evuswe kakhulu esimweni esivusa kakhulu, mhlawumbe ngaphandle kokulahleka okuphawulekayo kokwakhiwa.Kungaba isikhathi eside njengamahora ambalwa noma izinsuku emadodeni aphakathi nendawo nangaphezulu. 
Ngenkathi ubulili bomuntu buqondakala kahle, ososayensi abaqondi ngokuphelele ukuthi ezinye izilwane zihlobana kanjani nezocansi.Kodwa-ke, ucwaningo lwamanje lubonisa ukuthi izilwane eziningi, njengabantu, zijabulela ubudlelwane bobulili obungagcini ekukhiqizeni.Ama-dolphins nama- bonobos, isibonelo, zombili ziyaziwa ngokusebenzisa ubulili "njengethuluzi lomphakathi lokuqinisa nokugcina izibopho."Sekuyisikhathi eside izazi ze-Ethologists zibhala ukuhwebelana ngocansi ukukhuthaza ukuhlangana kweqembu ezilwaneni zenhlalo . 
Ukuqinisa ubugqila bezenhlalo kungenye yezinzuzo ezikhethwe kakhulu ezikhethiwe zethiyori yokukhetha iqembu . 
Ochwepheshe ekuziphendukeleni kocansi njengoJohn Maynard Smith baxhasa umbono wokuthi ukushintshaniswa kwezinhloso zocansi kusiza ukujiya futhi kutholakale ukuhlangana kwama- alleles kubantu abahlala bodwa ngakho-ke kungaba namandla amakhulu ekuziphendukeleni kwemvelo . 
UMaynard Smith ubhale kaningi kakhulu mayelana nokusetshenziswa kwe-seminal fluid swapping theory ye-assortment of alleles njengokukhonjiswa okunembe kakhudlwana komgomo we-Hardy-Weinberg ezimweni lapho abantu bezalana kakhulu. 
U-Ava Acres (owazalwa ngoMeyi 12, 2005) ungumlingisi waseMelika.Udlale uRegina osemusha ku-Once upon a Time futhi wavela naku- Agents of SHIELD njengoKaty Belyakov, ophikisana kakhulu nesiqephu esithi " Melinda ".Ngaphezu kwalokho, udlale uMadeline kusizini 5 yochungechunge lwethelevishini i- American Horror Story,noRebecca osemusha ochungechungeni lwamahlaya iCrazy Ex-Girlfriend .Udadewabo ka-Acres, u-Isabella, naye ungumlingisi. 
UKervin Mario Andrade Navarro (owazalwa ngo-13 Ephreli 2005) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo waseVenezuela odlala phambili njengeDeportivo La Guaira. 
UDina Aleksandrovna Agisheva ( ; owazalwa ngo-Ephreli 17, 2005) ungumvocavoci womzimba onesigqi waseBelarusian .Ungumpetha we- 2020 Junior European ngeRope. 
UNoor Ahmad (owazalwa ngomhlaka 3 Januwari 2005) ungumdlali wekhilikithi wase-Afghanistan.Wenze i-debut yakhe yeklasi lokuqala ngomhlaka 29 Ephreli 2019, weSifunda saseKabul kuMqhudelwano wezinsuku ezi-4 u-Ahmad Shah Abdali .Wenze umdlalo wakhe wokuqala we-Twenty20 ngo-8 Okthoba 2019, weMis Ainak Knights ku- 2019 Shpageeza Cricket League . 
NgoDisemba 2019, waqokwa eqenjini lase-Afghanistan leNdebe Yomhlaba Yekhilikithi ka-Under-19 ka-2020. NgoJulayi 2020, waqokwa eqenjini laseSt Lucia Zouks le- 2020 Caribbean Premier League .Wenze i- List yakhe yokuqala ngo-14 Okthoba 2020, esifundeni saseMis Ainak ku- 2020 Ghazi Amanullah Khan Regional One Day Tournament . 
NgoDisemba 2020, eneminyaka engu-15, wasayinwa yiMelbourne Renegades ukuyodlala kwisizini ka- 2020–21 yeBash Bash League e-Australia.NgoMashi 2021, iChennai Super Kings ifake uNoor njengomphoseli wenetha eqenjini labo le- 2021 Indian Premier League .NgoJuni 2021, uNoor waphinde wadlalela iKarachi Kings ku- 2021 Pakistan Super League. 
NgoJulayi 2021, uNoor waqokwa eqenjini le- One Day International (ODI) lase- Afghanistan emdlalweni wabo owawuhlangene nePakistan eSri Lanka . 
Ngo-31 Januwari 2021, uSabbe wadlala umdlalo wakhe wokuqala eqenjini eligcinelwe iBrugge, iClub NXT eBelgian First Division B neSeraing. 
URaunak Sadhwani (owazalwa ngomhlaka-22 Disemba 2005) ungumdlali we- chess waseNdiya kanye noGrmmaster.I- chess prodigy, wazuza isihloko se- Grandmaster eneminyaka engu-13.Ungumdlali omncane kunabo bonke emlandweni futhi ungowesi-4 omncane waseNdiya ukuba nguGrandmaster . 
URaunak wayengu-U-10 Commonwealth Champion ngo-2015 eNew Delhi, e-India . 
UDaniil Aleksandrovich Samsonov (; owazalwa ngo-13 Julayi 2005) ungumdwebi we- skater waseRussia, okwamanje ophethe irekhodi lomhlaba elincane lohlelo olufushane (amaphuzu we-87.33). 
UZvonarek wajoyina i-youth academy yaseSlaven Belupo ngo-2016, eneminyaka engu-11,evela eMladost Prelog . [2] Uqale ukudlala kahle noSlaven ngesikhathi ehlulwa yiRijeka ngo-2-0 Croatia First Football League ngo-12 Meyi 2021.Uthole igoli okuwukuphela kwalo ekubonakaleni kwakhe kwesibili, ukunqoba kwe-1-0 kuVaraždin ngomhla ka-22 Meyi 2021; eneminyaka eyi-16 nezinsuku ze-14 ubudala, waba ngumshayimagoli omncane kunabo bonke owake washaya amagoli kuCroatia First Football League ethatha irekhodi ku- Alen Halilović . 
UZvonarek ungowentsha yamazwe omhlaba eCroatia, njengoba emele amaCroatia U15s kanye nama- U16. 
UZeng Wenhui ( Chinese ; owazalwa ngomhlaka-8 kuFebhuwari 2005) uyi-Chinese skateboarder yaseChina futhi ungumpetha wamaShayina amahlandla amabili.Kuma- Olimpiki asehlobo e-2020, uqede endaweni yesithupha emcimbini wabesifazane abashwibeka e-skateboarding, umcimbi wokuqala walolu hlobo ukufakwa ohlelweni lwama-Olimpiki. 
Kuma-Olimpiki eTokyo 2020, uZeng ubengomunye wabasubathi abangamashumi amabili abebencintisana emcimbini wabesifazane ababamba i-skateboarding. 
Zeng wakufanelekela lomcimbi esenziwa simo 21 kule Umhlaba Skate -Olympic Umhlaba Skateboarding Amazinga.kowandulela owamanqamu, uZeng ungene endaweni yesi-6, wadlulela emzuliswaneni wamanqamu, lapho aqede khona lo mncintiswano endaweni yesi-6. 
UVan Zundert udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala weJunior Grand Prix ngo-2019 JGP France, waqeda owama-21. 
Umphumela wakhe wawungaqinile ngokwanele ukuthola iNetherlands indawo kuma- Olimpiki Wentsha Yasebusika ka-2020 .UVan Zundert wabe eseqeda endaweni yesithupha eTallinn Trophy .Uthole indondo yakhe yokuqala yamazwe omhlaba, isiliva, eSanta Claus Cup . 
Ngemuva kokuqeda indawo yesine ku-2020 Bavarian Open, u-van Zundert waqokwa eqenjini le- 2020 World Junior Championship . Uvikele isicoco sakhe sikazwelonke esincane ngenyanga elandelayo. 
KuJunior Worlds, uVan Zundert uqede endaweni yama-29 ohlelweni olufushane futhi akazange alungele ukungena esigabeni sokugcina. 
UVan Zundert wazalwa ngomhlaka 1 Februwari 2005 e- Etten-Leur .Kusukela ngo-2020, njengamanje ungumfundi we- mavo-4 eGraaf Engelbrecht eBreda . 
UVan Zundert waqala ukushushuluza eneminyaka eyisikhombisa. Wancintisana nemincintiswano yasekhaya yaseBelgium ekuqaleni komsebenzi wakhe. Ngo-2015, van Zundert waqala ukuqeqeshwa ngaphansi Ans Bocklandt e Courchevel, France kanye Wilrijk, Belgium . 
NgoDisemba 2020, uYull waqokwa eqenjini eliphakeme lika- Adelaide United elizolwa neWestern United . [1]NgoJuni 2021, wasayina inkontileka ephezulu yokufunda. [2] 
Yu Yiting (owazalwa 5 Septhemba 2005) umbhukudi waseShayina.Uncintisane emidlalweni yabesifazane engamamitha angama-200 kumqhudelwano we- 2019 World Aquatics Championship . 
(Izinhlanga ezibhalwe ngokugqamile zikhombisa ukuma kwepali ) (Izinhlanga ezibhalwe ngomalukeke zibonisa ithanga elisheshayo) 
(Izinhlanga ezibhalwe ngokugqamile zikhombisa ukuma kwepali ) (Izinhlanga ezibhalwe ngomalukeke zibonisa ithanga elisheshayo) 
U-Yeany wenza indawo yakhe yokuhlala eyodwa ku- 2020 Formula 4 US Championship ngeVelocity Racing Development.Ubephethe ubuqhawe ethatha amawini ayi-7 nama-podium ayi-14 emijahweni eyi-15.Okwenze le sizini yahlaba umxhwele kakhulu ukuthi akazange ancintisane emzuliswaneni wokugcina eCOTA .Sekukonke uqede amaphuzu angama-58 ngaphambi kwesibili ekumeni. 
UMohamed Yalouh (owazalwa ngoJanuwari 12, 2005) ungumqambi waseMorocco owaziwa ngemisebenzi yakhe ku- Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, nakuMechanical Engineering .Uwine i-International Invention Innovation Competition eCanada (iCAN) ngo-2020. 
Injini ka-Yalouh "Hexa-Stroke Engine" yaqanjwa njengomsunguli womklamo omuhle kakhulu kanye nokumelwa komqondo. [1] Unqobe ezinye iziqu eziningi ezivela ekudalweni kwemisha nasemincintiswaneni emhlabeni jikelele, njenge-International Innovation & Invention Competition eTaiwan.U-Yalouh usanda kuqashelwa ohlwini lwabasunguli abaqaphelekayo be-IFIA ngemisebenzi yakhe emisha. 
UYalouh wazalelwa eTetuan, eMorocco futhi njengamanje uhlala e-Abu Dhabi, e-United Arab Emirates lapho efunda khona I- American Community School yase-Abu Dhabi. 
Ubuye wasungula iWaind, iphrojekthi yocwaningo nentuthuko eholwa ngabafundi ehlose ukuhlola izixazululo ezintsha zezinkinga zomhlaba ngokusebenzisa i-Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, ne- Computer Vision . 
Ukuqalisa kuhlose ukwakha inethiwekhi ye-R & D yemiphakathi yabafundi emhlabeni wonke ukuhlola okusha okusha kobuchwepheshe obukhuni. 
UKirari Yamaguchi (山口 稀 良 莉, Yamaguchi Kirari, owazalwa ngoJanuwari 11, 2005) ungumdlali wabesifazane waseJapan osesikhundleni esingu-2-kyū. 
Udadewabo kaKirari omdala uNikori naye ungumdlali we-shogi okhombisa abesifazane.Laba bobabili bangodade abahlanu ukuba ngongoti besifazane.

UDaisy Liu Waite (owazalwa ngomhlaka 9 Septhemba 2005) ungumlingisi ongumNgisi nesiShayina, oyisibonelo nomethuli. 
Waziwa kakhulu ngokuveza uMei-Xue, kwifilimu yama-Chinese 2014 adventure Balala the Fairies: The Magic Trial .Ku-TV waziwa ngokwethula uhlelo olujwayelekile ohlelweni lweHunan Broadcasting System Playing Tricks (玩 名堂), olusakazwa kuzwelonke esiteshini se-Aniworld Satellite TV.UDaisy ubuye walingisa ngemikhiqizo emikhulu efana ne- ANTA Sports . [1] UDaisy wazalelwa eRoading, eBerkshire, eNgilandi kodwa uhlala eChangsha, eHunan kusukela eneminyaka emithathu. [3] 
Amafilimu 
U-Ayan Allahverdiyeva (owazalwa ngomhla ka-21 kuNhlolanja 2005) ungumdlali we-chess wase-Azerbaijan, ophumelele i-European Youth Chess Championship (2018). 
U-Listowel Amankona (owazalwa ngo-4 Ephreli 2005) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo waseGhana odlala njengomdlali wasesiswini weqembu laseGhanaian Premier League iBechem United FC 
U-Amankona uqale umsebenzi wakhe neBechem United futhi wayiswa eqenjini eliphakeme ngoSepthemba 2020, ngaphambi kwesizini ka- 2020-21.Uqale ukubonakala emdlalweni weligi bedlala neKarela United ngomhlaka 18 Disemba 2020, wangena ngomzuzu ka-87 uSteven Owusu waphinde washaya igoli ngomzuzu ka-90 elekelela iBechem ukuhlanganisa ukunqoba okungu-2-1.Ngo-29 Januwari 2021, washaya igoli lakhe lesibili ngemuva kokungena ngomzuzu ka-49 ukushaya igoli elishaye emuva komzuzu ka-89 esizwa nguFrancis Twene ukusiza iBechem United yanqoba ngo-3-1 kuTechiman Eleven Wonders ukuqeda amahlandla abo amane -match run winless. 
Daria Atamanov ( Hebrew ; owazalwa ngoDisemba 6, 2005) ungumuntu wokuzivocavoca onesigqi wase-Israeli . 
Ungumpetha we- 2020 Junior European namaKlabhu. 
Wayephinde abe yindondo yesiliva nezindondo zethusi emncintiswaneni ofanayo.UDaria naye ubanjwe amaphuzu aphakeme kunawo wonke azungeze amaphuzu amancane.Ezingeni likazwelonke, ungumpetha wamahlandla amabili (2019, 2020) wase-Israeli Junior National All-around. 
UWasil Ahmad (c. 
2005 - February 2016) wayeyisosha lezingane lase-Afghanistan, owaziwa kakhulu ngokuyala uphiko lwamaphoyisa nokubulawa kwakhe okwalandela yiTaliban eneminyaka eyishumi nanye.Umalume wakhe uSamad, wamqeqesha "ekusebenziseni izibhamu zemishini i- AK-47 ne- PK , amarokhethi nodaka kanjalo nezingcingo ze-satellite nemisakazo ye-VHF ." [1] 
UWasil Ahmad wazalelwa esifundazweni sase-Uruzgan. 
Isifunda sichazwe "njengeside ... isikhungo sezingxabano;" Umholi weTaliban uMullah Mohammad Omar wazalelwa lapho, futhi umongameli wakamuva wase-Afghanistan, uHamid Karzai, wahola ukuvukela kokuqala kukaPastun ngokumelene namaTaliban lapho ngo-2001.Ubaba ka-Ahmad phambilini wayebulewe elwa namaTaliban, kwathi indodana yakhe kamuva yathi ukufuna ukuziphindiselela ngokushona kukayise kwakuyisizathu sakhe esikhulu sokuya empini. [1] Umalume ka-Ahmad wayengumphathi wamaphoyisa endawo yase -Afghan esifundeni iKhas Uruzgan, esifundazweni sase-Uruzgan.Phambilini wayekade engumphathi wamaTaliban, kepha wayeseshintshe izinhlangothi ngo-2012, manje wayeselwela uhulumeni wase-Afghanistan.Ehlobo lika-2015, u-Khas Uruzgan- indawo yakhe yokuphatha- wavinjezelwa yiTaliban, kwathi uSamad walimala. 
Ngemuva kwalokho u-Ahmad uthathe isikhundla sokuphatha uphiko lukamalume wakhe. [2] 
Ekuvinjezelweni kokuvinjezelwa kweDan Sango,u-Ahmad wayala amasosha angama-75 asekela uhulumeni ngokumelene nebutho elihlaselayo cishe "elingamakhulu" amaTaliban. [1] Ukuvinjezelwa uqobo kwaphela izinsuku ezingama-71, kanti u-Ahmad wayala ithimba lakhe kwabangu-43 kubo. [2] Labe selidubula kokubili izigqulo namarokhethi kanye izibhamu kusukela kwakwakhe ophahleni.Kanye nokulwa ngokomzimba, u-Ahmad wayebuye abhekane nezokuxhumana nezwe langaphandle, kanye nendawo yokuxhumana yamabutho akhethekile ase- Afghanistan.Ngenkathi abokugcina bephakamisa ukuvinjezelwa kwabo ngo-Agasti 2015,Ahmad namasosha asindile angama-35 bakhishwa ngendiza enophephela emhlane yizindiza ezinophephela emhlane zase-Afghanistan nezaseNATO zayiswa eTarin Kowt . 
Ukufa 
Ngemuva kokuvinjezelwa, u-Ahmad wabhalisa esikoleni ebangeni lesine, ngenkathi ethola nemfundo yangasese ekhaya. [1] Usithuthukisile isiNgisi sakhe, yize ebengeyena "umfundi onekhono" - mhlawumbe, umakhelwane wabe esephawula, ngoba "wayekhuthazwe kakhulu yizikhulu zamaphoyisa futhi wanikezwa nezindondo ngobuqhawe bakhe" futhi kuphela "wayefuna ukudlala ngezikhali nokushayela izimoto zamaphoyisa njengokuzilibazisa. " Wagunyazwa ukuphatha isibhamu esikoleni.NgoMsombuluko, ngo-February 1, 2015, ngesikhathi wendawo asempumalanga,esendleleni eya esikoleni,edutshulwa kabili ekhanda oshayasibhamu simaskwe e isithuthuthu drive-ngokudubula, kulokho okuye kwabizwa ngokuthi "ukubulawa okuqondisiwe".Kamuva washonela esibhedlela saseKandahar [2] wangcwatshwa emathuneni aseShahidano endawo. 
Marc Justine Alvarez (owazalwa 18 Mashi 2005) umlingisi waseFillipino 
Amafilimu 
Oriane Bertone (owazalwa ngo-March 10, 2005 e Nice ) kuyinto French idwala umgibeli, ezemidlalo umgibeli futhi boulderer.Ngo-2018, lapho eneminyaka engu-12 ubudala, uBertone waba ngumqansa omncane kunabo bonke ukuthumela i- V14 (8B +) inkinga yedwala. Ngo-2019 waqala ukungenela imicimbi yokuqwala ezemidlalo yentsha yamazwe omhlaba lapho athola khona izindondo eziningi zegolide kuzo zombili izintaba zokuqwala kanye nezamatshe amakhulu. 
Ngo-Ephreli 2021, uBertone wenza umqhudelwano wakhe omkhulu we- International Federation of Sport Climbing (IFSC) eneminyaka engu-16 e- Boulder World Cup eMeiringen, lapho adlulela khona kowamanqamu wabeka isibili. 
U-Eva Brezalieva ( Bulgarian , owazalwa ngomhla ka-13 Januwari 2005 eBurgas, eBulgaria ) ungumvocavoci womzimba onesigqi waseBulgaria.ngumbhali wendondo yethusi omncane wase-2020 ngentambo. 
Ezingeni likazwelonke, uyindondo yethusi ye-2019 Bulgarian Junior All-Around. 
Ngo-2020, waba ngumpetha weBulgaria Junior National ngeRope futhi wawina indondo yesiliva neBall.Uqhudelane kwi-International Tournament eMoscow, lapho yena nozakwabo uStiliana Nikolova tok indawo yesibili emncintiswaneni weThimba.Uphinde wawina indondo yesiliva ngeRope neBhola nendondo yethusi neRibbon.Ungenele umqhudelwano we- 2020 Junior European Championship eKyiv, e-Ukraine futhi wahlungela ama-apparatus final amabili. 
Uthole indondo yethusi kowokugcina we-Rope. 
UDiego Hernandez (owazalwa ngoFebhuwari 23, 2005) ungumdlali webhola odlala njengomdlali wasesiswini weNorth Texas SC e-USL League One nge- FC Dallas academy. 
UDivya Deshmukh (owazalwa ngoDisemba 9, 2005) uyi-Indian chess Woman International Master (2020) ovela esifundeni saseMaharashtra . Wayeyingxenye yethimba leChess Olympiad elathola izindondo zegolide. 
Ukleliswe kunombolo 2 emashisheni amantombazane aseNdiya. 
UTaylor Grey (owazalwa ngoMashi 25, 2005) ungumshayeli waseMelika ongumjaho.Uncintisana ngokugcwele kwi- ARCA Menards Series East, eshayela uNo. 17 Ford weDavid Gilliland Racing, kanye netoho ku-ARCA Menards Series nakwi - ARCA Menards Series West emotweni efanayo. 
Uphinde ancintisane neqembu itoho kuNASCAR Camping World Truck Series, eshayela iNombolo 17 Ford F-150 . 
( ukhiye ) ( Bold - Pole isikhundla ukhishwa ngesikhathi sokufaneleka. 
Omalukeke - Pole isikhundla etholwe amaphuzu ukuma noma umkhuba isikhathi.Amathanga amaningi aholelekile. ) 
Okulandelayo kuhlukanisa abantu ababulele. 
Abdullah Shah (1965-2004) kwaba i -Afghan umalugaju batholakala benecala Kabul ngokubulala abantu abangaphezu kuka-20, kuhlanganise nomkayo.Ukubulawa kwakhe egunyaziwe kwaba okokuqala e- Afghanistan selokhu kwawa amaTaliban ngasekupheleni kuka-2001. [1] 
U-Shah wasebenza ngaphansi kuka- Zardad Khan — waze wathola nesiteketiso ngokuthi inja kaZardad - owayekhonza ngaphansi kukaGulbuddin Hekmatyar empini yombango e-Afghanistan (1992-1996) . [1]UShah noZardad baphange izihambi emgwaqweni osuka eKabul uya eJalalabad . 
UStefanu Wayne Anderson (July 8, 1953 - Januwari 29, 2002) lwakwazi American umalugaju owabulawa ngesikhathi California San Quentin Ejele State ngo ngomjovo obulalayo engazi ngo-2002 ngezinsolo zokubulala Elizabeth noLyman.Wayekwaziwa ukuthi wabulala noma wavuma ukubulawa okungenani kwabantu abayisishiyagalombili, kubalwa nesinye isiboshwa kanye nokubulala okungenani okuyisikhombisa. 
Lindela Rowland Ndlovu (wafa 18 Novemba 2015) bekayi-Biochemist yade Zimbabwe ezinto kanye Usekela-Shansela we -National University of Science and Technology Ubuye futhi waba yilungu lokuqala leZimbabwe Academy of Science futhi wasebenza njengoMongameli ohloniphekile weSouth African Academy of Animal Science. 
Wasebenza njengoSolwazi Wezilwane e- University of Limpopo eNingizimu Afrika, futhi iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye wayenguDini we-Faculty of Agriculture e-University of Zimbabwe.Uchithe amashumi eminyaka e-United States efunda isayensi yezilwane.UNdlovu wathola iziqu ze-PhD ngo-1985 e- University of Guelph, e-Ontario, eCanada. [3] 
Ngo-1995, uNdlovu wasiza ekuqaliseni umsebenzi wokucwaninga noJD Reed wase- University of Wisconsin wangena kwi-biochemistry yemvelo yama- proanthocyanidins .Ngo-2007, waba ngumamukeli weGolide Medal for Research evela eSouth African Academy for Animal Science. 
Ushone ngokuzumayo eGallen House Medical Centre, kwaBulawayo, ngomhlaka 18 Novemba 2015. 
UThemba igama laseNingizimu Afrika. 
Abantu abaziwayo abanegama bafaka 
UNelson Themba Godi (owazalwa ngomhlaka 10 Agasti 1966 eMassavana) ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika futhi wayeyilungu lePhalamende Likazwelonke .Njengephini lomholi wePhalamende lePan-Africanist Congress of Azania, wamiswa ngumongameli wePAC, uMotsoko Pheko, ngoSepthemba 2006.Lowo owayenguSihlalo wekomidi elibalulekile lama-akhawunti womphakathi ePhalamende (iScopa). [1] [2] 
UThembinkosi 'Themba' Mabaso, iState Herald, noma iNational Herald, yaseNingizimu Afrika, ungumqondisi weBureau of Heraldry yalelo zwe. 
Ngaphambi kokuba ngummemezeli, isipiliyoni sobungcweti sikaMabaso besisezikhungweni zobuciko nasekugcinweni kwezobuciko okuhle.Ngo-1999 nango-2000, wayehlotshaniswa neGoli Art Gallery eGoli futhi engusihlalo weConseil International des Musées (International Council of Museums). 
Ngo-2002 uMabaso wangena esikhundleni sikaFrederick Brownell njengoState Herald waseNingizimu Afrika.Imisebenzi yakhe kubandakanya ukubhalisa amajazi ezikhali, amabheji ezimpawu , amafulegi nezimpawu. 
Ubuye futhi aluleke uhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika, izinkampani nabantu ngabanye ngezindaba zekhambi, umfaniswano kanye ne- vexillology . 
UThemba James Maseko (owazalwa ngomhlaka 27 Januwari 1961) wayenguMphathi Omkhulu we- Government Communication and Information Systems futhi engumkhulumeli kahulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika.Waqokwa kulesi sikhundla mhla ziyi-14 kuNhlangulana 2006 nguNgqongqoshe owayenguNgqongqoshe ngaleso sikhathi u- Essop Pahad, walandela uJoel Netshitenzhe . 
UMaseko wake wasebenza njengelungu lePhalamende ePhalamende kusukela ngo-1994 kuya ku-1995, waphinde wasebenza njenge-Superintendent General eMnyangweni Wezemfundo waseGauteng kusukela ngo-1995-2000.Wabe esebenza njengo-MD weDamelin Education Group kanye ne-CEO yeSifikile Investments ngo-2001 nango-2002, walandelwa yisikhathi sokuba ngumqondisi-jikelele woMnyango Wezemisebenzi Yomphakathi kusukela ngoFebhuwari 2003 kwaze kwaba ukuqokwa kwakhe njenge-CEO ye-GCIS. 
Ngaphandle kukahulumeni, uMaseko uke wasebenza emabhodini e-Adopt a School Foundation, eCentre for Public Service Innovation nakuVista University Council. 
BA kwezenhlalo nakwezomthetho kanye ne-LLB evela eNyuvesi yaseWitwatersrand . I-MBA evela eDe Montfort University e-United Kingdom. 
UMasuku wazalwa ngomhlaka 7 Julayi 1950.Uthole iziqu zakhe zeMasters of Science e- University of Missouri. 
Ngawo-1990, wagcwalisa izikhundla ezahlukahlukene kuhulumeni waseSwaziland, kubalwa uNgqongqoshe Wezolimo Nemifelandawonye, uNgqongqoshe Wezokuhlelwa Kwezomnotho Nentuthuko, kanye noNgqongqoshe Wezezimali kusuka ngonyaka we-1996 kuya ku-1998.Ubuye wasebenza neFood and Agriculture Organisation yeZizwe Ezihlangene, njengomqondisi wamahhovisi okuxhumana eGeneva naseNew York kamuva. 
Waqokwa njengePhini likaNdunankulu ngonyaka ka-2008 yiNkosi uMswati III futhi wasebenza kuleso sikhundla kwaze kwaba ngu-2013, lapho eba ngumphathi wesifunda sesifunda saseShiselweni . 
UMasuku ubuyele esikhundleni sakhe njengePhini likaNdunankulu ngenkathi uNdunankulu u- Ambrose Mandvulo Dlamini ethula iKhabhinethi lakhe ngoNovemba 2018. [1] [2] Waba ngundunankulu osabambile ngemuva kokushona kukaDlamini ngomhlaka 13 Disemba 2020. [3] Ngokomthethosisekelo wase-Eswatini, uThemba Masuku bekufanele asebenze njengoNdunankulu osabambile isikhathi esiyizinyanga ezintathu.NgoJuni nangoJulayi 2021, phakathi kwesihluku samaphoyisa namasosha, uMasuku wagxekwa ngokuphatha kwakhe Imibhikisho yango-2021 Eswatini yokulwa nobukhosi. 
Kwisibaya mhla ziyi-16 kuNtulikazi ngo-2021, iNkosi uMswati ingene esikhundleni sikaMasuku yabeka uCleopas Dlamini njengoNdunankulu omusha. [5] 
ULieutenant General Themba Matanzima CCM SM UMMM wayeyisikhulu sombutho wezempi waseNingizimu Afrika, futhi wasebenza njengoMsombululi Wezempi. 
Wazalwa ngomhlaka 2 Febhuwari 1953 eCofimvaba.Ujoyine iTranskei Defence Force ngoJanuwari 1977. 
Ngo-1999 waqokwa waba yiNhloko Yezabasebenzi wakhushulelwa esikhundleni sokuba ngu-lieutenant general. 
Ngo-2000, i-SANDF yahlela kabusha futhi yaqokwa esikhundleni esisha esasanda kwenziwa seChief of Joint Support. 
Waqoka uMphathi Wezokusebenza Ngokuhlanganyela ngomhlaka 1 Septhemba 1, 2007 ngemuva kokushona kukaLt General Sipho Binda engozini yemoto ngo-2006. 
Ngo-2010 usebenze njengebamba likaNobhala Wezokuvikela kanye ne-Acting CSANDF kaningi. 
UThemba Mnguni (owazalwa ngomhlaka 16 Disemba 1973) ungumdlali webhola waseNingizimu Afrika osethathe umhlalaphansi owayedlalela kakhulu iMamelodi Sundowns neSupersport United. 
Udlale iqembu lesizwe lakuleli laseNingizimu Afrika futhi ubeyingxenye yeqembu elaya eFrance kwiNdebe Yomhlaba yeFIFA ngo -1998. 
Bheki Muata-Marlow (owazalwa 30 Apreli 1994) kuyinto Australian /English footballer okhokho Jamaican ngubani okwamanje udlala njengoba welungelo esimaphakathi APIA Leichhardt Tigers FC . 
UThemba Ndlovu ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo waseZimbabwe, odlala njengomdlali wasemuva weDynamos FC . 
NgoJanuwari 2014, umqeqeshi u-Ian Gorowa, wammema ukuba abe yingxenye yeqembu laseZimbabwe elizodlala ku- 2014 African Nations Championship.Usizile iqembu laqeda endaweni yesine ngemuva kokuhlulwa yiNigeria ngegoli eqandeni. 
U-Lieutenant General Themba Nkabinde uyi-General Officer Yezempi yaseNingizimu Afrika, njengamanje osebenza njenge-Chief Human Resources. 
Ujoyine uMkhonto weSizwe (MK) ngo-1977 washiya iNingizimu Afrika wayoqeqeshwa e-Angola. 
Ukusuka ngo-1991 kuya ku-1992 wayeyisekela lokunamathela kwezempi eTanzania futhi waqedela izifundo eziphezulu zomyalo nabasebenzi eNdiya.Ngo-1994 wazihlanganisa ne-SANDF futhi wasebenza njengesikhulu esiphezulu sabasebenzi e-Afrika ngaphansi komqondisi womsebenzi e-Chief of Joint Operations waphinde waba yiphini lomqondisi omkhulu we-Army Force Structure. 
Waba ngumphathi we- Infantry Formation ngomhlaka 1 Ephreli 2003. 
Wanikeza umyalo wokuba yiGeneral Officer Commanding, South African Army Infantry Formation ngomhlaka 2 Mashi 2012 kuMajor Lindile Yam . 
USimon Majola (owazalwa ngo-1968), owaziwa nge- The Bruma Lake Killer, uyisigebengu saseNingizimu Afrika futhi ungumbulali obulalayo, yena kanye noThemba Nkosi, ababebhekene nokubulawa kwabantu okungenani abayisishiyagalombili endaweni eseduze neChibi iBruma eBruma, eGauteng. . UMajola unikezwe odilikajele abawu-8, kanti njengamanje uboshiwe. 
UMajola, indoda eshadile enezingane ezimbili, ubeseke wagwetshwa phambilini ngokugqekeza, ukushaya nokweba ngaphambi kokubulala.Ngesikhathi esephathini eHillbrow, wazakhela ubungani noThemba Isaac Nkosi, waseVosloorus .Ubudlelwano babo basheshe baphenduka obobugebengu, noMajola noNkosi babamba inkunzi babulala abantu hhayi eBruma Lake kuphela, kodwa naseRhodes Park, eBezuidenhout Park nase-Observatory Rift Park. 
Phakathi kuka-Ephreli 2000 noFebhuwari 2001, izidumbu zombhangqwana zaziphenduka echibini laseBruma. 
Ekuqaleni zazithathwa njengokuhlobene nezidakamizwa,izisulu ngokusobala zantshontshwa yonke imali, ubucwebe, amakhadi asebhange, izingubo nomakhalekhukhwini, ngaphambi kokuba kuboshwe amatshe noma izitini ezinyaweni zabo futhi ngemuva kwalokho, baminzaUMajola noNkosi babezohlala besebenza njengeqembu, besabisa ababezama ngabo ngemimese nangezibhamu.Babehlala behlasela abantu ngezikhathi zakusihlwa noma ebusuku kakhulu emicimbini noma ezindaweni zepikiniki, kuyilapho izisulu bezisezimotweni zazo. [1]Izidumbu ezimbili bezisesimeni esithuthuke kakhulu sokubola kangangokuba bezingaziwa, kanti futhi namaphoyisa akholelwa ukuthi kungenzeka abengabokufika. [2] [2] 
Yize le micimbi yethusa abantu bendawo, yadala ukuthi izitolo zivalwe futhi ibhizinisi lilahlekelwe yimali eningi, [1] iningi lezigameko azikaze zibikwe kuziphathimandla, njengoba eminye yemibhangqwana ehlaselwe ibingabobulili obufanayo noma ibingafuni ukuveza obala.Ngokushoda kwanoma yiluphi uhlobo lobufakazi, kufaka phakathi izigxivizo zeminwe, leli cala labonakala linzima kakhulu, noma ngabe labe selinikezwa uSuperintendent Piet Byleveld, i-sleuth eyaziwayo ngezinga layo eliphumelelayo lokuxazulula amacala. 
NgoFebhuwari 8, 2001, kwaboshwa amadoda amabili eKensington ngokutholakala nezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni. 
Lawo madoda amabili kwakunguMajola noNkosi. 
Ngenkathi aziswa ngalokhu kuboshwa, uByleveld wavele washayela esiteshini ngenhloso yokuhambisa izigebengu eBrixton . 
Ngenkathi esemotweni ehlukile noNkosi, wabona lo muntu onemisipha, okwakungekude kangako ukuthi ubeyiqhude futhi ethatha ukuboshwa kwakhe njengehlaya, ngokuzumayo kwase kuqale ukuthuthumela. 
Kamuva, lapho bebuzwa ngokwehlukana, zombili izigebengu zavuma amacala azo, kufaka phakathi ezinye ezazingasolwa kuzo: kufaka phakathi abantu ababanjwa inkunzi eRhodes Park; ukubulawa kukamshumayeli wamaBaptist ngoMeyi 15, 2000 kanye nokubulawa komngani wakhe ngesikhathi kugqekezwa. 
UMajola noNkosi baphinde babulala noma yimuphi umuntu ohlanganyele naye othola ukuthi bakuphi, wababulala ngendlela efanayo naleyo abenza ngayo nezinye izisulu.UByleveld ukwazile ukubaxhumanisa nokubulala okungenani okungama-21 nokuzama ukubulala. 
Laba bobabili baquliswa icala ngoSepthemba 2002. 
Ngesikhathi kuqhubeka lolu hlelo, unina kaNkosi, uRuth Tshehlo, unxuse inkantolo ukuthi ibe nesandla enganeni yakhe “eyizibulo”, ngoba ubethembekile. [1]Khonamanjalo, uMajola uwaphikile wonke amacala, esola ukulahlwa kwakhe yicala ngobukhulu babamhlophe . [2]Azange asebenze amaqhinga obugebengu, njengoba uMajola alahlwa ngamacala angu-8 okubulala, ayi-19 okuphanga kuhlonyiwe, no-5 wokuzama ukubulala; ngenkathi uNkosi etholwa enamacala amane okubulala, ayi-14 okubamba inkunzi kuhlonyiwe, amahlanu okuzama ukubulala nelokushaya intombi yakhe eyayikhulelwe ngaleso sikhathi, uJabulile Lushaba, ayekade eziqhayisa ngokuba "yiBruma Lake Killer". 
Alfred Bheki Qabula (1942-2002) kwaba imbongi, umbhali kanye ukuhwebelana wezinyunyana e Durban, South Africa ngo 1980.Wayengumshayeli wokuphakamisa imfoloko futhi eyisishoshovu kwi-Metal and Allied Worker's Union.UQabula waziwa kakhulu "njengembongi yomsebenzi" owayephethe ukuguqulelwa kwezinhlobo zezinkondlo zesiZulu zibe izingqikimba zempilo yansuku zonke. 
UQabula uthathe lezi zinhlobo zezinkondlo zendabuko wajova izingqikithi ezivela empilweni yansuku zonke nasemsebenzini, ebhekana nezihloko zokusinda nokulwela ubumbano emsebenzini. 
UQabula wahlaselwa yisifo sohlangothi okhubazekile ngo-1998 nokuhlaselwa okwesibili ngo-2002 ngaphambi kokuba ashone ngo-Okthoba walowo nyaka. 
"Njengoba uQabula eqhubekele phambili 'emazweni omoya onamandla,' akumele sikhohlwe ukuthi washona ebumpofu nokuthi amazwi akhe okugcina asephepheni, inkondlo eyodwa eqedile namane angaqediwe, angamazwi abhalwe umunyu. 
Waphoxeka kakhulu ngokuthi inguquko yakhe 'yathathwa ngumhlaba womakhalekhukhwini nezikhwama. 
Njengoba futhi ethola ukuthi amathalente akhe njengomuntu womlomo alahleka emoyeni wenguquko, lezi zinkondlo eziphazamisayo zandulela ukuthunjwa kwakhe. 
"Ngempela, akekho noyedwa kithi owasindiswa kulezi zinkondlo - 'Umgwaqo Omude' kusigxeka sonke endleleni yethu eya engcebweni nasemandleni, sigibela emhlane wakhe ngezicathulo ezinamahliphihliphi. 
I-His 'Of Land, Bones kanye neMali' kungenye yezindlela ezijule kakhulu zokuhlala kwethu okuxoxiswene ngakho - okusikhumbuza 'abafileyo abangenalutho.' 
Futhi lezo 'zikhathi zesomiso azinayo uthingo.' " 
Imisebenzi 
U-Alfred Themba Qabula wazalelwa eFlagstaff, eMampondweni (ingxenye yeNingizimu Afrika yanamuhla ngo-1942. 
Uyise wayengumsebenzi wasemayini ofudukayo owashona lapho u-Alfred esemncane kakhulu. 
Qabula kwaba obambe iqhaza kwi-1959 Pondoland Rebellion.Ngemuva kokuhluleka kwayo, wabalekela ehlathini, lapho ajoyina khona i- African National Congress. 
UQabula wathuthela edolobhaneni elinezimayini zegolide iCarletonville wangena kwezentengiselwano yokwakha, ephila impilo encane emahostela nasezinkomponi zale ndawo.Wayesebenza njengomuntu osebenza ngempilo ngemfoloko futhi wayekhuthele kwi-Metal and Allied Worker's Union. 
Ngo-1969 uQabula wathuthela eThekwini, lapho aqala khona ukuhlala emjondolo e- Amaouti eNanda . [1]Wahlala kulowo muzi kwaze kwaba ngu-1985. 
Kusukela ngo-1985 kuya ku-1988, uQabula waphoqeleka ukuba acashe ngenxa yokweseka kwakhe i- United Democratic Front, okuyinhlangano eyayilwa nokuqhubeka kohlelo lobandlululo eNingizimu Afrika. 
UQabula ubengumholi oqavile weDurban Workers Cultural Local, okuyiqembu eliqubule imisebenzi ebanzi yamasiko enhlanganweni yezinyunyana ngokuxhasa imidlalo yeshashalazi, ezomculo, nobuciko bemibhalo. 
Qabula walo wayenguNkulunkulu ngokwakhe at inhliziyo yalesi ukunyakaza njengoba revivalist we Zulu isibongo isiko senkondlo. 
UThemba Zwane (owazalwa 3 Agasti 1989) is a South African professional footballer odlala njengoba mdlali ngoba iPremier Soccer League club weMamelodi Sundowns kanye ithimba lakuleli kazwelonke. 
Izinhlonipho 
U-Ella Aiko Anderson (owazalwa ngoMashi 26, 2005) [1] ungumlingisi waseMelika.Uqale umsebenzi wakhe njengomlingisi wezingane, edlala indawo kaPiper ochungechungeni lweNickelodeon uHenry Danger,futhi waziwa ngokudlala indawo kaRachel Rawlings kwifilimu yamahlaya ka-2016 iThe Boss . 
U-Anderson waqala njengomlingisi wezingane, esebenza kusukela eneminyaka emihlanu.Udlale uHazel eDisney Channel ' ANT Farm ngo-2011. 
Ubuye wavela esiqeshini esisodwa seRaising Hope, njengentombazanyana ethola inaliti inamathele esandleni sayo. 
Uphinde wavela ezinhlelweni zeDisney ngo-2013, ekubeni kwiDog ne-Blog njengoDarcy Stewart noLiv noMaddie njengoJenny Keene.Ngo-2014, wadlala iMitzy kuNickelodeon's A Fairly Odd Summer .U-Anderson ukhombise uPiper Hart emdlalweni owuchungechunge waseNickelodeon uHenry Danger kusukela ngo-2014,futhi wabonakala kwifilimu i- Unfinished Business .Uke wadlala uRachel Rawlings kuThe Boss,noVicky ngoSuku Lomama, womabili amafilimu avela ku-2016, noJeanette Walls eneminyaka eyi-11 bebhekene noBrie Larson kwifilimu ka-2017 iThe Glass Castle. 
Ngo-2017 uBarros wafanelekela isikhundla se-junior elite ku-KPAC National Qualifier. 
Ngasekupheleni kukaJulayi wancintisana e- US US 2017 lapho abeka khona u-18 kuyo yonke indawo.Wakufanelekela ukuncintisana kumaNational Championship ka -2017 lapho abeka khona ama-23 kuyo yonke indawo. 
Ngo-2018 uBarros wancintisana ekamu lokuqinisekisa lapho abeka khona isine phakathi kwabancane ngemuva kukaSelisa Lee, uKayla DiCello, noJordan Bowers .Ngenxa yokusebenza kwakhe waqokwa eqenjini elalizoqhudelana kumaJunior Pan American Championship ; ngenxa yalokho wengezwe naseqenjini lesizwe elincane .Ngasekupheleni kwenyanga uBarros waya e-Italy ukuyoqhudelana kwi- 2018 City of Jesolo Trophy ehamba nozakwabo eqenjini lakhe uRagan Smith no- Emma Malabuyo . 
Ngenkathi elapho uBarros wayencintisana kuphela ekuzivocavoca phansi nasegumbini lokulala njengoba alimala iqakala kulokhu futhi washiya kulo mncintiswano osele.Ngenxa yokulimala waphinde wahoxa kwiPan American Championship. 
UBarros ubuyele emncintiswaneni wokuncintisana ku- 2018 US Classic ; kodwa-ke ubencintisana kuphela ngemigoqo engalingani nebhalansi, waqeda owesi-13 nowama-31 ngokulandelana.Uqhudelane nxazonke kumaNational Championship ka-2018 lapho ngemuva kosuku lokuqala ebekwe endaweni yeshumi nesikhombisa.Uhoxile osukwini lwesibili lomncintiswano. 
UBarros uqhudelane eParkettes National Qualifier lapho aqede khona endaweni yesibili ngemuva kukaMjae Frazier waphinde waqeqeshelwa ukuba yi-elite elite.NgoJuni uBarros uqhudelane kumaJunior World Championships Trials lapho alala khona isithathu kuyo yonke indawo futhi waqokelwa eqenjini ukungenela umncintiswano wokuqala weJunior World Championship kanye noSkye Blakely noKayla DiCello. 
KumaJunior World Championships uBarros usize iqembu lathola ubhedu ngemuva kweRussia neChina futhi laqeda endaweni yesihlanu kuyo yonke indawo. 
Ufanelekele umdlalo wamanqamu wokugcina endaweni yokuqala. Ngesikhathi sokugcina komcimbi uBarros wabeka indawo yesihlanu egumbini. 
UBarros wazalelwa uBifredo noCarine Barros e2005 e- Atlanta, Georgia . 
Unezelamani ezine. 
I-Kseniya Olehivna Baylo ( Ukrainian , owazalwa ngomhla ka-25 kuFebhuwari 2005) ungumtshuzi wase-Ukraine. 
Ngo-2021, uBaylo no- Oleksiy Sereda bathola indondo yegolide emcimbini oxubile we-10 m platform synchro emqhudelwaneni we- 2020 European Aquatics Championships owawuseBudapest, eHungary.UBaylo noSofiya Lyskun bathola indondo yethusi emcimbini wabesifazane wesikhulumi se-10 m synchro. 
U-Oliver "Ollie" Bearman (owazalwa ngomhlaka 8 Meyi 2005) ungumshayeli wamahhashi waseBrithani, ongenela umqhudelwano we-2021 BRDC British Formula 3 Championship kanye ne- Italian F4 Championship, eshayela iFortec Motorsports neVan Amersfoort Racing ngokulandelana. 
UGavin Beavers (owazalwa ngo-Ephreli 29, 2005) ungumdlali webhola waseMelika odlala njengonozinti weqembu le-USL Championship Real Real Monarchs. 
I-Beavers ingumkhiqizo wesikhungo sentsha iReal Lake Lake. 
Wenze i-debut yakhe ephezulu kwiReal Monarchs, i-Real Salt Lake eqenjini le-USL Championship, ngoJuni 26, 2021, eqala emdlalweni we-1-1.Lapho eneminyaka engu-16, iBeververs yaba ngunozinti omncane kunabo bonke emlandweni weligi. 
UNicolas Joseph Bechtel (owazalwa ngoFebhuwari 15, 2005) ungumlingisi waseMelika.Waziwa kakhulu ngokuveza kwakhe uSpencer Cassadine (2013-2020) esibhedlela i- ABC 's General kanye neDisney Channel sitcom Stuck in the Middle . 
UBechtel uyindodana kaNick noJulie Bechtel.Wazalwa ngoFebhuwari 15, 2005 eFontana, eCalifornia .Unodadewabo osekhulile, uNicole.Igama lakhe eliphakathi nguJoseph, ngemuva kukayisemkhulu ongumama wakhe, uBechtel asondelene kakhulu naye. 
Amafilimu 
Umsebenzi Wokudlala 
Ku-2018, uBedard wavela njengethemba leHockey elincane, wabizwa ngokuthi "ikusasa leHockey" ku-athikili yiThe Hockey News .UBedard udlale iHockey encane neWest Vancouver Academy Prep yeCanada Sport School Hockey League.Ngenkathi edlala namaqembu esikole i-U15 ne-U18 alesi sikole, uBedard wahola iligi ngamagoli namaphuzu futhi waqokwa njengomdlali obaluleke kakhulu kuyo yomibili le minyaka. 
UMandisa Mfeka ungumshayeli wezindiza waseNingizimu Afrika.Uyaziwa njengomshayeli wamabhanoyi wokuqala wesifazane eNingizimu Afrika. 
UMfeka uzalelwe eNtuzuma KwaZulu-Natal . 
Wayenemfundo ephakeme eQueensburgh Girls 'High School.Ngo-2008, wajoyina iSouth African Air Force futhi wabhaliswa eCentral Flying School eLangebaan, eWestern Cape . 
Uthole izimpiko zakhe ngo-2011.Ngesikhathi uMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa egcotshwa, yena kanye nabanye abashayeli bezindiza besifazane, bathatha baya esibhakabhakeni embukisweni womoya wokwakhiwa koKlebe. 
Uyaziwa ukuthi uhambe ngendiza eyodwa kwezinhlanu zeSA Airforce Hawk Mk 120 edlula eLoftus Versveld Stadium ePitoli ngesikhathi kugcotshwa umongameli. 
UXolile Yawa (owazalwa ngomhlaka 29 Septhemba 1962 eLady Frere, e- Eastern Cape ) ungumgijimi osethathe umhlalaphansi waseNingizimu Afrika - ZA.Wazikhethela ekugijimeni amabanga amade, kuhlanganisa namamarathoni . 
Waziwa kakhulu njengomnqobi weBerlin Marathon ka-1993.Kuma- Olimpiki asehlobo e-1992, wayengu-13 kumamitha wamadoda ayi-10,000. [1]Wabuye wamela iNingizimu Afrika kuma- Olimpiki Asehlobo ngo-1996. 
Kuma- 1992 Championships e-Athletics, wawina iBronze kumamitha ayi-10000. 
Emqhudelwaneni kazwelonke waseNingizimu Afrika, wawina lo mjaho wamamitha ayi-10 000 amahlandla ayisishiyagalolunye (1985-1990, 1992, 1994, 1996) neHalf marathon kabili (1986 no-1988). 
Mbali Ntuli (owazalwa ngo- c. 28 Mashi 1988 ) ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika futhi uyilungu leDemocratic Alliance . 
UnguMqondisi Wemikhankaso Yesifundazwe owayekade eseqembu eKZN. 
Njengamanje usebenza njengelungu lesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natali futhi usebenza njengoMkhulumeli WeDA KZN Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana Nezindaba Zendabuko (CoGTA). 
Phambilini uke waba ngumholi weDemocratic Alliance Youth.Wakhethwa kulesi sikhundla ngoMeyi 2013. 
U-Ayanda yifilimu yakuleli yango-2015 eqondiswa nguSara Blecher futhi elingisa indawo kaFulu Mugovhani, OC Ukeje, noNthati Moshesh.Isihloko somkhosi wefilimu bekungu-Ayanda neMechanic. 
Le filimu yathathwa ngoNovemba 2015 yinkampani ezimele yokusabalalisa amafilimu i-ARRAY.Ifilimu ithole ukubuyekezwa okuhle. 
Ifilimu ithole ukubuyekezwa okuhle kakhulu lapho idedelwa. 
U-Ingvil Hareide Aarbakke (Julayi 26, 1970 - Novemba 23, 2005) wayengumculi waseNorway.Yena nomyeni wakhe Ion Sorvin wayewukuphela amandla ezihambayo ngemuva Copenhagen ezisekelwe collective N55 ngo-1994. 
Impilo 
Impilo 
ULora Aborn wazalelwa eNew York City futhi waqala ukufunda upiyano, ithiyori yomculo nokwakhiwa e- Effa Ellis Perfield School of Music. 
Uqhubeke nokufunda upiyano nezwi eCalifornia futhi wadlala eqenjini le-jazz.Ufunde e- Oberlin Conservatory lapho afundela khona ukwakheka ngaphansi kukaDkt George W. Andrews. 
U-Aborn uqhubeke nezifundo zakhe e- American Conservatory eChicago ngaphansi kukaJohn Palmer futhi wanikezwa indondo yegolide yokwakheka lapho ethweswa iziqu.Uqambe imisebenzi eminingi ethunyelwe, futhi umculo wakhe udlalwe waqoshwa e-United States, China nase-Europe.Wahlonishwa ohlwini lwabaqambi besifazane abaphambili baseMelika. 
Kwaphela iminyaka eminingi, u-Aborn wayengu-organist, umqondisi womculo nomqambi wezindlu e- Unitarian Universalist Church, e-Unity Temple kaFrank Lloyd Wright.Washada noHarry Busck, umthengisi wezincwadi zakudala owafa ngo-1999,futhi waba namadodakazi amabili. 
[1] U-Aborn ushone ngo-Agasti 25, 2005, eChicago. [2] 
Imsebenzi 
U-Ahmad Nasser Eid Abdullah Al-Fajri Al-Azimi, futhi, u- Abu Omar Al-Kuwaiti no- Abu Zaid (1972 - 16 Febhuwari 2005) wayeyi- Kuwaiti futhi esolwa njenge-ejenti ye -al-Qaeda esebenza kuqala e-Afghanistan futhi kamuva e- Chechnya nase indawo ebanzi yeCaucasus. 
U-Abu Zaid wasebenza njengomlingisi waseKwaiti ezinhlelweni zezingane ze-TV, waze waphendukela enkolweni futhi waqala ukusebenza njenge- Imam eSafwan Bin Omayah Mosque yaseKuwait City, yize ngokushesha waxoshwa ngenxa yokuqoqa iminikelo ngokungemthetho kulabo ababehamba ngama-mosque.Ngo-1998 uqale waya e-Afghanistan lapho kubikwa ukuthi waqeqeshwa khona ekamu lokuqeqesha i -al-Qaeda Al Farouq, kwathi ngo-Okthoba 1999 wadlulela eChechnya.Wayesolwa nguhulumeni waseRussia ngokuhlasela kwamaphekula okuningi,kufaka phakathi ukubandakanyeka ekuhleleni inkinga yokubanjwa kwabafundi esikoleni iBeslan . [2] [3] 
Ngo-16 Febhuwari 2005, u-Abu Zaid washona ngemuva kokuba ezungezwe amabutho akhethekile aseRussia endlini yakhe ephephile e- Ingushetia . [1] [2] [3] Ubeshade nonkosikazi waseChechen, abenamadodana amabili asindile. 
USkye Blakely (owazalwa ngoFebhuwari 4, 2005) ungumvocavoci wobuciko waseMelika futhi uyilungu leqembu lesizwe labesifazane lokuzivocavoca lase -United States.Ubeyilungu leqembu elidle ubhedu emcimbini wokuqala weJunior World Championship .Ungudadewabo omncane womzimba wokuzivocavoca uSloane Blakely . 
Omncane 
UBlakely wazalelwa uSteven noStephanie Blakely e2005 eDallas, eTexas futhi unengane eyodwa. 
Ekuqaleni kuka-2018 Blakely wancintisana eBuckeye National Qualifier naseWOGA Classic, lapho abeka khona indawo yesithupha kuyo yonke indawo. 
Kamuva wancintisana e-International Gymnix lapho abeka khona ishumi nanhlanu kuyo yonke indawo nasesizindeni sesihlanu emigoqweni engalingani.Ekuqaleni kukaJulayi, wancintisana e-American Classic lapho abeka khona indawo yesithathu kuyo yonke indawo ngemuva kukaKayla DiCello noKonnor McClain .Kamuva ngaleyo nyanga wancintisana e- 2018 US Classic lapho abeka khona indawo yesithupha kuyo yonke indawo nasesithathu egumbini.Ngo-Agasti Blakely wancintisana ku- 2018 US National Gymnastics Championship .Uqede endaweni yesine kuyo yonke indawo ezungeze ngemuva kukaLeanne Wong, uDiCello, noSunisa Lee futhi wanqoba isiliva ekuzivocavoca phansi nethusi egumbini. 
Ngenxa yalokho wengezwa eqenjini lesizwe okokuqala ngqa. 
U-Iulian Boiko (owazalwa ngomhlaka-22 Septhemba 2005 eKyiv, e-Ukraine ) ungumdlali odlala ngobuhlakani wase-Ukraine. 
NgoMeyi 2019, uBoiko wabhalisa ikhefu lakhe lokuqala elisemthethweni ngesikhathi ehlulwa ngo-4-3 bedlala noBilly Joe Castle eQ School 2019 - Umcimbi 2. 
UJhyllianne "Jillian" Wardë (owazalwa ngoFebhuwari 23, 2005 [1] [2] ) ungumlingisi osemusha wasePhilippines - waseMelika, imodeli yezentengiso, i- video blogger nomculi.Uyaziwa ngokulingisa indawo kaGertrudis "Trudis" Capili kwi- GMA Network 's Sine Novela Trudis Liit noDonna Marie "Mayi" Madreal / Claveria emdlalweni wantambama iPrima Donnas . 
Amafilimu 
UWang Yichun (owazalwa ngomhla ka-4 Ephreli 2005) uyabhukudi waseChina.Ubencintisana emcimbini wabamvemvane besifazane obungamamitha angama-50 kuma- 2018 Asian Games, ngokuwina indondo yesiliva. 
Ngo-15 Julayi 1961, uBari wazibulala ngokweqa phambi kwesitimela esasiza eMoscow. 
Nina Karlovna Bari (19 Novemba 1901 - 15 Julayi 1961) wayeyisazi sezibalo saseSoviet esaziwa ngomsebenzi wakhe ochungechungeni lwe-trigonometric . [1] 
UNina Bari wazalelwa eRussia ngomhlaka 19 Novemba 1901, indodakazi ka-Olga noKarl Adolfovich Bari, ongudokotela.Ngo-1918, waba ngomunye wabesifazane bokuqala ukwamukelwa eMnyangweni Wezemvelo Nezibalo eMoscow State University.Wathweswa iziqu ngo-1921 — eminyakeni emithathu nje kuphela ngemuva kokungena eyunivesithi. 
Ngemuva kokuthweswa iziqu, uBari waqala umsebenzi wakhe wokufundisa. 
Ufundise eMoscow Forestry Institute, eMoscow Polytechnic Institute, naseSverdlov Communist Institute .UBari wafaka isicelo futhi wathola okuwukuphela kobudlelwano bokucwaninga obukhokhelwe obunikezwe yi- Research Institute of Mathematics and Mechanics esanda kudalwa. 
Njengomfundi, uBari wayedonswa eqenjini eliphakeme elalibizwa ngeLuzitania — inhlangano engakahleleki yezemfundo nezenhlalo.Wafunda uchungechunge lwe-trigonometric nemisebenzi ngaphansi kokuqeqeshwa kukaNikolai Luzin, eba ngomunye wabafundi bakhe bezinkanyezi. [1] Wethula imiphumela esemqoka yocwaningo lwakhe kuMoscow Mathematical Society ngo-1922 — owesifazane wokuqala ukukhuluma nomphakathi. 
USergei Nikolaevich Bobokhov (1858-16 Novemba 1889) wayengumshisekeli wezinguquko waseRussia,owazibulala njengombhikisho wokushaywa kowesifazane waseSiberia. 
Wazalelwa emndenini ocebile waseRussia, wafundiswa esikhungweni sokuvivinya umzimba eSaratov, futhi ngesikhathi esemusha wajoyina inhlangano 'yabantu' lapho abantu abasebancane abaphakathi nendawo bevakashela amadolobhana benethemba lokuthuthukisa isimo sabalimi baseRussia.Ngokungafani nabanye abaningi, wayegwema ukuboshwa, kwathi ngo-1875 wangena eyunivesithi eSt-Petersburg, kodwa waxoshwa ngo-1876 wabuyiselwa eSaratov ngokuhlanganyela embhikishweni wabafundi. 
Ngonyaka olandelayo, wadingiselwa e- Arkhangelsk ngenxa yokusabalalisa inkulumo-ze yabantu.Uzamile ukweqa, kodwa wabanjwa emgwaqeni.Wayesolwa ngokudubula emaphoyiseni ngesikhathi eboshwa, yize athi wayedubule emoyeni, enethemba lokuthi uzoqulwa phambi kwabantu futhi azokwazi ukusebenzisa icala lakhe ukudalula ubushiqela bomthetho wamaTsarist.Ugwetshwe intambo yinkantolo yamasosha e-Arkhangel, kodwa ngenxa yobusha bakhe - wayeneminyaka engu-19 - isigwebo sehliselwa eminyakeni engu-20 besebenza kanzima eKara katorga .Uchithe iminyaka eyishumi endaweni yamacala eKara, esebenza ezimayini.Lapho ezwa ngokufa kwesiboshwa sezombusazwe uNadezhda Sigida, owayeshaywe imivimbo eyikhulu, wayengomunye weziboshwa zesilisa ezingama-20 ezazifaka ushevu ngokubhikisha, ngomhlaka 15 Novemba 1889.Iningi lasinda, kepha uBobokhov usweleke ngosuku olulandelayo. 
UVladimir Davydov ( December 14 [ - December 27 1906 )wayeyindodana yesibili ka-Lev no-Alexandra Davydov, nomshana womqambi uPyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky, owayembiza ngokuthi "Bob". [1] 
UTchaikovsky unikele ngeSithupha Symphony, iPathétique,kuDavydov, [1] kanye ne-Children's Album yakhe yomculo wepiyano, u-Op. 39. [1] 
U-Aiza Gazuyeva (1983 - Novemba 29, 2001) wayengowesifazane waseChechen, owayaziwa ngokuzibulala okwabulala uGeneral Gaidar Gadzhiyev, umphathi omkhulu webutho laseRussia, ngoNovemba 29, 2001.Yize ebenogqozi uqobo futhi engahambisani nezepolitiki, bekungelinye lama- shahidka (i-Chechen abesifazane abazibulala ngamabhomu ) aqala ukwenzeka eRussia, futhi uGazuyeva waba ngumuntu odume kancane phakathi kwemizwa elwa neRussia emphakathini waseChechen. 
U-Aiza Gazuyeva (obuye ahunyushwe njengoGazueva futhi owaziwa ngokuhlukile njengo-Aizan, Elza, Luisa noma uLuiza ) kukholakala ukuthi wazalwa cishe ngonyaka we-1983, futhi eneminyaka ephakathi kwengu-18 noma engama-20 ubudala ngesikhathi sokufa kwakhe. [1]Kubikwa ukuthi uGazuyeva wayelahlekelwe yizihlobo eziyi-16 eMpini Yesibili YaseChechen, kufaka nomyeni wakhe (ayeshade naye ezinyangeni ezimbili kuphela ngaphambili),abafowabo ababili nomzala.Umfowabo okhubazekile, owayelahlekelwe yimilenze yomibili ngenxa yamabhomu agqitshwayo eMpini Yokuqala YaseChechen,wadutshulwa wabulawa ngaphandle kwesizathu ngamasosha aseRussia aseduzane nomuzi wakubo.Umkhuzi wamasosha aseRussia kule ndawo, uGeneral Gaidar Gadzhiyev,wayengathandwa kakhulu kubantu bendawo futhi wayevame ukusolwa ngokwenza isihluku kubantu. 
Ngokusobala uGadzhiyev wayebize uGazuyeva, lapho abulala khona ngesihluku umyeni wakhe oboshiwe ngommese wase edonsela ikhanda lakhe enxebeni lesisu elalivulekile.Ngokusho kolunye uhlobo, ujenene utshele uGazuyeva ukuthi wabulala umyeni wakhe ngezandla zakhe ngesikhathi ephenywa. [4] 
NgoNovemba 29, 2001, uGazuyeva waya eqenjini lamasosha aseRussia kubandakanya uGeneral Gadzhiyev phambi kwehhovisi lomkhuzi wamasosha (Russian : komendatura).Kubikwa ukuthi amazwi akhe okugcina athi: "Uyangibona?" noma "Usangikhumbula?" uGadzhiyev waphendula wathi: "Anginaso isikhathi sokukhuluma nawe!" . 
[1] Ngemuva kwempendulo kajenene, uGazuyeva waqhumisa inqwaba yamabhomu esandla ayefihlwe ngaphansi kwezingubo zakhe. [2]UGazuyeva nonogada ababili bakaGadzhiyev bashone ujuqu, kwalimala namanye amasosha amabili.UGadzhiyev, obegqoke ijakhethi ye-flak, walimala kanzima (kubikwa ukuthi walahlekelwa womabili amehlo nengalo eyodwa) futhi washona ngokulimala kwakhe ngemuva kwezinsuku ezi-1 kuDisemba. 
Igagasi lokujeziswa okunzima ngamasosha aseRussia kwethulwe emndenini kaGazuyeva kanye nabantu bendawo.Amasosha aqhumise ikhaya likaGazuyeva nabazali bakhe, kanye nezindlu zeminye imindeni okungenani emine, ngenkathi amadoda amaningi omndeni wakwaGazuyev eboshiwe futhi eshaywa.Ngokushesha ngemuva kwalesi sigameko, abantu abangu-72 bavalelwa edolobheni i-Urus-Martan kanti abanye babo babikwa ukuthi banyamalala . 
Ngosuku olulodwa ngemuva kokushona kukaGadzhiyev, abantu abaningana bagcinwa esigodini sase-Alkhan-Yurt esifundeni i- Urus-Martanovsky District, kwathi abanye babo batholwa bebulewe. 
NgoDisemba 13, kwatholakala izidumbu ezonakele zamadoda amaningana abulawa ngamathuluzi aqhumayo eChechnya futhi kamuva zakhonjwa njengezakhamuzi zemizi emithathu esifundeni i-Urus-Martan ezazinyamalale ekuqaleni kukaDisemba, kufaka phakathi ezine ezaziphakathi kwababoshwe e-Alkhan-Yurt: ULom-Ali Yunusov, isihlobo sakhe uMusa Yunusov, uShamel Dzhemaldayev no-Aslan Taramov. 
UJulius Janonis (4 Ephreli 1896 - 30 Meyi 1917) wayeyimbongi nombhali waseLithuania.Wazalelwa emndenini wabalimi abampofu, waqala ukubhala nokuhumusha izinkondlo eneminyaka eyi-14. 
Ukufunda kuMaironis, wabhala ngemvelo nokuhlupheka kwabampofu. 
Izinkondlo zakhe zokuqala zanyatheliswa ngo-1912.Ngenkathi esafunda, waqala ukunikela ngama- athikili emaphephandabeni aseLithuania futhi wajoyina imisebenzi ye-leftist aušrininkai. 
Wayengumbusi wentando yeningi kwezenhlalo kepha wayencike kakhulu ebukhomanisini kanti izinkondlo zakhe zaqhubeka nokuxokozela kwezepolitiki.Imibono yakhe iba nkulu kakhulu lapho ngesikhathi seMpi Yezwe I ethuthelwa eVoronezh futhi kamuva nasePetrograd . 
Ujoyine iRussian Social Democratic Labour Party (bolsheviks) futhi waboshwa kabili ngenxa yezinguquko. 
Wangenwa isifo sofuba futhi, engathandi ukuba umthwalo, wazibulala eneminyaka engu-21. 
Kwi- SSR yaseLithuania,uJanonis udunyiswe "njengembongi yokuqala yabasebenzi bezikhundla ". 
UVictor Khrisanfovich Kandinsky(Ephreli 6, 1849, Byankino, Nerchinsky District, Siberia - Julayi 3, 1889, Saint Petersburg ) wayengudokotela wezifo zengqondo waseRussia, futhi wayengumzala wesibili kumculi odumile uWassily Kandinsky.Wazalelwa eSiberia emndenini omkhulu wosomabhizinisi abacebile ngokweqile.UVictor Kandinsky wayengomunye wabantu abadumile kwezengqondo zaseRussia futhi ephawuleka kakhulu ngeminikelo yakhe ekuqondeni ukusangana. 
U-Almir Izmailovich Kayumov ( 30 December 1964 - 7 Agasti 2013) kwaba umdlali webhola wase Russia kanye unompempe. 
NgoNovemba 9, 2009, kwabikwa ukuthi uKayumov wazama ukuzibulala ngokuziphonsa ngefasitela lendlu yakhe. 
Izingxoxo zamaphoyisa zamkhulumela phansi, nokho, futhi walethwa esibhedlela sabagula ngengqondo .[2]Kamuva uKayumov wakuphika lokhu, wathi wayelashwa ngendlela ejwayelekile. 
UKayumov ushone ngo-7 Agasti 2013, ngesikhathi eshayiswa yiloli leGazelle eSmolensk.Ngokusho abaphenyi, ukushona kwakhe ukuzibulala njengoba amavidyo ukubhekwa ikhamera wabonisa ukuthi wavele phambi iloli. 
USergei Gustavovich Legat wazalwa ngomhlaka 27 Septhemba 1875, eMoscow.Umfowabo omncane kaNikolai Legat, wafunda esikoleni sobukhosi se-ballet noPavel Gerdt, uChristian Johansson, uLev Ivanov nomfowabo. 
ULegat wajoyina iMariinsky Theatre ngo-1894 futhi ngokushesha waba ngumculi. 
Uthathekile ngemidlalo yakhe yesitayela futhi wafundisa, nabafundi kubandakanya uVaslav Nijinsky.I-Legat iqhamuke nendima ebibili yeNutcracker / i-Prince ku -ballet odumile kaTchaikovsky . 
Washada noMarie Petipa (1857-1930). 
Ukwahlukahluka okuningi kwamadoda okwakhiwa kokuphindaphindwa kwendabuko kwe-ballet yakhelwe ikakhulukazi kuye ekuqaleni kwekhulu lama-20. 
Ekugqashukeni koVukelo Lokuqala LweRussia, uLegat waxabana neziphathimandla, kwathi ngo-1 Novemba 1905, wazibulala eSt.Petersburg, wamshaya umphimbo ngensingo. 
U-Yelena Miroshina (Juni 5, 1974 - Disemba 18, 1995) kwaba umdivi wase Russia waziwa kakhulu ngokuwina kabili wendondo yegolide ngesikhathi Championships European e yabesifazane 10 m platform. nokuwina isiliva lama-Olimpiki e-Barcelona lapho ukutshuza kwakhe okunamandla kumthathe khona kusuka ku-8 ngemuva kwemizuliswano engu-4 yamanqamu kuya ku-2. 
UMiroshina wancintisana kuma- Olimpiki Asehlobo amabili alandelanayo, futhi wamela amazwe amabili: iSoviet Union (1988) neQembu Elibumbene (1992). 
Wayesebenzisana noSpartak ngesikhathi esebenza.UMiroshina ubengumhlanganyeli omncane kunabo bonke phakathi kwabangu-89 (amadoda angama-49 nabesifazane abangama-40) abavela emazweni angama-31 eSeoul Games, neminyaka eyi-14 nezinsuku eziyi-105. 
U-Promptov wazalelwa emndenini wesikhulu esiphezulu semali engenayo yaseRussia.Waya esikoleni eKostroma futhi waphumelela esikoleni sokuzivocavoca saseNechaev eMoscow. 
Noma esengumfana omncane, wayezithanda izinyoni kepha wakhetha ukwenza izifundo zoology yokulinga kune-ornithology.Kucatshangwa ukuthi ukukhetha kwakhe kungenzeka ukuthi kwasizwa izibopho zomndeni kuNikolai Koltsov Omama bakaPromptov noKoltsov babehlobene futhi uKoltsov wathonya iziphathimandla ukuthi zivumele uPromptov afunde izakhi zofuzo zezinyoni ngaphansi kuka- Alexander Serebrovsky, owayengumfundi waseKoltsov, kuphrojekthi exhaswa yi-People's Commissariat of Agriculture. 
U-Albert Alexeyevich Razin ( 12 June 1940 - 10 Septhemba 2019) lwakwazi Isi-Udmurt ulimi amalungelo letiphilako Neopaganist aphinga bendabuko self-immolation (tipshar) maphakathi Izhevsk njengoba isenzo wokumelana Inqubomgomo yolimi likahulumeni Russian kanye Russification we Udmurt abantu. 
UTatiana Rosenthal noma uRozenthal (1885-1921) wayengu-psychoanalyst woMbuso WaseRussia,engudokotela futhi onguchwepheshe kwezinzwa. [1] 
Imisebenzi 
Indodana yomthengisi ocebile e- Ufa, uSazonov ekuqaleni wayeyinkolo ejulile futhi eyinkosi njengomfundi, efuna ukuba ngudokotela.Kodwa ngemuva kokuboshwa, ukubhaxabulwa, nokuxoshwa, waba yiSocialist Revolutionary, wahlela izifundo zobusoshiyali, waphendukela unomphela uhulumeni.Uthe "Akulula ukwenqaba imithetho eyisisekelo yabantu, kepha ngiphoqelekile kuyo.Kusukela manje ngizinikela ekuvuleleni impi nohulumeni. . . " 
After assassinating Von Plehve, Sazonov was asked by a revolutionary how he felt, and he responded, "Pride and joy...only that."[1] 
UNadezhda Konstantinovna Sigida (née Malaxiano(1862-1889), wayeyinguquko yaseRussia, iqhawekazi lenhlekelele yeKara katorga yango -1889. 
Lo mcimbi uvuse ukusabela komphakathi. 
Imibiko ngezehlakalo zango-1889 yashicilelwa emaphephandabeni amakhulu aseRussia nawaseYurophu, kufaka phakathi izihloko ezimbili ephephandabeni laseBrithani iThe TimesNgenxa yalokho, uKara katorga wavalwa, futhi ukujeziswa ngomzimba kwabesifazane ababoshiwe nama- dvorianins (izikhulu) kwaqedwa ngumthetho kaMashi 28, 1893. 
UNadezhda Malaxiano wazalelwa emndenini wamaGrikhi edolobheni laseTaganrog ngo-1862.Waphumelela eTaganrog Mariinskaya Girls Gymnasium, futhi wafundisa esikoleni sesonto. 
Umndeni ubuhlala endlini ekuGogolevski Street 8, eduze kwendlu yomndeni ka- Anton Chekhov.UNadezhda Malaxiano wazibandakanya neqembu iNarodnaya Volya, waba ngomunye wezishoshovu zalo eTaganrog 's printshop ngomshoshaphansi ngonyaka we-1885-1886 ku- Glushko Street 6.Wenza umshado wokukhohlisa no- Akim Sigida (1868-1888) ngomsebenzi wobumbano e-printshop. 
U-Irina Vyacheslavovna Murakhtaeva ; née Kolebanova ; 8 Januwari 1973 - 2 Okthoba 2020), owaziwa njengo- Irina Slavina, wayeyintatheli yaseRussia evela edolobheni laseNizhny Novgorod, umphakathi kanye nezombusazwe,futhi engumhleli omkhulu weKoza.Press. 
Ngo-2 Okthoba 2020, washona ngokuzilimaza phambi kwesakhiwo soPhiko Olukhulu loMnyango Wezangaphakathi eRussia eNizhny Novgorod Oblast (maqondana nesiteshi sedolobha iGorkovskaya). 
Ngo-2 Okthoba 2020, ngo-15: 30 (UTC +3), uSlavina wabulawa ngokuzilimaza phambi kwesakhiwo se-Main Directorate of the Ministry of the Internal Affairs of Russia for the Nizhny Novgorod Oblast.Ekubhaleni kwakhe kokugcina kuFacebook, uSlavina ucele ukuthi "kusolwe iRussian Federation ngokufa kwakhe". 
U-Irina waphumelela eNizhny Novgorod State Pedagogical University ngo-1997. 
Kusuka ngo-1995 kuya ku-2003 wasebenza njengothisha wolimi lwesiRussia nezincwadi zaseRussia ezikoleni zaseNizhny Novgorod.Futhi, wafundela ubuntatheli e-University of the Russian Academy of Education (URAO), futhi kusukela ngo-2003 waba yintatheli. 
UMoishe Tokar ( isiYiddish : משה טאָקאַר; fl. 
1905-1910) wayengumuntu owayengundlovukayiphikiswa ongumJuda owazama ukubulala ujenene waseRussia uSergei Gershelman. 
UNikolai Vasilyevich Uspensky ( Russian: ; 31 Mbasa 1837 - 2 Lwezi 1889) wayengumbhali waseRussia, futhi engumzala wombhali naye uGleb Uspensky.U-Uspensky wabhala kakhulu ngamaqiniso empilo yabampofu emaphandleni eRussia ngesikhathi se- Emancipation Act ka-1861 nguTsar Alexander II, ukuthola impumelelo ebucayi neyentengiso.Ngemuva kokubona ukwanda kokwehlukaniswa nokwehla komsebenzi, u-Uspensky wazibulala ngomhlaka 2 Novemba 1889. 
Izinhlonipho 
Ngo-1949, kwasungulwa umncintiswano waminyaka yonke wezokusubatha wokuhlonipha abazalwane, i- Brothers Znamensky Memorial.Ngo-1958 yathola isimo samazwe omhlaba futhi kamuva yaba ngumhlangano omkhulu we-IAAF. Ngo-1961 kwaqalwa isikole sezemidlalo sama-Olimpiki kanye nenkundla yezokusubatha ehambisanayo eMoscow futhi saqanjwa ngabazalwane.Umfanekiso waseSeraphim kaSarra Lebedeva ukhonjiswa eMnyuziyamu waseRussia. 
USeraphim Ivanovich Znamensky (4 Septhemba 1906 - 7 Meyi 1942) wayengumgijimi webanga eliphakathi nebanga elide waseRussia. 
UZnamensky wazalelwa emndenini wompristi futhi wayenodadewabo abane nabafowabo abahlanu; omunye wabo, uGeorgy, waba ngumlingani wakhe wokuqeqesha isikhathi eside futhi waba imbangi yakhe kwezokusubatha. 
USeraphim waqeqeshwa ngunina njengomculi; wayengumculi ophumelelayo futhi wayekwazi ukufunda nokubhala umculo weshidi. 
Owen Benjamin Smith (owazalwa 24 Meyi, 1980) kuyinto American alt kwesokudla internet ubuntu kanye nowabe ukuma-up nosomahlaya futhi umlingisi.Uqale umsebenzi wakhe njengomlingisi wamahlaya, enendima kumafilimu afaka iThe House Bunny ne- All's Faire in Love, nakuma- sitcom wethelevishini uSullivan & Son.Ngemuva kokulandela umsebenzi wakhe ekulingiseni waba ngusomahlaya ozimele. 
UBenjamin ubhekane nobunzima obukhulayo emibukisweni yokubhukha ngemuva kwezehlakalo eziningana, ezibandakanya ukuchaza umuntu "njengomuntu onukubeza ingane" ngokukhulisa ingane eyeqile kanye nokusebenzisa ubuhlanga.Imibono yakhe yezepolitiki yaba yimbi kakhulu, futhi waqala ukushicilela okuqukethwe okuningi kwezepolitiki online.Ku-2019, wayevinjelwe kumanethiwekhi amaningana omphakathi nezinkundla ezibandakanya i- Twitter, i- Facebook, i- Instagram, ne- YouTube ngokwephula izinqubomgomo zabo ngenkulumo enenzondo, futhi wathuthela ezisekelweni ezithe xaxa ze-alt-tech. 
UBenjamin wazalelwa uJohn Kares Smith noJean Troy-Smith, bobabili abangoprofesa e- Oswego State University.Ufunde ePlattsburgh State College, lapho abesebenza khona esiteshini se-TV esilawulwa ngabafundi. [1] 
U-Alex Berenson (owazalwa ngoJanuwari 6, 1973) ungumbhali waseMelika. 
Wayengumbhali wephephandaba iThe New York Times futhi ebhale amanoveli amaningana athokozisayo kanye nencwadi emayelana nokufakwa kwemali ezinkampanini.Incwadi yakhe yango-2019 ethi Tell Your Children: The Truth About Marijuana, Mental Illness and Violence yaqubula impikiswano, yathola ukusola kwabaningi emiphakathini yesayensi neyezokwelapha.Ngesikhathi sobhadane lwe-coronavirus, uBerenson uvele kaningi emithonjeni yezindaba yaseMelika, esakaza izimangalo ezingamanga nge-COVID-19 nemithi yayo yokugoma.Uchithe isikhathi esiningi salolu bhubhane ephikisa ngokuthi ubucayi baso bungaphezu kwamandla; uma nje sekukhishwe imishanguzo ye-COVID-19, wenza izimangalo ezingamanga ngokuphepha nokusebenza kwemigomo. 
Ubumomoni isiko lenkolo elihamba phambili lokuhamba kwe-Latter Day Saint ye- Restorationist Christianity.Le nhlangano yasungulwa nguJoseph Smith ngawo-1820s.ISonto likaJesu Kristu Lama-Latter-day Saints (i-LDS Church) yilona gatsha elikhulu kunawo wonke ekuhambeni kweLatter Day Saint. 
MomoniAmaMormon ayiqembu lezenkolo namasiko ahlobene neMormonism, igatsha eliyinhloko lenhlangano yeLatter Day Saint eyaqalwa nguJoseph Smith enyakatho neNew York ngesikhathi sama-1820s.Ngemuva kokushona kukaSmith ngo-1844 inhlangano yahlukana yaba ngamaqembu amaningi elandela abaholi abehlukene; iningi lilandele uBrigham Young,kanti amaqembu amancane alandela uJoseph Smith III,uSidney Rigdon, noJames Strang.Iningi lala maqembu amancane ekugcineni ahlangana eMphakathini kaKristu,futhi igama elithi Mormon ngokuvamile libhekisela kumalungu e- The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church), njengoba namuhla leli gatsha likhulu kakhulu kunawo wonke amanye ahlanganisiwe. 
(Kusukela ngo-2018, iSonto LDS liye lacela ukuthi amalungu alo abizwe ngokuthi "Abangcwele Bezinsuku Zokugcina".Abantu abakhomba njengamaMormon bangabuye babe ngokuzimela benkolo,bezwe nabangaziphathi, noma bebezinye izinkolo. 
Ingosi yekhilikithi 
UNdlovu angabhekisa ku 
Dino Ndlovu (owazalwa 15 Febhuwari 1990) umdlali oqeqeshiwe webhola odlala njengoba Umgadli ngoba Kocaelispor ku TFF 1.Iligi neqembu lebhola lezinyawo laseNingizimu Afrika. 
Ndlovu ekudumisa kusuka eJouberton eduze Klerksdorp . [1]Ngesikhathi esemncane, uNdlovu waqala ukudlala ibhola emigwaqweni kwathi lapho eneminyaka eyishumi nesithupha, wanikwa ithuba lokujoyina i-Academy of Excellence.Kwakufanele enqabe lelo thuba, nokho ngoba lalizoshiya unina yedwa ekhaya.Kamuva waya eGoli lapho ayelala khona egumbini lokugezela esiteshini sesitimela izinsuku ezintathu ukuze ahambele izivivinyo zebhola nePlatinum Stars.Wanikezwa inkontileka yiqembu futhi waqala wahlaba umxhwele phambi kwamapali ezingeni lentsha. 
[2] Ifomu lakhe lacwila kungekudala ngemuva kwalokho, njengoba umthombo omusha wemali waqala ukusebenza njengesiphazamiso kwathi iPlatinum Stars yakhetha ukungayivuseleli inkontileka yakhe ngo-2011.Ngaleso sikhathi wayengumondli womndeni wakhe, owawuhlanganisa nonkosikazi wakhe owayekhulelwe. [2] 
NgoDisemba 12, 2008, ngemuva kosuku uMugabe athe uhulumeni waseZimbabwe uhlule ubhadane lwekholera,uNdlovu usole i-United Kingdom ngokuthi yiyona ebangele lokhu kuqubuka “kokucwasana ngokobuhlanga”obekuqonde ukubulala abantu baseZimbabwe.[1] 
I-Herald yabika ngoMasingana 3, 2009, ukuthi uNdlovu waxoshwa kwiKhabhinethi ekuqaleni kwesonto,kanye nabanye ongqongqoshe abangu-11,ngoba wayengasenaso isihlalo ePhalamende.[1] 
UNdlovu ungeniswe egunjini labagula kakhulu i-Intensive Care Unit (ICU) esibhedlela iMater Dei kwaBulawayo ngemuva kokuhlaselwa yisifo sohlangothi.Phambilini wayehlaselwe yi-Asthma.Ushone ekuseni ngovivi ngoSepthemba 15, 2015.Wayeneminyaka engama-78 ubudala. 
USikhanyiso Ndlovu wayengusopolitiki waseZimbabwe owayenguNgqongqoshe Wezokwazisa Nokushicilela kusuka ngo-2007 kuya ku-2008. 
Wayephinde abe yilungu leZANU-PF Politburo. 
Ngemuva kokusebenza njengePhini likaNgqongqoshe Wezemfundo,uNdlovu waqokwa njengoNgqongqoshe Wezolwazi nguMongameli Robert Mugabe ngoFebhuwari 6, 2007. [1] 
UMongameli Mugabe wazuza ukuvukela umbuso ngoDisemba 2007 lapho aye engqungqutheleni ye-European Union - Africa naphezu kokuvinjelwa kwama-visa kuzikhulu zikahulumeni waseZimbabwe, kusukela ngo-2001.Rngqungqutheleni, uNdlovu ubize iKhansela u-Angela Merkel " ngensali yamaNazi ".Ephendula ngokugxekwa kukaMerkel ngokuhlukunyezwa kwamalungelo abantu eZimbabwe,uNdlovu wamtshela ukuthi "avale umlomo noma athumele ngaphandle," ethi iGermany idinga inhloko yezwe njengo-Otto von Bismarck.Ngesikhathi sengqungquthela wayesevele efakwe ezijezisweni zaseMelika nasezinhlwini zojeziso lwe- European Union. 
Sandile Ndlovu (owazalwa 1 Julayi 1980 e [eMgungundlovu], KwaZulu-Natal kuyinto eNingizimu Afrika football Umgadli owadlalela-Premier Soccer League namaqembu iBloemfontein Celtic, iMoroka Swallows,iMaritzburg United, Dynamos, iMamelodi Sundowns,futhi iBafana Bafana. 
Udabuka KwamaChibisa (Malinyane) Edendale ngaseMgungundlovu.2004-05 Umdlali Womdlali WePSL Wesizini 
NgoMashi 2018, uNdlovu wabizelwa okokuqala eqenjini lesizwe laseNingizimu Afrika ngumqeqeshi uStuart Baxter kumqhudelwano wokuqala we-Four Nations Invitational Tournament.Uqale ukubonakala mhla zingama-21 kuNdasa (March), wangena endaweni kaMaphosa Modiba esiwombeni sesibili ngesikhathi beshaya i-Angola iphenathi ka-1(7-6).Uqale okokuqala ezinsukwini ezintathu kamuva ngesikhathi elakuleli lishaya osokhaya iZambia ngo 2-0 ukubanga isicoco. 
Ngasekupheleni kwalowo nyaka waqokwa eqenjini likaBaxter elizodlalela i-2018 COSAFA Cup.Uqale emdlalweni wokuvula wakuleli kulo mqhudelwano, nokuhlulwa kwamaphenathi sekuhlulwe iMadagascar.Uveze kulo mqhudelwano wonke njengoba iNingizimu Afrika iqhubeka nokuphakamisa isicoco sePlate, okulingana nokuqeda indawo yesihlanu. 
Siphesihle Ndlovu (owazalwa ngo-September 30 1996) is a South African professional footballer odlala njengoba mdlali ngoba iPremier Soccer League ohlangothini -Orlando Pirates ne ithimba lakuleli kazwelonke.Uthweswe iziqu kwezemfundo eMaritzburg United, wenza i-debut yakhe yobungcweti e-2016 futhi wadlala imidlalo engaphezu kuka-80 kule kilabhu.Ngesizini ka-2017-18, usize ikilabhu laqopha endaweni yesine ephezulu kwiligi futhi waklonyeliswa ngefomu lakhe nomklomelo weYoung Player weSizini. 
Ekupheleni kwesizini elandelayo, ujoyine i-Orlando Pirates. 
Iqembu lesizwe Unyaka Izinhlelo zokusebenza Imigomo R 2018 5 0 Ingqikithi 5 0 
UTakalani Ndlovu (owazalwa ngomhlaka 11 Januwari 1978), ungumshayisibhakela okhokhelwayo waseNingizimu Afrika onesimo esijwayelekile ohamba ngegama lesidlaliso elithi "Panther".Irekhodi lakhe lobungcweti lifaka izimpi ezingama-38: ukuwina okungu-32 (ama-knockout ayi-18), nokulahlekelwa okungu-6. 
Uhlala eGoli, eGauteng, eNingizimu Afrika. 
UMoses Mzila Ndlovu uyisishayamthetho saseZimbabwe, umakadebona wempi yenkululeko yango-1970 futhi uyisifundiswa esesathatha umhlalaphansi.Uyilungu le- House of Assembly eBulilima West ( MDC-M ). 
Wazalwa ngo-1956 noma ngo-1957 esifundeni iBulilima (esaziwa nangokuthi iPlumtree) eduze nomngcele weZimbabwe neBotswana.UMzila, njengoba aziwa kanjalo, ukhulele esigodini saseThekwane waze waphothula izifundo zobuthisha eGwelo (manje eyiGweru) Teacher's College (GTC).Ngenkathi ese-GTC uMzila waqala ukusebenza kuligi yentsha yeZimbabwe African People's Union (ZAPU) (eholwa nguJoshua Nkomo). 
Ngemuva kokuphothula izifundo zakhe, uMzila waphindela kwaBulawayo lapho afundisa khona ezikoleni eziningi okubalwa iSobukhazi High School. 
Ekupheleni kwempi ngo-1980, edumele ngokuthi iZANU hhayi iZAPU ithathe izintambo, uMzila wabuyela ezweni, wehliswa ebusosheni waphinde waqala impilo yobuzwe.Ngesikhathi kuqhubeka iGukurahundi, uMzila wayenguthisha emaphandleni aseMatebeleland ikakhulukazi eFatima, uRegina Mundi naseSt Paul bonke abaseLupane District.Njengo-ZIPRA owaziwayo impilo yakhe yayihlala isengozini kodwa njenge-ex-guerilla wayazi ukuthi angadlula kanjani ibutho elijwayelekile.Kungalezi zikhathi lapho abakha khona isibopho esiqine kakhulu nabalimi basemaphandleni njengoba ebabona behlukunyezwa ngenxa kanembeza futhi kaningi bebuhlanga.Kamuva, uMzila wayithuthukisa imfundo yakhe futhi waba ngumfundisi wasekolishi.Ufundise eHolideide Teacher's College, eGwanda ZINTEC (manje osenguJoshua Mqabuko Nkomo Polytechnic) nase-United College of Education (UCE).UMoses Mzila wafundisa iSociology of Education e-UCE futhi abafundi abaningi babemthatha njengomfundisi ovelele.Wayegcwele icharisma futhi izinkulumo zakhe zazithokozisa.Kwakungesikhathi sakhe njengomfundisi wasekolishi lapho asiza khona ekuguqulweni nasekuqiniseni iCollege Lecturers Association of Zimbabwe (COLAZ).ICOLAZ yaba yinxusa leZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions (ZCTU) eyaba nomthelela omkhulu ekusungulweni kweMovement for Democratic Change (MDC) ngo-1999. 
UMethembe Ndlovu (owazalwa ngomhlaka 16 Agasti 1973) wayengumdlali webhola waseZimbabwe .UNdlovu usebenzise isikhathi sakhe sokudlala ne- Albuquerque Geckos, Highlanders FC, Boston Bulldogs futhi njengomdlali/umqeqeshi weCape Cod Crusaders ne-Indiana Invaders. 
UNdlovu ubonakale kaningi eqenjini lebhola lezinyawo laseZimbabwe, okuhlanganisa nokudlalela iNdebe yeCOSAFA ngo-1998. 
Ngo-16 Juni 1976, ngesikhathi amaphoyisa avela esiteshini samaphoyisa e-Orlando eholwa nguColonel Kleingeld evulela ngenhlamvu kubafundi baseSoweto bebhikishela ukuphoqwa kokufundiswa ngesiBhunu esikoleni, waba ngowokuqala ukushaywa.Ukushona kukaNdlovu akuzange kumenyezelwe kabanzi njengokufa kukaHector Pieterson ngoba akekho umthwebuli wezithombe obekhona ukuyiqopha. 
UKleingeld uthe kwiKhomishini kaCillie uHastings "ugqugquzela isixuku".Kunokungabaza ukuthi ngubani owashona wokuqala, njengoba uPieterson kwathiwa ushonile ngesikhathi efika emtholampilo, kanti uNdlovu wabulawa ngamanxeba enhlamvu ekhanda ngemuva nje kokulethwa emtholampilo. 
UNdlovu ushiye emhlabeni ngabazali bakhe, odadewabo abathathu nomfowabo.Odadewabo balishiya leli ngemuva nje kukaJuni 16, kodwa babuyela eGoli ngemuva kweminyaka embalwa. 
UNdlovu wangcwatshwa noPieterson emathuneni ase- Avalon eGoli.Indlu yakhe eSoweto yayinophawu oluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka oluhlanganiswe nayo ngomhlaka 16 Juni 2012 ukukhumbula ukuzidela kwakhe. 
Gerald Ndlovu (owazalwa 10 December 1984) ngumdlali waseZimbabwewebhola,wasemuva okwamanje odlalela IHwange. 
UDudu Mntowaziwayo Ndlovu (25 Disemba 1957 - 4 Meyi 1992), owayedume ngelikaDudu Zulu, wayengumdansi wamaZulu, owayeshaya izingoma, futhi ecula namaqembu aseNingizimu Afrika iJuluka kanye (kamuva) noSavuka.UNdlovu udanse nozakwabo uJohnny Clegg iminyaka eminingi, esiteji nasemigwaqweni yaseSoweto naseJeppestown . 
NgoMeyi 1992, ngenkathi eya kwakhe eSiphongweni esuka komakhelwane, uDudu wadutshulwa wabulawa eseduze.Lokhu kuhlasela kwenzeke emzileni othuli ngaseGreytown KwaZuluNatal.Akuqiniseki ukuthi uNdlovu wayehlosiwe yini, noma wayephutha ngomunye umuntu.Ezinye izakhamizi zidutshulwe "ngephutha" empini yamatekisi yasendaweni. 
Ngonyaka olandelayo,uJohnny Clegg noSavuka baqopha i-albhamu yokugcina ndawonye:Heat, Dust and Dreams.UClegg unikele ngevidiyo yomculo ethi "The Crossing (Osiyeza)",iculo eliku-albhamu, wayibhalela uNdlovu. 
Ngo-29 Juni 2017, kwamenyezelwa ukuthi uBenyu usayine inkontileka yeminyaka emine neCeltic.Umdlali wasesiswini ushaye igoli ngesikhathi ebonakala okokuqala eqenjini elithuthukisa iqembu, emdlalweni wobungani belungiselela isizini ne-East Kilbride.UBenyu udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala wokuncintisana ngesikhathi iCeltic inqoba ngo 4-0 kuLinfield eCeltic Park. 
UBenyu wazalwa ngabazali baseZimbabwe ngomhlaka 12 Zibandlela 1997 eCamden Town, eLondon . 
Wakhulela eHarlow, e-Essex. 
UBenyu ujoyine i- Ipswich Town eneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye,esayina inkontileka yakhe yokuqala yobungcweti ngemuva kokuhlanganisa iminyaka engu-17. 
Ngo-7 Disemba 2016, uBenyu wajoyina i- Aldershot Town ngesivumelwano semalimboleko senyanga eyodwa.Imalimboleko yabe seyelulwa kaningi, kwavumela uBenyu ukuba aqede isizini ka-2016-17 neqembu leNational League. 
NgoMashi 2018, uZvirekwi wanqunywa isandla sobunxele odokotela abahlinzayo kulandela ukushayisana kwemoto eHarare. 
UHardlife Zvirekwi (owazalwa ngomhlaka 5 Meyi 1987) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo waseZimbabwe, odlala njengomdlali wasemuva weCAPS United neqembu lesizwe laseZimbabwe. 
Zvirekwi waqala ibhola lakhe ne Gunners futhi wayinqoba Premier Zimbabwe Soccer League Isihloko 2009 njengoba Gunners eseqedile amaphuzu amahlanu ukusula ka neDynamos.Uhlale engumdlali weGunners iminyaka emine isiyonke waze wahamba ngo-2013 wajoyina iCAPS United.NgoJanuwari 2016, uZvirekwi wasayina isivumelwano seminyaka emithathu neCAPS Utd. 
UZvirekwi udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala eZimbabwe ngowezi-9 kuNhlangulana 2013 ngesikhathi ehlulwa ngo- 2--4 bebhekene ne-Egypt emdlalweni wokuhlungela iNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2014.Eminye imidlalo emibili eyilandele lapho ibhekene neMozambique neNingizimu Afrika ngo-2013.NgoJanuwari 2014, umqeqeshi u-Ian Gorowa, wammema ukuba abe yingxenye yeqembu laseZimbabwe elizodlala ku- 2014 African Nations Championship.Usizile iqembu laqeda endaweni yesine ngemuva kokuhlulwa yiNigeria ngegoli eqandeni. 
Ukuvela okuyisithupha kulandelwe ku-2014 African Nations Championship.UZvirekwi kudingeke ukuthi alinde eminye iminyaka emibili kuze kuphele umdlalo wakhe olandelayo eZimbabwe ngesikhathi eqokelwa i- African Nations Championship ngo-2016, wadlala kuyo yomithathu imidlalo yaseZimbabwe kulo mqhudelwano. 
Umsebenzi 
UChipo Tsodzo (owazalwa ngomhlaka 6 Meyi 1976) ungumvikeli webhola waseZimbabwe osethathe umhlalaphansi 
ULeonard "Aghahowa" Tsipa (owazalwa ngomhlaka 25 Januwari 1982) ungumgadli webhola lezinyawo waseZimbabwe odlala kuZimbabwe Premier Soccer League kuCAPS United FC. 
Farai Vimisayi (owazalwa 30 Okthoba 1983) esithathe umhlalaphansi Zimbabwean football umgadli. 
Charles Yohane (owazalwa 26 Agasti 1973) is a wangaphambili Zimbabwean wangaphambili footballer ababedlala njengoba mdlali. 
ULincoln Zvasiya (owazalwa ngomhla ka- 25 kuNhlolanja 1991) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo waseZimbabwe, odlala njengomvikeli weCAPS United neqembu lesizwe laseZimbabwe. 
Uzalelwe eHarare, uZvasiya waqala umsebenzi wakhe e- Aces Youth Soccer Academy.Ngemuva kokushiya i-Aces Youth wajoyina iqembu lakhe lokuqala ngesikhathi esayina kwi-Monomotapa United eyanqoba i- Zimbabwe Premier Soccer League ngo-2008.Ngemuva konyaka noMonomotapa, uZvasiya ube nesikhathi esifushane nePlatinum ngaphambi kokubashiya maphakathi no-2013 bajoyina iqembu laseNingizimu Afrika iKaizer Chiefs. 
UJordan Bhekithemba Zemura (owazalwa ngomhlaka 14 Novemba 1999) ungumdlali webhola elikhokhelwayo odlala njengomdlali wasemuva kwesokunxele seqembu leChampionship i- AFC Bournemouth.UZemura owazalelwa eNgilandi, umele iqembu lesizwe laseZimbabwe. 
UZemura waya e- Oasis Academy Isle of Sheppey esikoleni samabanga aphakeme waqhubekela phambili wenza izifundo zeSport Science eCanterbury University .Ubuye futhi wamela isifunda sakhe kwezokusubatha. 
UZemura wajoyina iQueens Park Rangers 'academy eneminyaka eyisithupha, wachitha iminyaka emithathu lapho.
