Ube nesilingo esifushane neChelsea, ngaphambi kokuthuthela eCharlton Athletic, lapho achithe khona iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili kusethaphu yabo yentsha. 
UNkanyiso Moyo (owazalwa ngomhlaka 4 kuNhlangulana 1983 ungumvikeli webhola waseZimbabwe osethathe umhlalaphansi 
UDaniel Vheremu (owazalwa ngomhlaka 18 Mashi 1985) ungumvikeli webhola waseZimbabwe osethathe umhlalaphansi 
Waqokwa njengo-2009 i-Zimbabwe Soccer Star of the Year. 
UPraise Tonha (owazalwa ngomhlaka 29 Mashi 1995) ungumdlali webhola waseZimbabwe odlala njengomvikeli weCAPS United FC neqembu lebhola lezwe laseZimbabwe. 
UNthokozo Tshuma (owazalwa ngomhlaka 29 Okthoba 1985) ungumdlali wasesiswini osethathe umhlalaphansi ebholeni laseZimbabwe. 
UMartin Vengesayi (owazalwa ngomhlaka 18 Novemba 1987) ungumdlali wasesiswini webhola laseZimbabwe okumanje udlalela iHarare City. 
UZandazenkosi Dumisle Siziba (owazalwa ngo-19 Julayi 2003) ungumdlali webhola odlala njengomdlali wasesiswini weqembu le- EFL League One Ipswich Town. 
USiziba ujwayele ukudlala njengewindi kodwa futhi angadlala njengomdlali odlala ngokujulile.Unyawo lwesobunxele ngesitayela sakhe sokudlala esilinganiswe kahle nese- winger yeLiverpool uSadio Mane. 
Edmore Sibanda (owazalwa 3 Juni 1984) is a Zimbabwean footballer odlala njengoba unozinti ngoba iGolden Arrows kanye Zimbabwe football kazwelonke ithimba. 
Abantu abaphawulekayo abanesibongo bafaka 
UJabulani Sibanda wayengusihlalo weZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association (ZNLWVA), okuyinhlangano ekuqaleni eyayinabo bonke omakadebona abalwa ngesikhathi seSecond Chimurenga noma eZimbabwe War of Liberation eyaphela ngo-1979, yize engazange abambe iqhaza kule mpi.Ngaphansi kobuholi bakhe i-ZNLWVA yahlanganisa ama-War Veterans nabanye abasekelana ne-ZANU PF ekwabeni ngenkani futhi okuvame ukuba nobudlova kwezindawo zamapulazi abathi zebiwe ngesikhathi sekoloni.Waxoshwa kuZANU-PF ngo-2014 ngenxa yokuba yingxenye yeSimemezelo saseTsholotsho. 
UGibson Jama Sibanda (1944 - 24 Agasti 2010) wayengusopolitiki waseZimbabwe futhi eyinyunyana yabasebenzi . 
Wayeyilungu elasungula iMovement for Democratic Change kanti ngesikhathi eshona wayeyiPhini likaMongameli weqembu leMovement for Democratic Change eliholwa ngu- Arthur Mutambara. 
Owayengumongameli weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, waqokelwa okokuqala kwiNdlu Yesishayamthetho okhethweni lwasePhalamende lwango-2000.Wayeyilungu leSenethi futhi enguNgqongqoshe Wezwe eHhovisi lePhini likaNdunankulu u- Arthur Mutambara ngesikhathi eshona ngo-2010. 
UVusimuzi "Vusi" Sibanda (owazalwa ngomhlaka 10 Okthoba 1983) ungumdlali wekhilikithi waseZimbabwe.Udlale ikhilikithi yamazwe omhlaba eqenjini lekhilikithi laseZimbabwe ngazo zontathu izinhlobo zalo mdlalo.Ubuye wadlalela iMidlands kwiLogan Cup . 
Ukhulele eHighfields, eHarare futhi wabonakala kusenesikhathi ngabaqeqeshi bezentuthuko, wathola umfundaze eChurchill Boys High .Njengamanje udlala ikhilikithi yasekhaya kuMid West Rhinos 
UFelix Magalela Mafa Sibanda owazalwa ngoFebhuwari 5, 1951 uyisishoshovu saseZimbabwe, umgqugquzeli womphakathi, usopolitiki futhi oyilungu lephalamende laseMagwegwe kwaBulawayo eqenjini leMDC-T,kanye nokuba ngumkhulumeli waleso sifundazwe esifundazweni.Ungowesigungu sangaphakathi sasebukhosini bakwaNdebele, ubaba wakhe omkhulu omkhulu, uMasonginyoka wafika evela eTransvaal noMzilikazi njengodokotela uqobo lweNkosi. 
UTshokomela, ubaba wakhe futhi wayengudokotela weNkosi uLobengula owakhulisa ubaba wakhe uMaphahla, naye owabizwa ngegama elithi Mafa Sigodo okusho ukuthi "indlalifa" yingakho kwathiwa uMafa noma u- Ilifa. 
UNdaba igama elinikiwe.Kungabhekisa ku: 
Ngaphandle kwalokhu, uNdaba wakhulela kulokho okungabizwa ngokuthi yikhaya elibhidlikile. 
Ubaba wakhe uMakgatho Mandela wakhula engenaye ubaba. 
UNelson Mandela waboshwa ngenkathi umndeni wakhe usakhula, futhi waba ngumuntu ohamba emgwaqweni eSoweto.Ngemuva kokuzalwa kukaNdaba, umndeni wakhe wathuthela e-Eastern Cape.Uchithe iminyaka yokuqala yokufunda kwakhe edolobheni elincane elibizwa ngeCofimvaba .Wayeneminyaka eyisikhombisa lapho ehlangana nomkhulu wakhe uNelson Mandela.UMandela wayeboshwe eRobben Island.UNdaba wayeneminyaka eyishumi nanye ngenkathi ezohlala nomkhulu wakhe. 
Uchithe amashumi amabili eminyaka ehlala naye - enakekelwa, bese enakekela umkhulu wakhe. 
Ngokwesiko lamaXhosa abafana abaphakathi kweminyaka engu-18 no-21 bayiswa ezintabeni bayosokwa. 
UNdaba wayeneminyaka engama-21 ngesikhathi esokwa.Bafundiswa izindima nezibopho zabo ekubeni ngamadoda.Iqhaza nezibopho ezibandakanya ukushada, ukuba yindoda, ubaba, nokuba nekhaya lakho. 
I-Africa Rising yasungulwa ngenhloso yokuqhakambisa isithombe esihle nge-Afrika. 
UNdaba ubhalwe kwi- BET ku-inthanethi lapho ebekhuluma ngesisekelo sakhe, i-Africa Rising. 
UNdaba uthi isisekelo sakhe sihlose ukuqhakambisa isithombe esihle nge-Afrika ngezinhlelo, amafilimu, abezindaba nokuxhumana nabantu, ukuguqula imicabango yabantu abasha base-Afrika kanye nomhlaba wonkana. 
Ngo-2014 uNdaba waqokwa njengomunye “wama-28 Men of Change”, yiBET. 
IMen of Change ihlonipha iNyanga Yomlando Omnyama yaseMelika. 
Ihlonipha amadoda aMnyama aphumelele ezimbonini noma kumaphrojekthi aqhakambisa ubuhlakani babantu abamnyama. 
Washicilela incwadi yakhe yokuqala ngoJuni 2018 enesihloko esithi Going to the Mountain: Life Lessons from My Grandfather, uNelson Mandela.Uthi umkhulu wakhe wamfundisa ukuzakhela amafa kanye nokubuyisela emphakathini.UNdaba usho ngencwadi yakhe, ukuthi uthathe izifundo zokuphila umkhulu wakhe amfundise zona kanye nezinye zakhe ukuzidlulisela kubalaleli abasebancane.Ukuze abantu baqonde izindinganiso zikayisemkhulu. 
Ngo-2018 uNdaba wabambisana noPrince Harry, noSir Elton John ukwenza umkhankaso wokuqwashisa nge- HIV ne-AIDS.Baqale umkhankaso womhlaba wonke engqungqutheleni yama-22 yamazwe omhlaba yengculazi e-Amsterdam.Engxoxweni abe nayo neHill eLibrary of Congress, ngoJuni 2018, uNdaba ucashunwe ethi kungani abhala le ncwadi, “Bengifuna abantu bazi uNelson Mandela ngaphandle kokuba yisishoshovu sezwe, ngaphandle kokuba ngumholi omkhulu lo abamaziyo nokumazi nje ezingeni lomuntu njengogogo. " 
"Kumele sihlukane nemibono eyiphutha ekhona ezungeze i-Afrika.I-Afrika akuyona nje indawo yezimpi, ubuphofu, izifo kanye nomashiqela. 
I-Afrika yindawo yokuzalwa kobuntu. " 
"Anginaso isineke sakhe ngaso sonke isikhathi. 
Bengingeke ngichithe iminyaka engamashumi amabili neskhombisa ejele bese ngixola izitha zami ngendlela enza ngayo.Kodwa ngifunde lukhulu kuye futhi ngiyakholelwa ukuthi wabona indoda enhle kimi.Ngingase ngingakwazi ukuhamba ezinyathelweni zikaNelson Mandela, kodwa sonke singahamba ekukhanyeni kwakhe. " 
“Umhlaba ubheka kakhulu iNingizimu Afrika njengezwe okulindeleke ukuthi lizimele phezu kwezindinganiso zokuziphatha kanye nokuziphatha okuhle, ngoba siyizwe elikhiqize lesi sithombe somhlaba wonke. 
Kodwa ugogo wayehlale esifundisa ukuthi sizenzele umlando. ” 
Ndaba Mandela. 
UMandela njengamanje ungumsunguli kanye nosihlalo weMandela Institute for Humanity 
Uyasebenza ukugcina umlando kamkhulu wakhe uphila, futhi wethula uNelson Mandela esizukulwaneni esisha. 
Ungumsunguli futhi ungusihlalo obumbene we-Africa Rising Foundation. 
Futhi ungumsunguli weMandela Project. 
Wayeyingxenye yeqembu leMandela Centenary ngo-2018. 
Uyilungu loMkhandlu Wentsha wePan-African osebenzisana kakhulu ne-African Union. 
Ungummeli omude kunabo bonke osebenza emhlabeni jikelele we- UNAIDS, i-ejensi ekhethekile yeNhlangano Yezizwe ekhankasela ukuqeda ubhadane lwe-HIV / AIDS. 
Bobabili abazali bakhe babulawa yilesi sifo. 
UNdaba Mandela wazalelwa emndenini wezikhulu.Umkhulu wakhe u-Nelson lalibonisa ozalweni nemicengezi of kingship of Thembu abantu futhi indlalifa ebukhosini ka eMvezo ngo ilungelo lakhe. 
Isithunzi sakamuva siphethwe ngumfowabo omdala kaNdaba uMandla . 
UNdaba Walter Mhlongo (3 Julayi 1933 – 29 Okthoba 1989) kwakuwumlingisi zaseNingizimu Afrika futhi Umhleli womdanso waziwa kakhulu indima yakhe Mshefane phezu 1977 wemidlalo, Inyakanyaka.UNdaba uthathwa kabanzi njengomunye wosomahlaya abavelele. 
UJoe Mafela owayengusomahlaya osezinzile uchaze amahlaya kaNdaba njengomzamo. 
Waziwa ngendaba yamahlaya, Inyakanyaka (okusho inkinga) nefilimu yomdlalo weshashalazi ebizwa ngokuthi uDeliwe lapho ayelingisa khona nonkosikazi nendodana yakhe.Eminye imisebenzi yakhe eyaziwayo kubalwa Isivumelwano, Upondo no Nkinsela, Bad Company neStrike Force. 
Wayeshade nomlingisi, uMary Twala.Babenezingane ezi-2 ndawonye; U-Archie noSomizi. 
Uthole umklomelo weTony Award weBest Choreography kuMbongeni Ngema kuSarafina! ngo-1988. 
Ukukingisa 
USomizi Buyani Mhlongo (owazalwa ngomhlaka 23 kuZibandlela 1972) ungumlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika, ungumuntu wezokuxhumana futhi ungumdidiyeli womdanso.Ngo-1992, wabonakala kwifilimu yomculo nepolitiki, iSarafina! okwamzuzela ukuvelela.UMhlongo waba ngumdwebi ohola phambili wemibukiso nemicimbi eminingi, okubandakanya ukuvulwa nokuvalwa kwemidlalo yeNdebe Yomhlaba ye-FIFA ka-2010 kanye neNdebe Yezizwe yase-Afrika ka-2013. 
UNdaba Dube (owazalwa ngo-7 Januwari 1959) wayengumshayi- sibhakela owayekade engenele iBantamweight ( – 54kg) kuma-Olimpiki Asehlobo lika-1984 nakuma-Olimpiki Asehlobo lika- 1988. 
UDube uzuze indondo yesiliva kuma- All-Africa Games ka -1987,wahlulwa kowamanqamu we-bantamweight nguStephen Mwema waseKenya. 
URonald Sibanda (owazalwa ngomhlaka 29 Agasti 1976) ungumdlali wasesiswini osethathe umhlalaphansi ebholeni laseZimbabwe.Umdlali waseZimbabwe, wadlala ku- 2000, 2001, 2003, 2004, 2005 nango-2006 COSAFA Cup naku-2004 African Cup of Nations. 
Victor Ali Hassan Abondo (owazalwa 20 Novemba 1989 e Kisumu ) kuyinto Kenyan footballer ngubani okwamanje adlalele Wazito kanye Kenya eqenjini lesizwe njengoba mdlali. 
Ku-2020, waqala umsebenzi wakhe wokuphatha njengomphathi we-Unión San Felipe ezingeni elingaphansi kweminyaka engu-17.NgoNovemba 2020, ngemuva kokuthi u-Unión San Felipe eguqule abasebenzi bakhe bezobuchwepheshe,u-Acuña waba yisekela lomqeqeshi kaHéctor Roco, umphathi weqembu lokuqala. 
Ngo-Ephreli 28, 2021, wathatha inselelo yokuqeqesha u-Unión San Felipe njengomphathi osabambile ngemuva kokukhululwa kukaTomás Arrotea. 
Izinhlonipho 
I-Primera División de Chile:2002 iApertura 
UJorge Cristian Acuña Concha (owazalwa ngo-31 Ntulikazi 1978 e-Ovalle ), owaziwa ngegama lakhe lesidlaliso uKike Acuña,ungumphathi webhola laseChile futhi owayengumdlali webhola lezinyawo. 
Wayengumdlali wasesiswini. 
Wazalelwa e- Ovalle, esifundeni se-IV saseCoquimbo, e-Acuña wajoyina iqembu laseSantiago- elisisekelo leklabhu yase- Unión Española lapho kwamiswa khona eqenjini labantu abadala lokuqala ngo-1999.Ngemuva kokuchitha isizini nabaseSpain, ngoJanuwari 2000, wathuthela endlini yamandla iUniversidad Católica lapho asiza khona iklabhu ukunqoba i-2002 Torneo Apertura,waba ngukhiye odlala phambili ekuzuzeni isihloko. 
Ngo-2002, u-Acuña wasayina inkontileka neqembu laseDashi iFeyenoord .Ngemuva komdlalo weFeyenoord Reserve ngomhlaka 15 Ephreli 2004, yena nabanye abadlali beFeyenoord, kuhlanganisa noRobin van Persie, bahlaselwa yizigebenga ze-AFC Ajax.U-Acuña uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela elimele ekhanda, entanyeni nasezimbanjeni.Ngemuva kwalokho wajoyina isikweletu kuRBC Roosendaal ukuyodlala isizini ka-2005-06 ye-Eredivisie.Ngemuva kokuphothula ukubonakala kweligi okungama-24, u-Acuña waqeda ukupela kwakhe eNorth Brabant futhi kamuva wakhululwa eFeyenoord ngoJanuwari 2006 ongazange ayivuselele inkontileka yakhe. 
Ngemuva kwezinyanga njengomuntu okhululekile ubesequlwa ezinkantolo zamaNgisi iBlackburn Rovers neWigan Athletic.Kodwa-ke, ngo-23 Januwari 2007, ekugcineni u-Acuña wasayina i- Universidad de Chile,izimbangi zedolobha laseCatólica.Ufike kuleli qembu ngesikhathi kunenkinga yezikhungo, wadlala kuphela imidlalo engu-16 yeligi wase exoshwa ngumqeqeshi u-Arturo Salah ngemuva kokuphuthelwa wukuqeqeshwa. 
Ngo-8 Agasti 2007, kwabikwa ukuthi u-Acuña wathuthela eMamelodi Sundowns yaseNingizimu Afrika yePremier Soccer League.Ngemuva kwamasizini amabili edlalela amaBrazilians,uthathe isinqumo sokubashiya ngemuva kokungezwani nosihlalo weqembu uPatrice Motsepe othe ngokwe-Acuña wamcwasa ngoba emhlophe. 
UMumuni Abubakar (owazalwa ngomhlaka 17 Meyi 1993) ungumdlali wasesiswini webhola laseGhana okumanje udlalela iBlack Leopards. [1] 
UCamaldine uyindodana yowayengumdlali webhola laseTogo nomphathi wakhe uSamer Abraw.[1] 
Camaldine Abraw (owazalwa 15 Agasti 1990) umdlali webhola wase Togolese odlalela iqembu French Football Club de l'Ouest Tourangeau 37. 
Uzalelwe eLomé, u-Abraw waqala umsebenzi wakhe we-2004 ne-Académie Delta Liberty. 
Ku-2008 wajoyina iklabhu laseFrance iLB Châteauroux futhi wadlala isizini ka-2008-09 neqembu lentsha. 
Ngesizini ka-2009-10 wakhushulelwa eqenjini eligodliwe futhi wenza i-debut yakhe yobuchwepheshe beChâteauroux kuLigue 2 ngomhla ka-2 Ephreli 2010 bedlala neDijon.Ngo-28 Meyi 2010, wasayina inkontileka yakhe yokuqala noChâteauroux iminyaka emithathu. [1] 
Ngo-Agasti 2013, u-Abraw wadlulela kuFree State Stars kwiSouth African Premier Soccer League, wasayina inkontileka yeminyaka emibili nethuba lonyaka ozayo. 
Ngo-6 Februwari 2019, u-Abraw wasayina nohlangothi lweTercera División uCaudal Deportivo. [1]Ngemuva kwemidlalo eyisikhombisa yeqembu, uCaudal umemezele kuphrofayili yakhe esemthethweni kuTwitter, ukuthi u-Abraw uyishiyile iklabhu ngenxa yezizathu zakhe. [2] 
U-Abraw wayeyilungu leqembu lebhola likazwelonke laseTogo labangaphansi kweminyaka engu-17,wadlala iNdebe yoMhlaba yeFIFA yabaneminyaka engaphansi kwengu-17 eyayiseNingizimu Korea kanye neNdebe yase-Afrika yabangaphansi kweminyaka engu-17.Wenze i-debut yakhe enkulu eqenjini lebhola lezinyawo laseTogo ngo-13 Meyi 2010 ebhekene neqembu lebhola likazwelonke laseGabon.[3] 
Thapelo Phora (owazalwa 21 Novemba 1991) is a South African umsubathi .Ungenele umqhudelwano wamamitha angu-4 × 400 emjahweni we- 2016 IAAF World Indoor Championship . [2] Ngo-2019, wawina indondo yesiliva kumqhudelwano wamadoda wamamitha angu-4 × 400 emidlalweni ye- 2019 African Games eyayiseRabat, eMorocco.Uphinde wawina indondo yesiliva kumamitha angama-400 abesilisa. 
UMasimphuthando Ntini (owazalwa ngo-7 Ntulikazi 2000) ungumdlali wekhilikithi waseNingizimu Afrika.Ngo-Agasti 2018, wanikezwa inkontileka ephezulu yiCricket South Africa ngaphambi kwesizini yasekhaya ka-2018-19.Uyindodana yowayengumdlali wekhilikithi uMakhaya Ntini. 
Udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala we- Twenty20 eWestern Province kwi-2018 Africa T20 Cup ngomhlaka 15 Septhemba 2018.Ngaphambi komdlalo wakhe wokuqala we-T20, ubeyingxenye yabadlali baseNingizimu Afrika abazobamba iqhaza kwiNdebe Yomhlaba Yekhilikithi Yangaphansi Kweminyaka Engaphansi Kwengu-19 ka -2018.Wenze uhlu lwakhe lokuqala ku-Western Province ku- 2018-19 I-CSA Provincial One-Day Challenge ngomhla ka-10 kuNhlolanja 2019.Udlale umdlalo wokuqala esigabeni sokuqala eWestern Province kwi- 2018-19 CSA 3-Day Provincial Cup yangomhla ziyi-14 kuNhlolanja 2019. 
NgoSepthemba 2019, waqokwa eqenjini lesiFundazwe saseNtshonalanga ku- 2019-20 CSA Provincial T20 Cup.Ngo-Ephreli 2021, uNtini waqokwa esikwatini sabesilisa abasafufusa baseNingizimu Afrika ohambweni lwabo lwemidlalo eyisithupha eNamibia.Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ngayo leyo nyanga, waqokwa esikwatini saKwaZulu-Natali, ngaphambi kwesizini yekhilikithi ka-2021–22 eyayiseNingizimu Afrika. 
Sabelo igama elivela eNingizimu Afrika elingabhekisela ku 
Ngo-2012, ubuyele eGauteng wajoyina iqembu laseVarsity Cup elisuselwa ePitoli I-UP Tuks yaphinde yabonakala kubo izikhathi eziyishumi nane ngesizini ka- 2012 nango- 2013.I-UP Tuks iwine lo mncintiswano kuzona zombili lezi zikhathi,uNhlapo wadlala kuyona yomibili imidlalo yamanqamu. 
Ingxenye yokugcina ka-2013 yambona ethuthela eWellington eyojoyina i- IBoland Cavaliers yomncintiswano weCurrie Cup First Division ka-2013.Wenze ukubonakala okuyisikhombisa kubo kulowo mncintiswano. 
Ube esefudukela eNelspruit ukuyojoyina i- AmaPuma ka-2014. [1] Ubeyilungu leqembu iPumas elidle umhlanganiso kwiVodacom Cup okokuqala ngo- 2015, eshaya I-Western Province ingu-24-7 kowamanqamu.UNhlapo ubonakale izikhathi ezine ngesizini. 
USabelo Nhlapo (owazalwa ngomhlaka 17 Disemba 1988 eGoli) ungumdlali webhola lombhoxo waseNingizimu Afrika osethathe umhlalaphansi, osanda kudlala neqembu IPumas.Isikhundla sakhe esijwayelekile siyi-prop. 
Ngemuva kwalokho wajoyina ISharks Academy, lapho ayedlala khona ezingeni lika-Under-19 ngo-2007 nasezingeni lika-Under-21 ngo-2008 nango-2009.Waphinde futhi wathola inhlonipho yokumelwa ngalesi sikhathi, edlalela iqembu laseNingizimu Afrika labaneminyaka engaphansi kwengu-19 ku- 2007 Under 19 Rugby World Championship nangohlangothi lwabo lwe-U20 ku-2008 IRB Junior World Championship . 
Wenze ibanga lakhe lokuqala ekilasini le- Oshaka XV ngesikhathi somncintiswano weVodacom Cup ngo-2009, emdlalweni wabo womzuliswano wokuqala bedlala ne- IBoland Cavaliers.Ubuye imidlalo engamashumi amabili emncintiswaneni weVodacom Cup kumasizini amathathu alandelayo, kepha wehluleka ukungena eqenjini labo leCurrie Cup, yize eqokwe esikwatini sabo esinqobe isicoco se -2010 Currie Cup Premier Division futhi wafakwa i Isikwati seSharks Super Rugby sesizini yeSuper 15 ka-2011. 
USabelo Mlangeni (owazalwa ngo-1980) ungumthwebuli zithombe waseNingizimu Afrika ohlala futhi osebenza eGoli, eNingizimu Afrika.Umsebenzi wakhe ubanjelwe emaqoqweni e- Art Institute of Chicago,eSan Francisco Museum of Modern Art,naseWalther Collection. 
Impilo 
Umsebenzi kaMlangeni wenziwa kula maqoqo omphakathi nawezikhungo alandelayo: 
USabelo Mlangeni wazalwa ngo-1980 eDriefontein, isigodi esiseduze naseWakkerstroom eMpumalanga, eNingizimu Afrika. 
Sabelo Mlangeni:Umlindelo wamaKholwa. 
EGoli:Wits Art Museum, 2018. 
USabelo Victor Phama wayeyisishoshovu se-Anti-Aparthaid, uMkhuzi Wezempi we- Azanian People's Liberation Army APLA kanye noNobhala Wezokuvikela kwi- Pan African Congress PAC.Wayengumvukeli waseNingizimu Afrika. 
USabelo Phama [owazalwa anguSabelo Gqwetha ] (31 Mashi 1949 - 9 Nhlolanja 1994) wazalelwa e- Eastern Cape, eMthatha, eNingizimu Afrika.Wazalelwa eBaziya, indawo esemaphandleni emaphethelweni eMthatha.Wayeyindodana kaCyril Thozama Gqweta noThembani (Nee Mlambo) Gqweta. 
Ingxenye enkulu yobuntwana bakhe wayichitha nogogo nomkhulu wakhe ababengothisha ngomsebenzi.USabelo waqala imfundo yakhe yamabanga aphansi eBaziya Mission School eneminyaka eyisithupha ngo-1955.USabelo wayexhumana nabaholi be-PAC abangaphansi komhlaba eneminyaka engu-12 no-13, futhi wayefaka ingcindezi kubaholi begatsha nabamaseli ukuthi baye eLesotho ukuyothola umcabango wezinguquko.Ngokwethimba le-PAC lama-1960s okuqala, usuku olwalubhekiswe kowe-1963 lwenkululeko enkulu nenkululeko lwalulindelwe ngokomzwelo nangenshisekelo yintsha yase-Afrika. 
Sabelo Sikhali Ndzinisa (owazalwa 31 Julayi 1991) umdlali webhola waseLiswati odlalela Mbabane Swallows. 
Sabelo uPhumlani Nyembe (owazalwa 24 Disemba 1991) umdlali webhola lezinyawo odlala njengoba mdlali ngoba eNingizimu Afrika Premier Division ohlangothini Highlands Park. 
USibusiso igama anikezwe lona. 
Abantu abaziwayo abanegama bafaka 
Ngo2006 uZuma wavotelwa waba ngowokuqala kubalandeli phakathi kwemikhakha emikhulu eyake yadlalwa eFC Copenhagen 
Ngokusho kukaZuma udlale ibhola lakhe elihle kunabo bonke kuFC Copenhagen namanje okuzwakala njengekhaya lakhe lesibili.Ujabulela isimo sezinganekwane kuFC Copenhagen njengomdlali ovelele owake wadlala ekilabhini.UZuma ucabanga ukuthi ukweleta yonke into iFC Copenhagen nokuthi ubezithokozisa zonke izinsuku eba kule kilabhu.Kuyingxenye yempilo yakhe angasoze ayikhohlwa.UZuma uphinde atshele nokuthi "Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bazokutshela ukuthi uZuma uyinkosi eDenmark". 
I-FC Copenhagen yanqoba ubuqhawe bayo besibili beSuperliga ngo-2001 ngemuva kweminyaka ecishe ibe yishumi ingazange ibe ngompetha,yanqoba ngo 3-1 emdlalweni wokugcina weNew Firm wesizini, eParken Stadium.Igoli le-2-0 kube ukukhahlelwa kwebhayisikili nguZuma, owathola ibhola esifubeni sakhe, lapho ayishayelela khona emoyeni, futhi ekunyakazeni okufanayo wakhipha ukukhahlela okuphezulu, wafaka ibhola ekhoneni elikude, ngaphandle kukanozinti kaBrøndby Ukufinyelela kukaMogens Krogh.Lokhu kwavotelwa umgomo wonyaka waseDenmark, futhi wavotelwa njengegoli elihle kakhulu leSuperliga eminyakeni eyishumi ngoDisemba 2009. 
Ngo-2013, ukukhahlela ibhayisikili kukaZuma kwavotelwa njengesikhathi esikhulu kunazo zonke emlandweni weFC Copenhagen.Kwenziwa itshe lesikhumbuzo lokuhlonipha umzuzu omkhulu futhi ngaleyo ndlela ukukhahlela ibhayisikili kukaZuma.UZuma uqobo wamenywa yiFC Copenhagen futhi waya eParken ngomhlaka 18 Agasti 2013 lapho kwembulwa khona itshe lesikhumbuzo.Itshe lesikhumbuzo bekungukukhululeka ekukhahleleni ibhayisikili kukaZuma. 
Ngosuku lokwethulwa kwale mpumuzo uZuma uthe:"Kuyintokozo ukuba lapha. 
Ngiyabathanda labo bafana.Ngiyabathanda abalandeli beFC Copenhagen.Ngijabule ngokumangalisayo.Olunye lwezinsuku ezihamba phambili empilweni yami". 
Ngemuva kweminyaka emihlanu nohhafu e-FC Copenhagen,uZuma wathengiswa eqenjini laseGerman Bundesliga i- Arminia Bielefeld ngo- €1 million ngoJulayi 2005. 
Ngo-21 Juni 2008, uZuma wasayina kwiMamelodi Sundowns.Ukhululwe ehlobo lika-2009 kwathi ngo-Okthoba 2009 waba nesikhathi sokulingwa neFC Nordsjælland,wagcina esayinwe yiqembu. 
USibusiso Wiseman Zuma(owazalwa ngomhlaka 23 Juni 1975)ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo waseNingizimu Afrika owayedlala phambili noma umdlali wasesiswini 
Ngo-16 Okthoba 2009, wasayina inkontileka yonyaka owodwa neqembu laseDenmark iFC Nordsjælland.Ngo-8 Novemba 2009 uZuma washaya igoli lakhe lokuqala emdlalweni wekilabhu owawunqoba ngo-1-0 kuSønderjyskE.Ngenkathi uNordsjælland evakashele iFC Copenhagen ngomhlaka-24 Mashi 2010 emdlalweni weDenmark League, uZuma wadlala kahle futhi wafakwa esikhundleni seningi labalandeli beFC Copenhagen ababemshayela ihlombe.UZuma othinteke ngokusobala uthe abalandeli bekhaya bebengakholeki. 
Useke wamela iNingizimu Afrika amahlandla angama-67.Udlale izwe lakhe eNdebeni yoMhlaba yeFIFA ka-2002.UZuma wayengukaputeni weqembu lesizwe laseNingizimu Afrika emqhudelwaneni we- African Cup of Nations wango-2006. 
Ngo-2010, uZuma wavula iSibusiso Zuma Foundation esebenza nezingane ezincane ezine-HIV.Isisekelo sisebenza futhi "nokuvikela nokufundisa nge-HIV / Aids" kanye "nokuvinjelwa kokutheleleka nge-HIV kanye / noma nokusatshalaliswa kolwazi oluphathelene ne-HIV/Aids". 
UZuma uthi: "Ngizama nje ukusiza imiphakathi eminingi lapha eNingizimu Afrika. 
Ikakhulu abampofu". 
Amanye amagama eziteketiso ngenkathi edlala kuFC Copenhagen kwakunguSibu noma uZuma nje 
Ngo-25 Juni 2007, kwabikwa ukuthi uZuma wayebandakanyeka esigamekweni esenzeka ezweni lakubo iNingizimu Afrika.Ngemuva kwengxabano kube nezinsolo zokuthi wasabisa ngokudubula iqulu lamadoda emcimbini owawuseKokstad.Amaphoyisa endawo asiphenye lesi simo,uZuma wavinjelwa ukuba ahambe ezweni isikhathi esithile, kodwa akukho cala elabekwa lona. 
UZuma watshela kwi-documentary ka-2002 "uZuma the Puma "ukuthi ubaba wakhe akaze amsekele kakhulu ebholeni lakhe, engakholelwa kuye, emtshela ukuthi akasoze alunga, akaze eze emidlalweni yakhe futhi uhlala esebenza njalo.Ngesikhathi uZuma ethuthela kwiOrlando Pirates ngo1998,ubaba wakhe wamtshela ukuthi "Abadlali abahle badlala eqenjini lesizwe."Uyise kaZuma ushone ngosuku olwandulela olwedlule lokuthi indodana yakhe idlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala eqenjini lesizwe laseNingizimu Afrika 
UZuma, owazalelwa eThekwini, KwaZulu-Natal, uqale umsebenzi wakhe emaqenjini aseNingizimu Afrika iMighty Pa, African Wanderers ne-Orlando Pirates. 
NgoJuni 2000, uZuma wajoyina iqembu laseDenmark iFC Copenhagen, lapho aqhakaza khona njengomdlali. 
Ngo2001 uZuma waboshelwa endaweni yama-29 kumklomelo weFIFA World Player of the Year ngo2001. 
USibusiso Vilakazi (owazalwa 29 Disemba 1989) umdlali waseNingizimu Afrika webhomaodlala njengenhlangano mdlali ehlasela i neMamelodi Sundowns e-Premier Soccer League.Ku-2013-2014 Premier Soccer League unqobe umdlali wesizini nomdlali wabadlali besizini ngemuva kokudlala okuvelele isizini yonke.Uphinde wawina umdlali weNedbank Cup walo mqhudelwano ngesizini ka-2013-2014. 
UVilakazi udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala eNingizimu Afrika ngomhlaka 12 Okthoba 2013 bedlala ngokulingana ngo 1-1 neMorocco e- Adrar Stadium.

USibusiso Joel "S'bu" Ndebele (owazalwa ngomhlaka 17 Okthoba 1948) wayenguNgqongqoshe Wezokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo owasebenza kusukela ngonyaka wezi-2012 kuya kowezi-2014. [1]Ube eseKomitini Eliphezulu Likazwelonke (i-NEC) le- African National Congress (ANC) kusukela ngo-1997, futhi waba nguSihlalo Wesifundazwe we-ANC kusukela ngonyaka we-1998 kuya kowe-2008. [2] 
Kusukela ngo-1994 kuya ku-2004 yena waba UNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha kuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natali isifundazwe.Kusukela ngo-2004 kuya ku-2009 wayenguNdunankulu wesifundazwe saseNingizimu Afrika saKwaZulu-Natali. 
Kusukela ngo-2009 kuya ku-2012 wayenguNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha kuzwelonke. [1] 
Uma elapho, wayeya esikoleni samabanga aphansi e- Makhaseneni, eduze eMelmoth,futhi umatric osuka eShowe Teachers 'Ukuqeqesha kanye High School eShowe . 
Wathola iziqu zesayensi yomtapo wolwazi e- University of Zululand ngo-1972, wenza iziqu zeBachelor of Arts kwi-International Politics ne-African Politics e-University of South Africa ngo-1983, kanti wenza iziqu ze-honors kwi-Development Administration nePolitiki ngo-1985. [1] 
Wayengunobhala wezokwazisa weSouth African Students Organisation e-University of Zululand (1972).Ngokushesha ngemuva kwalokho, ngo-1974, wajoyina i-African National Congress ngomshoshaphansi waya ekudingisweni eSwazini .Waboshelwa imisebenzi ye-ANC ngoMeyi 1976 wagwetshwa iminyaka eyishumi eRobben Island ngoJuni 1977. 
USibusiso Edward Hadebe (owazalwa ngomhla ka-14 Meyi 1987) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo waseNingizimu Afrika odlalela iPlatinum Stars, njenge-winger yangakwesokunxele. 
Uzalelwe eStanderton, phambilini uke wadlalela i- Ajax Cape Town, iPretoria University, iJomo Cosmos naMaZulu. 
USibusiso Khumalo (owazalwa 8 Mashi 1991) ngumdlali webhola ongubani okwamanje udlala njengendlela mdlali. 
Ungumkhiqizo wohlelo lwentsha lweSwallows.UKumalo ukhushulelwe eqenjini lokuqala ngesizini ka2010-11 futhi waba yinto ejwayelekile eqenjini lokuqala leqembu, esetshenziswa kakhulu njengobambele. 
Kusukela ngoMashi 2019, uKhumalo ubesehlala eqenjini leSundowns.Kodwa-ke, wadedelwa ngoSepthemba 2019. [2] 
Ngo-4 Ncwaba 2009, uDuma waphinde wabekwa amacala mayelana namanye amacala akhe.Ngomhlaka 17 Agasti 2009, iJaji elibambile uKobus Booyens laphinde lagweba odilikajele abayisithupha nokugwetshwa iminyaka ejele iminyaka engu-104.Uthe uhlose ukuthi uDuma asuswe unomphela emphakathini. 
USibusiso uDerrick Duma (owazalwa 6 Meyi 1984) umalugaju owagwetshwa ukubulala ababili ngo-2007 futhi ezinhlanu zokubulala-2009 base begwetshwa 8 odilikajele ejele. [1]Ubekhuthele kakhulu eDolobheni laseMgungundlovu, KwaZulu Natali. 
UDuma ngudokotela wengqondo onodlame owayedla ukweba, ukuthumba, ukuhlukumeza, ukudlwengula nokubulala . 
Usebenze njengomshayeli wetekisi futhi usebenzise imoto yakhe njengesikhali kwesinye isikhathi nokuthola izisulu zakhe. 
Ukucabanga kukaDuma, ukuhlukunyezwa kwakhe kanye nendlela yakhe yokushintsha kwesinye isikhathi kusuka kwesisulu kuye kwesisulu, okukhombisa ukuthi wayengumbulali ongahlelekile. 
Ngosuku olulandelayo, uDuma waduna, wadubula wabulala amadoda amabili; Masizane Mtshatsha noThamsanqua Mbindwane. 
Kwehora, manje ngemoto utshontshe yohlobo lweVW Polo, Duma bathunjwa izisulu ezintathu olunye; UTsepo Mhlongo, uLinda Jali nentombazane esakhula.Laba bobabili babanjwa inkunzi, bayalelwa ukuba baphume emotweni, badutshulwa bahamba becabanga ukuthi bafa. 
UDuma nozakwabo, uSimphiwe Khesi, bathathe le ntombazanyana bayiyisa emathuneni ase-Azalea lapho beyidlwengule khona. 
UDuma ube esehamba ngemoto eyebiwe phezu kwale ntombazane amahlandla amaningi ukuyibulala. [1] 
Ekugcineni, ngomhlaka 25 Okthoba 2007, uDuma wathumba, waphanga, wadlwengula wabulala uthisha wasePinetown, uNoxolo Dlamini 
Ekuqaleni uDuma wabekwa icala, walahlwa yicala wagwetshwa kanye noSimphiwe Khesi ngokubulala uKippen no-Anderson ngomhlaka-14 Novemba 2007. 
UMengameli wamaJaji uVuka Tshabalala ugwebe la madoda iminyaka engu-15 umuntu emunye ngokuzama ukubamba inkunzi u-Anderson futhi wagweba uDuma iminyaka engu-15 ngokubamba inkunzi uKippen noKhesi iminyaka engu-20, ngaphezu kwezigwebo zodilikajele ngecala lokubulala.Womabili la madoda ahleka lapho egwetshwa ethi, "Bafile manje.Bakhathazeka ngani? " [1] 
"I-Heterosexual Sodomy " (ucansi lwendunu kanye / noma ngomlomo nomuntu wobulili obuhlukile) akukho emthethweni, i-Article 388 ye-Penal Code. 
Kanye nayo yonke imikhuba yezocansi yabantu bobulili obufanayo, i-Article 338, kanye "nokuthukuthelisa isimilo somphakathi", i-Article 333.Isijeziso semisebenzi emibili yokuqala nalabo abangaphansi kweminyaka engu-19 sinzima kakhulu kulowo obambe iqhaza osekhulile. [1] 
Ikhodi entsha yokujezisa eqala ukusebenza ngoFebhuwari 2021 ingeza ukuvikelwa kokuthambekela kwezocansi futhi isuse ubugebengu "bemikhuba emibi nemvelo", ebikade isetshenziselwa ukwenza ubugebengu ubulili obufanayo. 
Iminyaka yemvume e- Afrika yokwenza ucansi iyehluka ngokwamandla ezwekazi lonke.Umsebenzi othile ohilelekile noma ubulili babahlanganyeli bawo nawo ungathinta le minyaka kanye nokuba semthethweni kwezenzo zocansi. 
Ngezansi kunengxoxo yemithetho eyahlukahlukene ephathelene nale ndaba. 
Iminyaka egqanyisiwe isho iminyaka noma ngaphezulu lapho umuntu angazibandakanya ebudlelwaneni bezocansi obunganqandekile nomunye umuntu naye oseminyakeni noma ngaphezulu kwalokho.Ezinye izinto eziguqukayo, ngokwesibonelo ukuhlinzekwa kobungqingili kanye / noma ukuhlinzekwa kwabantu bobulili obufanayo okungekho emthethweni noma okusondele eminyakeni yobudala okungahle kube khona futhi kuyashiwo lapho kufanelekile. 
Ubudala bemvume yezenzo zobungqingili ("izenzo ezingcolile noma izenzo eziphikisana nemvelo") zingama-21 
Iminyaka yokuvuma ingu- 18, kusukela kuMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ikhodi Yephenal 2018,Ubudlelwano bobungqingili sebuvumelekile ngokusemthethweni kusuka ngoJulayi 2019. 
Ngaphansi kwe- Penal Code entsha ka-2009 (ngesiFulentshi), iminyaka yokuvuma eBurundi kwabesilisa nabesifazane (abesilisa nabesifazane) yiminyaka eyi- 18. [1] Kodwa-ke, ngaphansi kwe- Article 567, izenzo zobungqingili (abesilisa nabesifazane) zithwala inhlawulo efinyelela kuma-franc angu-100 000 aseBurundi kuze kube yiminyaka emithathu ejele. 
Ngezansi kunohlu lwazo zonke iziphathimandla e-Afrika njengoba kubhalwe ohlwini lwamazwe azimele kanye nezindawo ezincike e-Afrika. 
Iminyaka yokuvuma eGibhithe yiminyaka eyi-18, yabesilisa nabesifazane. 
Lokhu kuchazwe endatshaneni 269 yekhodi yokujezisa. 
Ukuthengisa ngomzimba akukho emthethweni kanti nomthetho wezocansi usetshenzisiwe ngokumelene nabangqingili besilisa nabesifazane. 
Iminyaka yokuvuma e-Eritrea ibonakala ineminyaka engu- 18, njengoba kushiwo ku-Article 305 wekhodi yango-2015, "Intukuthelo yezocansi kubantwana abaphakathi kweminyaka engu-15 no-18 ubudala".Lo mbhalo uthi izenzo zocansi nezingane ezingaphansi kwalesi sikhathi kuyicala elincane elijeziswa izinyanga eziyisithupha kuya kweziyisithupha ejele. 
Ama-cognates amaningi kwezinye izilimi, njenge- French sodomie (isenzo sodomiser ), sodomía yaseSpain (isenzo sodomizar ),kanye ne- Portuguese sodomia (isenzo sodomizar ), isetshenziselwa kuphela ucansi lwendunu lokungena, okungenani kusukela ekuqaleni kwekhulu leshumi nesishiyagalolunye.Kulezo zilimi, leli gama futhi livame ukuba ngolimi lwendabuko (hhayi nje ngokomthetho, ngokungafani nakwamanye amasiko) kanye nendlela esemthethweni yokubhekisa kunoma imuphi umkhuba wokungena ngendunu;wobulili izwi liphathelene kwemvume futhi injabulo mayelana zonke abathintekayo futhi ngokuvamile uyakugwema ukusho kuwo ngqo izici ezimbili ezivamile zenhlalo Taboo-Ubulili kanye ingquza - ngaphandle nokuyeka noma isetshenziswe ngomqondo zakudala ngokusetshenziswa kwayo. 
NgesiJalimane sanamuhla, igama elithi Sodomie ayinakho ukuqondaniswa nobulili bendunu noma bomlomo futhi ibhekisa ikakhulukazi ekulindeni nezilwane.[1]Okufanayo kuya ngePoland sodomia.sodomia.Igama lesiNorway elithi sodomi kuthwala zombili izinzwa. 
NgesiDanish, sodomi Kuhunyushwa ngokuthi " ulwazi olungokwemvelo olungokwemvelo nomuntu wobulili obufanayo noma (manje) nezilwane. 
Ngo -Arabhu futhi Persian, igama elithi sodomy, ‎ liwāṭ Arabhu: liwāṭ ;Ukubiza amagama asePheresiya lavât ), itholakala emthonjeni ofanayo nasenkambisweni yaseNtshonalanga,inezincazelo ezifanayo kakhulu nesiNgisi (kubhekiswa ezenzweni zocansi eziningi ezingavunyelwe yiKurani ).Ukubhekiswa kwayo ngqo kuLoti (لوط Lūṭ ngesi-Arabhu) kanye nokuhunyushwa okungokoqobo kwegama elithi "umkhuba kaLoti",kepha ngokunembile kusho ukuthi "umkhuba wabantu bakaLoti"(abaseSodoma) kunokuba uLoti uqobo 
Ngenkathi inkolo nomthetho kube nendima ebalulekile encazelweni yomlando nasekujezisweni kobungqingili, imibhalo yezocansi iveza amathuba amaningi okungaqondakali nokuchazwa.I-Sodomy kokubili kuyenzeka kwangempela nesigaba esicabangwayo.Esikhathini sekhulu leshumi nesishiyagalombili,okukhonjwa njenge-sodomy kuvame ukukhonjiswa ngokusebenza komuntu ngokwesibonelo, noma ukuphikisana nenkulumo yobudoda. 
"ukufundwa okwanele nokuqanjiwe kuhilela uchungechunge lokungenelela okuhlangana ngezikhathi ezithile lapho imilando iba izindaba, amanga kanye nokwakhiwa kabusha kwempikiswano enempilo kanye, naseduze," nobungqingili bobungqingili. . . 
Ukwakha kabusha lokho esicabanga ukuthi sikubona kungabandakanya ukuzakha kabusha ngezindlela ezimangazayo nezingalindelekile". 
Sodomy ( /s ɒ d əm i / ) noma buggery ( British English ) ngokuvamile ucansi lwendunu noma ubulili bomlomo phakathi kwabantu noma umsebenzi wocansi komuntu isilwane okungezona ezabantu ( nesilwane ), kodwa kungase futhi kusho noma ukuphi ucansi elingekho lokuzalai.Ekuqaleni, igama elithi sodomy, elisuselwa endabeni yeSodoma neGomora eNcwadini kaGenesise,lalivame ukuvinjelwa ocansini lwendunu.Imithetho yeSodomy emazweni amaningi yenza lokhu kuziphatha kube yicala.Emazweni aseNtshonalanga, eminingi yale mithetho iguquliwe noma kaningi ayiphoqelelwa. 
ITestamente Elisha, njengeTestamente Elidala, likhomba iSodoma njengendawo yentukuthelo kaNkulunkulu ngokumelene nesono, kepha incwadi kaJude inikeza isigaba esithile sesono njengembangela yokubhujiswa kwaso,okushiwo okuyimpikiswano ngaso. 
Leli gama lisuselwa ku- Ecclesiastical Latin peccatum Sodomiticum noma "isono saseSodoma",sona esivela egameni lasendulo lesiGreki elithi Σόδομα (ISódoma).UGenesise (izahluko18-20) usitshela ukuthi uNkulunkulu wayefisa kanjani ukubhubhisa imizi "enesono" yaseSodoma naseGomora.Izingelosi ezimbili zimenywa uLoti ukuba ziphephele nomndeni wakhe ebusuku. 
Amadoda aseSodoma azungeze indlu kaLoti futhi afuna ukuba akhiphe izithunywa ukuze "zizazi" (le nkulumo ifaka nezincazelo zocansi).ULoti ubhikisha ethi "izithunywa" izivakashi zakhe futhi unikeza abaseSodoma amadodakazi akhe ayizintombi esikhundleni salokho, kodwa-ke basongela ngokuthi "bazokwenza okubi kakhulu" noLoti kunalokho abebengenza ngezivakashi zakhe.Khona-ke izingelosi zashaya abaseSodoma izimpumputhe, "baze bazikhathaza ukuthola umnyango" (Genesise 19: 4-11, KJV ). 
Incazelo kaJustinian yendaba yaseSodoma kungenzeka ukuthi yayikhohliwe namuhla (njengabanye Uyibambe wayekade,kanye novelizations bakhe umthetho ophathelene kokuziphatha kobungqingili ngokuthi ngokushesha ngemva kokufa kwakhe) kwakungcono akazange enziwe ukusetshenziswa e inkohliso Charlemagnian capitularies bhila ngumuntu Frankish indela usebenzisa mbumbulu Benedictus Levita ("Benedict umLevi")azungeze 850 AD, njengengxenye yePseudo-Isidore.Izinduna ezintathu zikaBenedict Levita, ikakhulukazi eziphathelene nokuchazwa kukaJustinian ngendaba yaseSodoma, kwakungu: 
("Cha. 21: Kumacala amaningi ahlazisayo") I-CXLIII. 
("No. 143: On imikhuba emibi ngenxa yesono lapho imibuso iye yawa khona, ukuze senze konke okusemandleni ethu ukuba siyixwaye") I-CLX. 
("No. 160: Kubabenzi bezenzo zobubi ezininginingi") 
Ukushisa bekuyingxenye yesijeziso esijwayelekile sokuziphatha kobungqingili, ikakhulu okujwayele ukwenziwa kwaseJalimane(njengokusho kwezinganekwane zamaJalimane, ukuphambuka ngokocansi ikakhulukazi isifiso sobulili obufanayo kubangelwe uhlobo lobubi noma ububi obungokomoya obubizwa ngokuthi yi-nith,okwenza ukuthi labo bantu babonakale it njengoba fiends non-human, njengoba nithings).UBenedictus Levita cishe wayengowesizwe samaJalimane samaFranks 
Benedictus Levita titfutfukiswe okushiwo i sodomy nazo zonke izenzo zobulili akuhlobene ukuzala ke ukuthi abangu uthathwa esiphikisayo nemvelo(ngakho Ngokwesibonelo,ngisho indlwabu yodwa bezoziphatha anal phakathi owesilisa nowesifazane zambozwa),ngenkathi phakathi lezi,wayesalokhu kugcizelelwe zonke izenzo zokuziphatha azenzeki phakathi kwabantu besilisa nabesifazane, ikakhulukazi ubungqingili. 
Isizathu sikaBenedictus Levita sasiwukuthi ukujeziswa kwezenzo ezinjalo kwakuwukuvikela bonke ubuKrestu ezijezisweni zikaNkulunkulu, ezinjengezinhlekelele zemvelo zezono zenyama ezenziwe ngabantu,kodwa nangenxa yokuhlubuka,inkolelo-ze nobuzwe.Ngenxa yokuthi izimfuno zakhe ezibalulekile zokujeziswa ngokufa zazingakaze zizwakale emlandweni wezenkolo ngaphambili,kususelwa kumqondo wobuntu wobukristu wentethelelo nesihe,kwathatha amakhulu eminyaka ngaphambi kokuba izimfuno zikaBenedictus Levita zokuguqulwa kwezomthetho ziqale ukubonakala ngaphakathi kwezinhlelo ezinkulu zebandla. 
Lokhu kwenzeka ngokuQulwa Kwamacala Ezihlubuki Kwangenkathi Ephakathi ngo-1184.Amahlelo amaCathars kanye namaWaldsians ayeyisisulu esivamile, futhi laba bahlubuki babengashushiswa kuphela ngenxa yezinsolo zobusathane, kepha babebekwa amacala okufeba nobudoda.Ngo-1307, izinsolo zokukhwabanisa nobungqingili zazingamacala amakhulu akhishwa ngesikhathi sokuqulwa kwecala leKnights Templar.Amanye ala macala abhekiswe ngqo kuGrand Master we-oda, uJacques de Molay.Yilo mcimbi oholele ekuzingelweni kwabathakathi bangezikhathi zasendulo nezasendulo nakho obekuhlobene kakhulu nesodomy. 
Ukushushiswa kwamaCathars nehlelo lamaBogomiles eBulgaria kwaholela ekusetshenzisweni kwegama elihlobene kakhulu nesodomy:i-buggery ivela ku-French bouggerie, okusho ukuthi "kweBulgaria".[1]Inhlangano ka sodomy nge hereticism,ubusathane, nokuthakatha sasekelwa iNkantolo Yamacala Ezihlubuki nokulingwa.[2] 
I-Book of Wisdom, efakwe ohlwini lwezincwadi zeBhayibheli ngabama-Orthodox namaRoma Katolika,kepha engafakwanga ngamaJuda anamuhla, amaProthestani,namanye amahlelo obuKristu,ikhuluma ngendaba yaseSodoma, igcizelela ngokuqhubekayo ukuthi isono sabo bebehluleka ukwamukela izihambi: 
"Futhi izijeziso zehlela izoni ngaphandle kwezimpawu zangaphambili ngamandla okuduma: ngoba zahlupheka ngokufanele ngokokukhohlakala kwazo,kangangoba zazisebenzisa indlela elukhuni nenenzondo kubantu abangabazi." 
"Ngoba abaseSodoma ababamukelanga labo ababengabazi lapho befika:kepha laba baletha abangani ebugqilini obubafanele." 
( KJV 
Ukuhlolwa kwezilingo zokudlwengulwa nokudlwengula phakathi nekhulu le-18 e- Old Bailey eLondon kukhombisa ukuthi ukwelashwa kokudlwengulwa kwakuvame ukuthambile, kanti ukwelashwa kwesodomy kwakuvame ukuba nzima. 
Kodwa-ke,ubunzima bokufakazela ukuthi ukungena nokungena kwendoda kwenzeka kwasho ukuthi amadoda ayevame ukutholwa enecala elincane "lokushaya ngenhloso yobungqingili," okwakungeyona icala lokufa.Amacala eSodomy eNgilandi angasho ukuthi "ukuhlukumeza ngokocansi ingane encane," futhi angaholela ekutheni isigwebo sokufa siqoshwe, okungukuthi, hhayi isigwebo sentambo nhlobo. 
Ngekhulu le-18 eFrance, isodomy kwakusacatshangelwa ukuthi kuyicala lokufa, futhi kunamacala ambalwa lapho abulawa khona.Kodwa-ke, kokuningi kwalokhu, obunye ubugebengu babandakanyeka futhi.Amarekhodi aqhamuka eBastille nephoyisa lika-lieutenant d'Argenson, kanye neminye imithombo, akhombisa ukuthi abaningi ababoshiwe bathunjwa, bathunyelwa embuthweni, noma baboshwa ezindaweni (ngokuvamile isibhedlela) ezihlobene namacala okuziphatha (njengobufebe).Kulaba, iningi labo lalibandakanyeka ekudayiseni ngomzimba noma lalike lakhuluma nezingane, noma ngenye indlela ladlula nje ngokuba nobuhlobo bobungqingili.URavaisson(umbhali wekhulu le-19 owahlela amarekhodi e-Bastille) uphakamise ukuthi iziphathimandla zithanda ukusingatha la macala ngobuhlakani,hleze ukujeziswa esidlangalaleni empeleni kumemezele "lo mkhuba." 
Izikhathi zesikhathi kwesinye isikhathi zazibizwa ngama-sodomites aziwayo, futhi kwesinye isikhathi, zaze zaphakamisa nokuthi i-sodomy yayanda kakhulu.Lokhu akusho ukuthi abesilisa abathandanayo babehlala ngokulondeka — ngokwesibonelo, izikhulu ezithile zamaphoyisa, zazibheka amaTuileries, ngisho nalapho kwakuyindawo “yokuhamba ngezinyawo”eyaziwayo.Kepha, njengokuziphatha okuningi kwezocansi ngaphansi koMthetho Omdala,ukuqonda kwakukhathazeka kakhulu kuzo zonke izinhlangothi (ikakhulukazi ngoba amalungu emindeni evelele kwesinye isikhathi ayethinteka);umthetho wawubonakala ukhathazeke kakhulu ngalabo ababengaqondakali kangako 
Ekusetshenzisweni kwamanje, leli gama lisetshenziswa ikakhulukazi emthethweniImithetho evimbela ubungqingili ibonwa kaningi emiphakathini yangaphambilini yamaJuda,yamaKrestu neyamaSulumane, kepha leli gama alisebenzisi kangako ngaphandle kwe-Afrika, i-Asia ne-United States. 
Imithetho eyenza ubugebengu bobulili obufanayo kungavamisile ukuthi ichaze izenzo eziqondile zocansi, kepha ngokujwayelekile izinkantolo zihlanganisa ukufaka noma isiphi isenzo socansi esibonwa njengesingemvelo noma esingenasimilo.I-Sodomy imvamisa ifaka ucansi lwendunu, ucansi lomlomo, nokulala nesilwane.Ekusebenteni, imithetho sodomy baye akuvamile kuye iphoqelelwe ngokumelene kwabobulili imibhangqwana, futhi ikakhulukazi isetshenzisiwe target ongqingili. [1] 
Kusukela ngoJuni 2019,amazwe angama-69 kanye neziphathimandla ezinhlanu ezingaphansi kwezwe lonke [lower-alpha 1] zinemithetho eyenza ubugebengu bobungqingili bube yicala.[1]Ngo-2006 lelo nani lalingama-92.[2]Phakathi kwala mazwe angama-69, angama-44 awo enza ubugebengu bobungqingili besilisa hhayi kuphela kodwa nobungqingili besifazane. 
Kubo abangu-11,ubungqingili bujeziswa ngesigwebo sentambo. [1] 
Le mithetho eUnited States iphonselwe inselelo futhi kwesinye isikhathi itholakale ingahambisani nomthethosisekelo noma yathathelwa indawo imithetho ehlukile 
Incazelo yendabuko ibona isono sokuqala seSodoma njengezenzo zobulili ezi-homoerotic, [1]ehlanganisa ukulandisa kweSodoma noLevitikusi 18, okubalula ubugebengu obuhlukahlukene bezocansi, okuthi, ngokwevesi 27 no-28, bube nomphumela wokuthi umhlaba ube "kungcolisiwe": 
ngoba abakhileyo ezweni, ababengaphambi kwakho, bazenzile zonke lezi zinengiso, izwe langcoliswa; ngaphandle kwalokho izwe liyokuhlanza ngokulihlanza, njengoba lahlanza isizwe esasiphambi kwakho. 
Ezinye izazi, ezinjengoPer-Axel Sverker, baqondanisa lesi siqephu nencazelo yendabuko,bethi igama elithi isinengiso libhekisa ekuziphatheni okubi ngokobulili, nokuthi ngenkathi izenzo ze-homoerotic kungezona zodwa izizathu ezalahlwa iSodoma neGomora,kwakuyingxenye ebalulekile Isithombe 
Abanye, bokuqala kubo kwakunguDerrick Sherwin Bailey,bathi le ndima iphikisana nencazelo yendabuko ngokuphelele. 
Ngokubona kwabo,izono zaseSodoma zazihlobene kakhulu nokwephula imithetho yokungenisa izihambi kunezono zocansi.[1]Lokhu futhi kuvumelana nokuhumusha kwendabuko kwamaJuda kwale mibhalo futhi 
Ngenkathi iQuran iyilahla ngokusobala imikhuba yezocansi "yabantu bakaLoti" ("Yini, kuzo zonke izidalwa eniza emadodeni,futhi nishiye amakhosikazi eniyenzelwe yiNkosi yenu?"[1] ),indima eyodwa kuphela ngezikhathi ezithile kwahunyushwa njengokuthatha isikhundla esithile somthetho maqondana nemisebenzi enjalo: 
labo abanecala lehlazo elivela phakathi kwabesifazane benu, bizani ofakazi abane (kofakazi) abane abaphakathi kwenu; khona-ke uma benikeza ubufakazi bavalele ezindlini kuze kube yilapho ukufa kubasusa noma Allah ebavulela indlela ethile (15).Kepha labo abanecala lenu phakathi kwenu, banikeleni isijeziso; khona-ke uma bephenduka futhi belungisa, bafulathele; Impela uAllah Uyabuya (Emseni) Onesihawu. 
Igama elithi sod, ibizo noma isenzo (to "sod off") elisetshenziswe njengenhlamba, lisuselwa kusodomite.Kuyinkulumo ehlambalaza inhloso ejwayelekile yanoma ngubani isikhulumi esingamthandi ngaphandle kokubhekiswa ngqo ekuziphatheni kwabo ngokocansi. 
ISod isetshenziswa njenge-slang e-United Kingdom nase- Commonwealth futhi ithathwa njengecasulayo.(Igama elithi 'sod' linencazelo futhi ye "(clump of) earth" ene-etymology engahlobene,lapho kungukuthi kuyivelakancane kepha ayicasuli. 
Amakhosikazi asolwandle yizitabane ezasebenza emikhunjini ikakhulu yabathengisi achazwa ngaphambi kweminyaka yama-1960.Kwakumelwe ogxile effeminate gay indoda eyayisebenza noma ukuzijabulisa noma njengoba oweta ku kufika imikhumbi, ngokuvamile ekubeni off-ogwini 'abafazi' ngoba kwabobulili amatilosi kuze kuphele isikhathi uhambo lomkhumbi.Zingatholwa futhi ngaphakathi kweNavy njenge monograph yomlando ongeyona inganekwane Sawubona Sailor!Umlando Ofihliwe Wokuphila Kobungqingili Olwandle uchaza ngezindaba kanye nokuhlangenwe nakho kwezindlovukazi zasolwandle ezivela kuNavy.Ngaphezu kwalokhu, ukusetshenziswa kolimi lwePolari kungabuyiselwa emuva ezindlovukazi zasolwandle kanye nokuzama ukuxoshwa kwezitabane, amatilosi angamadoda eNewport,Rhode Island ngemuva kweWWI. 
Ngesikhathi sama-1950s kanye nama-1960s amaphesenti amakhulu amadoda angama-gay aqala ukujoyina uMbutho Wezempi.KumaNavy, abesilisa abayizitabane bangakhuluma iqiniso ngobulili babo.Bayisebenzisile njengendawo yokuphuma yenkululeko lapho bengaziveza khona,noma ngabe lokho bekungezembatho ezihlukile noma ezinye izici futhi bekwazi ukwenza lokhu ngaphandle kokwesaba ukubandlululwa. 
Ukujoyina uMbutho Wezasolwandle kwaba ukuphunyuka kwabantu abakhonjwa njengongqingili futhi bengafuni ukufihla ubulili babo.Bangaya bayoziveza ukuthi bafuna kanjani ngokweqiniso futhi bazungezwe abanye abazizwa befana nabo.Lokhu kuphikisana nempilo amadoda athandana nawo abezobuyela emhlabeni.Emuva ngezizathu zomzimba zaseBrithani, abesilisa abayizitabane baphoqeleka ukuba bavalwe futhi bagcine ubulili babo kubo.Amadoda angamaGay angafuni ukufihla ajoyine i-navy ukuze avulekele uqobo lwawo.Njengoba izinombolo zikhuphuka,kwakha umphakathi wabantu abesilisa abayizitabane.Njengoba abesilisa abayizitabane emhlabeni bephoqeleka ukuba bahlale befihlekile, abaningi bebengeke bazi ngamanye amadoda abengabungqingili,okwenza ukuthi amathuba emiphakathi angabi njengalawo aseNavy. 
Izitabane kungenzeka ukuthi zisebenzise iPolari ukuxhumana ngalezi zikhathi.IPolari kwakuwulimi olunamakhodi olusetshenziswa amadoda angama-gay asebenzisa izingathekiso nokubhala amagama noma ukwakha amagama ukukhuluma ngesihloko sobungqingili ngaphandle kwabanye abaseduze kwabo azi.Ulimi oluyimfihlo belungasetshenziswa ukukhuluma ngobulili babo ngaphandle kokuthi abanye baqoqe engxoxweni yabo babakhiphe ngokuthi bayizitabane.Kwaze kwasetshenziswa nemisakazo ethile ukusho amahlaya ezitabane ngaphandle kokuthi umuntu abone ukuthi bashayelani.Amadoda angamaGay asebenzisa iPolari ayevame ukuzibiza "ngendlovukazi" engadonswa ngokuhambisana nokusetshenziswa kwezindlovukazi zasolwandle.Kungenzeka ukuthi igama elithile kube wukwehluka kwelinye. 
Umphakathi wamakhosikazi asolwandle kanye nenani elichumayo lezitabane eMbuthweni Wezempi kwakungewona ukuphela komcimbi owawenzeka ngalesi sikhathi.Eminye imicimbi eminingi ingaxhunyaniswa nokwanda kwabantu bezitabane, kepha bekungapheli ngaso sonke isikhathi ngendaba enhle ongayitshela.Umcimbi owodwa obalulekile ungakhunjulwa kusuka esenzakalweni esiseNewport, eRhode Island lapho izitabane,amatilosi angamadoda ayekhonjwa amasosha, ecwaswa,futhi ayeboshwa uma etholakala eyisitabane.Uhulumeni waqala ukuhlasela abesilisa abayizitabane futhi wayebafuna ngamabomu.Ezimweni eziningi kwakukhona ubufakazi obuncane kakhulu obumelene nala madoda obudala ithuba eliphakeme lokuthi atholakale eyizitabane,noma ngabe kwakungukuthambekela okuncane kakhulu ukuthi angaba yisitabane.Lokhu kusho ukuthi abaningi nabo babemangalelwa ngamanga ngokuba izitabane. 
IPride House indawo yesikhashana ezinikele ebamba iqhaza kubasubathi bezitabane, izitabane, abesilisa nabesifazane kanye nama-transgender ( LGBT ),abanikeli kanye nezivakashi ezihambela ama-Olimpiki, amaParalympics noma eminye imicimbi yezemidlalo yamazwe omhlaba edolobheni elisingethwe.Owokuqala wahlelelwa i-Vancouver 2010 Olympic Olympics. 
Indawo yaseVancouver yePride House ibigcinwe ngaphakathi kwesikhungo saseQmunity.Ngesikhathi sama- Olimpiki wasebusika ka -2010, iVancouver neWhistler Pride Houses zazisebenza njengezindawo zabadlali bezemidlalo be-LGBT, abaqeqeshi, izivakashi nabangane babo, imindeni nabasekeli,futhi baba yizindlu zokuqala zokuziqhenya kuma-Olimpiki.Yize zombili lezi zindlu zokuziqhenya zinikela ngemininingwane nezinsizakalo kubasubathi be-LGBT nabahambele indawo, indawo yaseWhistler ePan Pacific Village Centre "inengqikithi yokugubha",ngenkathi indawo yaseVancouver igcizelela ezemfundo ngomphakathi we-LGBT waseVancouver futhi, kubadlali abangewona abaseCanada, imininingwane mayelana ukufudukela nokukhoseliswa eCanada, kufaka phakathi "izinsiza zomthetho" ezivela e- Egale Canada kanye ne-International Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Trans and Intersex Association (IGLA). [1] 
UThabang Sampson Makwetla MP ( /k m ə w t ɛ l ə /, ozalwa 18 Meyi 1957)kuyinto eNingizimu Afrika sezombusazwe inxusa -African National Congress (ANC) . 
Uyilungu lesiGungu Sikazwelonke SaseNingizimu Afrika futhi useyiPhini likaNgqongqoshe Wezokuvikela kanye namaVeteran Omasosha,okuyindima asebenza kuyo phambilini phakathi kuka-2009 no-2014.Uke futhi wasebenza njengePhini likaNgqongqoshe Wezobulungiswa Nokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo,futhi wayenguNdunankulu wesifundazwe saseMpumalanga phakathi konyaka we-2004 nowe-2009. [1] 
UThabang Johnny Lebese (24 Agasti 1973 - 22 Februwari 2012) Bekuwu mdlali webhola obabedlala amazing amazwe wonke. 
ULebese wadlalela ibhola lentsha i-Orlando Wanderers ne-Orlando Hotspurs,waphinde waqeqesha iKaizer Chiefs, Ria Stars, Orlando Pirates, Silver Stars, Moroka Swallows, Black Leopards neDynamos.Sekukonke, wadlala imidlalo engama-279 kwiPremier Soccer League ngesikhathi seminyaka engu-13 esebenza. 
ULebese utholele iNingizimu Afrika isicoco esisodwa ngo-1998, emdlalweni weCOSAFA Cup neNamibia. 
ULebese ushone ngo-22 Febhuwari 2012, eneminyaka engama-38,ngenxa yesifo esihlobene nengculazi. 
UThabang Thabong kwakuwuhlelo lwethelevishini lwezingane olufundisayo lwaseNingizimu Afrika olusakaza ekuseni phakathi nesonto kuSABC2.Uhlelo belunenhlanganisela yezinhlamvu zabantu nezopopayi kanye nezinye izithombe.Ayisasakazwa yiSABC. 
Uhlelo lolu lumayelana noTumi, owesifazane ohlala endlini eThabang Thabong nentombazane eneminyaka emine uTandi, kanye nezimbila zombili uTiki noToko.UTumi unguthisha,futhi ubuye abe ngumzali ohlelweni.Abalingiswa banezigemegeme, bacule izingoma, bafunde izincwadi futhi benze imidanso nokuzivocavoca umzimba.Uma benemibuzo, bavamise ukubuza iBlob, ibumba elenziwe ngobumba, elenza ukwakheka nezinto ukuphendula imibuzo yazo ngoba alikwazi ukukhuluma.Kanye ngesonto uThembi ovutha bhe uyangena neposi evela kubalandeli.Lezi zincwadi ziyafundwa bese imidwebo ethunyelweyo iyakhonjiswa

UThabang Mosiako (owazalwa ngomhlaka 23 Nhlolanja 1995) ungumgijimi waseNingizimu Afrika webanga elide. 
Ngo-2017,wabamba iqhaza emjahweni wabesilisa abaphezulu kuma- 2017 IAAF World Cross Country Championship abanjelwe eKampala, e-Uganda.Uqede endaweni yesi-47. 
Ngo-2019, wabamba iqhaza emjahweni wabesilisa abaphezulu kuma- 2019 IAAF World Cross Country Championship abanjelwe e-Aarhus, eDenmark.Uqede endaweni yesi-67. 
Udlale iHIT Gorica, Jomo Cosmos, FC Lyn Oslo, Le Mans UC ne-Orlando Pirates. 
UMolefe uphinde wadlalela iqembu lebhola likazwelonke laseNingizimu Afrika futhi waba yingxenye yeNdebe Yomhlaba yeFIFA yango-2002. 
Ngesikhathi esebenza emazweni angaphandle neNingizimu Afrika, uMolefe ubhekane noDavid Beckham owehle kabi ngenselelo futhi wafakwa endaweni yokuqala esiwombeni sesibili somdlalo wobungani ngaphambi kokuphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.U-Beckham, ukaputeni wase-England ngaleso sikhathi, wahlushwa isihlakala ngenxa yenselelo. 
UThabang Amod Monare (owazalwa ngomhlaka 16 Septhemba 1989) ungumdlali webhola likanobhutshuzwayo waseNingizimu Afrika odlala njengomdlali wasesiswini ophakathi neqembu leSouth African Premier Division i-Orlando Pirates. 
IThabong (okusho ukuthi 'indawo yenjabulo' eSotho saseNingizimu ) iyilokishi lesibili ngobukhulu ngemuva kwebotshabelo esifundazweni saseFree State eNingizimu Afrika.Leli lokishi lasungulwa phakathi neminyaka yokuhlukaniswa kwabantu abamnyama kanye nelokishi laseBronville kubantu bamakhaladi abakhelene nedolobha laseWelkom, ukuze kuhlinzwe abasebenzi ezimayini zegolide ezicebe kakhulu emhlabeni. 
Namuhla amalokishi aseThabong naseBronville anabantu ababalelwa ku200,000.Imvamisa iThabong ibhekiswa enhlanganisweni yeThabong neBronville (ilokishi langaphambili lamaKhaladi)yize iBronville ihlukaniswa njengelokishi elizimele laseWelkom. 
Abantu abavela eThabong naseBronville bayathenga eWelkom, kodwa-ke,ngezinga lapho ilokishi laseThabong likhula khona inxanxathela yezitolo entsha, "iBoitumelo Junction".Ku-25,500 m 2, ifakwe ihange nguShoprite,uBoxer nabanye abajwayelekile. 
Indawo ethakasela kakhulu futhi ethandekayo ikakhulukazi ngamaholide kaDisemba yiShopong Tsa Kgale okusho ukuthi 'Izitolo ezindala' Yilapho iThabong Kids ngokomfanekiso noma 'iBlack Diamonds' ihlangana khona ukuzithokozisa ikakhulukazi labo abasuke eThabong baya ezindaweni ezifana neGoli,iSandton,ERandburg, eRoodepoort,ePitoli,njll.

Leli lokishi lenza ingxenye kaMasipala waseMatjhabeng kuMasipala wesiFunda saseLejweleputswa, okubandakanya iWelkom.Leli lokishi ligcwele ukwehluka kwabantu ngenxa yabantu abaqhamuka emazweni ahlukahlukene afana neLesotho, Zimbabwe,Mozambique,njll bezosebenza ezimayini zaseGoldfields.Izilimi ezikhulunywa kakhulu eThabong isiSuthu zilandelwa isiXhosa. 
ISikhungo Sezemidlalo-Isikhungo sezemidlalo sikamasipala esinikela ngesibhakela, ibhola lombhoxo, ibhola likanobhutshuzwayo, ibhola lomnqakiswano, ithenisi,i-hockey, ikhilikithi,i-bowling, ukubhukuda nezinsiza zokulala 
Inkundla iZuka Baloyi Stadium,isikhungo semidlalo eminingi,okwamanje esisetshenziselwa ibhola likanobhutshuzwayo. 
Ikolishi iTosa FET eliseduze nedolobha iJerusalem Park kuhloswe ngalo ukuthola amathuba emisebenzi kanti i-Engineering bekuyiyona nto okugxilwe kuyo kakhulu. 
Isibalo sabantu abamnyama baseNingizimu Afrika abamnyama noma ababizwa kanjalo ngeBlack Diamonds kuleli lokishi sikhuphuke kakhulu ngamadolobha afana ne-Oppenheimer Park,Jerusalem Park,Mshongoville, Soweto kanye neLas Vegas. 
Unyawo (ubuningi: izinyawo ) isakhiwo se- anatomy esitholakala kuma-vertebrate amaningi.Kuyingxenye yokugcina yesitho esithwala isisindo futhi esivumela ukuqhuma.Ezilwaneni eziningi ezinezinyawo,unyawo luhlukile isitho engxenyeni yokugcina yomlenze esakhiwe yizingxenye noma amathambo noma ithambo elilodwa, ngokuvamile kufaka phakathi uzipho noma izipikili. 
Kungaba namathambo amaningi we-sesamoid eduze kwamalunga we-metatarsophalangeal, yize ekhona kuphela engxenyeni ye-distal yethambo lokuqala le-metatarsal.[1] 
Unyawo lomuntu lunamakhothamo amabili e- longitudinal kanye ne-arch enqamulelayo enakekelwa ukwakheka kokuhlangana kwamathambo ezinyawo, imisipha eqinile, nokudonsa imisipha ngesikhathi somsebenzi.Ukuhamba okuncane kwalawa makhothamo lapho isisindo sifakwa futhi sisuswe onyaweni kwenza ukuhamba nokugijima kube ukonga ngokwengeziwe ngamandla. 
Njengoba kungahlolwa ezinyaweni, i-medial longitudinal arch curves ngaphezu komhlaba.Leli khothamo lisuka ethanjeni lesithende ngaphezu kwethambo leqakala "lekhiye elingukhiye" liye kuzinsimbi ezintathu eziphakathi.Ngokuphambene, i-lateral longitudinal arch iphansi kakhulu. 
Njengoba i-cuboid isebenza njengetshe eliyisihluthulelo sayo, isabalalisa ingxenye yengxenye yesisindo ku-calcaneus nasekugcineni kwedatha yemetararsal yesihlanu.Ama-arch amabili e-longitudinal asebenza njengezinsika zetshe elijikelezayo eligijima ngokulingana ngaphesheya kwamalunga we-tarsometatarsal.Ukuhlukumezeka ngokweqile ezintanjeni nasemigudwini yezinyawo kungabangela ukugoqa okuwile noma izinyawo eziyizicaba.[1] 
Imisipha esebenza onyaweni ingahlukaniswa ibe yimisipha engaphandle,leyo evela engxenyeni yangaphakathi noma yangemuva yomlenze ongezansi,nemisipha yangaphakathi,evela ezicini zonyawo (phezulu) noma isitshalo (isisekelo) sonyawo. 
Yonke imisipha evela emlenzeni ongezansi ngaphandle kwemisipha ye-popliteus inamathiselwe emathanjeni onyawo.Itibia ne-fibula kanye nolwelwesi oluhlukanisayo luhlukanisa le misipha ibe ngamaqembu angaphambili nangemuva, ngokuhlukana kwabo kwahlukaniswa kwaba ngamaqenjana nezendlalelo.[1] 
Igama 
Igama elithi "unyawo", ngomqondo wencazelo "ingxenye yokugcina yomlenze wesilwane esinomgogodla" livela kunyawo "lwesiNgisi Esidala", kusuka ku-Proto-Germanic * fot (umthombo futhi we-Old Frisian fot, Old Saxon fot, I-Old Norse fotr, i-fod yaseDenmark, i-fot yaseSweden, i-voet yaseDashi, i-Old High fuoz yaseJalimane, i-German Fuß, i-Gothic fotus "unyawo"), kusuka kuzimpande ze-PIE * ped- "unyawo.""Izinyawo zezimo zobuningi ziyisibonelo sokuguquka komzimba." 
Ku-anatomy, ukubizela kungukuhamba okujikelezayo kwengalo (ejoyinini le-radioulnar) noma unyawo (kumajoyini angaphansi nethalocalcaneonavicular).Ukuphinyiselwa senyawo kusho ukuthi umzimba ihambisa isisindo njengoba imijikelezo ngokusebenzisa Gait.Ngesikhathi somjikelezo we-gait unyawo lungaphimisa ngezindlela eziningi ezahlukahlukene ngokuya ngomsebenzi we-footfoot ne-forefoot.Izinhlobo zokuphinyiselwa zifaka ukubiza okungathathi hlangothi, ukubizelwa phansi (ukukhishwa), nokubhalwa ngaphezulu. 
Umuntu neutrally pronates ekuqaleni ushaya phansi phezu lateral ohlangothini isithende.Njengoba umuntu ehambisa isisindo kusuka esithendeni kuya emethatarsus, unyawo luzogingqika luye ohlangothini oluphakathi, ukuze isisindo sisatshalaliswe ngokulinganayo kuwo wonke ama-metatarsus.Kulesi sigaba se-gait, idolo ngokuvamile, kodwa hhayi njalo, lizolandela ngqo ngaphezulu kwe- hallux. 
Lokhu kunyakaza kokungena ngaphakathi njengoba unyawo luqhubeka ukusuka esithendeni kuye ozwaneni yindlela umzimba ngokwemvelo omunca ngayo ukwethuka.Ukuphinyiselwa okungathathi hlangothi uhlobo oluhle kakhulu, olusebenzayo lwe-gait lapho usebenzisa isiteleka sesithende ;esitelekeni sangaphambili,umzimba umunca ukushaqeka esikhundleni ngokuguquguquka konyawo. 
Njengomabizeli ongathathi hlangothi, umuntu odlula ngaphezulu uqala ngokushaya phansi ohlangothini lwesithende.Njengoba umuntu ehambisa isisindo kusuka esithendeni esiya kwimetatarsus, noma kunjalo, unyawo luzogingqika kakhulu luye ohlangothini oluphakathi,ukuze isisindo sisatshalaliswe ngokungalingani kuyo yonke i-metatarsus,ngesisindo esedlulele esithwelwe ku-hallux.Kulesi sigaba se-gait, idolo ngokuvamile, kodwa hhayi njalo, lizolandela ngaphakathi. 
Izinyawo zosana . 
I-Underpronation 
Umuntu osebenzela ngaphansi uphinde aqale ngokushaya phansi ohlangothini lwe-lateral lwesithende.Njengoba umuntu ehambisa isisindo kusuka esithendeni uye emethatarsus, unyawo ngeke luzigingqe ngokwanele kusiqondisi sangaphakathi. 
Isisindo sisatshalaliswa ngokungalingani kuyo yonke i-metatarsus, ngesisindo esedlulele esithwalwa ku- metatarsal yesihlanu,kuya ohlangothini lwonyawo olulandelayo.Kulesi sigaba se-gait, idolo ngokuvamile, kodwa hhayi njalo, lizolandela ngemuva kwe- hallux . 
Igama elithi "unyawo" lisetshenziselwa ukubhekisa ku "...umugqa olinganiselwe wawuse-Old English (ubude obuqondile buye bahluka ngokuhamba kwesikhathi), lokhu kubhekwa njengobude bonyawo lomuntu; iyunithi yokukala esetshenziswa kabanzi futhi endulo.Ngalomqondo ubuningi buvame ukuba yizinyawo.I-intshi nezinyawo zamanje zishiwo kukalwa ku-12c. 
"Igama "unyawo" futhi linencazelo yomculo; a "... metric foot (sekwephuzile Old English, translating Latin pes, Greek pous ngomqondo ofanayo) kuvame ukuthathwa ukumela ukuphakama okukodwa nokuwa konyawo:ukugcina isikhathi ngokusho kwabanye, ukudansa ngokuya kwabanye." [1] 
UMasipa ufake isandla emthethweni wamacala mayelana nemisebenzi yomthethosisekelo yohulumeni basekhaya ehlobene nezindlu esinqumweni sakhe sango-2009 ngeBlue Moonlight Properties v Abahlali baseSaratoga Avenue 
UMasipa wayeyijaji eliphethe ecaleni lika-Oscar Pistorius ngecala lokubulala uReeva Steenkamp kanye namacala ahlobene nezibhamu aqala eNkantolo eNkulu ePitoli ngomhlaka 3 Mashi 2014.Uqoke abahloli ababili abazomsiza ecaleni.Ngokwe okhulumela namajaji eNingizimu Afrika, wayengatholi ngokukhethekile esinikelwe umlandu ngenxa yobulili bakhe.Ngemuva kokunikezwa kwakhe leli cala elisezingeni eliphezulu, kuthiwa ozakwabo bamchaze njengomuntu ohlonishwayo, onekhono, oligagu nogodliwe.Ngokusho kwenkampani eqapha abezindaba i-ROi Africa, iningi labaphawula ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngesikhathi kukhishwa lesi sinqumo laligxeka uJaji Masipa ngemuva kokuvela kokuthi uPistorius ngeke atholakale enecala lokubulala, okuyisinqumo esaphinde sahoxiswa yiNkantolo Yokudlulisa Amacala futhi kwaqoshwa isigwebo sokubulala.IJaji uMasipa, onikezwe ukuvikelwa ngamaphoyisa kusukela kuqale ukuqulwa kwecala, ubesongelwa futhi ehlaselwa ngabantu abangahambisani nesinqumo.Esigwebeni sakhe esisha esasinikezwe uPistorius ngokususelwa ecaleni lokulahlwa yicala lokubulala, uMasipa wasinyusa isigwebo sakhe ngonyaka owodwa waba yiminyaka eyisithupha.Isigwebo seminyaka eyisithupha sokubulala sidluliswe yiNational Prosecuting Authority futhi baqinisekisa ukuthi iNkantolo eNkulu yokuDluliswa kwamaCala yaseNingizimu Afrika iyasinyusa isigwebo.Lesi sigwebo sahlelelwa ubude obuncane besigwebo sokubulala eNingizimu Afrika - iminyaka engu-15. 
UThokozile Matilda Masipa (owazalwa ngomhla ka-16 Okthoba 1947) yijaji eGauteng Division yeNkantolo eNkulu yaseNingizimu Afrika.Wayengumphathi wecala ecaleni lika-Oscar Pistorius ngo-2014 lokubulala uReeva Steenkamp.Isinqumo sakhe sokungabi nacala lokubulala sabuye sachithwa ngemuva kokudluliswa kwecala. 
UMasipa wazalelwa wakhulela e-Orlando East, eSoweto, eGoli, uyizibulo ezinganeni eziyishumi.Ngemuva kokuphothula umatikuletsheni e-Immaculata High School elokishini lase-Alexandra ngo-1966, wathola iziqu ze-BA ezaziqhenya ngeSocial Work ngo-1974 ne-LLB ngo-1990 e-University of South Africa . 
Wamukelwa njengommeli ngo-1991. 
Ngaphambi umsebenzi wakhe umthetho, Masipa ubesebenza njengomshayeli usonhlalakahle futhi njengoba intatheli ubugebengu, okwaholela ukuthi wayenesithakazelo umthetho.Usebenze emaphephandabeni i-The World,Post ne- The Sowetan futhi wahlela i- Queen women supplement yomagazini i-Pace. 
Ngo-1998, waqokwa njengejaji eTransvaal Provincial Division (njengoba yayaziwa kanjalo ngaleso sikhathi) eNkantolo Ephakeme yaseNingizimu Afrika, eba ngowesifazane wesibili omnyama ukuqokwa njengo ijaji leNkantolo Lephakeme ngemuva kwaLucy Mailula, lobekabekwe kuMkhandlu Wetifundza waseTransvaal Wenkantolo Lephakeme (njengoba beyatiwa ngaleso sikhatsi) nga-1995.[1] [2]UMasipa uphinde wasebenza enkantolo yamacala abathengi eGauteng, Estate Agents Board, naseNkantolo Yezokhetho yaseNingizimu Afrika.[3] 
Engxoxweni abe nayo ne-Judicial Service Commission ngo- 2003,uMasipa wasekela ukusebenza obala okukhulu nokuxhumana nabezindaba ukusiza umphakathi ukuthi uqonde inqubo yezokwahlulela.Ungomunye wabahluleli besifazane baseNingizimu Afrika abayisikhombisa abafakwe kwiCourting Justice, ifilimu eliyi-documentary lango-2008 eliqondiswa nguJane Lipman. 
UThokozani Khuphe (owazalwa ngomhlaka 18 Novemba 1963) ungusopolitiki waseZimbabwe, inyunyana yabasebenzi futhi unguMongameli weqembu elihlubukayo leMDC-T leMovement for Democratic Change (MDC).WayeyiPhini likaNdunankulu ngo 2009-13. 
Ngo 2021 wasuswa esikhundleni sokuba ngumongameli weqembu nguDouglas Mwonzora phakathi kwezinsolo eziqinile zodlame nokukhohlisa kubalandeli bakhe 
UKhupe, owazalelwa kwaBulawayo, waphothula izifundo zakhe ngo-1999 eTurin Centre eTurin, e-Italy, enesitifiketi se-Information Technology.Uneziqu zeBachelor of Arts in Media Studies azithole eZimbabwe Open University, Master of Business Administration, MBA kwiNational University of Science and Technology,nePhD in Social Studies ayithole e- University of Zimbabwe. [3] 
Wabizelwa eqenjini laseNingizimu Afrika labangaphansi kweminyaka engama-23 ngo-2011. 
Thokozani Sekotlong (owazalwa 7 Meyi 1991) is a South African lezinyawo odlala njengoba mdlali ngoba eNingizimu Afrika Premier Division ohlangothini, iChippa United. 
USekotlong uzalelwe eMamelodi. 
Uqale umsebenzi wakhe e- University of Pretoria, futhi wayeyingxenye yeqembu elafinyelela kowamanqamu weNedbank Cup ngo-2008-09, ngaphambi kokuhlulwa yiMoroka Swallows.Unqobe ukukhushulelwa eqenjini neSouth African Premier Division ngo-2012.Unqabile ukunikezwa yiKaizer Chiefs nePlatinum Stars ngalelo hlobo,wadlala amahlandla ama-13 kuma-AmaTuks kuligi ngesizini ka-2012-13.Wadedelwa yi-AmaTuks ngo-2013, wase ejoyina iMaritzburg United.Uvele emidlalweni engu-36 yeligi, washaya amagoli ayisithupha, esikhathini esiyiminyaka emibili neqembu,ngaphambi kokukhishwa ehlobo lika-2015. 
Ngemuva kokuthakatha neqembu leNational First Division iCape Town All Stars engxenyeni yokugcina yesizini ka-2015-16, ujoyine iFree State Stars ehlobo lika-2016.Ushiye ikilabhu ekupheleni kwesizini. 
Ujoyine iMamelodi Sundowns ehlobo lika-2017.Ushaye igoli lakhe lokuqala eqenjini ngo-21 Okthoba 2017 ngesikhathi ehlulwa ngo-2-1 ekhaya naMaZulu .Ujoyine iBlack Leopards ebolekiswe ngoJanuwari 2019.Ushiye iSundowns ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2018-19. 
Njengoba ebengenalo iqembu selokhu akhululwa kwiMamelodi Sundowns ekupheleni kwesizini edlule, wajoyina iChippa United ngoJanuwari 2020.Ushaye igoli lakhe lokuqala leqembu ngo-Agasti 28 2020: igoli lokulinganisa elidlule lapho bedlala ngokulingana ngo-1-1 neStellenbosch. 
UMosia ungusomabhizinisi waseNingizimu Afrika-waseGhana futhi ongumsunguli wenkampani yamandla elanga asuselwa eSierra Leone i-Easy Solar. [1] 
UMosia wazalelwa eGhana,kamuva wathuthela eNingizimu Afrika.Ngesikhathi esemusha wayehlangabezana nokucinywa ngezikhathi ezithile ngenxa yokutholakala kukagesi okungathembekile, okwaqala kwamenza waba nentshisekelo ngamandla.UMosia uthole iBachelor of Business Science in Finance and Economics eNyuvesi yaseKapa, waphothula ngeziqu zokuqala nokwehlukanisa, ngemuva kwalokho wasebenza njengomxhumanisi wabaphathi e-Afrika yonkana.Ngo-2016 wafundela iziqu zeMasters egxile kwi-Clean Energy Finance and Policy eSchool of International and Public Affairs, e- Columbia University, lapho ahlangana khona nabasunguli bakhe be-Easy Solar, Eric Silverman no-Alexandre Tourre.[1] [2] 
UMosia nabasunguli bakhe babamba umqondo wokunikeza ugesi onokwethenjelwa futhi ongabizi kakhulu emakhaya angalondolozwa igridi eNtshonalanga Afrika,ngesikhathi sokufunda kwabo iziqu.Ngokubambisana bathole uxhaso olukhulu lwephrojekthi kusuka emincintiswaneni nakuma- hackathons ase- US,njenge-D-Prize ngo-2015 kanye ne-Columbia Venture Competition 2016.Uxhaso lokuqala lwavumela uMosia nozakwabo ukuthi benze ucwaningo ngokutholakala kwamandla kuyo yonke imindeni eyi-1,500 yaseSierra Leone. 
I-Easy Solar, edayisa umhlaba wonke njenge-Azimuth, yadalwa ngo-2016 njengesinyathelo sokuhweba sokwandisa ukufinyeleleka kwamadivayisi asebenza ngamandla elanga aphezulu (njengamalambu nezinhlelo zasekhaya) kuyo yonke iSierra Leone enganikeziwe. [1]Le nkampani inikela ngezinhlelo zezimali, njengokuqashisa -ukuba-ngumnikazi, ngemali oyikhokhelwayo ukuze usize amakhaya ampofu ukuthi akwazi ukuzitholela ama-solar panel. [1] 
Iletha ifomu elifushane laseNingizimu Afrika lokuqukethwe nge-smartphone yakho esukela kumahlaya wokuma,amatravel kanye nama-mini-documentary. 
Ifaka ithoni lama-movie atholakala kumaeMedia Investments kwezinye iziteshi futhi angikaze abone amafilimu asukela kuzenzo, amahlaya,amafilimu omndeni nawendawo. 
Ividiyo iyindlela esebenza ngogesi yokuqopha, ukukopisha, ukudlala, ukusakaza, nokukhombisa imidiya ebonakalayo ehambayo.Ividiyo yaqale yathuthukiselwa izinhlelo zethelevishini ezenziwa ngomshini, ezathathelwa indawo ngokushesha yizinhlelo ze- cathode ray tube (CRT) ezathi kamuva zathathelwa indawo ukuboniswa kwamapaneli ayizicaba ezinhlobo eziningana. 
Ithelevishini yakuqala cishe yayiyindlela yokuphila bukhoma enezinhlelo ezithile ezirekhodwe ukuqoshwa ukuze kusatshalaliswe izinhloso zomlando kusetshenziswa iKinescope.I-analog video tape recorder yethulwa ngokokuhweba ngo-1951.Ngokulandelana okulandelanayo.Onke amafomethi abhalwe ohlwini athengiselwa futhi asetshenziswa abasakazi, abakhiqizi bamavidiyo noma abathengi; noma zazibalulekile ngokomlando (i-VERA). 
ULehlohonolo Benedict " Lehlo " Ledwaba (Julayi 27, 1971-Julayi 2, 2021) wayengumshayisibhakela okhokhelwayo waseNingizimu Afrika owancintisana kusukela ngo-1990 kuya ku-2006,futhi wabamba isicoco se-IBF super bantamweight kusuka ngo-1999 kuya ku2001. 
ULedwaba waba ngumpetha ngo-1990 kwathi ngo-1999 wathumba isicoco se-IBF super bantamweight ngokunqoba uJohn Michael Johnson.ULedwaba uvikele leli bhande amahlandla ama-5 ngaphambi kokulahlekelwa nguManny Pacquiao ngeTKO ukuthola uPacquiao umqhudelwano wakhe wesibili womhlaba ezigabeni ezimbili zesisindo.ULedwaba uqhubeke nokulwa, kepha akakaze aphikise isicoco esikhulu selokhu alahlekelwa.Uthathe umhlalaphansi esibhakeleni ngemuva kokwehlulwa kwakhe nguMaxwell Awuku ngomhlaka-24 Novemba 2006. 
ULedwaba ushone ngoJulayi 2, 2021 eneminyaka engama-49 ngesifo se-Coronavirus. 
ULehlohonolo Majoro (owazalwa 19 Agasti 1986 ngo Ladybrand, Free State) kuyinto South African footballer odlala njengoba phambili ngoba iPremier Soccer League ohlangothini waMaZulu kanti iqembu izinkomba zobuzwe baseNingizimu Afrika. 
Uqale ukubonakala ngokungekho emthethweni kwiVodacom Challenge ngokunqoba ngo 1-0 kwiTottenham Hotspur.Wagxekwa ngokushaya ezokuvikela kubalwa noGareth Bale kodwa wahluleka ukuguqula.Udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala kwiChiefs ngo-18 Agasti 2011 ngesikhathi benqoba iJomo Cosmos ngo-2-1.Uphinde washaya igoli okokuqala kuphela ngemuva kwemizuzu engu-2 ngemuva kokuphasiswa okunembile okuvela kuBernard Parker.Uqhubeke waba ngumshayimagoli ohamba phambili wamagoli nge-10. 
Uqale ukudlala eNingizimu Afrika ngomhlaka 14 Meyi 2011 eqhathanisa neTanzania kowobungani bamazwe omhlaba. 
ULehlohonolo Seema (owazalwa 9 Juni 1980 e Mafeteng ) umdlali wase-Lesotho webhola wasemuva.Ubuye abe yisakhamuzi saseNingizimu Afrika.Njengamanje ungumphathi weChippa United kwiSouth African Premier Division. 
Ukujoyina South African ithimba neBloemfontein Celtic e isizini 1998/99, wathuthelae-Orlando Pirates ngo2006. 
Wayengukaputeni weBloemfontein Celtic phambilini,wayengukaputeni we-Orlando Pirates futhi esethathe umhlalaphansi eqenjini ngo-1 Ntulikazi 2011. 
Isihlabani seqembu lesizwe laseLesotho, uSeema nguyena kuphela umdlali owathi ngo-2003 wadlala ibhola lekilabhu phesheya.Ngo-2001, washaya igoli lokuwina ngesikhathi sekukhahlelwa iphenathi ngomzuzu ka-87 wokuhlungela i-African Cup of Nations iqhathaniswa neZimbabwe eyayiseBulawayo ukunika iLesotho ukunqoba okudumile. 
Lehlogonolo Masalesa (owazalwa 21 Mashi 1992 e yaseMankweng ) kuwumdlali webhola ngubani okwamanje udlalele neBlack Leopards e-DStv Premiership njengoba mdlali. 
UMasalesa uqale umsebenzi wakhe wokudlala kuPlatinum Stars ngemuva kokungena kwi-Africa Sport Youth Development Academy.Kodwa-ke udlale indawo eyodwa kuphela kwiDikwena, nokuholele ekutheni afudukele kuBidvest Wits,obemele amahlandla angama-28 ngaphambi kokusayina isivumelwano seminyaka emithathu ne-Orlando Pirates ngoSepthemba 2012.Lo mdlali owayedlalela iqembu lesizwe lika-Under 20 wahlaba umxhwele kakhulu ngesikhathi enikwa isikhathi sokudlala ngesikhathi iPirates igijimela owamanqamu weCAF Champions League ngo-2013 . 
UThapelo Matsheka ungusopolitiki noMotswana osesebenze njengoNgqongqoshe wezeziMali nokuThuthukiswa koMnotho kusukela ngoNovemba 2019.Wakhethwa njengelungu lePhalamende Likazwelonke Lobatse ngo-Okthoba 2019. 
Uyilungu leBotswana Democratic Party.UMatsheka ubenguMqondisi Ophethe wakwaFiducia Services. 
UMatsheka wayenguMphathi Omkhulu weCitizen Entrepreneurship Development Agency, uhlelo lukahulumeni lwamabhizinisi, kusukela ngo-2003 kuya ku-2010.Ubuye wasebenzela i-AON Botswana ngaphambi kokusula esikhundleni sakhe ukuze akhe iFiducia Services ngo-Agasti 2017. 
Okhethweni lukazwelonke lwango -2019, uMatsheka wayeyilungu leBotswana Democratic Party ePhalamende eLobatse .Wakhethwa futhi wangena esikhundleni sikaSadique Kebonang.UMongameli Mokgweetsi Masisi wamqoka njengoNgqongqoshe wezeziMali nokuThuthukiswa koMnotho ngomhla ziyi-6 kuLwezi 2019, futhi waqala ukusebenza ngalo lolo suku.Wethule inkulumo yakhe yokuqala yesabelomali ngoFebhuwari 2020. 
UVusi Sidney Mahlasela Ka Zwane (owazalwa ngo-1965 ePitoli, eNingizimu Afrika) ungumbhali wezingoma ezingumSuthu waseNingizimu Afrika 
USibusiso Busi Moyo (SB Moyo) (1960 – 20 Januwari 2021) wayengusopolitiki waseZimbabwe futhi engumphathi jikelele wezempi.Waziwa ngokumemezela ukuxoshwa kukaRobert Mugabe kuthelevishini kazwelonke ngesikhathi seRussia ngo- 2017.Uqhubeke nokusebenza njengoNgqongqoshe Wezangaphandle Nezokuhwebelana Namazwe Omhlaba kwikhabhinethi ka- Emmerson Mnangagwa kusukela ngoNovemba 2017 kwaze kwaba sekushoneni kwakhe. 
UMoyo wazalelwa esibhedlela saseMnene Mission eMberengwa ngo1960.Wayengowesithathu ezinganeni eziyisishiyagalombili.Ngesikhathi efunda eManama Secondary School, wajoyina umzabalazo wenkululeko ngo-1977.Uthole iMasters kwi-International Relations ne-PhD kwi-International Relations e-University of Zimbabwe, waphinde wathola ne-Masters in Business Administration ayithole e-Zimbabwe Open University 
USB Moyo wasebenza njengomphathi omkhulu embuthweni weZimbabwe National Army, ngaphambi kokukhushulelwa esikhundleni sokuba nguLieutenant General mhla ethatha umhlalaphansi ngoDisemba 2017.Wanyuselwa esikhundleni sokuba ngu-brigadier general waba ngu-general general ngowayenguMongameli uRobert Mugabe ngoJanuwari 2016. [2] 
USibusiso Bruno Matsenjwa (owazalwa ngomhlaka 2 Meyi 1988) ungumgijimi wase- Eswatini.Ungenele amamitha angama-200 kuma- Olimpiki ka-2012 nango- 2016, kepha wehluleka ukufinyelela kowamanqamu.Uphule irekhodi likazwelonke ngazo zombili lezi zikhathi futhi wakhonza njengomphathi wefulegi wase-Eswatini ngesikhathi somcimbi wokuvula ngo-2016.UMatsenjwa uphethe amarekhodi esizwe ngaphezu kwamamitha ayi-100-400 m. 
Ubemele izwe lakhe emiqhudelwaneni emithathu yomhlaba nangaphandle. 
USibusiso uphinde wahlabana kumaGolden Commonwealth Games ka-2018. 
Ungenele i -200m yabesilisa kuma- Olimpiki asehlobo ka-2020.
