UHungani Ndlovu (owazalwa ngomhlaka 19 Juni 1994, uBushbuckridge), ungumlingisi nomdansi waseNingizimu Afrika.Ungumlingisi wesiTsonga owaziwa kakhulu ngezindima zakhe kumdlalo kamabonakude iMemoir of an Honest Voice, uSipho neScandal!. 
Wazalwa ngo-19 Juni 1994, eMpumalanga, eNingizimu Afrika emndenini onezelamani ezintathu. 
Kodwa-ke, wakhulela eBushbuckridge eNelspruit, eNingizimu Afrika.Abazali bakhe baphuma emphakathini wamaTsonga. 
Ushadelwe naye ongumlingisi wakuleli, futhi ongumethuli wezinhlelo kumabonakude uStephanie Sandows.Umshado ubugujwe ngasese ngomhlaka 23 Febhuwari 2019. 
Uqale umsebenzi wakhe ngo-2001 eneminyaka eyisikhombisa. 
Wayekwazi ukudansa, kodwa kamuva waphenduka waba ngumlingisi. 
Ngenhloso yokuba ngumlingisi, wathuthela e-USA waphothula izifundo zeHipHop Choreography eFlii'Cademy, eLos Angeles. Ubuye athandwe kakhulu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngaphansi kwegama, 'Sbujwa dance' lapho efake khona ama-video okudansa. 
Ngesikhathi efunda eFlii'Cademy, waqeqeshwa ngaphansi komdwebi womdanso owaziwayo, uFliiStylz iminyaka emithathu. Ubuye wafunda eNew York Film Academy waphasa i-Associated Degree in Acting for Film. 
Ngemuva kokubuyela eNingizimu Afrika, waqala ukulingisa. 
Ukubonakala kwakhe okokuqala kwaba yindima ephambili efilimini, iMemoir yeZwi Elithembekile ngo-2014.Le filimu kamuva yathola indondo yeBest Short Film kuma- Africa Movie Academy Awards ngo-2015.Ngo-2016, wajoyina abalingisi bomdlalo wethelevishini odumile iScandal! futhi wadlala indawo ethi 'Romeo'.Khonamanjalo, ubuye wabonakala efilimini Yingoba Umnyama . Wabe esedlala indima ephambili kuvidiyo yomculo uBlack Coffee . 
Ungumsunguli wesikhungo sokuqeqesha se-NPO, i-The Ndlovu Foundation esiza intsha ukuthi ifinyelele ezinhlosweni zayo ngokudansa nangemidlalo.Futhi uyiphayona lokusungula isitudiyo sokuthuthukisa ezobuciko, iStrong Attitudes Nurture Success Group (SANS). 
Ngo-2016, wabonakala emidlalweni emibili yasesiteji: A Raisin in the Sun and A Night with Sam.Ngo-2018, walingisa efilimini uSipho wabe esethi HEKS ngo-2019. 
USandows wazalwa ngo-1990 futhi wafunda e- University of Johannesburg . 
Ngenkathi enza izifundo ze-post graduate wayekhanyisa inyanga ngokwakha imibhalo engezansi yeScandal yensipho! . 
Ucele iqembu lokukhiqiza ukuthi lengeze futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ubonakala kaningi. 
Wayengomunye zezimpi e.tv ka- Craz-e izingane izinhlelo ne nashayela Thulisile oPhongolo . 
USandows ubengumethuli wohlelo lwezenkolo lwezingane, uBonisanani. 
AmaSandows adlale u-Ingrid, indodakazi kaWesley Thompson ( uZane Meas ), emdlalweni owuchungechunge waseNingizimu Afrika iScandal!, selokhu kwaphela unyaka ka-2015. 
USandows waqala ukuthandana noHungani Ndlovu ngo-2016.UNdlovu, oveza umlingiswa kaRomeo kuScandal!, wahlangana naye ngo-2015 njengoba eba ngumlingisi omusha kulolu hlelo.Laba bobabili bashada ngasese ngoFebhuwari 2019. 
UNomvelo Makhanya (owazalwa ngomhlaka-24 Ephreli 1996), ungumlingisi nomculi waseNingizimu Afrika.Waziwa kakhulu ngokulingisa emdlalweni owuchungechunge wethelevishini Isibaya, iSoul City neScandal!. 
Wazalwa ngomhlaka-24 Ephreli 1996 eNkandla, KwaZulu-Natal, eNingizimu Afrika.Ngemuva kweminyaka embalwa, wathuthela eGoli nabazali bakhe. 
Ngo-2016, kwatholakala ukuthi unesifo sokudangala nokukhathazeka.Kodwa-ke, ngemuva kwezikhathi zokubonisana eziningana, wakunqoba ukucindezeleka kwengqondo.NgoJanuwari 2019, umshayeli okuthiwa wayephuzile washayisa imoto kaNomvelo eyayipakiwe.NgoFebhuwari 2019, waveza umyalezo wakhe ongokomzwelo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ukuthi uhlukunyeziwe nge-cyber ngenxa yekhanda lakhe. 
Ujoyine iNational School of Arts (NSA) eBraamfontein, eGoli ngaphansi kokuholwa ngumama wakhe.Ngemuva kwalokho wadlala kumculo 'weSarafina' futhi wacabanga ukulandela njengomculi okhokhelwayo. 
Kamuva wajoyina imidlalo eminingi yeshashalazi efana neThe Bald Prima Donn, African Reflections futhi Mhlawumbe Lesi Isikhathi.Ngo-2016, wadlala indawo ka'Lindiwe Ngema ', emdlalweni owuchungechunge we-eTV iScandal!. 
UNomvula Paula Mokonyane (owazalwa ngomhlaka 28 Juni 1963, eKagiso, eGauteng ) wayenguNgqongqoshe Wezemvelo eNingizimu Afrika, waqokwa ngomhlaka 22 Novemba 2018 ngaphansi kukaMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa . 
Waqokwa okokuqala kwikhabhinethi yaseNingizimu Afrika ngoMeyi 2014 ngaphansi kukaMongameli Jacob Zuma, esebenza njengoNgqongqoshe eMnyangweni Wezamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle, futhi waba nguNgqongqoshe Wezokuxhumana ngaphansi kukaMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngoJanuwari 2018.Ngaphambi kokusebenza kwiKhabhinethi, wayenguNdunankulu wesifundazwe saseGauteng, wakhethwa kulandela ukhetho lukazwelonke lwaseNingizimu Afrika lwango -2009.Uphinde futhi abe nguMongameli Wenhlonipho weSA-China People's Friendship Association . 
UNtokozo Qwabe (owazalwa ngo-1991) ungowaseNingizimu Afrika uRhodes Scholar owayengomunye wabasunguli bomkhankaso iRhodes Must Fall eOxford University.Ukuphawula kwakhe okulandelayo kulandela ukuhlaselwa nokuziphatha kweParis ngo-2015 kuweta omhlophe eNingizimu Afrika kugxekwe ezindabeni nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana,okuholele ekutheni kufakwe isicelo sokuthi asuswe eOxford esachithwa yinyuvesi.Uzichithile izinsolo zobuzenzisi zokuthola imali esikhungweni semifundaze iRhodes, ethi ubuyisa ingcebo eyebiwe abantu base-Afrika yiRhodes ngesikhathi sekoloni. 
UNtokozo Mzamomuhle Vidima (owazalwa ngomhlaka 13 Meyi 1995) ungumdlali wezinyunyana zombhoxo waseNingizimu Afrika IBorder Bulldogs kuCurrie Cup.Isikhundla sakhe esijwayelekile siyiflanker noma ilokhi 
UNtokozo Khonziwe Fortunate Hlonyana ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika osebenza njengelungu lePhalamende Likazwelonke laseNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngomhlaka 23 Januwari 2018.Uyilungu leqembu le- Economic Freedom Fighters . 
Impilo 
UHlonyana une-diploma kazwelonke yokuphathwa kwezemidlalo evela eDurban University of Technology kanye nesitifiketi sokubusa esivela e- University of Pretoria.Ujoyine i-EFF ngo-2013. 
[1] Ubeyilungu lethimba labaphathi begatsha futhi wakhonza njengomxhumanisi wesifunda esincane.UHlonyana ubebuye abe ngumhleli wethimba leqembu elilawula isifundazwe eGauteng. 
[1]Ngo-2018, wayengumgqugquzeli weSifunda seChris Hani se-EFF.Ngaphambi kwalokho ubengumxhumanisi wesifunda i-Alfred Nzo. [1]Ngo-2019, wakhethwa eqenjini eliphambili le-EFF njengelungu elengeziwe. 
Ngesikhathi sakhe sokuqala njengelungu lePhalamende, ubesebenza kuwo womabili amakomidi ephothifoliyo emfundo ephakeme nokuqeqeshwa kanye nokuthuthukiswa komnotho. [1] Wakhethwa isikhathi esiphelele okhethweni lukazwelonke lwango-2019.Njengamanje uyilungu lePortfolio Committee on Women, Youth and People with Disabilities. 
Ngokwezinhloso zalesi sigaba nezigaba zaso ezingaphansi, usopolitiki umuntu owenza lokhu 
Sakhile Hlatshwayo (1998 - 9 Ncwaba 2021), eyaziwa efanele njengoba Killer Kau, kwaba-South African rapper, umdansi futhi irekhodi umkhiqizi waziwa kakhulu hit yakhe ingoma "Tholukuthi Hey". 
UKiller Kau wazalwa ngo-1998 eSoweto, eNingizimu Afrika.Ukhule ecula esontweni ngaphambi kokuthi ajoyine ikhwaya yesonto iStain PC, ecula ibaritone. 
Ubuye futhi wajoyina ikhwaya labesilisa i-African Heavenly Soul Singers. 
Umsebenzi wakhe wezomculo waqala ngesikhathi esafunda isikole nalapho ebhala umatikuletsheni ngo-2019. 
Waduma kakhulu ngesikhathi efaka ivideo ecula iculo lakhe elithi "Tholukuthi Hey", eladuma laheha uDJ Ephonik. 
Ngo-9 Agasti 2021, uKiller Kau washona engozini yemoto eya egig, eceleni komculi wamapiyano uMpura. 
Umqhubi uqondisa ukusebenza komculo; ukuqhuba kuchazwe ngokuthi "ubuciko bokuqondisa ukusebenza ngasikhathi sinye kwabadlali abaningana noma abaculi ngokusebenzisa isenzo."Umqhubi umi emsamo ophakanyisiwe futhi uxhumana nabaculi ngokuthinta ngezandla noma ngokubabheka emehlweni. 
Izibonelo zabaculi zifaka, kepha azikhawulelwanga,abaculi bezinsimbi nabahlabeleli abaculela izethameli.Umculi angadlala njengomculi ohamba yedwa noma njengengxenye yomculo (isb. I-orchestra, ikwaya noma iqembu le-pop ). 
Umculi ngumuntu oqamba, aqhube, noma enze umculo.Ngokwe- United States i-Employment Service, "umculi" kuyinto jikelele eside lasetshenziswa ukuze kubhekiselwe endaweni umuntu olingisa umculo njengendlela mkhakha.Abaculi zihlanganisa bezingoma ngubani ukuqamba umculo kanye bhala isosha esihlatshelelwayo izingoma,babashayeli ngubani uqondise ukusebenza zomculo, noma abadlali abenza i izilaleli.Umenzi womculo ngumculi ngokuvamile noma umculi ohlinzeka vocals noma instrumentalist odlala a insimbi yomculo.Abaculi bangazenzela bodwa noma njengengxenye yeqembu, ibhendi noma i-orchestra.Abaculi bagxile kwisitayela somculo, kanti abanye abaculi badlala ngezitayela ezahlukahlukene eziya ngamasiko nemvelaphi. 
Umculi oqopha futhi akhiphe umculo angaziwa njengomculi oqoshiwe. 
Umqambi ungumculi odala izingoma zomculo.Isihloko sisetshenziselwa ikakhulukazi labo ababhala umculo we-classic noma umculo wamafilimu.Labo ababhala umculo wezingoma ezidumile bangabizwa njengababhali bezingoma (Labo ababhala kakhulu amagama ezingoma kungabizwa ngabo njengabaculi bezingoma ). 
Iziginci zingahlukaniswa ngezigaba ezimbili ezibanzi, ama-acoustic kanye nama-guitar kagesi.Ngaphakathi kwalezi zigaba, kukhona nezinye izigaba ezingaphansi.Isibonelo, isigingci sikagesi singathengwa ngemodeli yezintambo eziyisithupha (imodeli ejwayelekile kakhulu) noma kumamodeli wezintambo eziyisikhombisa noma eziyishumi nambili. 
I isiginci yithuluzi eli-fretted insimbi yomculo ukuthi ngokuvamile eziyisithupha amayunithi wezinhlamvu . 
Kunenkolelo flat ngokumelene umzimba womdlali bese eyadlalwa strumming noma abahluthula izintambo onesandla evelele, kuyilapho ngesikhathi esifanayo ngokucindezela amayunithi wezinhlamvu akhethiwe ngokumelene frets nge iminwe uhlangothi okuhlukile.I- plectrum noma ukukhetha komunwe ngamunye kungasetshenziselwa ukushaya izintambo.Umsindo isiginci kulindeleke noma acoustically, esebenzisa ikamelo resonant phezu ithuluzi, noma iyakhula i-electronic iveni kanye amplifier . 
UVelaphi Ndlangamandla (owazalwa ngo-1966), owaziwa ngo- The Saloon Killer, uyisigebengu saseNingizimu Afrika futhi ungumbulali, obhekene nokubulala abantu abangu-19 phakathi kuka-Ephreli noSepthemba 1998 eMpumalanga .Ugwetshwe iminyaka engu-137 ebhadla ejele ngamacala akhe. 
Ngo-Ephreli 4, 1997, ngemuva kokweba isibhamu i-.22 Anschütz kuJacobus Christoffel van Schalkwyk, obizwa ngokuthi "yisaloon", uNdlangamandla waphinde wantshontsha esinye isibhamu, izinhlamvu, imisakazo, ubucwebe, okokugqoka, okheshi nokunye ukudla, ngaphambi kokuqhubeka ukubhebhetheka kobugebengu.Ithimba lamaphoyisa eliholwa nguSuperintendent Izak van Zyl, libophe uNdlangamandla esigodini sasePhoswa ngasePiet Retief ngoSepthemba 10, 1998.Wabekwa icala 19 okuzama ukubulala amacala, 9 okuzama ukubulala, 6 okuphanga, omunye lokuzama ukubamba inkunzi, 5 lokugqekeza, ukushaya ngendlela engalungile, ifa esingekho emthethweni kanye nezinhlamvu, nokukhomba othile ngesibhamu.UNdlangamandla ulahlwe yicala lawo wonke amacala, wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-137 ebhadla ejele. 
UKhomishana wamaphoyisa esifundazweni, u-Eric Nkabinde, uncome umsebenzi wamaphoyisa, waxwayisa zonke ezinye izigebengu ukuthi ngeke zibaleke isikhathi eside. 
UGugulethu Zuma-Ncube (owazalwa ngomhlaka 10 Okthoba 1985) ungumkhiqizi waseNingizimu Afrika, ongumlingisi nendodakazi kaMengameli wangaphambilini uJacob Zuma kanye nosopolitiki we- African National Congress (ANC) uNkosazana Dlamini-Zuma, kanye nomalokazana ku-Zimbabwean Movement for Democratic Change Alliance usopolitiki uSolwazi Welshman Ncube. 
Ngokusebenzisa Nyenyedzi Productions, okuyinto yena babambisane ungumnikazi odadewabo uNokuthula Nomaqhawe futhi Thuthukile Zuma, yena babambisane ekhiqizwa futhi wenza kuMzansi Magic 's Okwawo Life, 2011 asiwona umdlalo wethelevishini ezine 20-somethings ngubani ukuthola kwemijondolo elisendlini yabo.Ubaba wabo ukhuthaze lolu chungechunge nge- akhawunti yakhe esemthethweni ye-Twitter, lapho athola khona ukugxekwa. 
UZuma-Ncube futhi co-ungumnikazi angcolile Glass Productions nge Kobedi "Pepsi" Pokane, which they co-kukhiqizwa Uzalo ngokuba SABC1 siteshi.Idlale izinsuku ezinhlanu ngesonto, ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu, kanti bekungumbukiso wethelevishini wesibili odume kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika, ngemuva kwesiteshi soMzansi Magic, Isibaya telenovella, obekuhloswe ngaso ukuqhudelana naso. 
Ngo-2015 nango-2016, amaphephandaba ahlukene kazwelonke asola ukuthi uZuma Ncube wazuza ngokungafanele ekuqashweni ngokwezivumelwano ngezivumelwano zika-R167million kwaSABC nakuR8million esivela kuMasipala weTheku u- Uzalo . [1] [2] 
Lolu chungechunge lwe-TV lwabanjwa mpikiswano ngesikhathi isikhulu se- SABC ngaleso sikhathi uHlaudi Motsoeneng engenelela esinqumweni sokungaluvuseleli lolu chungechunge, kunalokho wathatha isinqumo sokukhokha amanye amasizini amathathu ngemali elinganiselwa ku-R167 million, okuyimali "i-SABC eyayingakhiqiza ngayo izinhlelo ezingaba ngu-20".AbakwaStain Glass Productions babesolwa ngokugxambukela kwezepolitiki ezinhlelweni zokuthengwa kwempahla kwaSABC,okwaphikwa ngabadidiyeli ababambisene nabo, bethi "benza konke ngale ncwadi" futhi abatholi "mpatho ekhethekile". 
Ngo-2011, wazinikela eLuthuli House, ekomkhulu le-ANC, nodadewabo uThuthukile. 
EGugulethu uvele imibukiso eziningana ithelevishini, kuhlanganise kokuphenywa Room, SABC3 ka- Isidingo,futhi e.tv ka- Rhythm City. 
Gugulethu Zuma-Ncube is a TV producer of serial dramas mainly on prime TV through her production company Stained Glass which she co-owns with her sister producer Thuli Zuma; the pair has produced Ifalakhe for pay-per-view channel Mzansi Magic.She’s produced the leading TV serial exploitation drama Uzalo on the leading channel SABC 1;she also produces South Africa’s medical drama Durban Gen on the privately owned channel E TV since October 2020;and she also produces Ehostela on Mzansi Magic. 
Sindiswa, a graduation film in which she played a role, was nominated for the Student Academy Awards (Student Oscars) in Hollywood.She met her future husband, Wesley Ncube, while she was studying in Cape Town, and married him at the end of 2008. 
URethabile Ramaphakela (owazalwa ngomhlaka 13 Ephreli 1987), ungumenzi wamafilimu waseNingizimu Afrika, umkhiqizi wamafilimu nomlingisi .Waziwa kakhulu njengomqondisi kanye nomdidiyeli wezinhlelo ezithandwayo zethelevishini namafilimu iSeriously Single, Bedford Wives neThe Bang Bang Club. 
Wazalwa ngomhlaka 13 Ephreli 1987 eNingizimu Afrika.Unabafowabo ababili: uTshepo noKatleho. 
Waqala umsebenzi wakhe njengomethuli we-KTV. 
Ekanye nabafowabo ababili, uRethabile wasungula inkampani ekhiqiza amafilimu 'iBurnt Onion' ngo-2010.Ngo-2014, wenza indima yokweseka efilimini yomhlaba iThe Bang Bang Club . 
Bese kule nkampani kukhiqizwa umdlalo owubukhoma wethelevishini iMy Perfect Family, osakazwa kuSABC1 ngo-2015. 
Ngemuva kokukhonjiswa ngempumelelo kwe-sitcom, wakhiqiza amafilimu amafushane afana neGoody Thokoza asuselwa ezimpini zaseThokoza ngawo-1980.Ngemuva kokuphumelela kwe-sitcom, wakhiqiza uchungechunge lwethelevishini iThuli no Thulani, Kota Life Crisis kanye neCheck Coast ngendlu yokukhiqiza. 
Ngo-Agasti 2020, waqondisa ifilimu yamahlaya iSeriously Single nomfowabo uKatleho Ramaphakela.Ikhishwe ngoJulayi 31, 2020 kuNetflix. 
Ukungafani kuyinqubo yokuhlonza ukuthi iyiphi incazelo yegama esetshenziswe kumongo 
Ukuqasha kungabhekisela ku 
Ubufebe besilisa isenzo noma umkhuba wamadoda ahlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zocansi ngenhloso yokukhokha.Kuyindlela yokusebenza ngocansi.Yize amaklayenti kungaba yibuphi ubulili, iningi labo ngabesilisa.Uma kuqhathaniswa nabaqwayizi besifazane, abaqwayizi besilisa abakafundwa kangako ngabaphenyi. 
Amagama esetshenziselwa besilisa izifebe ngokuvamile zihlukile esetshenziselwa nabesifazane.Amanye amagama ayahluka ngamakhasimende noma ngendlela yebhizinisi.Lapho ukudayisa ngomzimba kungavunyelwe noma Taboo, kuvamile ukuba izifebe zesilisa ukusebenzisa euphemisms okuyinto ukwethula ibhizinisi labo nokunikeza ubungane ukumodeliswa nude noma ukudansa, umzimba ukubhucungwa, noma enye eyamukelekayo Imali i-service ilungiselelo. 
Ngakho-ke umuntu angabizwa ngokuthi ngumkhaphi wesilisa, i- gigolo (okusho amakhasimende abesifazane), umfana oqashisayo, u- hustler (ovame kakhulu kulabo abacela ezindaweni zomphakathi), imodeli, noma i- masseur.Umuntu alibheki yena njengoba gay noma ngithanda abesilisa nabesifazane, kodwa ocansini namaklayenti besilisa ngemali, ngezinye izikhathi ibizwa ngokuthi gay i-pay, noma ukuhweba. 
Amakhasimende wesilisa, ikakhulukazi lawo acosha abaqwayizi emgwaqweni noma ezindaweni zobhawa, kwesinye isikhathi abizwa ngama- johns noma amaqhinga.Labo abasebenza ngokudayisa ngomzimba, ikakhulukazi abaqwayizi basemgwaqweni, kwesinye isikhathi babiza isenzo sobufebe njengokuguqula izinto. 
Inkolo nayo ingabhekisa ku 
I-ETV ingamela: 
Ukuhlelwa kwe-eReality kufaka izindaba zangempela, izinhlamvu ezithakazelisayo nemizwelo yabantu eluhlaza. 
Izihloko eziphawuleka kakhulu zifaka phakathi i- MasterChef, Family Feud, The Real Housewives, Little Women franchise, Cheaters, The Planet's Funniest Animals, Forensic Files and Paternity Court. 
Kusukela ngoMgqibelo mhlaka-10 Julayi 2021, lesi siteshi sizokwethula uhlelo lwendawo olubizwa nge-eKasi olusakaza izinhlelo ezifana no-Deadbeats, Beef, Will You Be My Ex, Tembisa Show nethi Pay Back The Money.Kusukela ngo-Agasti 2021, okunye okuqukethwe kwatholakala kuphela kwi- eVOD . [1] 
eReality yisiteshi sase eNingizimu Afrika ngokoqobo ithelevishini isiteshi wadala futhi kungeyakho eMedia Investments sika e.tv ngoba OpenView.Isiteshi sisakaza amahora angu-16 ngosuku sikhombisa inhlanganisela yochungechunge lwasekhaya nolwamazwe omhlaba nostalgic ngokoqobo nemibukiso engakaze ivele ku-e.tv. 
I-eMedia Investment yenze ucwaningo ngokuthi yiziphi izibukeli ezazikhetha kakhulu ku-e TV naku-Openview.Lesi sinqumo bekungukuthi kunokuqukethwe okuhlanganisiwe okungokoqobo esiteshini esikhulu se-e.tv kufanele kube nesiteshi esisha, okwamanje esisebenza kuphela ku-Openview. 
UMarlon Davids, ongumqondisi ophethe iziteshi zakwa-e.tv, uthi ama-reality shows aqhubeka nokukhula ekuthandeni futhi kuyamjabulisa ukuthi abakwa-e.tv bethule lesi siteshi esizihlanganisayo. 
I-eExtra isakaza ikakhulukazi ama-telenovelas anenhlanganisela yezinye izinhlelo ezifana nochungechunge lwedrama, iqiniso, ama-sitcom, imibukiso yasenkantolo, indlela yokuphila nama-movie 
I-e.tv njengomsakazi yethule i-eKasi +, eToonz +, eMovies + ne-eAfrica + njengeziteshi ezingosisi ezintsha njengesiteshi sayo sokuqala sezinhlelo ze-TV zethelevishini yedijithali yomhlaba (i-DTT).I-e.tv, i-SABC ne-M-Net bahlela kutsi ngamunye wabo akhicite emaqoqo abo etiteshi letengetiwe taseNingizimu Afrika ekugcineni. 
e.tv (esivame ukubizwa emoyeni njengoba e) ungowokuqala futhi ngasese kuphela ephethwe free-kuya-emoyeni esiteshini sethelevishini e South Africa . 
Yisiteshi sethelevishini sesihlanu somhlaba ezweni, elandela iziteshi ezintathu ezisetshenziswa yiSouth African Broadcasting Corporation (okungukuthi i- SABC 1, i- SABC 2 kanye ne- SABC 3 ) kanye ne- M-Net ekhokhelwa ngabanikazi abazimele.Ngo-1997 isiteshi se-etv sathenga amalungelo okusakaza ekusakazeni imidlalo ye-English Premiership League (EPL) kwathi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi bathenga namalungelo okusakaza imidlalo ye-UEFA Champions League. 
Ebizwa nangokuthi i-eNews Channel Africa.Umsakazi wezindaba zethelevishini osebenza amahora angama-24 ogxile kuzo zombili izindaba zaseNingizimu Afrika nezase-Afrika. 
Lo msakazi waba yinkonzo yezindaba yokuqala nokubukwa kakhulu ezweni lonke lapho yethulwa ngoJuni 2008.I-e.tv isiteshi sokuqala sezindaba esitholakala kuphela ku- DStv . 
EExtra 
Isiteshi sezingane esinezinhlelo ezedlule nezamanje ezibonwe kue.tv kids block, eCraze. 
Ithembisa ukuba yipharadesi lababukeli bokuzitika ngocansi elinezindaba zangempela ezithokozisayo, abalingiswa abathandekayo nemizwelo yabantu eluhlaza.Kukhona okuthile okuphoqelela wonke umuntu. 
Rewind 
Kamuva ngalowo nyaka, abakwa-e.tv banikeze ama-eMovies + ne-eToonz + ukucabanga kabusha; ngethelevishini yedijithali esunguliwe, izithombe "+" zezimpawu nazo zehlisiwe kusuka kulawo manethiwekhi. 
I-eMovies iyisiteshi sethelevishini samahhala esisebenza ngama -satellite saseNingizimu Afrika esisebenza amahora angama-24 esakhiwe futhi esiphethwe ngabakwa-e.tv baseMedia Investment besikhulumi se-Openview . 
Ngo-2017, izindaba zaveza ukuthi ngokutholakala kwesiteshi ku- DStv ngaphambi kokuba kwenziwe ngokusemthethweni ngoMeyi 17 eceleni kwe-eToonz, eMovies Extra ne-eExtra.Kamuva ngalowo nyaka, abakwa-e.tv banikeze ama-eMovies + ne-eToonz + ukucabanga kabusha; ngethelevishini yedijithali esunguliwe, izithombe "+" zezimpawu nazo zehlisiwe kusuka kulawo manethiwekhi.

Ubuyena Ubudlelwano Obungcwele Phakade Lakho (2018 kuya ku-2019) Ngixolele (2019) Izindaba Zomndeni (2019 kuya ku-2020) Uthando lwaphakade (2020 to 2021) Hhayi Ngaphandle Komndeni Wami (2018 kuya ku-2019) Kulfi - The Singing Star (2019 kuya ku-2020) Unesibindi futhi Muhle (2020 kuya ku-2021) IGame Of Love (2018 kuya ku-2019/2020 kuya ku-2021) Yenzelwe Omunye nomunye (2019 kuya ku-2020) I-Geet (2019 kuya ku-2020) Izimfihlo Zomndeni (2019) Silinde uthando (2018) I-Crossroads (2018 kuya ku-2019) Uthando olungavumelekile (2018 kuya ku-2019) Okungahlukaniseki (2019 kuya ku-2020) Amanga Aphelele (2019 kuya ku-2020) Masidanse (2018 kuya ku-2020) IKoffee With Karan (2018 kuya ku-2019) I-Musical Star 2 (2019) I-Dance Plus 4 (2019) Isaziso Sobugebengu (2019 kuya ku-2020) Shayela Iqhawe (2020) Iso Elibi (Isikhathi sonyaka 1) (2020 kuya ku-2021) Iso Elibi (Isikhathi 2) (2021) 
I-Star Life iyisiteshi sethelevishini saseNdiya esethulwe yi- Star India, engaphansi kwenkampani i-The Walt Disney Company India e-Afrika ngomhlaka 27 Agasti 2018. 
Isiteshi léthulwa 27 Agasti 2018 ku DStv futhi Openview.Kusuka ngonyaka ka-2021, lesi siteshi saphinde satholakala ku-Azam TV, StarTimes nakuZuku TV . 
Ngomhla ka-27 Agasti 2021, i-Star Life izophinda imake kabusha njenge-Utsav Life. 
I-Telemundo ( Spanish pronunciation: [teleˈmundo] ( </img> ; phambilini obuwaziwa NetSpan) kuyinto American -ulimi lweSpanishi eliwumhlaba ithelevishini inethiwekhi okungewakho NBCUniversal Telemundo Enterprises, a division of NBCUniversal, nakho is owned by Comcast.nikeza okuqukethwe kuzwelonke ngohlelo oluhlanganiswe emhlabeni wonke emazweni angaphezu kwekhulu ngezilimi ezingaphezu kwama-35. 
I-Africa Magic iqoqo leziteshi zokuzijabulisa zePay TV ezigxile ezinhlelweni zase-Afrika,okuthandwa kakhulu uchungechunge namabhayisikobho aseNigeria I-Africa Magic, eyaqala njengesiteshi esisodwa esinegama elifanayo, iwumkhiqizo wakwaM-Net futhi manje uneziteshi eziyisikhombisa. 
I-Africa Magic yethulwa ngoJulayi 2003 njengesiteshi samabhayisikobho nesokuzijabulisa esijwayele ukukhombisa ithalente le-nollywood namasiko ase-Afrika. 
Ngesikhathi yethulwa ithole ukuthandwa kakhulu phakathi kwababhalisile be-DStv, ikakhulukazi eNingizimu Afrika naseNigeria. 
Ngakho-ke ukwethulwa kwesiteshi esingudade, i-Africa Magic Plus, kwenziwa kwaba nokwenzeka.Lezi ziteshi zadlulela kolunye uhlobo lomkhiqizo futhi eminyakeni eyishumi ezayo, lo mkhiqizo wakhula wafaka ezinye iziteshi eziyisikhombisa ezibandakanya ama-movie, izinhlelo zethelevishini nokuzijabulisa okujwayelekile.I-Africa Magic isakaza emazweni angaphezu kwama-50 ase-Afrika.Lezi ziteshi kubalwa i- Africa Magic Family, Africa Magic Showcase, Africa Magic Yoruba, Africa Magic Igbo, Africa Magic Hausa . 
I-Africa Magic Epic ne- Africa Magic Urban.I-Africa Magic ibuye ibhekane nemiklomelo yaminyaka yonke ye-Africa Magic Viewers 'Choice Awards (AMVCAs), umgubho omkhulu kunayo yonke wethalente lamafilimu nethelevishini e-Afrika. 
IM-Net (isifinyezo se-Electronic Media Network) isiteshi sethelevishini esikhokhelwayo saseNingizimu Afrika esasungulwa yiNaspers ngo-1986.Isiteshi sisakaza izinhlelo zasekhaya nezamazwe aphesheya, kufaka phakathi ezokuzijabulisa jikelele, uchungechunge lwezingane, ezemidlalo nama-movie. 
Ngenkathi isignali ye-TV ivame ukubethelwa, uM-Net ukhombise ezinye izinhlelo 'ezikhululekile ukungena emoyeni' endaweni yayo "Yesikhathi Esivulekile" phakathi kuka-5 ntambama no-7 pm, kuze kuvalwe indawo ngomhla ka-1 Ephreli 2007. 
Lesi sigaba siqukethe izindatshana ezimayelana neziteshi zethelevishini neziteshi zethelevishini. 
I-OpenView (phambilini eyayaziwa nge-OpenView HD) ingumhlinzeki wethelevishini we-Direct Broadcast Satellite eNingizimu Afrika ophethwe yiPlatco Digital (ingxenye ye-eMedia Group efaka isiteshi samahhala somoya i-e.tv kanye no-24- isiteshi sezindaba sehora eNCA).Yethulwe ngomhlaka 15 Okthoba 2013, kepha yahluleka ekuqaleni ukukhulisa isisekelo sayo. 
Iziteshi 
Isiteshi sokuqala esiphethwe ngumphakathi se- South African Broadcasting Corporation.Igxila kakhulu kwezikaqedisizungu, umculo nendlela yokuphila kanye nezinhlelo zemfundo. 
Isiteshi esisakaza okuqukethwe kwe-Bollywood (Indian).Izilimi zilungiselelwe ngesiNgisi kusuka ezilimini zakhona zaseNdiya zokuqala.Idlala imibukiso ethandwa futhi egijimayo efana neYoung Love nethi True Love 
Inkampani engudade ye-e.tv, iPlatco Digital, yethule ipulatifomu ye-Openview HD ngomhlaka 16 Okthoba 2013.Isizathu esikhulu ukuthi ukufuduka kwedijithali eNingizimu Afrika bekuhamba kancane: Izinkampani ezinikezwe amathenda zithathe isikhathi eside ukuletha, ukuxhaswa ngezimali kwama-decoded subsidans, kanye nempikiswano phakathi kweziteshi ezinkulu ze-TV zokuthi ama-decoder we-DTT kufanele abe nokufinyelela okunemibandela noma cha. 
IGlow TV yisiteshi saseNingizimu Afrika esikhombisa imibukiso yamaNdiya. 
Yethulwe ngo-Okthoba 2013.Isiteshi ekuqaleni sasakaza imibukiso yamaHindi futhi ngokushesha saqala ukubhuqa ngesiNgisi.Isakaza uchungechunge oluthi This is Love, True Love nethi Young Love . 
Isiteshi sinikela ngezinhlelo ezahlukahlukene ezisuka kweminye imikhiqizo efana ne- Colors TV ne- Sony Entertainment Television. 
Isiteshi sethulwe nge-Urban Brew Studios kusukela ngomhlaka 13 Okthoba 2013 ku- Openview futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi sangezwa kuDStv nakuStarSat.Ngo-2018, yasuswa ku-DStv. 
Lokhu Uthando (ukuphindisela) Uthando Lweqiniso (luyabuyiselwa) Ukufela Uthando U-Emperor Ashok Izindleko Zothando 
Isiteshi O yisiteshi somculo esisekelwe eNingizimu Afrika esiqale ukudlulisa ngo-1997.Umqondo wayo omkhulu ngumculo wase-Afrika e- Afrika nakwamanye amazwe. 
Isiteshi O sitholakala nge- DStv, isevisi ekhokhelwa nge-satellite pay kumakhaya akwele-Afrika.Isiteshi sisakaza amavidiyo omculo ahlukahlukene. 
Isiteshi O, kule minyaka edlule, besilahlekelwa isithunzi esikhulu ngenxa yokuvulwa kakhulu kweMTV Base Africa, Trace Urban neTrace Africa.Isiteshi besilokhu sizama izindlela eziningi zokuthola ukuthandwa kufaka phakathi indlela ethandwa kakhulu yokwakha okuphakelayo kwaseNingizimu Afrika kanye ne-Rest of Africa feed (iMTV Base neTrace nabo bakwamukele lokhu) 
ITrace Africa iyisiteshi somculo we-afro-pop esizinikele ekusakazeni abaculi bomculo abaphambili e-Afrika.ITrace Africa, okuyisiteshi somculo sokuqala e-Afrika, izinikele ekudlaleni nasekuboniseni umculo wabaculi abahamba phambili base-Afrika kanye nezinhlobo ezibandakanya i-Afro-pop, Coupé Décalé, Kwaito House, Afro-trap, Makossa, N'dombolo ngomsakazo nasemicimbini yekhonsathi ebukhoma.ITrace Africa yingxenye encane yomkhiqizo omkhulu weTrace, inkampani ezinikele ekusakazeni umculo, izindaba namasiko kulo lonke elase-Afrika eliHlakazekile.I-Trace Africa uhlelo lokuqala lomsakazo lwaqala ukukhonjiswa ku-DStv, ngonyaka ka-2016 esikhundleni seTrace Sports Stars kulo lonke izwekazi futhi kusukela ngo-2017 nalo selikhona kuStarSat. 
Njengoba umculo weTrace Africa ukhethwa futhi ucwaningwe kubaculi bakuleli nabakwamanye amazwe kwenye yezindawo ezintathu zeTrace eziseNingizimu Afrika, eCameroon naseNigeria, abaculi bakuleli kulindeleke bazuze kakhulu ekukhuleni kweTrace Africa.Labo abavela eZimbabwe bahlomule ikakhulukazi ezindlekweni zeTrace Africa zokuthola umculo.Abaculi baseZimbabwe bavame ukucindezelwa emthunzini wabantu abadumile baseNigeria nabaseNingizimu Afrika a rtists , kanti iTrace Africa manje isiphenduke inkundla lapho abaculi abaningi bengakhombisa ngamakhono abo futhi bazibeke ebalazweni.Ngaphezu kwalokho, ngemizila emisha yokulandela umkhondo yase-Afrika, abaseZimbabwe nabanye abaculi abavame ukumbozwa manje sebenethuba lokubonakala. 
Lokhu futhi kukhulisa ubuhlakani nokukhiqiza kubaculi bendawo. 
I-SABC 3 (eyenziwe isitayela njenge-S3) yinethiwekhi yethelevishini yamahhala yaseNingizimu Afrika ephethwe yiSouth African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC). 
Iphethe izinhlelo ngesiNgisi kanti, kusukela ngo-Ephreli 2009, isiBhunu, okwakuthi ekuqaleni sasineziqephu zaso kodwa eminyakeni embalwa edlule besiphinda kakhulu i- 7de Laan. 
ISABC3 isakaza imidlalo ye-English Premier League kusukela ngasekupheleni kuka-Agasti 2018 kuze kube ngu-Agasti 2019 futhi ibingumsakazi osemthethweni wayo yonke imidlalo engu-38 PL yeChelsea Football Club.Sekuyiminyaka uSABC 3 esakaza imidlalo yekhilikithi njengemidlalo yeT20, ODI, iTest series, World Cups neAfrican Cup of Nations, njll. 
Lesi siteshi futhi sinamalungelo okusakaza imidlalo yobuciko obubumbene bemidlalo yempi kusuka kuma-Extreme Fighting Championships Kusukela ngoSepthemba 2020, iSABC 3 isakaza iBundesliga njengomsakazi oyedwa waseNingizimu Afrika amasizini amabili 
Isiteshi sikhonza izindaba zezikhulumi zesiNgisi, simulcasting ukusakazwa kwezindaba nesiteshi sabo seSABC News . 
Ibuye ibe nezindaba zamanje nezamadokhumentari amanje nasekhaya. 
I-SABC 3 iphinde yasakaza iDeutsche Welle yaseGerman ngesiNgisi.Ngo-Ephreli 2021, i-SABC 3 inohlelo olusha lwezindaba ezisematheni olubizwa ngePrime News On 3, manje seluzosakaza phakathi nezinsuku ngeSonto ngo-8 ebusuku nangama-Weekends ngo-6 ntambama. 
Ukwethulwa kukaMuppet one-HIV, uKami, ukukhulisa ukuqwashisa nge-HIV / AIDS kugxekwe kakhulu yilungelo lezepolitiki lase-US, amaqembu afana ne- American Family Association eyibona kuyindlela yezishoshovu ezingongqingili ukuthonya ababukeli abasha. [1] Balinganiselwa ku-17% abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abaneminyaka ephakathi kwengu-15 kuya kwengama-49 ubudala abane-HIV / AIDS. 
Ngokusho kweSesame Workshop, iTakalani Sesame "yindlela ehlukile yaseNingizimu Afrika yokuhumusha imodeli yeSesame, iheha izingane nabazali bazo futhi igqugquzela ukulungela isikole okuyisisekelo, ukufunda nokubhala, ukubala, kanye nempilo nenhlanzeko."ITakalani Sesame nayo igxile ngokukhethekile ekuqwashiseni nge-HIV / AIDS futhi ifuna ukwethula ukuphepha nge-HIV / AIDS ngenkathi ikhuthaza ukubekezelelana nokunciphisa ukucwaswa. 
Uchungechunge lweTakalani lubuye lubandakanye nohlelo lomsakazo oludumile, uchungechunge lwamahlaya omagazini namaphephabhuku, kanye nomkhankaso kazwelonke okhuthaza abantu abadala ukuthi bakhulume nezingane zabo nge-HIV / AIDS nezinye izindaba ezihlobene nayo. 
U-Archbishop Desmond Tutu, uKofi Annan, noNane Annan benze ezibukwayo njengezivakashi kulolu hlelo.Isizini 11 yalolu hlelo bekufanele iqale ngomhlaka 1 Juni 2020 esiteshini sethelevishini saseNingizimu Afrika i- SABC 2.Isizini 12 njengamanje idlala phakathi nezinsuku ngo-15: 30 kuSabc2. 
IVelvet uhlobo oluthile lwendwangu elukiwe efakiwe 
IVelvet Underground, iqembu langaphambili le-rock laseMelika elakhiwa ngo-1964 eNew York City IVelvets (1959-1962), iqembu le-doo-wop IVelvet Revolver (2002-2008), iqembu elikhulu laseMelika eliqinile 
IVelvet (i-albhamu yeWink), i-albhamu ka-1990 yiqembu laseJapan i-Wink IVelvet (EP), ikhasethi EP yango-1992 ngabakwaToadies I-Velvet (i-albhamu yeStoney LaRue), i-albhamu ka-2011 nguStoney LaRue I-Velvet (i-albhamu ka-Adam Lambert), i-albhamu ka-2020 ka-Adam Lambert I-Velvet, i-EP ka-2016 kaRed Velvet 
"Velvet" (iculo likaSavoy), iculo likaSavoy elivela ku-albhamu ka-1996, iMary Is Coming "Velvet", ingoma kaMiss Kittin evela ku-albhamu ka-2002 Emgwaqeni "Velvet", ingoma kaFergie evela ku-albhamu ka-2006 iDutchess "Velvet" (Ingoma YeBig Pink), iculo leThe Big Pink eliku-albhamu ka-2009 ethi A Brief History of Love "Velvet" (ingoma kaChris Jamison), ingoma kaChris Jamison ka-2014 
IVelvet (isiteshi se-TV), isiteshi sokuzijabulisa esiqondiswe kwabesifazane IVelvet (Uchungechunge lwe-TV), uchungechunge lwe-TV yaseSpain 
IVelvet (ifilimu), ifilimu ye-TV yaseMelika yango-1984 IVelvet (yomculo), umculo wase-Australia ngokwengxenye osuselwe ku-Studio 54 yaseNew York IVelvet (Sirius XM), isiteshi somculo we-pop wesimanje kusevisi yokubhalisa yeSirius XM IVelvet Film, inkampani ekhiqiza amafilimu yaseJalimane esungulwe ngumenzi wamafilimu waseHaiti uRaoul Peck ngo-1986 Umdwebo we-Velvet, uhlobo lomdwebo ohlukaniswa ngokusetshenziswa kwe-velvet (imvamisa i-velvet emnyama) njengokusekelwa, esikhundleni sendwangu, iphepha, noma izinto ezifanayo 
I-Velvet (isifo senhlanzi), isifo esijwayelekile sezinhlanzi zase-tropical aquarium IVelvet (isitshalo), izitshalo eziningana kuhlobo lweVerbascum, ikakhulukazi i- V. Thapsus Velvet antler, isikhumba esithambile esimboza izimpondo zezinyamazane njengoba zikhula 
IVelvet (inkampani yamabhasi) ezinze e-Eastleigh, ngaseSouthampton, eNgilandi IVelvet (inja), inja esindise abagibeli abathathu bezintaba eMount Hood, e-Oregon IVelvet (indawo yomculo), elinye iklabhu lomculo eRimini, e-Italy UVelvet (umculi) (owazalwa ngo-1975), umculi waseSweden IVelvet, eWashington, umphakathi wase-United States Isihlanganisi seVelvet, isethi yama-algorithms womhlangano wokulandelana kwe-genomic IVelvet Divorce, ukuqedwa kweCzechoslovakia ngo-1993 IVelvet Revolution, ukuketulwa okungenabudlova kukahulumeni wobukhomanisi eCzechoslovakia e1989 IVelvet Ice Cream Company, inkampani ka-ayisikhilimu e-Ohio 
IVelvet, omunye wabalingiswa abahlanu abakhulu be- Odin Sphere UVelvet Crowe, omunye wabalingisi abakhulu beTales of Berseria UVelvet Hoofstrong, omunye wabalingiswa abaphambili emdlalweni wevidiyo iThem 's Fightin 'Herds . 
IVelvet (umagazini), umagazini wezocansi IVelvet (inoveli), inoveli yango-2016 yombhali wasePalestine uHuzama Habayeb IVelvet, uchungechunge lwamahlaya olwenziwa ngu- Ed Brubaker noSteve Epting 
IVelvet kwakuyinethiwekhi yethelevishini yekhebula lasePhilippines ezinze eQuezon City.Yayiphethwe futhi iqhutshwa yiCreative Programs, Inc. (manje eyi-ABS-CBN Cable Channels), okuyinkampani ephethwe ngokuphelele yithimba labezindaba i-ABS-CBN Corporation.Ukugxila okuyinhloko kwenethiwekhi bekuzinhlelo zokuzijabulisa ezigxile kwabesifazane. 
Velvet kwadingeka kusengaphambili hlala ku SkyCable isiteshi 25 kusukela ngo-November 2007, kanye Maxxx futhi Amabhola.IVelvet yethulwa ngokusemthethweni ngoJanuwari 1, 2008. 
IVelvet iphinde yasakaza imibukiso ekhethiwe kuStudio 23 (manje eyiS + A ). 
Isiteshi sasuka emoyeni phakathi kwamabili ngoMasingana 1, 2014.UMiss Universe 2013 kwakuwuhlelo lokugcina lweVelvet ngaphambi kokuthi lusayinwe unomphela. 
Iningi lezinhlelo zesiteshi kanye nezipesheli zithuthelwe ku-Lifestyle (manje eyiMetro Channel ). 
IVelvet ingumphumela ngemuva kokuphela kwenkontileka yeSolar Entertainment's 2nd Avenue neSkyCable . 
IVelvet ifana ncamashi netimu nezethameli ezine- ETC ne-yesibilind Avenue ngokujwayelekile ikhanga uhlobo lwababukeli besifazane ngobubanzi obusuka ngaphambi kokuthomba kuya kubakaki abaneminyaka engamashumi amathathu nantathu.I-Velvet ifaka izinhlelo ezisuselwa ezindabeni zokuzijabulisa nakokukhethekile, imibukiso yemidlalo,izenzo zamahlaya wokuma, idrama, uchungechunge lweqiniso nemibukiso yemiklomelo. 
IVelvet (eyaziwa nangokuthi nguGalerías Velvet ) uchungechunge lwethelevishini lwedrama lwaseSpain olwenziwe nguRamón Campos noGema R.María futhi lwenziwa yiBambú Producciones ye- Antena 3.Isabelomali sayo silinganiselwa kuma-euro ayizi-500,000 isiqephu ngasinye.Indaba esemqoka yalolu hlelo yindaba yothando ka-Alberto Márquez (odlalwa nguMiguel Ángel Silvestre ), indlalifa kaGalerías Velvet, enye yezindlu zemfashini ezihlonishwa kakhulu eSpain ngasekupheleni kweminyaka yama-1950, no-Ana Ribera ( Paula Echevarría ), usebenza njengomthungi lapho. 
Ngo-edition 2014 ka MIPTV Media Market, amalungelo ngoba Velvet lalifundwa Italy sika RAI kanye eFrance M6.I-RAI nayo ithole amalungelo okwenziwa kabusha.

ESlovenia ukukhonjiswa bekuku-RTVSLO ngomhlaka 15 Meyi 2016 kanti eSlovakia bekukuTV Doma ngomhlaka 4 kuJulayi 2016. 
Iriphabhulikhi yaseCzech Prima LOVETV ngomhlaka 13.10.2018 
Laba abashonile 
Ezifundweni ezisezingeni eliphakeme ("A") ezifundiswayo zihlukaniswe ngeZobuciko neSayensi.Izifundo zobuciko ezinikezwayo yilezi; Umlando, Ezomnotho, UbuNkulunkulu, IsiFulentshi, Izincwadi ZesiNgisi, IJografi, IsiSwahili, Umculo Nobuciko Obuhle.Izifundo zeSayensi ezinikezwayo yiFizikiki, iChemistry, iMathematics, iBiology, ezoLimo, iMasidi esezingeni eliphansi kanye neGeneral Paper okuyisifundo esiyimpoqo. 
Isikole iNtare yisikole samabanga aphakeme sabafana abahlala eMbarara, esifundeni iMbarara, eningizimu ntshonalanga ne- Uganda.Yasungulwa e1956 nguthisha waseScotland ogama lakhe linguWilliam Crichton. 
INtare School ingesinye sezikole ezihlonishwa kakhulu e-Uganda ngenxa yomlando waso, idumela laso, ukusebenza kahle kwezemfundo, nokubusa kwalo kwezemidlalo. 
UNtando Duma (owazalwa ngo-Agasti 29, 1995) ungumlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika futhi ungumlingisi wakumabonakude. 
Yena waziwa kakhulu njengoba umethuli ku e.tv ka- intsha izinhlelo block Craz-e, lapho yena ngokuyinhloko ofakwe Craz-e Umhlaba bukhoma.Uyaziwa futhi ngokulingisa uZinzi Dandala emdlalweni owuchungechunge i-e.tv iRhythm City. 
Ujoyine i- Rhythm City ye-etv enguZinzi Dandala.NgoJuni 2014 uNtando Duma wethulwa njengomunye wabethuli abasha beCraz-e. 
Ngo-2020, wajoyina iThe Queen telenova edlala indawo kaMpho Sebata, ngonyaka olandelayo ngoJuni 2021 kwamenyezelwa ukuthi uyashiya kulo mdlalo. 
Usebenze njengesibonelo futhi ubeyingxenye yomgwaqo wokugijima weviki lezimfashini laseSoweto ngo-2015. 
Wasungula i-Inspire A Teen SA Foundation. 
Ngo-6 Julayi 2021, uNtando Duma wathola ukugconwa ngokupaka endaweni ekhubazekile ebhalwe abakhubazekile, ngemuva kokuyifaka ku-akhawunti yakhe yeTwitter.Abantu abaningi ababuke le vidiyo bathi uDuma wayelindele ukuthi abantu abaMnyama bamvikele ngokubiza abantu abamhlophe "nokuziphatha kwabo okubi" noma "ukuzikhukhumeza". 
UNtando Duma wazalelwa elokishini e- Orange Farm eGoli, eGauteng.Ukhulele elokishini i- Orange Farm etholakala cishe kuma-45 km ukusuka eGoli, lapho akhuliswa khona ngunina nogogo wakhe. 
Unabafowabo abathathu okubalwa kubo nodadewabo, uThando Duma. 
Ubaba wakhe washiya umndeni eneminyaka emithathu ubudala futhi washona ngo-2008. 
Unengane enoDJ obizwa ngeJunior DeRocka oqambe ingane yabo, uSbahle Mzizi. 
UNtando Mahlangu (owazalwa ngo-2002) ungumgijimi waseNingizimu Afrika weParalympic.Ubemele iNingizimu Afrika kuma- Paralympics asehlobo i-2016 abanjelwe eRio de Janeiro, eBrazil futhi wawina indondo yesiliva emcimbini wabesilisa wamamitha angama-200 T42 . [1]Ngo-2019, wakufanelekela ukumela iNingizimu Afrika kuma- Paralympics asehlobo ka-2020 eTokyo, eJapan. 
U-Queen Ntfombi, u-The Queen Mother, u-Ndlovukati wase-Eswatini (owazalwa ngo- Ntfombi Tfwala ngo-1950) uyindlovukazi yamanje no- head of state of Eswatini, okhonza kusukela ngo-1986. 
Wayephinde Regent ka Eswatini kusuka 1983 kuya ku-1986. 
Ungumama weNkosi uMswati III. 
UNtfombi wazalwa ngo-1950. 
Washada neNkosi uSobhuza II waseSwazini, owathola indodana naye, uMntwana uMakhosetive Dlamini. 
Ngo-1982 inkosi uSobhuza esiqokiwe omunye kwamakhosikazi akhe, ukukhashelwa Queen Dzeliwe, njengoba Indlovukati ukubusa njengenkosi eNgophezukonke ezikanye ikusasa lakhe owalandela.Esikhundleni siqaphela enye yamadodana akhe ngokuthi indlalifa sobala, wabonisa ukuthi bakhe Loqoqo ukuthi wayefuna Prince Makhosetive Dlamini esikhundleni sakhe sobukhosi. 
NgoJuni 1982 wabuye welula igunya leLoqoqo, walinika amandla okusebenza "njengoMkhandlu Ophakeme Wombuso", okhululekile ukuqoka "Umuntu Ogunyaziwe" ozosebenzisa ilungelo lobukhosi uma i-regent ithathwa njengengakwazi ukwenza kahle. 
Esikhala sokuphela kwamandla esabangelwa ukufa kukaSobhuza II, u- Indlovukati Dzeliwe waba yiNdlovukazi u-Regent ngesikhathi esincane sendlalifa ekhethiwe, kepha iLoqoqo, eyayiqukethe kakhulu izihlobo eziphezulu zeNkosi uSobhuza, izinduna nabeluleki, yathatha igunya lakhe futhi yaxosha UNdunankulu kaSobhuza, uMntwana uMabandla Dlamini, okusobala ukuthi amalungu kaLoqoqo besaba ukuthi uzobaphuca indima yabo entsha.Uma Prince Makhosetive Dlamini attained iningi yakhe futhi ngokusemthethweni ukubusa, unina Bazobe kulindeleke ukuba eyabizwa ngokuthi Indlovukati entsha.Kodwa-ke, iNdlovukazi u-Dzeliwe yaboshwa ngaphansi kwendlu ngo-1983.Ukulandela izinsuku ezingu-9 ngesikhathi lapho Swaziland lalibuswa Prince Sozisa Dlamini, Ntfombi sikhethwe njengoba indlovukazi ibamba . 
Jean Kalala N'Tumba (7 Januwari 1949 - 11 Januwari 2021)bekawu umdlali webhola waseCongo owadlalela Zaire ku 1974 FIFA World Cup.Ubuye wadlalela i- AS Vita Club . 
U-Lee William Aaker (Septhemba 25, 1943 - Mandulo 1, 2021)wayengumlingisi wezingane waseMelika, umkhiqizi, umbazi, futhi ofundisa nge-ski owaziwa ngokubonakala kwakhe njengoRusty we "B-Company" kuhlelo lwethelevishini lwango-1950 i- The Adventures of I-Tin Tin Tin.Wayeyilungu lokugcina labadlali abasindile kulolu chungechunge.Ngo-1952, u-Lee Aker wavela ku “Desperate Search” eno Howard Keel no Keenan Wynn. 
Unina ka-Aaker, uNkk.UMyles Wilbour, wayengumnikazi wesikole sokudansa eLos Angeles.(Omunye umthombo uthi "wayeqhuba isikole sezingane zemidlalo yaseshashalazini" nokuthi lapho u-Aaker eneminyaka engu-4, wayemenza "acule futhi adanse emakilabhini endawo." 
I-eBella kwakuyisiteshi sethelevishini saseNingizimu Afrika sedijithali esenziwe futhi esasiphethwe yi-e.tv 's eMedia Investment ye- Openview ne- DStv. 
Ngemuva kokuthi iMedia Investments nePlatco Digital bethule ngempumelelo ipulatifomu yayo ye-OpenView, banquma ukukhulisa imindeni yabo yeziteshi.Njengoba i-eExtra idume kakhulu kuma-telenovelas asakazwayo anjengeSanta Diabla, abakwa-e.tv banqume ukungena kakhulu emidlalweni nakuchungechunge lwamazwe omhlaba. 
Ukwethulwa kwalokhu kungenxa yesiteshi esisha sokuqukethwe ku-DStv esibizwa ngeMoja Love, esethulwe ngomhlaka 14 kuFebhuwari 2015.Isiteshi besigxile kubathandi nabathandi bobudlelwano, okuyi-e.tv edale i-eBella ukuba ibe yisiteshi esithandwa ngabesifazane. 
I-eBella inqanyulwe ekupheleni kukaMashi 2019 ngenxa yokubukwa okuphansi. 
Konke okuqukethwe kuhanjiswe kwa- eExtra.Ngenxa yokususwa kweStar Life,i-OVHD imemezele ukuthi maduzane lesi siteshi sizovula kabusha. 
IMnet ( isifinyezo se-Music Network) iyisiteshi somculo wethelevishini esikhokhelwayo saseNingizimu Korea esiphethwe yi- CJ E&M, isigaba seCJ ENM, esiyingxenye yeCJ Group. 
Ukufa ukuphela kwayo yonke imisebenzi yemvelo esekela umzimba ophilayo 
Ukuhlinzwa kwenhliziyo, noma ukuhlinzwa kwenhliziyo, ukuhlinzwa enhliziyweni noma emikhunjini emikhulu eyenziwa odokotela abahlinzayo benhliziyo. 
Imvamisa isetshenziselwa ukwelapha izinkinga zesifo senhliziyo eschemic (ngokwesibonelo, ngomthambo we-coronary bypass ngokuxhunyelelwa ); ukulungisa isifo senhliziyo esizalwe naso ; noma ukwelapha isifo senhliziyo se-valvular ngezimbangela ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi i- endocarditis, isifo senhliziyo i-rheumatic, kanye ne- atherosclerosis.Kubandakanya ukufakelwa kwenhliziyo. 
Umbhali ngumuntu osebenzisa amagama abhaliwe ngezitayela namasu ahlukene ukudlulisa imibono.Ababhali bakhiqiza izinhlobo ezahlukahlukene zobuciko bemibhalo nokubhala kokuqamba njengamanoveli, izindaba ezimfishane, izincwadi, izinkondlo, imidlalo yeshashalazi, imidlalo yesikrini, izingcingo, izingoma nezindatshana kanye neminye imibiko nezindatshana zezindaba ezingaba nentshisekelo emphakathini.Imibhalo yabalobi ishicilelwa kwimidiya ehlukahlukene. 
Ababhali abanekhono abakwazi ukusebenzisa ulimi ukuveza imibono kahle, bavame ukufaka isandla kakhulu kokuqukethwe kwamasiko emphakathini. [1] 
Igama elithi "umbhali" liphinde lisetshenziswe kwenye indawo kwezobuciko nasemculweni - njengombhali wezingoma noma umbhali wesikrini - kepha njenge "mbhali" ozimele ngokuvamile kubhekiswa ekwakhiweni kolimi olubhalwayo.Abanye ababhali basebenza ngokwesiko lomlomo . 
Ababhali bangakhipha okokusebenza ezinhlotsheni eziningi, eziqanjiwe noma ezingezona eziqanjiwe.Abanye ababhali basebenzisa imidiya eminingi - ngokwesibonelo, ihluzo noma umfanekiso - ukuthuthukisa ukuxhumana kwemibono yabo.Esinye isidingo sakamuva senziwe ngabafundi bakahulumeni kanye nohulumeni ngomsebenzi wabalobi bezobuchwepheshe abangaqanjiwe, abanamakhono adala imibhalo eqondakalayo, etolikekayo yohlobo olusebenzayo noma lwesayensi.Abanye ababhali bangasebenzisa izithombe (ukudweba, ukudweba, ihluzo) noma i- multimedia ukukhulisa ukubhala kwabo. 
Ezimweni ezingavamile, ababhali bokudala bayakwazi ukudlulisa imibono yabo ngomculo nangamagama. [1] 
E- Ancient Rome, izimbongi eziqeqeshiwe zazivame ukuxhaswa ngabathengi, abacebile abacebile kubandakanya izikhulu nezikhulu zamasosha.Isibonelo, uGaius Cilnius Maecenas, umngani kaKesari Augustus, wayengumphathi obalulekile wezimbongi zika-Augustan, kufaka phakathi bobabili uHorace noVirgil.Ngenkathi u- Ovid, imbongi esungulwe kahle, waxoshwa eRoma ngu- Awugustu wokuqala. 
NgeNkathi Ephakathi Ephakathi, abahlukumezi babeyisigaba esibalulekile sezimbongi futhi bevela ezizindeni ezahlukahlukene.Babehlala futhi behamba ezindaweni eziningi ezahlukahlukene futhi babebhekwa njengabalingisi noma abaculi njengezimbongi.Babevame ukuphathwa, kepha abaningi babehamba kakhulu. 
Isikhathi se- Renaissance saqhubeka nokuxhaswa kwezimbongi ngabasebukhosini.Izimbongi eziningi, kodwa, bezineminye imithombo engenayo, okubandakanya amaNtaliyane anjengoDante Aligheri, uGiovanni Boccaccio noPetrarch 's works in a pharmist's guild and William 's Shakespeare's theatre. 
Esikhathini se-Romantic kuya phambili, izimbongi eziningi zazingababhali abazimele ababeziphilisa ngomsebenzi wabo, imvamisa belekelelwa yimali evela kweminye imisebenzi noma emndenini. [1] Lokhu bekubandakanya izimbongi ezinjengoWilliam Wordsworth noRobert Burns. 
Izimbongi ezifana noVirgil ku- Aeneid noJohn Milton kwi- Paradise Lost bacele usizo lwe- Muse. 
Izimbongi zezikhathi zangaphambili zazivame ukufundwa kahle nabantu abafunde kakhulu kanti ezinye zazizifundise ngezinga elikhulu.Izimbongi ezimbalwa ezifana noJohn Gower noJohn Milton bakwazile ukubhala izinkondlo ngezilimi ezingaphezu kweyodwa.Ezinye izimbongi zasePortugal, njengoFrancisco de Sá de Miranda, azibhalanga ngesiPutukezi kuphela kodwa nangeSpanishi. 
[1]UJan Kochanowski ubhale ngesiPolish nangesiLatin, [2] uFrance Prešeren noKarel Hynek Mácha [3] babhala izinkondlo ezithile ngesiJalimane, yize babeyizimbongi zaseSlovenia naseCzech ngokulandelana. 
U-Adam Mickiewicz, imbongi enkulu kunazo zonke zolimi lwasePoland, wabhala i-ode yesiLatini yombusi uNapoleon III.Esinye isibonelo uJerzy Pietrkiewicz, imbongi yasePoland. 
Lapho ethuthela eGreat Britain, wayeka ukubhala izinkondlo ngesiPolish, kodwa waqala ukubhala inoveli ngesiNgisi.[4]Wabuye wahumusha izinkondlo zisuselwa esiNgisini ziye esiNgisini. 
Izimbongi ezi-Lyrical ezibhala izinkondlo ezingcwele ("ama- hymnographer ") ziyehluka emfanekisweni ojwayelekile wezimbongi ngezindlela eziningi. 
Umbhali wezingoma ezifana no- Isaac Watts owabhala izinkondlo ezingama-700 ngesikhathi sakhe sokuphila, kungenzeka ukuthi izingoma zakhe ziculwa yizigidi zabantu njalo ngeSonto ekuseni, kodwa azifakwanga njalo kwizingoma zezinkondlo.Ngoba amaculo abhekwa njengokuthi " ukukhonza " kunokuthi "izinkondlo," igama elithi "ubuciko kenosis" kwesinye isikhathi lisetshenziselwa ukuchaza impumelelo yomculi wehuna "ekuchitheni" umuzwa wokuphumelela njengombongi.Umculi osesihlalweni angahle abambe ngekhanda izitanza ezimbalwa zikaWatts, ngaphandle kokwazi igama lakhe noma ukumcabanga njengembongi. 
Imbongi ngumuntu odala izinkondlo.Izimbongi zingazichaza kanjalo noma zichazwe kanjalo ngabanye abantu. 
Imbongi ingavele ibe ngumbhali wezinkondlo, noma ingenze ubuciko bayo kuzethameli. 
Umsebenzi wembongi empeleni ungowokuxhumana, kungaba ukuveza imibono ngomqondo ongokoqobo, njengokubhala ngomcimbi othile noma indawo ethile, noma ngokomfanekiso. 
Izimbongi bezikhona kusukela endulo, cishe kuzo zonke izilimi, futhi zikhiqize imisebenzi eyehluka kakhulu emasikweni nasezinkathini ezahlukahlukene.Kuyo yonke impucuko nolimi ngalunye, izimbongi zisebenzise izitayela ezahlukahlukene eziguqukile ngokuqhubeka komlando wokubhala, okuholele emlandweni wezimbongi ezahlukahlukene njengezincwadi abazikhiqizile. 
Izinkondlo (ezisuselwa kumagama athi Greek poiesis, "making") uhlobo lwezincwadi ezisebenzisa ubuhle futhi zivame ukuba nesigqi izimfanelo zolimi — njenge- phonaesthetics, uphawu lomsindo, nemitha —ukuveza izincazelo ku ukwengeza, noma esikhundleni sencazelo ye-prosaic ebonakalayo. 
Forms of odes appear in many of the cultures that were influenced by the Greeks and Latins.[1] The ode generally has three parts: a strophe, an antistrophe, and an epode. 
Odes are often intended to be recited or sung by two choruses (or individuals), with the first reciting the strophe, the second the antistrophe, and both together the epode.[2] Over time, differing forms for odes have developed with considerable variations in form and structure, but generally showing the original influence of the Pindaric or Horatian ode. 
One non-Western form which resembles the ode is the qasida in Persian poetry.[3] 
U-Alphonse Daniel Ntumba Luaba Lumu wayenguNobhala Ophethe Wengqungquthela Yamazwe Ngamazwe Esifundeni SamaLwandle Amakhulu kusukela ngoDisemba 2011 kuze kube ngu-2016. 
Phambilini uke waba nguNgqongqoshe Wamalungelo Abantu eDemocratic Republic of the Congo (DR of the Congo). 
Ngaphambi kwalesi sikhundla, ubenguSolwazi Wezomthetho Womhlaba Wonke eKinshasa.Wayengomunye wabantu, owayemele i-DR yaseCongo eNkantolo Yomhlaba Yezobulungiswa eHague 
NgoMeyi 2003, uNtumba waphoqeleka ukuba aphephele ezikhungweni ezilawulwa yi-UN ngesikhathi kuchitheka igazi elabulala abantu abangaphezu kuka-112.Lesi sigameko besingenye yezehlakalo eziningi ezenzeke eminyakeni edlule lapho ukuphepha kukaNtumba kusongelwa ngokuqhubeka nodlame lwangaphakathi. 
Onyakeni owawandulele, ngo-2002, Ntumba ethunjiwe ngeviki nge Hema amasosha e Bunia ngaphambi kokukhishwa bengenamiyocu kulesi sigameko.UNtumba Luaba ubephethe izikhundla eziningana kuhulumeni waseDRC njengePhalamende, iphini likangqongqoshe wezobulungiswa, ungqongqoshe wamalungelo abantu, unobhala-jikelele kahulumeni. 
WayenguMqondisi wohlelo lukazwelonke lwe-DDR waze waqokwa njengommeleli kanye nonobhala omkhulu we-DRPG we-CEPGL (Great Lakes Economic Community). 
I-Faith TV kwakuyi- movie yamaKristu, idokhumentari kanye nesiteshi se-biography esasi amadrama, amahlaya, isenzo, nezinhlelo zemfundo kanye namafilimu afakiwe athathwe emitatsheni yolwazi ekhuthazayo.Kwafakwa i- My Family TV. 
Ezinye izibonelo zemilando yomlando eye yasakazwa yiFaith TV nguMartin Luther, iHistory of Christianity, namaChristian Heroes of the Bible.Ama-documentary afake ama- Wings over the World, Rail Away, Hollywood First and Last, kanye neGiotto: His Life and Art.Amabhayisikobho afake iMimoya ekungqubuzaneni, iDivision encane kababa, noMfazi kaMbhishobhi.Futhi phakathi kwezinhlelo zomndeni ezisakazwayo kubalwa iNanna's Cottage, You Bet Your Life with Groucho Marx, Dusty's Trail noBob Denver ( Gilligan's Island ) nochungechunge lomshado wama- Adam no-Eve Factor. 
Kuma- South African Music Awards ama-27 athola amagama amathathu aqokiwe afaka phakathi; I-albhamu yonyaka, Male Artist of the Year neBest AmaPiano Album, okumenze waba ngumculi oqokwe kakhulu, nge-albhamu yakhe ethi I Am The King Of AmaPiano: Sweet & Dust. 
UMotha uvame ukubizwa nge "King of Amapiano".Uthathwa njengomunye wabaculi bomculo abathengisa kakhulu ama-amapiano, futhi futhi ungomunye wamaphayona alolo hlobo. 
Ngokuthuthuka kwakhe ngo-2018, wadlala indima enkulu ekwandiseni uhlobo lwama-amapiano.Ngomhla ka-3 kuZibandlela wezi-2019, iSpotify South Africa, yabiza uMotha njengomculi waseNingizimu Afrika osakazwa kakhulu endaweni yesikhulumi yango-2019 
UKabelo Petrus Motha owaziwa kakhulu ngegama lakhe isigaba Kabza De Small, kuyinto eNingizimu Afrika DJ futhi urekhode umkhiqizi.Wazalelwa eMpumalanga wakhulela ePitoli . 
Ubebizwa ngenkosi yohlobo lohlobo lwama-Amapiano.UMotha usebenze kakhulu nomdidiyeli womculo uDJ Maphorisa. 
UKabelo Motha wazalelwa eMpumalanga, eNingizimu Afrika, wakhulela ePitoli.UMotha waqala umsebenzi wakhe wokuba nguDJ ngo-2009, wangena ezinhlotsheni: Indlu ene-Afro-fused ne- EDM.Ngo-2016, wenza izikweletu zakhe zokukhiqiza ngokukhipha i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala, i- Avenue Sounds ngaphansi kwelebuli, i-House Afrika Records. 
NgoNovemba 2018, wathola ukunakwa ngokukhipha izingoma, "Amabele Shaya" nethi "Umshove", ngokulandelana, equkethe izingoma zabavakashi ngozakwabo wama-amapiano, uLeehleza. 
Ngemuva kwezingoma zombili, uqhubeke nokusebenzisana kwakhe noLeehleza njengoba ekhipha ingoma ethi "Bamba La", ngomhlaka 3 Januwari 2019. 
Ngo-4 Ephreli 2020, ngesikhathi se- COVID-19 kuzwelonke sokuvala, wakhipha i-EP esihloko sithi Pretty Girls Love Amapiano 2, edlala ngoTyler ICU, DJ Maphorisa, Xolani, King Deetoy. 
Ngo-26 Juni 2020, wakhipha i-albhamu yakhe elandelayo eyedwa, I Am The King Of Amapiano: Sweet & Dust, eveze zombili izinto zaseNingizimu Afrika nezamazwe omhlaba ezifana noBurna Boy, Wizkid, Cassper Nyovest, Dali Wonga, DJ Maphorisa, Samthing Soweto, Sha sha, Mlindo, Bontle Smith. 
Ngo-Okthoba 2020, wabonakala engomeni ka-Oscar Mbo esihloko sithi Genesis ku-albhamu, For The Groovists. 
Ngo-9 Ephreli 2021, uKabza wakhipha iRumble in the Jungle, okuyicwecwe lokusebenzisana nomdidiyeli womculo uDJ Maphorisa nomculi weTRESOR . 
US'busiso Romeo Nkosi (owazalwa ngomhlaka 21 Januwari 1996) ungumdlali webhola lombhoxo waseNingizimu Afrika oseqenjini lesizwe laseNingizimu Afrika futhi Oshaka kwiSuper Rugby.Isikhundla sakhe esijwayelekile yi-winger. 
UNkosi wazalelwa futhi wakhulela eBarberton.Ngo-2012, indawo yangakubo Iqembu lePumas limbizele ukuzobamela kumqhudelwano we-Under-16 Grant Grant Khomo Week, lapho uNkosi adlale khona kathathu.Wafunda iBarberton High School waze wafunda uGrade 10 lapho ngemuva kokuthuthela eGoli ukuyofunda eJeppe High School for Boys, lapho athola khona izifundo Iqembu le-Golden Lions 'Under-18 Craven Week ngawo womabili ama-2013 nango-2014.Yena kukora Zama kowamanqamu olungekho emthethweni we 2013 mqhudelwano ePolokwane, kodwa ohlangothini lwakhe kuntsandvo, ukulahlekelwa 29-45 ukuze eSifundazweni Sasentshonalanga. 
Isiteshi sethulwe ngo-Okthoba 1, 2011,sihlinzeka ngokuzijabulisa okuseqophelweni kuzo zonke izinhlaka zabantu abahlala endaweni ezungeze iBay. 
Ngo-2012, lesi siteshi satholakala kuDStv kusukela ngoLwezi 13. 
Ngo-2020, lesi siteshi sashintsha igama futhi senziwa ngokusemthethweni ngoFebhuwari 2021.Baphinde bethula uchungechunge lwemini,Ekhondweni. [1] [2] 
NgoJuni 2021, lesi siteshi sabambisana neNewzroom Afrika ukukhiqiza okuqukethwe yilesi siteshi sezindaba okuzosiza nasekuthuthukiseni ikhono lezindaba leMpuma Kapa TV.
