Umqambi ( Latin compōnō ; ngokwezwi nezwi "ohlanganisa ndawonye") ngumuntu obhala umculo, ikakhulukazi umculo we-classic [1] nganoma iyiphi indlela, kufaka phakathi umculo wezwi ( womculi noma wekwaya ), umculo wezinsimbi, umculo we-elektroniki, nomculo ehlanganisa amafomu amaningi.Umqambi angakha umculo kunoma yiluphi uhlobo lomculo, kufaka phakathi, isibonelo, umculo we-classic, itiyetha yomculo, i- blues, umculo wesintu, i- jazz, nomculo odumile.Abaqambi ngokuvamile baveze imisebenzi yabo amaphuzu zomculo olubhalwe kusetshenziswa notation emculweni. 
I-Wikipedia futhi ingabhekisa ku 
Ezinganekwaneni zaseNorse,u- Iðunn ungunkulunkulukazi ohlotshaniswa nama- apula nentsha.I-Iðunn ufakazelwa yi- Poetic Edda, eyahlanganiswa ngekhulu le-13 kusuka emithonjeni yendabuko yangaphambili, kanye neProse Edda, eyabhalwa ngekhulu le-13 nguSnorri Sturluson.Kuyo yomibili imithombo, uchazwa njengonkosikazi kankulunkulu wama-skaldic uBragi, naku- Prose Edda, futhi njengomgcini wama-aphula kanye nomnikezeli wobusha obungunaphakade . 
U-Iðunn wethulwa njengomfazi kaBragi esethulweni sesibongo senkondlo ethi Lokasenna, lapho bobabili beya edilini elenziwa ngu- irgir.Ezingxenyeni ezingu-16, 17 no-18, kuba nengxoxo phakathi kukaLoki no-Iðunn ngemuva kokuthi uLoki ethuke uBragi.Kusigaba 16, u-Iðunn (lapha uchazwe njengo- Idunn ) uthi: 
Enkondlweni kaHrafnagaldr Óðins, kunikezwa imininingwane eyengeziwe mayelana no-Iðunn, noma ngabe lolu lwazi alufakazelwa ngenye indlela. 
Lapha, u-Iðunn ukhonjwa njengowehla ema- elves, njengomunye "wezingane ezindala zika-Ivaldi " nanjengama- dís ahlala kuma- dales.UStanza 6 ufundeka kanje: 
Igama elithi Iðunn lichazwe ngokuhlukahlukene ngokuthi lisho ukuthi "umncane njalo", "umvuseleli", noma "ovuselelayo". [1]Njengoba yesimanje zamagama zesiNgisi awunazo waseMoresheti ( d ) uhlamvu, Iðunn ngezinye izikhathi anglicized njengoba Idun, Idunn noma Ithun. [2] Isijobelelo -a kwesinye isikhathi sisetshenziswa ukukhombisa ubufazi, okuholela kumafomu afana ne- Iduna ne- Idunna . 
I-SABC 2 iyisiteshi sethelevishini somphakathi saseNingizimu Afrika esiphethwe yiSouth African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC).ISABC 2 isakaza izinhlelo ngesiNgisi, isiBhunu, isiVenda nesiTsonga. 
I-SABC 2 idlala umculo we-afro-soul ne-pop wakuleli ongena phakathi kwemidlalo. 
Iphinde ibe nezinhlelo zomculo ezifana ne-Afro Cafè, iSoul'd Out Sessions, iKliphard, iMusiek Roulette neNoot vir Noot. 
I-SABC 2 ayivamile ukusakaza imidlalo bukhoma ngenxa yezinkinga zezimali, futhi kunalokho igxila kokugqamile kwezemidlalo.Igxile kakhulu kwesibhakela, umbhoxo, ukubhukuda nezokusubatha. 
Isiteshi inikeza amanqampunqampu ezintathu emini ukuze isiVenda / isiTsonga, ngesiBhunu, futhi Sesotho / Setswana / iSepedi izilimi. 
Ngaphezu kwalokho, inezinhlelo zezindaba zamanje ezifana noFokus, Ngula Ya Vutivi, Zwa Maramani neLeihlo La Sechaba.Iphinde idlale uhlelo lwasekuseni oludonsa isikhathi eside kakhulu iMorning Live. 
Kuyaziwa ngemicimbi kazwelonke efana nokuvulwa kukamongameli, Inkulumo Echaza Isimo Sezwe, Izinkulumo Zebhajethi, kanye nemicimbi yasePhalamende. 
I-SABC 2 inohlu lwezinhlelo ezivela kwi-SABC Education slate yayo, ikakhulukazi iTakalani Sesame, It's For Life, The Epic Hangout, njll. kusuka kuDisney Junior, kungaba kumculo wabo wokuqala wesiNgisi noma kubizwe ngezilimi zaseNingizimu Afrika njengeLion Guard ngesiZulu, uBen 10 ngesiBhunu nakuDoc McStuffins ngesiSuthu.Okwabasakhulayo nasebusheni buhlinzeka ngochungechunge lwamahlaya oluvela kuDisney Channel naseNickelodeon, njenge-ICarly, True Jackson, VP, ANT Farm, Sanjay noCraig, neCookabout, kanye nochungechunge lwasendaweni olufana neSignal High, Snake Park neHectic Nine-9.Okuqukethwe okubhekwe kakhulu phakathi kwentsha i-17: 00 slot, yokudlala uchungechunge lwe-anime kusuka kuToei Animation, Studio Pierrot neTV TV, ikakhulukazi edlala uchungechunge oludumile olunamasiko alandelayo afana ne- Yu-Gi-Oh!, Yu-Gi-Oh! 
GX, Beyblade, Dragon Ball, Dragon Ball Z, Dragon Ball Z Kai, Dragon Ball GT, Naruto Shippuden, One Piece neBleach. 
Yasungulwa ngomhlaka 6 Januwari 1976 ngaphansi kwegama elithi SABC TV / SAUK TV. 
Ngomhlaka 1 Januwari 1981, lashintsha igama laba yi-TV1, ngokwethulwa kwezinsizakalo ezimbili ezintsha: ukusakazwa kwe-TV2 ngesiZulu nangesiXhosa nokusakazwa kwe-TV3 ngesiSuthu nangesiTswana, zombili ezazibhekiswe kuzithameli zabamnyama zasemadolobheni. 
[1]Isiteshi esikhulu, manje esibizwa nge-TV1, sasihlukaniswe ngokulingana phakathi kwesiNgisi nesiBhunu, njengakuqala.Ngo-1986, kwethulwa insiza entsha ebizwa ngeTV4, iphethe izinhlelo zezemidlalo nezikaqedisizungu, kusetshenziswa isiteshi esabiwe yiTV2 neTV3, esayeka ukusakaza ngo-9: 30 ebusuku. [2] 
Ngemuva kokuthi iSABC ihlele kabusha iziteshi zayo zethelevishini, iSABC 2 yathatha indawo yesiteshi esidala se-TV1.Ukuncipha kokuvelela kwesiBhunu kwacasula izikhulumi eziningi zalolu limi, yize lesi siteshi sisenenani elikhulu lezinhlelo zesiBhunu, kufaka phakathi ukusakazwa kwezindaba njalo ngesonto ebusuku ngo-19: 00 nangezimpelasonto ngo-18: 00. 
Isiteshi singabhekisa ku 
Inxusa noma isiteshi samanxusa, lapho kuthunyelwe khona isikhulu sezombusazwe / isithunywa (noma imishini) Isizinda sezempi Isiteshi somoya sasolwandle, isikhumulo somoya se-United States Navy Isiteshi seRoyal Air Force Isiteshi Somoya SaseRoyal Naval Isiteshi (isakhiwo esivikela umngcele) 
Isiteshi (i-albhamu), yiqembu lamaRussian Circles Station (1981 ifilimu), ifilimu laseJapan eliqondiswe nguYasuo Furuhata Isiteshi (ifilimu ka-2014), isimanga samaHindi esikhishwe eNdiya Isiteshi, umlingiswa oqanjiwe ongumlingiswa kwifilimu ka-1991 iBill & Ted's Bogus Journey Station.com, ingosi yomdlalo eqhutshwa ngabakwaSony Online Entertainment "Stations", iculo elivela ku-albhamu ethi Churn by the band Shihad I-SM Station, isiteshi somculo sedijithali saseNingizimu Korea esiqhutshwa yi-SM Entertainment "Train Station", iculo likaBasshunter elikwi- albhamu yakhe ethi The Bassmachine Isiteshi (uchungechunge lwe-TV), uchungechunge lwe-Armenian TV 
Isiteshi, iCalifornia, igama langaphambili leMithetho, eCalifornia Isiteshi, California, igama langaphambili leZurich, California ILa Station, isikhungo somphakathi eMontreal, ekuqaleni esaklanywa nguLudwig Mies van der Rohe 
Isiteshi sebhasi Isiteshi seMetro noma isiteshi esingaphansi komhlaba, isiteshi sesitimela Isiteshi (i-roller coaster), izivakashi zendawo zilayisha isitimela se-roller coaster Isiteshi se-oda lesitimela, indawo yokulawula lapho izitimela zingamiswa futhi zilawulwe khona Isiteshi sesitimela, esaziwa nangokuthi isiteshi sesitimela noma isiteshi sesitimela Isitimela sakwaTramu, ithilamu, imoto yesitimela, noma isiteshi sesitimela esincane 
Isiteshi (ezolimo zase-Australia), indawo enkulu yase-Australia esetshenziselwa ukukhiqiza imfuyo Isiteshi (New Zealand Agriculture), ipulazi elikhulu laseNew Zealand elisetshenziselwa ukudlisa izimvu nezinkomo Isiteshi sezinkomo, isiteshi sokukhulisa izinkomo e-Australia noma eNew Zealand Isiteshi sezimvu, isiteshi sokukhulisa izimvu e-Australia noma eNew Zealand 
Isiteshi sokuxhumana somsakazo, isiteshi sokuxhumana samaza omsakazo sanoma yiluphi uhlobo, kufaka phakathi umsindo, i-TV, nokusetshenziswa okungasakazwa Isiteshi sokusakaza somsakazo, isiteshi somsindo esihloselwe ukwamukelwa ngumphakathi jikelele Isiteshi somsakazo se-Amateur, isiteshi esisebenza kumaza abelwe i-ham noma okunye ukusetshenziswa okungeyona eyokuhweba Isiteshi sokudlulisa somsakazo Isiteshi saphansi (noma isiteshi seMhlaba), isiteshi somsakazo sasemhlabeni sokuxhumana ngocingo lwangaphandle ngamasathelayithi noma ngomkhumbi-mkhathi Isiteshi sethelevishini Isiteshi se-Courier, isiteshi sokudlulisa ohlelweni lwe- courier Isiteshi se- cursus publicus, isistimu ephethwe nguhulumeni yombuso waseRoma Isiteshi (ukuxhumana), idivayisi ekwazi ukusebenzisa umthetho olandelwayo wenethiwekhi we-IEEE 802.11 Isiteshi seGoogle, insiza ye-WiFi yomphakathi 
Isiteshi se- gauging, noma i-gauge yokusakaza, indawo egudle umfula noma umfudlana osetshenziselwa ukulinganisa noma ezinye izilinganiso Isiteshi saseHill, idolobha eliphakeme ngokwanele ukuthi lipholile ehlobo, ikakhulu e-Asia nase-Afrika 
Isiteshi sokushaja, idivaysi noma indawo enikezela amandla kagesi wokushaja kabusha izimoto zikagesi Isiteshi sokugcwalisa, indawo yokugcwalisa imoto ngophethiloli oketshezi Isiteshi somlilo noma indlu yomlilo, isisekelo sabacimi bomlilo Isiteshi samaphoyisa, isizinda samaphoyisa Isiteshi sokucwaninga, indawo evame ukuqhela lapho kwenziwa khona ucwaningo lwesayensi Isiteshi sezulu indawo lapho kuthathwa khona ukufundwa kwesimo sezulu 
iChennai Mofussil Bus Terminus eChennai, eNdiya, iyisiteshi samabhasi esikhulu kunazo zonke e-Asia. 
I- Woodlands Temporary Bus Interchange eSingapore nayo ingenye yezindlela eziphithizela kakhulu zamabhasi emhlabeni, iphatha abagibeli abangama-400,000 nsuku zonke kuzo zonke izinsizakalo zamabhasi ezingama-42. [2] Ukuhwebelana kwebhasi iBedok neTampines edolobheni kulawula isibalo esifanayo sabagibeli nsuku zonke. 
Isiteshi samabhasi esingaphansi komhlaba esikhulu kunazo zonke eYurophu yiKamppi Center yaseHelsinki, eFinland eyaqedwa ngo-2006. 
Isiginali ibiza izigidi eziyi-100 ze-Euro ukuqeda futhi yathatha iminyaka emi-3 ukuyakha nokwakha.Namuhla, isikhumulo samabhasi, esihlanganisa amamitha-skwele angama-25,000, siyindawo yokugcina amabhasi ematasa kakhulu eFinland. 
Nsuku zonke, lesi sikhumulo sihamba cishe amabhasi angama-700, sihambisa abagibeli abangaba ngu-170,000. 
Isiteshi sebhasi i- Preston ePreston, eLancashire, esakhiwa ngo-1969 futhi sabhalwa ohlwini lwamagugu kamuva, sachazwa ngo-2014 ngokuthi "kuya ngokuthi usikala kanjani, isiteshi samabhasi esikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni, esesibili ngobukhulu eYurophu, neside kunazo zonke eYurophu ".Ilungiswe ngokuphelele ngo-2018. 
Isikhumulo samabhasi esikhulu kunazo zonke eGrisi yiMasedonia Bus Terminal etholakala ngaphandle kwenkaba yedolobha laseThesaloniki.Lesi sikhumulo samabhasi sixhuma wonke amadolobha amakhulu nazo zonke izingxenye zeGrisi, kufaka phakathi ezinye iziqhingi kanye nezinye izindawo zomhlaba wonke emazweni angomakhelwane. 
( IMillennium Park Bus Depot eDelhi iyindawo enkulu yokugcina amabhasi emhlabeni, kepha ayisebenzi njengesiteshi samabhasi. 
Isiteshi samabhasi siyisakhiwo lapho amabhasi asemadolobheni noma emadolobheni emisa ukulanda nokubeka abagibeli.Ngenkathi igama elithi idepho yebhasi lingasetshenziswa ukubhekisa esiteshini samabhasi, imvamisa libhekisa egalaji lebhasi.Isiteshi samabhasi sikhulu kunesitobhi sebhasi, esivame ukuba yindawo eseceleni komgwaqo kuphela, lapho amabhasi angama khona.Kungahle kuhloswe njengesiteshi sokugcina semizila eminingi, noma njengesiteshi sokudlulisa lapho imizila iqhubeka khona. 
Amapulatifomu wesiteshi sebhasi angabelwa imigqa yamabhasi ehleliwe, noma eguquguqukayo ngokuhlangana nohlelo lolwazi lwabagibeli olunamandla.Lesi sakamuva sidinga amapulatifomu ambalwa, kepha asinikezi umgibeli induduzo yokwazi ipulatifomu kusenesikhathi futhi silinde lapho. 
Isiteshi esifinyeleleka kalula yisiteshi sabagibeli sezokuthutha somphakathi esihlinzeka ukufinyelela okulungele, siyasebenziseka futhi asinazo izithiyo zomzimba ezivimbela futhi / noma ezivimbela ukufinyelela kwabantu abakhubazekile, kubandakanya nalabo abasebenzisa izihlalo ezinamasondo. 
Iziteshi eziningi zitholakala ngaphansi komhlaba, zingena / zingena ziholela phansi noma ezingeni lomgwaqo. 
Kwenqwaba esiteshini ngokuvamile ibekwe ngaphansi komhlaba agodliwe ukuze umphakathi thoroughfares noma amapaki.Ukubeka isiteshi ngaphansi komhlaba kunciphisa indawo engaphandle ehlala isiteshi, kuvumela izimoto nabahamba ngezinyawo ukuthi baqhubeke nokusebenzisa indawo ephansi ngendlela efanayo nangaphambi kokwakhiwa kwesiteshi.Lokhu kubalulekile ikakhulu lapho esiteshini ukhonza Isidlulisilwazi emagcekeni ezisemadolobheni, lapho ezingeni eliphansi izikhala kakade kakhulu esetshenzisiwe. 
Ezingeni lomgwaqo uphawu lwenkampani kamasipala luphawula ukungena / ukuphuma kwesiteshi.Imvamisa, izimpawu zikhombisa igama lesiteshi futhi zichaza izakhiwo zesiteshi nohlelo olusisebenzelayo.Imvamisa kuba neminyango eminingana yesiteshi esisodwa, okusindisa abahamba ngezinyawo ekudingweni ukuwela umgwaqo nokunciphisa ukuminyana. 
Isiteshi se-metro sihlinzeka ngokuthengiswa kwamathikithi nezinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ithikithi.Isiteshi sihlukaniswe indawo engakhokhelwa exhunywe emgwaqweni, nendawo ekhokhelwayo exhunywe kuzingxenyekazi zezitimela.Umgoqo wamathikithi uvumela abagibeli abanamathikithi avumelekile ukuthi badlule phakathi kwalezi zindawo. 
Isithiyo singasetshenziswa ngabasebenzi noma ngokujwayelekile ngama- turnstiles azenzakalelayo noma amasango avuleka lapho kudlula ukuthwalwa kwezokuthutha noma kutholwa.Amanye amasistimu kamasipala amancane ahlinzeka ngezindawo ezikhokhelwayo futhi aqinisekisa amathikithi nabasebenzi abakumakalishi ezitimela. 
Iziteshi zokudlulisa 
Ezinye iziteshi zemetro ziyaphambana, zisebenza ukudlulisa abagibeli phakathi kolayini noma izinhlelo zokuhamba. 
Amapulatifomu angaba ngamazinga amaningi.Iziteshi zokudlulisa ziphatha abagibeli abaningi kuneziteshi ezijwayelekile, ngemigudu yokuxhuma eyengeziwe nemikhonto emikhulu ukunciphisa izikhathi zokuhamba nokuphatha ukugeleza kwesixuku. 
Isiteshi sekholomu esingajulile siwuhlobo lokwakhiwa kweziteshi zangaphansi komhlaba, ngesici esivelelayo kube inqwaba yezinsizakalo ezengezelayo zomgodi ongaphansi komhlaba.Imiklamo eminingi isebenzisa amakholomu ensimbi noma amakholomu kakhonkolo nensimbi ahlelwe ngemigqa efana ne-eksisi ende yesiteshi. 
Isiteshi sekholomu esijulile siwuhlobo lwesiteshi esingaphansi komhlaba esinehholo eliphakathi nendawo elinamahholo amabili asemaceleni axhunywe ngamapaseji anjengendandatho phakathi kolayini wezinsika.Ngokuya ngohlobo lwesiteshi, amasongo adlulisa umthwalo kumakholomu kungaba "ngamakhothamo ahlanganisiwe" noma ngama- purlins, akha "ikholomu-purlin complex". 
Isiteshi sase-pylon siwuhlobo lwesiteshi esingaphansi komhlaba esingaphansi komhlaba.Isici esisehlukanisayo sesiteshi se-pylon yindlela yokwehlukaniswa kwehholo eliphakathi nemigwaqo yesiteshi. 
Ukwakhiwa kwesiteshi esisodwa-vault siqukethe ihholo elilodwa elibanzi futhi eliphakeme elingaphansi komhlaba, lapho kukhona khona igumbi elilodwa kuphela (yingakho igama).Iziteshi zokuqala zegumbi elilodwa e- USSR zakhiwa eLeningrad ngo-1975: iPolitekhnicheskaya nePloshchad Muzhestva.Futhi eSaint Petersburg kwakhiwa esokuqala futhi kuze kube manje ukuphela kwamazinga amabili esiteshi sokudlulisa esisodwa eRussia: iSportivnaya. 
Isiteshi se-metro noma isiteshi esingaphansi komhlaba siyisiteshi sesitimela sohlelo lokuhamba olusheshayo, okuvame ukubizwa ngokuthi yi "metro" noma "subway".Isiteshi sihlinzeka abagibeli ngezindlela zokuthenga amathikithi, izitimela ezihamba ngamabhodi, nokususa uhlelo esimeni esiphuthumayo.E- United Kingdom, baziwa njengeziteshi zangaphansi komhlaba, ezisetshenziswa kakhulu ukubhekisa eLondon Underground. 
Indawo yesiteshi sikamasipala omkhulu kuhlelwe ngokucophelela ukuhlinzeka ukufinyelela okulula ezindaweni ezibalulekile zasemadolobheni ezifana nemigwaqo, izikhungo zezohwebo, izakhiwo ezinkulu nezinye izindawo zezokuthutha. 
Isiteshi sokushaja, esibizwa nangokuthi ishaja ye-EV noma imishini yokuhlinzeka ngemoto kagesi (i- EVSE ), isiqeshana semishini enikeza amandla kagesi wokushaja izimoto zikagesi ezifakiwe (kufaka phakathi ama-hybrids, izimoto zikagesi ezingomakhelwane, amaloli, amabhasi, nezinye). 
LYize amabhethri angakhokhiswa kuphela ngamandla we- DC, izimoto eziningi ezisebenza ngogesi zineziguquli ze-AC-to-DC ezisemgodini ezivumela ukuthi zixhunywe kwisamukeli esezingeni eliphakathi nendawo se-AC.Iziteshi zokushaja umphakathi ezingabizi kakhulu nazo zizonikeza ugesi we-AC, owaziwa ngokuthi "iziteshi zokushaja i-AC". 
Ukwenza ukushaja kwamandla okuphezulu, okudinga abaguquli abakhulu be-AC-to-DC, isiguquli sakhiwe esiteshini sokushaja esikhundleni semoto, futhi isiteshi sinikeza amandla e-DC asevele eguquliwe ngqo emotweni, ngokudlula isiguquli semoto esisebangeni.Lezi zaziwa ngokuthi "iziteshi zokushaja ze-DC". 
Izinhlobo eziningi zemoto kagesi ngokuphelele zingamukela zombili amandla we-AC ne-DC. 
Ukugcwaliswa esiteshini lokuqala laliwumuzi ekhemisi e Wiesloch, eJalimane, lapho u-Bertha Benz amanye ethangini wokuqala imoto ohambweni lwawo lokuqala ezivela Mannheim ukuba Pforzheim emuva ngo-1888.Ngokushesha ngemuva kwalokho amanye amakhemisi athengisa uphethiloli njengebhizinisi eliseceleni.Kusukela ngo-2008 iBertha Benz Memorial Route ikhumbula lo mcimbi. 
iMelika esenyakatho 
Iziteshi zokugcwalisa ezinama- premium brand zidayisa izinhlobo zikaphethiloli ezaziwa kahle futhi ezijwayelekile zomhlaba wonke, kufaka phakathi i- Exxon kanye ne- Esso brand yayo, i- Phillips 66 / Conoco / 76, i- DRM, i- Mobil, i- Shell, i- Husky Energy, i- Sunoco (i-US), i- BP, i- Valero ne- Texaco.Non-international premium zihlanganisa Petrobras, Petro-Canada (okungewakho Suncor Energy Canada), QuikTrip, Hess, Sinclair, futhi Pemex.Iziteshi ze-premium-brand zamukela amakhadi wesikweletu, zivame ukukhipha amakhadi azo ezinkampani ( amakhadi kaphethiloli noma amakhadi wemikhumbi) futhi angakhokhisa amanani aphezulu.Kwezinye izimo, amakhadi kaphethiloli wamakhasimende asebenzisa uphethiloli ophansi a-odwa hhayi ngqo enkampanini kawoyela, kodwa kumlamuli.Imikhiqizo eminingi ye-premium inezikhungo zokukhokha ezisebenza ngokugcwele.Iziteshi zePrimiyamu zivame ukubonakala kakhulu kusuka kuthelawayeka nasekuphumeni komgwaqo onguthelawayeka, zisebenzisa izimpawu ezinde ukukhombisa ama-logo azo. 
Isiteshi ukugcwaliswa yindawo ethengisa fuel futhi injini zokugcoba ngoba izimoto . 
Amafutha avame kakhulu ukudayiswa ngo- 2010 kwaba uphethiloli (noma “uphethiloli”) nophethiloli kadizili. 
Isikhungo somlilo (esibizwa nangokuthi indlu yomlilo, ihholo lomlilo , ihholo labacimi bomlilo, noma indlu yenjini ) isakhiwo noma enye indawo yokugcina izinto zokucisha umlilo ezifana nezimoto zomlilo nezimoto ezihambisanayo, izinto zokuzivikela, amapayipi omlilo nezinye izinto ezikhethekile.Iziteshi zomlilo zivame ukuba nendawo yokusebenza nezicishamlilo nabasebenzi bokusekela. 
Emadolobheni amakhulu ase-US, iziteshi zomlilo zivame ukubizwa ngezinkampani zomlilo eziyinhloko kanye nezinto zokusebenza ezigcinwe lapho, njenge "Ladder 49".Ezinye iziteshi zomlilo zithiwa ngokususelwa esifundeni, endaweni, edolobhaneni noma esigodini lapho zitholakala khona, noma zinikezwe inombolo. 
Isiteshi sezicishamlilo okungenani sizoba negalaji lokwakha okungenani injini eyodwa yomlilo.Kuzoba nendawo yokugcina impahla, yize okokusebenza okubaluleke kakhulu kugcinwa emotweni uqobo.Izindlela zesiteshi somlilo zivame ukufakwa nezimpawu zokuxwayisa, futhi kungahle kube nophawu lomgwaqo lokumisa noma lokuxwayisa ithrafikhi lapho izinsimbi zisuka noma zibuyela esiteshini. 
Iziteshi zomlilo zivame ukwakhiwa ngombhoshongo, ngezinhloso eziguquke ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.Umbhoshongo we-drill usetshenziselwa ukwenza ukutakula okuphezulu, kuyilapho umbhoshongo we-hose usetshenziselwa ukulenga amapayipi ukuze ome ukuvimbela ukubola. [1]Ngokomlando, imibhoshongo yayingababheki bemlilo. 
Imisebenzi esiteshini somlilo ifaka ukuhlolwa njalo nokuhlanzwa kwezinto zokusebenza kanye nemishini, kanye nokuzivivinya lapho abacimi bomlilo benza khona amakhono abo.Ezinye izinkampani zomlilo nazo zisingatha imisebenzi yomphakathi esiteshini somlilo ngesikhathi semicimbi efana "neviki lokuvimbela umlilo", futhi isikhungo singasetshenziselwa ukuqoqa imali "yinhlangano yabacimi mlilo", " abacimi bomlilo ", noma "abasizi bomlilo". 
Indawo yehhovisi lapho izikhulu, abaseshi kanye nabasebenzi bezokuphatha bengasebenza khona Amaseli wababoshiwe. 
E-UK, indawo enamaseli yaziwa njengendawo yokugcina izingane Amakamelo okuxoxwa ngawo zombili iziboshwa nezivakashi ezingaboshiwe Amakamelo obufakazi wokugcina ubufakazi nempahla ethathiwe Amalokhi nezindlu zokugcina izinto zokusebenza Ideski lokwamukela izivakashi zomphakathi Indawo yokupaka izimoto yezimoto nezimoto zomuntu siqu eziphethwe yisikhulu Igumbi labasebenzi abavela kwezinye izinsizakalo eziphuthumayo 
Iziteshi ezikhethekile zikhona emazweni amaningi, ngokuvamile eziqukethe okungaphezulu noma okuncane kwalezi zikhungo.Isibonelo sifaka iziteshi zamaphoyisa abesifazane eLatin America. 
Iminyango emikhulu ingaba neziteshi eziningi ukumboza indawo abayisebenzelayo.Amagama asetshenziselwa lezi zikhungo afaka: 
Indawo esetshenzelwa yisiteshi samaphoyisa inamagama ahlukahlukene ahlukahlukene, njenge-precinct, isifunda, isigaba nendawo.Kodwa-ke, kweminye yamaphoyisa afana neHampshire Constabulary, iziteshi zamaphoyisa azisebenzi ndawo ethile futhi izikhulu zikwazi ukuguquguquka kakhulu lapho zingasebenza khona. 
IMumbuni High School (eyaziwa nangokuthi iMumbuni Secondary School ) isikole eKenya esise-ukusuka edolobheni iMachakos.Ingesinye sezikole ezinkulu eMachakos County esinabafundi abangaphezu kuka-800. 
UDaniel "Churchill" Ndambuki, ababengamalungu amabili ephalamende laseKenya, uMutinda Mutiso noDaudi Mwanzia.UMercy K. Wambua oyi-Chief Executive Officer ye-Law Society of Kenya, u-Noor Ahmed Mohamed waseMelika wase-Afrika ngo-2030 baphakathi kwabaphangi balo. 
Lesi sikole besinamakilasi ezinga lika "A" ngesikhathi sohlelo lwangaphambili lwezemfundo.Ikilasi lokugcina lika-A libhale izivivinyo ngo-1989. 
Lesi sikole sasivame ukuba yisikole esixubekile kodwa ngoFebhuwari 7, 2005, amantombazane adlulela ngaphesheya komgwaqo aya esikoleni sawo, iMumbuni Girls High School. 
UTongai Moyo (12 Mashi 1968 - 15 Okthoba 2011) wayengumculi wesimanje waseZimbabwe, obevame ukubizwa ngoDhewa.Wazalelwa futhi wakhulela Kwekwe, Dhewa rose waduma ngo-1990 ngasekupheleni njengoba umculi ohamba ngayedwa kanye ne-band Utakataka Express.Abaculi abaphumelele kakhulu abahlanganisa "uSamanyemba", "Naye", kanye "noMuchina Muhombe" baholele ekudumeni kwakhe kuzwelonke, ezifundeni nakwamanye amazwe; wakhiqiza ama-albhamu ayi-14 emkhakheni weminyaka engaphezu kwamashumi amabili. 
UTongai Moyo unqotshwe yi- non-Hodgkin's lymphoma esibhedlela iSt Anne's kusihlwa ngoMgqibelo mhlaka-15 Okthoba 2011 eHarare.Balinganiselwa ku-15 000 abantu abafike bamkhokhela okokugcina eMbizo Stadium eKwekwe .Wangcwatshwa eZhombe ikhaya lakhe lasemakhaya. 
I-albhamu yakhe yesi-14 neyokugcina, iToita Basa, ikhishwe ngomhlaka-25 Novemba 2010 ngelebula yokuqopha iGrama Records.Le albhamu yakhishwa ngesikhathi elashelwa umdlavuza, owawutholakale ngo-2008. 
Ingoma ethi "Ndinobvuma" ibiqondiswe ikakhulukazi empini yakhe yokulwa nalesi sifo. 
UMoyo wazalwa ngomhlaka-12 Mashi ngo-1968 eKwekwe.Ushone ngomhlaka 15 Okthoba 2011.Ubeshade noMiniehle Mukweli futhi enezingane eziyisithupha okungoNatasha, Nicole, Obert (Tongai Jnr), Tanaka noNyasha noPeter Moyo. 
Lo mculi onethalente waqala umsebenzi wakhe ngo-1988 edolobheni lasekhaya eKwekwe.Ukuhlonipha umsebenzi wakhe wobuciko, lo mculi 'uMuchinamuhombe', wadlala emaqenjini amaningi wagcina esejoyine iShirichena Jazz Band njengomculi weseshini, futhi wasiza iqembu ukukhipha ama-albhamu amabili neyodwa.Owayedume kakhulu kwakungu "Ndoita Zvangu Ndega" owakhishwa ngo 1991 uMoyo wayesaziwa ngaleso sikhathi. 
Uqhubekile wenza iqembu lakhe i-Utakataka Express ngemuva kwalokho wakhipha i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala, i-'Vimbo 'ngo-1996.Le albhamu yathola igama kuMoyo endimeni yomculo, eyayiphethwe ngabalingisi abafana noNicholas Zakaria no-Alick Macheso abacula uhlobo olufanayo.Kusukela lapho, akazange abheke emuva futhi wakhipha ama-albhamu ayi-14 kwisikweletu sakhe.I-albhamu ethi "Naye" yabona uDhewa ehlaba umxhwele ngokuqopha ishadi lakhe "Nemumvura Mese" okwamenza wathola amaZimbabwe Music Awards (ZIMA) amabili. 
Ngesikhathi eshona, uMoyo wayesanda kukhipha i-albhamu yakhe engu-14 ethi 'Toita Basa'. 
ULillian Dube (owazalwa ngomhlaka 30 Septhemba 1945) ungumlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika.Mhlawumbe waziwa kakhulu ngokulingisa uMasebobe emdlalweni owuchungechunge iGenerations. 
Ngo-2007, uDube watholakala enomdlavuza webele futhi ubelokhu exoxa kusukela ngo-2008.Umdlavuza ubuye futhi ngo-2015. 
Ngo-2017, uDube waklonyeliswa ngeziqu zobudokotela ezihloniphekile kwiDrama and Film Production eTshwane University of Technology. 
UTongai Mafidi Mnangagwa (owazalwa ngomhlaka 10 Nhlolanja 1978) ungusopolitiki waseZimbabwe osebenza njengelungu lePhalamende lesifunda saseHarare South.Ungumshana kaMengameli u-Emmerson Mnangagwa futhi nguyena kuphela ilungu le-ZANU-PF ePhalamende elimele isifundazwe sase Harare. 
UMnangagwa wazalwa ngomhlaka 10 Nhlolanja 1978 eZambia.Wathuthela eZimbabwe eseyingane encane, efunda eHaig Park Primary School eHarare .Wenza yakhe O Amazinga at Gokomere High School, a yamaKatolika boarding school e Isifundazwe Masvingo, ngaphambi kokuqeda kwakhe emfundweni yesibili at -Prince Edward School, a uhulumeni esikoleni esiphakeme e Harare.Ube esefunda eHarare Polytechnic, lapho athola khona isitifiketi kwezokukhangisa.Njengamanje wenza iziqu zeBachelor of science kuma-development studies eZimbabwe Open University 
Ku- physics, amandla impahla eyisilinganiso okufanele idluliselwe emzimbeni noma ohlelweni lomzimba ukwenza umsebenzi emzimbeni, noma ukuyifudumeza.Amandla ayinani eligciniwe ; umthetho ukongiwa amandla uthi amandla kungenziwa iguqulwe somzimba, kodwa asenziwanga noma ubhujiswe. 
Iyunithi yokukala ku- International System of Units (SI) yamandla yi- joule, okungamandla adluliselwe entweni ngomsebenzi wokuyihambisa ibanga lemitha elilodwa ngamandla e- newton eyodwa. 
Ngo-2 Juni 2012 uMalinga walwa noLeo Santa Cruz wesicoco somhlaba esasingenamuntu se-IBF lapho ahlulwa khona ngazwi linye.Le mpi yasakazwa ku-Showtime. 
Ngo-21 Disemba 2013 uMalinga walwa noStuart Hall ebanga isicoco se-IBF somhlaba esasingenamuntu wahlulwa ngesinqumo ngazwilinye. 
UVus'Umuzi Malinga (owazalwa ngomhlaka 29 Okthoba 1979), owaziwa ngelikaVusi Malinga, ungumshayisibhakela osezingeni eliphezulu waseNingizimu Afrika.Usephonsele inselelo amahlandla amathathu ngesicoco somhlaba se-bantamweight, ngo-2009, 2012 nango-2013. 
Ngo-12 Juni 2008 uMalingo walwa nowayengumpetha womhlaba wesibili we-bantamweight uVeeraphol Sahaprom ekhipha ilungelo lokulwela isicoco somhlaba se- WBC futhi wawina nge-technical knockout. 
Ngo-12 Mashi 2009 uMalinga walwa noHozumi Hasegawa ebanga isicoco somhlaba se-WBC lapho ahlulwa khona ngomngqimuzo wobuchwepheshe. 
Ngo-30 Okthoba 2010 uMalinga walwa noMichael Domingo ekhipha ilungelo lokulwela ibhande lomhlaba le-IBF futhi wanqoba ngesinqumo esifanayo. 
U-Anna Cooke Kendrick (owazalwa ngo-Agasti 9, 1985) ungumlingisi nomculi waseMelika.Waqala umsebenzi wakhe njengomntwana emidlalweni yaseshashalazini. 
Indima yakhe yokuqala ukulingisa yayiku-1998 Broadway musical High Society, lapho athola khona ukuqokwa kwi- Tony Award ye-Best Featured Actress in a Musical .Wenza ifilimu yakhe yokuqala kumdlalo wamahlaya womculo iCamp (2003), waphakama wagqama ngendima ayidlalile kwiThe Twilight Saga (2008-2012).UKendrick uthole ukuqashelwa okuqhubekayo ngefilimu yamahlaya e- Up in the Air (2009), eyamenza waqokelwa umklomelo we- Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress, kanye nendima yakhe ekulingiseni kuPitch Perfect film series (2012-17). 
ENkosi, kungenjalo kokuvela njengoba Nkosi, iyona Zulu futhi IsiXhosa ngoba isikhulu e Southern Africa.Inkosikazi yigama elilingana nelenkosi. 
Inkosi enegunya phezu kwe-inkosis engaphansi kwayo ngokwesiko ibizwa ngokuthi yiNkosi Enkhulu (lit. 
"Induna Enkulu").Le nguqulo yesihloko ngokujwayelekile ihunyushwa njengenkosi ngesiNgisi. 
Albert Lutuli Mandla Mandela UGeorge Matanzima UKaiser Matanzima Qaqambile Matanzima UFalo Mgudlwa Mangosuthu Buthelezi 
UZwelivelile "Mandla" Mandela, iLungu lePhalamende (owazalwa ngomhlaka 21 Juni 1974) uyinduna yesizwe soMkhandlu Wendabuko waseMvezo futhi ungumzukulu wesithunzi uNelson Mandela.Uphothule eRhodes University ngeziqu zePolitiki ngo-2007. 
Uyise, uMakgatho Mandela, ushone ngo-2005, okwamhlahlela indlela yokuba yinhloko yobukhosi. 
Njengoba lesi sizwe singazange sixoxe ngokukhetha ilungu lomndeni wakwaMandela kuze kube ngu-2007, wakhethwa njengozothatha izintambo.UNelson Mandela wayelahle ilungelo lomholi wabaThembu cishe eminyakeni engama-70 ngaphambi kokulwa nokubusa kwabamhlophe eNingizimu Afrika.Ngenkathi isizwe manje sesibheke kuye ukuthi abuye athole isihloko sakhe, waphakamisa ukuthi umzukulu wakhe athathe le ndima.Lapho Mandela abasebasha baba abakhulu ngo-2007, eneminyaka engu-32 kuphela ubudala futhi iningi imisebenzi yakhe Kwakuthiwa ukubandakanya emikhosini tribal, lokuxazulula izingxabano phakathi amalungu emindeni, futhi ezimele esizweni ezindabeni zezombusazwe. 
UMandela ubeyilungu lephalamende le- African National Congress kusukela okhethweni lwango-2009. 
UKhaya wuhlobo lwezinhlobo ezinhlanu zezihlahla emndenini wama-mahogany iMeliaceae.Ugodo lukaKhaya lubizwa ngokuthi yi- African mahogany, futhi luthathwa njengolungena esikhundleni se-American mahogany ( sohlobo lwe-Swietenia). [1] 
Uhlobo luvela e- Afrika eshisayo naseMadagascar.Zonke izinhlobo zikhula zizungeze u-30-35m ubude, akuvamile ukuba yi-45m, nesiqu esingaphezu kobubanzi obuyi-1m, esivame ukuboshelwa phansi. 
Amaqabunga aphinyiwe, anezincwajana ezingama-4-6, ipheshana lokugcina alikho; Ipheshana ngalinye linobude obungu-10-15 cm obuzungezwe ngokungazelelwe phezulu, kepha imvamisa linethiphu le-acuminate.Amaqabunga angaba yi- deciduous noma i- evergreen kuye ngezinhlobo.Izimbali zenziwa ngama- inflorescence akhululekile, imbali ngayinye incane, inamacembe amane aphuzi aphuzi kanye ne-stameni eziyishumi. 
Izithelo ziyi-globose capsule ezine noma ezinhlanu-valve 5-8 cm ububanzi, oqukethe imbewu enamaphiko eminingi. 
Izinhlobo 
IVenus yaseBrassempouy 
Ngawo-1800, abesifazane baseMelika baqala ukugqoka izinwele zabo lapho sebekulungele ukushada.Phakathi Fulani abantu entshonalanga Afrika, kwabesilisa nakwabesifazane ukugqoka izinwele zabo ornamented nge encane amber ubuhlalu futhi zemali, kuyilapho abesifazane abashadile ukugqoka amber imihlobiso ezinkulu.Umshado ukhonjiswa phakathi kwabesifazane baseToposa baseSouth Sudan ngokugqoka izinwele ezinkalweni eziningi zezingulube.Engashadile Hopi abesifazane baye ngokwesiko wayegqoka "butterfly" kwekhanda libhekene twist noma whorl izinwele at ohlangothini ubuso ngamunye.Abafelokazi abangamaHindu eNdiya babevame ukugunda amakhanda abo njengengxenye yokulila kwabo, yize lo mkhuba usunyamalele kakhulu manje. 
Emasikweni amaningi, kufaka phakathi isiko lamaHindu kanye naphakathi kwabantu baseWayana basezintabeni zaseGuiana, abantu abasha ngokomlando baye bagunda izinwele zabo ukukhombisa iminyaka yobudala.Abesifazane eNdiya ngokomlando bakhombise ukuba ngabantu abadala ngokushintsha kusuka ekugqokeni amagoda amabili baye kokunye.Phakathi kweRendille yasenyakatho-mpumalanga yeKenya kanye nabantu baseTchikrin basehlathini lemvula laseBrazil, abesilisa nabesifazane baphuca amakhanda abo ngemuva kokushona kwelungu lomndeni eliseduze. 
Lapho owesilisa eshona eGrisi lasendulo, unkosikazi wakhe wayegunda izinwele zakhe futhi wazingcwaba nayenasemindenini yamaHindu, kulindelwe ukuthi umuntu ozilile kakhulu aphuce ikhanda lakhe ezinsukwini ezintathu emva kokushona. [1] 
Abantu abasezingeni eliphezulu bahlale besebenzisa izitayela zabo zezinwele ukukhombisa ingcebo nesimo.Abesifazane abacebile baseRoma babegqoka izitayela zezinwele eziyinkimbinkimbi ezazidinga imisebenzi yabantu abaningana ukuze bazinakekele, futhi abantu abacebile nabo bavame ukukhetha izitayela zezinwele ezivimbela noma zithwalise umthwalo wabo ukunyakaza, okwenza kube sobala ukuthi abadingi kusebenza.Izitayela zezinwele zabantu abacebile bezijwayele ukuba semikhawulweni yemfashini, kusethwa izitayela zabacebile kancane. 
Kepha namuhla, abacebile bavame ukubonwa ukuthi bagqoka izinwele zabo ngezitayela zokulondoloza ezazisukela emashumini eminyaka edlule. 
Izitayela zezinwele ezisezingeni eliphakathi nendawo zivame ukwehliselwa phansi kanye nobuchwepheshe.Abantu abasezingeni eliphakathi bafisa ukuthi izinwele zabo zibukeke ziphilile futhi zingokwemvelo, okusho ukuthi banezinsizakusebenza zokuphila impilo enempilo futhi bazinakekele kahle. 
Ngokomlando, izinwele zezinwele zabantu besigaba esisebenzayo zivame ukuba lusizo futhi zilula.Abesilisa besigaba esivamile baye baphuce amakhanda abo noma bagqoke izinwele zabo zivaliwe, futhi abesifazane besigaba esisebenzayo baye badonsa izinwele zabo phezulu nasebusweni babo ngezitayela ezilula.Kodwa-ke, namuhla, abantu abasebenza kakhulu bavame ukuba nezitayela zezinwele ezisezingeni eliphakeme nezithanda imfashini kunezinye izigaba zomphakathi.Amadoda amaningi asebenzayo eMexico emadolobheni aseMelika agqoka izinwele zawo ngezitayela ezinjengeMongolian (zigundwe ngaphandle kwengcezu yezinwele entanyeni) noma umsila wegundane (i-crewcut phezulu, i-tuft ku-nape), ne- Afrika- AbaseMelika bavame ukugqoka izinwele zabo emaphethini ayinkimbinkimbi amabhokisi ama-braids nama-cornrows, afakwe nge-barrettes nobuhlalu, futhi kwesinye isikhathi kufaka izingxenye ezigundiwe noma umbala ogqamile.Izazi zezenhlalo zithi lezi zitayela ziyimizamo yokuveza ubuntu nobukhona lapho kubukelwa phansi umphakathi kanye nokungabonakali. 
I ukukhiqizwa kabusha endala aziwayo izinwele ngiluka amanga emuva eminyakeni engaba ngu-30,000: i- Venus ka Willendorf, manje eyaziwa e Academia njengoba nowesifazane Willendorf, ka insikazi Umfanekiso kusukela Paleolithic, okulinganiselwa ukuthi enziwe phakathi mayelana 28.000 futhi 25,000 BCE.IVenus yaseBrassempouy ibala cishe iminyaka engama-25,000 ubudala futhi ngokungangabazeki ikhombisa ukuhlobisa izinwele. 
Esikhathini seBronze,izinsingo zazaziwa futhi zisetshenziswa ngamanye amadoda, kepha hhayi nsuku zonke ngoba inqubo yayingemnandi futhi idinga ukuvuselelwa kwethuluzi elanciphisa ukubekezela kwalo. [1] 
Isitayela sezinwele, izinwele noma ukugunda izinwele kusho isitayela sezinwele, imvamisa ekhanda lomuntu. 
Kwesinye isikhathi, lokhu kungasho nokuhlelwa kwezinwele zobuso noma zomzimba.Ukwenziwa kwezinwele kungabhekwa njengesici sokuzilungisa komuntu siqu, imfashini, nezimonyo, yize kusebenza ngokoqobo, amasiko kanye nokuthandwa kakhulu futhi kuthonya ezinye izitayela zezinwele. 
Isitayela sezinwele sitholwa ngokuhlela izinwele ngendlela ethile, kwesinye isikhathi kusetshenziswa amakhehla, isomisi esishaywayo, ijeli, noma eminye imikhiqizo.Umkhuba wokutayela izinwele uvame ukubizwa ngokuthi ukucwala izinwele, ikakhulukazi uma kwenziwa njengomsebenzi. 
Ukugqoka izinwele kungafaka ukusikeka, ukuluka, ukufaka imibala, izandiso, izimvume, izinto zokuphumuza unomphela, ukugoba, nanoma yiluphi olunye uhlobo lwesitayela noma lokuthumela imiyalezo. 
Ukusika izinwele noma ukusika izinwele kuhloswe ngakho ukudala noma ukugcina ukwakheka okuthile nefomu.Kunezindlela zokunquma izinwele zomuntu kepha imvamisa kubhaliswa omunye umuntu ukwenza le nqubo, ngoba kunzima ukugcina ukulinganisa ngenkathi usika izinwele ngemuva kwekhanda lakho. 
Ukusika izinwele kuvame ukwenziwa ngezinwele, isikelo nezinsingo . 
Ama-Combs nezinwele kuvame ukusetshenziselwa ukwehlukanisa ingxenye ethile yezinwele ebese isikwa. 
Izomisi zezinwele zisheshisa inqubo yokomisa izinwele ngokushaya umoya, okuvame ukufudunyezwa, phezu kwesiqu sezinwele esimanzi ukusheshisa izinga lokuhwamuka kwamanzi. 
Umlando wokuqala nomlando 
Kuzo zonke izikhathi, abantu bagqoke izinwele zabo ngezitayela ezahlukahlukene, ikakhulu ezinqunywa yimfashini yesiko abahlala kulo.Izitayela zezinwele yizimpawu nezimpawu zesigaba senhlalo, ubudala, isimo somshado, ukuhlonza ubuhlanga, izinkolelo zepolitiki, nezimo zengqondo mayelana nobulili. 
Izinwele mfakela 
Abanye abantu bangamboza izinwele zabo ngokuphelele noma ngokwengxenye ngezizathu zamasiko noma ezenkolo. 
Letibonwako ikhanda isigubungelo babandakanya abesifazane Islam ngubani agqoke hijab, abesifazane abashadile Haredi UbuJuda ngubani agqoke sheitel noma tichel, washada ongumHimba amadoda ubani ukumboza izinwele zabo ngaphandle uma nilila, Tuareg amadoda ubani afake isembozo sobuso, kwabhapathizwa abesilisa nabesifazane eSikhism abagqoka i- dastar. 
Ama-wigi wenziwe ngokuvamile enziwa nge-fiber enhle elingisa izinwele zabantu. 
Le fiber ingenziwa cishe kunoma imuphi umbala kanye nekhanda, futhi imvamisa i-glossier kunezinwele zomuntu.Kodwa-ke, le fiber iyazwela ekushiseni futhi ayikwazi ukwenziwa isitayela ngezinsimbi eziyizicaba noma izinsimbi ezigoqekayo.Kukhona i-fiber entsha yokwenziwa engathatha ukushisa kuze kufike ekushiseni okuthile. 
Ama- wigi ezinwele zabantu angashaywa ngesitayela ngokushisa, futhi kufanele abhululwe kuphela lapho somile. 
Ama-wigi wezinwele zokwenziwa nawomuntu kufanele abhululwe omile ngaphambi kokugeza ukuze kususwe izigaxa.Ukuhlanza i-wig, i-wig kufanele ifakwe kwisitsha esinamanzi ne-shampoo emnene, bese ifakwa emanzini acacile bese inyuka iye phezulu naphansi ukuze isuse amanzi amaningi.Iwigi kufanele emva kwalokho yome umoya ngokwemvelo kwisitayela sayo sezinwele.Ukugcinwa okufanele kungenza iwigi yezinwele zomuntu ihlale iminyaka eminingi. 
Kunezinketho eziningi zokuhlobisa nokuhlela izinwele.Izikhonkwane zezinwele, izingwegwe, ama-barrette, amabhande asekhanda, amaribhoni, amabhande enjoloba, ama- scrunchies, kanye nama-combs angasetshenziselwa ukufeza izitayela ezahlukahlukene.Kukhona futhi imihlobiso eminingi yokuhlobisa okuthi, ngenkathi ingahle ibe nezingwegwe zokuyinamathisela ezinweleni, isetshenziselwa ukubukeka kuphela futhi ayisizi ekugcineni izinwele endaweniENdiya ngokwesibonelo, iGajra (imbali yezimbali) kuvamile ukuthi kunezinqwaba zezinwele. 
Ezikhathini eziningi emasikweni amaningi, amadoda afake izinwele zawo ngezitayela ezehlukile kwezabesifazane.Isazi sezokuhlalisana kwabantu baseMelika uRose Weitz wake wabhala ukuthi umthetho osabalala kakhulu wezamasiko ngezinwele ukuthi izinwele zabesifazane kumele zehluke kunezinwele zabesilisa.Okuhlukile ngabesilisa nabesifazane abahlala e- Orinoco-Amazon Basin, lapho ngokwesiko bobabili ubulili begqoke izinwele zabo ezisikiwe zaba umumo wesitsha. 
Emazweni aseNtshonalanga ngawo-1960, bobabili izinsizwa nezintombi babegqoka izinwele zabo ezinde nezemvelo, futhi kusukela lapho sekuyinsakavukela ukuba amadoda akhule izinwele zawo.Esikhathini esiningi emlandweni wesintu lapho abesilisa nabesifazane begqoka izitayela ezifanayo, njengaku-1920s naku-1960s, kudale ukukhathazeka okukhulu kwezenhlalo nokwesekwa. 
Umkeli potenza isitayela sezinwele eTokyo, Japan 
Ngomhlaka 1 Mashi 2016, uKebe wahlinzeka ngesampula yomchamo owawungaphandle komncintiswano, owahlola kahle ukutholakala kwezidakamizwa ezinqatshelwe i- stanozolol, futhi wabekwa icala ngokusemthethweni lokwephula umthetho wokulwa nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa ngomhlaka 2 Agasti 2017.Walivuma icala, ethi lowo owayesebenza naye uMonde Hadebe wamnika isengezo esasineziqu, futhi wathola ukuvinjelwa iminyaka emibili kusukela ngomhlaka 7 Julayi 2016.UKebe wethule ukuphikisana nalesi sinqumo, lapho isigungu sokwedlulisa isinqumo sanquma ukuthi ukuvalwa kwakhe kufanele kuguqulwe kusuka eminyakeni emibili kuye eminyakeni emine, uKebe evunyelwe ukubuyela embhoxweni ngomhla ka-8 Julayi 2020. 
UNtando Lucky Kebe (owazalwa ngomhlaka 19 Agasti 1988) ungumdlali wezinyunyana waseNingizimu Afrika, osanda kudlala umbhoxo wasekhaya weCurrie Cup ne IBorder Bulldogs neSuper Rugby enezimpawu ze- Amakhosi aseNingizimu.Isikhundla sakhe esijwayelekile yi-scrum-half. 
IWorld Wrestling Entertainment, Inc., d / b / a WWE, yinkampani yemidiya nezokuzijabulisa edidiyelwe yaseMelika eyaziwa kakhulu nge- wrestling yobungcweti.I-WWE iphinde yahlangana neminye imikhakha, kufaka phakathi ama-movie, ibhola, kanye namanye amabhizinisi ahlukahlukene. 
Igama le-WWE libuye lisho ukukhuthazwa kwe-wrestling uqobo, okwasungulwa ngo-1953 njengeCapitol Wrestling Corporation . 
Kungukuphakanyiswa kwe-wrestling okukhulu kunakho konke emhlabeni, ophethe imicimbi ebukhoma engaphezu kuka-450 ngonyaka, nohlu luhlukaniswe kakhulu lwaba yimikhiqizo emithathu ehamba emhlabeni wonke, futhi luyatholakala emakhaya ayizigidi ezingama-900 emhlabeni wonke ngezilimi ezingama-28.Indlunkulu yomhlaba wonke yale nkampani iseStamford, Connecticut, inamahhovisi eNew York, eLos Angeles, eLondon, eMexico City, eMumbai, eShanghai, eSingapore, eDubai, eMunich naseTokyo . 
I-WWE Raw, eyaziwa nangokuthi i- Monday Night Raw noma i- Raw nje, wuhlelo lwethelevishini oluphambili lwaseMelika olwenziwa yi- WWE njengamanje olusakazwa bukhoma njalo ngoMsombuluko ngo-8pm ET e- USA Network e-United States.Umbukiso uqukethe abalingiswa bohlobo lweRaw, lapho abasebenzi beWWE babelwe ukusebenza nokwenza.Umbukiso wavela ngoJanuwari 11, 1993 kanti njengamanje uthathwa njengomunye wemibukiso emibili ehamba phambili, kanye neLwesihlanu Night SmackDown.NgoSepthemba 2000, uRaw wasuka e-USA Network waya ku-TNN,owabuyela ku- Spike TV ngo-Agasti 2003.Ngo-Okthoba 3, 2005, uRaw wabuyela e-USA Network, lapho isekhona nanamuhla.I- WWE Network iyekile ukusebenza e-United States kusukela ngo-Ephreli 5, 2021, ngakho konke okuqukethwe kuyiswa ku- Peacock TV, njengamanje eneziqephu eziningi ze-Raw, ngaphandle kokuqukethwe okwakucatshangelwa noma kwasuswa umnyango wezindinganiso nemikhuba ye-Peacock TV.Iziqephu zakamuva zisatholakala ekubukweni okufunekayo ezinsukwini ezingama-30 ngemuva kosuku lokuqala lomoya. 
Kusukela ngo-Ephreli 20, 2021, ingoma esemthethweni yetimu ye- NXT ithi "Say Cheese" nguPoppy, eyaqala ukwenziwa kuNXT TakeOver: Stand & Deliver. 
Ekuthomeni kwayo kwasekuqaleni, iculo laseMelika i-Bang "Wild and Young" belisetshenziselwe isizini ngayinye ngaphandle kwesithathu. Ngesikhathi sesizini yesithathu, ingoma yokuqala yetimu bekuthi " You Make the Rain Fall " nguKevin Rudolf." Vices futhi Virtues " by Art of Dying elalibuye libe bumper umculo ngesikhathi sokuqala zonyaka ezinhlanu umbukiso. 
NgoJuni 2012, iWWE iqede ifomethi yokuncintisana kwesizini futhi yakhetha ukuvuselela lo mbukiso.I-WWE NXT yaba ngumbukiso wethelevishini ohamba phambili womkhiqizo we-NXT, futhi selokhu wathola ukwamukelwa okuhle nokubukwa okuphezulu, ngokuncoma ikhwalithi ephezulu ye-wrestling nezindaba ezihehayo.Abaningi babheka i- NXT njengophakeme kunombukiso we- WWE. 
Uhlobo lokuqala lombukiso lwaqala ukuvela kuSyfy ngoFebhuwari 23, 2010, esikhundleni se- ECW, kepha kwafakwa iSmackDown ngo-Okthoba.Yabe isisakazwa njenge- webcast yehora ngehora kuWWE.com e-United States kuze kube nguJuni 13, 2012, ngaphambi kokuba inwetshwe ibe izimakethe zomhlaba jikelele kwiWWE Network ngo-2014.Ku-2019, i- NXT yanda yaba uhlelo lwamahora amabili bukhoma ku-USA Network. 
NgoFebhuwari 2, 2010, uSihlalo weWWE uVince McMahon wamemezela ukuthi uhlelo olusha lwamasonto onke luzongena esikhundleni se- ECW ekhanseliwe ngesikhathi sayo eSyfy.UMcMahon uchaze lo mbukiso ngokuthi "ukuvela okulandelayo kweWWE; ukuvela okulandelayo komlando wethelevishini". 
I-WWE SmackDown, eyaziwa nangokuthi i- Friday Night SmackDown noma i- SmackDown, uhlelo lwe-American wrestling lwethelevishini olwenziwa yi- WWE okwamanje olusakazwa bukhoma njalo ngoLwesihlanu ngo-8pm ET kuFox . 
UFox Deportes ulingisa uhlelo ngokuhlaziya ngolimi lweSpanishi . 
Umbukiso izici izinhlamvu ukusuka SmackDown brand, lapho WWE abasebenzi abelwa umsebenzi futhi enze.Umbukiso njengamanje uthathwa njengomunye wemibukiso emibili ehamba phambili, kanye noMsombuluko ebusuku Raw. 
Umsakazo 
Ngaphezu kokukhulunywa kolimi lwaseSpain iFox Deportes elingisa neFox bukhoma e-United States nokusakazwa kwamabutho aseMelika athunyelwe phesheya kwezilwandle ku- AFN Sports 2,IsmackDown nayo iyavela emoyeni nasemhlabeni jikelele. 
Iziteshi zeSmackDown zihlala kwiFox Sports eMexico [1]futhi ziwela iMelika Ephakathi neseNingizimu kusukela ngonyaka wezi-2014. 
ECanada, SmackDown ngokomlando kuye kwasakazwa by Sportsnet 360 (SN360, ebibizwa The Score), njengengxenye umnikazi inethiwekhi Rogers Abezindaba 's eside ziphathelene WWE.Lolu hlelo luye lwasakazwa ngokomlando kwesinye isikhathi emidlalweni ye-simulcast ne-US eshayelwa umoya futhi kwesinye isikhathi ngayizolo.Ngo-2005, lapho lo mbukiso oqoshiwe usudluliselwa kuLwesihlanu osakazwa e-US, wasala ngoLwesine eCanada isikhathi esithile.Ngesikhathi ibuyela ngoLwesine e-US kusuka ngoJanuwari 2015 kuya kuJulayi 2016, iziqephu eziqoshwe ngaphambilini zeSmackDown zikhonjiswe ngoLwesithathu-ngobusuku obubodwa phambilini - ngenxa yezingxabano ezisakazwa yilesi siteshi iNational Hockey League yesiteshi. 
Uhlelo luye lwasakazwa kusimulcast nokusakazwa kwaseMelika kwazise lushintshele kufomethi ebukhoma ngoJulayi 2016, okokuqala ngoLwesibili bese lubuyela ngoLwesihlanu ngoOkthoba 2019.Naphezu hambisa Fox (okuyinto kabanzi baqhubeka abahlinzeki ithelevishini Canadian), Rogers ayizange abaqokelwe simulcast SmackDown ku ukusakaza yayo inethiwekhi Citytv ukuthi abuyisele ezingaba simsub amalungelo. 
Izindiza zeSmackDown zihlala e-Australia ngoMgqibelo ekuseni kakhulu / ntambama ngantambama nangeSonto ntambama kuFox8 nangoLwesihlanu ebusuku ku- 9Go! njengoba inguqulo yehora,kanye waziphakamisa bahlala New Zealand ku Sky 5 nangeSonto kusihlwa kwi Prime njengoba inguqulo ihora elilodwa. 
ISmackDown idlala eFiji eSky Pacific naseSky Fiji. 
Iziteshi zeSmackDown zihlala ePakistan naseBangladesh, eNepal, eSri Lanka naseNdiya kuSony Ten [1] [2]naseKenya kwiKenya Broadcasting Corporation. 
ISmackDown idlala eMalaysia e-Astro Supersport 4, naseMalta eMelita Sports 1. 
Uchungechunge ludlala ePhilippines ku- One Sports ngeCignal TV. 
Iziteshi zeSmackDown zihlala e- Indonesia kuMola TV. 
Lo mdlalo owuchungechunge uhlala eSingapore kuStarhub's HubSports 2,South Africa kuSuperSport,naseSamoa ku- SBC . 
ISmackDown idlala kwa-Israyeli ku- 5LIVE . [1] Iphinde idlale ku-FM1 (Ngaphambilini i-Iran FM-TV) e- Iran. 
Eningizimu Afrika, i SmackDown esake olusakazwa free-kuya-emoyeni abasakazi e.tv.Umbukiso ubuzodlala ngoLwesithathu ebusuku kusihlwa, ngokulibaziseka kwezinsuku eziyi-7, uhlelelwe ihora elilodwa futhi ubungomunye wezinhlelo ezibukwe kakhulu kulesi siteshi.Kodwa-ke, ngo-2017 abakwa-e.tv banqume ukungasivuseleli isivumelwano sabo sokusakaza neWWE.La malungelo aphinde athengiswa kuSuperSport (abasakazi bokuqala bohlelo lweWWE) abasakaza lolu hlelo kulo lonke elase-Sub-Saharan Africa, bukhoma futhi abangasikiwe. 
Ngo-2019 iSuperSport, kanye nenkampani yabazali bayo iMultichoice, basayine isivumelwano sokusakaza lesi siteshi se-WWE esingamahora angama-24 enkundleni yabo iDStv.Uhlelo ludlala ngo-02: 00 bukhoma, kanti lubuye lusakazwe ngesikhathi sokuqala ngo-09: 00, 14:00 no-20: 00. . 
EHungary, SmackDown waziphakamisa ku Galaxy4 njalo ngoLwesithathu ku-10:15 pm. 
E- Italy, iSmackDown idlala ku- DMAX, ngombukiso wamazwe omhlaba wehora elilodwa okhombisa ukukhonjiswa kuCielo ngesiNtaliyane.EPoland, iSmackDown idlala ku- Extreme Sports Channel idonsa izinsuku ezintathu ngemuva kwesikhathi. 
EPortugal, iSmackDown idlala kuSportTV 5 njalo ngoLwesithathu ngo-7 ebusuku, nenguqulo yehora elilodwa ikhonjiswa kuSportTV + njalo ngoMgqibelo ngo-11 ekuseni.ERussia,ISmackDown idlala ku- Матч! 
Боец ngamazwana waseRussia. 
ESpain, iSmackDown idlala eMega njalo ngeSonto ngo-1 ntambama.E.- United Kingdom nase- Ireland, iSmackdown idlala bukhoma kwi- BT Sport, [2] ngenguqulo yehora elilodwa ekhonjiswa eParamount Network njalo ngoLwesihlanu ngo-11 ebusuku.IVirgin Media Two ibuye iveze uhlobo lwehora elilodwa e-Ireland njalo ngeSonto Ekuseni. 
NgoMeyi 22, 2009, uHulu noWWE bavumelana ukukhipha iziqephu ezigcwele zeSmackDown ukuze zitholakalele ukubuka usuku olulandelayo ngemuva kokukhonjiswa kwalo kwasekuqaleni.NgoSepthemba 24, 2012, uHulu wasayina isivumelwano seminyaka eminingi neWWE ukusakaza yonke imibukiso yenkampani yeTV kanye nolunye uchungechunge lwewebhu, olubandakanya iSmackDown.Iziqephu ezigcwele zeSmackDown ziyatholakala ukubukwa ngosuku olulandelayo lomoya walo wokuqala.Zonke iziqephu ezedlule zeSmackDown ziyatholakala kunethiwekhi yeWWE, lapho iziqephu zakamuva zitholakalela ukubukwa okufunwayo ezinsukwini ezingama-30 ngemuva kosuku lokuqala lomoya. 
Umlando wokusakaza 
Khayamiya ( Egyptian Arabic khayyāmiyah ) luhlobo lwendwangu yokuhlobisa i-appliqué yendwangu ngokomlando esetshenziselwa ukuhlobisa amatende ngaphesheya kweMpumalanga Ephakathi.Manje ngokuyinhloko eyenziwe Cairo, Egypt, kanye lokho njengoba UMgwaqo amatende (Shari'a al-Khayamiyya, noma ezaziwa Suq al-Khayamiyya) enkabeni Qasaba ka Radwan Bey, emakethe mlando ezimboziwe eyakhelwe ekhulwini le-17 ikhulu leminyaka.Umgwaqo utholakala ngokushesha eningizimu yeBab Zuweila, futhi utholakala eceleni komlando wezomnotho waseCairo (ingxenye esenyakatho neBab Zuweila yaziwa namuhla ngokuthi umgwaqo u-al-Mu'izz ). 
Izinhlobo zomlando wekhayamiya azivamile.Ekuqaleni zazenziwe zabekwa ngaphandle lapho kushisa khona futhi kwashunqa uthuli, futhi zazithathwa njengezishintshwayo - yingakho zingabizi kakhulu ukuqoqwa noma ukulondolozwa. 
Izibonelo zeKhedival zibanjwa ekuqoqweni kweminyuziyamu eminingana, kufaka phakathi iBritish Museum . [1]Kukhona nezinkomba zekhayamiya kumarekhodi ezithombe nemidwebo yase-European orientalist kusukela ngekhulu leshumi nesishiyagalolunye nangaphambili.Izikhombo zemibhalo ngokusetshenziswa kwazo, kufaka phakathi imifanekiso, zingabonakala emibhalweni yesandla yangenkathi ephakathi.Kunobufakazi bemivubukulo obusikisela ukuthi izindwangu ezifana ne-khayamiya zakhiwe futhi zasetshenziswa eGibhithe kusukela esikhathini sobuFaro. 
Naphezu kwefa labo eliyingqophamlando, umsebenzi wokwenza amatende usengozini manje.Lokhu ikakhulukazi kungenxa yokuncintisana okuvela kwizindwangu ezithunyelwe ngobuningi ezingenisiwe ezinamaphethini afanayo okuhlobisa.Lawa mashidi aphrintiwe manje asetshenziswa kabanzi kulo lonke elaseGibhithe njengezikrini zesikhashana zemicimbi ekhethekile, ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi seRamadan, imikhosi, imishado, nemingcwabo, esikhundleni sekhayamiya eyenziwe ngezandla yokuqala. 
Iningi lekhayamiya elenziwe eminyakeni yamuva lithengiswa kubavakashi abavakashela eGibhithe.Ngawo-2000, imibukiso yokuqala yamazwe omhlaba yekhayamiya yaseGibhithe yabanjelwa e-Australia, e-UK, eFrance nase-USA.Lezi zikhethwe nguJenny Bowker, umenzi we-quiltm wase-Australia kanye nothisha. 
Umdwebi waseGibhithe uMoataz Nasr ufaka izici eziphefumulelwe nge-khayamiya kwimidwebo yakhe yezindaba exubile yesimanjemanje.Ukufaka kukaSusan Hefuna "Ngiyayithanda iGibhithe!" (okuvezwe kwi-18th Biennale yaseSydney ngo-2012) kusebenza neKhayamiya ngaphakathi komongo wobuciko besimanje bokufaka.Kusuka ngo-2009, umculi waseGibhithe uHani el-Masri wasebenzisana nabakhi bamatende ukukhiqiza ukutolika kobusuku obuyinkulungwane nobunye.Umdwebi wase-Algeria u- Rachid Koraïchi ubuye wasebenzisana namaTentmaker aseCairo ukudala amabhanela amakhulu we-calligraphic, njengochungechunge lwakhe lwe- Invisible Masters.Njengoba uKoraïchi asho ngo-2011: 
"Uma sikhuluma ngesiko lobuciko lamaSulumane, asikhulumi ngobuciko bekhulu le-19 obenzeka estudiyo somculi nasendlini. 
Lapha sikhuluma ngezinto eziphuma empilweni yansuku zonke. . . 
Akuwona umhlaba lapho umculi ehlala ngokuhlukana khona. " 
Isiko lengcweti - lisekhona, kepha linyamalale kancane emigwaqweni yase-Koraichi yase-Algeria kanye nasemazweni aseMaghreb - linikeza ukuqonda ukuthi ubuciko bungadonswa kanjani ngqo ezweni losuku nosuku, kepha kukhuliswe ukunikezelwa kobuciko."Uma ubheka izisekelo zobuciko basentshonalanga," kuqhubeka uKoraichi, "kwakususelwa kusiko lonke lobuciko elingena emasontweni; izimbiza ezenziwe ngabenzi bensimbi nemabula.Kufana ncamashi namaSulumane, ngokuthi akhiwa yilabo ababengasebenza ngamatshe nangokuluka. 
Le yimithombo esingayibona ngokusobala kepha umbuzo esinawo ukuthi ungathatha kanjani lawo masiko anyamalalayo siwenze abekhona futhi esikhathini esiphilayo. " 
Lesi sixhumanisi sizokuqondisa ku-Google Map echaza indawo yoMgwaqo Wamatende, maqondana nezimpawu ezaziwayo zabavakashi zeKhan el-Khalili.Umgwaqo iTentmaker's Street awaziwa ngezinkinga ezidayiswa kanzima ezihambisana nezitolo zokuvakasha eKhan el-Khalili. 
IKhedival khayamiya yenziwa phakathi kuka-1867 no-1914. 
Lawa ngokuvamile ngamapaneli amakhulu asetshenzisiwe ku-indigo, abomvu, futhi amhlophe ngendwangu ye-beige, imvamisa enemivimbo eluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka mpo kudoti uqobo. 
I- khayamiya yezokuvakasha yenziwa kusukela ngawo-1890s kuze kube namuhla, futhi yathandwa kakhulu ngemuva kokutholwa kwethuna likaTutankhamun ngo-1922. 
Lokhu kuvame ukuba kuncane, futhi kungukusebenzisa okungokomfanekiso, imvamisa okuqukethe imidwebo evela eGibhithe lasendulo noma ngaleso sikhathi okwakuyizigcawu zesikhathi samanje sempilo yaseGibhithe, ikakhulukazi izigcawu ze-folkloric. 
Ngokuvamile zazithengwa ngabavakashi bamazwe aphesheya abaya eGibhithe njengezikhumbuzo ezithandwayo zaseGibhithe. 
I-Street khayamiya ifaka phakathi amaphaneli enzelwe ukusetshenziswa ngaphandle eGibhithe, njengama-suradeq pavilions noma okwasemuva kwemicimbi yomphakathi. 
Lezi yizindwangu ezinkulu "zokwakha". 
Ngekhulu lama-20 ubukhulu obuphakathi bephaneli kwakungu-Amapaneli amaningi ayeboshelwa ndawonye esakhiweni sokhuni ukuze akhe itende lendwangu. 
I-Contemporary khayamiya ngamaphaneli we-appliqué enzelwe ukusetshenziswa endlini. 
I-Khayamiya yenziwa kahle futhi inemibala egqamile efakwe ngaphakathi kwamatende, isebenza umsebenzi okabili wokukhosela nokuhlobisa.Zifana nezinsika, futhi zinezingqimba ezintathu ezijwayelekile zama-quilts - "umqolo" osindayo, isizinda "phezulu", nokufakwa okuningiliziwe ngaphezulu kwe- "phezulu".Ngokusebenza, bangaqhathaniswa namakhethini, yize izindima zabo zakamuva sezihlukanisiwe ukubhekela izinjongo zokuvakasha.Lokhu manje sekubandakanya amakhava amakhushini, imfashini, izikhwama, okokulala nezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza. 
Khayamiya sici ngesandla babehlanganisa ukotini appliqué phezu esindayo ukotini emuva.Lo mgogqo wenzelwe ukuvikela nokuqina esimweni sezulu esishisayo, esomile, futhi esinothuli.Ukuthungwa kwesandla kwenziwa ngokushesha ngabenzi bamatende abanekhono ngenkathi behleli belengise imilenze, besebenzisa izinaliti nentambo.Izingcezu ezincane zendwangu zisikwa ngosayizi njengoba kudingeka ngokusebenzisa isikele esikhulu.IKhayamiya imvamisa iqedwa ngumenzi wetende elilodwa kungakhathalekile ukuthi ungakanani ubukhulu bento leyo.Lezi zingasuka kwizembozo eziyisisekelo zomcamelo ziye ezilingweni eziyindida zodonga oluphelele amamitha amaningana ngaphesheya.Amaphrojekthi amakhulu kamuva angathatha izinyanga ezimbalwa ukuqeda.Abenzi bamatende bavikela kakhulu ubuhlakani babo, njengoba imiklamo emisha ephumelelayo ivame ukukopishwa ngomakhelwane babo abancintisanayo. 
Ama-design motifs adumile afaka amaphethini we-arabesque wejometri kanye ne-curvilinear asuselwa emihlobisweni yamaSulumane, kanye nezigcawu eziphefumulelwe ubuciko be-Pharaonic, ikakhulukazi i- papyrus ne- lotus motifs.WaseGibhithe izifundo folkloric ezifana Goha, abaculi Nubian, kanye dervishes yelangabi athandwa siKotilandi eziyizikhumbuzo, njengoba ukuboniswa eliqoshiwe zezinhlanzi nezinyoni.Amaphethini we-Calligraphic, asuselwa emibhalweni evela ku- Qur'an, avame ukwenziwa abe yizinto nezilwane.Amapaneli e-Khedival enziwe ngasekupheleni kwekhulu leshumi nesishiyagalolunye nasekuqaleni kwekhulu lamashumi amabili ngokuvamile afaka amabhlogo amakhulu we-appliqué kanye nokuthungwa okubanzi, yize i-khayamiya yezokuvakasha neyesikhathi samanje inezandla ezinhle nezicace bha. 
Isipelingi esifanele sise-Arabhu, kepha ukulinganiselwa kwesiNgisi kwaleli gama khiamiah , khiyamiya , khiamiyya , khyamiyya , kheyyemiah , kheyameya , kanye ne- khayyāmia . 
Igama lesi-Arabhu khayma ( خيمة ), okusho ukuthi "itende", lixhunyaniswe ne-Persian khayyām ( خیام ), okusho ukuthi "umenzi wamatende". 
Izincazelo ezihlukile ezidumile esiNgisini zifaka phakathi "umsebenzi wabenzi bamatende baseCairo", "appmaker appliqué" noma umane uthi "appliqué waseGibhithe".UMedhat Adel Emam uxoxe ngemvelaphi yaleli gama njengoba kusebenza kuma-Arabhu aseGibhithe ngokusobala anethonya laseTurkey.Ama- "pavilions" amakhulu ahlotshisiwe ekhayamiya aziwa njenge- suradeq . [1] 
Ekuqaleni kuka-2007, yena noMina Ahadi babephakathi kwabasunguli beCentral Council of Ex-Muslims, okuyinhlangano yaseJalimane ehlose ukumela abantu abalahle ubuSulumane.Toker uthi Islam kuyinto ngonya, ngokuphambene German soMthethosisekelo futhi kokubili misogynous futhi misandrous : ngokusho kwakhe, abesifazane e-Islam sokuba "simfela yokuzalanisa imishini".Uyaxwayisa ukuthi emadolobheni amaningi Dutch kukhona abesifazane futhi inkulisa izikhungo ezandleni Islamists.Ngokuvumela lokhu kuphulukiswa kwamaSulumane, iNetherlands iyabekezelela kakhulu ngokombono kaToker's.Kuyena, i-Islam imele ingcindezelo, futhi umuntu kufanele avunyelwe ukusho lokho, eqamba u- Ayaan Hirsi Ali njengesibonelo sabo.

UGeybullayeva uthole izinsongo eziningi emibuthanweni eyahlukene yezokuxhumana evela e-Azerbaijan ngokubambisana kwakhe nephephandaba lase-Armenia i- Agos.Engxoxweni abenayo neGlobal Voices, waveza ukuthi wabizwa ngokuthi "uyimbuka" nokuthi lokho kubhebhethekisa kwaba yizinsongo zokubulawa kwakhe nomndeni wakhe.Lezi zinsongo zimenze ukuthi ayeke ukuvakashela izwe lakubo i-Azerbaijan ngaleso sikhathi lapho ayezidingise khona eTurkey ngo-2015. 
U-Arzu Geybullayeva ( Azerbaijani ), owaziwa nangokuthi u- Arzu Geybulla ( Azerbaijani ), ungumlobi we- Azerbaijani, i-blogger, nentatheli yamaphephandaba amaningana nezindawo zezindaba ezibandakanya i- Al Jazeera, Inqubomgomo Yezangaphandle, i- Global Voices, ne- Agos.Ubuye wasebenza nezinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo kanye namathangi okucabanga kubandakanya iNational Democratic Institute ne- European Stability Initiative . 
UGeybullayeva wafakwa ohlwini lwabesifazane abasezingeni eliphezulu le-BBC ngo-2014.Ukhuthaza ukuxazululwa ngokuthula phakathi kwabase- Armenia nabase- Azerbaijan ngempi yeNagorno-Karabakh.Kodwa-ke, eminyakeni yamuva nje, uthole izinsongo ezahlukahlukene ikakhulukazi ezivela e-Azerbaijan ngenxa yokusebenza kwakhe ne-Agos, iphephandaba lase-Armenia.Lezi zinsongo zigxekwe umhlaba wonke yizinhlangano ezahlukahlukene ezilwela amalungelo abantu.UGeybullayeva uhlala ekudingisweni okuzimele eWashington DC . 
Ngenkathi ese-Istanbul e2007, uGeybullayeva waqala ukusebenzela i- European Stability Initiative, isikhungo esingenzi nzuzo kanye nenqubomgomo kanye nethangi lokucabanga laseNingizimu East Europe.NgoSepthemba 2008, waqala ibhulogi yakhe ebizwa ngeFlying Carpets and Broken Pipelines.Kusukela ngo-2009, ube ngumlobi wephephabhuku onikela ekuhlelweni kwe- Osservatorio Balcani e Caucaso, ithangi lokucabanga elizinze e-Italy. 
INecdet Yaşar ( Turkish pronunciation: [ˈNedʒdet ˈjaʃaɾ] ; 1930 - Okthoba 24, 2017) wayengumdlali we- Turkish tanbur lute kanye nothisha.Ilungu elingumsunguli we-Istanbul State Turkish Music Ensemble, wadlala umhlaba wonke njengenxusa lezamasiko eTurkey futhi wafundisa kabili e- University of Washington (USA).Ngo-1991, uhulumeni waseTurkey wamnika isihloko esithi " National Artist ". 
Ngo-1930, uNecdet Yaşar wazalelwa eNizip, idolobha elincane eliseduze neGaziantep, eTurkey.Wathweswa iziqu eSikoleni Sezomnotho, e-Istanbul University. [1] 
Ngo-1972, u-Yaşar no-Signell bahambela umhlangano waminyaka yonke we-Society for Ethnomusicology (SEM) lapho u-Yaşar empeleni wethula khona umculo ongaziwa kakhulu waseTurkey Classical kuma-ethnomusicologists ngokukhuluma nokwenza ku-tanbur [Tanburi Necdet Yaşar: Anılar-Dostlar. 
ENew York: Brainstorm, 2009, k.263. ] 
Ngo-1991, uhulumeni waseTurkey wamnika isihloko esithi "National Artist" ( Devlet Sanatçısı ). 
U-Elif angabhekisa ku 
U-Elif (igama) UBegünhan Elif Ünsal (owazalwa ngo-1993), umcibisheli waseTurkey U-Elif Ağca (owazalwa ngo-1984), umdlali we-volleyball waseTurkey U-Elif Batuman (owazalwa ngo-1977), umbhali waseMelika, isifundiswa, intatheli U-Elif Demirezer (owazalwa ngo-1992), umculi we-pop wase-German-Turkish nombhali wezingoma U-Elif Deniz (owazalwa ngo-1993), umdlali webhola lezinyawo waseTurkey U-Elif Elmas (owazalwa ngo-1998), umdlali webhola lezinyawo waseNyakatho yeMakedoniya U-Elif Gülbayrak (owazalwa ngo-1988), umdlali we-volleyball waseTurkey U-Elif Jale Yeşilırmak (owazalwa ngo-1986), umlwi waseTurkey odabuka eRussia U-Elif Keskin (owazalwa ngo-2002), umdlali webhola lezinyawo labesifazane baseTurkey U-Elif Kızılkaya (owazalwa ngo-1991), umpheki waseTurkey U-Elif Köroğlu, usompempe webhola laseTurkey U-Elif Shafak, umbhali waseTurkey-waseBrithani futhi eyisishoshovu U-Elif Sıla Aydın (owazalwa ngo-1996), umdlali we-handball waseTurkey U-Elif Ulaş (owazalwa ngo-1986), umdlali we-skater waseTurkey nomdlali we-ice hockey U-Elif Yıldırım (owazalwa ngo-1990), umgijimi webanga eliphakathi waseTurkey 
Elif, Gaziantep, idolobha elisesifundeni i-Arabian esifundazweni saseGaziantep, eTurkey U-Elif (uchungechunge lwe-TV), uchungechunge lwe-Turkish TV Ekusebenziseni ikhompyutha, kusetshenziswe njengengxenye yoHlelo Ohlelekile Uma (kufushane ngo- el se uma ) Uhlamvu lokuqala lwe-alfabhethi: A U-Aleph I-Alpha 
Ngesikhathi sempi yezinguquko eTurkey, eyaqala ngo-1919, u- Atatürk waqala ukubhekisa kubantu besifazane abanesibindi abavikela phambili kwekhaya njengo "Elifs".Ngokushesha ngemuva kwempi, abesifazane banikezwa ilungelo lokuvota yiRiphabhulikhi yaseTurkey encane futhi entsha, ngo-1923, phambili kwezinye izizwe.Leli gama laduma eminyakeni eyalandela ukusungulwa kweTurkey entsha, ekhombisa ubungcweti obabuhlanganisa futhi buhlonipha okwedlule. 
Igama Elif livame ukusetshenziswa njengegama lamantombazane.Ngonyaka odlule ibekwe ku-2,636th ohlwini lwama-US Social Security Administration lwamagama amantombazane athandwa kakhulu. 
UBegünhan Elif Ünsal (owazalwa ngo-1993), umcibisheli waseTurkey U-Elif Ağca (owazalwa ngo-1984), umdlali we-volleyball waseTurkey U-Elif Batuman (owazalwa ngo-1977), umbhali waseMelika, isifundiswa, intatheli U-Elif Demirezer (owazalwa ngo-1992), umculi we-pop wase-German-Turkish nombhali wezingoma U-Elif Deniz (owazalwa ngo-1993), umdlali webhola lezinyawo waseTurkey U-Elif Elmas (owazalwa ngo-1999), umdlali webhola waseNorth Macedonia U-Elif Gülbayrak (owazalwa ngo-1988), umdlali we-volleyball waseTurkey U-Elif Jale Yeşilırmak (owazalwa ngo-1986), umlwi waseTurkey odabuka eRussia U-Elif Keskin (owazalwa ngo-2002), umdlali webhola lezinyawo labesifazane baseTurkey U-Elif Kızılkaya (owazalwa ngo-1991), umpheki waseTurkey U-Elif Köroğlu, usompempe webhola laseTurkey U-Elif Shafak, umbhali waseTurkey-waseBrithani futhi eyisishoshovu U-Elif Sıla Aydın (owazalwa ngo-1996), umdlali we-handball waseTurkey U-Elif Yıldırım (owazalwa ngo-1990), umgijimi webanga eliphakathi waseTurkey 
U-Elif Demirezer (owazalwa ngomhlaka 12 Disemba 1992 eBerlin ) okwamanje owaziwa ngegama lakhe lesiteji u- ELIF, ungumculi waseJalimane odabuka eTurkey.. 
Ngemuva kwePopstars, uDemirezer uqinise ubukhona bakhe be-inthanethi kuFacebook nakuYouTube ngokwethula izingoma zakhe, ebezitholakala kakhulu ngolimi lwesiJalimane.Ubuye wasebenza njenge-blogger ye- "I Love Radio" yeWebradio.Ngo-2012, uDemirezer wajoyina umbhali wezingoma zomculi waseJalimane uTim Bendzko ohambweni lwakhe lwangoNovemba lwamaqembu aseJalimane.Kamuva, ngoFebhuwari 2013, uDemirezer waba sesichengeni sokuvula kukaRonan Keating phakathi nohambo lwabo lwaseJalimane.Kamuva ngonyaka, i-Unter meiner Haut yakhe yokuqala (Under My Skin) yakhululwa yi-Universal Music, futhi yafinyelela kunombolo 80 kumashadi angashadile aseJalimane maphakathi no-Ephreli.Ngomhlaka 7 Ephreli 2013 kwaba ngu-Elif Demirezer olandelayo Seeed, Blumio, Glass Bead Game no-Andreas Bourani kubaculi be-Memorial Concert - "I am Jonny for our brother voices" ngo-2012 iBerlin eyabulala uJonny K. e-Admiral Palace yenzeka.Ekuqaleni kuka-Agasti 2013, lowo oyedwa wakhishwa izinsuku ezingama-200 ehlobo.Le vidiyo, ekhombisa u-Elif kanye nezindlovu eziluhlaza esiqhingini saseSri Lanka, ibiqondiswe nguJustin Kruse, obesevele enamavidiyo omculo no-Ivy Quainoo, uMax Herre, uMax Prosa, uLeslie Clio noJoy Dena Lane.Ukuphela kuka-Agasti 2013 kukhishwe i-albhamu yokuqala ethi "Unter meiner Haut".Yakhishwa nguDemirezer uqobo noPhilip Schwär futhi wafinyelela kunombolo 23 kumashadi ama-albhamu aseJalimane. 
NgoJanuwari 2014 u-Elif uqede ukuvakasha kwakhe kokuqala ngamaqembu aseJalimane. 
U-Elif Demirezer wazalwa njengendodakazi yabokufika baseTurkey eBerlin futhi ungowesithathu ezinganeni ezine.Ukhulele esifundeni saseBerlin iMoabit futhi wafunda esikoleni i-OSC KIM.Ngaphezu kokudlala emculweni wesikole nasekwayeni yesikole, u-Elif uthathe izifundo zesigingci esemusha.Kwakungaleso sikhathi lapho abhala khona izingoma zakhe zokuqala. 
Lapho ngineminyaka engu-16 ubudala, Demirezer ligcwaliswe kule sizini yesishiyagalombili ProSieben ithalente show Popstars.Wenze ukubonakala ngokuhlanganyela ne-All American Rejects (The Wind Blows) noCassandra Steen (Angikaze Ngazi Ukuthi Ngidinga) futhi waqeda ngokubambisana nozakwabo uNiklas Dennin ukuthola indawo yesibili kowamanqamu. 
U-Elif Elmas ( Macedonian ; ozalwa 24 Septhemba 1999) is a Macedonian professional footballer odlalela Serie A club Napoli kanye North Macedonia eqenjini lesizwe njengoba mdlali. 
U-Elmas waqala umsebenzi wakhe e- FK Rabotnički kwelakubo eMacedonia. 
Ngemuva kwesizini evelele lapho athola khona amagoli ayisi-6 weligi futhi wahola uRabotnički waqeda endaweni yesithathu kwiMacedonia First Football League ngo- 2016-17, wajoyina imidondoshiya yaseTurkey iFenerbahçe ngesivumelwano kwaze kwaba ngu-2022, kanti iFenerbahçe ikhokhele lowo owayengu- € 300,000 ngemisebenzi yakhe.Umdlali wasesiswini ohlasele waqhubeka nokushaya amagoli amane emidlalweni engaphezu kwengu-40 kumaYellow Canaries kuyo yonke imiqhudelwano ngaphambi kokuthuthela e-Italy ngoJulayi 2019. 
U-Elmas ushaye igoli lakhe lokuqala leNapoli ngomhlaka 3 Nhlolanja 2020 ukusiza ikilabhu ukuthi linqobe ngo 4-2 kuSampdoria, nokuvikela iwini yabo yesithathu ilandelana kuyo yonke imincintiswano. 
UShafak ushicilele izincwadi eziyishumi nesishiyagalombili, okuyinhlanganisela yenganekwane nengamanga. 
U-Elif Shafak ( Turkish , pronounced [eˈlif ʃaˈfak] ; ozalwa 25 Okthoba 1971) is a -Turkish -British umlobi nesazi, umlobi, zezemfundo, isikhulumi saseningini, isazi sesayensi yezombangazwe kanye amalungelo abesifazane isishoshovu.Lapho kushicilelwa ngesiNgisi, igama lakhe lihunyushwa ngokuthi 'Elif Shafak'. [3] 
Izindatshana ezingezona eziqanjiwe zikaShafak ngesiTurkey ziqoqwe ezincwadini ezintathu:IMed-Cezir (2005), iFirarperest (2010), i-Şemspare (2012) neSanma ki Yalnizsin (2017). 
Ngo-2020, uShafak washicilela ukuthi Ungahlala Kanjani Sane ku-Age of Division. 
UShafak uke wahlala e- Istanbul, nase-United States — eBoston, eMichigan nase- Arizona — ngaphambi kokuthuthela e- UK.UShafak uhlale eLondon kusukela ngo-2013,[3] kodwa ukhuluma "ngokuthwala i-Istanbul emphefumulweni wakhe." 
UShafak ushade nentatheli yaseTurkey u- Eyüp Can Sağlık, owayengumhleli wephephandaba iRadikal, onendodakazi nendodana. [1] [2]Ngo-2017, uShafak waphuma njengowabesilisa nabesifazane. 
Imisebenzi 
I-SABC Education iyisiteshi sethelevishini semfundo saseNingizimu Afrika esiphethwe yiSouth African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC). 
Uhlu lwezindaba zaseNingizimu Afrika Uhlu lweziteshi zethelevishini zaseNingizimu Afrika Uhlu lwamadrama akhiqizwa yi-SABC Uhlu lwemibukiso ehlukahlukene ekhiqizwa yi-SABC 
I-SABC Education (iwebhusayithi) 
Ngo-1991, i-TV2, i-TV3 ne-TV4 zahlanganiswa zaba insiza entsha ebizwa nge-CCV (Contemporary Community Values).Kwethulwa isiteshi sesithathu esasaziwa nge-TSS, noma iTopSport Surplus, iTopSport okuyigama elalisakazwa yiSABC kwezemidlalo, kodwa lokhu kwafakwa iNNTV (National Network TV), okuyisiteshi semfundo, hhayi esokuhweba, ngo-1993. 
Isungulwe ngonyaka we-1996, iSABC Education wuphiko lwebhizinisi lwe-SABC olubhekele ukuletha igunya lezemfundo lomsakazi womphakathi.Ngokwesiko leqiniso laseNingizimu Afrika, iSABC Education ihlangabezana nale nselelo ngokuletha okuqukethwe okuphoqayo kwezemfundo kubabukeli abahlukahlukene eNingizimu Afrika kanye nase-Afrika yonkana.Okuqukethwe yi-SABC Education, okuqoqwe kusuka ezindabeni ezahlukahlukene zezemfundo kuneqhaza ekunotheni okwabiwe ngobuntu baseNingizimu Afrika. 
Ukucebisa Izingqondo, Ukucebisa Ukuphila! 
Ngo-2015, iSABC Education yabambisana noTuluntulu ukwethula lo mkhiqizo njengesiteshi esiku-inthanethi kanye neSABC Children. 
Ngo-2018, i-SABC yehlisa izinhlelo zayo ezingasekelwa ngezimali ze-DTT eziteshini eziyi-9 iSABC Sport neMfundo ekhona kuleso sikhundla. Baphinde bavula isikole semfundo ephakeme salo mkhiqizo ukusiza abafundi bakamatikuletsheni ezifundweni zabo nokubahlomisa ngamakhono adingekayo ukuze basebenze ngokuzimela. 
Ngo-2020, kwaba nobhadane olwaphoqa izikole ukuba zivale ngakho-ke umsakazi womphakathi wanquma ukukhipha isiteshi ku-DTT naku-YouTube kusuka ngoMeyi 4 kunamapulatifomu amaningi okulindeleke ukuthi asengezwe kungekudala.Ngo-Okthoba walowo nyaka, iSABC yabambisana noTelkom ukusabalalisa lesi siteshi kanye nezinye izakhiwo zeSABC ngensizakalo entsha yokusakaza, iTelkomOne. [2] 
Okulandelayo uhlu lwabezindaba baseNingizimu Afrika, okubandakanya amaphephandaba, iziteshi zethelevishini, iziteshi zomsakazo neminye imithombo yezindaba ehlukile

I-Africa Media Online Enye imithombo yezindaba eNingizimu Afrika Uhlu lwamagazini eNingizimu Afrika Online newspapers published in South Africa 
IBeeld (itholakala ezifundazweni ezi-5 kwezi-9) Usuku lwebhizinisi ICity Press UMaverick wansuku zonke IDaily Sun Imeyili & Nomgcini Izindaba Nsuku Zonke INkathi Entsha Ukuxhumana Izindaba ze-SAMM - okwamanje ziyatholakala ku-inthanethi ISowetan NgeSonto Kuzimele ILanga Langesonto ISunday Times ISunday World UFakazi ILANGA 
eToonz kuyinto eNingizimu Afrika satellite digital ithelevishini free-kuya-air isiteshi zezingane wadala futhi kungeyakho eMedia Investments sika e.tv.isiteshi sisakaza isikhathi esingamahora ayi-16 kusuka ngeSonto kuze kube uLwesihlanu, amahora ayi-17 ngoMgqibelo namahora ayi-18 ngama-movie ngesikhathi samaholide ezikole. 
I-e.tv njengomsakazi yethule i-eKasi +, eToonz +, eMovies + ne-eAfrica + njengeziteshi ezingosisi ezintsha njengesiteshi sayo sokuqala sezinhlelo ze-TV zethelevishini yedijithali yomhlaba (i-DTT).I-e.tv, i-SABC kanye ne-M-Net bahlela kutsi ngamunye wabo akhicite emaqoqo abo etiteshi letengetiwe taseNingizimu Afrika ekugcineni. 
Izindaba Ezemidlalo kuyinto Afrika eNingizimu free-kuya-air digital satellite ithelevishini izindaba kanye nezemidlalo isiteshi wadala futhi kungeyakho e.tv ka- eMedia Investments.Pambilini ebizwa nge-OpenNews, iyisiteshi sezindaba sesibili esidalwe yi-eMedia, okuxakayo ukuthi siyimbangi yesiteshi sodadewabo i- eNCA. 
I-eMedia yethule i-OpenNews njengempendulo kubabukeli be-Openview abafuna kakhulu isiteshi sezindaba sasendaweni.Yize i-eMedia isivele inayo i- eNCA yamahora angama-24, lesi siteshi senzelwe kuphela i-DStv ne- BBC World News (esemapulatifomu womabili) ayizange yanelise izidingo zababukeli zezindaba zendawo. 
Isiteshi sethulwe ngo-17: 00 CAT futhi sasetshenziselwa ukusakaza izindaba zendawo kusuka ngo-17: 00 CAT kuya ku-23: 00 CAT ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu. 
Isikhathi sokusakaza sabe sesigcinwa kamuva futhi manje sikhombisa izindaba zasendaweni kusuka ngo-16: 00 CAT kuze kube ngu-19: 30 CAT namanye amahora asetshenziselwe abalingani bezindaba bamazwe omhlaba njenge- TRT World, i- China Global Television Network, i- France 24 namanye amadokhumentari asendaweni. 
Ngasekupheleni kwalowo nyaka, lesi siteshi saqala ukukhombisa Ezemidlalo futhi sasebenzisa uphawu lwe-e.tv Sport ngaphambi kokuba sibe yiNews & Sport. 
Ngemuva kwalokho isiteshi sabuye satholakala kuVui. 
I-News Service yasungulwa ngoJuni 1950, yathatha indawo yezinhlelo ze-BBC.Yize lokhu bekungenxa yokuthi ukusakazwa kwe-BBC bekuthathwa njengokunikeza umbono waseBrithani ngezindaba zamanje, bekukhona nokukhathazeka ukuthi abakwaSABC bazoba ngohulumeni abaphezulu ngokweqile, noma "Izwi Lethu Lenkosi". 
Ngo-1968, yayinezintatheli ezingaphezu kuka-100 zesikhathi esigcwele emadolobheni amakhulu nakubabhali basekhaya ezweni lonke, nezindaba zaphesheya kwezilwandle ezazinikezwa yiReuters, AFP, AP ne-UPI. 
Kwakukhona i-News Film Unit okwathi ngaphambi kwethelevishini ngo-1976 yakhiqiza amafilimu ezinhlangano zezindaba nezinhlangano zethelevishini. 
NgoMashi 2021, i-eMedia Investments, abanikazi benkonzo yesathelayithi yamahhala, i-Openview, kanye ne-SABC bafinyelele esivumelwaneni sebhizinisi esibona ukuthi i-Openview iyaqhubeka nokusakaza iziteshi ezinencazelo ephezulu i-SABC 1, 2 no-3, kanye nezinye iziteshi zethelevishini ezi-3.eyodwa kube yiSABC Sport evela kumsakazi womphakathi, kanye nayo yonke imisakazo engu-19 ephethwe yi-SABC.ISABC Sport kanye neziteshi zabo zomsakazo zenziwe zatholakala ku-Openview kusuka ngomhlaka 17 Ephreli. 
Lesi siteshi sinemidlalo emidala nemisha eminye yayo esivele ikhona ku-SABC 1-3. 
Izinhlelo eziphawulekayo kulesi siteshi kubalwa iSport Arena, iSport @ 10 neSoccerzone.Okuqukethwe yi-SABC SPORT okuqukethe i-ESPN eNingizimu Afrika njenge-ESPN FC ne-EFL Championship 
Uhlu lwezindaba zaseNingizimu Afrika Uhlu lweziteshi zethelevishini zaseNingizimu Afrika Uhlu lwamadrama akhiqizwa yi-SABC Uhlu lwemibukiso ehlukahlukene ekhiqizwa yi-SABC 
I-SABC Sport (iwebhusayithi) 
Ngo-1991, i-TV2, i-TV3 ne-TV4 (manje eyi-SABC 1-3) zahlanganiswa zaba insizakalo entsha ebizwa nge-CCV (Contemporary Community Values).Kwethulwa isiteshi sesithathu esasaziwa nge-TSS, noma iTopSport Surplus, iTopSport okuyigama elalisakazwa yiSABC kwezemidlalo, kodwa lokhu kwafakwa iNNTV (National Network TV), okuyisiteshi semfundo, hhayi esokuhweba, ngo-1993. 
Ngo-2012, iSABC yahlela ukutshala imali engu-R732.7 million eminyakeni emibili ezayo ukusungula iSABC Sport njengesiteshi esihlukile se-TV eNingizimu Afrika ngo-Okthoba 1.Baphinde basayina isivumelwano semali eyizigidi zamarandi neNBA yaseMelika ukukhombisa ukugcwala okuphelele ngeSABC Sport futhi bakhetha imidlalo kuSABC 1 ukuvimbela ukubukwa kokuphazamiseka ngaphambi kokuphuthelwa umnqamulajuqu. 
IMzansi Community Satellite, ehweba njengeGauTV yafuna ilayisense kwa-ICASA ukuze ihlinzeke ababukeli baseGauteng ngethelevishini ezinze kusathelayithi.Ithi isinqumo sesiphathimandla sokungayiniki ilayisense besingafanele futhi singahambisani nomthetho ofanele. [1] 
Ngo-2014, i-Alex TV (eyaziwa nangokuthi i-LX TV) isiteshi esincintisanayo esinakekela ingxenye esenyakatho yeGoli sethulwa ku-Openview ngo-Ephreli ihlinzeka ngokuzijabulisa okufundisayo nokufundisayo kanye nezindaba zamanje. 
Ngo-2015, ngemuva kokusebenza unyaka i-Alex TV yavalwa ngenyanga efanayo eyethula.Ngo-Okthoba walowo nyaka, iGauTV yagcina ithole isiteshi sayo ngokusakaza kwipulatifomu iMultiChoice ye- DStv kusuka ngo-06: 00 - 18:00 (amahora ayi-12 ngosuku) lapho iningi labantu lingatholakali ngaleso sikhathi. 
NgoMashi 2017, lesi siteshi sandise amahora aso okusakaza asuka emahoreni ayi-12 aya emahoreni angama-24. 
ICape Town TV iyisiteshi sethelevishini somphakathi esisakaza eKapa, eNingizimu Afrika.Yasungulwa ngoSepthemba 2008 inelayisense yonyaka owodwa, "yesikhashana" futhi ngemuva kwalokho yazuza enye leyo layisense ngoSepthemba 2009. 
Iyinhlangano engenzi nzuzo enelayisensi njengomsakazi womphakathi ngokoMthetho Wezokuxhumana Ngezobuchwepheshe waseNingizimu Afrika. 
Izinhlelo ikakhulukazi zingezemibhalo, zihlanganisa izihloko ezinjenge-NGO, ezempilo, ezomoya, ezenkolo, amalungelo abantu, intando yeningi, ezemvelo kanye nezindaba zomhlaba.Lesi siteshi sizakhele igama ngokusakaza izinhlelo ezingasoze zakhonjiswa eziteshini zethelevishini ezivamile.Lokhu kufaka phakathi izingqinamba ezinempikiswano efana 'nezinkolelo-mbumbulu zetulo' (isbI-Illuminati, ukuhlaselwa okungu-9-11, njl. 
I-CTV, njengezinye iziteshi zethelevishini zomphakathi eNingizimu Afrika, ibhekene nezinselelo eziningi.Lokhu kufaka hlangana imali, ukutholakala kwamafrikhwensi wokurhatjha nokufuduka kusuka ekusakazweni kwe-analogue kuye kweye-digital. 
I-CTV yisiteshi esingena mahhala esisakazwa ekudlulisweni kwe-analogi . 
Isiteshi sidlulisa kusuka kusidlulisi esisodwa samandla amancane esisegqumeni laseTygerberg, siya enyakatho yeKapa.Leli sayithi lihlinzeka ngokutholakala okubanzi kakhulu esifundeni samadolobha amakhulu aseKapa, yize sinelayisense kuphela (yi- ICASA ) yokudlulisa amandla kagesi aphansi.Isiteshi sisakazwa kumvamisa 607.25I-MHz (isiteshi 38) kubhendi ye-UHF. 
NgoSepthemba 2017, lesi siteshi sethule isiteshi sabo sokuqala esingudade, i-Onse TV.Isiteshi esisha sinokuzithokozisa okusiza umphakathi wamaKhaladi. 
Uhlu lweziteshi zethelevishini zaseNingizimu Afrika Ithelevishini eNingizimu Afrika I-TopTV kykNET Inkanyezi 
I-ASTV iqale ukusakaza ku- OpenViewHD15 Okthoba 2013.Ngo-15 Agasti 2016 i-ASTV yamemezela ukuthi lesi siteshi ngeke sisatholakala ku- OpenViewHD futhi okuphakelayo kwesiteshi kuzonqunywa ngomhlaka 14 Okthoba 2016 futhi basazoqhubeka nokusakaza kwiStarSat. 
Igazi liwuketshezi lomzimba ebantwini nakwezinye izilwane eziletha izinto ezidingekayo ezifana nezakhamzimba nomoya- mpilo kumaseli futhi lihambise imfucumfucu yemethabolic kude nalawo maseli. 
Ukugeleza okungeziwe kokubuyela emuva kungavela ngokuhamba kwemisipha yamathambo, engacindezela imithambo futhi iphushe igazi ngamaphayiphu emithanjeni ibheke e- atrium elungile. 
Vuzu (eliqoshiwe njengoba VUZU) kuyinto eNingizimu Afrika bentsha isiteshi sethelevishini ezivezwa -M-Net nodadewabo pay platform ithelevishini DStv.IVuzu ifana nezinye iziteshi ezithandwayo ze-American TV ezifana neBravo, FX, BET, The CW, NBC, TNT nezinye eziningi. 
Lesi siteshi sikhipha izinhlelo ezintsha nyangazonke futhi sizenze sibe yisiteshi sentsha esezingeni lomhlaba esikhaleni se-African Television and Broadcasting. 
Isiteshi sisakaza esiteshini se-116 ku- Dstv sixuba izinhlelo zombili zakuleli nezakwamanye amazwe.Isiteshi sisakazwa i-Afrika yonkana kubabhalisi beDStv Family, Compact, Compact Plus & Premium.Lesi siteshi besine-premium esithe xaxa yesiteshi esibizwa nge-Vuzu Amp ukusakaza esiteshini se-DStv 103 kubabhalisele ama-premium kuphela, sikhombisa kakhulu ama-HD Programs athile ngqo ngemuva kokukhonjiswa kwe-US okwaziwa nge- "Express From The US". 
Lokhu kwafakwa i- One Magic . 
Isiteshi sethulwa ngo-1 Agasti 2003 njenge- 'Channel go okubhekiswe kuyo intsha nentsha njengomncintiswano weMTV.Isiteshi besitholakala kusiteshi se-DStv 84. 
Ithuthele esiteshini se-123 ngomhlaka 1 Meyi 2008. 
NgoMashi 2009, kwamenyezelwa ukuthi iChannel go izoba yiVuzu ngomhlaka 1 Julayi 2009 njengengxenye yebinzana lesibili lezinguquko ezenziwa eziteshini zalo zentsha.IVuzu ijwayele ukubhekisa kubantu abaneminyaka eyi-14-23. 
Ukwethulwa kwaso kuphinde kwaqondana nokwethulwa kwenethiwekhi yomphakathi i-vuzu.tv ngomzamo wokwenza lesi siteshi sisebenzisane kakhulu kunangaphambili.Uhlelo lokuqala ukusakaza kwaba uhlelo oludumile olwaziwa ngeTouch TV, olwalusakazwa ngo-16: 00 (phambilini bekungu-17: 00).Ababukeli abaningi beGo bakhononda ngokwethulwa kwalesi siteshi njengoba kudale ukuthi izinhlelo eziningi ze-go zithuthele isikhathi, iziteshi noma zinyamalale ngokuphelele. 
Ngo-2012, lesi siteshi saphinde senza ushintsho njengoba isiteshi saso sendabuko esingu-123 sashintsha saba ngu-116.Ngo-2014, kwasungulwa isiteshi esihambisana nayo esikhundleni seM-Net Series Showcase eyaphinde yabizwa ngeVuzu Amp. 
UMzansi Magic uyisiteshi sedijithali saseNingizimu Afrika nesiteshi esijwayelekile sokuzijabulisa esidalwe ngabakwaMultichoice futhi esiphethwe ngabakwaM -Net abanenzalo yendawo, futhi sisakazwa kuDStv . 
Lesi siteshi sigxile kakhulu ochungechungeni lwe-reality oludume kakhulu, ikakhulukazi iDate My Family, Our Perfect Wedding, uMnakwethu, Idols South Africa, iLiving The Dream noSomizi noBeing Bonang phakathi kwezinye. 
Kubandakanya nezinkulumo zezinkulumo zomhlaba jikelele ezifana neThe Talk neThe Doctors. 
Iphethe okunye okuqukethwe okufaniswa neSuperSport.Lokhu kufaka phakathi okuvelele kweWWE Raw neSmackDown, kanye neNedbank Ke Yona Team Search. 
Isiteshi esethulwe maphakathi noJulayi 2010 esiteshini se-107 njengesikhulumi se-M-Net sokuthuthukisa ukukhiqizwa kwendawo kanye nokukhangisa ngobumnandi eNingizimu Afrika.
