UMose ( Greek ), [NB 1] Moishe ( Yiddish ), [NB 2] Moshe ( Hebrew ), [NB 3] noma iMovses ( Armenian : Մովսես) [NB 4] yigama elinikezwe owesilisa, ngemuva kwesibalo seBhayibheli uMose. 
Ngokwe- Torah, igama elithi "Moses" livela esenzweni sesiHeberu, esisho ukuthi "ukukhipha / ukukhipha" [amanzi], kanti usana olunguMose lanikezwa leli gama yindodakazi kaFaro ngemuva kokumophula emfuleni iNayile (Eksodusi 2:10)Kusukela kwavela i- Egyptology kanye nokuchazwa kwama-hieroglyphs, kwabhalwa ukuthi igama likaMose, elibizwa ngokufana nelithi Moshe wesiHeberu, yigama laseGibhithe leNdodana, elinamagama kaFaro anjengoThutmose nelithi Ramesses icishe ihumushele kokuthi "indodana kaThoth " kanye "nendodana kaRa ," ngokulandelana. [2] 
AmaJuda aqanjwe ngegama lesiHeberu likaMose, ayevame ukuba negama elifanayo ngolimi lwamazwe azalelwa noma ahlala kuwo. 
LEYurophu baqanjwa ngokuthi iMaurici, iMaurice, iMorris, iMauricio.Emazweni akhuluma isi-Arabhu, kanye noMoussa - igama lesi-Arabhu likaMose, babizwa nangokuthi uMustafa. [1] 
UMose, umbhali odumile wePentateuch kanye nomlingisi omkhulu weNcwadi ka-Eksodusi UMose wase-Alexandria, isazi samakhemikhali 
I-RTL Klub ibinguye kuphela umsakazi onelayisense weFormula One eHungary kusuka ngo-2002 kuze kube ngu-2011.Ngemuva kweminyaka eyishumi i-RTL inqume ukungayivuseleli ilayisensi yeFomula 1.Isizathu ukuthi babefuna ukugxila kakhulu ezinhlelweni zesikhathi sokuqala ngenxa yokuncipha kwemakethe yezikhangiso. 
I-RTL Klub iyisiteshi sethelevishini samahhala saseHungary (M-RTL Zrt.) 
Futhi siphethwe yiRTL Group .Kwakungesinye seziteshi zokuqala ze-TV zaseHungary ezentengiso futhi saqala ukusakaza ezinsukwini ezintathu kuphela ngemuva kwembangi yaso enkulu iTV2 . 
IFilm + 2 bekuyisiteshi somndeni esingenalo udlame.Ithule ngomhlaka 2 Ephreli 2008.Lesi siteshi se-movie besizinikele kakhulu kuzethameli zabesifazane, futhi ngokwengxenye kumafilimu omndeni ngezikhathi zakusihlwa nangezimpelasonto.Inikeza amahlaya, amafilimu ezothando, ezokuzijabulisa namadrama.Kwiphothifoliyo yekhebula le-RTL, iFilm + 2 bekuyisiteshi esisakaza amafilimu amaningi aseHungary. 
Kusukela yaqala, i-RTL Klub igxile ekutholeni ababukeli kubantu basemadolobheni.Isiteshi sidlala izinhlelo ikakhulukazi izilaleli ezisencane (18-49). 
Ithule njengePoén! ngo-2 Ephreli 2008, yabe seqanjwa kabusha njengePrizma ngomhla ka-20 Disemba 2010.Ukugxila kukaPrizma bekukuzijabulisa futhi inhloso yayo bekuwukunikeza okuthile okuhehayo esizukulwaneni ngasinye.Iningi lohlelo lwayo lalinabazalwane abathandekayo, kepha kwakukhona nezintandokazi zabalaleli ezintsha. 
Isakazwa njenge- RTL + kusukela ngomhlaka 1 Meyi 2014. 
ISorozat + iyisiteshi sabathandi be-series - kulabo abahlala ngokulindela isiqephu esilandelayo.ISorozat + inikeza okuthile kwilungu ngalinye lomndeni, kusuka kuma-telenovelas aseLatin-American kuya ochungechungeni oluphakeme lwase-US.Ithule ngomhlaka 2 Ephreli 2008. 
I-RTL Klub ne-TV2 yasakaza ngochungechunge lwamaqiniso amabili afanayo ngasikhathi sinye.Ngenkathi i-TV2 ithenga amalungelo kaBig Brother, i-RTL Klub yakhiqiza uchungechunge lwayo olubizwa ngeValó Világ (Umhlaba Wangempela).UValó Világ ube nezinkathi ezintathu zonyaka phakathi kuka-2002 no-2004.Kusukela ngesizini yesibili lolu hlelo luphumelele kakhulu kunembangi yakhe uBig Brother . 
I-RTL Klub iyisiteshi se-TV esibukwe kakhulu kunazo zonke eHungary kusukela ngo-2002, ngenxa yomdlalo ophuma nsuku zonke waseHungary iBarátok közt (Phakathi Kwabangane), okuwuhlelo lwe-TV olubukelwa kakhulu eHungary olunababukeli abangaphezu kwezigidi ezimbili; umagazini we-tabloid Fókusz (Focus) nombukiso womdlalo uLegyen Ön yi-milliomos ( Ubani Ofuna Ukuba usozigidi? ).Usozigidi ushiye uhlelo kusukela ngoSepthemba 2007 ngemuva kweminyaka eyisikhombisa futhi esikhundleni sakhe kufakwe i- A Széf ( Thatha noma uyiyeke). 
Kusukela kusizini yasekwindla-ebusika ka-2005-2006, i-RTL Klub isiqalile ukusakaza izinhlelo ezithandwayo ze-American TV ezifana ne- Lost.Isiqephu sokuqala seLost sasinababukeli abacishe babe yizigidi ezimbili, kanye nesabelo esingu-50%.Lokhu bekuyirekhodi.Ngonyaka olandelayo iJele Break laqala cishe ngezigidi eziyi-1.6.Namuhla uhlelo lwe-TV ngesikhathi sokuqala (21:00) lungafinyelela ababukeli abayizigidi eziyi-1-1.5.Ngesizini ka-2006-2007 Prison Break kwakuwuchungechunge lwaseMelika olubukelwa kakhulu eHungary. 
Kusukela ngenkathi yokwindla ka-2007, i-RTL Klub yethule amafomethi amabili amasha ngempumelelo enkulu.I-Poker Face yagijima njengomqhudelwano amasonto ayisithupha ngesabelo esilinganiselwe esingu-38-42%.Omunye umdlalo omusha kwakunguCsillag születik, inguqulo yesiHungary yefomethi yeRTL Got Talent.I-Poker Face iphele nge-super final ngo-18 Disemba kanti isikhathi esizodlalwa ngaso sizothathwa ngumbukiso omusha womdlalo i-A Széf ( Thatha noma uyiyeke). 
I- Akhawunti Yase Mzansi yi- akhawunti yasebhange yemali ephansi eyenziwayo eyenziwe ngokuhambisana nezibophezelo zoMqulu Womkhakha Wezezimali waseNingizimu Afrika.Umqulu Womkhakha Wezezimali udinga ukuthi amabhange enze ukuthi amabhange atholakale kalula esizweni futhi, ikakhulukazi, ukwandisa ukufinyelela kwamabhange kuyo yonke imiphakathi. 
I-Mzansi Account ingumphumela wamabhange amakhulu aseNingizimu Afrika asebenza ngokuhlanganyela ukuhlinzeka indinganiso yama-akhawunti amasha asebhange, atholakalayo, atholakalayo futhi ahambisana nezidingo ezithile zemiphakathi eyayingakhokhelwa ngaphambili.Ibhange ngalinye lisungule amanani alo ngokuncintisana. 
Incazelo yemali ithi yimali kuphela "ezweni elithile noma kumongo wezenhlalo nezomnotho".Ngokuvamile, imiphakathi isebenzisa kuphela isilinganiso esisodwa senani, esingakhonjwa kumanani ezimpahla ezifakwe kuhlu ezithengiswayo.Kungaba nemidiya eminingi yokushintshisana, engabonwa yilokho okunikezwayo ukuthenga izimpahla ("indlela yokushintshanisa"), njll. .Emazweni amaningi, uhulumeni uthatha isinyathelo sokukhuthaza izinhlobo ezithile zemali, njengokuyidinga intela nokujezisa ukukhwabanisa . 
Ezinye izindawo zigcina ezimbili noma zezimali, ikakhulukazi emadolobheni asemngceleni noma ezindaweni ezihamba kakhulu. 
Izitolo ezikulezi zindawo zingahle zibhale izintengo futhi zamukele inkokhelo ngezimali eziningi.Ngaphandle kwalokho, imali yakwamanye amazwe iphathwa njengempahla yezezimali emakethe yendawo.Imali yakwamanye amazwe ivame ukuthengwa noma ukuthengiswa ezimakethe zokushintshaniswa kwamanye amazwe ngabahambi nabahwebi. 
Imiphakathi ingashintsha imali eyisebenzisayo, eyaziwa ngokuthi ukufaka imali esikhundleni.Lokhu kungenzeka ngenhloso, lapho uhulumeni ekhipha imali entsha. 
Isibonelo, lapho iBrazil isuka e- cruzeiro yaseBrazil iya kwangempela yaseBrazil Kungenzeka futhi ngokuzenzekelayo, lapho abantu benqaba ukwamukela imali ehlangabezana ne- hyperinflation (noma ngabe ukusetshenziswa kwayo kukhuthazwa uhulumeni). 
Ukufeza imisebenzi yayo ehlukahlukene, imali kufanele ibe nezakhiwo ezithile: 
Imali iyiphi into noma irekhodi aqinisekiswe olwamukelwa njengoba ukukhokhelwa ngoba izimpahla namasevisi kanye ukubuyiswa kwemali of izikweletu, ezifana izintela, ezweni elithile noma izimo zenhlalo yomphakathi nezomnotho umongo.Imisebenzi esemqoka yemali ihlukaniswa njenge: indlela yokushintshanisa, iyunithi ye-akhawunti, isitolo senani futhi kwesinye isikhathi, izinga lokukhokha elihlehlisiwe .Noma iyiphi into noma irekhodi eliqinisekisiwe eligcwalisa le misebenzi lingathathwa njengemali. 
Imali yasebhange, noma imali ebanzi (M1 / M2) yimali eyenziwe ngamabhange azimele ngokuqoshwa kwemali mboleko njengamadiphozi amaklayenti abolekayo, ngokuxhaswa okuyingxenye okukhonjiswe isilinganiso semali.Njengamanje, imali yasebhange yenziwa njengemali ye-elektroniki. 
Emazweni amaningi, iningi lemali lenziwa kakhulu njenge-M1 / M2 ngamabhange ezentengiselwano enza imalimboleko.Ngokuphikisana neminye imibono eyiphutha ethandwayo, amabhange awasebenzi nje njengabalamuli, abolekisa ngamadiphozithi awagcina kuwo, futhi awancikile emalini yasebhange emaphakathi (M0) ukwenza imali mboleko entsha kanye nemali efakwa. 
"Ukuthengiswa kwemali emakethe" kuchaza ukuthi into ingathengiswa kalula kanjani ngenye into, noma ibe yimali efanayo ngaphakathi komnotho.Imali iyimpahla ewuketshezi kakhulu ngoba yaziwa emhlabeni wonke futhi yamukelwa njengemali ejwayelekile.Ngale ndlela, imali inika abathengi inkululeko yokuhweba izimpahla nezinsizakalo kalula ngaphandle kokuhwebelana. 
Okokusebenza kwezezimali okungamanzi kuyathengiseka kalula futhi kunezindleko zokuthenga eziphansi.Akufanele kube khona ukusabalalisa (noma okuncane) phakathi kwamanani ukuthenga nokuthengisa ithuluzi elisetshenziswa njengemali. 
Ngo-1875, isazi sezomnotho saseBrithani uWilliam Stanley Jevons wachaza imali eyayisetshenziswa ngaleso sikhathi njenge " mali emele ".Imali emele imali equkethe izinhlamvu zemali zamathokheni, imali yamaphepha noma amanye amathokheni aphathekayo njengezitifiketi, angashintshelwa ngokuthembekile ngenani elinqunyiwe lezimpahla ezifana negolide noma isiliva. 
Inani lemali emele limi maqondana ngqo futhi elingaguquki nempahla elisekelayo, kuyilapho lingelona uqobo lwalo lakhiwa leyo mpahla. 
Imali ye-Fiat noma imali ye-fiat yimali enenani elingasuselwa kunoma yiliphi inani elingaphakathi noma isiqinisekiso sokuthi lingaguqulwa libe impahla ebalulekile (njengegolide).Esikhundleni salokho, inenani kuphela nge-oda likahulumeni (fiat).Imvamisa, uhulumeni umemezela ukuthi imali ye-fiat (imanothi ejwayelekile kanye nezinhlamvu zemali ezivela ebhange elikhulu, njengeFederal Reserve System e-US) iyithenda elisemthethweni, okwenza kungabi semthethweni ukungayemukeli imali ye-fiat njengendlela yokukhokha zonke izikweletu, yomphakathi neyangasese. 
Ezinye izinhlamvu zemali ezifana ne- Australian Gold Nugget ne- American Eagle ziyithenda elisemthethweni, kepha, zidayisa ngokususelwa enanini lentengo lokuqukethwe kwensimbi njengempahla, kunenani lobuso bethenda elisemthethweni (okuvamise ukuba yingxenyana encane yabo inani le-bullion). [1] 
Imali ye-Fiat, uma imelwe ngokomzimba ngendlela yemali (iphepha noma izinhlamvu zemali), ingalimala ngephutha noma icekelwe phansi.Kodwa-ke, imali ye-fiat inenzuzo ngaphezu kwemali emele noma yempahla, ngoba leyo mithetho efanayo eyenze imali ingachaza nemithetho yokuyishintsha uma kwenzeka umonakalo noma umonakalo. 
Isibonelo, uhulumeni wase-US uzothatha isikhundla seFederal Reserve Notes (imali ye-US fiat) uma okungenani uhhafu wenothi ungakhiwa kabusha, noma uma kungafakazelwa ngenye indlela ukuthi ubhujisiwe. [1]Ngokuphambene, imali yempahla elahlekile noma eyonakalisiwe ayinakutholwa. 
Imali ehlwezi 
Lezi zinto zaholela ekushintsheni kwesitolo senani kuyinsimbi uqobo lwayo: ekuqaleni isiliva, kwase kuthi kokubili isiliva negolide, futhi ngesinye isikhathi kwakukhona nethusi.Manje sinezinhlamvu zemali zethusi nezinye izinsimbi ezingabalulekile njengezinhlamvu zemali. 
Izinsimbi zazigaywa, zilinganiswe, futhi zifakwe ezinhlamvwini zemali.Lokhu kwakungukuqinisekisa lowo owayethatha uhlamvu lwemali ukuthi wayethola isisindo esithile esaziwayo sensimbi eyigugu.Izinhlamvu zemali zingaba ngumkokotelo, kepha futhi zakha neyunithi entsha ye-akhawunti, esize yaholela ekubhangeni.Isisekelo sika-Archimedes sinikeze isixhumanisi esilandelayo: izinhlamvu zemali manje sezingavivinywa kalula ngesisindo sayo esihle sensimbi, futhi ngaleyo ndlela inani lohlamvu lwemali lalinganqunywa, noma ngabe laliphuciwe, lonakalisiwe noma laphazanyiswa ngenye indlela (bheka iNumismatics ). 
IM-Net Movies iyiqembu leziteshi zethelevishini ezizinze eNingizimu Afrika ezethulwe njenge-Movie Magic ngo-1995 futhi zisakazwa kulo lonke elase- Sub-Saharan Africa kumasevisi ezethelevishini akhokhelwayo e-TV iDStv neGOTV .Iziteshi zisakaza amafilimu / ama-movie asuselwa ohlotsheni kanye neziqeshana ezibonisa ngemuva-kwe-izigcawu kubukeka kumabhayisikobho angaphambili, amanje nawesikhathi esizayo ebhokisini lokuphuma ehhovisi. 
Isiteshi esihamba phambili seM-Net Movies esiqukethe ama-movie okuqala aqala ukusebenza ikakhulukazi ngemuva kokutholakala kwinsizakalo yokuqasha i-DStv BoxOffice, kanye nezici zokugqwayiza.Lesi siteshi siwumphumela weM-Net Movies Premiere neM-Net Movies Smile (Smile okuyinhlanganisela yeM-Net Movies Comedy neM-Net Movies Family). 
Isiteshi se-movie yesenzo se-premium sigxile kuma-thrillers nama-movie wesabekayo.Kuyinhlanganisela yeM-Net Movies Action neM-Net Movies Action +. 
Lesi yisiteshi esijwayelekile sokuzijabulisa esigxile kuzinkanyezi ezithandwa kakhulu, ezitholwe ngabazandulelayo beM-Net Movies Action & M-Net Movies Allstars.Ngenxa yokuthi izinkanyezi eziningi zingama-voiceovers, isiteshi sinamafilimu / ama-movie agqamile, ngokuhlanganiswa kwamahlaya nezothando nezenzo ezithile. 
Isiteshi se-pop-up nesiteshi sokuqala sama-movie ukusakaza ngaphansi kwamahora angama-24 ngosuku. 
Ekuqaleni, lesi siteshi sasibizwa nge-M-Net Movies Showcase.Ngo-2015, ngawo lowo nyaka kwasungulwa iM-Net Movies Smile, kwafakwa esinye isiteshi, iM-Net Movies Romance kwi-Showcase, ngokuphendula ngqo kwizikhalazo zababukeli zokuphindwa okuningi kakhulu.Imikhosi eminingi yama-movie efana ne-Star Wars, uHarry Potter, uJames Bond, njll. 
Lesi siteshi sivame ukutholakala ku-DStv Premium kanti kulo Januwari, lesi siteshi asizange sethulwe iPrimiyamu, sasungulelwa iCompact neCompact +.Ama-M-Net Movies nawo anesici se-Add Movies esivumela ababhalisile abangakhokhelwa ukuthi babuke iziteshi zama-movie ze-premium ngemali ekhokhelwayo efaka iziteshi ezizayo ezingaqala ezethula kuma-M-Net Movies. 
IMultiChoice ngokusebenzisa uM-Net yethule iziteshi ezimbili zeM-Net zamafilimu / ama-movie, i-Movie Magic 1 ne-Movie Magic 2 ngemuva kosuku kwethulwe insizakalo yesathelayithi ekhokhelwayo yethelevishini iDStv.Ukuze kuhlanganiswe / kwandiswe uhlobo lweM-Net, iziteshi zaqanjwa kabusha ngokulandelana ngokuthi iM-Net Movies 1 neM-Net Movies 2 ngo-2005.Iziteshi ezimbili ezengeziwe zamafilimu, iM-Net Stars neM-Net Movies Action (okwathi lapho yethulwa yathatha isikhundla seM-Net Action (ngaleso sikhathi i-actionX) eyasungulwa ngo-2006), zabuye zamenyezelwa kamuva.Ngo-Okthoba 2012, iziteshi zamafilimu ezedlule zanwetshwa zaba iziteshi eziyisithupha ezahlanganisa amafilimu ngokohlobo oluthile.Lezi ziteshi, kanye ne-Action, Stars neZone ekhona, yenzelwe iziteshi ezingama-movie eziyisishiyagalolunye. 
NgoJuni iM-Net Movies Action yenziwa isiteshi se-HD, yalandelwa iM-Net Movies All Stars, womabili kuphela aseNingizimu ye-Afrika, ngo-Okthoba 2016. 
Kusukela ngomhlaka 1 Septhemba 2020, abakwaM-Net bayeka ukunika amagama eziteshi zabo zama-movie futhi bahamba nohlelo lokubala izinombolo futhi banciphisa inani leziteshi zama-movie kusuka eziteshini ezi-6 kuye kwezingu-4.Ama-M-Net Movies nawo anesici se-Add Movies esivumela ababhalisile abangewona ama-premium ukuthi bakhokhele iziteshi zama-movie ze-premium kubandakanya neziteshi ze-pop-up ezizayo. 
Isiteshi sesikhombisa se- M-Net Movies Showcase ngokuhamba kwesikhathi sakhishwa yi-M-Net ngomhlaka 1 Ephreli 2017 ngenhloso yokwakha iziteshi ezilinganiselwe ze-run-up, ukusakaza amafilimu asukela kulawo alingisa uTom Cruise, uSylvester Stallone noWill Smith .Ngo-1 Juni 2017 kwafakwa iSundance TV.Ngomhlaka 1 Disemba 2017, iM-Net Movies Zone yenziwa yatholakala nge-HD kuyo yonke imizi eyayine-HD decoder ekwaziyo njenge-DStv Explora, HD Decoder, HD PVR futhi yayikuwo wonke amaphakheji we-DStv.IM-Net Movies Zone ukuphela kwesiteshi esidlala kwisevisi yeGOTV ngamaphakeji ayo akwaMax ne-Plus. 
Kusukela ngomhlaka-1 Septhemba 2020, ama-M-Net Movies ayeka ukunikeza amagama eziteshi zawo zama-movie futhi abuyela ekungezeni izinombolo eziteshini eceleni kokunciphisa inani leziteshi zama-movie zaba ezine.Kusukela manje, kuneziteshi ezingama-4 ze-Movie, izinombolo, izimfanelo namaphakheji. 
IZee World iyisiteshi esiyi-English-Bollywood eNingizimu Afrika esethulwe ngomhlaka 3 Febhuwari 2015 futhi sisebenza kuphela kwi- DStv.Iphethe izinhlelo zasekhaya ezivela eNdiya eziqanjwe ngesiHindi nesiMarathi ziye esiNgisini.Lesi siteshi siphethwe yiZee Entertainment Enterprises futhi sinamahhovisi eGoli . 
Kunezinhlobonhlobo zezenzo zocansi ezingangeni.I-Frot iyindlela yokwenza ucansi lowesilisa nowesilisa okuvame ukubandakanya ipipi ngqo -ukuthinta ipipi.Kuyindlela yefulethi. 
I-Frot ingathokozisa ngoba ivuselana futhi ngasikhathi sinye izitho zangasese zabo bobabili abalingani njengoba ijwayele ukukhiqiza ukungezwani okumnandi ngokumelene nesigaxa sezinzwa se-frenulum ngaphansi kwesigaxa sowesilisa ngamunye, ngezansi nje kokuvuleka komchamo kwekhanda lepipi (glans umthondo).Ukuya ocansini ngokobulili kungenye indlela yocansi olungangenisi olungenziwa phakathi kweMSM.Idokodo (ukufakwa kwepipi lowesilisa kwenye ijwabu lenye indoda) kuyenziwa futhi. 
I-MSM ingasebenzisa amathoyizi ocansi . 
Ngokuya ngocwaningo olwenziwa online kwabesilisa abangama-25,294 abazibika ngokuthandana kwabantu bobulili obufanayo noma abesilisa nabesifazane, ama-49.8% asebenzise izidlidliza.Iningi labesilisa abake basebenzisa isidlidlizi esikhathini esedlule babika ukusetshenziswa ngesikhathi sokushaya indlwabu (86.2%).Lapho esetshenziswa ngesikhathi sokusebenzisana okuhlanganyelwe, ama-vibrator afakwa ku-foreplay (65.9%) nasekuhlanganyeleni kocansi (59.4%). 
I-MSM ingahlanganyela ezinhlotsheni ezahlukahlukene zocansi lomlomo, njenge- fallatio, ukugoqa itiye, kanye ne- anilingus.Wellings et al. ibike ukuthi "ukulingana 'kobungqingili' nobulili 'bendunu' phakathi kwamadoda kuvamile kubantu abaqeqeshiwe kanye nabasebenza kwezempilo ngokufanayo," kanti ucwaningo olwenziwa online nge-18,000 MSM eYurophu "lukhombisa ukuthi ucansi lomlomo lwaluvame ukwenziwa, lulandelwe ukushaya indlwabu, ngokuya ocansini endunu endaweni yesithathu. 
"Ucwaningo olwenziwe ngo-2011 yi- The Journal of Sexual Medicine lwathola imiphumela efanayo kwabesilisa base-US abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa nabesifazane.Ukuqabula umlingani emlonyeni (i-74.5%), ubulili bomlomo (i-72.7%), nokushaya indlwabu okuhlukanisiwe (i-68.4%) kwakuyizindlela ezintathu zokuziphatha ezivame kakhulu, nge-63.2% yesampula yokuzibika ngokuziphatha kocansi okuhlanu kuya kwesishiyagalolunye ngesikhathi sokugcina kwabo ukuhlangana. [1] 
Izinhlobo zezifo ezithathelwana ngocansi (STIs) zingavela emisebenzini yezocansi.Ucwaningo lwango-2007 lwabika ukuthi izinhlolovo ezimbili zabantu ezinkulu zathola ukuthi "iningi labesilisa abayizitabane lalinamanani afanayo abantu abenza ucansi olungavikelekile minyaka yonke njengamadoda nabesifazane abaqondile."[1] 
I-Acquired immune deficiency syndrome (i-AIDS) isifo samasosha omzimba womuntu abangelwa igciwane lesandulela-ngculazi (i-HIV).Emhlabeni jikelele, kulinganiselwa ku-5-10% wokutheleleka nge-HIV kungumphumela wamadoda alala nabesilisa.Kodwa-ke, emazweni amaningi aseNtshonalanga, ukutheleleka okuningi kwe-HIV kudluliswa ngabesilisa abalala nabesilisa kunanoma iyiphi enye indlela yokudlulisa.E-United States, amadoda athandana nabesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa abesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa babamba ama-70% okuthola ukuxilongwa kwe-HIV okusha okungu-38 739 ngo-2017.Kubantu abangu-5,164 abatholakala bene-HIV e-UK ngo-2016, ama-54% kwakungamadoda athandana nabesilisa nabesifazane.Lesi sibalo siyancipha eLondon njengoba kwabikwa yiPublic Health England ngo-2017. 
Imikhuba yezocansi yezitabane yimisebenzi yezocansi ehilela abesilisa abalala nabesilisa (i-MSM), kungakhathalekile ukuthi bathanda ini ngokobulili noma ubunikazi bobulili.Le mikhuba ingafaka ucansi lwendunu, ucansi olungangeni, nobulili bomlomo .Ubufakazi bukhombisa ukuthi ucansi phakathi kwamadoda alubikwa kangako ocwaningweni ngenxa yokuchema okufuna umphakathi . 
Ugcunsula budluliselwa busuka komunye nomuntu buye ngokuthintana ngqo nesifo sogcunsula; ikakhulu esithweni sangasese sangaphandle, esithweni sangasese sowesifazane, noma endunu. [1] Ngo-2006, amacala abikiwe angama-64% e-United States ayephakathi kwabesilisa abalala nabesilisa.Ukwanda kwesigcwala se-syphilis phakathi kwe-MSM kubonwe kwezinye izizwe ezithuthukile. 
Ugcunsula onenkontileka unyusa amazinga okungcoliswa yi-HIV futhi okuphambene nalokho, futhi ngokufanele ucwaningo olwenziwe e-US luthole ngempela ukuthi uhhafu we-MSM onegcunsula nawo une-HIV.Olunye ucwaningo olusebenzisa amasampula alula luphethe ngokuthi ukukhuphuka okunjalo kungabangelwa ukukhuphuka kwamanani ocansi ngaphandle kwekhondomu phakathi kweMSM, [2] yize okungenani isifundo esisodwa kusetshenziswa isampula elimele izwe lonke sithole ukuthi amazinga okusetshenziswa kwamakhondomu phakathi kweMSM akhuphukile, awehlile, eminyakeni eyishumi edlule, futhi kube nokwehla okukhulu emvamisa yocansi lwendunu ekuhlanganyeleni ngokocansi okokugcina kwe-MSM esebenzayo. [3] 
Ngokwenhlolovo yase-US, i-HIV, ugcunsula, kanye nezinsumpa zangasese konke kuvame kakhulu kubantu besilisa abasanda kulala nabesilisa (MSM) kunabesilisa abasanda kwenza ucansi nabesifazane (MSW).Ngakolunye uhlangothi, i- herpes yezitho zobulili ayijwayelekile kakhulu phakathi kwe-MSM kunaphakathi kwe-MSW.IChlamydia, i- papillomavirus yomuntu, i- gonorrhea, nezintwala azibonanga mehluko omkhulu kuwo womabili la maqembu. 
Ubungqingili Ubungqingili Ubungqingili besilisa 
Ngokomlando, ucansi lwendunu beluhlotshaniswa kakhulu nobungqingili besilisa kanye neMSM. 
Ama-MSM amaningi, nokho, awazibandakanyi ocansini lwendunu, futhi angazibandakanya ocansini lomlomo, efrijini noma efotweni, noma esikhundleni sokushaya indlwabu.[1] 
Imibiko ephathelene nokusabalala kobulili bendunu phakathi kwe-MSM iye yahluka ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, kanti amanye amaphesenti aphezulu kunamanye.Amaphesenti amakhulu abesilisa abesilisa nabesilisa nabesilisa nabesifazane abenza ukuzibika kwabo ngesikhathi sokuphila kwabo ocansini lwangasese. [1] Ucwaningo phakathi kwamadoda athandana namanye lukhombisile ukuthi amaphesenti ayafana uma kuqhathaniswa amadoda akhetha ukungena kozakwethu kulabo abakhetha ukuba nguzakwethu olalelayo. [1] [2]Abanye besilisa abalala nabesilisa, noma kunjalo, bakholelwa ukuthi ukuba ngumlingani olalelayo ngesikhathi sobulili bendunu kubuza ubudoda babo. 
I- orgasm ifaka phakathi izenzo ezingazibandakanyi, kufaka phakathi ukuphazamiseka kwemisipha ezindaweni eziningi zomzimba, umuzwa ojwayelekile we- euphoric futhi, kaningi, ukunyakaza komzimba nokuzwakalayo.Isikhathi esingemva kwe-orgasm, esaziwa njengesikhathi sokuphikisa, imvamisa siyisikhathi sokuphumula, esenziwa ukukhishwa kwe- neurohormones oxytocin neprolactin. [1]Yize ngokuvamile kubikwa ukuthi abantu besifazane abahlangabezani nesikhathi sokuphika futhi ngenxa yalokho bangathola i-orgasm eyengeziwe (noma ama-orgasms amaningi) ngemuva nje kowokuqala, [1] eminye imithombo ithi abesifazane bayakwazi ukuhlangabezana nesikhathi sokuphikisa ngoba Bangathola umzuzwana ngemuva kwe-orgasm lapho ukuvuselelwa okuqhubekayo kwezocansi kungalethi injabulo. [2] 
Ukushukuma Oral we clitoris noma ezinye izingxenye ngemomozi noma esithweni sangasese liphathelene wayekwenza phakathi kwabesifazane, efana ukushukuma ngomlomo izingono, kungafaka ukusetshenziswa namazinyo ngaphezu ukusetshenziswa izindebe noma ulimi.Ucansi lomlomo olubandakanya ukukhuthazwa kwengquza yowesifazane noma ezinye izingxenye zesitho sangasese sowesifazane noma sangasese kubizwa ngokuthi i- cunnilingus.Ukugqugquzela ngomlomo indunu, okubizwa ngokuthi i- anilingus, akuvamile ukwenziwa. [1] [2] 
Imikhuba yobulili Lesbian kukhona izenzo zobulili ezihilela abesifazane abaya ocansini nabesifazane, kungakhathaliseki yabo ukukhetha olala nabo.Owesifazane olala nomunye wesifazane angakhomba ukuthi ungungqingili uma eheheka abesifazane, noma abesilisa nabesifazane uma engakhangwa ngabesifazane kuphela, noma enikeza ngokuhlonza ngokocansi ngokuphelele. 
Igama elithi ingaphinda ozofakwa kwabobulili noma asexual owesifazane ngubani ungaqiniseki noma ukuhlola ubulili bakhe. 
Zothando noma ngokobulili ubudlelwane obufanele ngokuvamile kuncike isifiso sobulili futhi ukuqhanyelwa, okuyinto ke kuholela umsebenzi wocansi ukukhishwa ngokobulili.Ukuveza ngokomzimba ukusondelana phakathi kwabesifazane kuncike kumongo wobudlelwano kanye nezithonya zenhlalo, zamasiko nezinye. 
Imvamisa, abesifazane bahlanganyela ekuboniseni uthando, njengokuqabula esihlathini noma ukugona.Ukuqabula ezindebeni, ukuqabulana isikhathi eside noma ukugona, noma ezinye izindlela zokuthinta, kungathathwa njengokuya ocansini noma cha.UShere Hite ongumfundisi wezocansi nowesifazane wathi esinye sezifundo zakhe zocwaningo sabhala ukuthi, "Ukuya ocansini nowesifazane kubandakanya: ukuthinta, ukuqabulana, ukumamatheka, ukubukeka uzimisele, ukwangana, ukukhuluma, ukuya ocansini kwedijithali, ukuphulula, ukubheka, i-cunnilingus, ukukhumula, ukukhumbula emuva kwesikhathi, senza imisindo, kwesinye isikhathi siyaluma kancane, kwesinye isikhathi siyakhala, futhi siphefumula futhi sibubula ndawonye. " 
Emkhumula phambi uzakwethu, kokukhipha izingubo umngane noma kokwenza izenzo ukusondelana ngokomzimba, ezifana ukuthintwa uzakwethu sika esishintshashintshayo erogenous ngokusebenzisa izandla, ulimi noma baphumule emlonyeni, kungabhekwa njengokwenzeka izinkomba isifiso sabalingani ngoba umsebenzi wezocansi kanye nesikhuthazo esivusa inkanuko noma ukuvula (ukuvusa inkanuko), okungaveza imizwa evusa inkanuko kubo bobabili abalingani.Ukuvumela izenzo ezinjalo zokusondelana ngokomzimba, ikakhulukazi ukuvusa amabele nezingono zomlingani wakho, kuyinkomba yokuthakasela isenzo socansi. 
Umlomo, izindebe nolimi lowesifazane kungaba yizindawo ezizwelayo ezizwelayo; zivame ukusetshenziswa ngozakwethu phakathi nezigaba zokuqala nakuwo wonke umsebenzi wezocansi, kungaba ngokwanga, ukuncela, ukukhotha noma ikakhulukazi ucansi lomlomo.Ukuvuselelwa kwamabele omlingani, kufaka phakathi ukuvusa izingono ngomlomo noma ngesandla, kuyindlela yokudlala kwangaphambili . Ukukhuthazwa kwamabele nengono kwabesifazane kuyisici esivamile sokwenza ucansi. 
[1] Ukukhuthazeka kwezingono zowesifazane kukhuthaza ukukhiqizwa nokukhululwa kwe- oxytocin neprolactin . [2] Ngesikhathi sokuvuselelwa kwezingono, kukhishwa inani elikhulu le-oxytocin, okungajwayelekile ukulungiselela ibele ukuncela.Ngaphandle kokudala imizwa yomama kowesifazane, kunciphisa nokukhathazeka kwakhe futhi kwandise ukubopha nokwethembana. 
Isibaya kwakuwumdlalo owuchungechunge owenziwa nsuku zonke eNingizimu Afrika owaqala ukwenziwa ngo-2013, owadlala phambili kuMzansi Magic owadalwa ngu-Angus Gibson, Desiree Markgraaff, Teboho Mahlatsi noCatherine Stewart.USiyabonga Thwala uhola abalingisi besilisa njengoba uMpiyakhe Zungu noThembi Nyandeni behola abalingisi besifazane njengoMkabayi "MaNcwane" Zungu. [1] 
Ekuqaleni, idrama yayigxile emindenini yamabhizinisi yamatekisi enamandla eBhubesini: amaZungu, aholwa nguMpiyakhe Zungu ( Siyabonga Thwala ), nomndeni wakwaNdlovu, oholwa nguSamson Ndlovu (Bheki Mkhwane), nezingxabano zabo, izimbangi zabo, usuku nosuku izimpilo kanye nezinkinga ezibazungezile.Bahlanganiswe umshado wezingane zabo ezimbili: uThandeka ( Nomzamo Mbatha ) noS'busiso (Sdumo Mtshali) wamaZungu kanye namaNdlovus, ngokulandelana.Empini yamatekisi kufika enye indoda nomndeni wayo.U-Judas Ngwenya ( Menzi Ngubane ) nonkosikazi wakhe uBeauty Ngwenya (Thuli Thabethe) kanye nezingane zabo uZama Ngwenya (Linda Mtoba) nendodana yakhe nendodana yakhe ayizela kuBeauty wayesebenzela ubaba wakhe futhi ebakhela uzungu ngabo.Indodana kaJudas uQaphela Ngwenya (Abdul Khoza).Bebehlala nonina kaBeauty uLillian Nyandeni (Linda Sebezo) nomshana wakhe uJerry Nyandeni (Charles Phasha).ULillian kamuva washada noSaddam Xaba (Siyatsheni Mdaki) owayeyindoda yesandla sokudla sikaJudas.Kodwa uJudas wabulawa yindodana yakhe uQaphela Ngwenya.
