UNqobile Mansuet Ntuli (owazalwa ngomhlaka 15 Januwari 1996) ungumdlali weHockey waseNingizimu Afrika odlala njengomdlali ophambili weqembu lesizwe laseNingizimu Afrika . 
UNtuli ubeyingxenye yesikwati saseNingizimu Afrika esinqobe i- Africa Cup of Nations yango-2017, okusho ukuthi balungele iNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2018.Ubemele iNingizimu Afrika kuma- Commonwealth Games ka-2018 .Ngo-Okthoba 2018 wakhethwa eqenjini laseNingizimu Afrika elizobamba iNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2018. 
UNqobile Nzuza wayeyisakhamuzi eMarikana Land Occupation eCato Crest, eThekwini, eNingizimu Afrika.Ubeyilungu lenhlangano yezenhlalakahle yabahlali basemjondolo Abahlali baseMjondolo . [1] 
Nkululeko Gwala Ingcindezelo yezepolitiki eNingizimu Afrika yangemva kobandlululo Imibhikisho eNingizimu Afrika 
Ngomhlaka 30 Septhemba 2013, eneminyaka engu-17, uNkz Nzuza wadutshulwa wabulawa ekhanda lakhe ngesikhathi kunombhikisho wokulwa nokukhishwa kwabantu endaweni owawuhlelwe yizakhamizi zaseMarikana. [1] 
Amaphoyisa avumile ukuthi adubule uNzuza, kanye nesinye isakhamuzi esalimala, kodwa asho ukuthi bebezivikela.Abamele Abahlali baseMjondolo bathe yiphutha lamaphoyisa. [1] 
Ukufa kudale impikiswano enkulu. 
Ngesikhathi uBandile Mdlalose evakashele umndeni kaNzuza, waboshwa.Kwakunenqwaba yezincwadi nezitatimende ngalolu daba ngabafundisi abaziwayo baseMelika abanjengoNoam Chomsky [2] noMbhishobhi wase-Anglican uRubin Phillip . [3] 
UChomsky ubhalele iphephandaba iMail & Guardian eGoli kanye nabanye abasayinile, okukhona kubo oSlavoj Zizek, Judith Butler noJohn Holloway.Banxuse uJacob Zuma, uMongameli waseNingizimu Afrika noJames Nxumalo, oyiMeya yendawo ukuthi baqede ukuhlaselwa okunobudlova kwezishoshovu nasemakhaya abo. [1] 
UNkululeko Gwala (owashona ngo-2013) odabuka eNchanga KwaZulu Natal, wayehlala eCato Crest eThekwini futhi engumsekeli weMarikana Land Occupation (eThekwini).Ubuye futhi waba yilungu elivelele lenhlangano yomphakathi yabahlali basemjondolo Abahlali baseMjondolo . [1] [2] 
Abahlali baseMjondolo Umsebenzi Womhlaba WaseMarikana (eThekwini) Nqobile Nzuza Ukubulawa kwabantu kwezepolitiki eNingizimu Afrika ngemuva kobandlululo Ingcindezelo yezepolitiki eNingizimu Afrika yangemva kobandlululo 
UGwala wabulawa ngoJuni 26 2013 ngemuva kokuthi oshayasibhamu abangadalulwanga amagama bavulela ngenhlamvu wadutshulwa amahlandla ayi-12.Lokhu bekulandela umhlangano womphakathi obuyimpikiswano neMeya yeTheku uJames Nxumalo nosihlalo we-ANC esifundeni uSibongeseni Dhlomo lapho uMnu uGwala ekhonjwe njengonenkinga. [2] [3] [4]Abahlali baseMjondolo bathi uDhlomo naye umemezele emhlanganweni ukuthi uMnu Gwala "uzolungiswa". [5] 
Le nhlangano ithi uNkululeko Gwala wabulawa ngokuveza inkohlakalo eCato Crest nokuthi umphakathi uyazi ukuthi ngubani lo oshayasibhamu abathi naye wabulala isishoshovu sezindlu uThembinkosi Qumbelo.Bathi oshayasibhamu bahlotshaniswa nekhansela lendawo le-ANC. [1] [2] 
AmaSulumane akholelwa ukuthi iQuran iyisambulo sokugcina sikaNkulunkulu esintwini, umsebenzi wokuholwa nguNkulunkulu okwembulelwe uMuhammad ngengelosi uGabriyeli . [1] 
Ihlonishwa ngamaSulumane azinikele "njengengcwelengcwele," [1] umsindo wayo oshukumisela abanye "ukukhala nokuthokoza", kuyisimbonakaliso sokholo, umbhalo ovame ukusetshenziswa njengekhubalo ngezikhathi zokuzalwa, ukufa, umshado.Ngenxa yalokho, 
Ngokwesiko kwagcizelelwa kakhulu izingane ukuthi zibambe ngekhanda amavesi angama-6200 + eQuran, labo abaphumelelayo behlonishwa ngesihloko esithi Hafiz."Izigidi nezigidi" zamaSulumane "zibhekisela kwiKoran nsuku zonke ukuze zichaze izenzo zazo futhi zithethelele izifiso zazo," [lower-roman 13] futhi eminyakeni yamuva nje abaningi bakuthatha njengomthombo wolwazi lwesayensi. [1] [2] 
Isambulo kuzimo zamaSulumane nezamaQuran sisho isenzo sikaNkulunkulu sokukhuluma nomuntu ngamunye, ehambisa umyalezo wenani elikhulu labamukeli.Inqubo okufika ngayo umyalezo waphezulu enhliziyweni yesithunywa sikaNkulunkulu yi- tanzil (ukuthumela phansi) noma i- nuzūl (ukwehla).Njengoba iQuran isho, "Ngeqiniso thina (uNkulunkulu) siyithumele phansi futhi ngeqiniso yehlile." [1] 
I-Quran igcizelela njalo embhalweni wayo ukuthi ihlelwe ngokwaphezulu.Amanye amavesi eQuran abonakala esho ukuthi ngisho nalabo abangakhulumi isi-Arabhu bangayiqonda iQuran uma beyifundelwa. [1] I-Quran ibhekisa embhalweni wokuqala obhaliwe, "ithebhulethi elondoloziwe," erekhoda inkulumo kaNkulunkulu nangaphambi kokuba yehliswe. 
AmaSulumane akholelwa ukuthi amagama akhona manje eQuran ahambisana nalokho okwembulelwe uMuhammad, futhi ngokwencazelo yawo yeQuran 15:9, ivikelwe ekonakaleni ("Ngempela, yithina esathumela phansi iQuran futhi impela, Sizoba umnakekeli wayo. ").AmaSulumane abheka iQuran njengesiqondisi, uphawu lobuprofethi bukaMuhammad neqiniso lenkolo. 
AmaShīa akholelwa ukuthi iQuran yaqoqwa futhi yahlanganiswa nguMuhammad ngesikhathi esaphila, kunokuba ihlanganiswe ngu- Uthman ibn Affan.Kukhona okunye ukwehluka endleleni amaShia ahumusha ngayo umbhalo.AmaSulumane awavumelani ngokuthi ngabe iQuran yadalwa yini uNkulunkulu noma ingunaphakade futhi "ayidalwanga."AmaSunni (enza cishe ama-85-90% amaSulumane) abamba ukuthi iQuran ayidalwanga — imfundiso ebikade ingaphikiswa phakathi kwabo amakhulu eminyaka.Shia Twelvers futhi Zaydi, kanye Kharijites -believe Quran yadalwa.Izazi zefilosofi zeSufi zibheka lo mbuzo njengowokufakelwa noma owakhiwe ngokungafanele. 
[3] 
I- surah yokuqala ye-Quran iyaphindwa emithandazweni yansuku zonke nakwezinye izikhathi.Le surah, equkethe amavesi ayisikhombisa, iyona surah ekhulunywa kaningi kakhulu yeQuran: 
Ukuhlonipha umbhalo obhaliwe we-Quran kuyinto ebalulekile yokholo lwenkolo ngamaSulumane amaningi, futhi i-Quran iphathwa ngenhlonipho.Ngokuya ngesiko nencazelo engokoqobo yeQuran 56:79 ("akekho ozothinta kepha labo abahlanzekile"), amanye amaSulumane akholelwa ukuthi kumele ahlanze ngamanzi (Wudu noma Ghusl) ngaphambi kokuthinta ikhophi yeQuran, yize lo mbono ungekho ndawo yonke.Amakhophi we-Quran agugile asongwe ngendwangu agcinwe ngokungapheli endaweni ephephile, angcwatshwe esontweni lamaSulumane noma emathuneni amaSulumane, noma ashiswe nomlotha ungcwatshwe noma usakazeke phezu kwamanzi. 
E-Islam, imikhakha eminingi yezobuhlakani, kufaka phakathi imfundiso yenkolo yamaSulumane, ifilosofi, imfihlakalo kanye nomthetho wezomthetho, ibikhathazekile ngeQuran noma isisekelo sayo ezimfundisweni zayo. [1]AmaSulumane akholelwa ukuthi ukushunyayelwa noma ukufundwa kweQuran kuvuzwa ngemivuzo yaphezulu ehlukahlukene ebizwa nge-ajr, thawab, noma hasanat. 
I-Quran iphinde yaphefumulela ubuciko bamaSulumane futhi ikakhulukazi lokho okubizwa ngokuthi yi-Quranic arts ye- calligraphy kanye nokukhanyisa . [1]I-Quran ayikaze ihlotshiswe ngemifanekiso engokomfanekiso, kepha ama-Qurans amaningi ahlotshiswe kakhulu ngamaphethini wokuhlobisa emaphethelweni ekhasi, noma phakathi kwemigqa noma ekuqaleni kwama-suras.Amavesi amaSulumane avela kweminye imidiya eminingi, ezakhiweni nasezintweni zabo bonke osayizi, njengamalambu ama- mosque, umsebenzi wensimbi, izitsha zobumba kanye namakhasi owodwa we-calligraphy yama- muraqqas noma ama-albhamu. 
Ngokwe-Quran, uNkulunkulu wayexhumana nomuntu futhi wenza intando yakhe yaziwe ngezibonakaliso nezambulo.Abaprofethi, noma 'Izithunywa zikaNkulunkulu', bathola izambulo futhi bazinikezela esintwini.Umlayezo ubufana futhi ubhekiswe kuso sonke isintu."Akukho okushiwo kuwe okungazange kutshelwe izithunywa ngaphambi kwakho, ukuthi inkosi yakho inokuthethelelwa ngokomyalo wayo kanye nesijeziso esibuhlungu kakhulu."Isambulo asiveli ngqo kuNkulunkulu kubaprofethi. 
Izingelosi ezisebenza njengezithunywa zikaNkulunkulu ziletha isambulo saphezulu kubo.Lokhu kuvela 42:51, lapho kubhalwe khona ukuthi: "Akufanele noma ngubani ofayo ukuthi uNkulunkulu akhulume nabo, ngaphandle kwesambulo, noma ngemuva kweveli, noma ngokuthumela isithunywa ukuthi sembule ngemvume yakhe noma yini Uzokwenzenjalo." 
Isazi se-astrophysicist uNidhal Guessoum, ngenkathi egxeka kakhulu izimangalo mbumbulu zesayensi ezenziwe ngeQuran, uqhakambise isikhuthazo sesayensi iQuran esihlinzeka ngokuthuthukisa "umqondo wolwazi." 
Uyabhala:: 174 
I-Qur'an idonsela engcupheni yokuqagela ngaphandle kobufakazi ( Futhi ungalandeli lokho ongenalo ulwazi oluthile ( 17:36) futhi emavesini amaningi ahlukene acela amaSulumane ukuthi afune ubufakazi ( Ithi:Letha ubufakazi bakho uma ngabe uneqiniso 2: 111), kokubili ezindabeni zenkolelo yezenkolo nakwisayensi yemvelo. 
Ku- Sunni Islam, i-degree inezingxenye ezimbili: la ilaha illa'llah (akekho unkulunkulu ngaphandle kuka- Allah ), noMuhammadun rasul Allah ( uMuhammad uyisithunywa sikaNkulunkulu), [1] kwesinye isikhathi okuthiwa yi- degree yokuqala futhi eyesibili degree . [2]Isitatimende sokuqala se-degree saziwa nangokuthi yi- tahlīl. 
Igama muslim ( Arabic , IPA: [ˈMʊslɪm] ; English: / m ʌ z l ɪ m /, /m ʊ z l ɪ m /, /m ʊ s l ɪ m / noma Moslem /m ɒ z l ə m /, /m ɒ s l ə m / ) iyona esithi asebenzayo zesenzo segama elifanayo zazo Islam iyi ngamazwi ibizo, esekelwe triliteral SLM "ukuba wonke, njengoba yayinjalo." [2]A adherent besifazane kuyinto muslima ( Arabic ) (ibuye ihunyushwe ngokuthi "Muslimah" ). 
Isimo sobuningi ngesi-Arabhu yi- muslimūn ( مسلمون ) noma muslimīn ( مسلمين ), futhi okufana nayo njengowesifazane yi- muslimāt ( مسلمات ). 
Igama elijwayelekile esiNgisini lithi "Muslim". 
Igama Mosalman ( Persian , Kungenjalo Mussalman) kuyinto okulingana ezivamile Muslim elisetshenziswa Central kanye naseNingizimu Asia.EsiNgisini kwesinye isikhathi bekubhalwa ukuthi Mussulman futhi sekuyinto yakudala ekusetshenzisweni.Kuze kube okungenani maphakathi nawo-1960, ababhali abaningi abakhuluma isiNgisi basebenzise igama elithi Mohammedans noma Mahometans . 
[1]Yize amagama anjalo ayengahloselwe ukubandlulula, amaSulumane athi lawo magama ayacasula ngoba kuthiwa asho ukuthi amaSulumane akhonza uMuhammad kunokuthi akhulekele uNkulunkulu.Amanye amagama angasasebenzi kanye namaSulumane. 
Kushiwo ku-hadith evela ku-Imam Ali ibn Musa al-Ridha ukuthi uMprofethi wamaSulumane wathi: "UNkulunkulu wadala abaprofethi abayizinkulungwane eziyi-124, engibathandayo kuNkulunkulu, ngasikhathi sinye angiziqhayisi (futhi angibonisi ukuziqhenya) futhi uNkulunkulu wadala amafa ayizinkulungwane eziyi-124, u-Ali ahlonishwa futhi aphakeme kunoNkulunkulu kunabo bonke."I-Qur'an ichaza abaprofethi nezithunywa eziningi ngaphakathi kobuJuda nobuKristu, kanye nabalandeli babo, njengamaSulumane: u-Adam, uNowa, u-Abrahama, u-Ishmayeli, uJakobe, uMose, noJesu nabaphostoli bakhe bonke babhekwa njengamaSulumane iKurani.I-Qur'an ithi la madoda ayengamaSulumane ngoba ayethobela uNkulunkulu, ashumayela umyalezo waKhe futhi agcina izimiso zaKhe, ezibandakanya ukuthandaza, isisa senhliziyo, ukuzila ukudla nokuhambela izindawo ezingcwele.Ngakho-ke, kuSurah 3:52 yeQur'an, abafundi bakaJesu bayamtshela, "Siyakholelwa kuNkulunkulu; futhi ube ngufakazi wethu ukuthi singamaSulumane (wa-shahad be anna muslimūn )."Ngokwenkolelo yamaMuslim, ngaphambi kweKurani, uNkulunkulu wayenikeze iTawrat ( Torah ) kuMose, iZabur ( AmaHubo ) kuDavid ne- Injil ( iVangeli ) kuJesu, bonke ababhekwa njengabaprofethi abangamaSulumane ababalulekile. 
Izwe elinabantu abaningi abangamaSulumane yi-Indonesia, ikhaya lamaSulumane angu-12.7% emhlabeni, elandelwa iPakistan (11.0%), iBangladesh (9.2%), iNigeria (5.3%) neGibhithe (4.9%).Cishe ama-20% amaSulumane emhlabeni ahlala eMiddle East naseNyakatho Afrika. 
Izimbalwa ezincane ezitholakalayo ziyatholakala naseNdiya, eChina, e- Ethiopia, eMelika, e-Australia nasezingxenyeni ezithile zeYurophu.Izwe elinenani eliphakeme kakhulu lamaSulumane azichaza njengengxenye yabantu bawo bonke iMorocco. 
AmaSulumane angaphezu kwama-75-90% angamaSunni.Ihlelo lesibili nelesithathu ngobukhulu, iShia ne- Ahmadiyya, bakha u-10-20%, [23] no-1% ngokulandelana. 
Ngabalandeli ababalelwa ezigidini eziyi-1.8 (2019), cishe ikota yesibalo sabantu emhlabeni,Islam iyinkolo yesibili ngobukhulu futhi ekhula ngesivinini esikhulu emhlabeni ngenxa yeminyaka yobudala kanye nezinga eliphezulu lokuzala kwamaSulumane, [1] ngamaSulumane anezinga le- (3.1) uma kuqhathaniswa nesilinganiso somhlaba esingu- (2.5).Ngokusho kocwaningo olufanayo, ukushintshwa kwezenkolo akunamthelela kubantu baseSulumane, ngoba inani labantu abamukela amaSulumane nalabo abashiya i-Islam cishe lilingana. 
Ucwaningo lwePew Center e2016 luthole ukuthi amaSulumane anesibalo esiphezulu sabalandeli abangaphansi kweminyaka engu-15 (34% yenani lamaSulumane lonke) yanoma iyiphi inkolo enkulu, kuyilapho bangu-7% kuphela abaneminyaka engama-60 + (amaphesenti amancane kunayo yonke inkolo enkulu ).Ngokusho kocwaningo olufanayo, amaSulumane anamazinga aphezulu okuzala (3.1) kunoma yiliphi iqembu elikhulu lenkolo.Ucwaningo luphinde lwathola ukuthi amaSulumane (aboshwe namaHindu ) anezinga eliphansi kakhulu lemfundo ngesilinganiso seminyaka engu-5.6 yokufunda, yize womabili la maqembu enze inzuzo enkulu kakhulu ekufinyeleleni kwezemfundo emashumini eminyaka amuva phakathi kwezinkolo ezinkulu. [1]Cishe ama-36% awo wonke amaSulumane awanayo imfundo esemthethweni, [1] kanti amaSulumane anamazinga aphansi aphansi emfundo ephakeme yanoma yiliphi iqembu lezenkolo elikhulu, kanti ama-8% kuphela aneziqu zokuthweswa iziqu nezokuphothula. 
Isiko lamaSulumane noma isiko lamaSulumane amagama asetshenziswa ukuchaza imikhuba yamasiko ejwayelekile kumaSulumane nakubantu abangamaSulumane ngokomlando.Izinhlobo zokuqala zesiko lamaSulumane, kusukela eRashidun Caliphate kuya esikhathini sokuqala se- Umayyad, kwakungu- Arabhu kakhulu, iByzantine, iPersian neLevantine .Ngokwanda okusheshayo kwemibuso yamaSulumane, isiko lamaSulumane lithonye futhi lafaka okuningi emasikweni asePheresiya, eGibhithe, eCaucasian, eTurkic, eMongolia, eSouth Asia, eMalay, eSomalia, eBerber, e- Indonesia, naseMoro . 
AmaSulumane ( Arabic ) ngabantu abalandela noma abenza i- Islam, inkolo ka -Abraham monotheistic. 
Ukutholwa kwe- "Muslim" kusuka egameni lesi- Arabhu elisho ukuthi "ozithoba (kuNkulunkulu)".AmaSulumane cabanga Quran, abo incwadi engcwele, ukuba izwi izwi nezwi ka Nkulunkulu njengoba ivezwe Islamic umprofethi isithunywa Muhammad.Iningi lamaSulumane libuye lilandele izinhlobo zalo zokuhlanganiswa ezithi ziyizimfundiso nemikhuba kaMuhammad ( sunnah ) njengoba kubhaliwe kuma-akhawunti wendabuko ( hadith ). 
Kusukela ngo-2015, ama-1.8 billion noma cishe ama-24.1% omhlaba wonke angamaSulumane.Ngokwephesenti labantu sebonke esifundeni abazibheka njengamaSulumane, ama-91% eMiddle East - eNyakatho Afrika ( MENA ),81% e- Asia Ephakathi,[1] 65% eCaucasus,40% eSoutheast Asia, [2] 31% eSouth Asia,30% e- Sub-Saharan Africa,25% e- Asia nase- Oceania bebonke,cishe ama-6% eYurophu, no-1% emazweni aseMelika. 
Iningi lamaSulumane lingelinye lamahlelo amabili; ISunni (75-90%) [1] neShia (12-17%).Cishe ama-12% amaSulumane ahlala e- Indonesia, izwe elikhulu kunawo lonke elinamaSulumane amaningi;31 % amaSulumane ahlala eSouth Asia,inani elikhulu lamaSulumane emhlabeni; 20 % eMiddle East – North Africa,lapho kuyinkolo evelele khona;no-15% e -Afrika eseNingizimu yeSahara.AmaSulumane angabaningi kakhulu e- Asia Ephakathi, [2] iningi laseCaucasus futhi asabalele eNingizimu-mpumalanga ye-Asia . [3]I-India yizwe elinabantu abaningi abangamaSulumane ngaphandle kwamazwe amaningi amaSulumane.Imiphakathi emikhulu yamaSulumane nayo iyatholakala emazweni aseMelika, eChina naseYurophu.[4]I-Islam iyinkolo enkulu ekhula ngokushesha emhlabeni. 
Ukuze ube ngumSulumane futhi uguqukele enkolweni yobuSulumane, kubalulekile ukukhuluma iShahada, enye yezinsika ezinhlanu zobuSulumane, isimemezelo sokholo nokwethembela ukuthi kukhona uNkulunkulu oyedwa kuphela (u- Allah ) nokuthi uMuhammad uyisithunywa sikaNkulunkulu.Isitatimende esibekiwe esivame ukufundwa ngesi-Arabhu: ašhadu ʾal-lā ʾilāha ʾillā-llhuhu wa ʾašhadu ʾanna muħammadan rasūlu-llh ( أشهد أن لا إله إلا الله وأشهد أن محمداً رسول الله "Ngiyafakaza ukuthi akekho unkulunkulu [ofanelwe ukukhonzwa] ngaphandle kuka-Allah, futhi uMuhammad uyisithunywa sika-Allah." 
Ngo ubuKristu izibalo ubhekwa njengomuntu abaprofethi yilezo agaguliwe ku iTestamente Elidala kanye neTestamente Elisha.Kukholakala ukuthi abaprofethi bakhethwa futhi babizwa nguNkulunkulu. 
Uhlu oluyinhloko olungezansi luqukethe kuphela labo bantu abachazwe ngokusobala njengabaprofethi, kungaba ngesitatimende esicacile noma ngokunamandla kokuqukethwe, (isb Ababhali abasikiwe bezincwadi ezibalwe njengabaprofethi abakhulu nabaprofethi abancane ) kanye nokubhekisela kweBhayibheli kubo Ihhovisi. 
Uhlu lwesibili luqukethe labo bantu ababhalwe njengabanokuhlangenwe nakho okungumbono noma okungokwesiprofetho, kepha ngaphandle komlando wanoma yikuphi ukubizwa okungokwesiprofetho okukhulu noma okungaguquguquki.Uhlu lwesithathu luqukethe abaprofethi abangashiwo ngamagama.Uhlu lwesine lunamagama alabo abachazwe eBhayibhelini njengabaprofethi, kepha bavezwa njengabawusebenzisa kabi lesi sipho noma njengabakhohlisayo. 
Izinhlu ezimbili zokugcina ziphathelene nabantu abathiwe ngemuva kweBhayibheli abalandelwa ngamanye amaKristu (kodwa hhayi wonke).Uhlu lokugcina luqukethe abantu abalandelwa ngemuva kweBhayibheli abathathwa njengabaprofethi kanye nabantu ababephila emuva kweBhayibheli abathi babebona noma babona isiprofetho. 
U-Aaron Ahiya Encwadi YamaKhosi 1 Kings 11.29 U-Amose (Omunye wabaProfethi Abancane Abangu-12) Agabu ( Imisebenti Yebaphostoli 11:27–28 ) U-Azariya ( 2 IziKronike 15:1–8 ) 
Lesi sigaba esabantu abathathwa njengabaprofethi ebuKristwini, kepha hhayi ubuJuda.Abantu ababhekwa njengabaprofethi ebuJudeni nasebuKristwini batholakala kusigaba esingezansi: 
U-Ann Bathurst wayengumprofethi futhi eyilungu leqembu lamaNgisi eliphikisayo lekhulu le-17, iPhiladelfiya Society . 
Akukho okuningi okwaziwayo ngomndeni kaBathurst, futhi okwaziwayo kungenxa yedayari yakhe enemiqulu emibili ebhala isikhathi esivela ku-1679 kuya ku-1696.Le dayari ibanjelwe eBodleian Library, e-Oxford. 
[1]Kubonakala sengathi uBathurst wayevela emkhayeni ongokwenkolo, futhi idayari yakhe iqala ngokulandisa ngokuphila kwakhe okuchaza umthandazo womndeni nokufundwa kweBhayibheli. 
Ngo-1697, abasePhiladelfiya babehlangana endlini kaBathurst eBaldwin Gardens, eLondon njalo ngeSonto, lapho ayehlala khona noJoanna Openbridge.Leli qembu liyaziwa ukuthi lalinemibono yeminyaka eyizinkulungwane eziyinkulungwane, kanti iBathurst yakhiqiza imibono engokwesiprofetho eyaholela 'ekumeleleni, okubandakanya nabesifazane imfundiso yenkolo eyimfihlakalo'.Wayebhekwa njengomuntu ongalandela uJane Leade owahola leli qembu kwaze kwaba sekufeni kwakhe ngo-1704.Lokhu kwavinjelwa ukufa kukaBathurst uqobo ngesikhathi esifanayo. 
Ngo-Ephreli 1652, uHatfield wagula ngohlobo lwe- catalepsy . 
Wakhubazeka, waba yimpumputhe, waba yisithulu futhi waba yisimungulu.Lokhu kwaphela izinsuku eziyishumi nesikhombisa.Lapho elulama waqala "ukuzulazula" ngezihloko zenkolo futhi waqala ukucaphuna imibhalo.Lokho akusho kwabhalwa nguJohn noPeter, izingoma zika- Edward Rodes, nenye indoda okwakuthiwa nguJohn Cromwell.Ngo-8 Septhemba 1652 waba isimungulu futhi.Wahlala eyisimungulu kwaze kwaba ngumhla ziyisi-7 kuZibandlela ngo-1652.Nokho, ukululama kwakhe kwesibili akuzange kube nezikhathi ezingokwesiprofetho. 
[1] 
Ngo-1653, umalume wakhe,uJames Fisher, owasungula isonto lokuqala laseHabe eSheffield, eNgilandi, wabhala incwadi ngeHatfield nangengxoxo yakhe engokwesiprofetho ebizwa nge- The Wise Virgin.Le ncwadi ibithengwa kakhulu futhi iphinde yashicilelwa kaningi. [2] 
UJarlath ubonakala kafushane njengomuntu ovelele ezinsukwini zasendulo zase-Ireland Lives of St Brendan waseClonfert. 
[1]UBrendan kuthiwa uvakashele eConnacht eyofunda ngaphansi kweJarlath yodumo.Ngelinye ilanga, lapho uJarlath esemdala, uBrendan weluleka umeluleki wakhe ukuba ashiye isikole futhi ahambe ngenqola esanda kwakhiwa kuze kuphuluke imiphongolo yayo emibili yangemuva, ngoba kuzoba khona indawo yokuvuswa kwakhe (esséirge) naleyo yabaningi emva kwakhe.Ngenxa yokuthi uJarlath wavuma ubuNkulunkulu nokuhlakanipha okuphezulu komfundi wakhe, wathi "ngithathe ngikusebenzele kuze kube phakade naphakade", wasamukela ngenjabulo iseluleko sakhe.Uhambo lwakhe aluzange lumuse kude kakhulu, njengoba imiphongolo yaphuka eTuaim da Ghualann ("Indunduma yamahlombe amabili"), okungukuthi, eTuam. 
UJohn Colgan udwebe imemori yosanta ku- Acta Sanctorum Hiberniae yakhe (1645).UJarlath kuthiwa wafunda ngaphansi kukaSt Benignus eKilbennen, umfundi waseSt Patrick. 
Ngemva kwalokho, yena wasungula esigodlweni sakhe sokuqala ngesikhathi Cluainfois ( Cloonfush ), eduze Tuam, kuyilapho esihlalweni zakhe eziyinhloko kwaba khona ngesikhathi Tuam.Isikole sakhe sezindela kuthiwa sidonse izazi ezivela kuzo zonke izingxenye ze- Ireland, kubalwa abafundi abanjengoSt Brendan wase- Ardfert noSanta Colman waseCloyne.Ngokubaluleka kwegama lendawo iTuam, isikhundla sikaDonall Mac Giolla Easpaig : 
"waba ngowokuqala kwigama lendawo uTuaim Dá Ualann / Ghualann wabhekisa endaweni yokungcwaba yobuqaba efana naleyo eyabekwa isigaba sesibili seCluain Fearta (bheka uClonfert ).Uma kunjalo uTuam unikeza esinye isibonelo sesonto lokuqala elakhiwa noma ngasendaweni engaphambi kobuKristu engcwele. " [1] 
Ngaphandle kokuduma kwakhe, uJarlath washiya iCloonfush wayofunda ngaphansi kukaSanta Enda wase-Aran cishe eminyakeni engama-495.Ngawo-520s, wathatha umhlalaphansi waya eTuam.Ukhethe uTuam ngoba isondo lenqola yakhe laphuka lapho.UJarlath ufakiwe ohlelweni lwesibili lwabangcwele base-Ireland, okusho ukuthi kumele ngabe waphila ngaphambi konyaka ka-540. 
Inkondlo enikezwe uCuimmín waseCoindeire, nayo ekhonjwe ku-Ó Cléirigh's Martyrology of Donegal, ithi uJarlath wayaziwa ngokupha nangokuzinikela emthandazweni (" izinkulumo ezingamakhulu amathathu njalo ebusuku, namakhulu amathathu okuxubana nsuku zonke"). [1] [2]KuMartyrology of Donegal, ubizwa ngokuthi wayebikezele amagama alabo abazomlandela, kufaka phakathi lawo ababhishobhi abathathu 'abaqamba amanga' kanye noMáel oyedwa. [1]Ngokufanayo, wakhe hagiography ku "Omkhulu Synaxaristes leSonto Lobu-Orthodox" amarekhodi ngenxa yakhe enkulu ukuzila nokuzinikela emthandazweni wanikezwa niprofethe . 
Usuku lomkhosi kaSanta Jarlath ngumhla ziyi-6 kuNhlangulana, okuwusuku okuhunyushelwa ngalo izinsalela zakhe esontweni elakhiwe ngokukhethekile ngokuhlonishwa kwakhe eduze kweCathedral yaseTuam.Isidumbu sayo abangu limbozwe a ingcwele esiliva, okuvela kulo ibandla langekhulu le-13 wathola igama Teampul na scrín, okusho "isonto shrine", a vicarage esiphakade united kuya prebend ka Kilmainemore e 1415. [1] Encwadini eyengezwe kuFélire Óengusso nakwamanye ama-martyrologies, usuku lomkhosi kaJarlath lwaqoshwa ngomhlaka 25 noma 26 kuDisemba. [3] [4] [5] 
Umgubho wokuqala wase-St Jarlath owawuseTuam, owawuhlelwe yiqembu lomphakathi i-Energize Tuam, wahlelwa ngoMgqibelo mhlaka-7 Juni 2008.Lokhu kufaka phakathi umncintiswano / umbukiso ovela eTuam Cathedral emigwaqweni yedolobha, umncintiswano wobuciko wesikole wokuqwashisa ngefa elingcwele namasiko endawo, kanye nokuzijabulisa emigwaqweni. 
USt Jarlath Road, umgwaqo ohlala eCabra eDublin 7 ubizwa ngegama lakhe. 
A lesifunda e Oakland, California e-United States nowodwa Yarragon, Australia ezibizwa ngegama lakhe. 
I-Saint Jarlath , owaziwa nangokuthi u- Iarlaithe mac Loga ( ngekhulu le-6), wayengumpristi wase-Ireland futhi eyisazi esivela eConnacht, ekhunjulwa njengomsunguli weSikole sezindela saseTuam kanye ne- Archdiocese yaseTuam,usanta ongumxhasi.Ayikho impilo yangenkathi ephakathi kaJarlath esekhona, kepha imithombo yempilo yakhe nenkolo yakhe ifaka izinhlu zozalo, ukufel 'ukholo, i-Irish Lives yaseSt Brendan yaseClonfert, kanye ne-biography ehlanganiswe nguJohn Colgan ngekhulu le-17. 
Jarlath ka Tuam kuthiwa ingeyamakhosi Conmhaícne, abusa khona ingxenye enkulu ukuthi ungaba wendawo ye Tuam. [1] [2]Omunye usanta kuthiwa wayengowaseDál Fiatach empumalanga ye- Ulster . [1]Uhlonzwa njengoMbhishobhi wesithathu wase-Armagh, kungemuva kwendlalifa kaPatrick uBenignus kanye no- Annals wase-Ulster no- Innisfallen baqopha ukufa kwakhe ngonyaka ka-481. 
Ngenxa yengozi enkulu nokungaqiniseki, ochwepheshe bezokwelapha ngokuvamile bayangabaza ukukhuliswa kwe-penile futhi bayakugwema ukukuzama. [1]Ucwaningo lwango-2019 ekubuyekezweni kwemithi yezocansi luthole ukuthi izindlela zokuhlinza zokwandiswa kwepenisi ngokuvamile azisebenzi futhi zingalimaza impilo yomzimba nengqondo.Ababhali bathole ukuthi lezi zindlela zokwelapha zisekelwa ubufakazi obuncane, obusezingeni eliphansi. . . 
Imijovo nokuhlinzwa kufanele kuhlale kuyindlela yokugcina, kubhekwe njengokungekho emthethweni ngaphandle kwezilingo zomtholampilo '".Ngokwalolu cwaningo, "" imiphumela yokwelashwa isiyonke ibingemihle, enamanani aphansi okweneliseka kanye nobungozi obukhulu bezinkinga ezinkulu, kubandakanya ukukhubazeka kwe-penile, ukunciphisa, kanye nokungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile ". [2] 
Amaphilisi okwandisa umthondo, amachashazi nezigcobo athengiswa ku-inthanethi.Imikhiqizo enjalo ngokuvamile ibhekwa njengengasebenzi. [1] 
Amasu omzimba afaka amadivayisi wokunweba, izisindo ezilengayo, nengcindezi ye-vacuum.Kukhona nokugqagqana okuphawulekayo phakathi kwamasu ahlose ukukhulisa ipipi namasu ahloselwe ukufeza ezinye izinhloso, ezihlobene nokuguqula ubuthakathaka, ukwandisa isikhathi sokuqina, noma ukukhulisa uvuthondaba lwezocansi. 
[1] [2]Ama-VED avunyelwe ngokwelashwa, aphatha ukungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile, anciphisa ingcindezi enkulu, kanti amaphampu athengwa kakhulu ngabathengi abafuna ukukhuliswa kwepipi angafinyelela kwingcindezi eyingozi, alimaze izicubu zepipi. [3]Ukugcina i-tumescence ngemuva kokuphula uphawu lwedivayisi olungangeni moya, umuntu kufanele aqinise isisekelo sepipi, kepha ukuminyaniswa okugqoke imizuzu engama-30 kungalimaza unomphela futhi kubangele ukungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile. [4]Yize i-vacuum therapy ingaphatha ukungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile ngokwanele ukuvimbela ukuwohloka kwepenisi nokuncipha, [2] izivivinyo zomtholampilo azikutholanga kusebenza ekwandisweni kwepipi. 
UkuJelqa 
Igama elihunyushiwe elithi "jelqing" yifomu elonakele elisuselwa ku- Persian jalq zadan ( جلق زدن ), jalq okusho ukuthi "ukushaya indlwabu" kulandelwa isenzo esisizayo esithi zadan esisho "ukushaya, ukushaya noma ukushaya".Yenziwe engxenyeni yomthondo yesisu esezingeni eliphakathi nendawo, i-jelqing ukukhohlisa okwenziwa ngesandla ngokukhama ngasikhathi sinye nokuphulula ishafula kusuka kusisekelo kuye ku- corona .Ebizwa nangokuthi "ukusenga", le ndlela inemvelaphi yasendulo yama-Arabhu. 
[1] Yize kunemibiko eminingi yempumelelo, ubufakazi bezokwelapha abukho. Izintatheli ziyichithile le ndlela ngokuthi ayinakuphikiswa, [2] noma ingenakwenzeka, yize kungeke kulimaze kakhulu ipipi.Noma kunjalo, uma kwenziwa ngokweqile noma ngokhahlo, i-jelqing kungenzeka ibangele ukuqhekeka, ukusikeka, ukuwohloka kobuntu, kanye nokususa ukungabi nathemba. [3] 
Ukukhuliswa komthondo, noma ukuqiniswa kowesilisa, yinoma iyiphi inqubo ehlose ukukhulisa usayizi wepipi lomuntu.Ezinye izindlela sinqophe ekungezeleleni obuphelele Imininingwane, abanye girth shaft, futhi okwamanje abanye glans ngosayizi.Amasu zihlanganisa ukuhlinzwa, izakhamzimba, yokugcoba, nezimagqabhagqabha, nazo izindlela ngokomzimba efana ukudonsa, jelqing, futhi traction. 
Ukudonswa ngamandla kuyindlela engeyona eyokuhlinza umthondo ngokusebenzisa imishini edonsa ubukhazikhazi benduku isikhathi eside.Kusukela ngo-2013, iningi locwaningo oluphenya ukusetshenziswa kwe-penile traction ligxile ekwelapheni ukugobeka nokuncipha kwepipi ngenxa yesifo sikaPeyronie, yize ezinye izincwadi zikhona ngemiphumela emadodeni ane-penises emfushane. [1] 
Ubufakazi besayensi busekela ukunwebeka okuthile ngokudonsa isikhathi eside. [1]Kodwa-ke, kukhona nezifundo zobudokotela ezikhomba ukuthi imiphumela yokwelula inganakwa. [2] 
Amanye amadoda afuna ukukhuliswa kwepenisi anezitho zobulili ezijwayelekile, futhi abaningi bangathola i- penile dysmorphophobia ngokubukela phansi usayizi wabo wepenisi ngenkathi beqhakambisa usayizi wepenisi omaphakathi. 
[1]Amanye amadoda angafuna ipenisi enkulu ukukhulisa izimpilo zabo zocansi, noma ngabe ipipi labo limaphakathi noma lingaphezulu kwesilinganiso vele.Abantu bangahle bathande ukukhulisa usayizi wabo wepenisi uma benesibungu sezitho ezinkulu zobudoda.Ipipi elikhudlwana lingadlala naku- BDSM naku- S & M, ngendoda evelele ngenhloso yokuba nepipi elikhulu lokuzwisa umlingani walo ubuhlungu ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini. 
Ngo-2013 eVietnam, amadoda amaningi aseVietnam azama ukukhulisa imithondo yawo ngokujova i-liquid silicone kuwo.Babelaliswe esibhedlela ngenxa yezinkinga ezifana nokutheleleka, i- necrosis, izicubu, ukuvuvukala, ukukhubazeka nokungasebenzi kahle kwezocansi. 
Izindlela zokukhulisa i-penis zingasebenza; kodwa-ke, izindlela ezinjalo zinezingcuphe zezinkinga futhi azikhonjiswa ngokwezokwelapha ngaphandle kwezimo ezibandakanya i-micropenis.Izindlela ezingezona ezokuhlasela zithole ucwaningo oluncane lwesayensi, futhi iningi alinabo ubufakazi besayensi bokusebenza. 
Kodwa-ke, ubufakazi obulinganiselwe besayensi busekela ukunwetshwa okuthile ngokudonsa isikhathi eside. [1] Eminye imikhiqizo yowaka bodokotela ingathuthukisa ukwakhiwa kwepenisi, iphazanyiswe abathengi ngokukhuliswa kwepipi. 
Ukunciphisa umthondo Isifo sikaPeyronie I - plastic surgery Ukunwetshwa kwezicubu 
Kunezindlela zokwelapha zokwandisa umthondo eziningi, iningi lazo elinobungozi bezinkinga ezinkulu.Izinqubo zabadokotela abahlinzayo abangenazo izincwadi zingaholela ezinkingeni ezinkulu. 
Izindlela zokukhulisa i-penis zihlanganisa ukufaka i-penile augmentation kanye ne- suspensory ligament release . 
Ukwandiswa kwePenile kubandakanya ukufaka amaseli anonile endondeni noma ekuhlanganiseni amangqamuzana anamafutha ethangeni.Ukujova amangqamuzana anonile endondeni kungadala ukuvuvukala nokukhubazeka; kwezinye izimo, ukususwa kwenduku kungadingeka.Ukuxhunyelelwa kwamaseli anonile epeni kungasebenza; kodwa-ke, ukwanda kosayizi kunganyamalala ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.Ukukhishwa kwe-ligament okusolisayo kukhulisa ubude benduku ye-flaccid, kepha akubukhulisi ubude benduku eqondile futhi kungadala izinkinga ngomsebenzi wezocansi. 
I- American Urological Association (AUA) kanye ne-Urology Care Foundation "babheka umjovo ongena ngamakhemikhali okhulisa i-penile girth njengenqubo engakhonjisiwe ukuthi iphephile noma iyasebenza.I-AUA futhi ibheka ukuhlukaniswa kwesigaxa somthondo esisolisayo sokwandisa ubude be-penile kubantu abadala njengenqubo engakhonjisiwe ukuthi iphephile noma iyasebenza."Zombili lezi zitatimende zashicilelwa okokuqala ngoJanuwari 1994 futhi zaqinisekiswa kabusha kusukela lapho. [1]Izinkinga ezivela ezinkambisweni zokukhulisa i-penis zifaka phakathi isibazi esingaholela, ekugcineni, ekunciphiseni kwepenisi noma ukungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile . 
Ezinye izindlela zokwelashwa zifaka umjovo wama-dermal fillers, i- gel abicah, noma i- PMMA .[1] [2]Ama-Dermal fillers nawo awavunyelwe yi-US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) ukuthi asetshenziswe endodeni. 
Izinkolo eziningi ziveze imibono yazo ngokwamukelekayo ukudliwa njengendlela yokudakwa kwezinhloso zokomoya, zokuzijabulisa noma zokwelapha.Izinto ezisebenza ngengqondo nazo zingadlala indima enkulu ekuthuthukiseni inkolo nemibono yezenkolo kanye nasemicikilishweni. 
Ku- Vedas, kusetshenziswa igama elifanayo elithi soma ekuphuzeni, esitshalweni, nakunkulunkulu waso. 
Ukuphuza isoma kuveza ukungafi ( Amrita, Rigveda 8.48.3).I-Indra ne- Agni bavezwa njenge-soma eqothulayo ngobuningi. 
Ezinganekwaneni ze-vedic, u-Indra waphuza kakhulu isoma ngenkathi elwa nedimoni lenyoka iVritra Ukusetshenziswa kwesoma ngabantu kufakazelwa kahle enkambisweni yamaVeda. 
Encwadini ethi Inside the Neolithic Mind, ababhali, abavubukuli uDavid Lewis-Williams noDavid Pearce bathi izidakamizwa ze-hallucinogenic zakha isisekelo senkolo ye-neolithic nobuciko be-rock.Imikhuba nezithombe ezifanayo zitholakala kubantu bomdabu "benkathi yamatshe" yangaleso sikhathi eNingizimu Melika besebenzisa yaje. 
KubuBuddha i-Right View ( samyag-dṛṣṭi / sammā-diṭṭhi ) nayo ingahunyushwa ngokuthi "umbono ofanele", "umbono ofanele" noma "ukuqonda okulungile", iyindlela efanele yokubuka impilo, imvelo, nomhlaba njengoba kunjalo zingezethu ngempela. 
Ukuqonda ukuthi iqiniso lethu lisebenza kanjani.Kusebenza njengesizathu lapho othile eqala ukuprakthiza indlela.Ichaza izizathu zobukhona bethu njengomuntu, ukuhlupheka, ukugula, ukuguga, ukufa, ukubakhona kokuhaha, inzondo, nokukhohlisa.Ukubuka kwesokudla kunikeza ukuqondiswa nokusebenza kwezinye izinto eziyisikhombisa zendlela. 
Kuqala ngemiqondo nolwazi lokuphakanyiswa, kepha ngokwenza umkhuba wokuhlunga okulungile, kancane kancane kudluliselwa ekuhlakanipheni, okungaqeda izibopho zengqondo.Ukuqonda kombono ofanele kuzogqugquzela umuntu ukuthi aphile impilo enhle ngokuhambisana nombono ofanele.Emigqeni kaPāli neyamaShayina, kuchazwa kanjena: 
Indlela yokuziphilisa efanele ( samyag-ājīva / sammā-ājīva ).Lokhu kusho ukuthi odokotela akufanele bahlanganyele kwezentengiselwano noma emisebenzini, eqondile noma engaqondile, eholela ekulimaleni kwezinye izidalwa eziphilayo. 
Izinhlobo ezinhlanu zamabhizinisi okungafanele zenziwe: 
Ngokomthetho wesihlanu wePancasila, amaBuddha enzelwe ukuthi angagwemi kunoma yiluphi inani "lweziphuzo ezivutshiwe noma ezifakiwe" ezingavimbela ukucabanga noma zibangele ukunganakwa. [1]Ku- Pali Tipitaka umyalo ukhathazeke ngokusobala ngophuzo oludakayo : 
"Ngibophezela emthethweni wokuqeqesha ukuthi ngingaziphuzi iziphuzo ezinomvubelo ezibangela ukunganakwa." 
Ngokuvamile, iningi lamaBuddha kanye namahlelo amaBuddhist ayasola futhi ngokomlando akwamukelanga ukusetshenziswa kwanoma iziphi izidakwa ngumuntu othathe imiyalo emihlanu.Iningi lamaBuddha likubheka ukusetshenziswa nokuxhashazwa kwezidakwa njengesithiyo ekukhuleni kwengqondo ekhanyiselwe.Kodwa-ke, kunokwehluka okumbalwa komlando nezimfundiso. 
Izikole eziningi zanamuhla zamaBuddhist zikukhuthaze kakhulu ukusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa zengqondo zanoma yiluphi uhlobo; kodwa-ke, kungenzeka zingavinjelwa kuzo zonke izimo kuwo wonke amasiko.Amanye amahlelo obuBuddhism be-tantric noma i-esoteric ikakhulukazi abonisa lokhu kokugcina, imvamisa esebenzisa izindlela ezinekhono : 
Isibonelo, njengengxenye yesiko le- ganachakra tsok (kanye neHoma, abhisheka futhi kwesinye isikhathi idrubchen ) amanye amaBuddhist aseTibet neBönpos aziwa ngokudla utshwala obuncane bezinhlamvu (obubizwa ngokuthi i- amrit noma i- amrita ) njengomnikelo.Uma ilungu lingumlutha wotshwala, noma ngenxa yesinye isizathu lingafisi ukubamba iqhaza ekuphuzeni umnikelo wotshwala, khona-ke lingacwilisa umunwe otshwaleni bese libu-flick kathathu njengengxenye yomcimbi . 
Amrita futhi mhlawumbe iyafana, noma okungenani ngomqondo othile a esuselwe nekutfutfuka kwelizinga lekucabanga wamaHindu lasendulo soma.(Lesi sakamuva izazi-mlando esivame ukulingana no- Amanita muscaria noma esinye isikhunta se- Amanita psychoactive. 
UCrowley (1996) uthi: 
"Ngokungangabazeki, ukufana okuphawulekayo phakathi" Kwenganekwane kaChakdor "nenganekwane yamaHindu yemvelaphi yesoma kubonisa ukuthi amrita amaBuddha nesoma lamaHindu ngesinye isikhathi kwaqondwa ukuthi ayefana.Ngaphezu kwalokho, impahla eyinhloko ye-amrita, kuze kube namuhla, ibonwa ngamaBuddha njengohlobo lokudakwa, kepha ngokomfanekiso lokhu kuchazwa kungachazwa.Kungani enye ubhiya (i- chhang yaseTibetan, "ubhiya webhali") ingasetshenziswa ngama-yogino njengengxenye engokomfanekiso ye-amrita [Ardussi]? 
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, enye kungani le bDud.rTsi eside ingasetshenziswa njengendlela emagama lafanako esankondlo emelela ubhiya ? 
Ezinye izazi ziphakamise ukuthi izinkolo zasendulo zamaGrikhi zasebenzisa ama- entheogen, afana neKykeon enkabeni yezimfihlakalo ze -Eleusinian, ukwenza umbono noma isimo sokuphupha.Ucwaningo olwenziwe nguJohn R. Hale, uJelle Zeilinga de Boer, uJeffrey P. Chanton kanye noHenry A. Spiller lukhombisa ukuthi iziphrofetho zeDelphic Oracle zashiwo ngabaPristikazi ngaphansi kwethonya lomhoshana wegesi okhishwe emhlabathini.Okutholakele kwabo kushicilelwe ku Ukubuza i-Delphic Oracle: Ukubuka konke / i-Tale edakisayo . 
Umonki wacabanga ngaphakathi kwakhe, " awu, impela uma ngiyoyibulala imbuzi ngizobe ngidala ukuhlupheka okukhulu ngoba umuntu ophilayo uzofa.Uma ngilala nowesifazane lapho-ke ngiyobe ngiphule esinye isifungo esikhulu sendela futhi ngokuqinisekile ngizolahleka ezindleleni zomhlaba. 
Okokugcina, uma ngiphuza ubhiya mhlawumbe akukho monakalo omkhulu ozovela futhi ngizodakwa isikhashana, futhi okubaluleke kakhulu ngizozilimaza mina kuphela. 
"(Ngokomongo wendaba lesi sibonelo sibaluleke kakhulu kuye ngoba izindela eMahayana naseVajrayana zizama ukuletha ukukhanyiselwa kwazo zonke izidalwa ezinemizwa njengengxenye yenhloso yazo. ) 
Ngakho indela yaphuza inkomishi kabhiya yabe isidakwa kakhulu.Ekudakweni kwakhe wahlaba imbuzi walala nowesifazane, wephula zonke izifungo ezintathu futhi, okungenani emehlweni akhe, wenza okubi okukhulu emhlabeni.Isifundo sale ndaba senzelwe ukuthi, okungenani ngokwamasiko lapho ichaza khona, utshwala budala ukuthi umuntu aphule zonke izithembiso zakhe, ngomqondo wokuthi umuntu angathi yimbangela yazo zonke ezinye izenzo eziyingozi. 
I Vajrayana uthisha Drupon Thinley Ningpo Rinpoche akushilo ukuthi njengengxenye iziyalezo ezinhlanu lapho layperson ukulungisa abaphephela, ukuthi nakuba kufanele uyeke intoxicants ukuthatha, bangase baphuze ngokwanele ngakho njengoba musa badakwe.Bhikkus futhi Bhikkunis (izindela nezindela, ngokulandelana), ngakolunye uhlangothi, asebethathe izifungo eziyishumi njengengxenye abaphephela beba sezizonke, awukwazi imbibe yisiphi isamba Utshwala lezinye izidakamizwa ke, ngaphandle imithi kuthathwe njengoba imithi. 
Kunobufakazi obuthile bokuthi ephathelene nokusetshenziswa deliriant Datura imbewu (eyaziwa ngokuthi candabija) e Dharmic Rituals elihlobene ne eziningi tantras - okuyi Vajramahabhairava, Samputa, Mahakala, Guhyasamaja, Tara futhi Krsnayamari tantras - kanye insangu nezinye entheogens e esizweni esincane Vajrayana sanghasURonald M Davidson uthi eNdiya Vajrayana, iDatura kwaba: 
Incwadi enesihloko esithi Zig Zag ZenBuddhism and Psychedelics (2002), ichaza umlando wobuBuddha nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa ze-psychedelic, futhi ifaka nezindatshana zothisha bamaBuddha banamuhla ngalesi sihloko. 
I-Zen Buddhism yaziwa ngokucindezela izimiso. 
EJapane Nokho, lapho Zen yaqhakaza ngokomlando, kukhona eziningi izibonelo okungafanele ohlangothini of izindela laypeople ngokufanayo.Lokhu bekuvame ukubandakanya ukusetshenziswa kotshwala, ngenxa yokuthi ukuphuza kunesici esaziwayo futhi esiqhubekayo sokuba yisiko laseJapan . 
Imininingwane yemivubukulo, ye-ethnohistorical, ne-ethnographic ikhombisa ukuthi amasiko aseMesoamerican asebenzise izinto ze- psychedelic kumasiko okwelapha nawenkolo.Ama- Aztec asendulo ayesebenzisa izitshalo nezilwane ezahlukahlukene ze-entheogenic emphakathini wabo, kufaka phakathi i- ololiuqui ( Rivea corymbosa ), teonanácatl ( Psilocybe spp. ), Kanye ne peyotl ( Lophophora williamsii ). [1]Izinjongo zokusetshenziswa kwama- entheogenics ngamaMaya ukuphulukiswa ngokomoya, ukuzuza ukuhlakanipha, kanye nemikhosi yenkolo.Imiphumela yezitshalo ze-psychedelic ngesikhathi semicikilisho yenkolo kukholakala ukuthi ibe nomthelela ekwakhiweni nasekudalweni kwezithombe, nezithombe ezingcwele. 
UbuHindu bunomlando wokusetshenziswa kwe-psychedelic kubuyela emuva enkathini yamaVedic.Imibhalo emidala kunayo yonke yamaHinduism Rigveda (1500 BCE), ikhuluma ngokusetshenziswa kwesiko kwe-psychedelic yaphezulu eyaziwa ngokuthi yi- soma.Kunemibono eminingi mayelana neresiphi yeSoma. 
Abaphenyi abangewona amaNdiya baphakamise abazongenela ukhetho okubalwa kubo u- Amanita muscaria, Psilocybe cubensis, Peganum harmala kanye ne- Ephedra sinica.Ngokwezifundo zakamuva ze-philological and archaeological, futhi ngaphezu kwalokho, imiyalo yokulungiselela eqondile iqinisekisa kuRig Vedic Hymns ( inkathi yeVedic ) iSoma yasendulo kungenzeka ukuthi yayiqukethe iPoppy, Phaedra / Ephedra (isitshalo) neCannabis . [1] 
Mufudza bekulokhu off-wesipina kusukela Wayesethatha umdlalo Mbizi Primary School Highfield, Harare.Wayedlala ngokuba Takashinga Cricket Club eHarare ngaphambi kokuba ukubuthwa Mountaineers. 
Udlale imidlalo yakhe yokuqala yeMountaineers ngo-2011-12, futhi wazimisa eceleni ngo-2012-13, ngesikhathi ethatha amawikhethi ayi-13 ngokwesilinganiso esingu-14.92 ukuhola ama-bowling asezingeni lokuqala.Emdlalweni weLogan Cup neSouthern Rocks ushaye ama-39 eshaya kunombolo 10, wabe esethatha amabili ngo-46 no-5 ngo-27 ekunqobeni ama-run ayi-116.Kowamanqamu womqhudelwano we-T20 waseZimbabwe neMashonaland Eagles uvule iblingling wathatha u-4 kwaba ngu-14.Abadlali bezintaba bawine lo mdlalo futhi yena wawina nendondo yomdlalo womdlalo. 
Udlale iCookham Dean kuThames Valley Cricket League ngo-2014, ethatha amawikhethi angama-80 ngesilinganiso esingu-14.86 nokwenza ama-run angu-499 kuma-27.72. 
Ku-Logan Cup ngoDisemba 2014 uthathe ama-7 kwabangu-31 kwi-innings yesibili bedlala neMid West Rhinos, kufaka phakathi amawikhethi okuqala ayisithupha ukuwa, ukuqinisekisa ukunqoba kwe-Mountaineers.NgoJanuwari 2015 wadlala imidlalo emibili yama-over amabili kwiZimbabwe A bedlala neCanada, ethatha amawikhethi amabili ngama-run angama-56 kuma-over angu-20.Ngasekupheleni kwenyanga leyo, evula i-bowling emdlalweni we- List A neMashonaland Eagles, uthathe u-4 kwabangu-28. 
NgoDisemba 2020, wakhethwa ukuthi ayodlalela i-Eagles ku- 2020-21 Logan Cup .Ngo-Ephreli 2021, uMufudza waqokwa eqenjini laseZimbabwe emdlalweni wabo weTwenty20 International (T20I) nePakistan. 
Tapiwa Marobela (owazalwa ngo-Ephreli 1987 30) kuyinto wangaphambili Botswana zesifazane ithenisi umdlali 
UMarobela ngaphambi kokufunda eFlorida State University kusuka ngo-2004 kuya ku-2008. 
Emibhalweni yangaleso sikhathi yasePheresiya, akukho mehluko owenziwe phakathi "kwedolobha" nelithi "idolobha"; womabili ahumusha ngokuthi "Shahr" (شهر).Emibhalweni emidala yasePheresiya (kuze kube yingxenye yokuqala yekhulu lama-20), igama lesi-Arabhu elithi "Qasabeh" (قصبه) lalisetshenziselwa idolobha.Kodwa-ke, eminyakeni engu-50 edlule, leli gama selingasasebenzi. 
ELatvia, amadolobha namadolobha abizwa ngokungakhethi i- pilsēta ngendlela yobunye.Igama kuyinto ukusikwa amagama amabili Latvian: Pils (castle) kanye SETA (kocingo), okwenza kube sobala kakhulu ukuthi kusho ukuthini igama elithi - lokho ikhona phakathi nqaba futhi enqabeni kocingo.Kodwa-ke, idolobha lingabizwa nge-lielpilsēta ngokuya ngosayizi walo.Idolobhana libizwa ngokuthi ama- ciemats noma ama- ciems ngesiLatvia. 
NgesiLithuania, idolobha libizwa ngama-miestas, idolobha libizwa nge- miestelis (ngokwezwi nezwi "ama- miestas amancane).I-Metropolis ibizwa nge- didmiestis (ngokwezwi nezwi "ama- miestas amakhulu). 
ENew Zealand, dolobha liyindawo eyakhelwe ngaphakathi engeyona enkulu ngokwanele ukuthi ingabhekwa njengedolobha.Ngokomlando, le ncazelo yayihambisana nenani labantu abaphakathi kuka-1 000 no-20 000.Amadolobha awanawo umthetho ozimele, ophathwa njengezingxenye zezifunda ezakhiwe, noma, kokunye, kwamadolobha 
Amadolobha aseNew Zealand ahluka kakhulu ngosayizi nokubaluleka, kusuka ezikhungweni zezinsizakalo ezincane zasemakhaya kuya ezikhungweni ezibalulekile zesifunda ezifana neBlenheim neTaupo.Imvamisa, uma idolobha selifinyelela inani labantu abaphakathi kwabantu abangama-20 000 nabangama-30,000, lizoqala ukuthathwa njengedolobha ngokwethukela.Umuntu othatha indawo yokuhlala njengencane kakhulu ukuthi ibe yidolobha uzoyibiza ngokuthi "ilokishi" noma "idolobhana." 
ENorway, "idolobha" kanye "nedolobha" womabili ahumusha athi " by ", noma ngabe idolobha lingabizwa ngokuthi "storby" ("idolobha elikhulu").Zonke zizoba yingxenye futhi ziphathwe njenge- " kommune " (" umasipala "). 
EPhilippines, isikhulu sendawo esilingana nedolobha ngumasipala (Filipino bayan ). 
Wonke umasipala, noma idolobha, ezweni linoMeya (Filipino alkalde) kanye nephini leMeya (Filipino bise alkalde ) kanye nezikhulu zedolobha lasendaweni ( iSangguniang Bayan ).Amadolobha asePhilippines, abizwa ngenye indlela njengomasipala, akhiwe nghamadolobhana nemiphakathi ebizwa ngokuthi ama- barangay one (noma iqoqo) lama- barangay asebenza njengesikhungo sedolobha noma i- poblacion 
Olimini lwesiPolish akukho mehluko wolimi phakathi kwedolobha nedolobha. 
Igama lakho kokubili i- miasto, njengendawo yokuhlala ehlukile kokulandelayo: village (wieś), hamlet (przysiółek), settlement (osada), or colony (kolonia).Isimo sedolobha sinikezwa yisinqumo sokuphatha, amadolobha amasha amenyezelwa nguHulumeni kuMthethosivivinywa ohlukile oqala ukusebenza kusukela osukwini lokuqala lonyaka.Ezinye izindawo zivame ukuhlala emadolobhaneni yize zinabantu abaningi kunamadolobha amaningi amancane.Idolobha lingabizwa ngendlela enciphisayo njenge- "miasteczko", okusetshenziswa ngokubambisana ezindaweni ezinabantu abayizinkulungwane ezimbalwa.Izindawo ezinjalo zivame ukuba neMeya (burmistrz) njengenkosi yomkhandlu wedolobha. 
Kulesi simo, idolobhana noma idolobha lingaphansi kwesiphathimandla sendawo ( ipharishi lomphakathi noma umasipala, ngokuqhathaniswa nomongo waseNyakatho Melika, lapho benemisebenzi yezepolitiki.Ezimweni ezikhethekile, eminye imizana inganikezwa isikhundla sedolobha uma inokubaluleka komlando, kwamasiko noma kwezokwakha. 
Imizana yamadolobha amaPutukezi i- heraldry ikhombisa umehluko phakathi kwamadolobha namadolobha,ngengubo yedolobha ephethe umqhele onemibhoshongo emi-4, kuyilapho ijazi lamadolobha linomqhele onemibhoshongo emi-5.Lo mehluko phakathi kwamadolobha namadolobha usasetshenziswa kwamanye amazwe akhuluma isiPutukezi, kepha eBrazil awusasetshenziswa. 
ERomania akukho mehluko osemthethweni phakathi kwedolobha nedolobha (igama lawo womabili ngesiRomania lithi oraş ).Amadolobha namadolobha aseRomania angaba nesimo se- oraş municipiu, anikezwe ezindaweni ezinkulu zasemadolobheni, noma i- oraş kuphela ezindaweni ezincane zasemadolobheni.Ezinye izindawo zihlala amadolobhana (ama- comune ) yize enabantu abaningi kunamanye amadolobha amancane. 
Amazwe ayi-193 abambe iqhaza emzameni ofanayo wokuvumelana ngencazelo efanayo yezibalo zale mikhakha emithathu: amadolobha, amadolobha nezindawo zasemakhaya. 
E-Ukraine igama elithi town ( містечко, mistechko ) lalikhona kusukela esikhathini sangeNkathi Ephakathi kwaze kwaba ngu-1925, lapho kwafakwa umbuso waseSoviet endaweni yokuhlala yasemadolobheni.Ngokomlando, idolobha elisemazweni ase-Ukraine laliyindawo encane enabantu abaningi eyayiqashwe ngaphansi komthetho wedolobha laseJalimane futhi yayinendawo yemakethe (bheka iMarketown town ).Namuhla ngokwethukela, idolobha liphinde libhekiswe emadolobheni abaluleke kakhulu ezifundeni, amadolobha anabantu abambalwa, kanye nama- shtetls wangaphambilini amaJuda. 
Idolobhana yindawo yokuhlala abantu .Amadolobha ngokuvamile kunangendlela nemizana kanye ezincane kuno emadolobheni, nakuba nenqubo ukuhlukanisa phakathi kwabo nemikhuba yazo ihluke kakhulu ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zomhlaba. 
Isazi sokuma komhlaba sase-Australia uThomas Griffith Taylor uphakamise ukuhlukaniswa kwamadolobha ngokuya ngeminyaka yawo nendlela yokusebenzisa umhlaba.Uhlonze izinhlobo ezinhlanu zedolobha: [1] 
E- Afghanistan, amadolobha namadolobha aziwa ngokuthi shār ( Dari : شهر, Pashto : ښار). [1]Njengoba izwe lingumphakathi wasemaphandleni ngokomlando onemizana embalwa emikhulu, ngamadolobha amakhulu engakaze abe nezakhamizi ezingaphezu kwamakhulu ayizinkulungwane ezimbalwa ngaphambi kweminyaka yama-2000, isiko lezilimi alibandlululi amadolobha namadolobha. 
E- Albania "qytezë" kusho idolobha, elifana kakhulu negama ledolobha ( "qytet" ). 
Noma kungekho ukusetshenziswa okusemthethweni kwaleli gama kunoma yikuphi ukukhokhelwa.Ngesi-Albania i- "qytezë" isho ukuthi "idolobha elincane" noma "idolobha elisha", kanti ezikhathini zasendulo "indawo yokuhlala encane ngaphakathi kwezindonga zenqaba". 
E- Australia, izikhungo eziningi zasemakhaya nezesifunda zabantu zingabizwa ngamadolobha; amadolobha amaningi amancane anabantu abangaphansi kwama-200. [1]Okuncane kakhulu kungachazwa njengamalokishi. 
Uhlelo lwezomthetho lwase-Austrian alwehlukanisi phakathi kwamadolobhana, amadolobha namadolobha. 
Izwe lihlukaniswe laba ngomasipala abangama-2098 ( German ) wezinga elilinganayo ngokuyisisekelo.Omasipala abakhulu baqokwa njengamadolobha ezimakethe ( German ) noma amadolobha ( iStädte ), kepha lokhu kwehlukaniswa kungokomfanekiso futhi akuniki izibopho ezengeziwe zomthetho.Kunemiphakathi emincane emincane ebizwa ngamadolobha ngoba yayijwayele ukuba yizikhungo zabantu besikhathi esedlule.Idolobha laseRattenberg ngokwesibonelo linabantu ababalelwa ku-400.Idolobha laseHardegg linezakhamizi ezingaba ngu-1200, yize idolobha eliyingqophamlando - iHardegg efanele ngaphandle kwalezi ebezikade ziyizindawo ezizungezile - likhaya lemiphefumulo engama-80 kuphela. 
Abantu baseBulgaria, ngokujwayelekile, abahlukanisi phakathi 'kwedolobha' nelithi 'idolobha'.Kodwa-ke, ngolimi lwansuku zonke nakwabezindaba amagama athi "amadolobha amakhulu" kanye "namadolobhana amancane" ayasetshenziswa."Amadolobha amakhulu" imvamisa abhekise eSofia, Plovdiv, Varna naseBurgas, anabantu abangaphezu kwama-200,000.URuse noStara Zagora bavame ukufakwa futhi ngenxa yokuba khona kwengqalasizinda ethuthuke kakhulu kanye nenani labantu ngaphezulu komngcele we-100,000.Kunzima ukubiza onhlokodolobha besifundazwe abasele ngokuthi "amadolobha amakhulu" njengoba, ngokuvamile, engathuthukile kangako futhi enabantu abanciphayo, amanye anabantu abambalwa njengokufika kwabangu-30,000. 
Igama "idolobha" labelana ngemvelaphi negama lesiJalimane elithi Zaun , igama lesiDashi elithi tuin , kanye ne- Old Norse tún.Igama lokuqala lamaProto-Germanic, * tūnan, kucatshangwa ukuthi liboleka kusenesikhathi kuProto -Celtic * dūnom (cf. dún esidala sase-Ireland , I- Welsh din ). [1] 
ECzech Republic, umasipala angathola isihloko sedolobha ( Czech ), idolobha ( Czech ) noma idolobha lemakethe ( Czech ).Isihloko sinikezwa ngumthetho. 
Amadolobha asemthethweni (ngesiNgisi ngokuvamile abizwa ngokuthi "amadolobha" nje), achazwa ngumthetho cha. 
I-128/2000 Coll., ingachaza izifunda zikamasipala ezizibusayo. 
Kunamadolobha anjalo angama-26, ngaphandle kwePrague, okuyidolobha elisemthethweni.Bonke omasipala baseCzech abanabantu abangaphezu kuka-40,000 bangamadolobha. 
Umqondo wokuqala wegama kuzo zombili iziJalimane nesiCeltic wawungowenqaba noma indawo ebiyelwe.Izinkomba ze- "town" ngezilimi eziningi zesimanje zaseJalimane zisho uthango noma uthango.NgesiNgisi nangesiDashi, incazelo yaleli gama yathatha umqondo wesikhala lalezi zicingo ezivalekile, futhi lapho kufanele kugijime khona ithrekhi.ENgilandi, idolobha lalingahambisani umphakathi omncane ukuthi ababengenamandla okukuthola noma ubekade angavunyelwe Yakha izindonga noma ezinye izinqaba ezinkulu, wakha udonga, amaqembu noma stockade esikhundleni. ENetherlands, lesi sikhala kwakuyinsimu, ikakhulukazi leyo yabacebile, eyayinocingo oluphakeme noma udonga olubazungezile (njengensimu yesigodlo saseHet Loo e- Apeldoorn, okwakuyisibonelo se ingadi kaWilliam III noMary II eHampton Court ).Ku-Old Norse tún lisho indawo (enotshani) phakathi kwezindawo zokulima, futhi leli gama lisasetshenziswa linencazelo efanayo ngesiNorway sanamuhla. 
EDenmark, ezimeni eziningi akukho mehluko owenziwe phakathi "kwedolobha", "idolobha" kanye "nomzana"; womathathu ahumusha ngokuthi "ngu".Ngo ngaphezulu ukusetshenziswa ethize, ngoba ngamaqembu amancane futhi imizana igama elithi "landsby" (okusho ukuthi "izwe edolobheni") isetshenziswa, kuyilapho okulingana Danish English "Umuzi" "storby" (okusho ukuthi "idolobha elikhulu").Ngezinhloso ezisemthethweni, izindawo zasemadolobheni ezinabantu okungenani abangama-200 zibalwa njenge- "by". 
EFinland, akukho mehluko phakathi kwedolobha nedolobha njengoba igama elithi kaupunki lisetshenziselwa izindawo zokuhlala ezinkulu nezincane, ezinkulu kunamadolobhana namadolobhana; yize ngandlela thile, lapho kukhulunywa ngegama elithi idolobha, lingasebenzisa futhi igama elithi pikkukaupunki ( pikku lisho "okuncane" noma "okuncane").Cishe kunamadolobha kamasipala ayikhulu eFinland. 
I-Old English tūn yaba yisijobelelo esivamile segama lendawo eNgilandi naseningizimu-mpumalanga yeScotland ngesikhathi sokuhlala kwama-Anglo-Saxon. 
Ku- Old English naku-Early and Middle Scots, amagama athi ton, ibizo, njll.Angabhekisa ezinhlotsheni ezahlukahlukene zezindawo eziqhamuka ezindaweni zezolimo kanye nasekubambeni, ngokwengxenye ethatha umqondo weNorse (njengakwiScots word fermtoun ) ekugcineni kwesikali, komasipala abaqinisiwe.Ezinye izijobelelo ezijwayelekile ze-Anglo-Saxon zifaka i- ham 'home', i- stede 'stead', ne- burh 'burury, borough, burgh'. 
Ngokombono wokuphatha, izinga elincanyana leziphathimandla zendawo lonke libizwa ngama- "communes".Labo bangaba nokuthola okuncane kusuka ezigidini kuya ezigidini zabemi, kanti iFrance inezinkulungwane ezingama-36000 zazo.Igama lesiFulentshi elisho "idolobha" lithi " bourg " kepha imithetho yaseFrance ayihlukanisi ngempela phakathi kwamadolobha namadolobha abizwa kakhulu ngokuthi "ama-villes".Kodwa-ke, eminye imithetho iziphatha ngale ndlela lezi ziphathimandla ngokuya ngesibalo sabantu futhi imithetho ehlukile iyasebenza emadolobheni amakhulu amathathu iParis, iLyon neMarseille.Ngenxa yezizathu zomlando, amtakhoma ayisithupha endaweni yokuqasha iMeuse akhona njengezikhungo zokuphatha ezizimele yize engenabo nhlobo abahlali. 
Ngokuvamile amaJalimane awahlukanisi phakathi 'kwedolobha' nelithi 'idolobhana'. 
Igama lesiJalimane lalaba bobabili lithi Stadt, njengoba kwenzeka kwezinye izilimi eziningi ezingahlukanisi phakathi kwale mibono yama-Anglo-Saxon.Igama elithi 'isigodi', njengendawo yokuhlala encane, nguDorf.Kodwa-ke, i-International Statistics Conference yango-1887 ichaze osayizi abahlukahlukene beStadt, ngokuya ngosayizi wabantu babo, ngokulandelayo: Landstadt ("idolobha elisemaphandleni"; ngaphansi kuka-5 000), iKleinstadt ("idolobhana elincane"; 5,000 kuya ku-20 000), iMittelstadt ("maphakathi idolobha "; phakathi kuka-20 000 no-100,000) kanye neGroßstadt (" idolobha elikhulu "; 100,000 kuya ku-1,000,000).Igama elithi Großstadt lingahunyushwa ngokuthi "idolobha".Ngaphezu kwalokho, amaJalimane angakhuluma ngeMillionenstadt, idolobha elinabantu abaphakathi kwesigidi esisodwa kuya kwezihlanu ( njengeMunich, Hamburg neBerlin ).Futhi, idolobha elinabantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezinhlanu kuvame ukubizwa ngokuthi yiMegastadt (Ngokuvamile ihunyushwa ngokuthi iMegacity ) 
Kwezinye izimo, igama elithi "idolobha" elinye igama elithi "idolobha" noma "isigodi" (ikakhulukazi isigodi esikhulu). 
Kwesinye isikhathi, igama elithi "idolobha" lifushane ngokuthi "ilokishi".Ngokuvamile, amadolobha namuhla kungenziwa umahluko kusuka emalokishini, emizaneni, noma imizana ngesisekelo uhlamvu yabo zomnotho, ukuthi iningi labantu edolobheni sika azothanda okuzuza baziphilise kusukela yokukhiqiza umkhakha, commerce, futhi izinkonzo zomphakathi kunokuba wemboni eyinhloko izimboni njengezolimo noma imisebenzi ehlobene. 
Usayizi wesibalo sendawo akuyona into enokwethenjelwa yohlamvu lwasemadolobheni.Ezindaweni eziningi zomhlaba, isb. 
ENdiya okungenani kuze kube yizikhathi zakamuva nje, idolobhana elikhulu lingaqukatha abantu abaphindwe kaningana kunedolobha elincane.E- United Kingdom, kunamadolobha omlando amancane kakhulu kunamadolobha amakhulu. 
Ukubalwa kwabantu eNdiya ngo-2011 kuchaza amadolobha ezinhlobo ezimbili: idolobha elisemthethweni kanye nedolobha lokubala abantu.Edolobheni emithetho kuchazwa njenganoma zonke izindawo nge umasipala, inkampani, Cantonment ibhodi noma aziswe ekomidini edolobheni endaweni.Amadolobha wokubalwa kwabantu achazwa njengezindawo ezanelisa le mibandela elandelayo: 
Onke amadolobha asemthethweni, amadolobha okubalwa kwabantu kanye nokukhula okuphuma ngaphandle kubhekwa njengezindawo zokuhlala ezisemadolobheni, uma kuqhathaniswa nezindawo zasemakhaya. 
Amanye ama-jali aseminyuziyamu emikhulu e-USA nase-Europe.Lokhu kufaka phakathi i-Indianapolis Museum of Art [1] neMetropolitan Museum of Art [2] neVictoria ne-Albert Museum. [3] 
A Jali noma jaali, (Jali, okusho "inetha") leli gama ngoba itshe perforated noma latticed isikrini, ngokuvamile iphathini Ornamental icanjwe ngokusebenzisa calligraphy, i-geometry noma amaphethini zemvelo.Leli fomu lokuhlobisa ngokwakha livamile ekwakhiweni kwe- Indo-Islamic futhi ikakhulukazi ekwakhiweni kwamaSulumane. Ngokusho kuka-Yatin Pandya, i- jali ivumela ukukhanya nomoya ngenkathi inciphisa ilanga nemvula.Futhi lapho umoya udlula kulokhu kuvuleka, isivinini sawo sandisa ukwanda okukhulu.

Ngokusetshenziswa kabanzi kwengilazi ngasekupheleni kwekhulu le-19, kanye nokuxinana kwezindawo zokuhlala eNdiya yanamuhla, i- jalis yehla kakhulu ezindabeni zobumfihlo nezokuphepha. 
Umsebenzi oyisisekelo wamatshe ayizinxande waseJali ubonakala ngesikhathi samaGupta amathempeli amaNachna wamaHindu kanye namathempeli aseGupta Pattadakal.Emsebenzini waseChina owenziwe ngokhuni owakhiwe ngesikhathi sobukhosi bakwaHan, leli siko liqhubekile nokwakhiwa kwamanje kwamaShayina. Umsebenzi wokuqala we- jali onobujamo bejiyometri obuningi wakhiwa ngokuqoshwa etsheni, ngamaphethini wejometri, \ kuqala kuvela ku- Alai Darwaza ka-1305 eDelhi ngaphandle kweQutub Minar, kwathi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi abakwaMughal basebenzisa imiklamo eqoshwe kahle yezitshalo, njengase UTaj Mahal.Babuye kaningi bangeze i- pietra dura inlay kokuzungezile, besebenzisa amatshe emabula namatshe ayigugu. Enqabeni yaseGwalior, eduze kwesango lase-Urwahi, kunombhalo oqoshiwe olayini abangu-17 obhalwe ngo-Samvat 1553, obalula amagama abanye babakhandi nemisebenzi yabo.Omunye wabo nguKhedu, owayeyisazi se- "Gwaliyai jhilmili" okungukuthi i-jali screen esenziwe ngesitayela seGwalior. [1]Ithuna likaMughal lesikhathi sikaMuhammad Ghaus elakhiwa ngo-1565 AD eGwalior liphawuleka ngama-jalis alo amatshe. 
[2] Izindlu eziningi zeGwalior zekhulu le-19 leminyaka zazisebenzisa ama-jalis amatshe.AmaJalis asetshenziswa kakhulu eGwalior's Usha Kiran Palace Hotel, okwakuyindlu yezivakashi yaseScindia. 
Izinkunzi zinemisipha kakhulu kunezinkomo, ezinamathambo amakhulu, izinyawo ezinkudlwana, intamo enemisipha kakhulu, nekhanda elikhulu elinamathambo elinemihosha evikelayo phezu kwamehlo.Lezi zici zisiza izinkunzi ekulweleni ukubusa phezu komhlambi, zinikeze ophumelele ukufinyelela okuphezulu ezinkomeni ezizalisayo. 
[1]Uboya ngokuvamile bufushane emzimbeni, kodwa intamo nekhanda kuvame ukuba ne- "mane" yezinwele ezisontayo, ezinoboya.Izinkunzi ngokuvamile zicishe zilingane nezinkomo noma zide kancane, kodwa ngenxa yesisindo esengeziwe samathambo, zivame ukuba nesisindo esikhulu kakhulu.Isikhathi esiningi, inkunzi iba ne-hump emahlombe. 
Ezinkomeni ezinezimpondo, izimpondo zezinkunzi zivame ukuba zincane futhi zibe mfushane ngaphezudlwana kunezo zezinkomo, [1] futhi ezinhlotsheni eziningi, zigobela ngaphandle ku-arc eyisicaba kunokuya phezulu ngesimo sehabhu. 
Akusilona iqiniso, njengoba kukholelwa kanjalo ngokuvamile, ke izinkunzi babe izimpondo kanye izinkomo musa: khona izimpondo incike zohlobo, noma izinhlobo zinezimpondo ekutheni izimpondo ziye disbudded.(Kuyiqiniso, nokho, ukuthi ezinhlotsheni eziningi zezimvu kuphela abesilisa abanezimpondo. ).Izinkomo ukuthi ngokwemvelo akudingeki izimpondo zibizwa ngokuthi ababuzwa, noma muleys. 
Izinkomo zesilisa ezisikiwe ziyafana ngokomzimba nezinsikazi ezakheke futhi zakhiwe ngophondo, yize zivunyelwe ukuthi zikhule, zingaba zinde kakhulu kunezinkunzi noma izinkomo, ezinamahlombe nezintamo ezinemisipha. 
Uhlelo lokuzala 
Izinkunzi ziyavunda zizungeze izinyanga eziyisikhombisa ubudala.Ukuzala kwabo kuhlobene kakhulu nosayizi wamasende abo, kanti isivivinyo esisodwa esilula sokuzala ukuzungeza ubude besikhungu; inkunzi encane kungenzeka ivunde uma lokhu sekufike 28 centimetres (11 ku) ; leyo yenkunzi esekhule ngokuphelele ingaba ngaphezu 40 centimetres (16 ku) .Izinkunzi zinomthondo we-fibroelastic. 
Njengoba kunikezwe inani elincane lezicubu ze-erectile, ukukhulisa okuncane kwenzeka ngemuva kokwakhiwa.I-penis iqine kakhulu lapho ingami, futhi iba nzima nakakhulu ngesikhathi sokumiswa.Protrusion alithintwa enkulu ngokubhula ukwakhiwa, kodwa eziningi ngokufaka ukuphumula we imisipha retractor umthondo futhi eqondisa we flexure sigmoid.Izinkunzi ziyathinteka ngezikhathi ezithile ngesimo esaziwa nge- "corkscrew penis".Umthondo wenkunzi evuthiwe ucishe ube yi-3-4 cm ububanzi,no-80-100 cm ubude. Umthondo wenkunzi yenkomo unomumo oyindilinga nophakeme. 
Umbono oyiphutha ovamile ophindaphindwa kabanzi emifanekisweni yokuziphatha kwezinkunzi ukuthi umbala obomvu uthukuthelisa izinkunzi, uzihlohle ukuthi zikhokhise.Eqinisweni, njengezilwane eziningi ezincelisayo, izinkomo zinombala obomvu noluhlaza okotshani.Ekulweni nenkunzi, ukuhamba kwekapa le-matador, hhayi umbala, kubangela ukusabela kule nkunzi. 
Inkunzi kuyinto abephule (ie, hhayi wawungabavumeli ) omdala wesilisa kwezinhlobo Bos taurus.Imisipha futhi inolaka kakhulu kunabesifazane bezinhlobo ezifanayo, izinkomo, izinkunzi sekuyisikhathi eside kuwuphawu olubalulekile emasikweni amaningi, futhi zibambe iqhaza elibalulekile ekufuyeni inyama yenkomo, ekufuyeni ubisi, nakweminye imisebenzi ehlukahlukene yamasiko, kufaka phakathi ukulwa nenkunzi ukugibela . 
Ngaphandle kwezinkunzi ezimbalwa ezidingekayo ukuzalanisa, iningi lezinkomo zesilisa liyathenwa bese lihlatshelwa inyama ngaphambi kweminyaka emithathu, ngaphandle kwalapho zidingeka khona (njengezithenjiwe) njengezinkabi zomsebenzi wokuthwala.Iningi lalezi zilwane zenyama yenkomo lithengelwe njengezinkonyane ukunciphisa isimilo esinolaka nokuvikela ukukhwelana okungafuneki, [1] yize ezinye zikhuliswa njengenkomo yenkomo engacoliswanga. 
Inkunzi ivamise ukulungela ukuhlatshwa inyanga eyodwa noma ezimbili ngokushesha ukwedlula eyeduna noma eyensikazi ethenjiwe, futhi ikhiqiza imisipha ethe xaxa ngokwengeziwe. [1] 
Uzimele amaphuzu ayindlela ewusizo yokuchaza ubukhulu bamathambo ezinkunzi nezinye izinkomo.Izikolo zohlaka zingasetshenziswa njengesizo ukubikezela osayizi bezinkomo abavuthiwe kanye nosizo ekukhetheni izinkunzi zenkomo.Zibalwa kusukela ekuphakameni kwe-hip nobudala. 
Kumakhathalogi wokuthengisa, lesi silinganiso sibikwa njalo ngokungeziwe kusisindo nenye idatha yokusebenza efana nenani lokulinganisa elilinganisiwe. 
Izinkunzi ezindala zingaba nesisindo esiphakathi kuka-Iningi liyakwazi ukuziphatha nolaka futhi lidinga ukuphatha ngokucophelela ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabantu nezinye izilwane.Lezo zinhlobo zobisi zingase zithambekele kakhulu ekuhlaselweni, kuyilapho izinhlobo zenyama yenkomo zinolaka kancane, kepha izinhlobo zenkomo ezinjengeSpanish Fighting Bull nezilwane ezihlobene nazo zaziwa ngokuthambekela okunolaka, okukhuthazwa ngokuqhubekayo ngokuzala okukhethiwe . 
Kulinganiselwa ukuthi u-42% wabo bonke abantu ababulawa imfuyo eCanada bangumphumela wokuhlaselwa kwezinkunzi, kanti kusinda izisulu ezingaphansi koyedwa kwabangu-20 ekuhlaselweni yinkunz.Izinkunzi ezifuywayo zobisi ziyingozi ikakhulukazi futhi zingalindelekile; izingozi zokuphathwa kwezinkunzi ziyimbangela ebalulekile yokulimala nokufa kwabalimi bezinkomo zobisi kwezinye izingxenye ze-United States.[3] [4]Isidingo sokufaka inkunzi ngaphandle nangaphandle kwesibaya sayo ukumboza izinkomo kuveza ophethe engcupheni enkulu yempilo nezitho zomzimba. [5]Ukunyathelwa, ukuminyaniswa odongeni, noma ukuqhutshwa yinkunzi kwakuyimbangela eyodwa yokufa kwabantu embonini yobisi ngaphambi kuka-1940. 
[6]Ngokuphathelene nezingozi ezinjalo, omunye umagazini odumile wezolimo usikisele wathi, "Bamba inkunzi ngenduku futhi ungathathi amashansi.Inkunzi emnene, hhayi enonya, imvamisa iyabulala noma ilimaze umgcini wayo ". [7] 
Ezindaweni eziningi, ukufaka amasongo emakhaleni ezinkunzi ukusiza ukuzilawula kungokwesiko.Iringi ivamise ukwenziwa ngethusi, bese ifakwa emgodini omncane osikwe engxenyeni yekhala. 
Isetshenziswa ngokunamathisela intambo yomthofu ngqo kuyo noma igijime kuyo kusuka kukhololo wekhanda, noma ezinkomeni ezinzima kakhulu, isigxobo senkunzi (noma abasebenzi bezinkunzi) singasetshenziswa.Lesi yisigxobo esiqinile cishe 1 m (3 ft) ubude nesiqeshana ngakolunye uhlangothi; lokhu kunamathela eringini futhi kuvumela inkunzi ukuthi iholelwe futhi ibanjelwe kude nomphathi wayo. 
Inkunzi enobudlova ingagcinwa ivalelwe esibayeni sezinkunzi, indawo yokukhosela eyakhiwe ngokuqinile kanye nepeni, imvamisa kunelungiselelo lokuvumela inkunzi ukuthi iphiwe ngaphandle kokungena esibayeni.Uma inkunzi enobudlova ivunyelwe ukuba idle ngaphandle, kungahle kudingeke ezinye izinyathelo zokuvikela ukuze ingalimazi abantu.Enye indlela isifihla-buso senkunzi, esivala amehlo enkunzi ngokuphelele, noma sivimbele umbono wakhe uwele phansi ngokushesha phambi kwakhe, ngakho-ke akakwazi ukubona umuntu angaba yisisulu sakhe.Enye indlela ukunamathisela ubude beketanga eringini lasekhaleni lenkunzi, ukuze kuthi uma idada ikhanda layo ishaja, inyathele iketango bese ikhuliswa ifushane.Ngenye indlela, inkunzi ingase ibhobokiswe, noma iboshwe ngamaketanga ngendandatho yayo noma ngekhola entweni eqinile enjengendandatho ebekelwe phansi. 
Emadlelweni amakhulu, ikakhulukazi lapho kugcinwa khona inkunzi nezinye izinkomo, izilwane zingamane zondliwe ngeveni noma ngogandaganda, imoto uqobo enikela ukuvikelwa kwabantu abathintekayo.Ngokuvamile, izinkunzi ezigcinwa nezinkomo zivame ukungabi nolaka kakhulu kunalezo ezigcinwa zodwa.Ezimweni zomhlambi, izinkomo ezinamathole amancane zivame ukuba yingozi kubantu.Esikhathini esingaphandle, izinkunzi eziningi zingagcinwa ndawonye "emhlambini we-bachelor". 
Amapulazi amaningi wezinkomo neziteshi ziqhuba izinkunzi nezinkomo, futhi amapulazi amaningi obisi noma enkomo ngokwesiko ayenezinkunzi okungenani eyodwa, uma kungenjalo, ngenhloso yokugcinwa kwemfuyo. [1] [2]Kodwa-ke, izinkinga ezihambisana nokuphatha inkunzi (ikakhulukazi lapho izinkomo kufanele zisuswe khona ukuze zisebenze) yenze ukuthi abalimi abaningi bezinkomo bazinqande ekusetshenzisweni kwezinkomo (AI). 
[3]Isidoda siyasuswa ezinkomeni bese sigcinwa emigqonyeni ye- liquid nitrogen, lapho sigcinwa khona size sithengiswe, ngaleso sikhathi singaba nenzuzo enkulu; empeleni, abafuyi abaningi bagcina izinkunzi ngokukhethekile ngale njongo.I-AI ibuye isetshenziselwe ukuthuthukisa ikhwalithi yomhlambi, noma ukwethula ukuphuma kwamagazi.Abanye abafuyi bakhetha ukusebenzisa i-AI ukuze bavunyelwe ukuba bazalele izinkunzi ezahlukahlukene ngenkathi ethile noma ukuzala imfuyo yabo engcono kakhulu kunkunzi esezingeni eliphakeme kunaleyo abakwazi ukuyithenga ngokuqondile.I-AI nayo ingasetshenziswa ngokuhlanganyela nokudluliswa kombungu ukuvumela abakhiqizi bezinkomo ukwengeza ukuzalanisa okusha emihlambini yabo. 
Ngaphandle kwemisebenzi yazo yokuzala, izinkunzi ziyasetshenziswa nakwezemidlalo ethile, kufaka phakathi ukulwa kwezinkunzi nokugibela izinkunzi . 
Zifakwe futhi emikhosini nasemicimbini yesintu efana nokugijima kwezinkunzi futhi zabonakala emidlalweni yasendulo efana nokuxhuma kwezinkunzi.Nakuba ezivamile esingaphansi kwabesilisa zazithenwa, izinkunzi ezisetshenziswa njengeziwusizo okusalungiswa izinkabi kwezinye izindawo.Umdlalo owake wathandwa kakhulu wokubamba izinkunzi, lapho inkunzi ihlaselwa yizinja ezifuywa ngokukhethekile futhi eziqeqeshiwe (ezaziwa ngokuthi ama- bulldogs ), wavinjelwa eNgilandi yi- Cruelty to Animals Act 1835. 
Njengezinye izilwane, ezinye izinkunzi ziye zabhekwa njengezilwane ezifuywayo . 
Umculi uCharo, ngokwesibonelo, ubenenkunzi yezinkomo egama linguManolo. 
Izinkunzi ezingcwele zibambe indawo ebalulekile emasikweni esintu kusukela ngaphambi kokuqala komlando oqoshiwe.Zibonakala emidwebweni yemidwebo elinganiselwa eminyakeni eyi-17,000 ubudala.I-Bull of the Heavens yezinganekwane idlala indima ku- Epic yasendulo yaseSumerian kaGilgamesh, eyaqala emuva ngo-2150 BC.Ukubaluleka kwenkunzi kubonakala ekubonakaleni kwayo kumzodiac njengeTaurus, kanye nokuvela kwayo okuningi ezinganekwaneni, lapho kuvame ukuhlotshaniswa nokuzala. 
Bheka futhi neKorban.KubuHindu, inkunzi egama layo linguNandi, evamise ukuboniswa ihleli phansi, ikhonzwa njengemoto kankulunkulu uShiva futhi ikhonjiswe ezithombeni eziningi zalowo nkulunkulu. 
Ngokomfanekiso, inkunzi ivela ngokujwayelekile ku- heraldry.Bulls selivela amacala futhi crests ku izingalo imikhaya eminingana British.Yezinkunzi ezinamaphiko avele njengoba abasekeli e izingalo okukhulekela Inkampani ye Obhusha . 
[1]Ezikhathini zanamuhla, inkunzi isetshenziswa njenge- mascot ngamaqembu ezemidlalo amateur nochwepheshe. 
Izinkunzi nazo zibaluleke ngokukhethekile emasikweni aseSpain, lapho ukugijima komkhosi wezinkunzi kwenzeka njalo ngonyaka ehlobo.Phakathi nalo mkhosi, iqembu labagijimi abangabantu elibizwa ngokuthi "mozos" lizama ukudlula iqembu lezinkunzi ezigijima ngemuva kwazo, ngenkathi izixuku ezinkulu zibuka wonke umjaho. 
Ukudlwengula uhlobo ngokocansi ngokuvamile okuhilela nobuhlobo bobulili noma ezinye izinhlobo sokungena ngokocansi eyenziwa ngokumelene umuntu ngaphandle ukuthi lomuntu kwemvume.Lesi senzo singenziwa ngamandla, ukuphoqelelwa, ukusetshenziswa kabi kwegunya, noma ngokumelene nomuntu ongakwazi ukunikeza imvume evumelekile, njengalowo ongazi lutho, okhubazekile, okhubazeke ngokwengqondo, noma ongaphansi kweminyaka esemthethweni yokuvuma.Igama elithi ukudlwengula kwesinye isikhathi lisetshenziswa ngokungafani negama elithi ukuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi. [1] 
Ukudlwengulwa okubanzi futhi okuhlelekile (isb. 
Ukudlwengulwa kwempi ) nokugqilazwa ngokocansi kungenzeka ngesikhathi sezimpi zomhlaba.Le mikhuba ngamacala abhekene nobuntu kanye namacala empi.Ukudlwengulwa kuphinde kubhekwe njengengxenye yecala lokuqothulwa kohlanga lapho kwenziwa ngenhloso yokucekela phansi, lonke noma ingxenye yalo, uhlanga oluthile. 
Abantu abadlwenguliwe bangahlukumezeka bese beba nengcindezi yangemva kokuhlukumezeka .Ukulimala kanzima kungaholela kanye nengozi yokukhulelwa kanye nezifo ezithathelwana ngocansi.Umuntu angabhekana nodlame noma izinsongo ezivela kumdlwenguli, kanti kwesinye isikhathi, angabhekana nomndeni nezihlobo zakhe. 
Kusukela ngoJulayi 2013, isibalo sababhalisile besiteshi sakhe, esasibizwa nge- "That-dude", sasicishe sibe ngu-240. 
Ngo-2015 nango-2016, uDonaldson waqala ukuzitholela udumo emsamo ngenxa yochungechunge lwamavidiyo wakhe “amabi kakhulu,” aqoqa futhi ahlekisa ngezethulo ze-YouTuber azithola kusayithi.Maphakathi no-2016, uDonaldson wayenababhalisile ababalelwa ku-30,000.Ekwindla ngo-2016, uDonaldson waphuma e- East Carolina University ngaphandle kokutshela (okwathiwa nguDonaldson kwenzeka ngemuva kwamasonto amabili kuphela elapho) ukuze aqhubeke nomsebenzi wesikhathi esigcwele njenge-YouTuber.Ngenxa yalokho, umama wakhe wamkhipha ekhaya. 
NgoJanuwari 2017, uDonaldson washicilela ividiyo ecishe ithathe usuku lonke ebala abayi-100,000. 
I-stunt imthathe amahora angama-40, ezinye izingxenye zahamba ngokushesha "ukuyigcina ngaphansi kwamahora angama-24".Ividiyo okwalandela onesihloko esithi "Ukubala ukuze 200,000 (Road Mil)" silayishwe ngenyanga ezayo, nakuba, ngokusho Donaldson, nakho, kwadingeka ukuba washesha ngoba egcwele amahora amahlanu nanhlanu ka nokubala kudlulwe umkhawulo wokulayisha-YouTube.UDonaldson uphinde wazuza ukuthandwa ngalesi sikhathi ngama-stunts, njengokuzama ukuphula ingilazi kusetshenziswa ama- megaphones ayikhulu, ukubuka upende womile ihora lonke,ukuzama ukuhlala ngaphansi kwamanzi amahora angama-24 (agcine ehluleka ngenxa yezinkinga zezempilo), kanye umzamo ongaphumelelanga wokujikeleza i- fidget spinner yosuku.Ngo-2018 uDonaldson wayesekhiphe u- $ 1 million ngezigqoko zakhe ezingajwayelekile, okwamenza waba yisihloko esithi “Umusa omkhulu kunabo bonke wakwa-YouTube”. 
Ngesikhathi sePewDiePie vs T-Series ngo-2018, umncintiswano wokuba isiteshi esibhaliswe kakhulu ku-YouTube, uDonaldson wathenga amabhodi amakhulu, izikhangiso eziningi nezikhangiso zomsakazo ukusiza iPewDiePie ukuthi ithole ababhalisile abaningi kune- T-Series ; eSuper Bowl LIII, uthengele yena neqembu lakhe izihlalo eziningi ezinamahembe abhalwe ukuthi, "Sub 2 PewDiePie".UDonaldson usho ukuthi usebenzisa isiteshi esikhulu ngokulahlekelwa. 
Ngo-Mashi 2019, uDonaldson wahlela futhi waqopha umncintiswano wempi wangempela we-royale eLos Angeles ngomklomelo wama- $ 200,000 (imidlalo emibili yadlalwa, okwenza inzuzo yemidlalo engu- $ 100,000 ngomdlalo ngamunye) ngokubambisana ne- Apex Legends.Umcimbi nedamu lomklomelo uxhaswe ngumshicileli we- Apex Legends Electronic Arts. 
UDonaldson wasolwa ngokusebenzisa imali-mbumbulu kuvidiyo kaNovemba 2019.Ubuye wachaza ukuthi usebenzise imali mbumbulu ukunciphisa izingcuphe zokuphepha nezokuphepha ezingabangelwa ukuqhuma kwabantu ababanga ukuthola imali yamahhala, futhi wathi washintshanisa izikweletu zomgunyathi wenza isheke langempela lawo wonke umuntu ngemuva kwalokho. 
Ngo-Ephreli 2020, uDonaldson wenza umqhudelwano wamadwala, iphepha, isikele owawunabagqugquzeli abangama-32 nomklomelo omkhulu wama- $ 250,000, ngaleso sikhathi owaba ngumcimbi obukhoma obukwa kakhulu we-YouTube ngezibukeli ezihambisanayo ezingama-662,000.Umcimbi ugcine unqotshwe nguNadeshot. 
Ngo-Okthoba 2020, uDonaldson wasungula omunye umqhudelwano wabagqugquzeli oqukethe izimbangi ezingama-24 ngomklomelo omkhulu wama- $ 300,000.Umqhudelwano wagcina unqotshwe ngumndeni wakwa-D'Amelio, owadala ingxabano ngenxa yezinsolo zokuthi babekopela. 
NgoJanuwari 1, 2021, uDonaldson wakhipha ividiyo ethi " Youtube [ Buyisela emuva u-2020, Siyabonga uNkulunkulu Kuphelile ".Phambilini umemezele ngoNovemba 2020 ukuthi uzobe enza uRewind ngemuva kwezinsuku i-YouTube imemezele ukuthi abazukuyenza.Ku-video kaDonaldson, uyachaza ukuthi ubelokhu ekholelwa ukuthi i-YouTubers "kufanele ikhulume kakhulu ku-Rewind", futhi ngalokhu engqondweni, wanquma ukubiza "amakhulu ama-YouTubers".Ekupheleni kwevidiyo, uDonaldson unxenxa uPewDiePie, ecaphuna yena noRewind wakhe ka-2018 njengogqugquzelo lukaDonaldson's Rewind (womabili amaRewinds aqukethe abahleli iFlyingKitty, iDolan Dark, neGrandayy, nengoma kaPhathi Emuva Kwezindlu). 
NgoFebhuwari 2021, uDonaldson wavela njengesihambeli kuhlelo lokusebenza lweClubhouse olwenza lwadilika. 
NgoMashi 2021, uDonaldson wasayina isivumelwano noJellysmack esivumela inkampani ukuthi ilawule kuphela ukusatshalaliswa kokuqukethwe kwevidiyo yakhe kuSnapchat nakuFacebook. 
Amavidiyo kaDonaldson ngokuvamile afaka izigaxa ezibamba ukunaka.Uvame ukwenza amavidiyo lapho anikela khona ngemali enkulu kubantu ngabanye, iningi lalawa mavidiyo axhaswa yizinkampani ezahlukahlukene.Futhi kwesinye isikhathi ubamba imincintiswano emidlalweni, efana neMinecraft, yemiklomelo emikhulu yemali ebandakanya ukunikela ngendlu kwenye yamavidiyo wakhe wokudlala. 
Ividiyo ejwayelekile ifaka uDonaldson enikeza izizumbulu zemali,njengokunikeza izinto ezingabiza u- $ 100,000 ezindaweni zokuhlala ezingenamakhaya ngoDisemba 2018,enikela ngama- $ 32,000 kuhlelo lweVeterans Army Wounded Warrior Programme, $ 70,000 kuSt. Isibhedlela Sezingane Sokucwaninga, kanye ne- $ 10,000 endaweni yokukhosela izilwane eLos Angeles.Amavidiyo akhe abizayo e-YouTube axhaswa kakhulu futhi axhaswe ngamadili amakhulu emikhiqizo avela njengezikhangiso zevidiyo kumavidiyo akhe.Ngo-2021, uDonaldson wathi usebenzisa isiteshi sakhe esikhulu ngokulahleka. 
UMrBeast unikezwe udumo ngokwethula isitayela esisha samavidiyo abiza kakhulu ku-YouTube, lapho abadali besusa khona izinselelo eziningiliziwe kanye nezipho ezinkulu ezixhasiwe. 
Njengoba isiteshi sakhe sesikhulile uDonaldson ukwazile ukuqasha abangani bakhe abane abasebuntwaneni - uChris, Chandler, Garrett noJake - ukuba basebenzele yena nesiteshi, okuholele ekutheni bakhonjiswe njalo kumavidiyo akhe. 
UMrBeast ubizwe ngendlela yokuqala yabadali-osomabhizinisi bakusasa. 
UJimmy Donaldson (owazalwa ngoMeyi 7, 1998), owaziwa kangcono kwi-intanethi njengoMnuBeast, uyi-American YouTuber, usomabhizinisi kanye nomuntu osiza abantu.Unikezwe udumo ngokuphayona uhlobo lwamavidiyo e- YouTube agxile kuma-stunts abizayo.Ungumsunguli kaMrBeast Burger futhi ungomunye wabasunguli beTeam Trees, oqoqa imali yeArbor Day Foundation, eqoqe imali engaphezulu kwezigidi ezingama- $ 23.Uphethwe yinkampani yokuphathwa kwamakhono esekwe eDallas iNight Media. 
UWill Hyde, ongumdidiyeli wesiteshi seMrBeast, umemezele ku-athikili kaNovemba 2020 neThe Wake Weekly ukuthi uDonaldson uzokwethula indawo yokudlela ebonakalayo ebizwa nge-MrBeast Burger ngoDisemba 2020.U-Hyde uthe iqembu lakhe lisebenzisane nama-Virtual Dining Concepts ngesikhathi kuthuthukiswa umqondo wokudlela.UMnuBeast Burger uzothengisa amalungelo e-franchise okuhlinzeka ama-burger ezindaweni zokudlela ezise-US futhi amakhasimende azokwazi uku-oda ama-burger ngezinsizakalo zokulethwa online. 
UDonaldson ungumtshali-zimali we-tech startup Backbone okhiqiza i-Backbone One, isilawuli esenza ama-smartphones avele afane kakhulu nabalawuli beNintendo switchch, kanye ne-Backbone app, ukudala okuqukethwe kanye nohlelo lokusebenza lwamathuluzi omphakathi kubasebenzisi bayo 
NgoMashi 2021, uDonaldson wabambisana nenethiwekhi yezezimali yeClassic Juice ukwethula amaJuice Funds, isikhwama sokutshala imali esingu- $ 2 million esinikeza abadali imali efinyelela ku- $ 250,000 ukushintshanisa ukulingana eziteshini zabo ze-YouTube. 
Ngo-Ephreli 2021, uDonaldson waba ngumtshalizimali wesikhathi eside nomlingani wenkampani yezobuchwepheshe bezezimali i-Current.Ngenyanga efanayo, uDonaldson wathola ukuhlaselwa ngemuva kokuthi abalandeli belahlekelwe yimali eningi ohlelweni lwe- cryptocurrency uDonaldson ayelufake futhi wakhuthaza. 
Ngo-Okthoba 25, 2019, uDonaldson nowayengunjiniyela we- NASA kanye no-YouTuber uMark Rober bahlele umcimbi wokubambisana wokuphonswa kwemali ku-YouTube obizwa nge- #TeamTrees. 
Inhloso yale phrojekthi bekuwukuqongelela u- $ 20 million we- Arbor Day Foundation ngoJanuwari 1, 2020 bese utshala izihlahla "kungakadluli uDisemba 2022".Yonke iminikelo iya kwi-Arbor Day Foundation ethembisa ukutshala umuthi owodwa ngedola ngalinye.Abakwa-YouTubers abaziwayo abanjengoRhett & Link, Marshmello, iJustine, Marques Brownlee, The Slow Mo Guys, Ninja, Simone Giertz, Jacksepticeye, noSmarter Every Day baletha lo mbono. 
Izihlahla zaqala ukutshalwa ngo-Okthoba 2019 emapaki kazwelonke ase-United States.NgoDisemba 19 walowo nyaka, umgomo wama- $ 20,000,000 weqiwa,futhi kusukela ngoMeyi 27, 2020, iphrojekthi yafinyelela ngaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-22 zamaRandi.Le phrojekthi ithole neminikelo emikhulu evela kubaphathi bezinkampani uJack Dorsey, uSusan Wojcicki, u-Elon Musk,noTobias Lütke.Izinkampani ezifana Ukutholwa, Verizon futhi Izitshalo vs. AmaZombi nawo afake ukusiza. 
NgoSepthemba 17, 2020, kwakhiwa isiteshi se-YouTube iBeast Philanthropy.NgoMashi 26, 2021, lesi siteshi safaka ividiyo yaso yokuqala esihloko sithi "I Opened My Own Charity!" [1] lapho uDonaldson amemezele khona abantulayo, ibhange lokudla kanye noDarren kusuka kumavidiyo angaphambilini njengoMqondisi Omkhulu. 
UDonaldson wazalwa ngoMeyi 7, 1998 esifundazweni saseKansas.UDonaldson wakhuliswa ikakhulukazi kanye nomfowabo uCJ eGreenville, eNorth Carolina.UDonaldson uthweswe iziqu eGreenville Christian Academy, okuyisikole samabanga aphansi esizimele kule ndawo, e2016.Ufunde kafushane e- East Carolina University ngaphambi kokuyeka isikolem 
UDonaldson uphethwe yisifo sikaCrohn, isifo sokuvuvukala kwamathumbu .Kokuthunyelwe ku-2019 ku-Instagram, kwavezwa ukuthi uDonaldson wayethandana nemodeli ye-Instagram nomgqugquzeli wezokuxhumana uMaddy Spidell. 
Izinhlolovo zemibono zikhombisile ukuthi uDonaldson ungomunye wama-YouTubers athandwa kakhulu endaweni yesikhulumi ngenhlolovo ye-2021 yeSurveyMonkey ekhombisa ukuthi ama-70% wabaphenduli banombono omuhle ngaye, uma kuqhathaniswa nabangu-12% ababenombono ongathandeki.
