Kusukela ngoSepthemba 14, 2021, isiteshi esiyinhloko se-YouTube sikaDonaldson "MrBeast" sinababhalisile abayizigidi ezingama-69.2 kanye nokubukwa okuphelele okungu-12.5 billion.Yisiteshi se -11 esibhaliswe kakhulu ku-YouTube, kanye nesiteshi sesibili esibhaliswe kakhulu nge-YouTuber, futhi esabhaliswa kakhulu nge-YouTuber evela e- United States.Ngaphandle kwesiteshi sakhe esikhulu, uDonaldson unezinye iziteshi eziyisikhombisa ze-YouTube, kufaka phakathi i-MrBeast Shorts neMrBeast Gaming, lena efinyelela ngaphezu kwababhalisi abayizigidi eziyi-10 esikhathini esingaphansi konyaka.Eziteshini zakhe eziyisishiyagalombili, uDonaldson unababhalisile abayizigidi eziyi-121, kanye nokubukwa okuhlanganisiwe okuyizigidi eziyizinkulungwane eziyi-17.3 kuzo zonke lezi ziteshi eziyisishiyagalombili. 
Uhlu lwe-YouTubers Izihlahla Zethimba 
Ngo-2019, uDonaldson uwine i-Breakout Creator ngama- Streamy AwardsKuma- 12th Annual Shorty Awards ngo-2020, wawina i-YouTuber of the Year.Ube engumlobi njalo omunye phezulu 10 YouTubers ezilinganiselwa ikhokhwe ka 2020, ngokuhambisana namanye ubuntu ezifana Markiplier, Umhlaba Ryan sika futhi Blippi . 
UDonaldson ulayishe ividiyo yakhe yokuqala ngqa ye-YouTube ngoFebhuwari 2012, eneminyaka engu-13 ubudala, ngaphansi kwesibambo esithi "MrBeast6000"; okuqukethwe kwakhe kwasekuqaleni kwakusukela ku- Let Plays (kugxilwe kakhulu kwi- Minecraft ne- Call of Duty ),amavidiyo alinganisa ingcebo yamanye ama-YouTubers,amavidiyo anikezela ngamathiphu kubadali be-YouTube abazayo, namazwana ngomdlalo we-YouTube.Ngalesi sikhathi sokuqala kwesiteshi sakhe, uDonaldson ngokwakhe uvele okumbalwa kumavidiyo akhe. [1] 
I-PowerDirector ( Chinese ) uhlelo lokuhlela ividiyo olwenziwe yiCyberLink . 
I-PowerDirector isebenza ku-Windows 7, 8, no-10, ngezinguqulo ezingama-64-bit ezinconyiwe 
Isikhumba esisesikhotheni sesikhumba sinombala ophakeme kakhulu uma siqhathaniswa nawo wonke umzimba. 
I-septum ulwelwesi lwezicubu ezihlanganayo oluhlukanisa i-scrotum zibe izimbotshana ezimbili. 
I-scrotum lymph idonsela ekuqaleni kuma-lymph node angenhla, lokhu kudlulela kuma-lymph node ajulile.Ama-lymph node ajulile angenela ku-iliac ejwayelekile ekugcineni ekhipha i-lymph ku-cisterna chyli. 
I-testis eyodwa ngokuvamile iphansi kunenye, okukholelwa ukuthi isebenza ukugwema ukucindezelwa uma kwenzeka kuba nomthelela; kubantu, ama-testis angakwesokunxele ngokuvamile aphansi kunesokudla.Umbono ohlukile ngothi i-testis descent asymmetry yavela ukuze kupholise amasende ngempumelelo. 
I scrotum noma scrotal sac kuyinto yokwakheka besilisa isakhiwo zokuzala sise kumila umthondo ukuthi siqukethe okwesikhashana sac-dual-chambered zesikhumba bushelelezi kwemisipha. 
Itholakala ezilwaneni eziningi ezincelisayo zesilisa ezisemhlabeni.I-scrotum iqukethe i- spermatic fascia yangaphandle, ama- testes, i- epididymis, ne ductus deferens.Kungukuhlukaniswa kwe- perineum futhi kuthwala izicubu ezithile zesisu emgodini wayo kufaka phakathi umthambo wamasende, umthambo wamasende, ne-pampiniform plexus.I- perineal raphe iyisigaxa esincane, esime mpo, esikhuphuke kancane sesikhumba esingaphansi lapho okutholakala khona i- scrotal septum.Kubonakala njengolayini omncane we-longitudinal ogijima ngaphambili uye emuva phezu kwesikhafu sonke.Kubantu nakwezinye izilwane ezincelisayo i-scrotum imbozwa izinwele zasesidlangalaleni ngesikhathi sokuthomba .I-scrotum imvamisa iqine ngesikhathi sokumiswa kwe-penile nalapho ivezwa emazingeni okushisa abandayo.I-testis eyodwa ngokuvamile iphansi kunenye ukugwema ukucindezelwa uma kwenzeka kuba nomthelela. 
[1] 
Isikhutha silawula ukushisa kwamasende futhi sikugcine kuma-35 degrees Celsius (95 degrees Fahrenheit), okusho ukuthi ama-degree amabili noma amathathu ngaphansi kwezinga lokushisa komzimba elingu-37 degrees Celsius (98.6 degrees Fahrenheit).Amazinga okushisa aphakeme athinta i- spermatogenesisUkulawulwa kwamazinga okushisa kufezwa yimisipha ebushelelezi yesikhotha esihambisa amasende noma asondele eduze noma kude nesisu esixhomeke emazingeni okushisa ambient.Lokhu kufezwa umsipha we-cremaster esiswini kanye ne- dartos fascia (izicubu zemisipha ngaphansi kwesikhumba). 
Ucwaningo luveze ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kwekhompyutha ephathekayo ebekwe ethangeni kungathinta kabi ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda. [1] 
I-scrotum i-biologically homologous kuya kuma- labia majora kwabesifazane.Yize sikhona ezilwaneni eziningi ezincelisayo, i-scrotum sangaphandle asikho ezilwaneni ezincelisayo zasolwandle ezihlanjululwe, njengemikhomo nezimpawu,kanye nakwezinye izizukulwane zezilwane ezincelisayo zomhlaba, njengama- afrotherians, ama- xenarthrans, nemindeni eminingi yamalulwane, amagundane, kanye nezinambuzane.[1] 
I-scrotum nokuqukethwe kwayo kungahlakulela izifo noma kungene ukulimala. 
Ukufakwa okuningana, uhlobo lwesikhashana lokuguqulwa komzimba Isitho socansi Ukuhlukaniswa kwe-lymph node ye-Retroperitoneal Ukuzihlola kwamasende 
Iscrotum 
Ukwehla kwamandla emali okwenziwe ngamanani, noma ukumunca i-scrotal infusion, umkhuba ongajwayelekile [1] wezocansi lapho kufakwa khona uketshezi (ngokuvamile olune-saline solution, kodwa kwesinye isikhathi umoya noma enye igesi [2] ) ku- scrotum ukuze lwenze ibhaluni ngosayizi. [1]Iqukethe izingozi eziningi zezinkinga ezinkulu, kufaka phakathi i-scrotal cellulitis [3] ne- emphysema engaphansi kwesikhumba, [2] [4] futhi mhlawumbe nezinkinga ezibulalayo ezifana ne- Fournier gangrene noma i- embolism yomoya . [3] 
Ukuhlukumezeka kwe-penile kungavela ekulimaleni okungaqondile noma okungena ngaphakathi, lokhu okugcina kungaphenywa kakhulu ngezindlela zokucabanga, cishe ngaso sonke isikhathi kudinga ukuhlolwa ngokushesha kokuhlinzwa.Emthondweni omile, ukuhlukumezeka kubangelwa ukunwebeka nokuncipha kwe-tunica albuginea, engahle idilizwe ngokwengxenye eyodwa noma zombili ze-corpora cavernosa, okudala ukuphuka kwepenile. [1] 
Ku-10-15% we-penile traumas, kungaba nesilonda esihambisana ne-urethral. 
Lapho kugcinwa igazi enyameni ye-urethral, ukuhlolwa okuthuthukisiwe kokuqhathanisa kwe-urethra kuyadingeka.Ezimweni lapho ukutholakala kwe-ultrasound kungahambelani, ukusetshenziswa kwemifanekiso yamagnetic resonance kungenza kube lula ukuxilongwa futhi kunconywe ababhali abahlukahlukene. [1] 
Ukuphuka kwepenile kuyisimo esiphuthumayo sezokwelapha, futhi ukulungiswa kokuhlinzwa okuphuthumayo yindlela yokwelashwa ejwayelekile.Ukubambezeleka ekufuneni ukwelashwa kukhuphula izinga lokuxakaniseka.Izindlela ezingezona ezokuhlinzwa zibangela amazinga okuxakaniseka ayi-10-50% afaka ukungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile, i- penile curvature yaphakade, ukulimala kwe- urethra nobuhlungu ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini, ngenkathi iziguli ezelashwa ngokuhlinzwa zithola isilinganiso se-11% sokuxakaniseka. 
Ukuphuka kwepenile ukuqhekeka kweyodwa noma zombili ze- tunica albuginea, izembozo ezinemicu emboza i- corpora cavernosa yepipi.Kubangelwa amandla asheshayo aqonde endondeni emile, imvamisa ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini, noma ukushaya indlwabu ngolaka.Kwesinye isikhathi kufaka nokuqhekeka okuyingxenye noma okuphelele kwe- urethra noma ukulimala kwezinzwa, imithambo nemithambo yegazi . [1] 
E- United States, icala likaDoe v. UMoe, iMisa lama-63. 
Uhlelo lokusebenza. Ct. 
I-516, 827 NE2d 240 (2005), isikweletu esivivinyiwe sokulimala kwepenile okwenziwe ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini.Inkantolo yenqabile ukuthola umsebenzi phakathi kwabantu abadala ababili abavumelana ngemibono.Ummangali kuleli cala, owesilisa owahlushwa isitho sangasese sowesilisa, wakhononda ngokuthi ummangalelwa, owayeyintombi yakhe, wamlimaza ngesikhathi ephezu kwakhe ngesikhathi benza ucansi.Inkantolo yamvuna, yanquma ukuthi ukuziphatha kwakhe kwakungeyona into engafanele ngokomthetho noma budedengu. 
Umsindo wokuqhuma noma wokuqhekeka, ubuhlungu obukhulu, ukuvuvukala, ukulahlekelwa ngokushesha kokwakhiwa okuholela ekuqothukeni, kanye ne- hematoma yesikhumba yamasayizi ahlukahlukene kuvame ukuhlotshaniswa nomcimbi wezocansi. [1] 
[1]Ubulili besitho sangasese sowesilisa nokushaya indlwabu okunolaka kuyizimbangela ezivame kakhulu.Ucwaningo lwango-2014 lwamarekhodi ezingozi kanye nezimo eziphuthumayo ezibhedlela ezintathu eCampinas, eBrazil, lukhombisile ukuthi owesifazane osezikhundleni eziphezulu udale ingozi enkulu kakhulu ngokuthi isikhundla sezithunywa zevangeli sibe esiphephe kakhulu.Ucwaningo lubhekise ekutheni uma umlingani owamukelayo ephezulu, bavame ukulawula ukunyakaza futhi abakwazi ukuphazamisa ukunyakaza lapho ipipi lithola ukungena okungalungile.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, lapho umlingani ongena ngaphakathi elawula ukunyakaza, banamathuba angcono okuyeka ukuphendula ubuhlungu bokungalungiswa kahle, banciphise ukulimala. 
Umkhuba we- taqaandan (obuye abe ngu- taghaandan ) nawo ubeka abesilisa engcupheni yokuphuka i-penile.Taqaandan, elivela Kurdish elisho "ukwetha chofoza" kuhilela eguqa phezulu ingxenye umthondo uqonde ngenkathi ebambe ingxenye engezansi kushaft esikhundleni, kuze ukuchofoza wezwa futhi wazizwa.UTaqaandan kuthiwa akanabuhlungu futhi useqhathaniswe nokuqhekeka imimese yomuntu, kepha umkhuba we-taqaandan uholele ekwandeni kokuqhekeka kwezintambo zepenile entshonalanga ye- Iran .Taqaandan kungase kwenziwe ukufeza detumescence . 
Longitudinal section showing rupture of the tunica albuginea with an adjacent 1.92 cm hematoma (between calipers), due to trauma.[1] B: Axial T2-weighted turbo spin-echo magnetic resonance imaging scan showing left-sided discontinuity of the tunica albuginea (arrow), secondary to fracture.[1] 
Ukubhoboza izitho zangasese kuyindlela yokubhoboza umzimba okubandakanya ukubhoboza ingxenye ethile yezitho zangasese, ngaleyo ndlela kwakheke indawo efanelekile yokugqoka izinhlobo ezahlukene zobucwebe.Noma kunjalo, leli gama lingasetshenziswa futhi i- pars pro toto ukukhombisa konke ukubhoboza umzimba endaweni ye- anus, perineum, izitho zangasese kanye ne- mons pubis, kufaka phakathi ukubhoboza okufana ne- anal, i-guiche, ne- pubic engabandakanyi ukuphuka kwesitho sangasese .Ukubhoboza izitho zangasese kungenziwa kwabesilisa noma kwabesifazane, ngezinhlobo ezahlukahlukene zokubhoboza ezitholakalayo.Isisusa esikhulu sabo bobabili ubulili ukuhlobisa nokuzenzela; ngaphezu kwalokho, okunye ukubhoboza kuthuthukisa injabulo yezocansi ngokwandisa ukuvuselela.Ukubhoboza izitho zangasese kungatholakala emiphakathini eminingi yezizwe, ikakhulukazi eNingizimu naseMpumalanga ye-Asia, lapho bekuyingxenye yomkhuba wendabuko kusukela ezikhathini zasendulo. 
Amarekhodi okuqala wokubhoboza izitho zangasese atholakala kwi- Kama Sutra eyabhalwa eminyakeni engaphezu kwengu-2000 eyedlule. 
Njengokubhoboza umzimba kukhulu, ukubhoboza izitho zangasese kuvame ukwenziwa ngezizathu zobuhle nanjengesibonakaliso sesitayela sakho.Ngaphezu kwalokho, ezinye (kepha hhayi zonke) izinhlobo zokubhoboza izitho zangasese zandisa ukuzwela futhi zinikeze ukukhuthazeka okwengeziwe ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini noma ukugqugquzela.Ngokusho kombiko wochwepheshe we- Association of Professional Piercers ka-Elayne Angel, oyiphayona lokubhoboza umzimba, owayeyilungu le-Gauntlet futhi owasungula ukubhoboza izitho zangasese okufana ne- fourchette ne- lorum, izisusa nezintandokazi zomuntu zihluke kakhulu: 
Ngokwengeziwe, ukubhoboza izitho zangasese kungakhuphula injabulo yezocansi ngesikhathi sokushaya indlwabu, ukudlala kwangaphambili nokuya ocansini.Ngenkathi ukubhoboza izitho zangasese zabesifazane kukwenza lokhu kuphela kwabesifazane abazigqokile, ukubhoboza izitho zangasese zabesilisa kungakhuthaza ukukhuthazeka kwabo bobabili umuntu ogqoke ubucwebe nozakwabo ngokuvuselela zombili izingqimba zomuntu ozigqokile nodonga lwesitho sangasese sowesifazane noma ingquza yomlingani ongene ngaphakathi.Ngenxa yomzimba wobufazi, abesifazane babonakala bethola injabulo ethe xaxa ngokocansi kubo bobabili, ngokwabo nangokubhoboza izitho zobulili zomlingani wakhe. 
Lo mphumela ubikwa ikakhulukazi ngokubhoboza okudlula kumthondo we-glans: ukubhoboza kwe-ampallang ne-apadravya.Abesifazane baseDayak eSarawak, eBorneo bathanda amadoda ane-ampallang, bethi ukuya ocansini ngaphandle kuzoba buthuntu: 
UPaolo Mantegazza uthe, women Abesifazane baseDayak banelungelo lokugcizelela i-ampallang futhi uma indoda ingavumi bangafuna ukwehlukana. 
Bathi ukwangana ngaphandle kwalomcabango kuyilayisi elisobala; ngayo ilayisi ngosawoti."Kwenye i-akhawunti yisazi semvelaphi yabantu uTom Harrisson, owachitha isikhathi esiningi sempilo yakhe eBorneo futhi waxoxisana nabomdabu mayelana ne-ampallang yendabuko; uthe, "umsebenzi wale divayisi, phezulu, ukwengeza ubumnandi bezocansi besifazane ngokuvuselela nokwelula izindonga zangaphakathi zesitho sangasese sowesifazane.Kulokhu, ngokwami ukubona, kuphumelele ngokunqumela. " [1] 
Abanye odokotela bakholelwa ukuthi ukubhoboza izitho zobulili kwabesilisa kwandisa ingozi yokudluliswa kwe-STD ngokwenza izivimbelo zocansi eziphephile (amakhondomu) zingasebenzi kahle. 
[1] [2] [3]Iningi lababhobozi bochwepheshe nabathandi bobuciko bomzimba bakholelwa ukuthi lezi zingozi zichazwe ngokweqile noma azikho.Ocwaningweni olwenziwe kabili, u-5% –18% wamadoda abhoboza izitho zangasese abike “izinkinga ezingasetshenziswanga zokusebenzisa amakhondomu” yize kungacaci ukuthi mangaki kulawa madoda abesebenzisa amakhondomu njalo. [4]Abukho ubufakazi obuqanda ikhanda bokuthi abaphatha ukubhoboza izitho zangasese banamathuba amaningi okuthi bathole izifo ezithathelwana ngocansi. [4] 
Isikhathi sokupholisa ngokuphelele ukubhoboza izitho zangasese sehluka kakhulu, kuya ngesiza sokubhoboza nezimpawu zomuntu ngamunye: singaqala kusukela esontweni kuye ezinyangeni eziyisithupha.Kuze kube selulame ngokuphelele, kufanele kwenziwe amalungiselelo ngokulwa nezimbangela zokutheleleka, njengokuhlanzwa okufanele nsuku zonke.Abantu abanokubhoboza okusha kufanele bagweme ukuya ocansini ezinsukwini ezimbalwa zokuqala futhi futhi lapho-ke kufanele basebenzise imigoqo yokuvikela ngokomzimba njengamakhondomu kuze kube yilapho ukubhoboza selulame ngokuphelele. 
Imithetho kwamanye amazwe iyahlukahluka.Emazweni amaningi ase-Europe, izingane kudingeka ukuthi zilethe ifomu lokuvuma elisayiniwe noma lizophelezelwa ngugadi osemthethweni.Ngisho nasemazweni angenayo imithetho elawula ukubhoboza izitho zobulili ezinganeni, abaningi abagwazayo bayayeka ukukwenza (ngoba ukukhula komzimba akuqediwe kwabancane).E- United States, akuvunyelwe ukubhoboza izitho zangasese zabantu abangaphansi kweminyaka eyi-18. 
Izindawo ezingabhoboza ezithweni zobulili zesilisa zifaka i-glans, isikhumba somgudu wepenisi, i- scrotum noma i- perineum. 
Ukubhoboza ngokusebenzisa glans wenduku zihlanganisa ampallang, oludlula nendawo, kanye apadravya, ludlulele thwi ngokusebenzisa glans.Ukubhoboza iPrince Albert kutholakala ohlangothini lomgogodla (ngaphansi) kwepipi ngokushesha ngemuva kwe-glans, kanti ukubuyela emuva kwePrince Albert kudlula ngasesinqeni (phezulu) sohlangothi.I- dydoe ihlaba ngasemgqeni we-coronal we-glans.Ngaphandle kwe-dydoe, konke lokhu kubhoboza ngokwesiko kudlula kwi-urethra.Lokhu kukhethwa ngoba isikhathi sokuphulukisa kanye nezifo zokutheleleka kuncishiswa ukuhamba komchamo oyinyumba. 
Lokhu kubhoboza kunikeza ukukhuthazeka okwandayo ngesikhathi sokuya kowesilisa (ophethe ukubhoboza) kanye nakumlingani.Ukubhoboza ekhanda, noma i-glans, kungukubhoboza izitho zobulili ngobufakazi bomlando obhalwe kahle kakhulu. 
Ukubhoboza isikhumba kudlula esikhunjeni se-penile ohlangothini lwe-dorsal, ventral noma le-lateral.Kuyadingeka ukuthi owesilisa angasoki.Ukubhoboza i-frenum kudlula nge-penile frenum, ibhuloho elincane lesikhumba elixhumanisa i-glans nesikhumba se-shaft.Le ngxenye yokwakheka komzimba kaningi ayitholakali emadodeni asokile. 
Ukubhoboza i-hafada kutholakala esikhunjeni se-scrotum.Njengenguqulo ephakathi nendawo phakathi kwe-frenulum ne-hafada, ukubhoboza i-lorum ( lo w fren um ) kuhlala lapho kuhlangana khona ipipi nesirobhothi. 
Isitebhisi sikaJacob siyisitebhisi esisuka kwi-frenum kuya esikhwameni.Ukubhoboza i-guiche ukubhoboza umzimba ku-perineum. 
Lokhu kubhoboza kudlala indima encane ekungezeni ukugqugquzela nokuningi kufeza kuphela injongo yokuhlobisa. 
Amagqabha e-clitoris uqobo angahlatshwa.Njengoba le ngxenye yokwakheka incane kakhulu ezimweni eziningi, lokhu kubhoboza akuvamile.Ngokuphambene nalokho, ukubhoboza i-clitoral hood yikubhoboza okuvame kakhulu kwezitho zobulili kubantu abanemizimba yabesifazane.Ingasetshenziswa ngokuvundlile nangokuqondile. 
Ukubhoboza hood okujulile kungukwehluka kokubhoboza i-clitoral hood okudlula kujule nge hood clitoral. 
Ukubhoboza u-Isabella kudlula mpo ngomgogodla futhi kunzima kakhulu ukubhoboza. 
Ukubhoboza i-Labia kungasetshenziswa kuma- labia majora noma kwi- labia minora.Ukubhoboza i-Triangle kutholakala ekugcineni kwe-labia minora, lapho kuguquka khona phakathi kwe-labia ne-clitoral hood.Igijima ngokuvundlile, ngokwengxenye ingaphansi kwesigaxa se-clitoral.Ngomphetho we-dorsal we-vestibule ye-vulval kudlula ukubhoboza kwe-Fourchette.Uhlobo olungajwayelekile kakhulu lwe-Fourchette ukubhoboza i-Suitcase, okungathathwa njenge-Fourchette ejulile (ingena ku-perineum).Okunye futhi ukuthi akujwayelekile ukubhoboza kweNkosazana u-Albertina, inguqulo yabesifazane yokubhoboza kweNkosana u-Albert, edlula odongeni lwe-ventral (ngezansi) lwe-urethra. 
Ukubhoboza uChristina ukubhoboza indawo, okusengxenyeni engenhla yamamons pubis lapho kuhlangana khona amalebula angaphandle.Kuyafana nokubhoboza kweNefertiti, okungabonakala njengokuhlangana phakathi kokubhoboza i-clitoral hood ukubhoboza nokubhoboza kukaChristina. 
Ukubhoboza umzimba okungabandakanyi ukugcotshwa kwezitho zobulili kodwa okubizwa ngokuthi "ukubhoboza izitho zangasese" ngomhlangano kungagqokwa yibo bonke abesilisa nabesifazane.Lokhu kufaka phakathi ukubhoboza esidlangalaleni, okutholakala ngenhla kwepipi emadodeni nakumamon pubic kwabesifazane (okuqhathaniswa nokubhoboza kukaChristina, kepha kuvundle).Ukubhoboza i-guiche kudlula ngokuvundlile nge-perineum ngenkathi ukubhoboza i-anal kudlula endunu. 
Ibhayibheli kanye nethiyori ebucayi iyincwadi evuleke kabili yokufinyelela evulelekile kontanga emkhakheni wezifundo zebhayibheli nangethiyori ebucayi.Yasungulwa nguRoland Boer e2004, futhi yashicilelwa yiMonash University ePress kwaze kwaba ngu-2010.Kusukela ngo-2011 ibishicilelwa ngokuzimela.UJulie Kelso wayengumhleli omkhulu kusukela ngo-2008-2011, wabe esehlanganyela neBoer kusuka ngo-2012-2015.Lusukela ngo-2016-2020, uCaroline Blyth noRobert J. Myles babengabahleli abakhulu. 
Iphephabhuku likhishwe futhi libhalwe ku- ATLA Religion Database nakuScopus . 
Ukuhlukaniswa okuyizingxenye ezintathu okuvezwe kusichasiso esithi Tanakh kufakazelwa kahle ezincwadini zorabi .Ngaleso sikhathi, noma kunjalo, iTanakh ayizange isetshenziswe.Esikhundleni salokho, isihloko esifanele bekuyiMikra (noma iMiqra, מקרא, okusho ukufunda noma lokho okufundwayo ) ngoba imibhalo yeBhayibheli yayifundwa obala. 
Isiqubulo esithi 'Tanakh' siqoshwa okokuqala enkathini ephakathi. [2] UMikra uyaqhubeka nokusetshenziswa ngesiHeberu kuze kube namuhla, eceleni kweTanakh, ukubhekisa kwimibhalo yesiHeberu. 
NgesiHeberu sakamuva esikhulunywayo, ziyashintshana. [3] 
Ubudlelwano obuphakathi kwemibhalo yesandla yasendulo ephawulekayo yeTestamente Elidala (eminye ikhonjwe yisiglum sabo). 
Mt ukuba umbhalo wamaMasorete.Umbhalo ophansi kakhulu "(elahlekile)" kungaba yi- Urtext . 
Ngokwe- Legends of the Jews kaLouis Ginzberg, incwadi engamashumi amabili nane yezincwadi zeBhayibheli yesiHeberu yamiswa ngu- Ezra nababhali ngesikhathi seThempeli Lesibili.[1] 
Inani lamagama ahlukile eBhayibhelini lesiHeberu lingu-8,679, okuyi-1 480 kuwo angama- hapax legomena, : 112 amagama noma izinkulumo ezenzeka kanye kuphela.Inani lezimpande ezihlukile zamaSemite, lapho iningi lala magama aseBhayibhelini asekelwe khona, cishe linga-2000. [1] : 112 
IBhayibheli isiHebheru noma Tanakh [lower-alpha 1] ( /t ɑː n ɑː x / ; [1] Hebrew : pronounced [taˈnaχ] noma [təˈnax] ), iqoqo lezincwadi zemibhalo yesiHeberu, okubandakanya neTorah.Le mibhalo icishe ibe ngesiHeberu seBhayibheli kuphela, inezindima ezimbalwa ngesi-Aramu seBhayibheli (ezincwadini zikaDaniel no- Ezra, ivesi uJeremiya 10:11,namagama athile). 
ITanakh iqukethe izincwadi ezingamashumi amabili nane, kubalwa njengencwadi eyodwa u-1 Samuweli no-2 Samuweli, 1 Amakhosi no-2 AmaKhosi, 1 IziKronike no-2 IziKronike, no- Ezra – Nehemiya.I abaProfethi Nambili Minor ‎ עשר ) nazo zibalwa njengencwadi eyodwa.NgesiHeberu, izincwadi zivame ukubhekiswa ngamagama (amagama) abo avelele. 
ITorah (תּוֹרָה, ngokwezwi nezwi "ukufundisa" ), eyaziwa nangokuthi iPentateuch, noma "Izincwadi Ezinhlanu ZikaMose".Ezinguqulweni ezinyathelisiwe (kunokuba imiqulu) Torah ngokuvamile abizwa ngokuthi "Chamisha Chumshei Torah" ‎ חומשי תורה "Izingxenye ezinhlanu ezinhlanu zeTorah" ) nangokungakahleleki i- "Chumash" . 
Nevi'im ‎ Nəḇī'īm , "Prophets" ) isigaba sesibili esikhulu seTanakh, phakathi kweTorah neKetuvim.Lesi sigaba sifaka izincwadi ezihlanganisa isikhathi esivela ekungeneni kwama-Israyeli angene eZweni lakwa-Israyeli kuze kube sekudingisweni kwaseBabiloni kwaJuda ( "isikhathi sokuprofetha" ).Ukusatshalaliswa kwabo akulandeli ngokulandelana kwezikhathi, kodwa kuyenzeka. 
Ifomu lombhalo ukuthi unegunya ngoba yorabi UbuJuda njengoba laziwa wamaMasorete Umbhalo (MT) futhi siqukethe izincwadi 24, futhi kuhlelwa yabala usebenzisa perek futhi pasuk ( Izahluko kanye namavesi zeBhayibheli ).Okuqukethwe yiBhayibheli lesiHeberu kuyefana ne- Protestant Christian Old Testament, lapho okubhaliwe kuhlukaniswe kwaba yizincwadi ezingama-39 futhi kwahlelwa ngendlela ehlukile. 
AmaBhayibheli amaKhatholika, amaBhayibheli ase-Eastern / Greek Orthodox namaBhayibheli ase- Ethiopia aqukethe izinto ezengeziwe, ezithathwe kwi- Septuagint (imibhalo ehunyushelwe ku- Koine Greek ) neminye imithombo. 
Ngaphezu kombhalo weMasoretic, izazi zanamuhla ezifuna ukuqonda umlando weBhayibheli lesiHeberu zisebenzisa imithombo ehlukahlukene.Lokhu kufaka phakathi i-Septuagint, inguqulo yesiSyriac ethi Peshitta, iPentateuch yaseSamariya, iqoqo lemiQulu yoLwandle Olufile nezingcaphuno ezivela emibhalweni yesandla yorabi.Le mithombo ingaba mdala kunoMbhalo weMasorete kwezinye izimo futhi ivame ukwehluka kuyo.Lokhu kwehluka kuye kwaveza umbono wokuthi kukhona omunye umbhalo, i- Urtext ye-Hebrew Bible, owake waba khona futhi ungumthombo wezinguqulo ezikhona namuhla. [3]Kodwa-ke, i-Urtext enjalo ayikaze itholakale, futhi yiziphi kulezi nguqulo ezintathu ezaziwa kakhulu (i-Septuagint, i-Masoretic Text, i-Samaritan Pentateuch) esiseduzane ne-Urtext okuxoxiswana ngayo. 
Lezi zincwadi ezintathu nazo kuphela eTanakh ezinesistimu ekhethekile yamanothi e-cantillation aklanyelwe ukugcizelela iziqu ezifanayo ngaphakathi kwamavesi.Kodwa-ke, ukuqala nokuphela kwencwadi kaJobe kusezinhlelweni ezijwayelekile zeprozi. 
Izincwadi ezinhlanu ezimfishane kakhulu zeNgoma Yezingoma, iNcwadi kaRuth, iNcwadi yesiLilo, uMshumayeli, neNcwadi ka-Esteri zaziwa ngokuhlanganyela njenge- Ḥamesh Megillot (iMegillot emihlanu).Lezi yizincwadi zakamuva eziqoqwe futhi zaqokwa "njengegunya" ohlwini lwezincwadi lwamaJuda, ngezingxenye zakamuva ezinezinsuku ezisukela ekhulwini lesi-2 BCE.Le miqulu ngokwesiko ifundwa phakathi nonyaka emiphakathini eminingi yamaJuda. 
Ngaphandle kwezincwadi ezintathu zezinkondlo kanye nemiqulu emihlanu, izincwadi ezisele eKetuvim nguDaniel, uEzra – uNehemiya noKronike.Yize kungekho ukuqoqwa okusemthethweni kwalezi zincwadi ngokwesiko lamaJuda, nokho babelana ngezici eziningi ezihlukanisayo. 
I-Nach, nayo i-anglicized , ibhekisa ezingxenyeni zeTanakh zeNevi'im neKetuvim.UNach uvame ukubizwa ngokuthi yisihloko sakhe, esihlukile kwiTorah. 
Kuyisifundo esikhulu kwikharikhulamu yezikole eziphakeme zama-Orthodox zamantombazane nasemaseminari abazofunda kuwo kamuva, futhi imvamisa ifundiswa ngothisha abehlukile kunalabo abafundisa uChumash.Ikharikhulamu yezikole zamabanga aphakeme zabafana ifaka kuphela izingxenye ezithile zeNach, njengencwadi kaJoshua, incwadi yabaHluleli, [3] kanye ne-Five Megillot. [4] 
Ukuphawula okuyinhloko okusetshenziselwe iChumash ukuphawula kukaRashi.Ukuphawula kukaRashi kanye nokuphawula kweMetzudot yizincazelo ezinkulu zeNach. 
ITanakh yisifushaniso, esenziwe ngohlamvu lokuqala lwesiHeberu lwezigaba ezintathu zendabuko zeMasoretic Text : Torah (ngokwezwi nezwi 'Umyalelo' noma 'Umthetho'), Nevi'im (Prophets), neKetuvim (Writings) - lapho TaNaKh. 
Okuvame kakhulu izinto ezisuselwa ku- polydimethylsiloxane, etholakala nge-hydrolysis ye- dimethyldichlorosilane.Le dichloride iphendula ngamanzi ngale ndlela elandelayo: 
I-polymerization ivame ukukhiqiza amaketanga aqondile ahlanganiswe namaqembu e-Si-Cl noma ama-Si-OH ( silanol ).Ngaphansi kwezimo ezihlukile, i-polymer iyindilinga, hhayi iketanga. 
Ezinsizeni zabathengi ezifana ne-caulks silyl acetates zisetshenziswa esikhundleni sama-silyl chloride.I-hydrolysis yama-acetate ikhiqiza i- acetic acid engeyona ingozi (i-asidi etholakala kuviniga ) njengomkhiqizo wokuphendula wenqubo yokwelapha ehamba kancane.Le chemistry isetshenziswa ezinhlelweni eziningi zabathengi, njenge-silicone caulk kanye nama- adhesives . 
Amagatsha noma ama-crosslinks kuketanga le-polymer angeniswa ngokusebenzisa i-organosilicone precursors enamaqembu ama-alkyl ambalwa, njenge-methyl trichlorosilane ne- methyltrimethoxysilane .Ngokufanelekile, i-molecule ngayinye yenkomfa enjalo iba iphuzu legatsha.Le nqubo ingasetshenziselwa ukukhiqiza izinhlaka ze-silicone ezinzima.Ngokufanayo, abangaphambi kwamaqembu amathathu e-methyl bangasetshenziswa ukunciphisa isisindo samangqamuzana, ngoba i-molecule ngayinye enjalo inesiza esisodwa kuphela esisebenzayo ngakho-ke yakha ukuphela kochungechunge lwe-siloxane. 
I- silicone noma i- polysiloxane iyi- polymer eyenziwe nge- siloxane (2R 2 Si − O − SiR 2 -, lapho R = iqembu lezinto eziphilayo).Ngokuvamile akunambala, uwoyela noma izinto ezifana nenjoloba.Ama-silicone asetshenziswa kuma-sealants, ama-adhesives, izinto zokuthambisa, imithi, izitsha zokupheka, nokufakwa okushisayo nokugesi.Amanye amafomu ajwayelekile afaka uwoyela we-silicone, i- silicone grease, iraba le- silicone, i-resin ye-silicone, ne-silicone caulk. 
Ama-silicone akhombisa izici eziningi eziwusizo, kufaka phakathi: 
Abicah angakhiwa amashidi wenjoloba, lapho enezinye izinto, njengokuhambisana ne-FDA.Lokhu kunweba ukusetshenziswa kwamashidi abicah ezimbonini ezifuna inhlanzeko, isibonelo, ukudla neziphuzo kanye nemithi. 
Imisebenzi 
Ama-silicone asetshenziswa emikhiqizweni eminingi.I-Ullmann's Encyclopedia of Industrial Chemistry ibala le mikhakha emikhulu elandelayo yohlelo lokusebenza:Ugesi (isib. Ukwahlukanisa), i-elekthronikhi (isib. Ukumboza), abendlu (isib.Ama-sealants nezitsha zokupheka), imoto (isib. 
Amabhasiketi), indiza (isb. Izimvu zamanzi), ihhovisi imishini (isib. ama-keyboard pads), ezokwelapha nezamazinyo (isib. isikhunta sokuveza amazinyo), izindwangu kanye nephepha (isib.Kulezi zicelo, kulinganiselwa ukuthi kwakhiqizwa amathani angama-silicone angaba ngu-400,000 ngo-1991.Izibonelo ezithile, ezinkulu nezincane zethulwe ngezansi. 
Emkhakheni wezimoto, i- silicone grease imvamisa isetshenziswa njengothambisa wezinto zokubopha ngoba izinzile emazingeni okushisa aphakeme, ayincibiliki emanzini, futhi mancane kakhulu amathuba okuthi ingcoliswe ezinye izinto zokuthambisa.Uketshezi lwamabhuleki lwe-DOT 5 lususelwa kuma-silicone e-liquid. 
Izintambo ze-spark plug zezimoto zivinjwe izingqimba eziningi ze-silicone ukuvikela izinhlansi ukuthi zingagxumeli ezintanjeni ezincikene, kubangele ukungqubuzana.I-Silicone tubing kwesinye isikhathi isetshenziswa ezinhlelweni zokungeniswa kwezimoto (ikakhulukazi izinjini ezinokufakwa ngenkani ). 
Izitshalo ezikhiqiza umzimba nezitolo zokupenda zivikela ama-silicone, ngoba ukungcoliswa komkhondo kungadala "amehlo enhlanzi", amancane, yimigodi eyisiyingi ephazamisa ukuphela kahle. 
Ukwengeza, izinhlanganisela ze-silicone ezifana ne-silicone rubber zisetshenziselwa ukugcoba nama-sealants kuma- airbags ; amandla aphakeme enjoloba abicah ayenza ihlangane kahle futhi ivale ama-airbags anomthelela omkhulu.Silicones ngokuhlanganiswa ne-thermoplastics ahlinzeka ngokuthuthuka ekumeni nasekumelaneni kwe-mar kanye ne-coefficient eyehlayo yokungqubuzana. 
Amandla nokwethembeka kwenjoloba abicah kuvunywa kabanzi embonini yezokwakha. 
Izingxenye ezine ze-silicone sealants kanye nama-caulks kusetshenziswa ngokujwayelekile ukuvala izikhala, amalunga kanye nemifantu ezakhiweni.Ingxenye eyodwa yesilicone iyelapha ngokumunca umswakama womoya, okwenza kube lula ukufakwa.Amapayipi, abicah amafutha ngokuvamile isetshenziswa O-amasongo zethusi ompompi kanye valve, ekuvimbeleni lime kusukela kunanyathelwe metal. 
I-silicone yesakhiwo nayo isetshenzisiwe ekwakhiweni kwezindonga zamakhethini kusukela ngo-1974 lapho i- Art Institute yaseChicago yaba yisakhiwo sokuqala ukuthola ingilazi yangaphandle elungiswe kuphela ngezinto ezibonakalayo.Izicubu ze-Silicone zisetshenziselwe ukumboza nokubuyisa uphahla lwezimboni, ngenxa yokumelana kwayo ne-UV ngokweqile, kanye nokukwazi ukugcina ukusebenza kwazo kungangenwa ngamanzi amashumi eminyaka. 
Okuningi ngokunembile ngokuthi polymerized siloxanes noma polysiloxanes, silicones aqukethe i wezinto Silicon--mpilo backbone uchungechunge (⋯ -Si-O-Si-O-Si-O- ⋯) nemacembu lamabili organic enamathiselwe ngamunye isikhungo silicon.Imvamisa, amaqembu aphilayo yi-methyl.Izinto zokwakha zingaba yi-cyclic noma i-polymeric.Ngokushintshashintsha ubude beketanga le-iSi − O−, amaqembu asemaceleni, nokuxhumeka kwe-crosslinking, ama-silicone angahlanganiswa nezinto eziningi ezahlukahlukene nokwakhiwa.Zingahluka ngokungaguquguquki kusuka kuketshezi kuya ku-gel kuye kuraba kuye kupulasitiki onzima.I-siloxane ejwayelekile kakhulu i-linear polydimethylsiloxane (PDMS), uwoyela we-silicone.Iqembu lesibili ngobukhulu lezinto zokwenziwa ze-silicone lincike ezinhlakeni ze-silicone, ezakhiwa ngama-oligosiloxanes anamagatsha kanye nezinyosi. 
I-silicone yotshwala ingasetshenziswa njenge- solvent yokuhlanza eyomile, ukuhlinzeka ngokuhlukile kune-chlorine yendabuko-equkethe i- perchlorethylene (perc) solvent.Ukusetshenziswa kwama-silicone ekuhlanzeni okomile kunciphisa umphumela wezemvelo wemboni evame ukungcolisa kakhulu. 
Ezogesi 
Igwebu le-Silicone lisetshenziswe ezakhiweni zaseNyakatho Melika ukuzama ukuvimba umlilo ngaphakathi kwebandla elilinganiselwe ukumelana nomlilo kanye nemihlangano yaphansi ukuvimbela ukusabalala kwamalangabi nentuthu kusuka kwelinye igumbi kuya kwelinye.Uma ifakwe kahle, izikhuni zomlilo ezingamacwecwe ezinjenge-silicone zingenzelwa ukuhambisana nekhodi yokwakha.Izinzuzo zifaka ukuguquguquka namandla aphezulu we- dielectric.Okubi kubandakanya ukushisa (okunzima ukucisha) nokuthuthuka okukhulu kwentuthu. 
Izicishamlilo ze-Silicone-foam kube yindaba yokuphikisana nokucindezelwa ngenxa yokuthuthuka kwentuthu kusuka ku-pyrolysis yezinto ezivuthayo ngaphakathi kwe-foam, ukuphuma kwegesi le- hydrogen, ukuncipha nokuqhekeka.Lezi zinkinga ziholele emicimbini ebikiwe phakathi kwabanamalayisense (abasebenza ngezikhungo zamandla enuzi ) weKhomishini Yokulawula Inuzi (NRC) . 
Amafutha abicah asetshenziselwa izinhloso eziningi, njengamaketanga amabhayisikili, izingxenye zezibhamu ze- airsoft, nezinye izindlela ezahlukahlukene. 
Imvamisa, i-lubricant esethiwe eyomile ihanjiswa ngesithwali se-solvent ukungena kulo mshini.Isinyibilikisi sibe sesihwamuka, sishiya ifilimu ecacile ethambisa kodwa engadonseli ukungcola nokugaya njengoyise othanjiswa uwoyela noma okunye okugcobisayo kwendabuko. 
Amasistimu abicah ayizingxenye ezimbili asetshenziswa njengezikhunta zenjoloba ukusakaza izinhlaka, amagwebu, injoloba kanye nama-alloys asezingeni lokushisa eliphansi.Isikhunta se-silicone ngokuvamile sidinga ukukhishwa kwesikhunta noma ukulungiswa kwangaphansi, njengoba izinto eziningi zingahambelani ne-silicone.Ngokusetshenziswa kokuhlola, abicah abajwayelekile abayingxenye eyodwa bangasetshenziselwa ukwenza isikhunta noma ukubumba kube bobunjwa.Uma kudingeka, uwoyela ovamile wokupheka wemifino noma i- petroleum jelly ungasetshenziswa ezindaweni zokumatanisa njenge-ejenti ekhipha isikhunta. 
[1] 
Ama-Silicones asetshenziswa emikhiqizweni yokushefa kanye nezinto zokugcoba zomuntu siqu. 
I-Silly Putty nezinye izinto ezifanayo zakhiwe nge-silicones dimethyl siloxane, polydimethylsiloxane, ne- decamethyl cyclopentasiloxane, nezinye izithako.Le nto yaziwa ngezici zayo ezingavamile, isb.Ukuthi iyagquma, kepha yephuka lapho ishaywa ngokucijile; izophinde igeleze njengoketshezi futhi yenze amadaka anikezwe isikhathi esanele. 
Ama-silicone "amabhande erabha" angukugcwaliswa kabusha okuthandwayo okuhlala njalo kwamabhande wenjoloba kumathoyizi "we-band band loom " ka-2013 aphindwe kabili kuya kane kunentengo (ngo-2014).Amabhande we-Silicone nawo eza ngobukhulu besongo obungabhalwa ngokwezifiso ngegama noma ngomyalezo.Amabhande amakhulu abicah nawo athengiswa njengezinsizakalo zokubopha phansi. 
I-Former i-rubber eyicilicone (emakethwa njengo-Sugru) esetshenziswa njengempahla yobuciko nobuciko, njengoba i-plasticity yayo iyivumela ukuthi ibunjwe ngesandla njengobumba bokumodela.Iqina ekamelweni lokushisa futhi inamathela ezintweni ezahlukahlukene kufaka phakathi ingilazi ne-aluminium. [1] 
Sativus ) iyimifino yezimpande, ejwayelekile ngombala wewolintshi, yize kukhona ama-cultivars ansomi, amnyama, abomvu, amhlophe, [1] [2] [3] wonke amafomu asekhaya isanqante yasendle, iDaucus carota, edabuka eYurophu naseNingizimu-ntshonalanga ye-Asia.Lesi sitshalo kungenzeka ukuthi sasivela ePersia futhi ekuqaleni sasitshalwa ngenxa yamaqabunga aso nembewu.Ingxenye yesitshalo edliwa kakhulu yi- taproot, yize iziqu namaqabunga nakho kudliwa.Isanqante yasekhaya sikhethelwe ngokukhetha ngenxa yempande yaso ekhuliswe kakhulu, enambitheka kalula, engaphansi enezinkuni. 
I-Daucus carota isitshalo esivela kabili .Ngonyaka wokuqala, layo rosette ka amahlamvu ukhiqiza esiningi ushukela, okuyinto zigcinwa Taproot ukuze lunikeze amandla isitshalo ukuze imbali ngonyaka wesibili. 
Iningi le-taproot liqukethe i- pulpy cortex yangaphandle ( phloem ) nengaphakathi langaphakathi ( xylem ). 
Izaqathe ezisezingeni eliphakeme zinesilinganiso esikhulu se-cortex ngokuqhathaniswa nengqikithi.Yize isanqante engenaso i-xylem ngokuphelele ingenakwenzeka, amanye ama-cultivars anezinhlamvu ezincane nezinemibala ejulile; i-taproot ingabonakala ingenawo umnyombo lapho umbala we-cortex nengqikithi kufana ngamandla.Ama-taproots ngokuvamile amade futhi ayindilinga, yize kukhona izinhlobo zezilimo eziyindilinga nezicishe zibe yindilinga.Ububanzi bezimpande bungaqala kusuka ku- kuze kufike kokungu- 10 cm (4 in) engxenyeni ebanzi kakhulu.Ubude bezimpande busuka , yize iningi liphakathi. 
I-carrot isitshalo esivela kabili emndenini we-umbellifer, i- Apiaceae.Ekuqaleni, ikhula nge- rosette yamaqabunga ngenkathi yakha i-taproot ekhulisiwe.Izinhlobo ezikhula ngokushesha zivuthwa ezinyangeni ezintathu (izinsuku ezingama-90) zokuhlwanyela imbewu, kuyilapho izilimo ezikhula kancane zidinga inyanga ende (izinsuku eziyi-120).Izimpande ziqukethe inani eliphezulu le- alpha- ne- beta-carotene, futhi ziwumthombo omuhle kavithamini K novithamini B6 . 
Ukukhula kwembali kuqala lapho i- meristem eyisicaba iguquka kusuka ekukhiqizeni amaqabunga iye ku-meristem ephakanyisiwe, eyindilinga ekwazi ukukhiqiza ukunwebeka kwesiqu kanye neqoqo lezimbali.Iqoqo liyi- umbel ehlangene, futhi i-umbel ngayinye iqukethe ama-umbels amancane amancane (ama-umbellets).Umbele wokuqala (oyinhloko) wenzeka ekugcineni kwesiqu esikhulu sezimbali; ama-umbels amancane wesibili akhula kusuka egatsheni elikhulu, futhi lawa aqhubekela phambili abe ama-umbels wesithathu, wesine, ngisho nangemva kwesikhathi. 
Izimbali zishintsha ubulili ekukhuleni kwazo, ngakho-ke ama-stamens adedela impova yawo ngaphambi kokuba ukucwaswa kwembali efanayo kwamukeleke.Leli lungiselelo liyi-centripetal, okusho ukuthi izimbali ezindala kakhulu ziseduze nonqenqemeni kanti izimbali ezincane kunazo zonke zisenkabeni.Izimbali zivame ukuvula kuqala emaphethelweni angaphandle we-umbel oyinhloko, zilandelwe cishe ngesonto kamuva kuma-umbels wesibili, bese kuthi emasontweni alandelayo kuma-umbels aphezulu. 
Isikhathi esivamile sokuqhakaza kwama-umbels ngamanye izinsuku eziyi-7 kuya kwezingu-10, ngakho-ke isitshalo singaba senqubeni yokuqhakaza izinsuku ezingama-30-50.Ama-umbels ahlukile nezimbali zezimbali ziheha izinambuzane ezithutha impova.Ngemuva kokuvundiswa futhi ngenkathi imbewu ikhula, ama-umbellet angaphandle we-umbel egoba ngaphakathi abangela ukuma kwe-umbel ukuthi kushintshe kusuka ku-convex kancane noma kube flat flat to concave, futhi lapho i-cupped ifana nesidleke senyoni. 
I-carrot yizinhlobo ze-diploid , futhi inama-chromosomes ayisishiyagalolunye amafushane, anobude obufanayo (2 n = 18). [1] [2]Usayizi we-genome ulinganiselwa kuma-mega base pair angama- 473, okuyinto enkulu ngokuphindwe kane kune- Arabidopsis thaliana, ingxenye yesihlanu yobukhulu be-genome yommbila, futhi icishe ilingane ne-genome yelayisi. [3] 
Ama-Polyacetylenes angatholakala kwimifino ye-Apiaceae enjengezaqathe lapho akhombisa khona imisebenzi ye- cytotoxic.I-Falcarinol ne- falcarindiol (i- cis -heptadeca-1,9-diene-4,6-diyne-3,8-diol) yizinhlanganisela ezinjalo.Le nhlanganisela yokugcina ikhombisa imisebenzi yokulwa nokubulala i-Mycocentrospora acerina neCladosporium cladosporioides.I-Falcarindiol iyinhlanganisela eyinhloko ebhekene nomunyu kuzinqathe. 
Izaqathe zitshalwa kusuka enzalweni futhi kungathatha izinyanga ezine (izinsuku eziyi-120) ukuvuthwa, kepha izinhlobo eziningi zezilimo zikhula zingakapheli izinsuku ezingama-70 kuya kwezingama-80 ngaphansi kwezimo ezifanele.Zikhula kahle elangeni eligcwele kepha zibekezelela umthunzi othile.Izinga lokushisa elikhulu.Umhlabathi olungile ujulile, uvulekile futhi ukhishwa kahle, unesihlabathi noma u-loamy, une- pH engu-6.3 kuye ku-6.8. 
Umanyolo kufanele usetshenziswe ngokuya ngohlobo lomhlabathi ngoba isivuno sidinga amazinga aphansi e-nitrogen, phosphate elinganiselayo kanye ne-potash ephezulu. 
Inhlabathi ecebile noma enamadwala kufanele igwenywe, ngoba lokhu kuzodala ukuthi izimpande zibe nezinwele futhi / noma zishintshe ukubumbeka.Ukunisela kuyasetshenziswa lapho kunesidingo ukugcina inhlabathi imanzi.Ngemuva kokuhluma, isivuno sigcina sincishisiwe kube yisikhala kanye nokhula ukuvimbela ukuncintisana ngaphansi kwenhlabathi. 
Izilimo zikakherothi zingahlukaniswa ngezigaba ezimbili ezibanzi, izaqathe zasempumalanga kanye nezaqathe zasentshonalanga.Izinhlobo eziningi zezilimo ezintsha zenzelwe izici ezithile. [1] [2] 
Izaqathe "zaseMpumalanga" (okuyinkomba yezwekazi laseYurophu nelaseMelika) zafuywa ePersia (mhlawumbe emazweni aseIran nase- Afghanistan yanamuhla eNtshonalanga Asia) ngekhulu le-10, noma ngaphambili.Izinhlobo zekherothi "empumalanga" ezisaphila kuze kube namuhla zivame ukuba nsomi noma ziphuzi, futhi zivame ukuba nezimpande ezinamagatsha.Umbala onsomi ovamile kulezi izaqathe uvela kumbala we- anthocyanin. 
I-carrot esentshonalanga yavela eNetherlands ngekhulu le-17.Kunenkolelo edumile yokuthi umbala wayo osawolintshi okwenza uthandwe kulawo mazwe njengesibonakaliso seNdlu ye-Orange kanye nomzabalazo wenkululeko yamaDashi, yize buncane ubufakazi balokhu.Umbala wewolintshi uvela kuma- carotenes amaningi kulezi zinhlobo. 
Izaqathi zeChantenay. 
Yize izimpande zimfushane kunamanye ama-cultivars, zinamahlamvu amakhulu kanye ne-girth enkulu, zibanzi emahlombe futhi ziqonde ngasemthonjeni ocijile, oyindilinga.Zigcina kahle, zinengqamuzana enemibala ephaphathekile futhi zisetshenziselwa kakhulu ukucubungula.Izilimo zifaka phakathi 'iCarson Hybrid' ne 'Red Cored Chantenay'. 
Izaqathe zeDanvers.Lezi zinamahlamvu aqinile futhi izimpande zinde kunezinhlobo zeChantenay, futhi zinesimo esiyindilinga esinehlombe elichazwe kahle, sithinta iphuzu.Imifushane ngandlela thile kunezilimo ze-Imperator, kepha iyabekezelela izimo zenhlabathi ezisindayo.Izinhlobo zeDanvers zigcina kahle futhi zisetshenziswa zombili zihlanzekile futhi zicutshungulwa.Zakhiwa ngo-1871 eDanvers, eMassachusetts . 
[2] Izilimo zifaka phakathi 'iDanvers Half Long' ne 'Danvers 126'. 
Izaqathi ze-Imperator.Lesi silimo sinamahlamvu amakhulu, sinokuqukethwe okunoshukela omningi, futhi sinezimpande ezinde nezincane, ezingena esicongweni esicijile.Izinhlobo ze-impperator yizo ezitshalwa kakhulu ngabalimi bezohwebo.Izinhlobo zokutshala zifaka phakathi 'i-Imperator 58' ne 'Sugarsnax Hybrid'. 
Izaqathe zaseNantes.Lawa anamahlamvu amancane, ayindilinga, amafushane anethiphu ebuthuntu kunezinhlobo ze-Imperator, futhi athola isivuno esikhulu ezimeni ezahlukahlukene.Isikhumba sonakele kalula kanti nengaphakathi limbozwe kakhulu.Ane-brittle, aphezulu ushukela futhi agcina kahle ngaphansi kunezinye izinhlobo.Izinhlobo zezilimo zifaka phakathi 'iNelson Hybrid', 'Scarlet Nantes' kanye ne 'Sweetness Hybrid'. 
Izinhlelo zokuzalela izaqathi zisungule imihlanganisela emisha ukuze ibe nenani eliminyene lezingulube ezakhiwe ngamakhemikhali ezizinzile ezinamakhemikhali, njenge- anthocyanins, enothisa umbala wesanqante ngokuya ngobuningi nezinhlobo ze-anthocyanin ukukhiqiza imibala ehlukene yesanqante. [1] [2]Olunye uhlobo lwembewu luswele i-pigment ejwayelekile yewolintshi ngenxa ye-carotene, ngenxa yombala wayo omhlophe kofuzo oluphindaphindwayo lwe-tocopherol (uvithamini E), kepha lesi silimo kanye nezaqathe zasendle azinikezi inani elibalulekile lokudla okunempilo likavithamini E. [3] 
Izaqathe zingagcinwa izinyanga ezimbalwa esiqandisini noma ngaphezu kobusika endaweni enomswakama, epholile.Ukugcina isikhathi eside, izaqathe ezingageziwe zingabekwa ebhakedeni phakathi kwezingqimba zesihlabathi, ingxube yesihlabathi engu-50/50 nesihlabathi, noma enhlabathini.Ibanga lokushisa kuhamba phambili. 
Izaqathe zingadliwa ngezindlela ezahlukahlukene.Amaphesenti ama-3 kuphela e- β-carotene akweziqathe ezingavuthiwe akhishwa ngesikhathi sokugaya: lokhu kungathuthukiselwa ku-39% ngokugaya, ukupheka kanye nokungeza uwoyela wokupheka.Ngenye indlela ingaqunywa futhi ibiliswe, ithosiwe noma iphekwe nge-steamed, futhi iphekwe ngesobho kanye nesitshulu, kanye nokudla kwezingane nezilwane ezifuywayo.Isitsha esaziwayo yi- carrots julienne.Ngokubambisana no- anyanisi nesilimo esidliwayo esinamagatsha anamanzi, izaqathe zingenye yemifino eyinhloko esetshenziselwa i- mirepoix yokwenza imihluzi ehlukahlukene. 
ENdiya izaqathe zisetshenziswa ngezindlela ezahlukahlukene, njengamasaladi noma njengemifino efakwa elayisi elibabayo noma ezitsheni zedal.Ukuhluka okuthandwayo enyakatho ye-India yi- Gajar Ka Halwa carrot dessert, enezinqathe ezigayiwe futhi eziphekwe obisini kuze kube yilapho yonke ingxube iqinile, ngemuva kwalokho kufakwa amantongomane nebhotela.Amasaladi wesanqante avame ukwenziwa ngoqathe abagayiwe ngesinongo sembewu yesinaphi kanye nopelepele oluhlaza ovele emafutheni ashisayo.Izaqathi kungaba futhi ukuncishiselwa izicezu bese yengezwa irayisi, kungaba yingxenye isidlo okuxubile eyosiwe imifino noma kungenziwa ezihlangene tamarind ukuze ukwakheka chutney. 
Kusukela ngasekupheleni kweminyaka yama-1980, izaqathe zezingane noma ama-mini-carrot (izaqathe ezihlutshiwe futhi zasikwa zaba ngamasilinda afanayo) bekuyinto ethandwayo yokudla okulungele ukudliwa etholakala ezitolo ezinkulu eziningi.Ama- carrot ahlanjululwa futhi asetshenziswa njengokudla kwezingane, aphelelwe amanzi emzimbeni ukwenza ama-chips, ama-flakes, ne-powder, futhi asikiwe kancane futhi athosiwe ajulile, njengama- chips amazambane. 
Ubumnandi bezaqathe buvumela ukuthi imifino isetshenziswe kwezinye izindima ezifana nezithelo.Izaqathe ezigayiwe zisetshenziswa kumakhekhe esanqante, kanye nakaphudingi, isitsha sesiNgisi okucatshangwa ukuthi saqala ekuqaleni kwekhulu le-19.Izaqathe zingasetshenziswa zodwa noma zixutshwe nezithelo emijamu kanye nasekulondolozeni.Ijusi leSanqante libuye limakazwe kabanzi, ikakhulukazi njengesiphuzo sezempilo, kungaba yizimele noma lihlanganiswe namajusi akhishwe ezithelweni nakweminye imifino. 
Ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile isikhathi eside kungaholela ku- carotenemia, ukushintsha kombala okuphuzi okusawolintshi kwesikhumba okubangelwe ukwakheka kwe-carotenoids. 
Izaqathe ezingamanzi zingama-88% wamanzi, ama-carbohydrate ayi-9%, amaprotheni angu-0.9%, u-2.8% wefayibha yokudla, u-1% womlotha kanye no-0.2% wamafutha.I-Carrot fiber fiber ihlanganisa kakhulu i- cellulose, enezilinganiso ezincane ze- hemicellulose, i- lignin ne- starch.Ushukela wamahhala kukherothi kufaka phakathi i- sucrose, i- glucose, ne- fructose . [1] 
I- provitamin A beta-carotene evela kwizinqathe empeleni ayibasizi abantu ukuthi babone ebumnyameni ngaphandle uma behlushwa ukuntuleka kukavithamini A. [1] Le nganekwane kwakuyinkulumo- ze esetshenziswa yiRoyal Air Force ngesikhathi seMpi Yesibili Yomhlaba ukuchaza ukuthi kungani abashayeli bezindiza babo benze impumelelo empini yasebusuku, kepha empeleni yayisetshenziselwa ukufihla intuthuko kubuchwepheshe be-radar kanye nokusetshenziswa kwamalambu abomvu kuma-panels wezinsimbi. 
Noma kunjalo, ukusetshenziswa kwezinqathe kwakukhuthazwa eBrithani ngaleso sikhathi njengengxenye yomkhankaso we- Dig for Victory.Uhlelo lomsakazo olubizwa ngeThe Kitchen Front lwalukhuthaza abantu ukuthi batshale, bagcine futhi basebenzise izaqathe ngezindlela ezahlukahlukene zenoveli, kufaka phakathi ukwenza ujamu wesanqante nephayi leWoolton, eliqanjwe ngegama leNkosi uWoolton, uNgqongqoshe Wezokudla.Umphakathi waseBrithani ngesikhathi seWWII wawukholelwa kakhulu ukuthi ukudla izaqathe kuzobasiza ukuthi babone kangcono ebusuku futhi ngo-1942 kwakukhona inqwaba yamathani izaqathe ayi-100,000. 
In 2018, world production of carrots (combined with turnips) was 40 million tonnes, with China producing 45% of the world total (table). Other major producers were the United States, Uzbekistan, and Russia. 
U-rahbrahim Melih Gökçek ( Turkish pronunciation: [ibɾaˈhim meˈlih ˈɟœctʃec] ; owazalwa ngo-20 Okthoba 1948) ngusopolitiki waseTurkey owasebenza njengeMeya yase- Ankara kusuka ngo-1994 kuya ku-2017.Kusukela ngo-1991 kuya ku-1994, wayeyilungu lePhalamende .IGökçek unqobe ukhetho lomasipala ngo- 1994, 1999, 2004, 2009, waphinde wamenyezelwa njengonqobile ngo- 2014 .Uyilungu leqembu elibusayo iJustice and Development Party . 
UGökçek wazalelwa eKeçiören e- Ankara . 
Umndeni wakwaGökçek, odabuka eHalfeti, wathuthela eGaziantep ngomsebenzi kababa u-Ahmet Gökçek njengommeli. 
IGökçek yayinemvelaphi ethile yeKosova.Njengoba enemfundo yakhe yamabanga aphansi, aphakeme nasesikoleni esiphakeme eGaziantep, uMelih Gökçek uthweswe iziqu eGazi University, College of Journalism, e-Ankara.Usebenze njengentatheli yePhalamende futhi emele iphephandaba.UGökçek waqeda umsebenzi wakhe wezempi njenge-Reserve Officer eGüzelyurt eNyakatho Cyprus. 
Usekela i-Ankaraspor e-Ankara. 
Ungusihlalo ohloniphekile weMKE Ankaragücü.Ibhola nezithombe yizinto zokuzilibazisa kakhulu zikaGökçek, oshade noNevin Gökçek, futhi unamadodana amabili, u-Ahmet no-Osman.Indodana yakhe u-Osman Gökçek ungumxhumanisi wokuhlela jikelele wesiteshi se-TV saseTurkey iBeyaz TV. 
Ngemuva kokubuya emsebenzini wezempi, uGökçek wasungula ibhizinisi.Ngemuva kwalokho, njengelungu le- Motherland Party, wasebenza kusukela ngo-1984 kuya ku-1989 njengeMeya yaseKeçiören, isifunda esise-Ankara, ngaphansi kobuholi beMeya kaMasipala wase-Ankara Metropolitan, uMehmet Altinsoy. 
Ngemuva kwalokho, uMelih Gökçek waphatha iSocial Services neChild Protection Society njengoMqondisi Jikelele wayo kusukela ngo-1989 kuya ku-1991. 
Ngo-1991, wangena ephalamende njenge-Ankara MP yeWelfare Party .Ngenkathi eyisishayamthetho ngesikhathi sokhetho lwasekhaya ngo-1994, wamela isikhundla sokuba yiMeya yase-Ankara futhi walunqoba ukhetho. 
Ngokwalokho okutholwe ngumlando yiBritish Association of Urological Surgeons ngokususelwa ocwaningweni olwenziwe ekuhlolweni kwesidumbu samajwabu angama-22, "i-prepuce inikeza ipulatifomu enkulu futhi ebalulekile yezinzwa eziningana nokuphela kwemizwa", [1] The College of Physicians and Surgeons waseBritish Columbia ubhale ukuthi ijwabu "lakhiwa isikhumba sangaphandle kanye ne- mucosa yangaphakathi ecebile ngeziphetho zezinzwa zemizwa ezikhethekile nezicubu ezine-erogenous." 
Ngo-2007 i- World Health Organisation (2007) yathi kukhona "impikiswano mayelana neqhaza lejwabu, ngemisebenzi engaba khona kubandakanya ukugcina i-glans imanzi, ukuvikela ipipi elikhulayo esibelethweni, noma ukukhulisa injabulo yezocansi ngenxa yobukhona bezinzwa zemizwa" . [1]Ijwabu lisiza ukuhlinzeka ngesikhumba esanele ngesikhathi sokumiswa. [2] 
Ijwabu livikela izingilazi.Ijwabu livikela ubukhazikhazi bezinsana kusuka ku-ammonia kanye nendle kumanabukeni, okunciphisa izehlakalo zokuqina kwenyama, futhi kuyaqhubeka nokuvikela izingcwecwe ekulimaleni nasekuhlukumezekeni impilo yonke. [1]Ukugoqwa kwesilondolozi kugcina ubumanzi obuncane obungabekwa ngaphambili, obungadala i-smegma lapho inhlanzeko efanele ingenziwa. 
Ijwabu liqukethe izidumbu zikaMeissner, okuyiziphetho zemizwa ezibandakanyeka ekuzweleni okuhle kokuthinta.Ucwaningo lwamasampuli esikhumba luthole ukuthi, uma kuqhathaniswa nezinye izindawo zesikhumba ezingenaboya emzimbeni, inkomba kaMeissner ibiphezulu kunethiphu yomunwe (0.96) futhi iphansi kunawo onke kujwabu (0.28) kuphakanyiswe ukuthi ijwabu linezicubu ezibucayi ezingenaboya umzimba. [1] Ucwaningo lwezomlando olwenziwe kuzinzwa zomthondo lithole ukuthi ijwabu "alinandima ekuzweleni ngokocansi". 
Kuma-primates, ijwabu likhona ezithweni zobulili zabesilisa nabesifazane futhi kungenzeka ukuthi belikhona izigidi zeminyaka yokuziphendukela kwemvelo.Ukuvela kwama-penile morphologies ayinkimbinkimbi njengejwabu kungenzeka kuthonywe abesifazane. 
Ijwabu liyisigaxa esiphindwe kabili sezicubu zemisipha ebushelelezi, imithambo yegazi, ama-neuron, isikhumba, nolwelwesi lwamafinyila okuyingxenye yomthondo ehlanganisa futhi ivikele i- glans penis nenyama yomchamo .Lujwabu ephathekayo, sasivumela stretchable, futhi uba yemvelo igrisi .Ijwabu liphinde lichazwe njenge- prepuce, igama elibanzi ngokwezobuchwepheshe futhi elihlanganisa ne- clitoral hood kwabesifazane, lapho ijwabu lithanda kakhulu embhedeni 
I-Preputioplasty inqubo ejwayelekile yokwakhiwa kabusha kwejwabu, evame ukwenziwa lapho umfana ezalwa nejwabu elincane kakhulu: 177 kwenziwa inqubo efanayo yokunciphisa ijwabu eliqinile ngaphandle kokusebenzisa ukusoka. [1] : 181 
Ijwabu labantu abadala livame ukuhlehliswa ngaphezulu kwe-glans. 
Ukumbozwa kwama-glans endaweni e-flaccid nokuma kuyehluka kuye ngobude bejwabu.Ijwabu linanyathiselwa ku-glans lapho lizalwa futhi imvamisa alibuyiseki kusebuntwaneni.Ukwehluleka ukuhoxisa ijwabu ebuntwaneni akufanele kuthathwe njengenkinga ngaphandle kokuthi kube nezinye izimpawu.I innervated kakhulu zone mucocutaneous we umthondo kwenzeka eduze ichopho ijwabu. 
Ukusoka ukususwa kwejwabu, ngokungaphelele noma ngokuphelele.Ezinganeni ezisanda kuzalwa, kungenzelwa izidingo zenkolo noma okuthandwa ngumuntu okuzungeze inhlanzeko nobuhle. : 257 Ukusoka kungenziwa nasezinganeni noma kubantu abadala ukwelapha i-phimosis, i-balanitis, noma ukuvimbela ukudluliselwa kwezifo ezithathelwana ngocansi.: 166 Ukuziphatha kokusoka ezinganeni kuyimbangela yengxabano . [1]Kusukela ngo-2012, ayikho inqubo ephumelelayo yokwakha kabusha ijwabu elisokiwe ebelishicilelwe. [2] : 181 Amanye amadoda asebenzise izinsimbi ukwelula isikhumba somthondo ukubuyisa ijwabu; izicubu ezivelayo zimboza izingcwecwe kepha aziphindi izici zejwabu. 
Eminye imikhuba yamasiko noma yobuhle ihlanganisa ukubhoboza izitho zangasese okubandakanya ijwabu nokusika ijwabu . 
Ama-Foreskins atholakala ezinkambisweni zokusoka avame ukusetshenziswa ngabaphenyi be-biochemical kanye ne-micro-anatomical ukufunda ukwakheka namaprotheni esikhumba somuntu.Ikakhulu, amajwabu atholakala ezinganeni ezisanda kuzalwa atholakale ewusizo ekukhiqizeni isikhumba somuntu esithe xaxa. 
Ama-Foreskins wezingane asetshenziselwa izicubu zokuxhunyelelwa kwesikhumba kanye nezidakamizwa ezisekelwe ku- β-interferon. 
Ama- fibroblast akhiqizwa ngesikhumba asetshenziswe ocwaningweni lwe-biomedical, [1] nasekusetshenzisweni kwezimonyo. 
Ijwabu lingaba ngaphansi kwezimo eziningi zokugula. Izimo eziningi azivamile futhi zelashwa kalula. 
Kwezinye izimo, ikakhulukazi ngezimo ezingalapheki, ukwelashwa kungafaka ukusoka, inqubo lapho ijwabu lisuswa khona kancane noma ngokuphelele. 
EGrisi lasendulo, amajwabu ayaziswa, ikakhulukazi izibikezelo ezazinde ngobude. [1]Umfanekiso wokuqala owaziwayo wejwabu ubuyela emuva embusweni waseGibhithe.Ijwabu lingabonakala kuvezwe kubuciko obuvela eminyakeni ehlukene. 
Ingaphandle lejwabu liwukuqhubeka kwesikhumba emgodini wendoda, kepha ijwabu langaphakathi ulwelwesi lwamafinyila njengaphakathi kwejwabu leso noma umlomo. 
Indawo enocucutaneous yenzeka lapho kuhlangana khona ijwabu langaphandle nelangaphakathi.Njengejwabu leso, ijwabu likhululekile ukuhamba ngemuva kokuthi lihlukane ne- glans, okuvame ukwenzeka ngaphambi noma ngesikhathi sokuthomba.Ijwabu linamathiselwe kwi-glans yi- frenulum, isicubu semithambo esinemithambo yegazi kakhulu.I-World Health Organisation ithi "[f] he frenulum yakha ukuxhumana phakathi kwezingqimba zejwabu langaphandle nangaphakathi, kuthi lapho ipipi lingamile, liqinise ukunciphisa imbobo yejwabu. 
The area of the outer foreskin measures 7–100 cm2,[1] and the inner foreskin measures 18–68 cm.2[2] 
Ukusoka ukususwa kwejwabu emthondweni womuntu.Enkambisweni ejwayelekile ijwabu selulwa nge-forceps (ezinganeni ezingaphambi kokushicilela ukubambelela kwalo okujwayelekile emakhazeni kufanele futhi kwephulwe ngophenyo), khona-ke kungabekwa into yokusoka, ngemuva kwalokho ijwabu likhishwe.I-anesthesia yezihloko noma ejojowe endaweni ivame ukusetshenziselwa ukunciphisa izinhlungu nokucindezeleka komzimba . 
[1]Inqubo imvamisa ukuhlinzwa okukhethwa kukho okwenziwa ezinganeni nasezinganeni ngezizathu zenkolo noma zamasiko.Kwezokwelapha, nokusoka akukhona kukho ukwelashwa nanokuzwela ka phimosis futhi balanoposthitis ukuthi musa ukuxazulula neminye imithi yokwelapha, futhi ezingelapheki pheshana urinary nezifo (UTIs). [6]Kuyaphikiswa ezimweni ezithile zokukhubazeka kwesimo sangasese noma impilo engeyinhle ejwayelekile. [3] [2] 
Papillomavirus Human (HPV) yiyona ngokuvamile ngocansi ezithathelwana ngocansi, ezithinta kokubili amadoda nabesifazane.Yize izifo eziningi zingenayo i-asymptomatic futhi zisuswa amasosha omzimba, ezinye izinhlobo zaleli gciwane zidala izinsumpa ezithweni zangasese, nezinye izinhlobo, uma zingelashwa, zidala izinhlobo ezahlukahlukene zomdlavuza, kubandakanya umdlavuza womlomo wesibeletho, nomdlavuza we-penile.Izinsumpa zangasese nomdlavuza womlomo wesibeletho yizinkinga ezimbili ezivame kakhulu ezibangelwa i-HPV. 
I- Prepuce Engcwele, noma i- Holy . ( Latin præputium noma i- prepucium ), ingesinye sezinsalela eziningana ezashiwo uJesu, umkhiqizo wokusoka kukaJesu.Ezindaweni ezahlukahlukene emlandweni, amasonto amaningi eYurophu athi aphethe ijwabu likaJesu, kwesinye isikhathi ngasikhathi sinye. 
Kunikwe amandla ahlukahlukene okwenza izimangaliso. 
UMary Dzon uthi kubantu abaningi ngesikhathi sangeNkathi Ephakathi, ukuzinikela ku-Holy Prepuce kukhombisa ukugxila ebuntwini bukaJesu. 
Ngokusho kukaFarley, "Ngokuya ngalokhu okufundile, bekukhona amajwabu angcwele ayisishiyagalombili, ayishumi nambili, ayishumi nane, noma ngisho ayi-18 emadolobheni ahlukahlukene aseYurophu ngeNkathi Ephakathi." [1]Ngaphezu kwe-Holy Foreskin yaseRoma (kamuva eyiCalcata), abanye abafaka izicelo babandakanya iCathedral yaseLe Puy-en-Velay, iSantiago de Compostela, idolobha lase- Antwerp, iCoulombs esifundeni saseChartres, kanye neChartres uqobo, namasonto e Besançon, Metz, Hildesheim, Charroux.Ama-Conques, amaLangres, i- Fécamp, namabili e- Auvergne . 
Esinye sezibikezelo ezidume kakhulu safika e-Antwerp eBrabant ngo-1100 njengesipho esivela enkosini uBaldwin I waseJerusalema, eyasithenga eZweni Elingcwele ngenkathi yempi yokuqala.Lesi simemezelo saziwa lapho umbhishobhi waseCambray, ngesikhathi kugujwa iMisa, ebona amaconsi egazi amathathu esula izindwangu ze-altare.Kwakhiwa isonto elikhethekile futhi kwahlelwa udwendwe lokuhlonipha ithempeli eliyisimangaliso, elaba yinhloso yokuhambela izindawo ngezindawo.Ngo-1426 kwasungulwa ubuzalwane ethempelini elikhulu "van der heiliger Besnidenissen ons lief Heeren Jhesu Cristi in onser liever Vrouwen Kercke t 'Antwerpen" ; amalungu ayo angama-24 wonke ayengababhishobhi futhi engabantu abavamile nje.Insalela yanyamalala ngo-1566, kodwa isonto lisekhona, lihlotshiswe ngamafasitela amabili anengilazi anikelwe yinkosi uHenry VII waseNgilandi nomkakhe u-Elizabeth waseYork ngo-1503. 
I- abbey yaseCharroux ithi i-Holy Foreskin yanikezwa izindela nguCharlemagne.Ekuqaleni kwekhulu le-12, yathathwa ngodwendwe iya eRoma lapho yethulwa khona phambi kukaPapa Innocent III, owacelwa ukuba anqume ngobuqiniso bayo.UPapa walinqaba lelo thuba.Ngesinye isikhathi, nokho, insalela yalahleka, yahlala ilahlekile kwaze kwaba ngo-1856 lapho isisebenzi esasilungisa i-abbey sathi sithole umuthi wokucasha ofihlwe ngaphakathi kodonga, oqukethe ijwabu elilahlekile. 
Ngokusho kukaFarley, uMkhandlu Wesibili WaseVatican kamuva wasusa uSuku Lokusoka Okungcwele ekhalendeni lesonto lesiLatini, yize amaMpumalanga Katolika kanye NamaRoma Katolika Esintu besagubha uMkhosi Wokusoka kweNkosi yethu ngoJanuwari 1. [1] [2]Empeleni, kwakuyiminyaka engaphezu kwemibili ngaphambi komhla ziyi-11 kuMfumfu 1962, usuku lapho kwaqala khona uMkhandlu Wesibili WaseVatican, lapho isimemezelo sika-25 Julayi 1960 sikaPapa John XXIII [3] senza ukushintshwa okubanzi kweKhalenda Jikelele yamaRoma, okubandakanya eguqula igama lomkhosi wango-1 Januwari ukusuka "ekusokeni kweNkosi naku- Octave of the Nativity " kuya ku- "Octave of the Nativity", kungashintshiwe ukufundwa kweVangeli ngokusokwa kwengane uJesu. [4] 
Emzaneni wase-Italiya iCalcata, itafula eliqukethe okucatshangwa ukuthi yi-Holy Foreskin lahanjiswa emigwaqweni muva nje ngo-1983 eMkhosini Wokusoka, owawumenyezelwa yiSonto LamaRoma Katolika emhlabeni jikelele ngoJanuwari 1 unyaka nonyaka.Umkhuba uphelile, noma kunjalo, lapho amasela entshontsha ibhokisi elinamatshe ayigugu, okuqukethwe nakho konke. 
[1]Ukulandela lokhu kwebiwa, akucaci ukuthi ngabe kukhona yini ama-Prepuces okuthiwa angcwele asekhona.Ku-documentary yethelevishini ka-1997 yeChannel 4, intatheli yaseBrithani uMiles Kington waya e-Italy eyofuna i-Holy Foreskin, kepha akakwazanga ukuthola isibonelo esisele.NgoDisemba 22, 2013 iNational Geographic Channel yasakaza idrama ehambisana noFarley ebizwa nge "The Quest for the Holy Foreskin". [2] 
Ngokomthombo wekhulu le-19 ongaqinisekisiwe,ngasekupheleni kwekhulu le-17 umtapo wolwazi waseVatican uLeo Allatius wabhala incwadi engakashicilelwa enesihloko esithi De Praeputio Domini Nostri Jesu Christi Diatriba ( Ingxoxo Yesikhumba SeNkosi Yethu UJesu Christ ), bethi iPucece eNgcwele yakhuphuka, njengoJesu uqobo, yaguqulwa yaba izindandatho zikaSaturn. 
Ngo-2009, kwashicilelwa incwadi ethi Farley's An Irreverent Curiosity: In Search of the Strangest Relic of the Church in the Oddest Town of Italy yashicilelwa. 
Ku- The Gospel According To Jesus Christ, uJosé Saramago ubhala ukuthi noma ngubani "ofisa ukuhlonipha lelojwabu namuhla kudingeka avakashele kuphela isonto lesifunda saseCalcata ngaseViterbo e-Italy, lapho ligcinwa khona ukuze kube nenzuzo yokomoya yabathembekile nokuzijabulisa yokukholelwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu akekho. " 
Zonke Jewish abafana kudingeka umthetho wamaJuda ukuba asokwe ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili elandelayo lokuzalwa kwabo; Umkhosi Wokusoka KukaKristu, osagubha amasonto amaningi emhlabeni wonke, ngokufanelekile ungoJanuwari 1.ULuka 2:21 (King James Version), ufundeka kanje: "Kwathi seziphelele izinsuku eziyisishiyagalombili zokusoka kwengane, igama lakhe laqanjwa igama kwathiwa nguJESU, elabizwa kanjalo ngengilosi engakakhulelwa esibelethweni." [1]Ukubhekiswa kokuqala kokusinda kwejwabu likaKristu elisikiwe kuvela esahlukweni sesibili se- Apocrypha ye- Arabic Infancy Gospel equkethe le ndaba elandelayo: 
Kwathi sesifikile isikhathi sokusoka, okungukuthi, usuku lwesishiyagalombili, lapho umthetho wayala ukuba umntwana asokwe, bamsoka emhumeni. 
Futhi isalukazi esingumHeberu sathatha ijwabu (abanye bathi bathatha inkaba-inkambo), baligcina ebhokisini le-alabhasta lamafutha amadala enadi. 
Wayenendodana eyayinenkinga yezidakamizwa, athi kuyo, "Qaphela ungathengisi leli bhodlela le-alabhaste lamafutha enadi, nakuba ubunganikelwa ngalo odenariyu abangamakhulu amathathu." 
Manje leli yibhokisi le-alabhasta uMariya isoni alithengile, futhi wathela ngalo amafutha ekhanda nasezinyaweni zeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, walisula ngezinwele zekhanda lakhe. [1] 
UDavid Farley ulandisa ukuthi ijwabu laphangwa kanjani ngesikhathi seSack of Rome ngo-1527. 
Isosha laseJalimane elalintshontsha labanjwa esigodini saseCalcata, 47 km enyakatho neRoma, kamuva ngawo lowo nyaka.Yakhiwe eCalcata, yahlonishwa kusukela ngaleso sikhathi kuqhubeke, neSonto ligunyaza ubuqiniso ngokunikela ngeminyaka eyishumi ukuzitika kwabahambi .AmaPilgrim, izindela nezindela batheleka esontweni, futhi "iCalcata [yaba] yindawo okumele ibonwe ebalazweni lokuhambela."Ijwabu kuthiwa labiwa ngumfundisi wendawo ngo-1983. 
[1] 
Kodwa-ke, ngo-1905, uPapa Pius X wagunyaza uhlu lwempahla olwenziwa uProfesa Hartmann Grisar, wase-University of Innsbruck. 
[1]Umbiko kaGrisar uhambelana ne- Descriptio laternansis Ecclesia yangaphambili .Isiphambano segolide sasingesaphakathi kwekhulu lesithupha nelesishiyagalombili.Ucwaningo lukaGrisar luthi, njengesiphambano sikaPapa Paschal esenziwe ngamatshe esiliva, isiphambano segolide esenziwe ngegolide kusobala ukuthi ekuqaleni sasiklanyelwe ukubamba izinsalela ze-True Cross.Lokhu kubuye kusekelwe isitatimende ku Descriptio eziphathelene yona udwendwe ku umkhosi Ekuphakanyisweni Wesiphambano oNgcwele. 
IVita kaPapa Sergius I (687-01) ibalula ngazo zombili uMkhosi Wokuphakanyiswa, isiphambano esiyigugu, kanye nokuhlonishwa kwengcwele ekulo. [2]U-Grisar ubhekise ekubhekisweni kwejwabu kanye ne-umbilicus njengoba kususelwa kumasiko akudala aseNkathi Ephakathi.Isiphambano segolide salahleka ngo-1945. 
Udebe olungezansi lwakhiwa ngokuvelela okuyigunya, igatsha le- arch pharyngeal yokuqala.Udebe olungezansi lumboza umzimba wangaphakathi we-mandible .Yehliswa yi- depressor labii inferioris muscle futhi i- orbicularis oris iyilinganisela kancane . 
Izindebe zithambile, ziyagudluka, futhi zisebenza njengendawo yokudla ukudla nasekukhulumeni komsindo nenkulumo.Izindebe zomuntu ziyisitho sezinzwa ezithintekayo, futhi zingaba yindawo erogenous lapho zisetshenziselwa ukuqabula nakwezinye izenzo zokusondelana . 
Usayizi wezindebe uxhunyaniswa nokuheha ngokocansi kwabesilisa nabesifazane.Abesifazane bakhangwa abesilisa abanezindebe zesilisa, ezinosayizi ophakathi kakhulu futhi ezingezikhulu kakhulu noma zincane kakhulu; kufanele zibe lukhuni futhi zithande inkanuko.Ngokuvamile, abacwaningi bathole ukuthi ikhala elincane, amehlo amakhulu nezindebe ezinamandla okuheha ngokocansi kwabesilisa nabesifazane.Izindebe zingakhukhumala okwesikhashana ngesikhathi sokuvusa ucansi ngenxa ye-engorgement enegazi. 
Izindebe zinikela kakhulu ekubukekeni kobuso.Izindebe batshengise ukuveza imizwelo efana ukumamatheka noma uhwaqabale, iconically ngu ijika sezindebe azakhele up-evulekile noma phansi uvule parabola, ngokulandelana.Izindebe zingenziwa futhi zibe nehlazo lapho kukhwazwa, noma kube yinto evusa inkanuko. 
Izindebe zivame ukubhekwa njengophawu lwezinkanuko nezocansi.Lokhu kunemvelaphi eminingi; ngaphezu kwakho konke, izindebe ziyisitho esibucayi kakhulu se-erogenous nesithintekayo.Ngaphezu kwalokho, emasikweni amaningi omhlaba, umlomo nezindebe zowesifazane zimboziwe ngenxa yokuhlangana kwabo okuhambisana nomuntu obhekene nesitho sangasese, nangenxa yeqhaza labo njengelungu lesibili lowesifazane locansi. 
Ukubhoboza izindebe noma ukukhulisa izindebe kwesinye isikhathi kwenziwa ngezizathu zezimonyo.Imikhiqizo eyenzelwe ukusetshenziswa ezindebeni ifaka i-lipstick, i- lip gloss ne- lip balm . 
Isikhumba sendebe, esinezingqimba zeselula ezintathu kuye kweziyisihlanu, sincane kakhulu uma siqhathaniswa nesikhumba sobuso esijwayelekile, esinezingqimba ezingafika kwezili-16.Ngombala wesikhumba okhanyayo, isikhumba sezindebe siqukethe ama- melanocyte ambalwa (amaseli akhiqiza i-melanin pigment, enikeza isikhumba umbala wawo).Ngenxa yalokhu, imithambo yegazi ivela ngesikhumba sezindebe, okuholela kumbala wabo obomvu obonakalayo.Ngombala wesikhumba omnyama lo mphumela awugqamile kangako, njengoba kulokhu isikhumba sezindebe siqukethe i-melanin eningi futhi ngenxa yalokho sibonakala simnyama ngokwengeziwe.Isikhumba sendebe sakha umngcele phakathi kwesikhumba sangaphandle sobuso, nolwelwesi lwangaphakathi lwamafinyila lwangaphakathi lomlomo. 
Isikhumba sezindebe asinaboya futhi asinazo izindlala zomjuluko.Ngakho-ke, ayinayo ungqimba olujwayelekile lokuvikela izithukuthuku namafutha omzimba agcina isikhumba sibushelelezi, sivimbele amagciwane futhi silawule ukufudumala.Ngenxa yalezi zizathu, izindebe zoma ngokushesha futhi zikhubazeke kalula. 
IsiNdendeule siwulimi lwesiBantu eTanzania.Izipikha zivame ukukhuluma ulimi olulodwa. 
Ukuqhubeka kwesigodi saseYoruba uqobo kuqukethe izilimi eziningi.Izilimi ezahlukahlukene zaseYoruba eYorubaland yaseNigeria zingahlukaniswa zibe yizindawo ezinhlanu ezinkulu zolimi lwesifunda: iNyakatho-ntshonalanga, iNortheast, Central, Southwest kanye neNingizimu-mpumalanga.Imingcele ecacile ayikwazi ukudonselwa, izindawo ezingamaphethelo ezifunda zesigodi zivame ukufana ngokufana nolimi oluhlangene. 
INorth-West Yoruba ngokomlando iyingxenye yoMbuso wase- ọyọ.Ezilimini ze-NWY, i-Proto-Yoruba velar fricative /ɣ/ ne-labialized voiced velar / gʷ / have been integrated into / w /; onkamisa abaphezulu / ɪ / no / ʊ / bakhuliswa futhi bahlanganiswa no / i / kanye / u /, njengoba nje nozakwabo bamakhala, okuholela ohlelweni lukankamisa ononkamisa abayisikhombisa bomlomo nabathathu. 
Yoruba ( /j ɒr ʊ b ə / ; [1] .Yor Èdè Yorùbá ; Ajami : ‎ يوربا ) ulimi olukhulunywa eNtshonalanga Afrika, ikakhulukazi eNingizimu-ntshonalanga yeNigeria .Kukhulunywa ngabantu baseYoruba bobuzwe.Inani lezikhulumi zaseYoruba kuthiwa lilinganiselwa ezigidini ezingama-50, kanye nezikhulumi ezingaba yizigidi ezimbili zolimi lwesibili.Njengolimi olunabaningi, kukhulunywa ikakhulu endaweni yezilimi ehlanganisa iNigeria nemiphakathi emincane efudukile eCote d'Ivoire, eSierra Leone naseGambia . 
I-Literary Yoruba, eyaziwa nangokuthi i- Standard Yoruba, i- Yoruba koiné, ne- Yoruba ejwayelekile, iyilungu elihlukile leqoqo lezilimi.Kuyindlela ebhaliwe yolimi, ukuhlukahluka okujwayelekile okufundwa esikoleni nokuthi kukhulunywa ngabafundi bezindaba emsakazweni.I-Yoruba ejwayelekile inomsuka wayo ngawo-1850, lapho uSamuel A. Crowther, umbhishobhi wokuqala wase-Afrika wase-Anglican, eshicilela uhlelo lolimi lwesiYoruba futhi eqala ukuhumusha kwakhe iBhayibheli.Yize ingxenye enkulu isuselwa kuzilimi ze-Ọyọ nezesi- Ibadan, iS Standard Yoruba ifaka izici eziningana ezivela kwezinye izilimi. 
[1]Ibuye inezici ezithile ezihlukile kuyo, isibonelo, uhlelo lokuvumelana konkamisa olwenziwe lula, kanye nezinhlaka zakwamanye amazwe, ezinjengama- calque avela esiNgisini aqala ekuhumusheni kokuqala kwemisebenzi yenkolo. 
Izakhi ezintathu ezinamalungu ezinhlamvu zesiYoruba ongonkamisa (onkamisa (i-CV), unkamisa yedwa (V), ne-syllabic nasal (N).Njalo nohlamvu uthela omunye amathoni ezintathu: okusezingeni eliphezulu ⟩ maphakathi ⟩ (ngokuvamile kwesokunxele ukumakwa), kanye ongaphakeme ⟩Isigwebo N O Lo (Angiyanga) sinikeze izibonelo zezindlela zokugcina izinhlobo ezintathu uhlamvu: 
IsiYoruba siwulimi lwethoni olunamathoni ezingeni ezintathu namathoni amabili noma amathathu entaba.Wonke amalunga kufanele okungenani abe nethoni eyodwa; uhlamvu oluqukethe unkamisa omude lungaba namathoni amabili.Amathoni zibonakala ukusetshenziswa nokugqamisa ahlekise ithoni okusezingeni eliphezulu ⟩ ⟩ kanye nokugqamisa ethuneni ithoni ongaphakeme ⟩ ⟩ maphakathi kuyinto ukumakwa, ngaphandle nasals syllabic lapho kukhonjiswe usebenzisa macron ⟩ ⟩ Izibonelo: 
IsiYoruba esibhalwayo sifaka amamaki okubhalwa kwempawu angatholakali kukhibhodi ejwayelekile yekhompyutha, edinga ukulungiswa okuthile.Ikakhulukazi, ukusetshenziswa kwamachashazi amancane namamaki wethoni akumelwe, imibhalo eminingi yaseYoruba imane iyishiye.U-Asubiaro Toluwase, ephepheni lakhe lowezi-2014, [1] uveza ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kwalezi zimpawu kungathinta ukubuyiswa kwemibhalo yaseYoruba yizinjini ezidumile.Ngakho-ke, ukushiywa kwabo kungaba nomthelela omkhulu ocwaningweni olwenziwa online. 
IsiYoruba siwulimi oluzihlukanisa kakhulu. 
[1]Ukuhleleka kwayo okuyisisekelo kuyisihloko-isenzo-into, [2] njengaku- ó nà Adé 'washaya u-Adé'.Isiqu sesenzo esingenalutho sisho isenzo esigcwalisiwe, esivame ukubizwa ngokuthi siphelele; esishubile futhi isici zibonakala izinhlayiya preverbal ezifana n 'abangaphelele / samanje okuqhubekayo', ti 'esidlule.FddvcasxsUkungabi nalutho kuvezwa yizinhlayiyana ezingaphambi komlomo k.Ukwakhiwa kwesenzo okujwayelekile kuvamile, njengakwezinye izilimi eziningi zaseNtshonalanga Afrika . 
IsiYoruba sihlukaniswa phakathi kwezilimi zase-Edekiri, zona kanye ne- Itsekiri kanye ne- Igala ehlukanisayo ezakha iqembu lezilimi zaseYoruboid ngaphakathi kwegatsha laseVolta – Niger lomndeni waseNiger-Congo.Ubunye bezilimi bomndeni waseNiger –Congo buqala emlandweni ojulile, kulinganiselwa eminyakeni engaba ngu-11000 edlule (ukuphela kwe- Upper Paleolithic ).ENigeria yanamuhla, kulinganiselwa ukuthi kunezikhulumi ezingaphezulu kwezigidi ezingama-40 zolimi lwesiYoruba nolwesibili kanye nezinye izigidi zezikhulumi ngaphandle kwaseNigeria, okwenza kube yilona limi olukhulunywa kakhulu e-Afrika ngaphandle kwezwekazi. 
Phakathi kwamagama ajwayelekile e-Arabhu asetshenziswa eYoruba kukhona amagama ezinsuku ezinjenge- Atalata ( الثلاثاء ) ngoLwesibili, Alaruba ( الأربعاء NgoLwesithathu, u- Alamisi ( الخميس ) NgoLwesine, noJimoh ( الجمعة , Jumu'ah ) ngoLwesihlanu. 
I- Ọjọ'Jimoh isetshenziswa kahle kakhulu.Kuvame ukubizwa ngegama elingemnandi ngoLwesihlanu, Ẹtì, okusho ukwehluleka, ubuvila, noma ukulahlwa.Ekugcineni, amagama ajwayelekile ezinsuku zeviki athi Àìkú, Ajé, Ìṣẹ́gun, Ọjọ́rú, Ọjọ́bọ, Ẹtì, Àbámẹ́ta, ngeSonto, uMsombuluko, uLwesibili, uLwesithathu, uLwesine, uLwesihlanu, uMgqibelo ngokulandelana. 
NgoLwesihlanu kuhlala isi-Eti ngolimi lwesiYoruba. 
Hausa ( /h aʊ s ə / ; [4] Harshen / Halshen Hausa ; Ajami : ‎ هوس ) wulimi lwesiChadic olukhulunywa ngabantu baseHausa, ikakhulukazi engxenyeni esenyakatho yeNigeria nengxenye eseningizimu yeNiger, kanye nabambalwa abambalwa eChad, Benin naseCameroon. 
IsiHausa siveza ukufana okubanzi nomaphi lapho kukhulunywa khona.Kodwa-ke, izazi zezilimi zikhombe izindawo ezinolimi olunenqwaba yezici ezivelele endaweni ngayinye. 
Eastern Hausa zezigodi zihlanganisa Dauranci e Daura, Kananci e Kano, Bausanci e Bauchi, Gudduranci e Katagum Misau futhi ingxenye Borno, futhi Hadejanci e Hadejiya . 
Western Hausa zezigodi zihlanganisa Sakkwatanci e Sokoto, Katsinanci e Katsina, Arewanci e Gobir, uAdari, Kebbi, futhi Zamfara, futhi Kurhwayanci e Kurfey eNiger. 
UKatsina ushintsho phakathi kwezigodi zaseMpumalanga nezaseNtshonalanga.ISokoto isetshenziswa emibhalweni eyahlukahlukene yakudala yesiHausa, futhi yaziwa kakhulu njengeClassical Hausa . 
The Daura ( Dauranchi ) and Kano ( Kananci ) dialect are the standard.I- BBC, iDeutsche Welle, iRadio France Internationale neVoice of America banikela ngezinsizakalo zeHausa kumasayithi abo wezindaba aphesheya besebenzisa iDauranci neKananci.Ekuthuthukisweni kolimi kwakamuva uZazzaganci uthathe izintambo zokubhala nokukhuluma ukusetshenziswa kwamanje kolimi lwesiHausa. 
Izigodi ezisentshonalanga kuya empumalanga yeHausa zeKurhwayanci, iDam agaram ne- Aderawa, zimelela umkhawulo wendabuko osenyakatho kakhulu wemiphakathi yendabuko yamaHausa.Lezi ezikhulunywa enyakatho Sahel futhi mid- Saharan izifunda e entshonalanga nasenkabeni Niger ku Tillabéri, Tahoua, Dosso, Maradi, Agadez futhi Zinder izifunda.Ngenkathi iqondakala ngokunye nezinye izilimi (ikakhulukazi iSakkwatanci, kanye nezinga elincane iGaananci), izilimi ezisenyakatho kakhulu zinokuhluka okuncane kohlelo nolimi ngenxa yokuxhumana njalo namaqembu amaZarma, amaFula, namaTuareg kanye nezinguquko zamasiko ngenxa yokwehluka kwendawo phakathi utshani nezindawo eziwugwadule.Lezi zezigodi futhi babe izinga asemngceleni non-kokuthona iphimbo nokugqamisa zezigodi. 
UHausa uyilungu lomndeni wolimi lwesi-Afroasiatic futhi yilona limi olukhulunywa kakhulu egatsheni laseChadic lalowo mndeni.I-Ethnologue ilinganisele ukuthi ikhulunywa njengolimi lokuqala ngabantu abangaba yizigidi ezingama-47 futhi njengolimi lwesibili kukhulunywa ngezinye izigidi ezingama-25, okwenza isibalo esiphelele sabakhuluma isiHausa sifinyelele ezigidini ezingama-72.Ngokwezibalo zakamuva nje, isiHausa sizokhulunywa ngabantu abayizigidi eziyi-100-150. 
I Ghanaian Hausa lwesigodi (Gaananci), akhulunywa Ghana futhi Togo, kuyinto esihlukile entshonalanga bomdabu Hausa lwesigodi-Bloc nge ngokolimi eyanele yabasebenzi abezindaba atholakalayo.Kukhulunywa izilimi ezincanyana ezihlukene zesiHausa ngenani elingaziwa lamaHausa ngasentshonalanga ezingxenyeni zeBurkina Faso, naseHaoussa Foulane, Badji Haoussa, eGuezou Haoussa, nase- Ansongo izifunda ezisenyakatho-mpumalanga yeMali (lapho kukhulunywa khona njengolimi oluncane ngabaseMaliya government), kepha kuncane kakhulu izinsizakusebenza zolimi kanye nocwaningo olwenziwe kulezi zilimi ezithile ngalesi sikhathi. 
IsiHausa siphinde sikhulunywe ezingxenyeni ezahlukahlukene zaseCameroon naseChad, ezihlanganise izilimi ezixubekile zaseNyakatho yeNigeria neNiger.Ngaphezu kwalokho, isi-Arabhu sibe nomthelela omkhulu endleleni isiHausa esikhulunywa ngayo yizikhulumi zomdabu zaseHausa ezikulezi zindawo. 
Kunezinhlobo eziningana ze- pidgin zesiHausa. 
IBarikanchi phambilini yayisetshenziswa ebuthweni lamakoloni eNigeria.IGibanawa njengamanje isetshenziswa kabanzi eJega enyakatho ntshonalanga yeNigeria, eningizimu yendawo yomdabu yaseHausa. 
Umehluko wezindlela ezintathu phakathi kwama- /c ɟ cʼ/, plain velars /k ɡ kʼ/, kanye nama- /kʷ ɡʷ kʷʼ/ atholakala kuphela ngaphambi kwesikhathi eside futhi esifushane /a/, isib /cʼaːɽa/ ('utshani'), /kʼaːɽaː/ ('ukwandisa'), /kʷʼaːɽaː/ ('shea-nuts'). 
Ngaphambi konkamisa bangaphambili, kuphela ama- /ciːʃiː/ ('jealous') vs. /kʷiːɓiː/ ('side of body'). 
Ngaphambi konkamisa abayindilinga, kuvela ama- /kʷoːɽaː/ ('ringworm'). [18] 
Zibhalwe ngezinguqulo eziguquliwe zezinhlamvu zesiLatini.Zingakhonjwa futhi nge- apostrophe, kungaba ngaphambi noma ngemuva kuye ngencwadi, njengoba kukhonjisiwe ngezansi. 
IsiHausa siwulimi olunamathoni . 
Onkamisa bawo abahlanu ngamunye bangaba nethoni ephansi, ithoni ephezulu noma ithoni ewayo.NgesiHausa esivamile esibhaliwe, ithoni ayimakiwe.Ezinsizakalweni zakamuva zezilimi nezokufundisa, ithoni imakwa ngezimpawu zokubhala. 
Ukugcizelela okukhulu ( ´ ) kungasetshenziselwa ithoni ephezulu, kepha umkhuba ojwayelekile ukushiya ithoni ephezulu ingamakiwe 
Izikhulumi zomdabu zaseHausa, isizwe samaHausa, zitholakala kakhulu eNiger, eNyakatho yeNigeria, eNyakatho yeCameroon naseChad.Ngaphezu kwalokho, ulimi isetshenziswa njengophawu isifanakalo izikhulumi okungezona bomdabu e iningi Northern Nigeria kanye Southern Niger, futhi njengoba ulimi ukuhweba uhlangabezana Swathe emikhulu kakhulu Ntshonalanga Afrika ( Benin, Ghana, Cameroon, Togo, Chad futhi izingxenye ISudan ). [1] 
Umdlavuza Penile kuyinto umdlavuza esakheka esikhumbeni noma izicubu umthondo.Izimpawu zingafaka ukukhula okungajwayelekile, isilonda noma isilonda esikhunjeni sowesilisa, kanye nokopha noma ukukhipha okunuka kabi. 
Kuphakama umdlavuza Penile kusuka eyandulela izilonda, okuyinto ngokuvamile bathuthuke kusukela ephansi kulibanga ephezulu grade izilonda.Kumdlavuza we-penile ohlobene ne-HPV lokhu kulandelana kanje: [1] 
Izici zobungozi zibandakanya i-phimosis (ukungakwazi ukuhoxisa ijwabu lobudoda), ukuvuvukala okungapheli, ukubhema, ukutheleleka nge-HPV, i- condylomata acuminate, ukuba nabalingani abaningi bezocansi, kanye nokuya ocansini usemncane. 
Cishe ama-95% omdlavuza we-penile angama- squamous cell carcinomas .Zihlukaniswe ngezinhlobo ezilandelayo: 
Ezinye izinhlobo ze-carcinomas azivamile futhi zingafaka iseli elincane, i- Merkel cell, i- cell ecacile, i-sebaceous cell noma i- basal cell tumors.Izilonda ezingekho epithelial ezifana nama- melanomas nama- sarcomas zivame kakhulu. [1] 
Njengamakhemikhali amaningi amabi, umdlavuza we-penile ungasakazekela kwezinye izitho zomzimba.Ngokuvamile kuyisifo esiyinhloko, indawo yokuqala lapho umdlavuza usakazeka khona emzimbeni.Kancane kancane kuyisifo esibuhlungu sesibili, lapho umdlavuza usabalalele khona endondeni kusuka kwenye indawo.Ukufakwa komdlavuza we-penile kunqunywa ubukhulu bokuhlasela kwesimila, i-nodal metastasis, kanye ne-metastasis ekude. 
Ingxenye ye-T yemihlahlandlela yesiteji ye-AJCC TNM ingeyesimila sokuqala ngokulandelayo: 
I-Anatomic Stage noma Amaqembu Okuqagela umdlavuza we-penile ami kanjena: 
Cishe ama-95% omdlavuza we-penile angama- squamous cell carcinomas .Ezinye izinhlobo zomdlavuza we-penile njenge- Merkel cell carcinoma, i- cell cell carcinoma, ne- melanoma ngokuvamile azivamile. [1]Ku-2018, kwenzeka emadodeni angama-34,000 futhi kwabangela ukufa kwabantu abayi-15,000. 
Ukudlanga kwabantu i-papillomavirus kumdlavuza we-penile kuphakeme cishe ngama-40%. 
I-HPV16 yi-genotype ebaluleke kakhulu ebala cishe izicubu ezingama-63% zama-HPV-positive.Phakathi komdlavuza we-warty / basaloid ukwanda kwe-HPV kungama-70-100% kanti kwezinye izinhlobo kucishe kube ngu-30%. [1] 
Imishanguzo ye-HPV efana neGardasil noma iCervarix inganciphisa ubungozi be-HPV futhi, ngenxa yalokho, umdlavuza we-penile. [1] [2] Ukusetshenziswa kwamakhondomu kucatshangwa ukuthi kuyazivikela emdlavuzeni ophathelene ne-HPV penile. [1] Ukuhlanzeka okuhle kwezitho zobulili, okubandakanya ukugeza ipipi, isikhumba, nejwabu nsuku zonke ngamanzi, kungavimbela i-balanitis nomdlavuza we-penile. 
Noma kunjalo, insipho enezithako ezinzima kufanele igwenywe. [ ukucaphuna kuyadingeka ] Ukuphela kokubhema kunganciphisa ingozi yomdlavuza we-penile. [3] Ukusoka ngesikhathi sobuntwana noma ebuntwaneni kungahlinzeka ngokuvikelwa okuyingxenye kumdlavuza we-penile. 
Ababhali abaningana baphakamise ukusoka njengecebo elingenzeka lokuvikela umdlavuza we-penile; [1] [2] [4] kodwa-ke, i-American Cancer Society ikhomba ukuthi lesi sifo siyivelakancane futhi iphawula ukuthi i-American Academy of Pediatrics noma iCanada Academy of Pediatrics ayikukhuthazi ukusoka okwenzeka njalo ngaphambi kokubeletha. I-Phimosis ingavinjelwa ngokwenza inhlanzeko efanele nokubuyisa ijwabu njalo. [ ukucaphuna kwezokwelapha kuyadingeka ] I-Paraphimosis ingavinjelwa ngokungashiyi ijwabu lihoxiswe isikhathi eside. [ ukucaphuna kwezokwelapha kuyadingeka ] 
Ukwelashwa komdlavuza we-penile kuzohluka ngokuya ngesigaba somtholampilo sesimila ngesikhathi sokuxilongwa.Kunezinketho eziningi zokwelashwa komdlavuza we-penile, kuya ngesiteji.Kubandakanya ukuhlinzwa, ukwelashwa ngemisebe, ukwelashwa ngamakhemikhali kanye nokwelashwa kwezinto eziphilayo.Ukwelashwa okuvame kakhulu kungenye yezinhlobo ezinhlanu zokuhlinzwa: 
Indima yokwelashwa ngemisebe ifaka phakathi indlela yokulondolozwa komzimba yomdlavuza wepenile osezingeni lokuqala ezikhungweni ezikhethekile.Ngaphezu kwalokho, i-adjuvant therapy isetshenziselwa iziguli ezinesifo esithuthukile endaweni noma ukuphatha izimpawu. [1] 
Isibikezelo singahluka kakhulu ezigulini, kuya ngokuthi sikalwe kuphi.Ngokuvamile, lapho umdlavuza utholakala ngokushesha, kungcono ukubikezelwa.Izinga lokusinda leminyaka emihlanu yonke yazo zonke izigaba zomdlavuza we-penile cishe liyi-50%. 
Izimpawu
