Njengoba owesilisa eqhubeka nokuthomba, isidoda sakha izici ezivuthiwe ngobuningi obukhulayo besidoda esijwayelekile.Isidoda sikhiqize izinyanga eziyi-12 kuya kwezingu-14 ngemuva kokuqala kokukhishwa kwe-ejaculation ngemuva kwesikhathi esifushane.Kungakapheli izinyanga ezingama-24 kwe-ejaculation yokuqala, ivolumu yesidoda nobungako nezimpawu zesidoda kufana nokwedoda endala. 
Ukwenza imephu yokusebenza kwe-neuronal kobuchopho ngesikhathi sokuphendula okujula, abacwaningi bafunde ukubonakaliswa kwe- c-Fos, iproto-oncogene evezwe kuma-neuron ngokuphendula ukukhuthazwa ngamahomoni nama-neurotransmitters. [1]Ukuchazwa kwe-c-Fos ezindaweni ezilandelayo kuye kwabonwa: [2] [3] 
Yize kungavamile, amanye amadoda angafeza ama-ejaculation ngesikhathi sokushaya indlwabu ngaphandle kokuvuselelwa okwenziwa ngesandla.Amadoda anjalo ajwayele ukukwenza ngokugoqa nokuguquguqula imisipha yabo yesisu neyezinqe kanye nokucabanga ngamandla.Abanye bangakwenza ngokuxegisa indawo ezungeze ipipi, okungaholela ekuvinjweni okunzima ikakhulukazi uma kufakwe umfutho. 
Ukucindezela kwe-Perineum kuholela ekujuleni okubanjelwe emuva ngokucindezela i-perineum noma i-urethra ukuphoqa uketshezi lwesisu ukuba luhlale ngaphakathi.Esimweni esinjalo, uketshezi lwesisu luhlala ngaphakathi emzimbeni luye kwesinye.Abanye abantu bakwenza lokhu ukugwema ukwenza ukungcola ngokugcina sonke isidoda ngaphakathi. 
[1]Njengesimo sezokwelapha, kubizwa ngokuthi yi- retrograde ejaculation . [2] 
Ezilwaneni ezincelisayo nezinyoni, ukujula okuningi kuvamile.Ngesikhathi sokucobelelana, izinhlangothi zombili zomthondo ka-echidna onemilomo emifushane zisetshenziswa ngokulandelana.Ukushintshana phakathi kwezinhlangothi zombili kuvumela ukukhuthazwa okuqhubekayo ukwenza i-ejaculation ngaphandle kokuvimbela isikhathi sokuphikisa. [1] 
Ezingxenyeni ezinkulu zamahhashi, ukujula kuhambisana nokunyakaza komsila okwaziwa nge- "flag flagging".Lapho impisi yesilisa ikhipha umjelo, amandla ayo okugcina okhalo angase abe made.Inkawu i-rhesus eyesilisa ivame ukukhipha imisipha engaphansi kwemizuzwana eyi-15 ngemuva kokungena ngokocansi .Umbiko wokuqala nemidwebo yokuchichima okuzenzakalela esilwaneni esincelisayo sasemanzini yaqoshwa ehlelweni lasendle i-Indo-Pacific dolphin eduze naseMikura Island, eJapan, ngo-2012. [1] 
Emahhashini, ezimvwini nasezinkomeni, ukukhishwa kwesisu kwenzeka emizuzwaneni embalwa, kepha ezingulubeni, kungathatha imizuzu emihlanu kuya kwamashumi amathathu .Ukujula kwezingulube kuyakhuthazeka lapho umthondo omise okokuhlangana ungena nomlomo wesibeletho sowesifazane.Ingulube evuthiwe ingaveza yesidoda ngesikhathi esisodwa.Ku-llamas kanye ne-alpaca, i-ejaculation yenzeka ngokuqhubekayo ngesikhathi sokuhlangana. 
Isidoda sezinja zesilisa sikhishwa ngezigaba ezintathu ezihlukene.Isigaba sokugcina sokuphuma kwe-canine wesilisa senzeka ngesikhathi sethayi yokukopisha, futhi siqukethe kakhulu uketshezi lwe-prostatic. 
Ukujula ngaphambi kwesikhathi yilapho ukukhishwa kwe-ejaculation kwenzeka ngaphambi kwesikhathi osifunayo.Uma owesilisa engakwazi ukukhipha umuthi ngesikhathi esifanele ngemuva kokuvuselelwa ngokocansi isikhathi eside, naphezu kwesifiso sakhe sokwenza lokho, kubizwa ukubambezeleka kwe-ejaculation noma i- anorgasmia .I-orgasm engahambisani ne-ejaculation yaziwa njenge- orgasm eyomile . 
IVideo ye-ejaculation 
Izisulu zokusokwa okuhlulekile zibike ukuthi zicabanga ukuzibulala ngenxa yokudangala nokuzizwa zincishwa ubudoda bazo. [1]NgoDisemba 2014, ukufakelwa umthondo okokuqala ngempumelelo emhlabeni kwenziwa iqembu eliholwa nguDkt Andre van der Merwe.Lesi siguli bekuyindoda eneminyaka engu-21 ubudala eyaba yisisulu sezinkinga ngenxa yemikhuba yokuthwasa ezikoleni zokuthwasa ezingekho emthethweni. 
[1] [2] Ngo-21 Ephreli 2017 ukufakelwa umthondo wesibili kwenziwa iqembu elifanayo lodokotela elaliholwa uDkt Andre van der Merwe endodeni eneminyaka engama-40 eyalahlekelwa ipipi eminyakeni engu-17 ngaphambi kwenqubo. [3] Odokotela bathe ngenxa yezimo ezizungeze izikole zokusoka ezingekho emthethweni, iNingizimu Afrika isibe ngelinye lamazwe anesidingo esikhulu sokufakelwa isitho sangasese sowesilisa. 
Amadoda athandana nobulili obufanayo eNingizimu Afrika asathukwa futhi agxekwa yimiphakathi yawo. 
Isiko le-'Ulwaluko 'ngumkhuba ohlonishwa kakhulu futhi ongcwele wamasiko phakathi kwamaXhosa kanye nabantu abathile abakhuluma isiNguni baseNingizimu Afrika.Kusolwa ukuthi umthelela walo mkhuba ungasongela ukuzethemba kwensizwa eyisitabane, yize kungaphoqelekile ukuthi noma ngubani aye 'ehlathini'.Abanye besilisa abathandana nabobulili obufanayo ababambe iqhaza kulo mkhuba babika ukuthi benza kanjalo ukuze bathole ukuqinisekiswa kobudoda ngokwamasiko, kungashiwo okufanayo ngamadoda angasokile abesilisa nabesifazane.Ezinye izizathu zokuhlanganyela e-Ulwaluko zibandakanya ukufeza isifiso sokuhlangabezana nokulindelwe ngumphakathi kanye nengcindezi evela emndenini 'yokuguqula' ubungqingili ngokusebenzisa inqubo ye-Ulwaluko. 
[1]IFilm 'The Wound' yaqala ukukhonjiswa kwi-2017 Sundance Film Festival futhi ikhuthazwe yinoveli kaThando Mgqolozana ethi 'Indoda engeyona indoda' [2] egxile kokuhlangenwe nakho kwamadoda athandana nabesilisa abathandana nabesilisa abathandana nabobulili obufanayo ngesikhathi sika 'Ulwaluko'. [3]Abaholi bendabuko bakwaXhosa bagxeke le filimu besithi 'ayihloniphi', 'ibukela phansi isiko lamaXhosa' njengoba ikhombisa amasiko afihliwe. Empeleni akuvezi lutho ngabantu abangamaXhosa. 
[5] Le filimu iqhathaniswe ne- Moonlight ewine i-Oscar. [5] Umkhuba we-'ulwaluko 'uphinde ulawulwe yimithetho eminingana ukukhuthaza ukuphepha nokuvikelwa kwamathwasa angaphansi kweminyaka eye aba yisisulu semikhuba engahlanzekile ezikoleni zokusoka ezingekho emthethweni, le mithetho ifaka noMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika (1996), uMthetho Wezingane ( 2005), Ukusetshenziswa Kwamazinga Ezempilo Ekusokeni Komdabu (2001), kanye noMthetho Wabasebenzi Bezempilo Bendabuko (2004). 
Imininingwane yesiko akufanele idalulwe kwabesifazane noma kwabesilisa abangaqaliwe; ngokwesimiso sokuthi 'okwenzeka ehlathini, kuhlala ehlathini', ngokusho kweminye imithombo. [1]Ukubandlululwa kwamasiko kungaba kukhulu kangangokuthi amadoda angasokile noma 'angafanelekile' asokiwe ahlaselwa futhi ashaywe ngenxa yokungahambisani nawo, akucaci ukuhambisana nalokho noma isixhumanisi senkambiso yesikhashana uqobo. [2]NgoMashi 2014 insizwa yahlaselwa ngemuva kokuba ikhulume ngesikhathi somhlangano womphakathi ngezinkinga eyazibamba ngalesi siko. 
Ulwaluko, bendabuko ukusoka futhi Ukuqalwa ifomu ebuntwaneni sibe abantu abadala, kuyinto Ukuqalwa emkhubeni yasendulo (nakuba hhayi kuphela) ngokufaka amaXhosa, futhi ngokuvamile kwenziwa eNingizimu Afrika.Isiko ngokwesiko kuhloswe ngalo njengesikhungo sokufundisa, ukulungiselela abesilisa abancane ngemithwalo yemfanelo yobudoda. [1] Ngakho-ke, amathwasa abizwa ngokuthi abakhwetha ngesiXhosa : aba kusho iqembu, kanti i- kwetha kusho ukufunda. 
Eyesilisa oyedwa eqenjini waziwa ngokuthi umkhwetha.Owesilisa ongakatholakali ubizwa ngo- inkwenkwe (umfana), kungakhathalekile ukuthi uneminyaka emingaki, futhi akavunyelwe ukuba yingxenye yemisebenzi yabesilisa efana nemihlangano yesizwe. [3]

Isenzo 
Isiko lokuqalisa livame ukwenziwa ngasekupheleni kukaJuni / ekuqaleni kukaJulayi noma ngasekupheleni kukaNovemba / ekuqaleni kukaDisemba. 
[1] Ngesikhathi senqubo yesiko udokotela ohlinzayo wendabuko ( ingcibi ) ngokuhlinzwa ususa ijwabu . 
Ngemuva kokusikwa, isikhathi sokuhlukaniswa okulandelayo sithatha cishe inyanga eyodwa futhi sehlukaniswe izigaba ezimbili - kepha lokhu akuvamile ukwenzeka ezikhathini zanamuhla kanye / noma ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, lapho kuvame ukuhlala okungenani amaviki ama-4.Ngezinsuku eziyi-7 zokuqala abakhwetha bavalelwa eqhugwaneni (bhoma) futhi ukusetshenziswa kokudla okuthile, ngokwesibonelo inyama, kunqunyelwe, kepha lokhu kungahluka njengoba imizi ethile inezinkolelo zayo noma izindlela zokwenza izinto.Amanzi nawo angavinjelwa.Lesi sigaba sigcina ngomkhuba wokukhululwa, lapho kudedelwa khona amatheko okudla, okukhomba ushintsho esigabeni sesibili esihlala amasonto amabili kuya kwamathathu.Ngalezi zigaba amathwasa abhekwa yikhankatha (umlindi wendabuko).Ukuphela kwesikhathi sokuzihlukanisa kuqala lapho abafana benxuswa ukuba bagijimele emfuleni bayozigeza, futhi, kuye ngendawo.Kushe iqhugwane (iBhoma) nempahla yamathwasa okubalwa nezingubo zabo.Lokhu kufanekisela ukubukeka kwangaphandle okusha abaqalayo okufanele bakuthathe.Kuyisiko ngisho ukuthi abathwalwayo bagqoke ngendlela ehlelekile isikhathi esithile ngemuva komkhuba.Ithwasa ngalinye lithola ingubo entsha manje selibizwa ngokuthi "ikrwala" (ubunye) okusho ukuthi umuntu omusha noma amakrwala . (ubuningi) (amadoda amasha). 
[3]Amadoda angaqaliwe abizwa I nkwekwe. 
Okungenani abalethimba angama-969 ashonile ngenxa yezinkinga ezibangelwe yisiko kusukela ngo-1995. 
Izibalo ezinembile azitholakali ngenani lokunqunywa kwe-penile, kepha kulinganiselwa ukuthi inani lazo liphindwe kabili kunenani labashonile. [1]Iningi lokufa kanye nezinkinga kungumphumela wokungakwazi ukusebenza kochwepheshe bendabuko. 
[2]Lesi yisizathu esenza ukuthi ikakhulukazi amaMpondo athinteke kakhulu ngokufa kanye nezinkinga.AmaMpondo enza lesi siko kwaze kwaba yilapho iNkosi uFaku iwenqabela ngawo-1820s ngemuva kokulahlekelwa amadodana akhe amaningi ngenxa yezinkinga.Izikole zokuthwasa ziphinde zavela ngawo-1980 nawo-1990, kanti isiko leli seliqhutshwa ngezinga elikhulu. [3] 
NgoJanuwari 2014, uDesmond Tutu wanxusa ubuholi bendabuko nohulumeni ukuba bangenelele, futhi "basebenzise amakhono odokotela abaqeqeshiwe ukuthuthukisa imikhuba yethu yokusoka."Ubuye wagcizelela ukubaluleka kwamasiko alesi siko njengesikhungo semfundo, elungiselela amathwasa "ukuthi anikele ekwakheni umphakathi ongcono wabo bonke." [1] 
Ehlobo lonyaka wezi-2019 eNingizimu Afrika, bangu-21 sebebonke abafana abashonile ezikoleni ezihlukene zokusoka esifundeni sonke. 
Iningi labantu abashonile kuthiwa lingenxa yokuphelelwa ngamanzi emzimbeni ngenxa yokuvinjelwa kwamanzi.UNgqongqoshe Wezempilo uZweli Mkhize wenze izincomo zokuthi izikole zingabe zisalwenza lolu siko ezinyangeni zasehlobo. 
Iwilly warmer (noma sokisi lepipi ) ingubo eseyintsha eklanyelwe ukulingana ngaphezulu kwepipi . 
Ngokusho komdidiyeli waseCroatia uRadmila Kus, abavikeli ababelukiwe babegqokwa ngokwesiko ngabesilisa baseCroatia, ikakhulukazi esifundeni sezintaba saseMrkopalj, njengenhloso yokuvikela isithwathwa.Izingubo ezinjalo nazo igqoke Norway, lapho bebizelwa forhyse, vænakot, noma suspensorium.Izibonelo eziningana zigcinwa eNorway Museum of Cultural History.Kwesinye isikhathi eNorway zazenziwa ngoboya besikwele nohlangothi lwangaphakathi ngaphakathi, ukuthi zigqokwe ngaphansi kwebhulukwe lesikhumba ebusika. [3]EziQhingini zaseFaroe izingubo ezinjalo zibizwa ngokuthi i- kallvøttur (man mitten) noma i- purrivøttur (amasende mitten). [2] Kwakunomkhuba eNorway naseDenmark, ikakhulukazi e-Faroe Islands, lapho intombazane yayizonikeza isoka layo i- forhyse ukubona ukuthi ibuthathela phezulu kangakanani ubuhlobo bayo.Uma lesi sipho senqatshwa, lokhu kwakuthathwa njengobufakazi bokuthi wayengakakulungeli ukushada. 
[1] 
Kusukela ngekhulu lama-20, ukufudumala kwama-wilily kuvame ukwenziwa njengezinto ezintsha nezipho zamahlaya kunokuba kufezwe injongo esebenzayo.Ngo-1939, ngenkathi kuqoshwa i- Gone with the Wind, uClark Gable wathola isipho sesifudumezi esenziwe ngesandla sesitho sangasese esivela kuCarole Lombard.Ngawo-1950 uJoan Crawford waluka i- "cock sock" njengesipho sokuvalelisa uPorfirio Rubirosa . 
Umthetho wemithondo emincane isu ngokwethukela kusetshenziswa abalobi ukugwema ukuhlambalaza kumangala.Kuchazwe endabeni yeNew York Times nguDinitia Smith ngo-1998: 
Umthetho wepenisi omncane wakhonjwa empikiswaneni yango-2006 phakathi kukaMichael Crowley noMichael Crichton .UCrowley wasola ukuthi ngemuva kokubhala ukubukeza okungathandeki kwenoveli kaCrichton iState of Fear, uCrichton wafaka umlingiswa ogama lakhe lingu "Mick Crowley" kule noveli ethi Next.Uhlamvu kuyinto Rapist ingane, abachazwa njengabavela a -Washington, DC -Isekelwe intatheli Yale iziqu nge umthondo encane. 
Izithombe zobulili ezingcolile zezitabane zingumfanekiso wezenzo zocansi phakathi kwabesilisa.Umgomo wayo oyinhloko ukuvusa ucansi ezilalelini zawo.Softcore gay izithombe zobulili ezingcolile futhi ukhona; ke ngesikhathi esisodwa zazakha uhlobo, futhi ingase ivezwe njengoba beefcake izithombe ezingcolile kwabobulili besifazane futhi zobungqingili ukusetshenziswa besilisa. 
Ubuciko be-homoerotic nezinto zakudala zinomlando omude, zibuyela emuva endulo yaseGrisi.Yonke indlela isetshenzisiwe ukumela izenzo zocansi phakathi kwabesilisa.Kodwa-ke, izithombe zobulili ezingcolile zobungqingili emithonjeni yemidiya yesimanje ikakhulu zigxile ekwenzeni amavidiyo asekhaya (kufaka phakathi ama-DVD ), ukusakazwa kwentambo kanye nevidiyo evelayo ngokufunwa kanye nezimakethe ezingenantambo, kanye nezithombe nama-movie wokubukwa kwi-Intanethi. 
(Ukuthola i-gay erotica ephrintiwe, bheka inganekwane ye-gay pulp ). 
IHole Lokubhukuda (1884-85) lomculi waseMelika uThomas Eakins (1844-1916) uthathwa njengobuciko bomdwebo waseMelika, [1] [2] futhi ubizwe ngokuthi "isithombe esakhiwe kahle kunazo zonke izithombe zakhe zangaphandle".Lo mdwebo "ucashunwe kabanzi njengesibonelo esihle se- homoeroticism kubuciko baseMelika".U-Eakins uqobo uvela emanzini ngezansi kwesokudla - "endaweni yesiginesha, ngomqondo ongokomfanekiso."Ngokusho kukaJonathan Weinberg, iSwimming Hole iphawule ukuqala kwezithombe ze-homoerotic kubuciko baseMelika. 
I-Homoeroticism ibikhona ezithombeni nakumafilimu kusukela yasungulwa. 
Esikhathini esiningi saleso sikhathi, noma imuphi umfanekiso wezocansi kwakufanele uhlale ungaphansi komhlaba ngenxa yemithetho yamanyala.Ikakhulu, izinto zobungqingili zingaba ubufakazi besenzo esingekho emthethweni ngaphansi kwemithetho yesodomy ezindaweni eziningi.Lokhu akusenjalo e-United States, ngoba iNkantolo Ephakeme yakhipha isinqumo sokuthi leyo mithetho ayivumelani noMthethosisekelo ngo-2003 ecaleni likaLawrence v. ITexas . 
Amazwe ukuthi kukhona monarchies - by ifomu yabo uhulumeni. 
Ekudwetshweni kwamabalazwe noma mapmaking isifundo futhi ukwenza amabalazwe noma Globes . 
Imibhalo emabalazweni athile itholakala kusigaba : Amamephu. 
Ukuvivinya umzimba nge-aerobic yinoma yimuphi umsebenzi womzimba osebenzisa amaqembu emisipha emikhulu futhi ubangele umzimba ukuthi usebenzise i- oxygen eningi kunaleyo obuyenza ngesikhathi uphumule.Umgomo wokuzivocavoca nge-aerobic ukwandisa ukukhuthazela kwenhliziyo . [1] Izibonelo zokuzivocavoca nge-aerobic zifaka ukugijima, ukuhamba ngebhayisikili, ukubhukuda, ukuhamba ngamandla, ukweqa intambo, ukugwedla, ukuhamba izintaba, ukudansa, ukudlala ithenisi, ukuqeqeshwa okuqhubekayo, nokugijima ibanga elide. [2] Umsebenzi anaerobic, okuhlanganisa amandla kanye ukumelana ukuqeqeshwa, ungakwazi aqine, aninike amandla, ukwandisa yemisipha, kanye ngcono kwamathambo, ibhalansi, futhi elihlaba . 
[1] Izibonelo zokuzivocavoca amandla ngama- push-ups, ama- pull-ups, amalanga, ama- squats, i- bench press .Ukuzivocavoca kwe-Anaerobic kufaka phakathi ukuqeqeshwa kwesisindo, ukuqeqeshwa okusebenzayo , ukuqeqeshwa kwe-eccentric, ukuqeqeshwa kwesikhawu, ukuphrinta, kanye nokuqeqeshwa kwesikhawu esiphakeme okwandisa amandla emisipha yesikhashana. [1] [3] Ukuzivumelanisa nezimo kunwebeka futhi kwandise imisipha . [1] Imisebenzi efana nokwelula usizo ukuthuthukisa ukuguquguquka kokuhlangana nokugcina izicubu zomzimba zisebenza kahle. 
Ukuvivinya umzimba ungakwazi futhi zibandakanya ukuqeqesha ukuthi igxile ku ukunemba, lobubhalo, amandla, kanye nesivinini. 
Izinhlobo zokuzivocavoca nazo zingahlukaniswa njengezinamandla noma ezimile.Ukuzivocavoca kwe-'Dynamic ', njengokugijima okungaguquki, kuvame ukukhiqiza ukwehla komfutho wegazi we-diastolic ngesikhathi sokuzivocavoca ngenxa yokuhamba kwegazi okuthuthukile.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ukuzivocavoca okungu-static (njengokuphakamisa isisindo ) kungadala ukuthi ingcindezi ye-systolic ikhuphuke kakhulu, yize kunjalo, ngesikhathi sokuzivocavoca. 
Kwenziwa ngezizathu ezahlukahlukene: ukusiza ukukhula nokwenza ngcono amandla, ukuvimbela ukuguga, ukuthuthukisa imisipha kanye nohlelo lwe-cardiovascular, amakhono okucija ezemidlalo, ukunciphisa isisindo noma ukugcinwa, ukuthuthukisa impilo, noma ukumane ujabulise.Abantu abaningi bakhetha ukuzivocavoca ngaphandle lapho bangahlangana khona ngamaqembu, bazihlanganise, futhi bathuthukise inhlalakahle kanye nempilo yengqondo . [1] [2] 
Ngokuya ngezinzuzo zezempilo, inani lokuzivocavoca okunconywayo lincike enhlosweni, uhlobo lokuvivinya umzimba, nobudala bomuntu.Ngisho nokuzivocavoca umzimba okuncane kunempilo kunokungakwenzi. 
UKarabo Poppy Moletsane (owazalwa ngo-1992) ungumdwebi wezithombe waseNingizimu Afrika, umdwebi wezithombe, nomculi wasemgwaqweni. 
UPoppy wazalelwa eVereeniging.Ufunde e- Open Window Institute ePitoli kanti uneziqu zeVisual Communication. 
UPoppy wenze umsebenzi weWall Street Journal, Google, Coca-Cola, neNike - kufaka phakathi ukuklama izicathulo ezigqokwa nguLeBron James.Wakha imidwebo yochungechunge lokuqala lwase-Afrika kuNetflix, iNdlovukazi uSono, nethi Lapho Basibona.Wasebenzisana noRICH MNISI eqoqweni lezingubo ezihlanganisiwe, elibizwa nge-Running Errands, ngo-2020.Umdwebo wakhe we- Utah Jazz ufakwe eSalt Lake City, e-Utah. 
Ngo 2021, yena eyalwa Wikipedia, kanye Jasmina El Bouamraoui, ukuklama 101 izimpawu ukuze 20 weminyaka Wikipedia. 
Imidwebo yakhe ebunjiwe ikhonjiswa njengokufakwa emadolobheni kulo lonke elaseGoli, futhi ivele eTimes Square, kumavidiyo omculo, naseSoweto Towers. 
Wayekleliswe kuhlu lweForbes “30 Under 30” esigabeni sabadali bango-2019.Imiklamo yakhe yango-2019 yeNike iwine iBASA Beyond Border Partnership Award.Ngo-2020 wabizwa ngegama elithi "Ubuciko Bonyaka" phakathi kuka-10 no-5 . 
UKarabo igama elinikezwe eningizimu ye-Afrika.Kusho "impendulo" e -Sepedi, Sesotho kanye Setswana, futhi lingase libhekisele: 
UKarabo Modise, umdlali wekhilikithi UKarabo Motlhanka, umdlali wekhilikithi U-Queen 'Masenate Mohato Seeiso, ozalwa ngu-Anna Karabo Mots'oeneng 
Karabo, izinsalela ezithandekayo Jeso ke karabo FM, isiteshi somsakazo saseLesotho 
UKarabo Modise (owazalwa ngoJulayi 20, 1988 eBotswana) ungumdlali wekhilikithi waseBotswana futhi njengamanje udlalela iqembu lesizwe lekhilikithi laseBotswana. 
NgoMeyi 2019, waqokwa eqenjini laseBotswana elizodlalela amaFineral Finals omqhudelwano we- 2018-19 ICC T20 World Cup Africa Qualifier e- Uganda .Udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala weTwenty20 International (T20I) eBotswana bedlala ne-Uganda ngomhlaka 20 Meyi 2019. 
UMasenate Mohato Seeiso (owazalwa ngo- Anna Karabo Motšoeneng, ngoJuni 2, 1976) uyindlovukazi engumfazi waseLesotho njengomfazi weNkosi uLetsie III waseLesotho.Wayengumuntu wokuqala ovamile emlandweni wanamuhla ukushada emndenini wasebukhosini waseLesotho.Selokhu aba yiNdlovukazi, waba nguMxhasi wezinhlangano zosizo eziningana futhi wasebenza ukukhuthaza umsebenzi wamaphrojekthi ahlobene ne- HIV / AIDS . 
UQueen 'Masenate Mohato Seeiso ubambe iqhaza kumaphrojekthi ahlukahlukene okusiza, kubandakanya iPatronage yeLesotho Red Cross Society, iSOS Children's Village, neMachabeng International College lapho afunda khona ngaphambi kokuba yiNdlovukazi.Ngaphezu kokusebenza kwakhe nenhlangano esiza abantulayo Abantu Abakhubazekile, uQueen 'Masenate ngokuvamile unentshisekelo yokusebenza namaphrojekthi afuna ukuthuthukisa amazwi abantu abakhubazekile eLesotho. 
Unentshisekelo enkulu ekwenzeni ukuthi umsebenzi owenziwe ngeziguli ezine-HIV / AIDS ukhulunywe emphakathini, futhi ubambe iqhaza ezinhlelweni eziningi zokuqwashisa eLesotho.I-Queen 'Masenate nayo ihambele imiklamo eyahlukahlukene yengculazi ezweni lonke, kuhlanganisa nezikhungo zezintandane . 
Ubuye abe nesitifiketi sosizo lokuqala. [1] 
UQueen 'Masenate wahlangana okokuqala neNkosi uLetsie III waseLesotho ngo-1996.Lokhu kwaba ngunyaka ofanayo abeseyiNkosi ngokwesibili, kulandela ukushona kukayise engozini yomgwaqo. 
UKarabo Mathang-Tshabuse (owazalwa ngo-1987/88) ungummeli futhi uyinxusa lebhola.Ngo-2009, waba ngummeli wokuqala webhola lezinyawo waseNingizimu Afrika owagunyazwa yiFIFA.Ngo-2007, wayengumsunguli wenkampani yokuphathwa kwezemidlalo iPmanagement. 
Ngo biology, i sitho iqoqo kwezicubu ehlanganyela iyunithi kwesakhiwo ukukhonza ovamile umsebenzi. 
Izindlela zokulawula inzalo. 
Umshado wasezulwini (obizwa nangokuthi Isivumelwano Esisha Somshado Esisha, Esingunaphakade, Umshado Wasethempelini noma Isimiso ) imfundiso yokuthi umshado ungahlala unaphakade ezulwini.Lokhu kuyimfundiso eyingqayizivele yeThe Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church) noma i- Mormonism, kanye namagatsha e- Mormon basicism . [1] 
Umshado wasezulwini uyisibonelo semfundiso yeSonto LDS yokufaka uphawu.Ukulandela umshado wasezulwini, akugcini ngokuvalwa kwabashadikazi njengendoda nenkosikazi, kepha izingane ezizalwe emshadweni nazo zifakwe kulowo mndeni.Ezimweni lapho indoda nenkosikazi bebekade beshade ngokwesiko phambilini futhi besekuvele kunezingane ezisuka kubumbano lwabo, izingane ziphelezela abazali bazo ziye ethempelini futhi zivalwa kubazali bazo kulandela umcimbi womshado. 
Kunengxabano enkulu yemfundiso phakathi kweSonto le-LDS kanye namahlumela alo mayelana nokuthi ngabe umshado wasezulwini ubuningi noma uyinkosikazi eyodwa.Abanye abagxeki bathi umbhalo osemthethweni wamaMormon, Imfundiso neziVumelwano isigaba 132, esichaza umshado wasezulwini, ucacisa ukuthi imishado yobuningi kuphela efanelekile.Abanye bathi lo mbhalo ukhombisa "unkosikazi", okusho ukuthi noma imuphi umthetho wokufaka uphawu ethempelini womshado ungafaneleka. 
Umbono wokugcina usekelwa yi- History of the Church esemthethweni, ekhombisa ukuthi umshado unomphela wawunomfazi oyedwa ngaphandle "kwezinye izimo": [2] 
Wayazi izwi likaNkulunkulu — wayazi ukuthi umyalo kaSomandla kuye kwakufanele uye phambili — ukubeka isibonelo, nokusungula umshado wobuningi waseCelestial.Wayazi ukuthi wayengenakho kuphela ukucwasana kwakhe nezinto zakhe zangaphambili ukulwa nokuhlula, kepha nezomhlaba wonke wamaKrestu ...; kepha uNkulunkulu ... wayenikeze umyalo. [1] Noma kunjalo, kulungile ukuthi "umshado wasezulwini" bekuvame ukusetshenziselwa ukubhekisa emshadweni weningi. 
Umqondo womshado wasezulwini wachazwa ngu- Emanuel Swedenborg ekuqaleni kuka-1749.Igama leSwedenborg Latin conjugium coeleste lahunyushwa ngokuthi "umshado wasezulwini" nguJohn Clowes ngo-1782.Abahumushi ababili bakamuva bakhethe igama elithi "umshado wasezulwini." [1] [2]Kuwo wonke umbhalo wakhe onegunya, [3] ISwedborg ibalula kuphela igama elithi umshado wasezulwini kabili. 
Matthew 22:28–30, uJesu ubuzwa ngesimo esiqhubekayo somshado emva kokufa futhi uphendula ngokuthi emva kokuvuka kwabafileyo "abantu ngeke bashade noma bendiswe; bayoba njengezingelosi ezulwini."AmaMormon awakuhumushi okushiwo nguJesu njengokusho "ukuthi imishado ngeke ibe khona ngemuva kovuko, kepha ukuthi imishado ngeke yenziwe ngemuva kovuko; ngoba yonke imibuzo ngezinga lomshado kumele ixazululwe ngaphambi kwalesosikhathi." [1]Ngakho-ke, amaMormon akholelwa ukuthi ngabantu abafayo kuphela abangaba ngaphansi komthetho womshado waphakade; abantu abafayo bangazitholela umthetho noma ngokwabo kulabo asebashona. 
UbuMomoni nobuNicaene ubuKrestu (obuvame ukubizwa ngokuthi ubuKhristu obujwayelekile) bunobudlelwano obuyinkimbinkimbi bezenkolo, bomlando nobudlelwano bezenhlalo.AmaMormon baveze izimfundiso zabo esebenzisa indinganiso amagama waseBhayibhelini futhi banemibono efanayo mayelana nohlobo uJesu Kristu ka- isihlawulelo, uvuko komzimba, futhi Coming Okwesibili njengoba bendabuko ubuKristu.Yize kunjalo, iningi lamaMormon aliyemukeli imfundiso kaZiqu -zintathu yobuNicaea ubuKristu, ehlanganiswe ku- Nicene and Nicene-Constantinopolitan Creeds of 325 and 381.Nakuba amaMormon cabanga iBhayibheli amaProthestani njengoba umbhalo, bengakholelwa e inerrancy waseBhayibhelini.Babuye futhi bamukela imibhalo eyengeziwe eBhayibhelini abakholelwa ukuthi yembulwe ngokwaphezulu nguJoseph Smith, [1]kubandakanya neNcwadi kaMormoni, [3] [2] [3] iMfundiso neziVumelwano, [3] neParele Lenani Elikhulu . 
[3] AmaMormon enza ukubhaphathizwa futhi agubha isakramente, kepha futhi abamba iqhaza kweminye imikhuba yenkolo. 
AmaMormon azibiza ngamaKristu. 
I- Book of Mormon (1830), ehlanganisa imfundiso yokuqala yamaMormon, yayihloselwe, ngokwengxenye, ukuxazulula izingxabano eziqhubekayo zemfundiso phakathi kwamahlelo obuKhristu nokwakha imfundiso eyodwa ehlanganyelwe.UJoseph Smith wayekholelwa eBhayibhelini futhi wabelana ngesiko lamaProthestani lokuthi iBhayibheli (ngaphandle kwe- Apocrypha ) ekuqaleni lembulwa uNkulunkulu esintwini futhi lalinokuqukethwe "kwevangeli". 
Yize kunjalo, uSmith wayekholelwa ukuthi iBhayibheli lesikhathi sakhe lalivele lisusele esimweni salo sokuqala.USmith usole iSonto LamaKhatholika ngokulahleka kwezincwadi zebhayibheli nangokwethula ukonakala kanye nokuphazamiseka embhalweni weBhayibheli.USmith uthe iNcwadi kaMormoni iveze "izinto ezicacile neziyigugu ezazithathiwe" eBhayibhelini.USmith uphinde waqeda ukubuyekeza okungashicilelwe kweBhayibheli ngo-1833, athe kulungisa amaningi ala maphutha,[1]futhi wanezela ukuhlaziya okugqugquzelwe.USmith unikeze iNcwadi kaMormoni isikhundla esilingana neBhayibheli. 
Ukubukwa kohlobo lukaNkulunkulu ekuqaleni kweMormonism kube yindaba yokuphikisana.UThomas G. Alexander uthi imfundiso yenkolo yokuqala yamaMormon "empeleni yayinguZiqu-zintathu", Isitatimende esikwiLectures on Faith sisetshenziselwa ukuvikela le nkolelo: 
Kunabantu ababili abakha amandla amakhulu, angenakuqhathaniswa, aphetheyo, futhi aphakeme ngaphezu kwazo zonke izinto, okwenziwa ngazo zonke izinto futhi zenziwa ngaye, ezidaliwe zenziwa.BanguYise neNdodana-uBaba ongumuntu womoya, inkazimulo, namandla aphethe konke ukuphelela nokugcwala, iNdodana, eyayisesifubeni sikaYise, umuntu wetabernakele. 
Kungenzeka ukuthi uJoseph Smith wamane nje akazange aqonde isimo senyama noma somzimba kaNkulunkulu ngesikhathi kuhanjiswa Izinkulumo Zokholo.Ulwazi lwakhe lwezinto ezinjengalezo zabo bonke abesilisa nabesifazane-lwaluvame ukukhuphuka, futhi ukukhula kwakhe ekuqondeni ngakho-ke kwaba yintuthuko "emgqeni owodwa".Njengomphumela woMbono Wokuqala, umfana ongumprofethi wayazi ukuthi amazulu awasavaliwe; lowo sathane wayengaphezu kwenganekwane noma isingathekiso; nokuthi uBaba neNdodana babengabantu abahlukene nabahlukile. 
Bona (amaMormon) bakholelwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu weqiniso ungumuntu obonakalayo, owenziwe ngomzimba nezitho; nokuthi ngenkathi uMdali enza u-Adamu ngomfanekiso wakhe, wamenza walingana nobukhulu bukaNkulunkulu uqobo. 
I-Early Mormon soteriology, yize yayingalandeli isiko elalikhona, imvamisa yayiyi- Arminian.I-Early Mormonism yavumelana namaWeseli nabaFundi bakaKrestu ekwenqabeni izimfundiso zikaCalvin ngokuthanda ukuphelela kobuKristu nenkululeko yokuzikhethela (ebizwa ngenkululeko yokuzikhethela ).Futhi, ngenkathi iNcwadi kaMormoni iqinisekisa imfundiso yesono sokuqala,ibuye ivumelane namanye amahlelo ase-Arminian ukuthi izingane azikwazi ukwenza isono futhi zisesimweni somusa. 
I-Mormonism yavela ngawo-1820s ngesikhathi sokuguqulwa okukhulu kanye nokuhlolwa ngaphakathi kwamaProthestani aseMelika, futhi iMormonism ixhunyaniswe ngokuqinile kuleyo ndawo yenkolo . [1]Njengendlela yobuKristu yokuqala, inkolo entsha yayingenye yezinhlangano eziningi zenkolo ezithi zazibuyisela ubuKrestu esimeni sazo ngesikhathi sabaPhostoli Abayi-12 . [2] 
Ngemva Kosala, Nemade ethulwa protagonist ezahlukene, Changadev Patil, ngokusebenzisa amanoveli akhe amane Bidhar ( Marathi ), Hool ( Marathi , Jarila ( Marathi kanye neJhool ( Marathi ). 
Enye i-tetralogy iqala ngamaHindu - uJagnyachi Samruddha Adgal ( Marathi ) ngo-2010 enoKhanderao, isazi semivubukulo njenge-protagonist yaso. 
Umehluko phakathi kukaSangvikar noPatil awugcini nje kubudala babo, ubungcweti, imikhuba yabo, kanye nokuqonda kwabo ngokomqondo nangokomzwelo. ukubhekana nokuyiqonda.I-Sangvikar is mercurial, uPatil ubhekana namaqiniso, kanti ukwazi kukaKhanderao kuhamba iminyaka engu-5000 kuya esikweni lase-Indus Valley ku-tetralogy yamaHindu. 
Njengomgxeki, umnikelo kaNemade uhlala ekuqaliseni iDeshivad, umbono ophikisa ukuhwebelana kwembulunga yonke noma ukuhwebelana kwamazwe omhlaba, eqinisekisa ukubaluleka kwamagugu omdabu wabalobi, okukhombisa ukuthi izincwadi zaseMarathi kufanele zizame ukuvuselela isizinda sazo somdabu futhi zihlole imithombo yazo yomdabu.UNemade wabacasula abantu besikhathi sakhe ngokubanga ukuthi indaba emfushane uhlobo oluphansi kunaleli noveli. 
UNemade uzuze umklomelo ohlonishwayo weJnanpith Award ngoFebhuwari 2015.Wayengowesine owathola umklomelo ngomsebenzi wolimi lwesiMarathi. 
Owine iSahitya Akademi Award, wanikezwa uPadma Shri ngo-2011 nguHulumeni wase-India. 
UBhalchandra Vanaji Nemade (owazalwa ngo-1938) ungumbhali wolimi lwesiNdiya saseMarathi, imbongi, umgxeki kanye nesazi sezolimi.Ukuqala ngenoveli yakhe yokuqala ethi Kosala, uNemade ulethe ubukhulu obusha emhlabeni wezincwadi zesiMarathi.Lokhu kwalandelwa tetralogy ehlanganisa amanoveli Bidhar, Hool, Jareela futhi Jhool.Ngo-2013, uNemade washicilela i-magnum opus yakhe enesihloko esithi Hindu: Jagnyachi Samruddha Adgal ( Marathi ) ebhekwa njengobuciko bakhe.UNemade ungumamukeli weSahitya Akademi Award kanye noMklomelo weJnanapith, okuyinhlonipho ephakeme kakhulu yezincwadi eNdiya.Ngo-2013 wanikezwa iPadma Shri . 
UNemade wazalwa ngomhlaka 27 Meyi 1938 esigodini saseSangavi esifundeni saseKhandesh eMaharashtra.Ngemuva kokuphothula umatikuletsheni, wathuthela ePune, futhi wathola i- BA yakhe eFergusson College ePune nase- MA eLinguistics evela eDeccan College ePune naseNgilandi Literature evela eMumbai University eMumbai.Uthole i-PhD ne-D.Lit. amadigri asuka eNyakatho Maharashtra University. 
UNemade wasebenza njengothisha wasekolishi ezingxenyeni eziningana zeMaharashtra. 
Uhlale unyaka eLondon efundisa isiMarathi eSchool of Oriental and African Studies.Ukusuka ngo-1973 kuya ku-1986, wafundisa isiNgisi eMarathwada University e-Aurangabad.Ngo-1987 waqokwa njengoprofesa nenhloko yomnyango wesiNgisi eGoa University.Ngo-1991, wajoyina iMumbai University, lapho athatha khona umhlalaphansi njengoSihlalo waseGurudeo Tagore wezifundo zokuqhathanisa ezincwadini.Ngawo-1960, uNemade wahlela umagazini waseMarathi iVacha . 
UNemade wabhala inoveli yakhe yokuqala ethi Kosala ( Marathi ) ngo-1963.Kuyincwadi engamanga yomlando kaPandurang Sangvikar, osemusha ovela emaphandleni iMaharashtra ofunda ekolishi ePune ; kepha kusekelwe ngokukhululeka empilweni kaNemade uqobo ebusheni bakhe. 
USizwe Banzi Is Dead (owadidiyelwa futhi wakhishwa njenge: Sizwe Bansi is Dead ) ngumdlalo ka- Athol Fugard, owabhalwa ngokubambisana nabalingisi ababili baseNingizimu Afrika, uJohn Kani noWinston Ntshona, bobabili ababonakala emdlalweni wokuqala. 
Indunankulu yayo yomhlaba yenzeka ngomhlaka-8 Okthoba 1972 e- Space Theatre, eKapa, eNingizimu Afrika.Indunankulu yayo eyalandela yaseBrithani yawina i-London Theatre Critics Award ye-Best Play ka-1974 Indunankulu yayo yaseMelika yenzeka e- Edison Theatre, eNew York City, ngomhlaka 13 Novemba 1974.Ubekwe phakathi kwemidlalo ephambili eyake yenziwa yi- The Independent, lapho yachazwa khona njenge "umdlalo olula okhohlisayo nobuntu odlula isikhathi sobandlululo." 
Uhlobo lukaSizwe Bansi Is Dead lungalandelwa kulokho okwenzeka kuFugard njengomabhalane wezomthetho eNkantolo Yekhomishana Yomdabu eGoli .Ngaleso sikhathi kwakudingeka ukuthi zonke izakhamuzi ezimnyama namakhaladi ezingaphezulu kweminyaka eyishumi nesithupha ziphathe [sic] incwadi kamazisi evimbela ukuqashwa nokuhamba ngaphakathi ezweni.Enkantolo, uFugard wabona imiphumela yalo mthetho: abamnyama bathunyelwa ejele ngesilinganiso esethusayo.Yize le mikhawulo ingeyaseNingizimu Afrika ngokukhethekile, abagxeki bakuqaphelile ukuthi indikimba yalo mdlalo yobunikazi igcwele umhlaba wonke.Abagxeki nezazi baphinde babona ukuthi iSizwe Bansi Is Dead iqukethe izinto ezingenangqondo, ikakhulukazi ukubekwa kwayo okuncane kanye nodaba lwe-surreal. 
[1] 
Lo mdlalo uvula estudiyo sokuthwebula izithombe sowesilisa ogama lakhe linguStyles.Lesi situdiyo siseNew Brighton, ePort Elizabeth, eNingizimu Afrika. 
Ngemuva kokufunda udaba lwephephandaba ngomshini wezimoto, uStyles utshela abalaleli indaba ehlekisayo ngesigameko esenzeke ngesikhathi esebenza eFord Motor Company. 
Encwadini, uSizwe utshela umkakhe ukuthi uSizwe Banzi ushonile.Ubhala ukuthi ngesikhathi efika ePort Elizabeth evela kubo eKing William's Town, wahlala nomngani wakhe uZola owazama ukusiza uSizwe ukuthi athole umsebenzi.Ukufuna kwakhe umsebenzi akuphumelelanga; ngenxa yalokho, watshelwa yiziphathimandla ukuthi kufanele ahambe ezinsukwini ezintathu.USizwe wayohlala kumngani kaZola, uBuntu. 
Umdlalo ubuyela esikhathini samanje. 
Ukuhlala kwaBuntu, uSizwe utshela uBuntu ngezinkinga zakhe - ngaphandle uma kwenzeka isimangaliso, kuzofanele ahambe edolobheni ezinsukwini ezintathu.UBuntu uyazwelana nale nkinga futhi uphakamisa ukuthi asebenze ezimayini eziseKing William's Town. 
USizwe uyawuphika lo mqondo ngokuthi uyingozi enkulu.UBuntu unquma ukumkhipha ayophuza indawo eSky, endaweni yokucima ukoma yendawo. 
Ukugxila kubuyela kuSizwe njengoba eqhubeka nokuqamba incwadi ayibhalele umkakhe.Uchaza okuhlangenwe nakho kwakhe eshibhini laseSky, lapho enikezwe khona utshwala ngowesifazane ngendlela enenhlonipho. 
USizwe uqeda ukuyala umkakhe lencwadi.Kuyo, umtshela ukuthi uBuntu uyamsiza ekutholeni imvume yokungena.Isimo sibuyele emuva esitudiyo sezithombe seStyles; USizwe uthathwa isithombe sakhe. 
Imibhalo ephathelene namasiko aseNtshonalanga, ifa lezinkambiso zomphakathi, izindinganiso zokuziphatha, amasiko wendabuko , izinhlelo zezinkolelo, izinhlelo zezombusazwe, izinto zobuciko nobuchwepheshe bezwe laseNtshonalanga.Leli gama lisebenza nangaphesheya kweYurophu emazweni nakwamasiko anemilando exhunywe ngokuqinile neWestern Europe ngokufuduka, ukoloni, noma ithonya.Isibonelo, isiko laseNtshonalanga lifaka phakathi amazwe anqunyiwe eMelika nase- Oceania.Isiko laseNtshonalanga lithonywe kakhulu amasiko amaGreki namaRoma kanye namaJuda. 
Umdwebo wendlu yamaNdebele isitayela sobuciko base-Afrika obenziwa ngabantu baseNingizimu Ndebele baseNingizimu Afrika.Kuvamise ukwenziwa ngabesifazane bamaNdebele uma bependa amakhaya. 
Lezi zindlu ezibukeka zilula kakhulu ziyisistimu eyinkimbinkimbi yesiko nokudalwa.Lesi siko esidwetshiwe sisaphila nanamuhla.Njengoba sonke isizukulwane sidlula phansi kunezinguquko ezincane eziqala ukuba khona.Le yindlela yabo yokuxhumana nokukhuluma emakhaya abo. 
Abesifazane basebenza isikhathi eside futhi kanzima ukuqeda lezi zindonga futhi bayaqashelwa umphakathi wangaphandle ngenxa yethalente labo kanye nokukhuluma kwabo. 
Phakathi nekhulu le-18, Ndzundza Ndebele abantu of South Africa wadala emasikweni abo siqu futhi isitayela endlini Umdwebo.Kuze kube ngasekupheleni kweminyaka yama-1900, amaNdebele ayephawula amaqhawe nabanikazi bomhlaba abakhulu.Ekwindla ka-1883, baya empini namabhunu angomakhelwane.Ukuhlulwa kwempi kwaletha impilo enzima nezijeziso ezesabekayo kumaNdebele.Ngalezo zikhathi ezinzima izimpawu zokuveza zenziwa ngabantu abahluphekayo bezwakalisa usizi lwabo.Lezi zimpawu bekuyisiqalo sefomu lobuciko lase-Afrika. 
Yize babelana ngegama elifanayo, akufanele badidaniswe nabantu ( baseMzilikazi ) baseNdebele baseNyakatho baseZimbabwe banamuhla, abadabuka esizweni samaZulu, abahlangana nabo kuphela ngemuva kweMfecane.Abantu baseNdebele baseNyakatho bakhuluma ulimi lwesiNdebele.Umndeni wakwaMzilikazi wakwaKhumalo (kamuva owabizwa ngokuthi amaNdebele) unomlando ohlukile (bheka ulimi lwesiNdebele lwaseZimbabwe ) futhi ulimi lwabo lufana kakhulu nesiZulu nesiXhosa.AmaNdebele aseningizimu ikakhulukazi ahlala ezifundazweni zaseMpumalanga, eGauteng naseLimpopo, zonke ezisenyakatho-mpumalanga yezwe. 
UMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika ubeka ukuthi bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika banelungelo lokuzibona ngolimi lwabo, futhi uveza ukuthi izinhlangano zezinhlanga noma "ubuzwe" bukhonjwa kakhulu ngolimi olufanayo; yingakho kwamukelwa amaqembu afana nesibonelo samaXhosa ahlanganiswe isiXhosa; AmaZulu ahlanganiswe isiZulu; AmaVenda ahlanganiswe nguTshivenda; namaSotho ahlanganiswe isiSuthu.Amaqembu ahlukahlukene akhuluma ulimi lwesiXitsonga noma olunye lwezilimi zalo ngakho-ke nawo ahlanganiswe yilolu limi futhi athatha igama lalo kulo, yingakho ngokomthethosisekelo kungabantu bamaTsonga (Vatsonga).Kukhona namanye amaqembu esiTsonga ezingxenyeni ezithile zeMozambique, iZimbabwe, neSwaziland.Amanye amaqembu ahlobene ngaphandle kwaseNingizimu Afrika angokhokho noma ahlobene nabantu baseTsonga baseNingizimu Afrika ahamba ngamagama ezizwe ezahlukahlukene (isib, iTonga, Rhonga, Chopi, Tswa) kepha kwesinye isikhathi ahlukaniswa phakathi kwamagugu nomlando wabantu baseTsonga baseNingizimu Afrika. 
Umnotho wendabuko wamaTsonga usekelwe kwezolimo ezixubekile kanye nokwelusa.Imidumbula iyisona esiyisisekelo; Ummbila (umbila), amabele, amabele nezinye izitshalo kuyalinywa.Abesifazane benza umsebenzi omningi wezolimo, kuyilapho abesilisa nabafana abasebasha benakekela izilwane ezifuywayo (umhlambi wezinkomo, izimvu nezimbuzi) yize abanye besilisa betshala imali.Iningi lamaTsonga selinemisebenzi eNingizimu Afrika naseMozambique. 
Abantu baseTsonga ( Tsonga ) Isizwe samaBantu esidabuka kakhulu eSouthern Mozambique naseNingizimu Afrika ( eLimpopo naseMpumalanga ). 
Bakhuluma isiXitsonga, ulimi lwaseNingizimu Bantu.Linani lelincane kakhulu lemaTsonga latfolakala eZimbabwe naseNyakatfo ye-Eswatini. 
Abantu abangamaTsonga baseNingizimu Afrika babelana ngomlando othile nabantu abangamaTsonga baseNingizimu yeMozambique; nokho ziyehluka ngokwesiko nangokolimi. 
IsiTsonga amadoda ngokwesiko sokuya esikoleni sokusoka ukusoka ngokuthi Matlala (KaMatlala) noma Ngoma (e Ngomeni) okwathi ngemva kwalokho ithathwa njengokuhlola amadoda.Amantombazane asemancane afunda esikoleni sokuthwasa esiholwa ngabesifazane abadala baseVatsonga esibizwa ngeKhomba, ngakho-ke amathwasa abizwa nge-tikhomba (khomba- singular, tikhomba- plural)Izintombi kuphela ezivunyelwe ukuya kulesi sikole sokuthwasa lapho zizofundiswa kabanzi ngobufazi, ukuthi zingaziphatha kanjani njenge-tikhomba emphakathini, futhi zilungiselelwe nomshado. 
Abantu bamaTsonga badabuka eMaphakathi neMpumalanga ye-Afrika ndawo thile phakathi kwe-AD 200 kanye ne-500, futhi sebethuthele ngaphakathi nangaphandle kwaseNingizimu Afrika iminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane (1,000).Ekuqaleni, abantu bamaTsonga bahlala emathafeni asogwini eNyakatho neMozambique kepha bagcina behlala eSifundazweni saseTransvaal nasezindaweni ezizungeze iSt Lucia Bay eNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngawo-1300s. 
[1]Enye yezincwadi zokuqala ezibhalwe phansi zabantu baseTsonga nguHenri Philipe (HP) Junod osihloko sithi "Matimu ya Vatsonga 1498-1650 " eyashicilelwa ngokusemthethweni ngonyaka we-1977, futhi ikhuluma ngemibuso yakuqala yamaTsonga.Ngaphambi kwalokhu, uHenri Alexandri (HA) Junod osekhulile wakhipha incwadi yakhe ethi " The Life of a South African Tribe " eyashicilelwa okokuqala ngaphansi kwemiqulu emibili ngo-1912-1913 yaphinde yashicilelwa ngo-1927. 
UVeysel Sarı (owazalwa ngo-25 Julayi 1988) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo waseTurkey odlala njengeqembu emuva leqembu laseSüper Lig i- Antalyaspor. 
Ngo-4 Febhuwari 2014, uVeysel wajoyina iGalatasaray esayina inkontileka ezomgcina ekilabhini kuze kube ngu-2018.Wenza DEBUT yakhe ngokumelene Tokatspor ku 5 Februwari 2014, inetha igoli, e ngo 3-0 win for umkhankaso ka- Turkish Cup. 
UVeysel udlale umdlalo wakhe wokuqala ku-8 kuFebhuwari 2014 ebhekene neqembu lakhe langaphambilini u- Eskişehirspor, ezongena esikhundleni se-3-0 ekhaya. 
Ngo-28 Meyi 2013, uVeysel wakhethwa okokuqala eqenjini eligcwele ngumqeqeshi u-Abdullah Avci, emidlalweni yobungani neSlovenia neLatvia. 
Lesi sigaba sifaka ama-athikili ezinhlobo ezithile kanye nemikhiqizo yeziphuzo eziqukethe i- ethanol. 
Lesi sigaba simayelana nokusetshenziswa kweziphuzo ezidakayo ngabantu. 
Mayelana nama-athikili wemikhiqizo ethile yeziphuzo ezidakayo, bheka Isigaba: Iziphuzo ezidakayo Ngemibhalo ephathelene nobhiya, iwayini, ne-cider, bheka Isigaba: Iziphuzo ezibilile 
Uzihlanganisa babe uhlobo Mint ushokoledi eyenziwe Bendicks futhi ithengiswe UK kusuka 2002. 
Amashokolethi enziwa wonke e-UK efektri eseWinchester.Ngo-Ephreli 2009 u- August Storck wakuqinisekisa ukuthi kuvalwa ifektri ngasekupheleni kukaJulayi futhi wathuthela umkhiqizo e-Ohrdruf, isitshalo sayo saseMpumalanga Jalimane.Lokhu kuzoholela ekulahlekelweni yimisebenzi engaphezu kwama-80 yize kuzoqhubeka nokuqasha abasebenzi abangaphezu kwama-30 eWinchester ukuxhasa ukumaketha nokuthengiswa kwemikhiqizo yayo e-UK. 
Izinhlobo zamaMingles zashintshwa ngoKhisimusi 2007, kwase kuba yilezi: 
Zingathengwa ngebhokisi lebhokisi elijwayelekile, noma kumathini omude oyindilinga.Zonke zaziluhlaza. 
Isifunda saseGokwe siqukethe umhlaba osendaweni ezungeze isikhungo saseGokwe ebesingaphansi kwesandla sabantu baseShangwe, [1] [2] iqembu elikhuluma isiShona, elalisenyakatho nesifundazwe saseMidlands enyakatho-ntshonalanga yeZimbabwe, futhi manje sehlukaniselwe esifundeni iGokwe South naseGokwe North District.Amanye amaqembu amaningi ahlala kule ndawo, okubalwa kuwo amaTonga, namaNdebele. [3] 
Isifunda iNkayi North silele eningizimu.Umcwaningi waphawula ngonyaka we-1998, ukuthi umngcele weNkayi-Gokwe wawukhuni ngisho nangaphambi kokuthola inkululeko ngenkathi kuqashwa amabutho asizayo akhuluma isiShona eGokwe futhi asetshenziswa ngokumelene neNkayi ekuhlaseleni okusobala kwezizwe. [1] 
IKwekwe High School yisikole samabanga aphezulu esisedolobheni laseKwekwe, esifundeni saseMidlands eZimbabwe .Kwaziwa kwaze kwaba ngu-1982 njengeQue Que High School.Isiqubulo sesikole uNon Sibi Sed Omnibus (hhayi owomunye kodwa owethu sonke). 
IKwekwe High yisikole sezinhlanga ezihlangene esinikeza imfundo kusuka kuFomu 1 kuze kufike kuFomu 6 futhi inikela ngezemidlalo ezifana nebhola lombhoxo, ikhilikithi, ithenisi, basketball, ukubhukuda, i-hockey yasenkundleni, i-netball ne-volleyball.Lesi sikole sasungulwa ekuqaleni kwekhulu lamashumi amabili, futhi sasiyisikole samabanga aphansi nasesekondari esihlanganisiwe kwaze kwaba ngasekupheleni kweminyaka yama-1920 lapho sihlukaniswa.Ekusungulweni kwaso lesi sikole sasisebenza kakhulu ezinganeni zabasebenzi abamhlophe baseGlobe nasePhoenix Gold Mine kanye nasezimbonini ezincike ezinsizeni eziseduze zensimbi ne- chromite, kanye nezingane zabalimi abamhlophe nabalimi bendawo.Isikole savulelwa abafundi bazo zonke izinhlanga ngo-1980. 
Inabafundi abangaba ngu-1 500 nothisha abangu-50, kanti abayisithupha babo bafundisa izibalo.Osayizi bekilasi bavame ukuba phakathi kwabafundi abangama-40 nabangu-43 ekilasini ngalinye. 
Ngo-2004, isikole isingathwe final kokubili-National Association of Heads School (Nash) lezinyawo esikoleni esiphakathi futhi high mqhudelwano futhi Olivine Industries Izikole National Netball Tournament.Uthishanhloko okhona manje nguMnu. Shumba. 
Isikole sinamahostela ama-2 (iDavern Port neDavey House) ahlala cishe abafundi abangama-300 abahlala emabhodini.IDavern Port yihostela lamantombazane kanti inkosikazi yasehostela ekhona manje nguNkk Mukwananzi kuthi iDavey House ihostela labafana kanti umphathi wehostela njengamanje nguMnu P. Muchechemera.Isikole sakhiwe maqondana nedolobha laseFitchlea; itholakala ngasemgwaqweni omkhulu waseKwekwe - Gweru. 
UMichael Olowokandi (owazalwa ngomhla ka-3 Ephreli 1975) ungumdlali we- basketball wangaphambili waseNigeria.Wazalelwa eLagos, eNigeria futhi wakhulela eLondon, wadlala ngokubambisana kumaPacific Tigers aseStockton, eCalifornia.U-Olowokandi wakhethwa njengokhetho lokuqala jikelele lwe- NBA 1998 yiLos Angeles Clippers .Udlale ngokomsebenzi kwaze kwaba ngu-2007, lapho aphoqeleka khona ukuthi athathe umhlalaphansi ngenxa yokulimala kanzima kwe- hernia nokulimala edolweni. 
Ngo-2001, u-Olowokandi nozakwabo eqenjini le-Clippers babamba iqhaza kwi-BasketBowl Challenge eKeystone Lanes eNorwalk, ukuqoqa imali yeLos Angeles Clippers Foundation ne- Children's Hospital Los Angeles. 
Ngesikhathi Sokubonga sango-2006, u-Olowokandi wanikela ngesikhathi sakhe esibhedlela i- Boston Children's Hospital waphaka wadla nabantu abangaphezu kwama-200 abangenamakhaya ePine Street Inn eBoston.Ubuye wanikela ezinhlanganweni zosizo ezahlukahlukene nasezibhedlela, kufaka phakathi imali engaphezulu kwama- $ 100,000 ku- Children's Hospital Los Angeles ukuze kufakwe i-incubator entsha yezinsana ezisanda kuzalwa.Iningi lezinhlelo zika-Olowokandi zosizo azidalulwanga futhi zenziwa ngasese ngaphandle kokusebenzisana kwamaqembu akhe. [1] 
Ngenxa yomsebenzi wakhe ophansi, uthathwa njengomunye wamabhasi okusalungiswa amakhulu emlandweni we-NBA. 
U-Olowokandi wazalelwa eLagos, eNigeria, njengezibulo ezinganeni ezinhlanu.Uyise, uHezekeli, wayengummeli waseNigeria.Umndeni wakhe wathuthela eLondon ngenkathi eyi-4.U-Olowokandi unesakhamuzi saseNigeria futhi akazange abe nepasipoti yaseBrithani kusukela ngo-2004. 
U-Olowokandi wabe esengena eBrunel University njengomphathi wezobunjiniyela, lapho ayengumgijimi kwezokugijima nasenkundleni, ikhilikithi, kanye nomanyano wombhoxo.Ube ne-tryout neThames Valley Tigers yeBudweiser Basketball League kodwa wangayithola inkontileka. 
Baby ukudla yiliphi elithambile, idliwe kalula ukudla ngaphandle lwebele noma usana ifomula ukuthi senziwa ngqo womuntu izingane eziphakathi kwezinyanga ezine futhi eziyisithupha kanye neminyaka emibili.Ukudla kuvela ezinhlotsheni eziningi kanye nama-flavour athengwa esekulungele ukwenziwa kubakhiqizi, noma kungaba ukudla kwasetafuleni okudliwe ngumndeni osikishiwe noma okonakele ngenye indlela. 
Kusukela ngo-2011, i- World Health Organization, i- UNICEF nezinhlangano eziningi zezempilo zikazwelonke zancoma ukulinda kuze kube yizinyanga eziyisithupha ngaphambi kokuqala ingane ekudleni; [1] izingane ngazinye zingahluka kakhulu kulesi siqondiso ngokuya ngentuthuko yazo eyingqayizivele.Ukudla kwezingane kunganikezwa lapho ingane ikulungele ukudla.Izimpawu zokulungela zifaka amandla okuhlala ngaphandle kosizo, ukulahleka kolimi, nokukhombisa intshisekelo esebenzayo ekudleni okudliwa abanye. 
Izingane zingaqaliswa ngqo ekudleni komndeni okujwayelekile uma kunakwa izingozi zokuklinya; lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi ukulunyulwa okuholwa yizingane .Ngoba ubisi lwebele luthatha ukunambitheka kokudla okudliwe ngumama, lokhu kudla kuyizinqumo ezinhle kakhulu. 
Izinhlamvu Ngosuku olujwayelekile cishe uhhafu wezingane zaseMelika ezineminyaka emine nezinyanga ezinhlanu ubudala zondliwa okusanhlamvu kwezinsana.Ingane kungenzeka ukuthi idle okuncane nje kokudla okuncane okusanhlamvu okusanhlamvu, noma ngisho nokuncanyana nje kokulunywa okuncane kokudla okuqukethe okusanhlamvu kosana okuhlanganiswe nokunye ukudla.Ezinye izinhlobo zokudla okususelwa okusanhlamvu ziyivelakancane ngaleso sikhathi.Cishe izingane ezingama-90% ezineminyaka eyisithupha kuya kweziyishumi nambili ezinyangeni zidla uhlobo oluthile lokusanhlamvu, noma yingxenye kuphela edla okusanhlamvu kwezinsana.Abanye badla ilayisi, isinkwa, ama-crackers, i-pasta, noma okusanhlamvu okwenzelwe izingane ezindala. 
[1] Izithelo Nganoma yiluphi usuku, cishe ama-20% ezingane ezineminyaka emine nezinyanga ezinhlanu adla uhlobo oluthile lwesithelo, imvamisa ukudla kokulungiswa kwengane. 
[1] Njengazo zonke lezi, lokhu kungamela okuncane nje kokuluma izithelo noma ukudla okuyingxenye yezithelo. 
Izingxenye ezimbili kwezintathu zezingane ezineminyaka eyisithupha kuya kweziyisishiyagalolunye, futhi phakathi kwezingane ezingama-75% kanye nama-85% ezineminyaka engaphansi kwezinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye, zidla uhlobo oluthile lwesithelo. Lapho unezinyanga eziyisithupha kuya kweziyisishiyagalolunye, uhhafu wezingane udla izithelo zokudla ezilungiselelwe izingane, kepha izingane ezineminyaka eyishumi nambili nangaphezulu ubudala zidla izithelo zokudla okungezona izingane, njengobhanana omusha noma izithelo ezisemathinini. 
I-Apple nobhanana izithelo ezivamile ezinganeni zayo yonke iminyaka. Ijusi yezithelo, ikakhulukazi ijusi le-apula nelamagilebhisi, ivame ukwethulwa kamuva kunezithelo, futhi cishe uhhafu wezingane ezindala nosana luphuza uhlobo oluthile lwejusi yezithelo engu-100%. 
[1] Imifino Ngosuku olujwayelekile, cishe ikota yezinsana ezineminyaka emine nezinyanga ezinhlanu zidla uhlobo oluthile lwemifino okungenani kanye, cishe njalo okulungiselelwe ukudla kwezingane, futhi imvamisa imifino ephuzi noma ewolintshi njengezinqathe, ithanga, ubhatata, nesikwashi sasebusika . [1] Lapho unezinyanga eziyisithupha kuya kweziyisishiyagalolunye, cishe izingane ezingama-60% nezingane ezindala ezingaba ngama-70% zidla imifino, imifino yokudla kwengane isuswa ngokushesha yimifino ephekiwe ngemuva kwezinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye. Imifino eluhlaza ayivamile kuzo zonke izingane nojahidada. 
Ngosuku lokuqala lokuzalwa, cishe ingxenye yesithathu yabantwana idla amazambane ngosuku olunikeziwe. 
[1] Inyama Zimbalwa kakhulu izingane ezinezinyanga ezine nezinhlanu ubudala zaseMelika ezidla inyama noma omunye umthombo wamaprotheni (ngaphandle kobisi). [1] Izingane ezinezinyanga eziyisithupha kuya kweziyisishiyagalolunye ubudala zidla kakhulu inyama njengengxenye yokudla kwengane okuqukethe inyama encane kanye nemifino noma okusanhlamvu. 
Cishe izingxenye ezintathu kwezine zezinsana ezinezinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye kuya kweziyishumi nambili ubudala zinikezwa inyama noma omunye umthombo wamaprotheni, njengamaqanda, ushizi, iyogathi, ubhontshisi noma amantongomane. 
Ngaphezu kwezingane ezingama-90% ezineminyaka engu-12 kuya kwezingu-18 ubudala, futhi cishe zonke izinsana ezindala kunalokho, zinikezwa umthombo wamaprotheni okungenani kanye ngosuku. 
Cishe izingxenye ezintathu kwezine zalezi zingane zinikezwa inyama yokudla engeyona eyengane; inyama yokudla okulungiselelwe yabantwana (iyodwa) ayijwayelekile kunoma yisiphi isikhathi. [1] Ukudla okumnandi nosawoti Ukudla okunoshukela nosawoti akuvamile ezinganeni. [1] Uma kuqhathaniswa nocwaningo lwangaphambilini ngo-2002, inani lezingane ezingaphansi kweminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye lezinyanga ezithola noma yiluphi uhlobo lokudla okunoshukela, okokudla okulula, noma isiphuzo, lehle cishe ngesigamu. 
Ezinyangeni eziyisishiyagalolunye kuya kweziyishumi nambili, zingaphansi kwengxenye zezingane ezinikezwa ukudla okunoshukela njengamakhukhi, u-ayisikhilimu, noma iziphuzo ezinongwe ngezithelo. 
Uphudingi olungiselelwe abantwana wokudla akuvamile kunoma yisiphi isikhathi, kepha unikezwa cishe izingane eziyi-12% ezineminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye kuya kweziyishumi nambili ubudala. [1] 
Ezinye izinkampani ezidayisa ukudla kwezingane ziye zandisa imigqa yazo ukuze zikhiqize ukudla okukhethekile kwabancane kusukela eminyakeni engaba yizinyanga eziyi-12 kuye eminyakeni emibili nengxenye ubudala.Lokhu kufaka phakathi ujusi, okusanhlamvu, ukudla okuncane okungenwa ngama-microwaveable, izimpahla ezibhakiwe, nokunye ukudla okwenziwe futhi kwathengiselwa izingane ezisacathula. 
Abazali kanye / noma abanakekeli bangabona kuze kube uhhafu wezingane ezisencane njengabantu "abathanda izinto" noma "abadumile", ngenani eliphakeme lezinyanga ezingama-24. [1] [2] Abantu abadala abaphethe lo mbono bavame ukuyeka ukunikeza ingane ukudla okusha ngemuva kwemizamo emithathu kuya kwemihlanu kuphela, kunokuqhubeka nokunikela ngokudla kuze kube yilapho ingane isikunambithe izikhathi eziyisishiyagalombili kuya kweziyishumi nanhlanu.Bangase futhi bahlanganyele ekuziphatheni okungakhiqizi, njengokunikeza ubisi olucindezela isifiso sokudla noma okunye ukudla okuthandayo njengenye indlela, noma ukuzama ukuphoqa noma ukufumbathisa ingane ukuthi idle. 
Ukudla kwezingane kuyahlukahluka kuye ngamasiko.Emasikweni amaningi, ama-pastes okusanhlamvu neziphuzo angukudla kokuqala kwezingane.Emlandweni wesintu futhi njengamanje ngamasiko amaningi emhlabeni jikelele, izingane zondliwa ngokudla ngaphambi kwesikhathi ngumgcini wengane ukuze zikuphuze ukudla ziqale inqubo yokugaya ukudla. 
[1] Ukuluma kokuqala kosana ukudla okuqinile kungokwesiko futhi kubalulekile ezinkolweni eziningi.Isibonelo salokhu yi- annaprashan, isiko lamaHindu lapho usana lunikezwa khona iphalishi lelayisi elinoshukela, ngokuvamile elibusiswa, yilungu lomndeni elidala.Imikhuba efanayo yokudlula yenziwa kulo lonke elase-Asia, kufaka phakathi isifunda saseBengal , iVietnam, neThailand. 
Njengesincomo sempilo yomphakathi yomhlaba wonke, i- World Health Organisation incoma ukuthi izinsana kufanele zinceliswe ibele kuphela ezinyangeni eziyisithupha zokuqala zokuphila ukuze zikhule kahle, zikhule futhi zibe nempilo.Iningi lezinsana ezinezinyanga eziyisithupha ubudala zikulungele ngokomzimba nangokwentuthuko ukudla okusha, ukwakheka nezindlela zokondla.Ochwepheshe abeluleka i- World Health Assembly banikeze ubufakazi bokuthi ukwethula okuqinile ngaphambi kwezinyanga eziyisithupha kwandisa amathuba okugula ezingane, ngaphandle kokukhulisa ukukhula. 
Okunye ukudla kwezingane okuthengiswayo kugxekiwe ngokuqukethwe kanye nezindleko. 
Emashumini amaningi eminyaka, kube nezikhumbuzo eziningi zokudla kwezingane ngenxa yokukhathazeka ngokungcoliswa noma ukonakala.Ngo-1984 nango-1986, uGerber wayebandakanyeka ehlazweni lezimbiza zokudla kwengilazi ezazigqekeza, okwakuthinta kakhulu ukuthengiswa kwayo nenzuzo yayo, yize i-US Food and Drug Administration kamuva yaphetha ngokuthi inkampani yayingenaphutha.Ngo-1987, iBeechnut yakhokha amadola ayizigidi ezingama-25 zamaRandi ukuxazulula amacala okuthengisa ujusi wama-apula ongcolile ekuqaleni kwawo-1980. 
[1] Ngo-2011, iNestlé France yanquma ukukhumbula inqwaba yokudla kwezingane iP'tit pot njengendlela yokuzivikela ngemuva kokuba ikhasimende kubikwa ukuthi lithole izingilazi zengilazi kwesinye sezimbiza zalo.Uphenyo mayelana nobubanzi besigameko luholele ekutheni inkampani iphethe ngokuthi bekuyinto eyenzeka yodwa nokuthi le nqwaba yenqwaba ayithintekanga. 
Ukudla kwezingane kwezentengiselwano e-United States kubuswa yiGerber, eyayinama-70% emakethe yaseMelika ngonyaka we-1996.I-Beechnut yayine-15% yemakethe, kanti i-Heinz yayine-10%.Okuhamba phambili kukaHeinz's Earth, uhlobo olukhulu lokudla kwezingane eziphilayo, lwalunamaphesenti angaba ngu-2 wesabelo semakethe yaseMelika. [1] 
ECanada sodium okuqukethwe kwezingane ukudla ngokomthetho; Izithelo ezihlungiwe, ijusi yezithelo, isiphuzo sezithelo, nezinhlamvu azikwazi ukuthengiswa uma i-sodium ingeziwe (ngaphandle kwama-dessert ahluziwe).Ukudla ngokwemvelo okuqukethe i-sodium kukhawulwe ku-0.05 - 0.25 amagremu ngamagremu ayi-100 wokudla, kuya ngohlobo lokudla kwezinsana. 
Uma kunomlando wokungezwani komzimba nomndeni, umuntu angafisa ukwethula ukudla okukodwa okukodwa ngasikhathi, ashiye izinsuku ezimbalwa phakathi ukuze abone noma yikuphi ukusabela okungakhombisa ukungezwani kokudla noma ukuzwela.Ngale ndlela, uma ingane ingakwazi ukubekezelela ukudla okuthile, kunganqunywa ukuthi yikuphi ukudla okubangela ukusabela. 
Ababhali abangamaKrestu okuqala kwesinye isikhathi bake bagxile ekuchithekeni kwembewu, futhi isenzo socansi sisetshenziselwa izinhloso ezingezona ezokuzala.Le ncazelo yayiphethwe abalweli bokholo bokuqala abangamaKristu.Ngokwesibonelo, uJerome waphikisa: 
Umbhalo wobupapa uCasti connubii (1930) ubiza lo mbhalo weBhayibheli ukusekela imfundiso yeSonto LamaKatolika ngokumelene nobulili obuvimbelwe. 
Ekhuluma ngecala lika-Onan ukukhomba ukushaya indlwabu njengesono, kwiCommentary on Genesis yakhe, uJohn Calvin wabhala ukuthi "ukuchitheka ngokuzithandela kwesidoda ngaphandle kocansi phakathi kwendoda nowesifazane kuyinto embi kakhulu.Ukuhoxa ngamabomu kwi-coitus ukuze isidoda singawela phansi kuyinto embi kakhulu. "Methodism umsunguli uJohn Wesley, ngokuvumelana Bryan C. Hodge, "wayekholelwa ukuthi iyiphi imfucuza isidoda e isenzo socansi ongatheli, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi kufanele sibe ngohlobo indlwabu noma interruptus coitus, njengoba kwaba njalo endabeni ka-Onani, wabhubhisa imiphefumulo abantu abakwenzayo ".Ubhala imicabango yakhe ngesono sika-Onan (1767), eyaphinde yakhiqizwa njenge- A Word to Whom it May Concern ngo-1779, njengomzamo wokuhlola umsebenzi kaSamuel-Auguste Tissot .Kulowo mbhalo, uWesley uxwayisa "ngobungozi bokungcoliswa kwakho", imiphumela emibi yomzimba nengqondo yokushaya indlwabu, [1] ubhala amacala amaningi anjalo kanye nezincomo zokwelashwa. 
Ngemuva kokuthi umfowabo ka-Onan u-Eri abulawe nguNkulunkulu, ubaba wakhe uJudah wamtshela ukuthi afeze isibopho sakhe kumfowabo ngokungena emshadweni ongavumelekile nomfelokazi womfowabo uTamar ukuze amnike inzalo yakhe.Uprofesa wezenkolo uTikva Frymer-Kensky uveze imiphumela yezomnotho yomshado ovumayo: noma iyiphi indodana ezalwa nguTamar izothathwa njengendlalifa kamufi u-Er, futhi ikwazi ukuthola isabelo esiphindwe kabili sefa.Kodwa-ke, ukube u-Er ubengenabantwana, noma ebenamadodakazi kuphela, u-Onan ubeyozuza njengendodana endala kunazo zonke esaphila. 
Ngenkathi u-Onan enza ucansi noTamar, wahoxa ngaphambi kokukhipha umuthi futhi "wathela imbewu yakhe phansi", ngoba noma iyiphi ingane ezelwe yayingeke ibhekwe njengendlalifa yayo ngokusemthethweni.Isitatimende esilandelayo eBhayibhelini sithi u-Onan wenza okubi nokuthi uNkulunkulu wambulala. 
Omunye umbono ovezwe kwiTalmud uthi kulapho kwavela khona ukuphoqelelwa kwesigwebo sentambo . [1]Kodwa-ke, imithethonqubo yamaLevi ephathelene nokujula, noma ngabe kungenxa yocansi noma cha, imisa nje ukugezwa okuyisiko, nokuhlala ungcolile ngokwesiko kuze kube usuku olulandelayo luqale kusihlwa olulandelayo. 
Ukuphinga ( okususelwa kuLatin adulterium ) ubulili obungaphandle komshado obubhekwa njengobungaziphethe ngezizathu zenhlalo, zenkolo, zokuziphatha noma zomthetho.Nakuba izenzo zobulili ezihlanganisa ukuphinga ziyahlukahluka, kanye nemiphumela kwezenhlalo, zenkolo, futhi ngokomthetho, umqondo likhona amasiko amaningi nemikhutshana akufane ubuKristu, UbuJuda futhi Islam . [1]Ukuphinga kubhekwa yiziphathimandla eziningi njengokucasulayo ekuziphatheni komphakathi, njengokuphathwa kabi kobudlelwano bomshado. 
Nokho, ngisho izindawo eziye decriminalized ukuphinga, isese nemiphumela zomthetho, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni nge-fault-based isehlukaniso imithetho, lapho ukuphinga cishe njalo kwakha phansi lokufaka isehlukaniso futhi kungaba umthelela e impahla zokuhlala, le esitokisini kwezingane, ukwenqaba isondlo, njll.Ukuphinga akusona isizathu sesehlukaniso ezindaweni ezithathe imodeli yedivosi engenacala. 
I-kiwifruit ngezinhlobo A = A. i-arguta, C = A. i-chinensis, uD = A. i-deliciosa, i-E = A. eriantha, mina = A. indochinensis, P = A. polygama, S = A. setosa . 
Kiwifruit (ngokuvamile saba ikiwi e eNyakatho neMelika futhi ezwekazini laseYurophu ) noma ugqumugqumu Chinese iyona ezidliwayo berry of Kunezinhlobo eziningi bok imivini e uhlobo lwe Actinidia.Iqembu lesilimo esivame kakhulu le-kiwifruit (i- Actinidia deliciosa 'Hayward') liyi-oval, elilingana neqanda lesikhukhukazi esikhulu:bude nobubanzi.Inesikhumba esincanyana, esintofontofo, esinemicu emifushane, esishubile kodwa esidliwayo kodwa esinombala onsundu futhi esidliwayo futhi nenyama eluhlaza okotshani noma egolide enemigqa yezimbewu ezincane, ezimnyama, ezidliwayo.Izithelo zinokuthungwa okuthambile okunephunga elimnandi nelihlukile. 
Ngo-2018, iChina yakhiqiza uhhafu wenani lomkhiqizo we-kiwifruit. 
I-Kiwifruit idabuka enkabeni nasempumalanga yeChina.Incazelo yokuqala eqoshiwe yezinsuku ze-kiwifruit yangekhulu le-12 ngesikhathi sobukhosi beNgoma.Ekuqaleni kwekhulu lama-20, ukutshalwa kwe-kiwifruit kwasakazeka kusuka eChina kuya eNew Zealand, lapho kwenzeka khona ukutshala kokuqala kokuhweba.Isithelo lesi sathandwa kakhulu ngamasotsha amaNgisi kanye lamaMelika ayemiswe eNew Zealand ngesikhathi seMpi Yomhlaba Yesibili, kwathi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi athunyelwa kakhulu, aqala ngokuthunyelwa eGreat Britain lase eCalifornia ngawo 1960. 
Izinhlobo okuqala uchazwa 1904 nursery ikhathalogi ukuba '... izithelo ezidliwayo usayizi walnuts, nokunambitheka kwe ezivuthiwe gooseberries ", [1] okuholela igama ugqumugqumu Chinese. [2] Ngo-1962, abalimi baseNew Zealand baqala ukuyibiza ngokuthi "i-kiwifruit" yokumaketha kwamanye amazwe, igama elamukelwa ezentengiselwano ngo-1974. [2] E-New Zealand nase-Australia, igama elithi "kiwi" lilodwa lisho inyoni ye- kiwi noma lisetshenziswa njengesidlaliso sabaseNew Zealand ; cishe ayikaze isetshenziselwe ukubhekisa esithelweni.I-Kiwifruit selibe igama elijwayelekile layo yonke i-kiwifruit eluhlaza okhiqizwe ngokuthengisa kusuka kuhlobo lwe- Actinidia.E-United States naseCanada, igama elifushanisiwe elithi kiwi lisetshenziswa kakhulu lapho kubhekiswa kwisithelo. 
Umculo ngonyaka. 
I-Der Diktator ( The Dictator ) iyi- opera edabukisayo ngesenzo esisodwa ngamagama nangomculo ngu- Ernst Krenek, i- Op yakhe. 49 nowokuqala wabalingisi abathathu ( noDas geheime Königreich noSchwergewicht, oder Die Ehre der Nation ) eyaqala ukukhonjiswa ngomhlaka 6 Meyi 1928 eHessisches Staatstheater Wiesbaden njengengxenye yeFestspiele Wiesbaden.Amaphuzu abhalwe usuku lokuqedwa, ngomhlaka-28 Agasti 1926. 
Umlingisi wesihloko ususelwe ngokukhululekile kuBenito Mussolini, yize le ndaba ingeyona eyepolitiki ngamabomu;UKrenek kamuva wayichaza njenge- "anecdote evela empilweni yangasese 'yendoda enamandla'."Kuphela kulokho okungenangqondo lapho ehlehla khona, hhayi kakhulu ngenxa yokwesaba kepha ngoba akukho angakwenza ngakho, ngeke akwazi ukubusa." 
Ikhethini likhuphuka kumhlaba ophakathi kwehhotela iGrand Palace nesibhedlela, esibheke eLake Geneva.UMaria ubabaza ukuhlwa kwehlobo esibhedlela, lapho uDictator ehambisa isithunywa ephuma ehhotela, emyala ukuthi ahambise isimemezelo sempi.UMaria uyafikelwa, kodwa uyamthakazelisa.UCharlotte uyaphuma, ecasukile yilezi zindaba: "Usuvele unezitha eziningi kakhulu"; umtshela ukuthi ukwesaba kwakhe ngaye kuyindlela yesikhwele futhi uphonsa ukunqoba okuzayo ngenkathi abesifazane bejoyina abathathu, uMaria ekhala ngamehlo akhe angabekezeleleki noCharlotte ecula ukuthi lapho inhlanhla yakhe isiphelile uzophinde abe ngowakhe futhi. 
Bonke bangena ngaphakathi, iphoyisa likhishwa ngamasondo, likhalela umoya nokukhanya.Utshela uMaria, olandela, indaba yokuphuphuthekiswa kwakhe yigesi enobuthi.Uthembisa ukuziphindiselela ngokubulala umphathi wakhe futhi bacula i-duet: "..nalezi zandla, ziphoqelelwe ukuba zichithe igazi elingenacala eliningi, ake ngizicwilise egazini lalowo onecala." (bona isibonelo esingezansi). 
Ukuqala 
Ukuhlulwa kwesizini yesihlanu enesihloko esithi Kuch Toh Hai: Naagin Ek Naye Rang Mein kwethulwe ngomhlaka 7 Nhlolanja 2021 esikhundleni sikaNaagin 5. 
UShivanya noShesha bangama- naagin anquma ukuphindisela ngokufa kwabazali bakaShivanya okwenzelwa umndeni wakwaRahejaUShivanya ushada noRitik bese eqala ukubulala ababulali ngamunye ngamunye.UShesha uwela kuRitik futhi ujoyina uYamini.Babekela uShivanya icala lokubulala ukuze avuse uRitik ngokumelene naye.UShivanya noRitik bavuma uthando lwabo nokupheleliswa okwenza uShivanya alahlekelwe amandla akhe.USangram uyazibulala ukuze abuyisele uShivanya amandla akhe.UShivanya ubulala uYamini, wehlula uShesha futhi avikele naagmani. 
UShivanya ubeletha indodakazi yakhe, uShivangi ngenyanga yesithathu ekhulelwe okuyinto ethusa odokotela.UYamini uyavuswa. 
Naagin ( ukuhumusha. Inyoka yesifazane) khona-Indian kwemvelo fantasy Thriller ewuchungechunge yethelevishini ezivezwa Ekta Kapoor ngaphansi Balaji Telefilms.Kuthatha izinkathi ezinhlanu, uchungechunge ludlala ku- Colors TV futhi lubonisa impilo yezinyoka eziguqula isimo . 
UShivangi ukhula noShivanya futhi uthandana noRocky, indodana yokutholwa kaYamini.UYamini ubulala uShivanya okucasula uShivangi bese ethatha isinqumo sokuziphindiselela kunina.URocky ujoyina uShivangi ukubulala uShesha noYamini, kodwa ekugcineni ubulala uShivangi ngaphansi kokuyalelwa nguRitik.UShivangi uzizwa ekhashelwe futhi wenza isifungo sokuthola iqiniso ngokufa kwakhe. 
UNaagrani Ruhi uhlangana nesithandwa sakhe uVikrant ngemuva kweminyaka eyikhulu futhi bazimisele ngokushada.Kodwa-ke, uYuvraj nabangane bakhe bahlukumeza uRuhi futhi bahlasela uVikrant kwaholela ekufeni kwakhe. 
URuhi ukhathazekile kepha uyafunga ukuthi uzobuyela ezophindisela. 
UVishaka Khanna, umtshalizimali ocebile ufika futhi azame ukubulala uYuvraj, kepha uyakwazi ukusinda.UMahir uphoqelekile ukuthi ashade noBela odalulwa njengoRuhi.Uthandana noMahir. 
Lapho ethola iqiniso lokuthi uBela ungubani, uMahir uyaphazamiseka.Ulahlekelwa yinkumbulo futhi akhohlwe uBela ngemuva kokuthi iSumitra imlumile. 
UBela usebenzisa uNaagmani ukubuyisa izinkumbulo zikaMahir futhi baqeda ubuhlobo babo.ISumitra ifuna usizo kuHukkum ozama ukukhulelisa uBela ukuze abelethe ingane yedimoni.UVishaka uthatha indawo kaBela azale uTaamsi, okhula ngendaba imizuzwana abulale uHukkum.UBela noMahir bathola uNaagmani kepha uqalekisiwe nguShivangi.Bangayithola kuphela ngemuva kokuphindukuzalwa. 
UBela noMahir bayafa. 
Isizini yokuqala yasakazwa kusukela ngomhlaka 1 Novemba 2015 kuya ku-5 Juni 2016.Kudlale uMouni Roy, Arjun Bijlani no- Adaa Khan njengoShivanya, Ritik noShesha.Ibe ngomunye wemibukiso ekalwe kakhulu kuthelevishini yaseNdiya. 
Inkosazana yaseNaagin uManyata ushada noKeshav njengomuntu, ngaleyo ndlela alahlekelwe ngamandla akhe futhi abelethe uNayantara.UKeshav ubulawa ngumndeni kaParekh.UManyata ubaleka alinde usuku lokuzalwa lwendodakazi yakhe iminyaka engama-25 ukuzeaphindisele ngokubulawa komyeni wakhe.Ngenxa yesiqalekiso somzali kaManyata yena nendodakazi yakhe kumele balinde iminyaka engama-25 ukuze bathole amandla abo. 
Umndeni kaParekh usasaba ukuthi uNaagin uyaphila futhi ubuyela ekuziphindiseleni kwakhe.UManyata ulinde usuku lokuzalwa lwendodakazi yakhe uNayantara iminyaka engama-25. 
Isizini yesibili yasakazwa kusukela ngomhlaka 8 Okthoba 2016 kuya kumhla zingama-25 kuNhlangulana 2017.Kudlale uMouni Roy, Karanvir Bohra no- Adaa Khan njengoShivangi, Rocky noShesha. 
Isizini yesithathu ikhonjiswe kusuka ngomhlaka 2 Juni 2018 kuya kumhlaka 26 Meyi 2019.Kudlale uSurbhi Jyoti, Pearl V Puri, Rajat Tokas no- Anita Hassanandani njengoBela, Mahir, Vikrant noVish, ngokulandelana. 
Isizini sesihlanu sikhonjiswe kusuka ngomhlaka-9 Agasti 2020 kuya kumhla zi-6 kuNhlolanja 2021.Kudlale uSurbhi Chandna, Sharad Malhotra noMohit Sehgal njengoBani, Veer noJay, ngokulandelana. 
Ngemuva kokushona kukaMajeed eminyakeni eyi-15 kamuva, unkosikazi wakhe uRabea Begum wasungula ukwethenjwa kosizo egameni lakhe nangamadodana abo amabili. 
IHamdard Laboratories India yethule izinhlobo ezimbili ezilungele ukuphuza eNdiya okuyiRoohAfza Fusion neRoohAfza Milkshake. 
Rooh Afza ( Hindi ; Urdu ; Bengali (ISoul Refresher) yisikwashi esigxilisiwe . [1] Yakhiwa ngo-1906 eGhaziabad, eBrithani India nguHakim Hafiz Abdul Majeed, [2] [3]futhi yasungulwa isuka e- Old Delhi, e-India.Njengamanje, iRooh Afza yenziwa yizinkampani ezasungulwa nguye namadodana akhe, iHamdard Laboratories, India, Hamdard Laboratories (Waqf) Pakistan neHamdard Laboratories (WAQF), Bangladesh.Kusukela ngo-1948, inkampani ibikhiqiza umkhiqizo eNdiya, ePakistan naseBangladesh . 
[2] 
URooh Afza wasungulwa ngumsunguli weHamdard uHakim Hafiz Abdul Majeed.Ngo-1906, wayefuna ukudala ukuhlanganiswa kwamakhambi okuzosiza abantu baseDelhi ukuthi bahlale bepholile ehlobo.Wakhetha amakhambi kanye nama-syrups emithini yendabuko ye-Unani futhi wenza isiphuzo esizosiza ukumelana nokushaywa ukushisa nokuvimbela ukulahleka kwamanzi kubantu.Umdwebi, uMirza Noor Ahmad, waklama amalebula kaRooh Afza ngemibala eminingi ngo-1910.Inqubekela phambili ekuthuthukisweni nasekucwengekeni iresiphi yangempela iqhubeke njalo kwaze kwavela isiphuzo sokugcina. 
[1] 
I-Vishakhadatta ( Sanskrit wayeyimbongi yase-Indian Sanskrit futhi edlala umbhali wemidlalo.Nakuba Vishakhadatta abeke igama likayise noyisemkhulu njengoba Maharaja Bhaskaradatta futhi Maharaja Vateshvaradatta e idrama lakhe lezombusazwe Mudrārākṣasa, siyazi kancane okunye ngaye.Kuphela ezimbili kudlala lakhe, Mudrārākṣasa kanye Devichandraguptam zaziwa kithi.Isikhathi sakhe asiqinisekile kepha kungenzeka ukuthi wachuma phakathi noma ngemuva kwekhulu lesi-6 CE.Ezinye izazi ezinjengo- AS Altekar, uKP Jayaswal no- Sten Konow bathi iVishakhadatta wayephila ngesikhathi esifanayo noChandragupta II, futhi wayehlala ngasekupheleni kwekhulu lesi-4 kuya ekuqaleni kwekhulu lesi-5.Kepha lo mbono uphikisiwe ngezinye izifundiswa, kufaka phakathi uMoriz Winternitz no- RC Majumdar. 
UMudrārākṣasa ("Indandatho kaRákshasa") ukuphela komdlalo osindile kaVishakhadatta, yize kukhona izingcezu zomunye umsebenzi okuthiwa wabhalwa nguye.Vishakhadatta uye wagcizelela phezu amaqiniso angokomlando ku Mudrarakshasa, ukudlala esebenzelana naleso sikhathi Maurya Dynasty. 
Iziqu zikababa nomkhulu kaVishakhadatta zikhombisa iphuzu elilodwa lentshisekelo: ukuthi wayevela emndenini oyisikhulu, nakanjani ukuthi wayebandakanyeka ekuphathweni kwezepolitiki okungenani ezingeni lendawo.Kubukeka kungenzeka kakhulu, eqinisweni, ukuthi uVishakhadatta weza ezincwadini ezivela ezweni lezindaba. 
IBuruuli (indawo) igama elijwayelekile elisetshenziselwa ukubhekisa endaweni lapho kuhlala iBaruuli.Itholakala esifundeni saseNakasongola, kanye naseBugerere Kayunga District .AbakwaBaruuli bakhuluma ulimi lwesiRuruuli, ulimi lwesiBantu oluhlobene kakhulu nesiLunyala, ulimi olukhulunywa yiBanyala yesiFunda saseKayunga . 
I Baruuli abuswa futhi zibuswa Ssabaluuli Mwogezi, owayebizwa kokubekwa njengeNkosi yabo Kabaka umongameli Uganda uYoweri Kaguta Museveni. 
IBuruuli yindawo eyihlane lapho iLake Kyoga ingumthombo wabo omkhulu wokudla, wokuqashwa kanye nengcebo. 
Abantu baseBaruuli ngabelusi, abalimi, abadobi nabashisa amalahle.Nabo benza ukuhweba nomakhelwane ngezinhlanzi, amalahle kanye nokudla.Ukudla kwabo okuyisisekelo ubhatata kanye ne- matooke.Nazo zitshala amabele, amakinati, ama-yam, umdumbula nezinye izinhlobo zemifino. 
Izwe labo lome kakhulu cishe zonke izinyanga kepha bayalima eduze nogu lolwandle lwabo oluthandekayo iKyoga. 
Bayisibonelo uBantu ukukhuluma isizwe nge nezimfumbe kanye ngemifanekiso futhi abantu ubungane.Kwesinye isikhathi, laba bantu abakhuluma isiBantu bazibiza bona-futhi abanye bababiza ngoBaduuli okusho ukuthi “Abaqhoshayo”. 
Leli yigama ebelisetshenziswa isikhathi eside selokhu kwasungulwa izindawo zabo. 
Yonke imikhaya ibe banana ipulazi futhi izinkomo futhi lokhu kwakuqinisa bajabule kakhulu futhi kokuqhosha ukuba ezinye izizwe zizihlanganisa futhi ngahlala khona.Zonke abayithandayo kwaba izinkomo zabo zinezimpondo eside afana Nsagala izinkomo ubude zinezimpondo we Banyankole ka Bushenyi futhi Mbarara Izifunda eWestern Uganda. 
Lezi zinkomo zaziwumthombo wengcebo kokubili emndenini nasezihlotsheni zazo. 
Babevame ukushintshanisa izinkomo ngezinye izinhlobo zezinkomo, izimvu nezimbuzi.Zasetshenziswa nasemicimbini yomshado njengoba umkhwenyana kwakufanele akhokhe izinkomo ezine emndenini kamakoti.ILake Kyoga ihlala iyimpahla yabo abayithandayo ngoba ibhekwa njengenhliziyo yabo.Ngaphandle kwalo, abakwazi ukuthola isoso, imali nezinye izidingo zokuphila. 
Kwezentengiselwano, abantu baseBaruuli besifunda saseNakasongola bahweba nomakhelwane abahlanganisa iLangi, Acholi, Baganda, Banyoro neBakenyi neBasoga.Ukushintshaniswa kwezinhlanzi ngezikebhe, izinkomo ngezinye izidingo kwenziwa, kepha kuphelile manje. 
UMormon Enigma: U-Emma Hale Smith, Umfazi Womprofethi, "Elect Lady," Isitha Sesithembu umlando ka- Emma Hale Smith, unkosikazi kaJoseph Smith Jr., obhalwe nguLinda King Newell noValeen Tippetts Avery. 
Imukelwa ngokujwayelekile njenge-biography ebabazekayo, le ncwadi ibeka u-Emma Smith kumongo ochaze kangcono izivivinyo nokuzidela kwamalungu esonto lokuqala le- Latter Day Saint.Umsebenzi wenza kwaba nokwenzeka, kanye neminye imisebenzi yakamuva yomlando, ukutolikwa kabusha okukhulu kwenkathi yokwakhiwa kweMormonism . 
Incwadi yawina i-1984 Best Book Award yomlando wokuhumusha yi- Mormon History Association . 
Abaholi bakuqala e-Utah bakhipha u-Emma emapulpitini abo wokuphikisa uBrigham Young kanye nokwenza umkhuba wesithembu, kanye nokuboleka ukuxhasa ukuHlela kabusha.Njengoba lezi zimo zengqondo zahlungwa eminyakeni edlule, u-Emma wayebhalwa emlandweni osemthethweni wase-Utah.Kule biography, sizamile ukwakha kabusha udaba oluphelele lwalesi sipiliyoni sowesifazane esimangazayo futhi esingaqondakali kahle. 
UKhayyam Sarhadi wabulawa yisifo senhliziyo ngokuzumayo ngesikhathi sokudutshulwa komdlalo kamabonakude ngo-3 Febhuwari 2011 eneminyaka engama-62 eLahore.Umngcwabo wakhe ububanjelwe lapho ahlala khona eDefence Housing Authority, eLahore . 
UKhayyam Sarhadi (12 Juni 1948 – 3 Febhuwari 2011 owazalwa njengo Khayyam Sethi ) wayengumlingisi wefilimu nomabonakude wasePakistan futhi ungumuntu womsakazo. 
Umkhulu wakhe ongumama, uRafiq Ghaznavi, wayengumculi owaziwayo futhi njengoba bobabili abazali bakhe babengababhali, waba semsakazweni kusukela esemncane.UKhayyam waya e- United States lapho athola khona iziqu ze-master in cinematography.Ubeneziqu ze-master nasezinadini zesiNgisi nakuFine Arts. [1] 
UKhayyam Sarhadi wayeshade nomlingisi wefilimu u- Atiya Sharaf.Kamuva, lo mbhangqwana wahlukanisa futhi washada nomlingisi we-TV uSaiqa .Wayenamadodakazi amane eyodwa ivela ku-Atiya kanti emithathu ivela eSayiqa, enye yamadodakazi akhe nguZarghuna Khayyam .USarhadi wayeyindodana yomqondisi odumile wamafilimu, umkhiqizi nombhali uZia Sarhadi kanti umama wakhe wayengumbhali ogama lakhe linguZahra Sarhadi . 
Wayengumalume wesimodeli nomlingisi uZhalay Sarhadi. 
UDon Rush uyi-American ADR umqondisi, umbhali weskripthi se-ADR, umlingisi wezwi nomkhiqizi owaziwa ngomsebenzi wakhe wama- ADV Films.Kusukela ngo-2016, uRush okwamanje uhlala eHouston, eTexas nomkakhe, uMax Rush. URush manje usengumlobi wamakhophi omkhulu nomkhangisi. 
I-KOKX (1310 AM ) isiteshi somsakazo sezohwebo esisebenza endaweni yaseKeokuk, e-Iowa.Isiteshi sisakaza ngokuyinhloko ifomethi yenkulumo nezemidlalo.IKOKX iphethwe nguLeah Jones noMichael Greenwald, Keokuk Broadcasting Inc. esebenza njengeRadio Keokuk. 
Ngesikhathi sokusakazwa kwasemini, isiteshi sisebenzisa umbhoshongo owodwa onephethini omnidirectional Phakathi nobusuku, KOKX kunciphisa amandla futhi sekuqalile ukuba isistimu antenna ukuthi ukusetshenziswa imibhoshongo ezintathu kuhlelwe ngendlela afanayo ohlangothini ukuthi ugxilisa isiginali ubheke enyakatho-ntshonalanga, nge Lobe ezincane uya eningizimu-mpumalanga. 
I-KOKX iqale ukusakaza ngo-Okthoba 19, 1947, njengesiteshi sasemini esingu-250-watt kuphela.Umnikazi welayisensi kwakuyiKeokuk Broadcasting Company, kanti lesi siteshi sasihambisana ne-Iowa Tall Corn Network. 
NgoJuni 27, 2016 i-KOKX ishintshe ifomethi yabo kusuka kumazinga abantu abadala kuya ezweni.Isiteshi sabe sesiphindiselwa ezindabeni zendawo, ezingxoxweni nakwezemidlalo lapho kuguqulwa ubunikazi bango-2018. [1] 
I-esyN (Amanethiwekhi [1] [2] iyithuluzi lewebhu le- bioinformatics yokubona ngeso lengqondo, ukwakha nokuhlaziya amanethiwekhi wokuxhumana kwamangqamuzana.I-esyN isuselwa ku-cytoscape.js futhi inhloso yayo ukwenza kube lula ngawo wonke umuntu ukwenza ukuhlaziywa kwenethiwekhi. I-esyN ixhunyaniswe nemininingwane eminingi - ikakhulukazi: i-pombase, i- flybase, kanye nezinqolobane eziningi zedatha ye- InterMine , i-DrugBank, ne- BioGRID lapho kungenzeka khona ukulanda amaprotheni amaprotheni noma ukuhlangana kofuzo kwanoma iyiphi iprotheni noma isakhi sezinhlobo zezinto eziphilayo ezahlukahlukene. 
Amanethiwekhi ashicilelwe ku-esyN angashicilelwa kalula kwamanye amawebhusayithi kusetshenziswa indlela ye- <iframe>. 
Kusukela ngoJanuwari 2016 i-esyN ibukwa abasebenzisi abayingqayizivele abangu-1500 ngosuku (cishe i-16000 ngenyanga) ngokwe- Google Analytics. 
Te'udat Bagrut ( Hebrew , kukhanyisiwe. "isitifiketi ukuvuthwa", Arabhu : شهادة بجروت) kuyinto isitifiketi efakazela ukuthi umfundi isidlulile ngempumelelo Israyeli esikoleni esiphakeme ka- kamatikuletsheni luhlolo.IBagrut iyimfuneko yemfundo ephakeme kwa-Israyeli. 
Izivivinyo eziningi zitholakala emazingeni ahlukene obunzima, avezwe "kumayunithi wokufunda".Ezifundweni eziningi, abafundi bangakhetha inani lamayunithi abahlolwa kuwo.Ukuze uthole isitifiketi “esigcwele” sikamatikuletsheni, umfundi kufanele athathe futhi aphumelele okungenani ukuhlolwa okukodwa kwezifundo ezingeni lobunzima lamayunithi ama-5 futhi athole inani lamayunithi okungenani angama-21 ahlangene okufunda kuzo zonke izivivinyo ze-bagrut ezithathiwe.Ngokunjalo, ukwakheka kwamakilasi abafundi phakathi neminyaka yabo yokufunda esikoleni samabanga aphezulu kufaniswa namayunithi abafundi okulindeleke ukuthi bafunde kuwo lapho bezohlolwa khona ezivivinyweni zabo ze-bagrut.Ngakho-ke, ngokwesibonelo, umfundi ohlela ukwenza isivivinyo se-5-unit mathematics uzothatha izifundo zezibalo eziklanyelwe izinga lobunzima lamayunithi ama-5 kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe wesikole esiphakeme. 
U-65.5% wabafundi abaphothule esikoleni esiphakeme sakwa-Israeli sakwa-2014, noma abanye abantu abafundela ukuhlolwa kuka-2014 (imvamisa abantu abasebenza empini ngemuva kokuphoqeleka abagcwalisa izidingo zeBagrut kamuva empilweni ukuze bafake isicelo semfundo ephakeme) sebedlulise izidingo zokufanelekela ukuthola iBagrut isitifiketi.Kubantu bonke ababeneminyaka yobudala yokuphothula esikoleni esiphakeme ngo-2019, ama-76.1% ayenelungelo lokuthola isitifiketi seBagrut. 
Ikhophi yezivivinyo zezibalo zango-2010 (emazingeni amane kuya kwayisihlanu) yadalulwa izitshudeni, kodwa uthisha wabikela iziphathimandla kwafakwa okunye ukuhlolwa. 
Isitifiketi saseBagrut sinikezwa nguMnyango Wezemfundo wakwa -Israyeli kubafundi abaphasa izivivinyo ezibhalwe phansi (futhi kwezinye izimo zomlomo) izivivinyo zezihloko ezinamamaki okudlula (55% noma ngaphezulu) esivivinyweni ngasinye.Isitifiketi Bagrut Nokho akufanele kudidaniswe nge -diploma esikoleni esiphakeme (te'udat g'mar tichon, Hebrew ، Isi-Arabhu : شهادة انهاء الثانويّة), okuyisitifiketi esikhishwe nguMnyango Wezemfundo esifakazela ukuthi umfundi uqede iminyaka eyi-12 yokufunda.Izikolo zeBagrut zingenye yezinqubo ezihlolwe ekusetshenzisweni kwamayunithi aphambili ezempi kanye nezikhungo zemfundo zakwa-Israyeli.Ezinye izindlela zibandakanya amamaki ezikole zamabanga aphezulu kanye nePsychometric Entrance Test . 
Ukuhlolwa kweBagrut kuhlola ulwazi ngezifundo ezifundwe esikoleni esiphakeme. 
Inqubo yokubhala umatikuletsheni kwa-Israyeli igadwe nguMnyango Wezemfundo wezwe.Ukuhlolwa kwazo zonke izifundo eziphoqelekile kanye nezifundo eziningi zokukhetha kuklanywa futhi kwabhalwa nguMnyango, ngaleyo ndlela kwakha isilinganiso esijwayelekile solwazi lwabafundi ezweni lonke.Ezikoleni eziphakeme ezigxile ezifundweni, iminyaka emibili edlule yezifundo yenzelwe ukulungiselela abafundi izivivinyo ze-bagrut. 
Izihloko eziphoqelekile 
INyangatom eyaziwa nangokuthi iDongiro futhi ngokujongwa njengeBumé ngabelusi bezolimo baseNilotic abahlala emngceleni oseningizimu-ntshonalanga ye- Ethiopia naseningizimu-mpumalanga yeSouth Sudan nase- Ilemi Triangle enabantu abahlala kuwo womabili la mazwe.bangabalimi abaxubekile [1]Bakhuluma ulimi lwesiNyangatom. 
I Nyangatom bangamalungu Ateker noma Karamojong cluster ukuthi iqukethe Turkana, Toposa, Karamojong, futhi Jie abakhuluma izilimi ahlobene eduze. 
Babalwa cishe ngama-30,000 anabantu eSouth Sudan nase-Ethiopia.AmaNyangatom amaningi ayimizulane, ahlala ezigodini ezihamba imfuyo ezingathutha kaningana ngonyaka.Inani elikhulu leNyangatom nalo lihlala ezigodini ezihlala njalo.Kujwayelekile ukuthi abantu bahambe phakathi kwamakamu ezinkomo ezihambahambayo kanye nemizana ehlala unomphela. 
I Nyangatom babe ukungqubuzana ngakanye nge omakhelwane babo abaningi babethembe, ikakhulukazi Turkana, Dassanetch, futhi Suri .Uhulumeni waseKenya unikeza ukusekelwa kwamasosha eTurkana kulezi zingxabano.Yize kunengozi yokungqubuzana kwamaqembu, iNyangatom eningi inezihlobo ezisondelene namalungu amanye amaqembu futhi kunobudlelwano bezohwebo phakathi kweNyangatom nomakhelwane bayo abaningi.
