Ama-plugin we-NXT avumela abathuthukisi bangaphandle ukuthi bengeze izici noma izithuthukisi zokusebenziseka.Ama-plug-ins aqukethe ibhokisi lesanti. 
I-NXT ingumthombo ovulekile we- cryptocurrency nenethiwekhi yokukhokha eyethulwe ngo-2013 ngonjiniyela wesoftware ongaziwa i-BCNext.Isebenzisa ubufakazi bokuthi kufinyelelwe esivumelwaneni ukufinyelela ukuvumelana kokuthengiselana-ngenxa yalokho kunemali emile.Ngokungafani neBitcoin, azikho izimayini. 
[1] I-NXT ikhulelwe ngokukhethekile njengeplatifomu eguquguqukayo ezungeze izinhlelo zokusebenza zokwakha nezinsizakalo zezezimali, futhi isebenza njengesisekelo se-ARDR ( Ardor ), ipulatifomu yamaketanga amaningi we-blockchain-as-a-service akhiqizwa nguJelurida, kanye ne- IoTeX (cryptocurrency) umphathi wamanje weNxt kusukela ngo-2021.I-NXT imbozwe kakhulu embikweni we- "Call for Evidence" yi- ESMA. 
I-NXT yenziwe ngezinhlamvu zemali eziyizigidi eziyinkulungwane.Mhlaka-28 Septhemba 2013, Bitcointalk.org ilungu BCNext wadala intambo iforamu ekumemezeleni ukwethulwa okuhlongozwayo NXT njengoba lesibili isizukulwane cryptocurrency wacela iminikelo ezincane bitcoin ukunquma ukuthi ungasabalalisa esigxotsheni kokuqala. 
Ngo-18 Novemba 2013, ukuqoqwa kwemali kwe-NXT kwavalwa. 
Umnikelo wohlamvu lwemali lokuqala waqoqa ama- bitcoins angama- 21 abiza u- $ 17,000 wase-US. 
NgoJulayi 2016, i-NXT yethule izifanekiso ze-Smart Transaction, ezazenzelwe ukusebenza njengezakhiwo zokwakha amabhizinisi ukwakha izixazululo zeBlockchain zezinkinga ezithile. 
Ingqalasizinda eyinhloko ye-NXT iyinkimbinkimbi, okuthi, uma iqhathaniswa ne- Bitcoin elula futhi elula, idale amathuba amaningi amaphutha noma amaphutha.Kodwa-ke, lokhu kuvumela abantu besithathu ukuthi banikele kwi-blockchain kalula. 
I-NXT's Asset Exchange ingukushintshana kontanga okuvumela ukuhwebelana okwabiwayo kwamasheya nezimpahla ze-crypto.Njengoba i-blockchain iyi-ledger yomphakathi engenakuguqulwa yokuthengiselana, ingahlinzeka ngerekhodi lokuhweba lezinye izinto ngaphandle kwe-NXT.Ukwenza lokhu, i-NXT ivumela ukubekwa noma "ukufakwa umbala" kohlamvu lwemali oluthile, olwakha ibhuloho elisuka emhlabeni we-virtual cryptocurrency uye emhlabeni womzimba."Uhlamvu lwemali olunemibala" lungamela impahla, amasheya / amabhondi, izimpahla, noma imiqondo. 
Izizinda ze-WWE zenzeka ngezigaba ezimbili ezisebenzayo zamaprotheni, okungukuthi lezo ezihambisana nobiquitination kanye nalezo ezihlobene ne-poly-ADP ribosylation ( PARP ).Ngakho-ke, izizinda ze- WWE zibamba umsebenzi obalulekile ekudlulisweni kwesiginali, ukonakala kwamaprotheni, ukulungiswa kwe-DNA kanye ne- apoptosis . [1] 
I WWE lesizinda yaqanjwa ezintathu zalo alondolozwe izinsalela, W no-E izinsalela ( tryptophans futhi glutamate ngokulandelana), futhi kubikezelwa ukuthi ethize ngasolinye amaprotheni-amaprotheni ekusebenzisaneni e ubiquitin futhi Adp ribose lokuhlanganisa izinhlelo (midi Adp ribose polymerase).Lesi sizinda itholakala njengendlela Ngohlelo uphinda ngesikhathi N-ukuphela Deltex, a cytosolic effector ka Notch mkhosi okucatshangwa uxhumano nomsebenzisi N-ukuphela kwe-Notch yokwamukela . [1] Iphinde itholakale njengemodyuli yokuxhumana kuma- protein ubiquination kanye ne-ADP ribosylation protein . 
Ngaphakathi kwemodyuli ngayinye ye-WWE, izinsalela zakha izakhiwo ezimbili ezifanayo ezibalulekile ekusimeni kwaso.Amamojula amabili e-WWE ahlangana futhi akha umsantsa omkhulu ofanele ukubopha ama-polypeptides anwetshiwe.Amamojula amabili e-WWE amukela ukwakheka okuhlanganisiwe ikakhulu okuqukethe imicu ye-beta, nge- alpha helix eyodwa kumamojula womabili nangengxenye eyengeziwe emfushane ye-helical kusigaba sesibili seWWE.Amamojula amabili we-WWE abamba i- eksisi yokujikeleza kabili. 
[1] 
UMuho Asllani wayengusopolitiki wase- Albania we- Albanian Party of Labour (PPSh).Wayeyilungu lePolitburo, owayemele iPhalamende lase -Albania iminyaka eminingi, uNobhala Wokuqala Weqembu ezifundeni eziningana, futhi eyilungu leKhabinethi yase-Albania ngo-1976-79. 
U-Asllani wazalwa ngomhlaka 17 Okthoba 1937 eBërdicë, eduzane naseShkodër, emndenini ompofu. [1]Ngemuva kokufunda esikoleni sobuchwepheshe bezolimo eShkodër, wafunda ngo-1961-1964 e-Agricultural Institute, manje eyi- Agricultural University of Tirana (Alb: Universiteti Bujqësor Tiranës ). 
I-6th Congress ye-PPSh ngo-1968 yamthola elandela i- "V. Lenin" Party School eTirana.Kuleyo ngqungquthela, waba yilungu leCentral Committee of the Party, yize phambilini wayengelona ukhetho.Ngonyaka olandelayo wasebenza njengoNobhala wePhathi eShkodër, eshintsha noProkop Murra . 
Le nkampani isebenza ngokugcina imininingwane eyisishiyagalombili eYurophu, e- Asia nase- United States . 
I-Leaseweb ibanga ngokushintshana nge-Intanethi e- Amsterdam, eFrankfurt, eLondon, eNew York City, eBrussels, eStockholm, eMadrid, eZurich, eDusseldorf, eParis, eWarsaw, eBudapest, eMilan, eVienna, ePrague, eLuxembourg, eBucharest, eBratislava, eCopenhagen, e- Oslo, e- Ashburn, IMiami, iChicago, iDallas, iPalo Alto neLos Angeles.Inethiwekhi yeLeaseweb iqukethe ama-Points-of-Presence angama-55 nama-33 Internet Exchanges emhlabeni jikelele.Inethiwekhi inomthamo womkhawulokudonsa we-5.5 Tbit / s nge-peak traffic cishe ngo-2.5 Tbit / s futhi ibika isikhathi sokuphumula esingu-99.9999% 
Ngo-1998, iLeaseweb yathola amaseva ayo okuqala yase isungula ihhovisi layo lokuqala e-Utrecht.Ngo-2005 inkampani yayiphethe amaseva angu-5 000, inombolo eyayiphindwe kabili yaya ku-10,000 eminyakeni emibili kamuva. 
Ngo-2007, uLeaseweb wathuthela ikomkhulu lenkampani endaweni yase-Amsterdam.Ngo-2010, iLeaseweb ithola abahlinzeki bokusingathwa baseJalimane iNetdirekt.Ku-2016, uLeaseweb uthola i-Nobis Technology Group ese-Illinois, kanye nokusebenza kwayo kwe-Ubiquity Hosting. [2] Ku-2018, iLeaseweb USA ithola iServInt, ukusingathwa kwewebhu okusekwe eNyakatho Virginia nezinsizakalo zokubamba ezenzelwe imisebenzi ye-IT yefu. 
Le nkampani isebenza ngezikhungo eziyishumi nesishiyagalombili zedatha eYurophu, e- Asia nase- United States .Intanga yeLeaseweb enezingxoxo ze-Intanethi e- Amsterdam, Stockholm, Warsaw, Budapest, Vienna, Frankfurt, Dusseldorf, Zurich, Brussels, Paris, Luxembourg, London, Madrid, Washington DC, New York, Miami, Chicago, Atlanta, Dallas, Phoenix, Los Angeles, Palo Alto, Seattle, San Jose, Hong Kong naseSingapore . 
Isiqalo sempilo yakhe 
Irivolushinari 
Ngaphambi kwezehlakalo zaseSharpville, uChiba wayeyisishoshovu kuTransvaal Indian Congress ngasekupheleni kweminyaka yama-1950 kanye neSouth African Communist Party ngo-1960. [1] [2] Ngemuva kwesibhicongo saseSharpeville ngo-1960, waphetha ngokuthi imibhikisho enokuthula yehlulekile futhi kwakudingeka impi, ngakho-ke wajoyina uphiko lwe- ANC, uMkhonto weSizwe (MK) ngo-1961. [2] 
[1] Wakhishwa ngo-1982, waqhubeka nomsebenzi we-ANC njengelungu le- United tic Front . [1] Ngo-1983, waba ngomunye wamaphini kamongameli weTransvaal Indian Congress. [2] Waphinde waboshwa ngoJulayi 1985 futhi wadedelwa ngaphandle kokuqulwa kwecala ngoMashi 1986, ngemuva kwalokho wacasha ukuze aqhubeke nomsebenzi wakhe we-ANC. 
Kuthe ngokuvulwa umlomo ngokusemthethweni kwe-ANC ngo-1990, waba ngumengameli wegatsha layo laseLenasia. [1] Wakhethelwa ukuya ephalamende laseNingizimu Afrika ngo-1994 nango-1999. [2] Ngo-2004 waqokwa waba yilungu le- Order of Luthuli . 
UChiba washona ngomhlaka 8 Disemba 2017. [1] Ushiye unkosikazi uLuxmi, amadodakazi amathathu - uGita, uKailash, noYaswanti, abazukulu abayisikhombisa, nezingane zabazuku ezine. [2] [1] 
Amareferensi 
I-Oloibiri umphakathi omncane e- Ogbia LGA etholakala eBayelsa State, esifundeni esisempumalanga yeNiger Delta eNigeria .Izakhamizi zomphakathi wase-Oloibiri ikakhulukazi zingabadobi nabalimi.Le yindawo yokuqala u-Oyili atholakala okokuqala eNigeria. 
I-Oloibiri yidolobha elinomlando embonini kawoyela negesi eNigeria.Ukutholakala kokuqala kukawoyela eNigeria edolobheni lase-Oloibiri nguShell Darcy ngoJanuwari 15, 1956. 
Ukutholakala kukawoyela e-Oloibiri akubasizanga abantu abaningi baseNigeria futhi kuholele ekubhujisweni kwemvelo nangendlela yokuphila yabantu bomdabu baseNiger Delta.Futhi ngokukhiqizwa kokuqala kwemiphongolo ka-oyela engu-5 000 ngosuku (eyayizophenduka ibe ngu-2,000,000 kamuva), iNigeria yaba ngumkhiqizi ka-6th kawoyela eshadini leNhlangano Yamazwe Athekelisa Uphethiloli i-OPEC. 
Oloibiri kahle kwakuwumthombo wokuqala kawoyela wokuhweba eNigeria. 
I-Oloibiri Oilfield kwakuyinkambu yokuqala kawoyela yokuhweba eNigeria kanye naseNtshonalanga Afrika.INigeria yathumela uwoyela wayo ongahluziwe wokuqala ngoFebhuwari 1958 kusuka ensimini kawoyela i-Oloibiri.Ukuthunyelwa kukawoyela ongahluziwe okokuqala eNigeria kwaqhamuka emkhakheni wase-Oloibiri ngoFebhuwari 1958.Ipayipi lokuqala likawoyela ongahluziwe laseNigeria labekwa lisuka enkanjini kawoyela i-Oloibiri laya ePort Harcourt emfuleni iBonny (iBonny Export Terminal). 
Njengoba idolobha lase-Oloibiri 'laliyindawo yokuzalwa' kawoyela eNigeria, kungumbono wamehlo abuhlungu. [1] Indawo ayithuthuki kahle, abantu bangabalimi abampofu, izinga lobhadane alikho emashadini, izinga lokungasebenzi liyethusa, futhi umhlaba wabo uhlaselwe yimivimbo ebulalayo yokuchitheka kukawoyela. 
Uwoyela ose-Oloibiri usuvele woma kodwa akukho okukhombisa ukuthi bekuyindawo lapho kuqhamuke khona ukuqhamuka kukawoyela eNigeria.Ngamagama alula, kungashiwo ukuthi idolobha lase-Oloibiri lasetshenziswa futhi 'lalahlwa' ngemuva kokuthi abahloli bamafutha bengasatholakali ukusetshenziswa kwalo.UHulumeni Wombuso waseNigeria wake wathembisa ukuthi uzokwakha umnyuziyamu e-Oloibiri, kodwa kuze kube manje, leso sithembiso asikagcwaliseki. 
UKiraz Mevsimi uchungechunge lwedrama yaseTurkey oludlala kuFox TV . 
Iphinde yabizwa ngesi-Arabhu eMiddle East ku- MBC 4, ngesi-Urdu ePakistan ku- ARY Zindagi, e-Indonesia e-Indonesia ku- Trans TV kanye nase-Italy e-Italy e- Kanale 5. 
Iphupho lika-Öykü elikhulu lokuba ngumklami wemfashini ophumelelayo. 
Uhlala nonina (uMeral) nomfowabo omncane uCem. 
Uthandane nomngane wakhe omkhulu umfowabo kaBurçu umfowabo uMete kusukela ebuntwaneni. 
Kepha uMete akazizwa ngendlela efanayo.Ngolunye usuku, uMete uthandana nomngani ka-Öykü onobugovu uSeyma, ngakho-ke u-kykü uyayeka ngoMete.U-kykü ube esehlangana ngephutha nomngani omkhulu kaMete nozakwabo ebhizinisini u-Ayaz Dincer. 
UAyaz uyindoda ebukekayo, uthandana no-kyk ngaso leso sikhathi futhi noma engamxosha, ulokhu ebuya.Ngelinye ilanga uBurcu, umngani ka-Öykü, uthumela ibhokisi loshokholethi nenothi lothando kumfowabo, kepha yena ulisayina ngegama lika-kykü. 
Lapho u-Öykü ethola, ugijimela ehhovisi likaMete ayothatha isipho esinenothi ngaphambi kokuba asibone.Lapho efika, u-Ayaz usevele usibonile isipho futhi uthukile ukusibona sivela ku-Oyku, uthola ukuthi intombazane ayithandayo isothandweni nomngani wakhe omkhulu. 
Ngalo mzuzu uMete ufika abuze ukuthi leso sipho sikabani.U-kykü, enamahloni futhi esaba ukuphendula kwakhe, uthi ulethe isipho ku-Ayaz futhi utshela uMete ukuthi uthandana nomngani wakhe, kodwa-ke amanga lawo.Ngakho-ke u-Ayaz no-Öykü bazenza abantu abashadile, baze baqale ukuthandana ngokweqiniso. 
U-gezge Gürel njengo-kykü Acar USerkan Çayoğlu njengo-Ayaz Dinçer UDağhan Külegeç njengoMete Uyar UNilperi Şahinkaya njengo-Şeyma Çetin UFatma Toptaş njengoSibel Korkmaz USerkan Börekyemez njengo-kerlker Korkmaz UNihal Işıksaçan njengoBurcu Uyar U-Aras Aydın njengo-Emre Yiğit UNeslihan Yeldan njengo-Önem Dinçer U-Ayşegül Ünsal njengoMeral Acar UNezih Cihan Aksoy njengo-Olcay UTamer Berke Sarıkaya njengeCem Acar UHakan Çimenser njengoBülent Uyar U-Atilla Saral njengoMehmet Karaylı UHasan Şahintürk njengoKemal Acar UJale Arıkan njengoMonika Sessa Ozgur Cevik njengoDerin Aydın 
IHalata & Spathe (1997) ibike; "lo glans umthondo iqukethe predominance mahhala kwalapho, eziningi zangasese ekupheleni ama futhi akuvamile Pacinian futhi Ruffinian corpuscles. 
Ukuphela kwemizwa kaMerkel nezidumbu zikaMeissner azikho. " 
U-Yang noBradley baphikisana; "iphethini ehlukile yokugcinwa kwama-glans igcizelela indima ye-glans njengesakhiwo sezinzwa". [1]Abanye abacwaningi baphakamise ukuthi i-glans iguqukele ekubeni yi-acorn, amakhowe noma isigaxa esakhiwe ukuze kuthi ngesikhathi sokukopisha sisebenze ukususa noma yisiphi isidoda esisekhona kubalingani bobulili bangaphambilini, kepha lokhu akusekelwa lapho kubhekwa izihlobo ze-primate ezinokuziphatha okuhlukile kokukhwelana. [2] 
I- epithelium ye-glans penis iyizicubu ezinomucu.UBirley et al. bika ukuthi ukuwasha ngokweqile ngensipho kungomisa ulwelwesi lwamafinyila olumboza i-glans penis futhi kubangele i- dermatitis engacacisiwe. 
Ukuvuvukala kwe-glans penis kwaziwa njenge- balanitis, futhi, kwenzeka ngo-3-11% wabesilisa (kuze kufike kuma-35% wabesilisa abanesifo sikashukela).U-Edwards ubike ukuthi kuvame kakhulu kwabesilisa abanemikhuba emibi yokuhlanzeka noma abangasokile.kunezimbangela eziningi, kuhlanganise ukucasuka, noma ukutheleleka nge ezihlukahlukene Amagciwane.Ukuhlonza ngokucophelela imbangela ngosizo lomlando wesiguli, ukuhlolwa komzimba, ama-swabs namasiko, kanye ne-biopsy kubalulekile ukuze kutholakale ukwelashwa okufanele. 
I-Meatal stenosis iyinkinga esedlulile yokusoka, eyenzeka cishe kumaphesenti ama-2 kuye kwangama-20 wabafana abasokile. 
Ama- felids wesilisa ayakwazi ukuchamela emuva ngokugoba ichopho le-glans penis emuva. [1]Emakati, umthondo we-glans umbozwe imiqolo, kepha ezinjeni, i-glans iyashelela.Penile ameva futhi senziwe glans owesilisa nowesifazane izimpisi nezimanakanaka. 
Ezinjaneni zesilisa, i-glans penis iqukethe izingxenye ezimbili ezibizwa nge- bulbus glandis ne- pars longa glandis.Ubukhazikhazi bomthondo wefossa buya cishe maphakathi nomshayo futhi bunamaphiko ngaphandle kwethiphu. 
Ngokuqhathanisa, ubukhazikhazi bezinwele ezimfishane bufushane futhi bucwebezela, kanti obama-viverrids bushelelezi futhi bude.Ukuma kwama-glans kuyahlukahluka phakathi kwezinhlobo ezahlukahlukene ze- marsupial.Kuma-marsupial amaningi, i-glans ihlukene phakathi, kepha ama- macropods wesilisa ane-glans penis ehlukanisiwe.Umthondo we-glans ubuye uhlukaniswe izingxenye ezimbili kuma- platypus nakuma- echidna . 
KuThomasomys ucucha umthondo we-glans uyindilinga, mfushane, futhi mncane futhi uhlukaniswe ngokukha phezulu waba uhhafu wesobunxele nangakwesokudla ngomkhombe ongenhla nomqolo phansi.Ingxenye enkulu yama-glans imbozwe ngemigogodla, ngaphandle kwendawo eseduze kwethiphu. [1] 
Lapho imile, ubukhazikhazi bomthondo wehhashi bukhuphuka ngamahlandla ama-3 kuye 4 times.I- urethra ivula ngaphakathi kwe- urethral fossa, isikhwama esincane ekugcineni kwe-glans.Ngokungafani nobukhazikhazi bomuntu, ubukhazikhazi bomthondo wehhashi buhlehlela emuva kushafti yalo. 
Clitoris ICorona yomthondo we-glans Ipipi leCorpus cavernosum I-Foreskin I-Frenulum ye-prepuce yepipi Ama-Hirsuties papillaris genitalis 
I- glans penis, ejwayele ukubizwa ngokuthi i- glans, iyisakhiwo esisekugcineni kwepenisi ezilwaneni ezincelisayo zesilisa.Kuyisakhiwo esibucayi esibucayi ekugcineni kwendoda yomuntu, futhi sinobungqingili ngokwasendalweni yesikhumba sowesifazane womuntu.Umthondo we-glans ungaba bushelelezi, ucwebezele, uvuleke, noma uhlukaniswe kwezinye izilwane ezincelisayo. 
Imvamisa, i-glans imbozwa ngokuphelele noma ngokwengxenye ijwabu elisebantwini, ngaphandle kwalabo abasokile.Ijwabu ngokuvamile lingahlehliswa ngaphezulu futhi lidlule i-glans, futhi lingahle lihlehle ngokuzenzakalela ngesikhathi sokwakhiwa.I-glans yaziwa kakhulu ngokuthi "ikhanda" noma "ithiphu" yesitho sangasese.Igama lezokwelapha lisuselwa kumagama esiLatini athi glans ("acorn") nepenis ("of the penis"). 
Ebantwini 
Umthondo we-glans yisigaxa esandisiwe se- corpus spongiosum.Ibunjwe emaphethelweni oyindilinga we- corpora cavernosa penis, enabela kude phezulu ngaphezulu kunaphezulu kwayo.Engqungqutheleni yama-glans kune-orifice yangaphandle eqondile ebheke phezulu.Umjikelezo wesisekelo se-glans wakha umngcele oyindilinga wokuphrojusa, i- corona glandis, emboze i- sulcus ejulile ye-retroglandular (i- coronal sulcus ), ngemuva kwayo okuyintamo yomthondo.Ubukhulu obulinganayo bepenisi ye-glans bungahluka kakhulu.Kwamanye amapipi kubanzi kakhulu ukuzungeza kune-shaft, okunikeza ipipi ukubukeka okufana nekhowe, kokunye kuncane futhi kufana kakhulu nophenyo lwesimo.Ubucwebecwebe obuthambile be-glans buthatha umthelela ngesikhathi esinzima sokubambisana. 
[1] 
Ijwabu ligcina i-mucosa endaweni enomswakama. 
[1] Imithondo esokiwe ine-glans evezwe unomphela futhi yomile.Ucwaningo oluningi luye lwaphakamisa ukuthi i-glans ibucayi ngokulinganayo kuzo zombili izitho ezisokile nezingasokile, [2][3] ngenkathi abanye bebike ukuthi iyazwela kubantu abangasokile. [4] [5] 
UJohn Taylor (1 Novemba 1808 – 25 Julayi 1887) wayengumholi wezenkolo owazalwa ngesiNgisi owayesebenza njengomongameli wesithathu we- The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church) kusuka ngo-1880 kuya ku-1887.Ungumongameli wokuqala futhi kuze kube manje kuphela ongumongameli weSonto LDS ozalwe ngaphandle kwaseMelika. 
UTaylor kubikwa ukuthi ubenezwi elimangalisayo lokucula.Ngokwesicelo sikaHyrum Smith, wacula kabili ingoma ethi " A Poor Wayfaring Man of Grief " eCarthage Jail ngaphambi nje kokubulawa kwezelamani zakwaSmith . [1] 
UTaylor ubhale izingoma emaculweni amaningana, ezinye zazo ezisasetshenziswa yiSonto LDS.Ku-2005, iculo likaTaylor elithi "Joseph the Seer" lahlatshelelwa emcimbini weSonto LDS wokugubha iminyaka engama-200 yokuzalwa kukaJoseph Smith.Uhlelo lwesiNgisi lwango-1985 lwesihlabelelo se- LDS Church lufaka phakathi amaculo amabili anezingoma zikaTaylor, "Go Ye Messengers of Glory" (no. 
262) ne- "Go, Ye Messengers of Heaven" (no. 
Ngemuva kokushona kukaBrigham Young ngo-1877, iKhoramu labaPhostoli AbayiShumi Nambili lalilawula isonto, noJohn Taylor njengomongameli wekhoramu.UTaylor waba ngumongameli wesithathu webandla ngo-1880.Wakhetha njengabaluleki bakhe uJoseph F. Smith noGeorge Q. Cannon, owokugcina kwaba ngumshana womkakhe, uLeonora. 
UTaylor ushone ngomhlaka-25 Julayi 1887, ebulawa ukuhluleka kwenhliziyo eKaysville, e-Utah Territory.UTaylor wangcwatshwa emathuneni aseSalt Lake City e- The Avenues, eSalt Lake City, e-Utah.Kwaphela iminyaka emibili eshonile, isonto laphinde lahlala ngaphandle kukamongameli.Umgwamanda wabaPhostoli AbayiShumi Nambili, noWilford Woodruff njengomongameli wekhoramu, bathatha ubuholi ngalesi sikhathi sesikhashana.Engqungqutheleni yesonto ka-Ephreli 1889, uMongameli Wokuqala wahlelwa kabusha noWilford Woodruff njengomongameli.Ezinyangeni eziyisithupha kamuva, engqungqutheleni ka-Okthoba, u- Anthon H. Lund wabizelwa ukuzovala isikhala sikaWoodruff kwiKhoramu LabaPhostoli AbayiShumi Nambili. 
UTaylor wazalelwa eMilnthorpe, eWestmorland (manje eyingxenye yeCumbria ), eNgilandi, indodana kaJames no-Agnes Taylor. 
Wayenezikole ezihlelekile kuze kube yiminyaka eyishumi nane, wabe esesebenzela ubambiswano lokuqala futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi waqeqeshwa njengomshintshi wezinkuni nowenza ikhabethe.Uthe ngesikhathi eseyinsizwa, wayenombono "wengelosi emazulwini, iphethe icilongo emlonyeni wayo, izwakalisa umlayezo ezizweni" - leyo eyayizoyikhomba kamuva njengengelosi uMoroni.Wayelethwa christened kule iSonto LaseSheshi, kodwa bajoyine Methodist esontweni elishumi elinamithandathu.Waqokwa njengomshumayeli ojwayelekile ngemuva konyaka, futhi wezwa ubizo lokushumayela eMelika .Abazali bakaTaylor kanye nezingane zakubo bathuthela e- Upper Canada (i- Ontario yanamuhla) e1830.UTaylor wasala eNgilandi ezolahla impahla yomndeni futhi wajoyina umndeni wakhe eToronto ngo-1832.Uhlangane noLeonora Cannon ovela e- Isle of Man ngenkathi ehambela iSonto LaseToronto LaseMethodist futhi, yize ekuqaleni asenqaba isicelo sakhe, wamshada ngomhlaka 28 Januwari 1833. 
Izimfundiso zikaTaylor njengomphostoli kwakuyizifundo ze-2003 ezifundweni ze-LDS Church zeSonto Labahlengikazi kanye naseMelkisedeki. 
Phakathi kuka-1834 no-1836, uJohn noLeonora Taylor babamba iqhaza eqenjini lokufunda ngezenkolo eToronto.Iqembu laxoxa ngezinkinga nokukhathazeka ngenkolo yabo yamaWeseli, futhi ngokushesha laziwa ngokuthi "Abaphikisi."Amanye amalungu afaka phakathi uJoseph Fielding nodadewabo uMary noMercy, ababuye baba nodumo ekuhambeni kweLatter Day Saint.Ngenkathi eseToronto uTaylor wayeqhubeka nokusebenza kwezentengiselwano zakhe njengomuntu osebenzisa izinkuni. 
UTaylor nomkakhe baqala ukuhlangana neChurch of the Latter Day Saints ngo-1836 ngemuva kokuhlangana noParley P. Pratt, umphostoli esontweni, eToronto. 
ULeonora waba ngowokuqala ukujoyina isonto futhi wancenga uTaylor ukuba aqhubeke nezifundo zakhe noPratt. 
Ngemuva kokubhabhadiswa kwalezi zithandani esontweni, bebekhuthele ekushumayeleni nasekuhleleni isonto e-Upper Canada.UTaylor wesikhashana engamele amagatsha ayisithupha endaweni yaseToronto.NgoJulayi 1837 wayebambe iqhaza ekuxhumaniseni ukuvakasha kukaJoseph Smith endaweni yaseToronto. 
[1] Babe sebethuthela eFar West, eMissouri, lapho uTaylor agcotshelwa khona ukuba ngumphostoli ngomhlaka 19 Disemba 1838.Usize amanye amalungu esonto njengoba abalekela izingxabano eziya eCommerce, eIllinois (ngemuva nje kokuqanjwa kabusha ngokuthi yiNauvoo). 
UThomas Sankara wazalwa enguThomas Isidore Noël Sankara ngomhlaka 21 Disemba 1949 eYako, eFrench Upper Volta njengengane yesithathu ezinganeni eziyishumi zikaJoseph noMarguerite Sankara.[1] Ubaba wakhe, uJoseph Sankara, i-gendarme, wayengowokudabuka okuhlangene phakathi kweMossi-Fulani (Silmi-Moaga) ngenkathi umama wakhe, uMarguerite Kinda, wayengowokudabuka wohlanga lweMossi.[2][3][4] Wachitha iminyaka yakhe yokuqala eGaoua, idolobha eliseningizimu-ntshonalanga elinomsokama lapho ubaba wakhe adluliselwa khona njengegendarme esizayo. 
Njengendodana yomunye wabasebenzi abambalwa base-Afrika ababeqashwe umbuso wamakoloni, waba nethubaa lesikhundla esiphezulu. 
Umndeni wawuhlala endlini yezitini nemindeni yamanye ama-gendarmes esiqongweni segquma elibheke lonke elaseGaoua.[1] 
USankara wafunda esikoleni seprayimari eBobo-Dioulasso. 
Wazikhandla kakhulu emsebenzini wakhe wesikole futhi wasebenza kahle kakhulu kwimatemetikisi nesiFulentshi. 
Wayeya esontweni kaningi, futhi ehlabeke umxhwele ngamandla akhe nokulangazelela ukufunda, abanye babapristi bakhuthaza uThomas ukuthi aye esikoleni sobufundisi uma eseqedile isikole seprayimari. 
Ngisho noma wayevumile ekuqaleni, wathatha ukuhlolwa okudingekayo ukuze angene ebangeni lesithupha ohlelweni lwezemfundo yezwe futhi waphumelela. 
Isinqumo sikaThomas sokuqhubeka nemfundo yakhe esikoleni esiseduze i-Ouezzin Coulibaly (eyayiqanjwe ngegama lobuzwe bangaphambi kokuthola inkululeko) sabonakala siyinkathi yenguquko. 
Lesi sinyathelo samkhipha endlini kayise njengoba isikole sasiseBobo-Dioulasso, isikhungo sezohwebo lezwe. 
Esikoleni samabanga aphakeme, uSankara wenza abangani abakhulu, okubalwa kubo uFidèle Too, kamuva ambeka njengqongqoshe kuhulumeni wakhe; noSoumane Touré, owayesekilasini eliphambili.[1] 
Abazali bakhe abangamaRoma eKatolika babefuna abe ngumpristi, kodwa wakhetha ukungena ebusosheni. 
Ubusosha babuthandwa kakhulu ngaleso sikhathi, ngoba babesanda kuxosha umongameli owayezondwa. 
Ubusosha babubonwa yizazi ezisezintsha njengesikhungo sikazwelonke esingasiza ekuqondiseni izimilo zabasebenzi kabahulumeni ababekhohlakele, ukulinganisa ithonya elingelutho lezinduna zendabuko futhi ngokuvamile busize nokwenza izwe libe ngelesimanje. 
Nangaphandle kwalokho, ukwamukelwa esikoleni sezobusosha kwakuhambisana ne-scholarship; uSankara wayengakwazi ukukhokhela kalula izindleko zemfundo eqhubekela phambiili. 
Wathatha ukuhlolwa kokungena futhi waphumelela.[1][2] 
Ngaphezu kwalokho, wakwenqabela ukucwiywa kwezitho zangasese zabesifazane, imishado ephoqelelwe kanye nesithembu.[1] Wafakela abesifazane ezikhundleni eziphezulu zikahulumeni futhi wabakhuthaza ukuthi basebenze ngaphandle kwekhaya futhi baqhubeka nesikole, ngisho noma bekhulelwe.[2][3] USankara wakhuthaza ukushushiswa kwezikhulu ezisolwa ngenkohlakalo kwezezimali, abaphikisana nenguquko kanye "nabasebenzi abavilaphayo" kuma-Popular Revolutionary Tribunals.[3] Njengomthandi we-Cuban Revolution, uSankara waqala amaKomiti afana nawaseCuba wokuvikela i-Revolution.[4] Izinhlelo ezinjalo zaholela ekugxekweni yi-Amnesty International nezinye izinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni ngokwephulwa kwamalungelo abantu, ezazisola ukuthi kwakukhona ukubulawa okungekho emthethweni kanye nokuvalelwa ngokungemthetho kwabaphikisi bezepolitiki.[5] 
Izinhlelo zakhe zenguquko zokuthi i-Afrika izimele zamenza waba ngumfanekiso omuhle kwabaningi abampofu base-Afrika.[1] USankara wahlala ethandwa iningi lezakhamuzi zezwe lakhe.[2][3] Kodwa-ke, imigomo yakhe yahlukanisa futhi yaphikisana namaqembu amaningana, ayebandakanya isigaba esincane kodwa esinamandla saseBurkinabé esiphakathi, abaholi bezendabuko abaphucwa amalungelo abo endabuko asenesikhathi eside okusetshenziswa kwabantu ngempoqo nokukhokhisa intela yempoqo, kanye nohulumeni baseFrance nomlingani wayo i-Ivory Coast.[4][5] Amaqembu aphikisayo kanye nezinyunyana zavinjelwa futhi inkululeko yabezindaba yancishiswa. 
Othisha ababetelekile baxoshwa futhi esikhundleni sabo kwafakwa abantu abasha ababengenazipiliyoni.[6] Ngomhla ka-15 Okthoba 1987, uSankara wabulawa amasosha ayeholwa nguBlaise Compaoré, owathatha ubuholi bombuso maduzane ngemuva kokubulawa kukaSankara. 
Isiqalo sempilo yakhe 
UThomas Isidore Noël Sankara ( French pronunciation: [tɔma sɑkaʁa] ; 21 December 1949 - 15 Okthoba 1987) wayengu Burkinabé yisosha futhi futhi isishoshovu sobusoshiyali, owasebenza njengoMongameli weBurkina Faso, ukusukela ethatha umbuso ngobuvukela bombuso ngobusosha ngo 1983 kuze kufikele lapho aketulwa khona ngokubulawa ngo 1987. 
Wayeyi-Marxist Leninist nokuba yi-pan Africanist, wayebona ngabasekeli bakhe njengomholi wedumela nowaziwayo njengerivolushinary ethathwa njengo-Che Guevara wase-Afrika". [1] [2] [3] [4] 
Ngemuva kokuqokwa njengoNdunankulu ngo-1983, ukungezwani nohulumeni owayephethe kwaholela ekutheni uSankara agcine eboshiwe. 
Ngenkathi eboshelwe endlini, iqembu lamarivolushinary, lathatha amandla ombuso egameni lakhe, ngovukelambuso alalesekelwa kakhulu ngalowo nyaka. [1] [2] 
Eminyakeni engama-33 ubudala, uSankara waba nguMongameli weRiphabhulikhi yase-Upper Volta . 
Ngokushesha wethula izinhlelo zokuguqula ezenhlalo yabantu, ezemvelo nezomnotho futhi waqamba kabusha leli zwe elisusa egameni lobukoloni baseFrance elithi Upper Volta walitha igama elithi eBurkina Faso ("Land of Incorruptible People"), nabantu balo babizwa ngamaBurkinabé ("abantu abaqotho"). [1] [2] Imigomo yakhe namazwe angaphandle yayigxile ekulweni ne-imperialism, kanti futhi wanqaba nezihlelo zosizo oluvela ngaphandle ezinhlanganweni ezifana ne- International Monetary Fund. 
USankara wamukele usizo lwangaphandle oluvela kweminye imithombo kodwa wazama ukunciphisa ukuthembela osizweni ngokukhuphula imali engenayo yasekhaya nangokuhlukanisa imithombo yosizo. [3] 
Imigomo yakhe yezasekhaya yayigxile ekuvimbeleni indlala ngokuzimela kwezwe kwezolimo kanye nokubuyiselwa komhlaba, ukubeka phambili imfundo ngomkhankaso kazwelonke wokufunda nokubhala nokukhuthaza impilo yomphakathi ngokugonya izingane ezingaphezu kwezigidi ezimbili kwizifo ze- meningitis, i-yellow fever nesimungumungwane . 
Kuphakathi kwezingane eziyi-18,000 nezingama-50 000 ezafa minyaka yonke ngesimungumungwane ne-meningitis. [1] [2] [3] IBurkinabe yakha okokuqala izikole eziningi, izikhungo zezempilo, amadamu amanzi, futhi cishe u-100 km wemizila yezitimela, futhi ngaphandle kosizo oluvela ngaphandle kwezwe. 
Ingqikithi yokukhiqizwa kwamabele yakhuphuka ngamaphesenti angu-75% phakathi kuka-1983 no-1986. [4] [5] 
Ezinye izingxenye zohlelo lwakhe lukazwelonke zazibandakanya ukutshala izihlahla ezingaphezu kwezigidi eziyi-10 ukulwa nokwanda kwehlane kweSahel, ukwabiwa kabusha komhlaba kubanikazi bomhlaba abazimele, ukumisa intela yezindawo zasemaphandleni nezintela zasekhaya nokusungula uhlelo lokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo nojantshi bezitimela. [1] [2] [3] Ezingeni lendawo, uSankara wanxusa yonke imizi ukuthi yakhe indawo yokwelapha futhi wakha namakhemisi ezigodini ezingama-5,384 kweziyi-7 500. [4] Kusukela ngo-1982 kuya ku-1984 izinga lokufa kwezinsana lehla lisuka kwizinsana ezingu -208 kwezingu-1 000 ezinganeni ezizalwayo laya kwazingu-145. 
UJetiro Mohlala, ngokuvamile eyaziwa ngokuthi Lovers Mohlala, (owazalwa 26 Apreli 1975) is a South African wangaphambili footballer ababedlala efanele njengoba kwesokunxele-fullback e Greece futhi eNingizimu Afrika.Uthole izicoco eziyisishiyagalolunye eqenjini lesizwe laseNingizimu Afrika, waqokelwa esikwatini esizobamba iqhaza kwiCOSAFA Cup ngo-2002. 
Wazalelwa e- Alexandra, uMohlala waphenduka ubuchwepheshe eWits University ngo-1992.Ngemuva kwamasizini amahlanu neWits, wajoyina iMamelodi Sundowns.Ngemuva kokuhluleka kwe FC FCenhagen, uMohlala uphoqelele ukufudukela kuMaZulu .Ngemuva kwesikhashana, usayine kabusha neWits, ngaphambi kokudlulela kuJomo Cosmos. 
NgoJanuwari 2004, uMohlala wasayina neqembu laseSuperleague Greece u- Aris Thessaloniki, kodwa wadlala imidlalo emibili kuphela yeligi ngaphambi kokubuyela eNingizimu Afrika ngemuva kwezinyanga eziyisithupha.Uzodlalela iJomo Cosmos, Silver Stars, Moroka Swallows, AmaZulu neBlack Leopards ngaphambi kokuthatha umhlalaphansi ngo-2009. 
UMohlala wayemele iNingizimu Afrika kuyo yonke iminyaka yobudala.Uqale ukudlala umdlalo wakhe omkhulu emdlalweni weCOSAFA Cup ngo-1999 neBotswana. 
UMathibe Rebecca Mohlala ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika.Wakhethwa njengelungu lePhalamende ePhalamende Likazwelonke leqembu le- Economic Freedom Fighters ngo- 2019. 
Selokhu aba yilungu lePhalamende, usebenze ekomidini elibhekele ezezimali. 
Jikelele Siphiwe Nyanda SSA , SBS , CLS , I-DMG , I-MMS , UMMM (owazalwa ngo-1950) wayengumphathi wamasosha waseNingizimu Afrika futhi engusopolitiki.Usebenze njengeChief of the South African National Defence Force kusukela ngo-1998 kuya ku-2005, uNgqongqoshe Wezokuxhumana kusukela ngo-2009 kuya ku-2010 nokuqokwa njengelungu lebhodi leDenel ngoMeyi 2018. 
Ngesikhathi esifanayo lapho kuvela izinsolo ezimalunga nezindawo zokuhlala kwakhe, ibhizinisi likaNyanda langasese lalibhekiwe. 
Inkampani, umndeni wakwaNyanada owawunamaphesenti angama-45, ebizwa nge- GNS Risk Management Services (kamuva eyabizwa nge- Abalozi Security Risk Advisory Services ) yasolwa ngokungafanele ekusebenzeni kwamathenda ngoMashi 2010.Phakathi kwamakhasimende ayo amaningi bekukhona nohulumeni abaningi, okubalwa kubo iTransnet Freight Rail, inkampani yezitimela yabagibeli iMetrorail, inkampani yamabhasi kahulumeni i-Autopax, kanye nohulumeni wesifundazwe saseGauteng. 
Kamuva kwavela ukuthi iTransnet Freight Rail ibibambe iqhaza ekunikezelweni kwamathenda ngaphandle kokulandela imigudu efanele.Phakathi kwamathenda abuzwa imibuzo kwakuyinkontileka eyodwa yezokuphepha ebiza u-ZAR 55 million, eyanikezwa abakwa-GNS Risk Management Services.Isikhulu esiphezulu kwaTransnet, uSiyabonga Gama, waxoshwa ngesikhathi kuvela lezi zinsolo. 
Nokho uNyanda akazange akhuzwe. 
Ngo-Okthoba 2010, uNyanda wagxekwa ngokumiswa komqondisi jikelele wezokuxhumana uMamodupi Mohlala .Kubikwa ukuthi ngoJulayi 2010, ngosuku uNyanda agenca ngalo uMohlala, wabika emaphoyiseni ngokungahambi kahle kwamathenda okungabiza u-ZAR 70 million emaphoyiseni ukuze kwenziwe uphenyo lokukhwabanisa kanti kubikwa ukuthi wayefuna aqondiswe izigwegwe kubasebenzi bakahulumeni abaphezulu. 
UNyanda uziphikisile lezi zinsolo, wazibiza ngokuthi "zingamanga, zinamanga futhi zinobulwane".Kodwa-ke, ngemuva nje kokuphuma kwendaba ephathelene nokususwa kukaMohlala, uNyanda wasuswa esikhundleni sakhe njengoNgqongqoshe Wezokuxhumana.Ngaphandle kweziphakamiso eziningi zokungaziphathi kahle kwezepolitiki, ngemuva kwalokho uNyanda waqokwa njengomeluleki wasePhalamende walowo owayenguMongameli uJacob Zuma. 
UNyanda wajoyina uMkhonto weSizwe (MK), uphiko lwezempi lwe- African National Congress, ngo-1974, futhi wasebenza njengomphathi wenkundla ngesikhathi somzabalazo wenkululeko elwa nohulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika ngawo-1980.Waqokwa waba yi-MK Chief of Staff ngo-1992, wasebenza kwiTransitional Executive Council eyayibhekele ukuguqulwa kukahulumeni ngo-1994. 
Ngo-1999, uNyanda waklonyeliswa nge- Star of South Africa, iGold. 
UNyanda ubengundabuzekwayo phakathi nezinyanga ezingu-18 esengungqongqoshe wezokuxhumana. 
Ebizwa ngokuthi "ungqongqoshe wezokunethezeka" yiMail & Guardian yaseNingizimu Afrika, uNyanda kusolwa ukuthi usebenzise amakhulu ezinkulungwane zamarandi ehlala ehhotela likanokusho laseKapa esikhathini sakhe sonke ngoba wayengeneme ngendlu yongqongqoshe ayenikezwe yona. 
Njengamaqembu amaningi oSuthu-Tswana, uMaPulana ukholelwa kuBadimo (okhokho).Uma benza ukukhulekelwa kwabo kokhokho (go phasa badimo) babhekana nokuya eShakwaneng, ebheke empumalanga.Akekho unkulunkulu oyedwa kepha wonke amadlozi noma imimoya iyahlonishwa.Ukushweleza nemimoya oyidingayo ngezikhathi ezithile.Ngesikhathi seminikelo kwenziwa ubhiya bendabuko futhi isilwane (imbuzi / inkukhu / inkomo) kufanele kuhlatshwe.Elinye igazi lesilwane esihlatshiwe kanye nelinye ubhiya lithelwa ku-legandelo (ipulatifomu yomhlatshelo) njengokunikela kwimimoya.Ilungu eliphezulu kakhulu lomndeni elikhona kulo mhlatshelo libiza amagama amadlozi ngokwezigaba ezihambisana nokushaywa kwezandla kwamanye amalungu omndeni.Isihlahla se-Mmalo (Coral) sivame ukutshalwa endaweni yesikhulumi. 
Imithi yesintu ibilokhu futhi iseyinto ekhethekile kaMapulana.Lokhu kungabangelwa isimo sezulu esishisayo saseMapulaneng esenza amakhambi akhule ngobuningi. 
Imithi yesintu ikhishwa uDingaka (odokotela bendabuko).Ukuze umuntu abe ngudokotela wendabuko kumele aqeqeshwe kanzima nangesikhathi eside ngaphansi kweGobela (Guru).Udokotela oqeqeshwayo wendabuko ubizwa ngokuthi yi-letwasane (Sangoma).Ukwenza imvula nakho kwakungokukhethekile kukaMapulana. 
UMapulana uqala ubusha babo ebufazini nasebudodeni.Isikole sokuthwasa (koma) senziwa ebusika.Imikhuba yezikole zokusoka ibonakaliswa ngokufihla.Abafana abaqale ukuthwasa ndawonye bazoba ngamabutho afanayo emphato / moroto (webutho).Kukhona uhlelo oluningiliziwe lokwehlukanisa ibutho lesinye ngokususelwa ekutheni iqembu laqalwa nini.Umuntu ongazi lutho "akakwazi ukuvakashela" isikole sokuthwasa lapho sesisesikhathini.Amagama eMephato ya badika nguMatuba, Mangana, Magakwa, Madingwane, Mankwe, Maakwa,. 
Madisha, Makgola, Madikwa, Manala, Magolopo. 
Njengoba kungalindelwa abesifazane abanayo imibuso. 
UMapulana unohlelo lwezigaba, olwaziwa ngeDikgoro (Clans lit. "kraals").Kukhona labo abavela ku-Kgorong e ezinkulu (clan ephakeme) noma Kgorong ea nyana (low clan).Labo abavela kuKgorong e ezinkulu bangabantu begazi lasebukhosini noma bazalwa kunkosikazi omkhulu futhi kulindeleke ukuthi babe dikata-pele (abaholi) ngesikhathi semikhosi yokwethwasa.Lolu hlelo lusetshenziswa futhi kwi-go loma maraka (umkhosi wokuvuna kokuqala) nangesikhathi sokutshala. 
Izizinda eziyinhloko zaMaPulana yilezi bagaMashego, bagaMalele, bagaMogane, bagaChilwane, bagaNonyane, bagaMashile.Bobabili uMashego noMalele bangamakhosi endaweni yaseBushbuckridge, uChilwane uyinduna endaweni yase-Acornhoek nasePilgrem Rest kanye noMogane noNonyane endaweni yaseGraskop naseSabie kanye noBagaMashile eMatibidi kuya eLydenburg.UMapulana unezinduna ezimbili eziphezulu bagaChiloane noMashego Masoyi.Inkosi eyinganekwane yengxenye ethile kaMapulana ingcwatshwe eMmadiokane (Manaledi) Village eBotswana ngemuva kokufuduka isuka eMmalebogo nomndeni wayo waseBa ga Mogoma kukamalume wayo uKgungu Disikalala. 
Umndeni womfana wawukhomba umndeni lapho kwakufanele umfana ashade khona.Umfana wabe eseqola intombazane ehlangabezana nokuthanda kwakhe kulowo mndeni okhethiwe. 
Kokunye umfana ubekhomba intombazane yakhe.Ngazo zonke izinhloso, umshado wahlelwa njengoba imindeni inikela ngezibusiso zayo ngemuva kwesigcawu.Umndeni womfana uxoxisane ngodikgomo tsa bogadi okumele ukhokhelwe umndeni wentombazane.Isithembu sasenziwa.Unkosikazi wokuqala nenzalo yakhe babephethe isikhundla esiphakeme.Ifa lidlula kunkosikazi wokuqala ngaphambi kokudluliselwa kunkosikazi omncane kanye nenzalo yakhe. 
I Pulana noma Mapulana, Uyi ephansi esigangeni Zulu-Tswana uhlanga atholakala engxenyeni esenyakatho-mpumalanga Mpumalanga futhi mpumalanga Limpopo izifundazwe.Ulimi lwabo lubizwa ngeSepulana (SeKutswe nePai) futhi lubhekwa njengolimi lweqembu lolimi lwesiSuthu saseNyakatho. 
Lapho izingane zizalwa "ba ya relela" (zithola igama lokhokho wazo).Uma igama lomuntu othile kunguThadishe, ngokwesibonelo, angaba nguThadishe 6. 
Ogogo nobabekazi bakayise bayazi ukuthi yiliphi igama abazolinika ingane.Lokhu bekuvame ukwenziwa ngemuva kokubonisana noNgaka ozobatshela ukuthi ngubani ozalwa kabusha ngokuzalwa kwengane.Lapho ingane ingalali noma igula, ikhonjwa enyangeni ngugogo wayo noma ubabekazi wayo.Ugogo uzomemeza athi: "mogwera wa go ke yela, gola o reme diphate, o tshware lerumo noma lwe dintwa!" 
(Kukhona umngani wakho / Umngani wakho yinyanga, khulisa futhi usike izihlahla (ukhuni), khula, thatha imikhonto ulwe izimpi! ).Empeleni, khula ube namandla. 
ILeruo (imfuyo) neMashemo (umhlaba okwakulinywa kuwo) bebehlukanisa umuntu ocebile nendoda empofu.Umhlaba wawungowabo bonke abahlali bendawo futhi uNduna wabela indawo yokulima.Indawo yokudla kwamadlelo yayihlangene.Uhlelo lokuqashwa komhlaba kwaMapulana lwalungukuthi umhlaba wawungathengwa noma uthengiswe.IDipholwane (umdlalo) ibizingelwa ukudla, ukwelapha noma imigubho. 
Ikhalenda likaMapulana lisebenza ezinyangeni zenyanga, lapho kuqala ukugqama kwenyanga kube wusuku lokuqala lwenyanga.KuSePulane igama kgwedi (inyanga) lisho nenyanga.Ukuma kwenyanga nokukhanya kwayo kungafundwa ukunquma ukuthi izimvula zizokuwa nini.Unyaka uqala lapho izimvula zokuqala ziqala ngoSepthemba noma lapho izitshalo ziqala ukuqhakaza.Ngakho-ke, uSepthemba wunyaka omusha. 
Unyaka Omusha umemezela ukuqala kwenkathi yokutshala izitshalo ezikhiqiza ukudla okuyisisekelo kwaMapulana.Ukutshala bekuvame ukwenziwa ngokobudala bomndeni, izinhlekelele zakhula kuqala kuqala kanti ezinye ziyalandela.UMabele (umbila namabele) batshalwa kuqala, uDintlu (jugobeans) agcine.Ezinye izitshalo ezinjengoMjumbula (umdumbula), iMathape (i-colocasia), iMatlapala njll zitshalwa nganoma yisiphi isikhathi sonyaka. 
Lapho izitshalo sezikulungele ukuvunwa, umdala womndeni uzokhetha ukukhetha okuncane kwesivuno.Uzobiza amagama amadlozi bese enikela isivuno kubo.Lonke ilungu lalowo mndeni lizokwenzelwa ukuba liqhume kulokho okukhethiwe okuncane.Lokhu kuzoba umkhosi wokuvuna kokuqala.Akuvunyelwe neze ukudla noma ikuphi ukukha ngaphandle kokuthi lezi zinqubo ezibizwa nge-go loma (to nibble) zenziwe. 
Igama elithi MaPulana lisho ukhokho ovamile ogama lakhe linguLepulana, igama lakhe libhekisa ekulandiseni okuyindumasi kwamakhono akhe okwenza imvula.ULepulana wayaziwa nangokuthi uChiloane. 
Indawo lapho kuhlala khona abakwaPulana ibizwa ngokuthi iMapulaneng, isuka emfuleni iCrocodile eningizimu ize ifike emngceleni waseSwazini (Mapulana waseMashego) isuke eNgwenya iye Olifants River enyakatho, izintaba zaseLebombo empumalanga futhi ibandakanya nedolobha lonke iHazyview, Lepunama ( Nelspruit ), Sabie, Graskop, Hoedspruit, Barberton, Lydenburg futhi Dullstroom entshonalanga.Ngolimi lwesiPulana noma iSepulana, uMapulaneng usho ukuthi "Indawo yabantu bakwaMapulana"; lesi sizwe sithola igama laso kumholi waso ongumsunguli, uLepulana owagcina eguqule igama lakhe laba nguChiloane. 
UMapulana uyinzalo kaMorolong kanti imvelaphi yabo ingabuyela emuva eKgalagadi ngaphambi kokuba bayohlala eThaba Chueu, okuyindawo esempumalanga yeLesotho kanye naseShakwaneng (Carolina) ngeminyaka yama-1500.UMapulana waseMatshwe ngathola igama labo kumholi wabo uPulane futhi bangamahlumela ama-Amazizi futhi bangabokudabuka kabeNguni . 
Uphawu lwe- totem lukaMaPulana yingonyama. 
Iningi likaMaPulana lihlala kule ndawo kusuka eHoedspruit kuya eHazyview namaphethelo.Le ndawo enkulu njalo ibizwa ngokuthi "iMapulaneng" okusho ukuthi "Indawo yabantu bakaPulana (Lepulana)".Emazweni awo yokhokho ngokomlando, Nokho ayesuka Klaserie (enyakatho Hoedspruit enyakatho kuya kwaze kwaba seningizimu njengoba eMbombela (Nelspruit) kuhlanganise namuhla Graskop, Sabie futhi Ohrigstad . 
Kukhona nesibalo esikhulu sabakwaMaPulana abahlala eMabopane, eWinterveld naseKlipgat enyakatho nentshonalanga yePitoli kanye naseDaveyton empumalanga yeGoli lapho kukhona umgwaqo oqanjwe ngoMaPulana.Amanye amadolobhana akwaMapulana afaka phakathi [[Chochocho] Lilydale, Cottondale, Dwarsloop, Mariti, Mgandusweni, Manyeleti, Lephong, Moloro, Matibidi, Leroro, Greenvalley, GaJosefa, Jerusalema, Oakley, Rolle, Wales, [1] ] 
UDavid Nyathi - Umdlali webhola lezinyawo. 
UPenny Lebyane - Ubuntu bezindaba UNicolette Mashile - Ubuntu beMedia 
Imvelaphi kaMaPulana nomlando wokuthi sekunesikhathi esingakanani behlala endaweni enkulu yeMapulaneng kuyisihloko senkulumompikiswano eshubile.Ucwaningo lukhombisa ukuthi kunamaqembu amathathu akwaMapulana, aMapulana akwaMohlomi angamaBakwena kanye noMapulana wokuqala ukuhlala eThaba Chueu, uMapulana waseMatshwe I, wasePulane angama-Amazizi futhi ayehlala ngasemfuleni iTugela futhi kamuva ajoyina elinye iMapulana eThaba Chueu.AbaMapulana bakwaChiloane abangabokudabuka eBarolong futhi bashiya isizwe esikhulu saseBarolong ngesikhathi sokubusa kukaTau.INkosi yakwaMapulana uMalele yayinamadodana amabili avelele, endala kwakunguMorale owaziwa ngoChiloane jnr noMashego. 
Laba bobabili babengamaqhawe angcono futhi behlonishwa kahle ngabalandeli babo.Kwaqubuka ingxabano eshubile phakathi kwalezi zelamani ngenxa yowesifazane osemncane okwakuthiwa ungumzala wabo kanti ingxabano yafihlwa abomndeni wasebukhosini yatshela abantu ukuthi abazalwane balwela isibaya samabele (seshego sa mabele) Ngemuva kokubona ukuthi abantu esekela umfowabo omdala, uMashego wahamba nabalandeli bakhe wayozinza ngaseBakwena kulokho okukhona namuhla iSwazini futhi wazihlukanisa nesizwe esikhulu sakwaMapulana.UChiloane noMashego bobabili bahlonishwa njengamakhosi akwaMapulana kanti uChiloane nguyena ophakeme.AbakwaMapulana baseChiloane babehlala ePhageng (Empakeni) eningizimu empumalanga yeNelspruit kanye nomfula iLepunama (Nelspruit) kanti uMapulana waseMashego wayehlala eMotsheteng (Emjindini, eBarberton lapho umzukulu kaMasoyi II kaMashego angcwatshwa khona) Isazi-mlando seMaPulana uMoses Mashego usitshela "Babenamakhosi amabili, uMashego noChiloane, bonke abanye babeyizikhonzi nezinduna." 
NgoDisemba 1864, aMaPulana anqoba amaSwazi empini yaseMoholoholo ngaphansi kobuholi bezinduna ezine, uMaripe Mashile, uChiloane noMohlala, noSekakole Maatjie owayeyiqhawe elinesibindi futhi eyisangoma.AbaBaPedi abangaphansi kweNkosi uSekhukhune benqabile ukusiza futhi abakwaMapulana bavikela inqaba yabo yezintaba zaseMoholoholo ekuhlaselweni amaSwazi okwakuthunyelwe yiNkosi uMswati II.AbakwaSwazi babhujiswa kwathi owokuqala ukubhekana nokushona kwabo esiqongweni sentaba kwakungumfowabo omncane wenkosi yaseSwazini uZimase.Amatshe aguqulwa ukuze avikele isitha, futhi ukuhlaselwa okuningi enqabeni yabo kwaxoshwa.Amathambo abantu abalimele eSwazini agcwala intaba isikhathi eside ngemuva kwalokho.Umfula ongaphansi kweNtaba waqanjwa ngokuthi iMotlasedi (iKlaserie) 
Kunezinganekwane phakathi kukaMaPulana mayelana nesibindi nobuhlakani bukaSekakole (owayesevele eyikhehla) empini yaseMoholoholo.Kuthiwa ubephethe izibhamu abezithengisile, futhi wenza imilingo eminingi ukujabulisa amasosha aseSwazini ngenganekwane eyodwa ephawuleka ngendlela aziphendula ngayo waba yindlwana yokudida isitha sakhe abaleke. 
UXolisile Shinars Qayiso (owazalwa ngomhlaka 8 kuNhlolanja 1962) ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika futhi uyilungu lesiGungu Sikazwelonke saseNingizimu Afrika.Uyilungu le- African National Congress. 
UQayiso wazalwa ngoFebhuwari 8, 1962. 
Uqale isikole eByelkanderkoms Primary School eBloemfontein West ngo-1972 futhi wenza ibanga leshumi eMoemedi High School ngo-1984.Ngemuva konyaka eqeqeshwa futhi ethola isitifiketi, waqashwa njengomsizi wobuhlengikazi obhalisiwe. 
Wabe esenza izifundo ezimfishane eNyuvesi yaseNingizimu Afrika wathola isitifiketi sokuphathwa kolwazi. [1]UQayiso njengamanje ugcwalisa izifundo ze-Basic Principle of Labour Law eNyuvesi yaseFree State . [1] 
Njengezinyunyana, uQayiso wayeyilungu leNational Education, Health and Allied Workers 'Union futhi engumphathi wesitolo. 
[1] Wayengumphathisikhwama wesifundazwe weNEHAWU kwesinye isigaba.Ubuye wasebenza njengosihlalo wesifundazwe kanye nephini likasihlalo weCongress of South African Trade Unions (COSATU) eFree State . [1] 
UQayiso ubephethe nehhovisi legatsha futhi esebenza njengomxhumanisi wabasizi bezomthetho esifundeni.Wayeyilungu leMangaung Advice Centre ekuqaleni kwawo-1990. [1] 
UQayiso wajoyina i- African National Congress ngo-1992 kwathi kamuva wajoyina iSouth African Communist Party .Ubeyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu egatsheni elifundiswe ezombusazwe. [1]Njengamanje uyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC esifundazweni. 
UQayiso wama njengelungu lephalamende le-ANC ePhalamende eFree State okhethweni lukazwelonke lwango -2019, wase eqokwa ePhalamende Likazwelonke futhi wafungiswa ngomhlaka 22 Meyi 2019. 
UKathleen Dibolelo Mahlatsi (owazalwa ngomhlaka 12 Juni 1984) ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika futhi uyilungu lesiGungu Sikazwelonke saseNingizimu Afrika esivela eFree State.UMahlatsi uyilungu le- African National Congress . 
Ngo-Ephreli 2021, uMahlatsi wagxeka umholi we-United Democratic Movement , uBantu Holomisa isicelo sokuhlakazwa kukahulumeni kazwelonke nokuqokwa kwesikhashana kuze kube lukhetho oluzayo ngonyaka ka-2024, walubiza ngokuthi lwalunolwazi olungelona iqiniso, olwalunhlanhlatha futhi lwalusomathuba. 
UMahlatsi wazalwa ngomhlaka 12 Juni 1984 eBloemfontein.Ufunde eBrebner High School ngaphambi kokuyofunda eCentral University of Technology nase- University of Free State.Ngaphambi kokuthi aqokelwe ephalamende ngonyaka wezi-2019, uMahlatsi wayesebenzela uMnyango Wezemisebenzi Yomphakathi eFree State, uMgwaqo kanye Nezokuthutha kanye noMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi eFreyistata. 
NgoDisemba 2018, wakhethwa njengesekela lesibili likanobhala kazwelonke weYoung Communist League yaseNingizimu Afrika. 
Ngo- 2019, uMahlatsi walwela ukhetho ePhalamende Likazwelonke laseNingizimu Afrika njengo-5 ohlwini lwe-ANC lwabazongenela ukhetho ePhalamende Likazwelonke.I-ANC ibiphethe eFree State, yanqoba izihlalo eziyisishiyagalombili kwezingu-11.UMahlatsi wakhethwa okhethweni futhi wafungiswa esikhundleni sokuhlala okokuqala eMkhandlwini Kazwelonke omusha ngomhlaka 22 Meyi 2019. 
Ngomhlaka 27 kuNhlangulana 2019, waqokwa njengelungu leKomidi Likazwelonke Lwezolimo, Ukuguqulwa Komhlaba kanye Nentuthuko Yasemakhaya.Ngomhlaka 21 Agasti 2019, waba yilungu elingavoti leKomidi le-Ad Hoc lokuchibiyela iSigaba 25 soMthethosisekelo.UMahlatsi waba yilungu lokuvota ngomhlaka 10 Nhlolanja 2020. [1] 
UMahlatsi uyakweseka ukuthathwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo.Ngesikhathi senkulumompikiswano ngeNkulumo Echaza Isimo Sezwe yango-2020 mhla ziyi-18 kuNhlolanja 2020, uMahlatsi wathi: "Njenge-ANC, sibheke umhlaba, hhayi impahla. . . 
Hon. Somlomo, abampofu kumele banikezwe izindlela zokukhiqiza ukuze banqobe ubuphofu.Umhlaba kumele usetshenziswe njengempahla yezomnotho."NgoJuni 2020, uvotele ukusungula kabusha iKomidi le-Ad Hoc lokuchibiyela iSigaba 25 soMthethosisekelo ngemuva kokuphela kwesikhathi salo.Uthe "umhlaba untshontshiwe futhi kumele ubuyiswe" nokuthi i-ANC ikubonile ukuthinteka ngokomthetho, ezomnotho nezepolitiki ngaphandle kokunxeshezelwa. 
UMatshidiso Melina Gomba ngusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika oke waba yilungu lePhalamende (MP) le- African National Congress kusukela ngo-2019. 
Njengamanje ungusihlalo wePortfolio Committee on Tourism. 
Uneziqu ze-Master Degree in Public Administration (MPA) ne-MANCOSA futhi uyi-HTML coder nesitifiketi esiqinisekisiwe. 
Ngaphambi kokunyuselwa ePhalamende, uHunsinger wayeyiKhansela kuMasipala Wendawo yaseSwartland.WayenguMMC obhekele ezezimali nokuThuthukiswa koMnotho ngenkathi umkhandlu uthola imiphumela emithathu elandelanayo yocwaningomabhuku "ehlanzekile".Ngo-2011/12, 2012/13, 2013/14, oyedwa komasipala ababili kwabangu-256 baseNingizimu Afrika abalifezile leli zinga futhi bathuthukisa ukuma kwalo.Futhi, ukwenza ngcono ekuhlolweni okuzimele kokuThuthukiswa koMnotho Wendawo kusuka kusikhundla se-14 ngo-2011 kuya ku-1 ngo-2014 komasipala abangama-30 eNtshonalanga Kapa. 
Uhole ithimba lamabhidi laseSwartland ngo-2013 elanqoba izimali zomhlaba wonke ngephrojekthi yokuqala ye-VPUU ne-RSEP (Violence Prevention through Urban Upliftment and Regional Socio-Economic) eNingizimu Afrika ezindaweni zasemakhaya.Isiphakamiso esiyingqayizivele samukelwa njengebhidi ehamba phambili ngokuya ngomqondo, okuqukethwe okusha, kanye nezinga lokulethwa.Ubuye futhi wasebenza njengelungu loMkhandlu oPhethe esiFundazweni saseWestern Cape eSouth African Local Government Association nanjengoSihlalo wesifundazwe wamaqembu amathathu asebenzayo ezingeni lesifundazwe nakuzwelonke: Ingqalasizinda Nokuhlela Komasipala, Ukuhweba Kwezinsizakalo Nezinsizakalo ZikaMasipala, kanye Nesimo Sezulu Nokuhlelwa Kwezemvelo.NjengoMholi Wezepolitiki kwiDemocratic Alliance, uHunsinger usebenze njengelungu le-Federal, Provincial, kanye ne-Regional Council.NjengeMenenja Yomkhankaso Wesifunda SaseNtshonalanga okhethweni lukazwelonke lwango-2014, olubandakanya iziFunda ZikaMasipala eziyishumi, iDemocratic Alliance yathuthuka ngoxhaso lwama-23% uma kuqhathaniswa nokhetho lukaZwelonke lwangaphambilini ngo-2009 kanye naseSwartland Constituency - ukwesekwa kwe-DA okungu-65% okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya ngo-2011 kwandisiwe kuya kuma-67% - kugcinwa isithunzi sendawo yokhetho ehamba phambili eNingizimu Afrika emiphumeleni yokhetho lwasekhaya, lwesifundazwe nolukazwelonke.Okhethweni Lohulumeni Basekhaya lwangonyaka wezi-2016, wayephethe umsebenzi wokulandela umkhondo wabantu abafuna ukulandela umkhondo esifundeni saseNtshonalanga, okwenyuka ngo-19% kunemiphumela yokhetho lwango-2011.Njengekhansela lesigceme kuMasipala Wendawo yaseSwartland, uHunsinger wenze ngcono ukwesekwa kweDemocratic Alliance kuwadi 10 kusuka ku-68% ngo-2006 kuya ku-93% ngo-2014 ngokuhlanganyela kwabavoti okungu-73%.Ngenkathi esebenza njengeNhloko Yesifunda eMatzikama, iDemocratic Alliance inqobe amawadi ayi-7 kwangu-8 ku-LGE yowezi-2016.Ngaphambi kwalokhu, waphinde wasebenza njengeNhloko Yesishayamthetho ePhillipi lapho kwaqoshwa khona inzuzo ezokweseka i-DA. 
Kusukela ngoFebhuwari 2017, usebenza njengoMholi Wezepolitiki kanye neNhloko Yezobumbano eBergrivier, esinye sezifunda zohulumeni basekhaya kuphela ngaphansi kokuphathwa kwe-DA, eziphethe ngokugcwele zonke izigceme ze-Constituency kusukela ngoJanuwari 2019. 
Ngo-2006, uHunsinger wahlonishwa nge-International Blue Heart Award eBerlin, eJalimane, ngeqhaza lakhe ekuqhakambiseni ubudlelwano bentsha ehlukahlukene phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika neJalimane kusukela ngonyaka we-1997 - futhi ikakhulukazi ekusungulweni kweSikhungo Sentsha Samazwe Ngamazwe Sonyaka eGanzekraal, eNingizimu Afrika, ngo-2004.Wayengumlandeli we-14 wamazwe omhlaba kanye nowokuqala wase-Afrika ukuthola lo mklomelo ohloniphekile futhi uhlala ebambe iqhaza kumaphrojekthi nezinhlelo zokuzithandela, ezaqala ngo-2005.Intsha evela esifundeni esisezindaweni ezisemaphandleni kakhulu eNtshonalanga Kapa ibambe iqhaza minyaka yonke phakathi kwamazwe angama-20 amenyiwe ezinhlelweni zokuthuthukisa ubuholi e- Eurocamp e-Kiez-Harz, eGüntersberge, eJalimane, eBelgium naseNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngo-1999, kuhlomula intsha engaphezu kwenkulungwane .Ngo-2016, uHunsinger wathola ubulungu bempilo obuhloniphekile be-USAPHO, inhlangano yomphakathi engenzi nzuzo ebhalisiwe, wakhonza njengelungu leBhodi eliPhethe le -The Character Company, kanye noMqondisi Wokuphatha weSASH - I-SA Society of Hope 
UChris Hunsinger (owazalwa ngomhla ka- 23 Okthoba 1962) ungusopolitiki waseNingizimu Afrika, Ilungu lePhalamende laseNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngo-2014, uCaucus Whip noMgcinimafa kanye neDemocratic Alliance (South Africa) . 
[5]Waqokwa nguMholi wangaleso sikhathi weqembu eliphikisayo uMmusi Maimane mhla ziyi-5 kuNhlangulana 2019 futhi wagcinwa nguMholi wamanje weqembu eliphikisayo uJohn Steenhuisen ngo-Okthoba 2019 waphinde futhi ngoDisemba 2020, waba nguNgqongqoshe Wezokuthutha.UHunsinger waphinde wakhethwa ePhalamende ngomhlaka 6 Juni 2019.Ukhuluma futhi abhale ngezinkinga eziphathelene nezidingo zabathengi nezimpahla kwezokuthutha, kufaka phakathi ezokuphepha,ukuhlela, ezezimali kanye nokuphathwa ngomgwaqo waseNingizimu Afrika, ujantshi, olwandle, [11] nabahlinzeki bezinsizakalo zezindiza. 
UHunsinger uthole ukuqashelwa ngeqhaza lakhe elibalulekile ekuhlanganiseni okukhulu kwawo wonke amaqembu aphikisayo ezingqungqutheleni zokugcina zePhalamende ngoDisemba 2018 ngesikhathi kucutshungulwa 'iRABS Bill'. 
Kubhekiswe kuye njengo; "... ushintsho olumangalisayo" (Times Live) le nkulumo [3] ePhalamende Likazwelonke e-RSA iveze ukusilela koMthethosivivinywa Womthetho Wokuhlomula Ngengozi Yomgwaqo, ka-2017 futhi wethula icala elingenangqondo design & manipulated in the Second Reading Debate on 4 December 2018, kanti i-RABS yayihlose ukufaka esikhundleni se-Road Accident Fund Act 56 ka-1996.Ngawo wonke amanye amaqembu aphikisayo alandela umbandela, imvume ayiphumelelanga ngalolo suku futhi yagcina ihluliwe okwesibili ngomhla ziyi-6 kuZibandlela 2018 kanti eminye imizamo (5 kuZibandlela 2018) yamiswa ngempumelelo ngokusetshenziswa ngobuqili kweMithetho ye-NA. [5]Yize izichibiyelo zoMthethosivivinywa ezethulwe nguHunsinger 'zenziwe kabi' esihlalweni, wonke amaqembu aphikisayo aphuma - okwenza iNdlu yabuza futhi yangakwazi ukuvota ekufundweni kwayo kwesibili futhi uMthethosivivinywa waphela ngenxa yalokho.Esigabeni sokuqala sokubuyiselwa kabusha ngesikhathi sePhalamende lesi-6 "uHunsinger waqinisekisa iKomidi" [8] ukuthi angaqhubeki noMthethosivivinywa weRABS.Impumelelo engajwayelekile, evunyelwe yiPhalamende ngomhlaka 3 Septhemba 2020. 
[9] 
UHulumeni Wendawo yaseBergrivier usezuze imiphumela emihlanu elandelanayo yocwaningomabhuku olungenacala kusukela ukuqokwa kukaHunsinger njengenhloko yesifunda ngoFebhuwari 2017 kwathi ngonyaka wezi-2019 umasipala wabekwa endaweni yesi-8 eNingizimu Afrika, owesi-3 esifundazweni saseNtshonalanga Kapa, nowesibili esifundeni saseNtshonalanga eGood I-Governance Africa Performance Index iqhutshwe phakathi komasipala abangama-213, kusetshenziswa imininingwane yezinkomba eziyi-15 ezingqikithini ezintathu: ukuphatha, ukuthuthukiswa komnotho kanye nokulethwa kwezidingo. 
Ilungu leKomidi Likazwelonke Lesigungu Esibhekele Ezokuthutha lifaka: 
Umgwaqo : (kufaka phakathi iRoad Accident Fund, iRoad Traffic Management Corporation, Cross-Border Road Transport Agency, Road Traffic Infringements Agency ) Isitimela : (kufaka phakathi Umlawuli Wezokuphepha Kwezitimela, I- Passenger Rail Agency yaseNingizimu Afrika ) Ezasolwandle : (kufaka phakathi Isiphathimandla SaseNingizimu Afrika Sokuphepha Olwandle, Isilawuli Sezimboni SaseNingizimu Afrika ) Ezokundiza : (kufaka phakathi iSouth African Civil Aviation Authority, i- Airports Company South Africa, i-Air Traffic Navigation Services, [1]) 
UHunsinger wayengusomabhizinisi embonini yezinsizakalo zokuthengisa nezimali.Waqokwa njenge-SA Best Practice Top 10 Finalist ngo-2009 futhi wawina umklomelo weCelestis Best Practice Award wesiFundazwe saseWestern Cape ngawo lowo nyaka 
Ku- Atlas of Human Sex Anatomy (1949) kaRobert Latou Dickinson, i- clitoris ejwayelekile ichazwa njengobubanzi obunqamulelayo obungu-3 kuye ku-4 mm (0.12 - 0.16 amayintshi) nobude obude obungu-4 kuye ku-5 mm (0.16 - 0.20 amasentimitha).Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ezincwadini zezokwelapha ze-Obstetrics and Gynecology, incazelo ejwayelekile ye-clitoromegaly kulapho kunenkomba ye-clitoral (umkhiqizo wobude obude nobubanzi obuwela) ongaphezu kuka-35 mm 2 (0.05 amayintshi 2 ), ecishe iphindwe kabili ngosayizi onikezwe ngaphezulu we- average clitoral hood. 
Ukwehliswa kokuqala kokuhlinzwa kwe-clitoromegaly ngokusebenzisa i- clitoridectomy ephelele noma eyingxenye kuyimpikiswano, futhi abesifazane abathandana nabobulili obuthile abathola le mpatho bakhulume ngokulahleka kwabo kwemizwa, kanye nokulahleka kokuzimela.Eminyakeni yamuva nje, izinhlangano ezilwela amalungelo abantu ziye zakugxeka ukusheshe kuhlinzekwe lezo zici. [1] 
Ngo-2013, kwavezwa ephephabhukwini lezokwelapha ukuthi abasubathi besifazane abane abaziwayo abangaziwa abavela emazweni asathuthuka bangeniswa kuma-gonadectomies nakuma-clitoridectomies athile ngemuva kokuhlolwa kwe-testosterone kwembula ukuthi banesimo se-intersex. [1] [2]Ngo-Ephreli 2016, Umphenyi Wezindaba Ezihlangene weZizwe Ezihlangene kwezempilo, uDainius Pūras, wakugxeka lokhu kwelashwa njengohlobo lokucwaswa kwabesifazane "ngaphandle kwezimpawu noma izinkinga zezempilo eziqinisekisa lezo zinqubo." [3] 
I-Pseudo-penis, i-clitoris enwetshiwe noma esinye isakhiwo esifana nepipi esivame ukuba khona kwezinye izinhlobo zezilwane ezincelisayo, izinyoni nezinambuzane 
I-Clitoromegaly (noma i- macroclitoris ) ukukhuliswa okungajwayelekile kwe- clitoris ikakhulukazi okuzalwa noma okutholwayo, kepha ukukhuliswa kwe-clitoris okwenziwe ngamabomu njengendlela yokuguqulwa komzimba womuntu wesifazane kutholakala ngokusetshenziswa okuhlukahlukene kwe-anabolic steroids, kufaka phakathi i- testosterone . [1] [2] [3] [4] IClitoromegaly ayifani nokwandiswa okujwayelekile kwe-clitoris ebonwa ngesikhathi sokuvuswa kocansi . 
IClitoromegaly yisimo esingajwayelekile futhi singabakhona ngokuzalwa noma sitholwe kamuva empilweni.Uma ikhona ngesikhathi sokuzalwa, i- congenital adrenal hyperplasia ingaba esinye sezimbangela, ngoba kulesi simo indlala ye-adrenal ye-fetus yabesifazane ikhiqiza ama-androgens athe xaxa kanti ingane esanda kuzalwa inezitho zangasese eziyindida ezingezona ezesilisa noma owesifazane ngokusobala.Kwabesifazane abakhulelwe abathola i- norethisterone ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa, kwenzeka masculinization kwe-fetus, okuholele ekutheni i-hypertrophy ye-clitoris; [1] kodwa-ke, lokhu akuvamile ukubonwa kulezi zinsuku ngenxa yokusebenzisa ama- progestogens aphephile.It kungabuye okubangelwa autosomal esikhubazayo disorder azalwa naso eyaziwa ngokuthi iFraser syndrome . 
[2] 
Ku-clitoromegaly etholakele, imbangela enkulu ukungalingani kwama-endocrine okuthinta owesifazane omdala, kufaka phakathi i- polycystic ovarian syndrome (PCOS) ne- hyperthecosis.I-clitoromegaly etholakalayo nayo ingabangelwa yi-pathologies ethinta ama-ovari nezinye izindlala ze-endocrine . 
Lezi zifo zingabandakanya i-virulent (njenge-arrhenoblastoma) kanye nezicubu ze- neurofibromatosic. 
[1] Enye imbangela ngama-cystal cysts. [2]Kwesinye isikhathi kungahle kungabi nasizathu esisobala somtholampilo noma sehomoni. [3] 
Ukubhoboza i-clitoris ukubhoboza izitho zangasese zesifazane okubekwe ngqo ekhanda (glans) le clitoris uqobo.Kuwukubhoboza okungajwayelekile ngokuzikhethela ngenxa yamandla omonakalo wezinzwa, futhi ngoba abesifazane bangakuthola kukhuthaza kakhulu ukuvumela ukugqokwa njalo kweringi encane noma i-barbell.Kuvame ukudideka nokubhoboza okuvame kakhulu kwe- clitoral hood, okubhoboza kuphela isembozo esimboze i-glitoral glans, [1] okuvumela ubucwebe ukuthi buxhumane kuphela ngezikhathi ezithile nendawo ebucayi kakhulu. 
Ngokuya ngesimo somuntu ngamunye, ukubhoboza i-clitoris, ikakhulukazi ukubhoboza i-clitoral hood, kungabhekiswa ngokuqondile noma ngokuvundlile. [1]I-clitoris inikezwe ukuqina okuphezulu kakhulu kweziphetho zezinzwa futhi njengokubhoboza izitho zangasese zowesilisa okungena ngaphakathi kumthondo we-glans, ukubhoboza okwehlisayo kungashukumisa kakhulu ngokocansi lapho kwenziwa ukuphathwa kabi, noma ukudlidliza, yingakho ukuthandwa kwabo emasikweni athile we-S & M, lapho imihlobiso emincane esindayo ivame ukufakwa ukukhulisa ukuzwa. 
UPiercer Elayne Angel uthe "kwabesifazane abambalwa kakhulu abafisa ngempela ukubhoboza i-clitoris (hhayi ukubhoboza i-clitoral hood), amaphesenti angama-90 kuye kwangama-95 akhiwe ngendlela efanelekile ukufaka ubucwebe ngekhanda lamakhosombe."Umuntu obhoboza intshontsho kufanele abe nesigaxa esikhulu esanele ukuvimbela ukufuduka kokugwazwa kanye nokulahleka okulandelayo ngoba isilinganiso sobucwebe obuningi bujwayele ukusetshenziselwa ukuvimbela umphumela we-'ish-cutter 'uma ubanjwa ezingutsheni, noma udonswa kanzima ngesikhathi socansi umsebenzi. 
Lokhu kubhoboza kungokwemvelo yesimanje futhi akuvamile.Ngo-1989, umgibeli uJim Ward, okwaxoxwa naye no-Andrea Juno kwi- Modern Primitives, wathi "Sengineminyaka engaphezu kwengu-10 ngisebhizinisini futhi angikaze ngenze okungaphezu kwesigamu kweshumi nambili." 
Ibhande elijiyile yibhande lesikhumba esingumahamba nendlwana ngasekupheleni kwejwabu.It has, ikakhulukazi ngokuphathelene phimosis futhi preputioplasty, elibizwe indandatho preputial noma indandatho phimotic, indandatho kokuba fanekiso band, ebhekisela umumo, futhi incazelo preputial eziphathelene prepuce . 
Ngokuyinhloko, kubhekiswa endaweni yesikhashana kusuka ngaphandle kuya ngaphakathi kwangaphakathi kwesimemezelo, noma ijwabu.Imvamisa ichazwa njenge- erogenous ephezulu. [1] 
UTaylor uchaze leli bhande eliqhekekile njengeqembu elihlukanisiwe elicwengekile lezicubu ze-mucosal, elitholakala ngaphakathi kuphela kwephambili lejwabu eduze komngcele we-mucocutaneous, owaziwa nangokuthi i- preputial sphincter.Uveze leli bhande elinezinhlayiya ezinamandla futhi elingenakuqhathaniswa, wathi "liqukethe izidumbu eziningi zikaMeissner kunaleyo ebushelelezi", futhi waphawula ukuthi lezi zinhlamvu ezithintekayo zitholakala kuphela ezinqoleni zemikhawulo. 
Isimemezelo, kufaka phakathi i-ridged band, indawo ethize erogenous. 
Umsebenzi oqhubekayo ukhombisa ukuthi ukuhlehliswa nokwelulwa kwalesi sakhiwo esifana nekhodiyasi kudala ukucinywa kwe-bulbocavernosus ne- bulbospongiosus. 
UTaylor uthi umsebenzi omkhulu webhendi eliqotshiwe ukuqala izingqondo zobulili.Encwadini ayibhalela umhleli weBJU International, 2007, uTaylor uyabhala: 
Ucwaningo lokuqala (i-JRT olungashicilelwanga) lukhombisa ukuthi ukubaluleka kwangempela kweqembu eliqediwe ukuya ocansini kusekhonweni lokubangela ukuqina kwemisipha okubhekele ukuphuma kwe-ejaculation. 
Kokubili i-glans ne-prepuce zifaka isandla endaweni eyodwa ehlangene yomthondo futhi kungenzeka ukuthi lezi zinhlaka ezibonakala zingafani empeleni zabelana ngemisebenzi efanayo ehlobene kakhulu nezimo zocansi kunokuthinta ukuqonda. 
Kanye ne- frenulum yepenisi, kubhekwa njengengxenye ebucayi kakhulu yomthondo ukuthinta-kahle.Kutholwe ngudokotela wezifo zokugula waseCanada kanye nomcwaningi wezokwelapha uJohn Taylor ngo-1991. 
Isakhiwo kunenkolelo evamile ukuba ezibalulekile besilisa ukuzwa ngokobulili futhi elisheshayo . [1]Iningi noma lonke iqembu eliqotshiwe lisuswa ngokusokwa kwabesilisa ngenxa yesikhundla salo kwi-prepuce. [2] 
Umphumela wokusoka ekusebenzeni kocansi kuyisihloko senkulumo mpikiswano enkulu.Umbono kaTaylor uthi "cishe impela, ukususwa kwesibambiso nebhendi yaso kuhlanekezela imisebenzi ye-penile reflexogenic kepha ukuthi kusazobonakala kanjani futhi ngezinga elingakanani".Ucwaningo lwamuva nje lukhombisile ukuthi i- bulbocavernosus reflex ebalulekile emtholampilo ayikho kuma-73% wamadoda asokile ngokusobala ngenxa yokususwa kokuphela kwezinzwa ezithintekayo eqenjini eliqediwe. 
Ukubuka konke ngezinkinga eziphathelene nokusoka kwabesilisa nokusebenza kocansi, bheka imiphumela yezocansi ekusokeni. 
UTaylor uqale wasebenzisa igama elithi "ridged band" esikhundleni selithi "isikhumba esishwabene" futhi wachaza isakhiwo kwi- Second International Symposium on Circumcision, ehlelwe yi- NOCIRC eSan Francisco, ngo-1991, ngemuva kokuhlola amajwabu abantu abadala abangama-22 abatholakala kuhlolwa isidumbu.Igama elithi ridged band labe selisetshenziswa nguye esifundweni se-anatomical and histological of ijwabu elashicilelwa kwiBritish Journal of Urology ngo-1996. 
Iminyaka yobudala kusho iminyaka engu-37, ububanzi 22-58.Ama-prepuces afundwe kakhulu futhi ngokomlando. 
Ngo-Agasti 2021, inkampani yezokwelapha yase-Italy i-Foregen yamemezela ukuthi izokwenza ucwaningo lwe-histological lwe-band ridged, kanye nezinye izingxenye zejwabu, emizameni yayo yokuyivuselela , i-frenulum, ne- mucus preutial of the prepuce. 
I-Phimosis yisimo lapho ijwabu lobudoda lingakwazi ukwelula khona ukuvumela ukuthi libuyiselwe emuva lidlule i- glans . [1] Ukuvuvukala okufana nebhaluni ngaphansi kwejwabu kungenzeka ngokuchama. [1] Ebusheni nasebantwini abadala, kungahle kube nobuhlungu ngesikhathi sokumiswa, kepha kungenjalo akubuhlungu. 
I-pathological phimosis (ngokungafani nokungabuyiseki kwemvelo kwejwabu ebuntwaneni) akuvamile, futhi izimbangela ziyahlukahluka.Amanye amacala angavela ku- balanitis (ukuvuvukala kwepenisi ye-glans). [1] 
I-Phimosis ingavela ngemuva kwezinye izinhlobo zokuvuvukala okungapheli (njenge- balanoposthitis ), i- catheterization ephindaphindwayo, noma ukuhlehliswa kwejwabu ngenkani. 
Ezinganeni ezincane, kuyinto ejwayelekile ukungakwazi ukubuyisa ijwabu nhlobo.Ngaphezu kwamacala angama-90% axazululwa eneminyaka eyisikhombisa, yize ukuhoxiswa okugcwele kusavinjelwe ukunamathiselwa kokuqina okungaphezulu kwengxenye engaphezu kwalesi sikhathi. [1]Ngesinye isikhathi, i-phimosis ingabangelwa yisimo esingaphansi kwesibazi ngenxa ye- balanitis noma i- balanitis xerotica obliterans . [2] Lokhu kungatholakala ngokutholakala kokubola kokuvulwa kwejwabu. 
UBeaugé uqaphele ukuthi imikhuba engajwayelekile yokushaya indlwabu njengokucindezela umbhede noma ukugcoba ijwabu phambili ingadala i-phimosis.Iziguli zelulekwa ukuba ziyeke ukwandisa amasu okushaya indlwabu futhi zikhuthazwa ukushaya indlwabu ngokuhambisa ijwabu phezulu naphansi ukuze zilingise ngokuseduze isenzo socansi.Ngemuva kokunikeza lesi seluleko uBeaugé waphawula ukuthi akakaze ancome nakanye ukusoka. 
[1] Akufanele kuzanywe imizamo yokubuyisa ijwabu ngesikhathi seminyaka yokuqala yokuphila kowesilisa. [2] Kulabo isimo esingathuthuki kubo, isikhathi singanikezwa noma ukhilimu we-steroid ungasetshenziswa ukuzama ukukhulula isikhumba esiqinile. [2] Uma le ndlela, kuhlangene umzimba esisuka, akuyona ngempumelelo, bese ezinye izindlela zokwelapha ezifana ukusoka kungenzeka Kunconywa.Inkinga engaba khona ye-phimosis yi- paraphimosis, lapho ijwabu eliqinile livaleleka ngemuva kwe-glans. 
I-Preputioplasty: Umdwebo 1. 
Umthondo onendandatho eqinile ye-phimotic okwenza kube nzima ukuhoxisa ijwabu. 
Umdwebo 2. 
I-Foreskin ihoxisiwe ngaphansi kwe-anesthetic ngendandatho ye-phimotic noma i- stenosis evimba umphini wepipi futhi yakha "okhalweni". 
Umdwebo 3. 
Ukuqhekeka kuvalwe kamuva. 
Umdwebo 4. 
Umthondo onesikhumba sejwabu esithukululiwe ubuyiselwe esikhundleni se-glans. 
Isigaxa se-Dorsal (superincision) ukusikeka okukodwa ebangeni elingaphezulu lejwabu kusuka kusihloko kuya ku-corona, kuveza izingilazi ngaphandle kokukhipha noma iyiphi izicubu. 
I-Ventral slit (subincision) iyimbobo ebangeni eliphansi lejwabu kusukela ekugcineni kwe-frenulum kuya phansi kwe-glans, isusa i-frenulum kule nqubo.Kuvame ukusetshenziswa lapho i- frenulum breve ivela eceleni kwe-phimosis. 
I-Preputioplasty, lapho kuklanywa khona umgogodla omkhawulo ngokuvalwa okuguqukayo kwenziwa eceleni kwebhande lesikhumba elincinayo, [1] kungaba yindlela ephumelelayo ekusokeni. [2] Inenzuzo yobuhlungu obulinganiselwe kanye nesikhathi esifushane sokuphulukiswa esihlobene nokusoka, ngenkathi futhi igwema imiphumela yezimonyo. [1] Ukusoka kwesinye isikhathi kwenzelwa i-phimosis, futhi kuyindlela yokwelapha esebenzayo; kodwa-ke, le ndlela seyande kakhulu kusukela ngo-2012. 
Ngenkathi ukusoka kuvimbela i-phimosis, ukutadisha izehlakalo zezinsana ezinempilo ezisokiwe ecaleni ngalinye elivinjelwe le-phimosis akuhambelani. [1] 
Inkinga ebucayi kunazo zonke yi- paraphimosis Kulesi simo, i-glans ivuvukile futhi ibuhlungu, kanti ijwabu livinjelwa ukuvuvukala endaweni ehoxisiwe kancane. 
Umthondo osondele kakhulu uyimbaba. 
Olunye ucwaningo luthole i-phimosis njengengozi yokugcinwa komchamo [1] kanye ne- carcinoma yesitho sangasese sowesilisa . [2] 
Ekuzalweni kwakhe, ungqimba engaphakathi ijwabu ivaliwe kuya glans umthondo.Ijwabu livame ukungahlehleki zisencane, kanti abanye besilisa bangafika eminyakeni eyi-18 ngaphambi kokuba ijwabu labo lihoxiswe ngokuphelele. [1] 
Izinhlangano zososayensi bezokwelulekwa ukuthi zingalihoxisi ijwabu losana, ngenhloso yokuvimbela izibazi.Abanye bathi ukungabuyiseli emuva "kungathathwa njengokujwayelekile kwabesilisa kuze kufike ebusheni." [1] [2]UHill uthi ukuhoxiswa ngokugcwele kwejwabu kungenzeka kungatholakali kuze kube sekwephuzile noma ebudaleni. [3]Ucwaningo lwaseDenmark lwathola ukuthi iminyaka yobudala yokuqala yokuhoxa ijwabu yiminyaka eyi-10.4. [4] 
I-Frenulum breve, noma i- frenulum emfushane, iyisimo lapho i- frenulum yepipi, okuyi-band ethandekayo yezicubu ngaphansi kwepenisi ye-glans exhuma kwijwabu futhi esiza ukuyibamba ngaphezulu kwe-glans, imfushane kakhulu futhi ngaleyo ndlela ivimbela ukunyakaza wejwabu.I-frenulum kufanele ibe yinde ngokwanele futhi ithambe ngokwanele ukuvumela ukuhoxiswa okugcwele kwejwabu ukuze ilele kahle emuva emhumeni wenduku emile. 
Ukuphuka kwe-Frenulum kungahle kube nzima ngokudwengula kwe-frenulum ngesikhathi socansi noma omunye umsebenzi futhi kuyimbangela ye- dyspareunia.Kungaholela ekubhaleni ngephutha ogulayo njengonenkinga yobungqingili. [1]I-frenulum edabukile ingaholela ekuphulukisweni ngezicubu ezibomvu ezingashintshi kalula ngemuva kwesigameko esidala ubunzima obengeziwe.Kodwa-ke, lokhu kudabuka kungabuye kuxazulule inkinga, kuphulukise okufana nokuthi i-frenulum yinde futhi ngenxa yalokho ayisenankinga. 
Ukuxilongwa kwe-frenulum breve cishe kuhlala kudidaniswa nalokho kwe- phimosis kanye nejwabu eliqinile ngokuvamile, ngoba uphawu kunzima ukuhoxisa ijwabu. 
Iningi lamadoda ane-phimosis nawo ane-frenulum breve ngezinga elithile. 
Isimo singalashwa ngokuzivocavoca umzimba nokwelula okhilimu. 
Kungabuye kwelashwe ngokuhlinzwa. 
Kunezindlela ezahlukahlukene zokwelapha lesi simo. 
Ukuchusha umthungo kulwelwesi olungezansi, bese ubopha ifindo eliqinile elizungeze i-frenulum uqobo kuyindlela enciphisa isenzo sokuhlasela.Ngemuva kwezinsuku ezimbalwa i-frenulum izoncipha futhi ekugcineni ihlukane ukuvumela i-prepuce ukuthi ihoxise ngokuphelele.Ezinye izinqubo zibandakanya ukusikwa kwesikhumba futhi kudinga ukusetshenziswa kwama-suture ukusiza kunqubo yokuphulukisa.Ngenye indlela, ingalashwa ngokuhlinzwa okwenziwa kabusha kwepulasitiki okubizwa nge-frenuloplasty, noma ngokusoka okuphelele kubandakanya ukwenziwa kabusha kwe-frenulum ( frenectomy ). 
I-Paraphimosis ivame ukubangelwa ochwepheshe bezokwelapha ( iatrogenic ) noma abazali abaphatha ijwabu ngokungafanele. [1] [2]ijwabu lingakhishwa ngesikhathi sokuhlolwa kwe-penile, ukuhlanzwa kwe-penile, i- urethral catheterization, noma i- cystoscopy ; uma ijwabu lisale lihoxiswa isikhathi eside, ezinye izicubu zejwabu zingaba edematous (zivuvuke uketshezi), okwenza ukwehla kwejwabu kube nzima. 
I-Paraphimosis ingagwenywa ngokubuyisela ijwabu emuva esimweni salo esijwayelekile, phambili, esingabuyiswanga ngemuva kokuhoxa akusadingeki (ngokwesibonelo, ngemuva kokuhlanza i- glans penis noma ukubeka ipayipi le-Foley).I-Phimosis (kokubili amafomu we-pathologic kanye ne-physiologic ebuntwaneni ejwayelekile) iyingozi engcupheni ye-paraphimosis; [1] physiologic phimosis ixazululeka ngokwemvelo njengoba ingane ivuthwa, kepha kungakuhle ukwelapha i- phologosis ye-pathologic ngokusebenzisa amasu wokuhlinza okwelula isikhathi eside noma okhethwayo (njenge-preutioplasty ukukhulula i-orifice engaphambi kokuqokwa noma ukusoka ukunquma izicubu zejwabu kancane noma ngokuphelele). 
Ijwabu liphendula ekusetshenzisweni kwengxabano ukudala ukwanda ngokwakha amangqamuzana amasha esikhumba yize inqubo ye- mitosis.Ukunwetshwa kwezicubu kungunaphakade.Ukwelulwa kwejwabu okungasetshenziswanga kungasetshenziselwa ukunweba ijwabu elincane, elingabuyiseki. 
[1]Ukwelula kungahlanganiswa nokusetshenziswa kokhilimu we-corticosteroid. [2] [3]U-Beaugé uncoma ukuzelulela okwenziwa ngezandla kwabesilisa abasebasha kunokusoka njengokwelashwa kwejwabu elingabuyisi emuva ngenxa yokulondolozwa kwemizwa yezocansi. [4] 
I-Paraphimosis ivame ukwelashwa ngempumelelo ngokuphathwa ngesandla kwezicubu zomzimba ezivuvukile.Lokhu kuhilela ukucindezela umthondo we-glans nokubuyisela ijwabu emuva endaweni yalo ejwayelekile, mhlawumbe ngosizo lwe-lubricant, ukubanda okubandayo, ne-anesthesia yendawo lapho kudingeka.Uma lokhu kwehluleka, ibhande eliqinile elicijile lezicubu lingasuswa ngokuhlinzwa ngomgogodla [1] [2] noma ngokusoka. 
[3] [4]Enye indlela, inqubo ye-Dundee, ifaka ukufaka ama-punctures amaningi kujwabu elivuvukile ngenaliti enhle, bese izwakalisa uketshezi lwe-edema ngokucindezela ngesandla. [4]Ngokusho kukaGhory noSharma, ukwelashwa ngokusoka kungakhethwa "njengesixazululo sokugcina, esizokwenziwa ngudokotela womchamo ". [5]Abanye ochwepheshe bancoma ukubambezela ukusoka okukhethiwe kuze kube yilapho sekuxazululwe i-paraphimosis. 
I-Phimosis Ukusoka I-Preputioplasty 
Kukodwa ukusika okubonisiwe kuMdwebo 3; uma kwenziwa ukusikeka okubili noma ngaphezulu lokhu kuzovimbela ukubhoboza okumise okwe-V lapho kuvulwa ijwabu lapho ipipi lingamile.Uma ukufakwa kufakwa ezinhlangothini zendandatho ye-phimotic, umphumela wokugcoba wokugcina ungcono.Kunconywa nokuthi izicubu ezingaphansi kwesikhumba zibukeleke phansi ukuze kuqinisekiswe imiphumela yezimonyo engcono. 
Ukuvulwa kwejwabu manje sekuvuleke ngokwanele ukuze ijwabu lihoxiswe kalula.Ijwabu libuye libe mfushane kancane (ngesigamu ubude bezimbobo ze-longitudinal esezivaliwe ngokuguqukayo) ngoba ukunwetshwa kwendandatho ye-phimotic kuthatha ubude bejwabu.Izifundo ezivela eqenjini elikhulu e-Indian Subcontinent zikhombisa ukwamukelwa okuhle nentshisekelo yokulondolozwa kwejwabu lapho kungekho zinkomba zenkolo zokususa ijwabu. 
I-Preputioplasty Umdwebo 1. 
Umthondo onendandatho eqinile ye-phimotic okwenza kube nzima ukuhoxisa ijwabu. 
Umdwebo 2. 
I-Foreskin ihoxisiwe ngaphansi kwe-anesthetic ngendandatho ye-phimotic noma i- stenosis evimbela umgoqo wenduku futhi yakha "okhalweni." 
Umdwebo 3. 
Ukuqhekeka kuvalwe kamuva. 
Umdwebo 4. 
Umthondo onesikhumba sejwabu esithukululiwe ubuyiselwe esikhundleni se-glans. 
Kwezinye izimo ijwabu lingavuvukala ngenxa ye-paraphimosis (ijwabu eliboshwe ngemuva kwe-glans) noma ezinye izimo ezifana ne- balanitis enamandla.Uma ukunciphisa ukuvuvukala ngezindlela zokugcina kungaphumeleli, i-dorsal slit ukungenelela okuvamile kokukhetha ngoba ukusoka cishe kuhlala kungafakwanga ezimweni ezinjalo. [1] [2]Yize phambilini bekunconywa ukuthi ukusoka kwenziwe ngemuva kwalokho lapho isimo esivela khona sesihlile, [3] lokhu kubonakala kungasenjalo. 
Kodwa-ke, ukusebenza kwamaMaasai kwehlukile kulokhu: esikhundleni sokuqhekeka komgogodla kusuka ekuvulekeni kwesimemezelo kuya e-corona, "okweqanda" okwakheke njengenhliziyo kususelwa ngaphakathi komgogodla we-prepuce bese i-glans idonswa ngalo mgodi.Kamuva imiphetho ye-prepuce esikiwe izolulama. 
Isilandiso siqale sinqunywe, kusale ingxenye encane kuphela lapho kutholakala khona imithambo emikhulu, edonswa phansi nomgodi omncane lapho i-glans efinyelelwe khona idalwa khona.Ingxenye esele isele ilenga phansi, kepha izingilazi zidaluliwe. 
Ngaphambili izizwana usukope Maasai efana eziningi Kikuyu eKenya futhi luqhutshwa ngendlela efanayo yokusoka.Izithombe ukusebenza kanye yi kuthiwa numerously ezitholakala ezikhethekile amabhuku Afrika, ezifana uCarol Beckwith noMahasayi Tepelit Ole Saitoti sika. 
Kunamagama omphumela "we-preputial flap" ezilimini ze-Maa nesiGikuyu, futhi mhlawumbe nangezinye izilimi zase-Afrika.NgesiGikuyu igama, manje elidala, kungenzeka ukuthi libe yi- ngwati . 
Isiguli esisodwa sethulwe nge-dorsal slit ngenxa yokutheleleka okunamandla ebuntwaneni.Sonke isikhumba esijwayelekile esivele sikhona besisesekhona futhi isiguli sifisa ukuthi isikhumba sibuyiselwe ekubonakaleni okujwayelekile.Kusikwe imbobo emise okwenziwe ngo-V lapho kwenziwa khona uqhekeko lwengwengwezi futhi imiphetho yomibili yahlanganiswa ndawonye, ngaleyo ndlela, yakhiqiza kabusha isimemezelo esijwayelekile.Isiguli sajabula ngemiphumela.Kungenzeka ukuthi lokhu kungaba yimpendulo kwabanye abagxeka ngokusoka.Ukuqhekeka okulula kwe-dorsal kungenziwa ezigulini ezine-phimosis noma izifo ezinzima eziphindaphindayo.Kamuva, uma befuna ukubuyiselwa, ukwakhiwa kabusha kokubukeka okungasokile kungaba lula. 
[1] 
Kwezokwelapha zaseNtshonalanga yayisetshenziswa njengenye indlela yokusoka ukuqeda izimo ezinjengokwehluleka kwejwabu ukubuyisa ( phimosis ) noma ukwehluleka ukumboza i-glans penis ( paraphimosis ), yize umbono wokubukeka kabi wawukunciphisa ukuthandwa kwayo.Yize kungukuhlinzwa okungahlaseli kakhulu kunokusoka, kuyahlasela kakhulu kune-preutioplasty ngoba ishiya imbobo ivulekile.Isasetshenziswa lapho ukusoka noma ezinye izinyathelo kubhekwa njengokungenakwenzeka noma okungathandeki. 
Njengoba ukugadla ngokweqile nokusoka kuyizindlela zombili zokusika izitho zangasese okuveza ubukhazikhazi, kungahle kube nzima ukwazi ukuthi iyiphi inqubo echazwayo noma ekhonjiswayo.Imibono ihlukene phakathi ngokuthi ngabe isithombe seminyaka engu-4,000 esivela eGibhithe, esivame ukuchazwa njengesibonakaliso sokuqala sokusoka, empeleni singaba sesiphezulu. 
I-Superincision yenziwe kabanzi ngabantu basePacific, isuka eHawaii iye ePhilippines . [2]Kodwa-ke, ngokwanda kwamadolobha, imikhuba yesiko ibilokhu ithatha indawo ezindaweni eziningi ukuze kusokwe ngokwezokwelapha, futhi cishe kunjalo kubantu base-Islanders abahlala eNew Zealand, lapho inhlolovo yakamuva ithole khona ukuthi "kunesidingo esiqinile sabazali". [2] Kakhulu ngaphandle esiphawulekayo zasePacific superincision iyona Maori of New Zealand, abenza hhayi abasoka ngaso noma superincise, [4] nakuba beye i term zomdabu ngenxa yokugcina (ure haea noma "ukuhlukaniswa umthondo") kanye emasikweni abo ukuthi bamisa zijwayeze lapho zifika eNew Zealand . 
Ukuqhekeka komgogodla kunomlando omude njengokwelashwa kwe- phimosis yabantu abadala, [1] njengoba kuqhathaniswa nokusoka kwakulula ukukwenza, akubanga sengozini yokulimala kwe- frenulum, futhi ngaphambi kokuba ukwenziwa kwama- antibiotic kube namathuba amancane okutheleleka.Kodwa-ke, imibhalo ivame ukukhombisa ukuthi yize "ingumsebenzi olula" "ayithandiwe ngabathile" [2] noma ibhekisa "ekubukekeni okufana ne-apron" okungakhiqizi. [3] Ukuqhekeka kwe-Dorsal manje sekuyivelakancane emazweni aseNtshonalanga njengokwelapha i-phimosis. 
Imihlahlandlela ejwayelekile iphakamisa izindlela ezilondolozayo kuqala futhi, uma lezo zingaphumeleli, kungaba ukusoka noma i-preputioplasty kokugcina ijwabu nokuqeda i-phimosis. 
Ukubekwa phambili kwesimo yisimo lapho ipipi lihlala limile khona amahora uma kungekho ukushukuma noma ngemuva kokuphela kokuvuselela. [1] Kunezinhlobo ezintathu: ischemic (low-flow), nonischemic (high-flow), kanye ne-ischemic ephindaphindwayo (ngezikhathi ezithile). [1]Izimo eziningi ziyi-ischemic. 
Ngoba ischemic priapism ibangela ukuthi igazi lihlale endondeni isikhathi eside ngokungavamile, igazi liphucwa umoya-mpilo, ongahle ulimaze izicubu zepenile.Umonakalo onjalo ungadala ukungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile noma ukukhubazeka kwesitho sangasese sowesilisa.Ezimweni ezimbi kakhulu, uma umthondo eba nesifo esinzima semithambo, le priapism kungaholela penile esibhibhayo . [1] 
[1]Ezinye izimbangela zibandakanya imishanguzo efana ne- antipsychotic, i- SSRIs, i- blood thinner ne- prostaglandin E1, kanye nezidakamizwa ezifana ne- cocaine ne- cannabis . [1]I-Ischemic priapism yenzeka lapho igazi lingakhiphi ngokwanele kusuka endodeni. [1] I-nonischemic priapism imvamisa ingenxa yokuxhuma okwenzeka phakathi komthambo kanye ne- corpus cavernosum noma ukuphazamiseka kohlelo lwezinzwa lwe-parasympathetic okuholela ekwandeni kokugeleza kwemithambo. 
[1] Uma uhlobo lokugeleza okuphansi lwe-priapism lukhona, igazi ngokuvamile line-pH ephansi, kanti uma uhlobo lokugeleza okuphezulu lukhona, i-pH ijwayelekile.
