[1]Umbala we-doppler ultrasound nawo ungasiza ukuhlukanisa lezi zinto ezimbili. [1] kuhlola umuntu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi akanayo i- hemoglobinopathy nakho kungaba nengqondo. 
I-penile ultrasonography ene- doppler iyindlela yokuzikhethela yokuzikhethela, ngoba ayihlaseli, iyatholakala kabanzi futhi izwela kakhulu.Ngale ndlela, kungenzeka ukuthi kutholakale ukuxakwa futhi kwehlukaniswe phakathi kwamafomu asezingeni eliphansi neliphezulu. [1] 
Ekuhambeni okuphansi (ischemic) priapism ukugeleza kwemithambo ye-cavernous kuncishisiwe noma akukho.Njengoba isimo siqhubeka, kukhona ukwanda kokuqina kwe-corpora cavernosa, okubangelwa i-edema yezicubu.Ekugcineni, izinguquko ekwakhiweni kwe-corpora cavernosa zingabonakala ngenxa yokuguqulwa kwe-fibrotic okwenziwe yizicubu ze-anoxia. 
Ekugelezeni okuphezulu okujwayelekile noma okwandisiwe, ukugeleza kwegazi okuyisiphithiphithi emithanjeni ye-cavernous kubonakala.Indawo ezungeze i-fistula iveza i-hypoechoic, lesion engajwayelekile kuzicubu ze-cavernous. [1] 
Ukuhlolwa kwezokwelapha kunconyelwa ukuvinjelwa okuhlala isikhathi eside kunamahora amane.Ubuhlungu bungahlala buncishiswe nge- dorsal penile nerve block noma nge-penile ring block . [1] Kulabo abane-priapism engeyona eyamakhemikhali, amaphakethe abandayo kanye nengcindezi yendawo kunganela. 
I- pseudoephedrine elawulwa ngomlomo iyindlela yokwelashwa komugqa wokuqala ye-priapism. [1]Ukwakhiwa ngokuyinhloko kuyimpendulo ye-parasympathetic, ngakho-ke isenzo sozwela se-pseudoephedrine singasebenza ukukhulula lesi simo. 
I-Pseudoephedrine ingumenzeli we- alpha-agonist onomphumela wokucindezela emisipheni ebushelelezi ye-corpora cavernosum, yona eyenza kube lula ukuphuma kwe-venous. 
[1]Ukuhlinzwa kungenziwa uma izinyathelo ezijwayelekile zingasebenzi. [1]Ekucabangeni okuyischemic, ubungozi bokunqunyulwa unomphela kwenduku buqala ukwanda ngemuva kwamahora amane futhi kwenzeka nakanjani ngemuva kwamahora angama-48. [1]I-Priapism yenzeka cishe kwabangu-1 000 kuya kwabangu-1 kwabesilisa abayi-100,000 ngonyaka. 
Kulabo abane-ischemic priapism, ukwelashwa kokuqala imvamisa ukufisa kwegazi kusuka ku- corpus cavernosum . [1]Lokhu kwenziwa nhlangothi zombili. [1]Uma lokhu kungasebenzi ngokwanele, i- saline ejwayelekile ebandayo ingajovwa futhi isuswe. 
Uma ukufisa kunganele, umthamo omncane we- phenylephrine ungafakwa kwi-corpus cavernosum. [1]Imiphumela emibi ye-phenylephrine ingafaka: umfutho wegazi ophakeme, ukushaya kwenhliziyo okuncane, kanye ne- arrhythmia ma lo muthi usetshenziswa, kunconywa ukuthi abantu babhekwe okungenani ihora ngemuva kwalokho. [1]Kulabo abane-priapism ischemic eqhubekayo, i- diethylstilbestrol (DES) noma i- terbutaline ingazama . 
Ku-sickle-cell anemia, ukwelashwa kuqala nguketshezi olufakwa emithanjeni, imithi yezinhlungu, kanye nokwelashwa komoya-mpilo . [1] [2] Ukwelashwa okujwayelekile kwe-priapism nakho kungenziwa.Ukumpontshelwa igazi akuvamile kunconywe njengengxenye yokwelashwa kokuqala, kodwa uma ezinye izindlela zokwelapha zingasebenzi, ukumpontshelwa igazi kungenziwa. [1] [2] 
I-Priapism ihlukaniswe ngamaqembu amathathu: ischemic (low-flow), nonischemic (high-flow), kanye ne-ischemic ephindaphindayo. [1]Iningi lamacala (ayi-19 kwangu-20) angama-ischemic ngokwemvelo. [1] 
Eminye imithombo inika isikhathi samahora amane njengenchazelo yobuningi, kepha eminye inika ayisithupha."Isikhathi sokwakhiwa okujwayelekile ngaphambi kokuba kuhlukaniswe njengoba kusasakazwa kusengumbango.Ukuqubuka okuqhubekayo kwepenile ngaphezulu kwamahora we-6 kungahlukaniswa njengokubheka phambili. " 
Ukubekwa phambili kwabesifazane (kuyaqhubeka, ukwakhiwa okubuhlungu kwe- clitoris ) kuyivelakancane kakhulu kunokukhathazeka emadodeni futhi kwaziwa njenge-clitoral priapism noma i-clitorism.Ihlotshaniswa nokuphikelela kokuphazamiseka kocansi okuqhubekayo (i-PGAD).Imibiko yamacala ambalwa kuphela yabesifazane abahlangabezana nokukhathazeka ngokweqile okukhona. [1] 
I-Chordee yisimo lapho ikhanda lobudoda ligobele phansi noma phezulu, lapho kuhlangana khona ikhanda nomphimbo wepipi.Ukugoba kuvame ukusobala kakhulu ngesikhathi sokwakhiwa, kepha ukumelana nokuqondiswa kuvame ukubonakala nasesimweni se-flaccid. 
Ezimweni eziningi kepha hhayi zonke, i-chordee ihlotshaniswa nama- hypospadias.Lesi akusona isimo esifanayo nesifo sikaPeyronie, esibandakanya ukugobeka komgogodla wenduku ikakhulu ngenxa yokulimala ngesikhathi sokuphila komuntu omdala. 
Ukwelashwa okuyinhloko kwe-chordee kungukuhlinzwa ebuntwaneni, imvamisa kudokotela wezifo zomchamo wabantwana.Ngama-chordees abangelwa ukusoka, indlela encanyelwayo yokwelashwa okuhlinzwa yi- z-plasty . [2]Isikhathi esithandwayo sokuhlinzwa siphakathi kweminyaka yobudala eyisithupha nengu-18 futhi ukulungiswa kuyaphumelela. 
Imvamisa kubhekwa njengokuzalwa okungahambi kahle kwesizathu esingaziwa.Kusukela esigabeni sokuqala sokukhula kombungu ipipi ligobele phansi, kuphakanyisiwe ukuthi imiphumela ye-chordee kusuka ekuboshweni kwentuthuko ye-penile ngaleso sikhathi. 
Ukuvuthwa kwe-chordee kungabandakanya 
Ama-degree amabi we-chordee ajwayele ukuhlotshaniswa nama- hypospadias, kepha ama-degree amancane we-curvature angavela kwabesilisa abaningi abajwayelekile.Lapho i-penis egobile incane futhi ihambisana nama-hypospadias, ukuntuleka komphumela we-androgen ngaphambi kokubeletha kungacatshangelwa. 
I-chordee ingadalwa yisimo esingaphansi, njengokuphazamiseka kokuthuthuka kwezocansi noma isimo se- intersex, noma kusuka enkingeni yokusoka, [1] [2] yize abanye ochwepheshe bezokwelapha bengakubheki njengokuyiqiniso ngoba i- corporal imizimba ngokuvamile yakhiwa.Kodwa-ke, akuyona yonke i-chordee yokuzalwa efaka phakathi i-corpora engajwayelekile, futhi imibiko yamacala omonakalo we-corpus cavernosum kusuka ekusokeni iyaphawulwa ezincwadini; ikakhulukazi njengenkinga ye-anesthetic yendawo. [3] 
I-Aposthia yisimo esingajwayelekile sokuzalwa kubantu, lapho ijwabu lobudoda alikho. : 37–39 
Amanye amasiko enkolo yamaSulumane athi uMuhammad wazalwa engenalo ijwabu. 
ULazaru Long, ophambili ophambili kumanoveli kaRobert Heinlein, wazalwa engathandeki. 
Ngasekupheleni kwekhulu leshumi nesishiyagalolunye, u- ES Talbot wathi i-aposthia phakathi kwamaJuda yayiwubufakazi benkolelo yokuziphendukela kwemvelo yaseLamarckian esehlisiwe . [1]Encwadini yakhe ethi The Variation of Animals and Plants Under Domestication, uCharles Darwin uphinde wakhuluma ngamacala abantwana "abazelwe besokile" njengobufakazi obuqand 'ikhanda " befa elilahliwe manje. 
I Midrash ka Ki-Tetze [כי תצא] izimangalo uMose wazalelwa aposthic. 
Eminye imithombo ukuthi uJakobe, indodana yakhe uGadi kanye neNkosi uDavid nabo bazalwa bengathandeki.Incwadi ethi Abot De-Rabbi Natan (Obaba NgokukaRabi Nathan) iqukethe uhlu lwabantu abavela emiBhalweni yakwa-Israyeli "abazalwa besokile": U-Adam, uSeti, uNowa, uShemi, uJakobe, uJoseph, uMose, uBhalami omubi, uSamuweli, David, Jeremiah noZerubabele. 
[1]Umthetho wamaJuda kudinga abesilisa abazalelwa ngaphandle ijwabu namkha ezilahlekelwe yejwabu labo ngezindlela ngaphandle esisemthethweni ukusoka emcimbini ( milah brit ברית מילה) ukuba abe iconsi legazi (hatafat-damu, הטפת דם) ake kusukela umthondo endaweni lapho ijwabu ngabe linamathiselwe (noma lalinamathiselwe).ITalmud (Shabbat 135A) iqopha ingxoxo yokuthi ukubaluleka kwalokhu kuvunyelwa kwegazi kuyithathela indawo iSabbat, okungasokwa kuphela umfana owazalelwa eSabbat sangaphambilini.Uma ukusoka okujwayelekile kubambezeleka, akukho ukungavumelani ngokuthi lokhu kungenziwa eShabbat.Kodwa-ke, endabeni ye-aposthia, kunezikole ezimbili zokucabanga. 
R. Elazar Hakappar wathi ukuthi isikole Shamai futhi kaHileli ungalilahli banemibono ehlukahlukene mayelana nokuthi umfana ozelwe ngaphandle ijwabu.Bobabili bayavuma ukuthi igazi lesivumelwano kumele likhishwe ezingubeni.Isikole saseShamai, nokho, sithi lokhu kungenziwa ngeSabatha, kanti esinye sithi iSabatha akumele lihlanjalazwe ngenxa yalokho. 
Orabi eRabat bamemezela ukuthi lokhu kwabikezela ukuthi uLevy uzokhula abe "ngumholi wakwa-Israyeli", yize uMbuso ungazange usungulwe kuze kube uLevy wayeneminyaka eyi-11, ngo-1948.Lesi simemezelo kwakungekhona ukuthi sasiyisiprofetho ngokusungulwa kuka-Israyeli, ngoba "u-Israyeli" igama elingasetshenziswa ukubhekisa "kubantu abangamaJuda". 
Ipipi elihlanganayo (noma ipipi eliphindwe kabili ) yisici esingajwayelekile sokuzalwa lapho kuvela khona izigubhu ezimbili zangasese 
Ama-marsupial amaningi amaningi wesilisa anjenge- kangaroo ngokwemvelo anepipi elihlukanisiwe, elinama-prongs angakwesobunxele nangakwesokudla afakwa emiseleni eminingi yangasese ngasikhathi sinye. 
Akuvamile kakhulu kubantu abasokile, njengoba ezimweni eziningi, ukungasebenzi kahle kwejwabu kuyimbangela noma okunomthelela.Kokubili ukuhlanza okungenele nokuhlanza ngokweqile kungadala izinkinga. [1]Isifo sikashukela singenza i-balanitis ibe nokwenzeka kakhulu, ikakhulukazi uma ushukela wegazi ungalawulwa kahle. [2] 
I-balanitis yeZoon, eyaziwa nangokuthi yi- Balanitis Circumscripta Plasmacellularis noma i- plasma cell balanitis (PCB), iyi-idiopathic, engavamile, enobungozi be-penile dermatosis lapho ukusoka kuvame ukwelashwa okuncanyelwayo. [1] [2] [3] I-balanitis yeZoon iphethwe ngempumelelo nge- carbon dioxide laser ; [4] futhi muva nje, i-Albertini nozakwabo babika ngokugwema ukusoka nokwelashwa okuyimpumelelo kwe-balanitis kaZoon nge- Er: YAG laser . [5] Olunye ucwaningo, olwenziwe nguRetamar nozakwabo, luthole ukuthi amaphesenti angama-40 alabo abaphathwa nge-CO 2 laser babuyele emuva. 
[6] I-circan balanitis, eyaziwa nangokuthi i- balanitis circinata, i- serpiginous annular dermatitis ehlotshaniswa ne- arthritis esebenzayo . I-pseudoepitheliomatous keratotic and micaceous balanitis 
Ukwelashwa kwasekuqaleni kubantu abadala kuvame ukufaka ukubuyisa emuva ijwabu nokuhlanza ipipi. [1]Kodwa-ke, amanye amafutha okugcoba nama-fungal angasetshenziswa ekwelapheni amacala amancane.Ngokuya ngobukhulu, i-hydrocortisone namanye okhilimu be-steroidal angasetshenziswa ekubonisaneni. 
[1]Lapho ijwabu libuye lithinteke, igama elifanele yi- balanoposthitis . [1]Balanitis ku abafana namanje namanabukeni kumele ahlukaniswe kusuka ububomvu kubangelwa ammoniacal dermatitis . [2] Igama elithi balanitis livela esiGrekini βάλανος balanos , ngokwezwi nezwi okusho 'i- acorn ', esetshenziswa ngenxa yokufana kokuma kwepenisi ye-glans . 
Ngo izinja, balanoposthitis ibangwa ukuphazamiseka ku uhlelo integumentary, njengemoto isilonda noma Ukungena a nomzimba angaphandle.Inja enalesi simo iziphatha ngendlela eyejwayelekile, ngaphandle kokukhotha ngokweqile ku-prepuce, futhi ukukhipha okuluhlaza okotshani, okufana nobomvu kuvame ukuba khona. 
Izimpawu 
Ukuqubuka okuvamile kwe-balanitis kungadala ukushaqeka kwe- preutial orifice ; ukunwebeka okuncishisiwe kungaholela ku- pathologic phimosis .Ezinye izinkinga zingafaka: 
Ukuqina kwenyama ye-urethral I-Phimosis I-Paraphimosis 
Ukuvuvukala kunezimbangela eziningi ezingaba khona, kufaka phakathi ukucasuka ngezinto zemvelo, ukuhlukumezeka ngokomzimba, kanye nokutheleleka okufana negciwane, igciwane noma ukhunta. [1] [2]Ezinye zalezi zifo izifo ezithathelwana ngocansi . 
I-Posthitis (ebizwa ngokuthi i-pos-THI-tis) ukuvuvukala kwejwabu (isikhuthazi) somthondo womuntu.Kubonakala ngokuvuvukala nokubomvu esikhunjeni futhi kungahle kuhambisane nokukhishwa okunukayo. 
Ukwelashwa kuncike ekuboneni imbangela. 
Izicasuli zemvelo kufanele zisuswe.Ama-antibiotic nama-antifungal angasetshenziswa ukwelapha ukutheleleka, [1]kepha inhlanzeko enhle njengokugcina indawo yomile ibalulekile ukumisa ukuphindeka, noma kunjalo ukugeza ngokweqile ngensipho kungadala i-dermatitis yokuxhumana. [2] 
I-Posthitis ne- balanitis (ukuvuvukala kwepenisi ye-glans) kuvame ukuhlangana njenge- balanoposthitis.Ukusoka kungavimbela i-balanoposthitis, noma i-balanitis isengenzeka ngokwehlukana. 
I-Posthitis ingaba nezimbangela ezithathelwanayo ezifana nama-bacteria noma isikhunta, noma izimbangela ezingezona ezithathelwanayo ezifana ne- contact dermatitis noma i- psoriasis .Ukuvuvukala kungabangelwa yizinto ezicasulayo emvelweni.Izinto eziphilayo ezijwayelekile ezibandakanya i-candida, i-chlamydia, ne-gonorrhea.Isizathu kufanele sitholwe kahle ngaphambi kokuba kunikezwe ukwelashwa.Isici esijwayelekile sobungozi yisifo sikashukela . 
I-Posthitis ingaholela ku- phimosis, ukuqiniswa kwejwabu okwenza kube nzima ukuhlehlisa i-glans.I-posthitis ingaholela nasezilondweni ezingaphezulu kanye nasezifweni zama-lymph node. 
Inhlanzeko, ikakhulukazi ukuhlanzwa okuvamile kwe-glans, ngokuvamile kubhekwa njengokwanele ukuvikela ukutheleleka nokuvuvukala kwejwabu.Ukuhoxa okuphelele kwejwabu kungenzeka kungenzeki kubafana abangaphansi kweminyaka eyishumi kanti abanye kungenzeka bangakwazi ukulihoxisa ngokuphelele ijwabu labo ukuze balihlanze kuze kube sebeneminyaka eyevile kwengu-20. 
Sclerosing lymphangitis, eyaziwa nangokuthi lymphangiosclerosis noma lymphangitis sclerotic, yisimo isikhumba elinesimo isakhiwo cordlike ozungeza sulcus coronal we umthondo, noma egijima ubude shaft, esiye isibaluli ukuhlukumezeka ngesikhathi play ocansini ngamandla. : 43 
I-nonvenereal sclerosing lymphangitis iyisilonda esingajwayelekile se-penile esinezintambo ezincane, zensimbi ezibandakanya i-coronal sulcus futhi kwesinye isikhathi esikude nesikhumba se-penile esiseduze.Isimo sibandakanya ukuqina kwesitsha se-lymph esixhunywe emthanjeni osesithweni sangasese.Ingabukeka njengentambo ewugqinsi futhi ingazizwa njenge- vein eqinisiwe, ecishe yabalwa noma enemicu, kepha ijwayele ukungabelani ngombala oluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka nomthambo.Kungazwakala njengesigaxa esiqinile noma "umthambo" noma ngabe ipipi lincane, futhi ligqame kakhulu ngesikhathi sokwakhiwa.Lokhu kuphazamiseka kuvame kakhulu futhi kuvame ukwenzeka ngemuva kocansi olunamandla futhi kuxazululwe ngokuzenzekelayo. 
Ezimweni eziningi kuvame ukuhamba uma kunikezwe ukuphumula nokunakekelwa okuthe xaxa, ngokwesibonelo ngokusebenzisa izinto zokuthambisa.Ngisho ngaphandle kokuphumula noma ukunakekelwa okuncane, kwezinye izimo kuzomane kunyamalale ngemuva kwamasonto ambalwa uwedwa.Ukululama okuzenzakalelayo kungenzeka noma kuphi phakathi kwamasonto ambalwa kuye ezinyangeni ezimbalwa. 
Yize kungebona bonke abesilisa abakhuluphele kakhulu abanesimo sowesilisa esingcwatshiwe, abesilisa abangama-87% abathole ukwelashwa ngokuhlinzwa kwepipi elingcwatshiwe babikwa ukuthi bakhuluphele.Amafutha asesiswini abaluleke kakhulu nawo angakha indawo ekhuthaza ukukhula kwamagciwane nefungal.Ukukhuluphala kungakhuphula namathuba okuthuthuka kohlobo lwesifo sikashukela sohlobo II, olubonakala ngokwanda kokungenwa yizifo, okwenza kube nzima ukuphumelela futhi ngokushesha ukuphatha isimo sendoda esingcwatshiwe.Ukutheleleka okunjalo okuphindayo nakho kungaholela ekuvikelekeni kwesibazi, okungadala ukuthi isikhumba se-prepubic sigudluzele ngaphezulu komgogodla noglans, ngaleyo ndlela singene esikhunjeni seshaft futhi siholele ethangeni elingcwatshiwe. 
[1] [2] 
I-BXO yinqubo engapheli yokuvuvukala kwesikhumba ebangela i-sclerosis ye-glans, shaft, prepuce, noma i-urethra.Lokhu kungaholela ku-cicatrix yomthondo we-distal nokubanjwa kwawo. [1] 
I-Dysgenic dartos yisimo esivezwa ukungabi bikho kokuxhaswa kwesiduli kanye nokuqina kwesikhumba sangaphakathi kanye nokuntuleka kokunamathiselwa okufanele phakathi kwama-dartos nepipi.Lokhu kungavumela ipeni ukuthi likwazi "isibonakude" lingene esikhwameni, ngaleyo ndlela lenze ipipi elingcwatshiwe. [1] 
Ipipi elingcwatshiwe (elaziwa nangokuthi ipipi elifihliwe noma ipipi elihoxisayo ) yisimo sokuzalwa noma esizuziwe, lapho ipipi lifihlwe kancane noma ngokuphelele ngaphansi kwesikhumba.Kwaqala kwachazwa ngu- Edward Lawrence Keyes ngo-1919 njengokungabonakali kobudoda nokuthi kungcwatshwe ngaphansi kwesikhumba sesisu, sethanga, noma sesimfimfithi . [1]Olunye ucwaningo lwenziwa nguMaurice Campbell ngo-1951 ngenkathi ebika ukuthi isitho sangasese sangasese sangcwatshwa ngaphansi kwamafutha angaphansi kwesikhumba, i-perineum, i- hypogastrium kanye nethanga. 
Abantu abadala abanendoda engcwatshiwe bazophila ngesimo sabo noma benze izinhlelo zokwehlisa isisindo.Kodwa-ke, izinhlelo zokwehlisa isisindo zihamba kancane futhi imvamisa azithi "zithukulule" ipipi; ngaphezu kwalokho, inhlanzeko embi yokuhlangana komchamo ingaholela ekuthelelekeni kwezicubu ezithambile. 
Ngenkathi isimo singazixazulula ngaphandle kokungenelela ezinganeni ezisencane kakhulu, iziguli ekugcineni zingadinga ukuhlinzekwa okucacile kokuvuselela nokwelashwa okuphuthumayo uma ukutheleleka kukhona. [1] [2] [3] [4] [5] [6]Odokotela abahlinzayo abaphatha lesi simo kungaba abahlinzayo be-urologic noma abahlinzayo beplastiki. 
Izinketho zokuhlinza zingabandakanya ukuhlukaniswa kwemisipha exhuma isisekelo sendoda ethanjeni le-pubic; ukwenziwa kokufakwa kwezikhumba ukumboza izindawo zepenisi ezidinga isikhumba esingeziwe; i-liposuction isebenzisa i-catheters ukumunca amangqamuzana amafutha ngaphansi kwesikhumba endaweni ezungeze ipipi; isisu esiswini lapho kususwa khona amafutha amaningi nesikhumba esifundeni; i-escutheonectomy lapho kususwa khona iphedi lamafutha ngaphezulu nje kwendawo yenkantini; noma i-panniculectomy lapho kususwa khona i-panniculus, izicubu ezeqile nesikhumba esilenga phezu kwezitho zangasese namathanga.Ku-video ekhombisa ukusetshenziswa kwe-panniculectomy ekulungisweni kwenduku endala engcwatshwe, uDkt.Bryan Voelzke nozakwabo bagcizelele isidingo sokufaka iphedi yamafutha we-suprapubic ku-periosteum ye-symphysis pubis kanye nokubaluleka kokungadonsi phansi ukuhlangana kwepeno-scrotal kanye nokuhlangana kwepeno-kwesisu ukuze nje kuqhubeke ukuveza ipipi. 
I-Micropenis I-Phalloplasty Umthondo oboshiwe 
Izimbangela zokuzalwa zingafaka ukungakhuli kahle kwe-penile shaft ngokuntuleka kokunamathiselwe kwesikhumba se-shaft kushaft ye-penile.Yize kungavamile, kungafaka iphedi enkulu yama-pubic enkulu ngokungajwayelekile nezicubu eziqinile ezidonsa umthondo ngaphakathi.Ipipi elingcwatshwe ngokuzalwa lingalungiswa ngokuhlinzwa ebuntwaneni ngokunamathisela i-corpora cavernosa kuma-dartos bundles esisekelweni se-penile. [1] 
Ukulimala kwe-penile yisimo esiphuthumayo sezokwelapha esihlupha ipipi.Ukulimala okuvamile kufaka ukuphuka, ukuxoshwa, ukuklanywa, ukuboshwa, nokunqunywa. [1] 
Ukulimala kwe-degloving kanye ne-avulsion kufaka ukususwa kwesikhumba somthondo, okuyisimo esiphuthumayo sezokwelapha.Ukwelashwa kwalokhu kulimala kubandakanya ukuvalwa kwesikhumba esidabukile, noma ukufakelwa kwesikhumba ukufaka isikhumba esilahlekile ekulimaleni.Ukufakwa kwesikhumba kwakhiwe ukuzama ukugcina ukusebenza kwe-erectile nokuzwa. 
Ukulimala ngokuklinyeka endodeni, okubizwa nangokuthi ukulimala ejele, okubangelwa izinwele, amabhande enjoloba, noma ezinye izinto kungukulimala kwesibili kwezicubu ezithambile ezinganeni. [1] [2]Ukuklinyeka kwezinwele kungaba nzima ukukuxilonga ngenxa yokwakheka kwepenisi; izinwele ezibangela ukuklinywa zingafihlwa ngaphansi kwe-coronal sulcus uma zivuvukile. [3]Kubantu abadala, ukulimala ngokuklinywa okudinga ukwelashwa kungadalwa yizinto ezahlukahlukene ezisetshenziselwa inhloso yokwanelisa ngokocansi, ukunweba isikhathi sokwakhiwa, noma i- enuresis, kufaka phakathi izindandatho zensimbi, okumele zisuswe ngezinsimbi ezikhethekile zokusika. 
Into nayo ingasuswa ngokudicilela phansi ipipi. [1] [2]Ngoba i-vasculature yepenisi icindezelwe, izinkinga eziningi zingavela ekulimaleni kokuklinywa, kuya ngokuthi imithambo, imithambo, noma yomibili icindezelwe, kufaka phakathi ukuvinjelwa kwemithambo okuncane, okuguqukayo; i-ischemic necrosis; esibhibhayo futhi izinso umonakalo ; i-lymphedema ; isilonda; i-fistula e-urethrocutaneous, ukulahlekelwa ukuzwa; ukulimala kwe-urethral; ispsis ; kanye ne- autoamputation . [2] 
Indandatho yomshado Indandatho yensimbi Ibhodlela Ibhande lobumsulwa 
Ukulimala okujwayelekile kwezicubu ezithambile kungukulimala kokubanjwa okubandakanya ipipi elibanjwe uziphu; lokhu kulimala kuvame kakhulu ezinganeni ezisencane ezingasokile futhi ezihlala zikha phezulu.Zelashwa ngokususa uziphu nge- anesthesia yendawo kusetshenziswa umsiki wethambo, ukuthambisa, noma i-hacksaw, ukuqaqa uziphu, noma ukususa izicubu ezithintekile, futhi kungavinjelwa ezimweni eziningi ngokusoka . [1] [2]Uma ingelashwa ngokushesha, izicubu abathintekayo kungaba bandisa futhi batheleleke. 
Ukuphuka kwepenile kungumphumela wokuqhekeka kwe-tunica albuginea. Zijwayelekile kakhulu futhi zingahle zivele ngokuqhekeka okuncane noma okuphelele kwe-urethral, yize lokhu kungavamile. 
[1] [2] [3] Ukulimala kwe-urethral kwenzeka kuma-10-38% wamacala. [4]Ukwephuka kulashwa ngokuhlinzwa okuphuthumayo, futhi kungatholakala ukuthi kune- ultrasound, ikakhulukazi ezimeni zezingane. [1] [2] [3]Ukwephuka kwePenile kubangelwa ukuhlukumezeka kwesitho sangasese esime mpo, imvamisa ngokukugoba ngokuzumayo ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini nomlingani owamukelayo ngaphezulu komlingani ongena, noma ngesikhathi sokushaya indlwabu .Kubonakala ngomsindo omkhulu ophumayo ngesikhathi sokulimala, umphumela wokuqhuma kwe-tunica albuginea.Ezinye izimpawu zibandakanya ubuhlungu obukhulu, ukulahlekelwa ukwakhiwa, nokuvuvukala. 
[5]Izimpawu zokulimala kwe-urethral zifaka i-hematuria, igazi e-meatus, ne-dysuria. 
[4]Uma kushiywe kungalashwa, izinkinga zibangela amacala angama-28-53%; lokhu kufaka ukugobeka unomphela kwenduku, i-fistula, i- urethral diverticulum, i- priapism, kanye nokungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile . [5] 
Hard flaccid syndrome (HFS), eyaziwa nangokuthi flaccid kanzima (hf), okumiyo ubuhlungu elinesimo lulwimi ngendlela elukhuni umthondo isimo flaccid, ethambile glans isimo uqonde, ubuhlungu bamathambo okhalo, ongaphakeme libido, Erectile Dysfunction, ubuhlungu Erectile, ubuhlungu ku ejaculation, penile izinguquko sezinzwa (ndikindiki noma coldness), yehlisa urinary izimpawu pheshana, ukusikwa we esitezi okhalo imisipha, nokucindezeleka ngokwengqondo.Okunye izikhalazo zihlanganisa rectal futhi isizalo ukungakhululeki, izandla abandayo futhi izinyawo, umuzwa eziyize noma ihlukane ngaphakathi kushaft penile.Iningi leziguli ze-HFS zikuma-20s-30s kanti izimpawu zalo zithinta kakhulu izinga lomuntu lokuphila. [1] 
Abagulayo ngokuvamile babika ukuqala kwezimpawu ngemuva kokuhlukumezeka ngenxa yokuhlukumezeka ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini noma ukushaya indlwabu okunzima, ikakhulukazi ukulimala okubuhlungu phansi kwepenisi eqondile, [1] okungenzeka kuthinte umthambo we-dorsal we-penis, i- bulbourethral kanye nemithambo ye-pudendal, kanye ne- pudendal ne- dorsal nerve yomthondo .Izinguquko zezinzwa nezombhalo we-Penile, kanye nezinguquko ekubukekeni, ziyizimpawu zesimo futhi zisebenza ukuhlukanisa i-HFS ku-classic pelvic pain syndrome noma i- BPH. 
Kokubili imithelela yezinto eziphilayo nezingokwengqondo ifaka isandla kulesi simo ngokuguqula ukunikezwa kwemithambo yegazi emisipheni yangaphansi ne-penis.Omunye umbono uphakamisa ukuthi i-HFS ingumphumela wengcindezi yokuqala edala ukulwa okungajwayelekile noma ukuphendula ngendiza okuholele ekwandisweni kokuzwelana kwemisipha ye-pelvis ngegatsha le- perineal le -pudendal nerve.Ngokulandelayo, kudedelwa i-adrenaline, i- noradrenaline ne- cortisol emicimbini yezinzwa esebenza kahle egqugquzela ukwanda kokugeleza kwegazi kuye emisipheni ye -bulbospongiosus, ischiocavernous kanye nelevator ani kanye nokuncipha kwemisipha okuqhubekayo okuholela ekuvinjelweni kokuphuma kwemithambo ephuma epeni ngokucindezela kwe i-dorsal vein ejulile kanye ne-pelvic myoneuropathy eseceleni kokuvuvukala kwe- neurogenic . u 
Ukwelashwa kungabandakanya imishanguzo yokuphathwa kobuhlungu, i-pelvic floor therapy, i-biofeedback, namasu wokunciphisa ukucindezeleka.Amadoda abhekene nokukhathazeka noma ukucindezeleka angazuza ekwelulekeni. 
NgoDisemba 28, 2020 iwebhusayithi yeHardflaccidinfo idalelwe ukuqoqa imininingwane ngeHardflaccid nokusabalalisa. 
I-Webbed penis eyaziwa nangokuthi i-penis efihliwe noma efihliwe yisimo esitholwayo noma sokuzalwa lapho isikhumba se-scrotal sidlulela ku-ventral penile shaft.Umgogodla we-penile ungcwatshwe esikhwameni noma uboshwe ku-scrotal midline ngesibaya noma ngewebhu yesikhumba.Imizimba ye-urethra neye-erectile imvamisa ijwayelekile.I-Webbed penis ivame ukungabonakali, kepha ukubukeka kwezimonyo kuvame ukungamukeleki.Lesi simo singalungiswa ngamasu okuhlinza. 
[1] [2] [3] [4] 
Ukungasebenzi kahle kwe-Erectile ( ED ), okubizwa nangokuthi ukungabi namandla, wuhlobo lokungasebenzi kahle kocansi lapho ipipi lihluleka ukuba khona noma ukuhlala liqondile ngesikhathi sokwenza ucansi.Kuyinkinga ejwayelekile yezocansi emadodeni. [1]Ngokuxhumeka kwayo ekuzicabangeni nasezinkinga ebudlelwaneni bezocansi, ukungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile kungadala ukulimala kwengqondo. 
Cishe ku-80% wamacala, izimbangela zomzimba zingabonakala. [1]Lokhu kufaka phakathi isifo senhliziyo nemithambo yegazi ; isifo sikashukela ; izinkinga zemizwa, njengalezo ezilandela i- prostatectomy ; hypogonadism ; nemiphumela emibi yezidakamizwa .Cishe i-10% yamacala ukungabi namandla kwengqondo, okubangelwa yimicabango noma imizwa; [1] lapha, kunempendulo enamandla ekwelashweni kwe-placebo . 
Igama ukungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile alisetshenziswanga kwezinye iziphazamiso zokwakhiwa, njenge- priapism. 
Ukwelashwa kubandakanya ukubhekana nezimbangela ezisemqoka, ukuguqulwa kwendlela yokuphila, nokubhekana nezinkinga zengqondo. [1]Ezimweni eziningi, ukwelashwa kuzanywa yizidakamizwa, ikakhulukazi i- PDE5 inhibitors (njenge- sildenafil ), evula imithambo yegazi, evumela igazi eliningi ukuba ligeleze ngezicubu zesiponji zepenisi (ngokufana nokuvula i-valve ngokuqhubekayo ukuze kuvunyelwe amanzi amaningi faka ipayipi lomlilo).Ezinye izindlela zokwelapha, ezingasetshenziswa kakhulu, zifaka phakathi i- prostaglandin pellets, efakwe ku- urethra ; ama-relaxant-muscle muscle kanye nama-vasodilator, afakwe kumthondo; ukufakwa kwe-penile ; amaphampu omthondo ; nokuhlinzwa okwakha kabusha imithambo yegazi . 
Izimpawu 
I-ED ivame ukuba nomthelela enhlalakahleni engokomzwelo yabo bobabili abesilisa nabalingani babo.Amadoda amaningi awafuni ukwelashwa ngenxa yemizwa yokuphoxeka.Cishe ama-75% wamacala atholakala we-ED awalashwa. 
It is defined as the "persistent or recurrent inability to achieve and maintain a penile erection of sufficient rigidity to permit satisfactory sexual activity for at least 3 months."[1] 
Isummer i-penile syndrome (eyaziwa nangokuthi yi-'Lions Mane Penis ') yisimo sezokwelapha sezingane sonyaka esibonakala ngokubomvu, ukuvuvukala (i- edema ), kanye nokulunywa ( pruritus ) kwesikhumba se-penile. [1] 
Ihlobo le-penile syndrome livame ukubangelwa i- chigger eluma epenis, noma, ngokungajwayelekile ngokuvezwa kwesifunda sangasese ezitshalweni ezinjenge-poison ivy, sumac ne-oki. [1] [2]Iningi lamacala lenzeka ezinyangeni zasehlobo, nezingubo ezihambisana nesimo sezulu esishisayo okwenza ukuthintana kwe-penis-arachnid ne-penis-plant kube lula kakhulu. 
Imithi yokwelashwa yokuqala yehlobo le-penile syndrome ifaka ama- antihistamine omlomo nezingcindezi ezibandayo .Ezimweni ezimbi kakhulu lapho ogulayo esezinhlungwini ezinzima noma engakwazi ukudlulisa umchamo, kubhekwa i- systemic corticosteroids. [1] 
Isifo sikaPeyronie yisifo esixhuma izicubu esihilela ukukhula kwamapuleti anemicu ezicutshini ezithambile zepipi .Ngokukhethekile, amafomu wesicubu esibomvu ku-tunica albuginea, umgogodla wesicubu ozungeze i- corpora cavernosa, obangela ubuhlungu, ukugobeka okungavamile, ukungasebenzi kahle kwe-erectile, ukuqaqanjelwa, ukulahlekelwa yibhande kanye nokunciphisa. [1] 
Imbangela yesifo sikaPeyronie ayaziwa.Noma kunjalo, kungenzeka ukuthi kungenxa yokwakheka kocwecwe ngaphakathi kwepenisi ngenxa yokuhlukumezeka okuphindaphindayo noma ukulimala ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini noma komzimba. [1] 
Izici ezinobungozi zibandakanya isifo sikashukela, isivumelwano sikaDupuytren, i- plantar fibromatosis, ukuhlukunyezwa kwe-penile, ukubhema, ukuphuza ngokweqile , ukuthambekela kofuzo, kanye nefa laseYurophu. [1] [2] 
Le ultrasound iveza izingxenye ezihlukanisiwe zepenisi ezindaweni ezahlukahlukene esigulini esinesifo sikaPeyronie.Isithombe esiphezulu sikhombisa ukwakheka komzimba okujwayelekile kanti isithombe esingezansi sikhombisa izicubu ezibomvu kwi- tunica albuginea (umthondo).Izicubu ezibomvu zihlala endaweni futhi zibhekele ukukhubazeka okuphawuleka kwesifo sikaPeyronie (ukugobeka nokuncipha). 
Udokotela we-urologist angakwazi ukuxilonga lesi sifo futhi asikisele ukwelashwa.I-ultrasound inganikeza ubufakazi obuqand 'ikhanda besifo sikaPeyronie, esinquma ukuphuma kwesisu noma okunye ukuphazamiseka. [1] 
Kulinganiselwa ukuthi kuthinta cishe amadoda ayi-10%.Isimo siba ngokuvame kakhulu ngeminyaka. 
Izindlela eziningi zokwelapha ngomlomo sezifundwe kepha imiphumela kuze kube manje ixutshiwe. [1]Abanye babheka ukusetshenziswa kwezindlela ezingezona ezokuhlinzwa njengokuphikisana ". [2] 
I-Collagenase clostridium histolyticum kubikwa ukuthi izosiza ngokudiliza i-collagen eyeqile kupipi.Kwavunyelwa ukwelashwa kwesifo sikaPeyronie yi-FDA ngo-2013. 
Ukwelashwa okugxilwe ngaphandle kwe-shockwave kuyindlela yokwelashwa engeyona ehlaselayo ebandakanya ukudlulisa izingqimba ze-acoustic nge-plaque, ezingayidiliza ngaphezulu kwezikhathi eziyisithupha kuya kweziyishumi nambili. [1] [2]Ukwelashwa kusebenza kakhulu emadodeni anamaPeyronie amancane. 
Ukuhlinzwa, okufana "nokusebenza kweNesbit" (okuqanjwe ngoReed M. Nesbit (1898-1979), udokotela wase-American urologist e- University of Michigan ), [1] kuthathwa njengesixazululo sokugcina futhi kufanele kwenziwe kuphela ngomchamo onekhono kakhulu odokotela abahlinzayo abanolwazi ngamasu akhethekile wokuhlinza okulungisa.Ukufakwa kwe-penile kungahle kufaneleke ezimweni ezisezingeni eliphakeme. [2] 
Kulinganiselwa ukuthi kuthinta cishe amadoda ayi-10%.Isimo siba ngokuvame kakhulu ngeminyaka. [1]Iminyaka yobudala ekuqaleni kwesifo yiminyaka engama-55-60. [2] 
Isimo sichazwe okokuqala ngo-1561 ngokuxhumana phakathi kuka- Andreas Vesalius noGabriele Falloppio ngokuhlukile nguGabriele Falloppio.Lesi simo sibizwa ngoFrançois Gigot de la Peyronie, owasichaza ngo-1743. 
Izinga elithile lokugobeka lobudoda lithathwa njengelivamile, njengoba amadoda amaningi ezalwa enalesi simo sobungozi, esivame ukubizwa ngokuthi ukugobeka kokuzalwa.Lesi sifo singadala ubuhlungu; izilonda eziqinile, ezinkulu, ezifana nentambo (izicubu ezibomvu ezaziwa ngokuthi "amapuleti"); noma ukugobeka kwendoda ngokungajwayelekile lapho imile ngenxa yokuvuvukala okungapheli kwe- tunica albuginea (CITA). 
Ukulimala kwepenile Ukusoka Ukuphuka kwepenile Ukubheka phambili I-Phimosis Isifo sikaPeyronie Izifo ezithathelwana ngocansi Isifo esingalapheki se-prostatitis / esingapheli se-pelvic pain syndrome 
Priapus, ingane ngesiGreki unkulunkulu wenzalo, ephawuleka oversized, akhe unomphela ukwakhiwa, okuyinto emenza yezokwelapha eside priapism.Abanye abacwaningi bakholelwa ukuthi ukuboniswa kwepipi likaPriapus kubhekiselwe kwisifo se-penile, nokuthi imidwebo kaPriapus yasetshenziselwa ukunqanda lesi sifo. 
IPenile Artery Shunt Syndrome (PASS) yisimo somtholampilo se-iatrogenic esichazwe okokuqala nguTariq Hakky, uChristopher Yang, uJonathan Pavlinec, uKamal Massis, noRafael Carrion ngaphakathi koHlelo Lwezocansi eMnyangweni Wezokwelapha, e-University of South Florida naseRicardo Munarriz, waseBoston University School of Medicine Department of Urology ngo-2013.Kungaba imbangela yokungasebenzi kahle kwe-Erectile kwiziguli ezenze iPenile Revascularization Surgery. 
Ukuhlanganiswa kwe-Coil Percutaneous yomthambo we-obturator we-aberrant kwenziwa.Ukuhamba kwe-arterial kuthuthuke ngokushesha ngomthambo we-dorsal penile artery, futhi ukuqaqanjelwa okusheshayo kwabonwa ngaphezul kwe-glans penis.Inqubo yokuthumela, isiguli sathola ukuthuthuka ngokushesha ekusebenzeni kwe-erectile. 
IPenile Revascularization iyindlela ekhethekile yokwelashwa ngemithambo-yokuhlinzwa ye-Erectile Dysfunction.Ukubonisana Kwamazwe Ngamazwe Kwezokungasebenzi Ngokobulili Kwango-2009 kunconywe ukuthi ukuvuselelwa kwemithambo yegazi kukhawulelwe kubantu abangabhemi, abesilisa abangaphansi kweminyaka yobudala engama-55 abane-stenosis ehlukanisiwe yomthambo wangaphakathi we-pudendal ngokungabikho kokuvuza okunobuthi. [1]Iziguli ezinokukhubazeka okuqhubekayo kwe-erectile ngemuva kwe-revascularization zingazuza ngokuphinda i-penile duplex ultrasound kanye ne-pelvic angiography ukuhlola isimo se-bypass graft nokukhipha ubukhona be-PASS njengesizathu.Ukusabalala komthambo we-obturator we-aberrant ovela emthanjeni ophansi we-epigastric cishe u-10.5%. 
[2]Uma umthambo we-obturator we-aberrant uboniswa ngamehlo avela kumthambo ophansi we-epigastric ngaphambi kokuhlinzwa kwe-penile revascularization, kufanele kucatshangelwe ekusebenziseni omunye umthambo womthombo noma ekuhlanganiseni ukugwema ukwakhiwa kwePenile Artery Shunt Syndrome ehlangane naleli cala elichaziwe. 
IPenile Artery Shunt Syndrome (PASS) ekuqaleni ichazwe esigulini esathola iPenile Revascularization Surgery ye-cavernosal artery stenosis ehlukanisiwe lapho kungekho khona ubungozi besistimu yemithambo yegazi.I-anastomosis yokuphela kokuphela komthambo we-epigastric ongaphansi kwesobunxele kumthambo we-dorsal penile artery wenziwa kusetshenziswa inqubo echazwe ngaphambili. 
[1]Ngemuva kokuhlinzwa ngempumelelo kwe-revascularization kwezobuchwepheshe, isiguli saqhubeka saba nokungasebenzi kahle kwe-post-operative naphezu kokuqina okubhaliwe kokuxhunyelelwa kokuhlinzwa nguPenile Duplex Ultrasonography.I-pelvic angiography yenziwa esigulini, kwembula umthambo we-obturator we- aberrant ovela emthanjeni ophansi we-epigastric .Ucwaningo luveze ukugeleza okuvilaphayo okuboniswa ngokusebenzisa i-anastomosis kuya emthanjeni we-dorsal penile artery, ngokugeleza okuphezulu emthanjeni we-epigastric ongaphansi kwesobunxele kumthambo we-obturator nasemagatsheni awo.Lokhu kwagcina ngokuncipha kokugeleza kwegazi okuya endondeni. 
Ukubuyiselwa kwesikhumba kuyinqubo yokwandisa isikhumba esithweni sangasese sokwakha kabusha isitho esifana nejwabu, elisuswe ngokusoka noma ukulimala.Ukubuyiselwa kwesikhumba kufezwa ngokuyinhloko ngokwelula isikhumba esisele senhloko yendoda, kepha izindlela zokuhlinza zikhona futhi.Ukubuyiselwa kwakha isithombe sejwabu, kepha izicubu ezikhethekile ezisuswe ngesikhathi sokusoka azikwazi ukubuyiselwa.Ukuvuselelwa kwangempela kwejwabu kusalingwa ngalesi sikhathi.Ezinye izinhlobo zokubuyiselwa zibandakanya ukuvuselelwa okuyingxenye kuphela ezimweni zokusika okuphezulu lapho osokile ezwa khona ukuthi osokile ususe isikhumba esiningi kakhulu nokuthi asikho isikhumba esanele ukuze ama-erections akhululeke. 
[1] 
Ngesikhathi sokubuyiselwa ngokwandiswa kwezicubu, isikhumba se-penile esisele sidonswa phambili phezu kwe-glans, futhi ukungezwani kugcinwa ngesandla noma ngosizo lwento yokubuyiselwa kwejwabu. 
Izindlela ezenziwa ngesandla zivame ukusetshenziswa ngamadoda kuqala ukuqala ukubuyiselwa, kepha zingasetshenziswa kunoma yisiphi isigaba senqubo yokubuyisela, futhi zibhekise kusidingo sombuyisi ukuze azigcinele mathupha ukubamba isikhumba ngeminwe esebenzisa enye yezindlela ezahlukahlukene ukubekwa ngomunwe. 
Amadivayisi amaningi wokubuyiselwa kwejwabu abamba isikhumba nge- tape noma ngaphandle kwawo nawo ayatholakala kwezentengiso.Ukungezwani okuvela kulawa madivayisi kungasetshenziswa ngezisindo, imichilo enwebeka, noma ukwehla kwamandla emali njengendlela yokusunduza isikhumba siye phambili endondeni, noma ngokuhlanganiswa kwalezi zindlela. 
Isibonelo sedivayisi esebenzisa izintambo ezinwebeka indlela ye-T-Tape, eyakhiwa ngeminyaka yama-1990s ngomqondo wokuvumela ukubuyiswa kwenzeke ngokushesha okukhulu. 
Izindlela zokwehla kwamandla emali zibandakanya ukuvala indawo ephakathi kwe-glans nesikhumba esidonswe phezu kwayo kusetshenziswa okokuqinisa (okuvame ukusetshenziswa izingono zamabhodlela ezingane), futhi kungagcwala isikhumba noma ibhaluni elibekwe ngaphansi kwesikhumba. 
Inani lokungezwani elikhiqizwe nganoma iyiphi indlela kumele lilungiswe ukugwema ukubanga ukulimala, ubuhlungu, noma ukungaphatheki kahle, futhi linikeze umkhawulo ezingeni lapho isikhumba esisha singakhuliswa khona. 
Kukhona ingozi yezicubu ezilimaza kakhulu ngokusebenzisa ukungezwani okweqile noma ukufaka ingcindezi isikhathi eside kakhulu.Amawebhusayithi mayelana nokubuyiselwa kwejwabu ayahlukahluka ezincomweni zawo, kusukela ekuphakamiseni uhlobo lwemali elinganisene yokuqina olusetshenziswe amahora amaningana ngosuku,kuye ezincomeni zezikhathi zokungezwani okuphezulu okufakwa imizuzu embalwa ngosuku, njengamasu wezandla. 
Esikhundleni sokukhulisa isikhumba esisha noma kuze kube yilapho isikhumba esanele sesikhulile ngokwandiswa kwezicubu, amanye amadoda angakhetha ukusebenzisa okokugcina ukubamba isikhumba esisele, uma sikhona, ngaphezu kwama-glans ngendlela efana ne- kynodesme yasendulo yamaGrikhi.Njengoba i-glans ulwelwesi lwangaphakathi, ekuqaleni luvikelwe ijwabu lize lisuswe ngesikhathi sokusoka, inhloso yokugcina izindlela ukuphindaphinda isembozo esivikelayo se-glans. 
Uma inani elanele lesikhumba likhona ukugcina ukumbozwa kwe-glans ngesikhumba se-penile esisele, umuntu angasebenzisa ikhava yokufakelwa etholakalayo ethengiswayo.Izibonelo zokumbozwa okunjalo okufakelwayo zifaka ijwabu lokufakelwa elenziwe nge- latex elimboza izingcwecwe endaweni enomswakama, nesembatho sangaphansi esisonga ipipi ngendwangu ethambile ekabili ehighod "hood" ukunciphisa ukungqubuzana glans. 
Izindlela zokuhlinza zokubuyiselwa kwejwabu, ezaziwa ngokuthi ukwakhiwa kabusha kwejwabu, imvamisa zibandakanya indlela yokuxhunyelelwa kwesikhumba engxenyeni esekude ye-penile shaft.Isikhumba kuwo ngokuvamile othathwe scrotum, equkethe okufanayo imisipha bushelelezi (eyaziwa ngokuthi dartos fascia ) njengoba enza isikhumba wenduku. 
Enye indlela ifaka inqubo eneziteji ezine lapho i-penile shaft ingcwatshwa khona esikhwameni isikhathi esithile.Amasu anjalo ayabiza, futhi anamandla okuveza imiphumela engagculisi noma izinkinga ezinkulu ezihlobene nokuxhunyelelwa kwesikhumba.I- frenulum nayo ingakhiwa kabusha. [1] 
Isakhamuzi saseBritish Columbia uPaul Tinari wabanjwa phansi wasokwa eneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili kulokho athe "kuyindlela ejwayelekile yokujezisa" ukushaya indlwabu ezikoleni zokuhlala .Ngemuva kwenkantolo ukubuyiselwa kwejwabu likaTinari kwahlanganiswa nguMnyango Wezempilo waseBritish .Udokotela ohlinzayo wepulasitiki owenza ukubuyiselwa kwaba ngowokuqala eCanada ukwenza lo msebenzi, futhi wasebenzisa inqubo efana naleyo echazwe ngenhla. 
Kube nentshisekelo ekhulayo emithini yokuvuselela kabusha njengendlela yokuvuselela ijwabu lesilisa lomuntu.Le nketho, ngokungafani nokubuyiselwa kwejwabu, ingaholela ekubuyisweni kabusha kwejwabu lesilisa lomuntu.Amaphayona emkhakheni wemithi yokuzivuselela afaka phakathi uDkt Anthony Atala weWake Forest Institute for Regenerative Medicine (WFIRM). 
Ekuqaleni kuka-2010, Foregen, i-Italian engenzi-nzuzo kuqala ekuhlanganiseni inhlangano esizinikezele ukuthola amaqembu nesithakazelo ucwaningo ngenjongo yokuthandana regrowing iduna womuntu ijwabu usebenzisa amakhono okuzivuselela we -matrix extracellular, e amathemba ekugcineni akwazi ukondla ukuvuselelwa ukuze abantu besilisa abasokile, yasungulwa.Ayikwazi ukwenza kanjalo, u-Foregen ushintshele enhlanganweni engenzi nzuzo, encike eminikelweni yokusiza ukufeza ucwaningo lwayo, ngezikhungo zayo. 
Isilingo somtholampilo sasihlelelwe ukuphela kuka-2010, ngaphambi kokuthi sishintshele kunhlangano yaso yocwaningo, kepha kwakungekho minikelo eyenele yokuyilandela.Inhloso yafinyelelwa ngoJuni 2012 futhi bakwazile ukuthola ilabhorethri nokubambisana kososayensi bamakhemikhali ezinto eziphilayo kanye nochwepheshe bemithi yokuzivuselela.Imiphumela evela esivivinyweni sabo sokuqala somtholampilo, ukuhlukanisa amajwabu ezinkomo ukudala i-matrix yangaphandle, yakhishwa ngoFebhuwari 2013 futhi kusukela ngoMashi 2018, yayiphothule ukuvivinywa kwejwabu lomuntu, elashicilelwa ngo-2017, futhi lalisendleleni yokubuyekezwa kontanga njengoba wango-2018.Ukuhlolwa kwemitholampilo ezifundweni zabantu kungafinyelelwa ngasekupheleni kuka-2021. 
Indlela ehlongozwayo izobandakanya ukubeka isiguli ngaphansi kwe-anesthesia ejwayelekile.Isikhumba se-penile sizovulwa esikhungweni sokusoka, kuyilapho izicubu zesibazi zonakele ngokuhlinzwa.Kuzobe sekusetshenziswa isixazululo se-biomedical kuzo zombili izinhlangothi zesilonda, okwenza ijwabu liphinde livuseleleke ne- DNA kumaseli wesiguli.Isikafula esibolayo esibolayo (okusho ukuthi, ijwabu elingasetshenziswanga le- cadaver ) lizosetshenziselwa ukunikela ukwesekwa kwejwabu elisha kabusha.Ngenkathi izinkundla zomphakathi zisizile engxoxweni yamathuluzi amanje nezithiyo ezibheke kule ndlela, 
Emhlabeni wamaGrikhi namaRoma izitho zangasese eziphelele, kuhlanganisa nejwabu, zazithathwa njengezimpawu zobuhle, ezenhlalakahle, nezobudoda. [1] Emiphakathini yakudala yamaGrikhi neyamaRoma (ngekhulu lesi-8 BC kuya kwelesi-6 leminyaka AD), ukuvezwa kwama-glans kwakuthathwa njengokunyanyezelayo nokungafanele, futhi akuhambisani nenhloso yamaGreki yobunqunu be-gymnastic. [1]Amadoda anamajwabu amafushane ayegqoka i -kynodesme ukuvimbela ukuvezwa.Njengomphumela walolu hlazo emphakathini, indlela yokuqala yokubuyiselwa kwejwabu eyaziwa ngokuthi i- epispasm yayenziwa phakathi kwamaJuda athile eRoma lasendulo (ngekhulu lesi-8 BC kuya kwelesi-5 leminyaka AD). 
Ukuvuselelwa kwe-Foreskin kanye ne-penise ekhuliswe elebhu (ukuvuselelwa kwawo wonke umthondo) kungenzeka kungekudala.Ngo-2014, kwamenyezelwa ukuthi kungenzeka kube yiminyaka emihlanu kusukela kusimemezelo sokuqala.Akukacaci ukuthi ukungabi nejwabu elibuyiselwe noma ukumbozwa ngokugcwele kwama-glans kungaphazamisa yini ukufaka iscaffold sejwabu esithweni sangasese nokuvuselelwa okulandelayo. 
Isikhathi esidingekayo ukubuyisa ijwabu kusetshenziswa izindlela ezingezona ezokuhlinzwa sincike enanini lesikhumba esikhona ekuqaleni kwenqubo, izinga lokuzibophezela kwendaba, amasu asetshenzisiwe, izinga lemvelo lomzimba lepulasitiki, nobude bejwabu izifiso zomuntu ngamunye. 
Imiphumela yokubuyiselwa kokuhlinzwa iyashesha, kepha ivame ukuchazwa njengamaqembu angagculisi futhi amaningi ayeluleka ngokuhlinzwa. 
Ukubuyiselwa kwakha isithombe se- prepuce, kepha izicubu ezikhethekile ezisuswe ngesikhathi sokusoka azikwazi ukubuyiselwa.Izinqubo zokuhlinza zikhona ukunciphisa usayizi wokuvula lapho ukubuyiselwa sekuqediwe (njengoba kubonisiwe esithombeni ngenhla), noma kungancishiswa ngokuzibophezela okude kumbuso wokunweba isikhumba ukuvumela isikhumba esithe xaxa ukuqoqa ichopho. 
Ukubuyiselwa kwesikhumba kungumsuka wasendulo futhi kusukela emuva ekubuseni koMbusi waseRoma uTiberius (AD 14-37), lapho izindlela zokuhlinza zazithathwa ukwelula ijwabu labantu abazalwa benesikhumba sejwabu esifushane esingazange simboze i-glans ngokuphelele [1 ] noma i-glans evezwe ngokuphelele ngenxa yokusoka . [2]Futhi, phakathi neMpi Yezwe II amanye amaJuda aseYurophu afuna ukubuyiselwa kwejwabu ukuze agweme ukushushiswa ngamaNazi. 
Ijwabu lemvelo linezinto ezintathu eziyinhloko, ngaphezu kwemithambo yegazi, izinzwa nezicubu ezixhumene : isikhumba, esidalulwa ngaphandle; ulwelwesi lwamafinyila, okuyindawo ebusweni ethintana nepipi le-glans lapho ipipi liyi-flaccid; nebhande lemisipha ngaphakathi kwesihloko sejwabu.Ngokuvamile, isikhumba sikhula kalula ngokuphendula ukunwebeka kunokwakha ulwelwesi lwamafinyila.Indandatho yemisipha evamise ukubamba ijwabu livaliwe isuswe ngokuphelele kuningi lokusoka futhi ayikwazi ukuphinda ibhalwe kabusha, ngakho-ke ukumbozwa okuvela kuzindlela zokwelula kuvame ukukhululeka kakhulu kunalokho kwejwabu lemvelo.Yize kunjalo, ngokusho kwezinye izingqapheli, kunzima ukuhlukanisa ijwabu elibuyisiwe nejwabu lemvelo ngoba ukubuyiselwa kukhiqiza "isikhuthazo esivela njengokujwayelekile." [1] 
Kwamanye amadoda, ukubuyiselwa kwejwabu kunganciphisa izinkinga ezithile abazibanga ekusokeni kwabo.Izinkinga ezinjalo zibandakanya ukusikeka okuvelele (i-33%), isikhumba esanele se-penile sokwakhiwa okunethezeka (27%), i-erectile curvature kusuka ekulahlekelweni isikhumba okungalingani (16%), nobuhlungu nokopha lapho kwakhiwa / kuxhashazwa (17%).I-poll ibuye yabuza mayelana nokwaziswa noma ukubandakanyeka ekubuyiselweni kwejwabu futhi kwafakwa isigaba sokuphawula esivulekile.Abaphenduli abaningi namakhosikazi abo "babike ukuthi ukubuyiswa kuxazulule ukoma kwendoda esokiwe okungeyona eyemvelo, okubangele ukuhuzuka, ubuhlungu noma ukopha ngesikhathi sokuya ocansini, nokuthi ukubuyiselwa okunikeza ubumnandi obuhlukile, obukhulisa ukusondelana ngokocansi." [1]Indoda eyodwa ibike ukuthi ilahlekelwe kakhulu yimizwa ku-glans ngoba ijwabu lakhe belingekho. 
Kusungulwe amaqembu ahlukahlukene kusukela ngasekupheleni kwekhulu lama-20, ikakhulukazi eNyakatho Melika lapho ukusoka kwenziwe khona njalo ezinganeni.Ngo-1989, iNational Organisation of Restoring Men (NORM) yasungulwa njengeqembu elenza inzuzo elingenzi nzuzo lamadoda enza ukuvuselelwa kwejwabu.Ngo-1991, iqembu le-UNCircumcising Information and Resource Centres (UNCIRC) lasungulwa, [1] elahlanganiswa ne-NORM ngo-1994.Izahluko ze-NORM zisungulwe kulo lonke elase-United States, kanye nase-Canada, e-United Kingdom, e-Australia, e-New Zealand nase-Germany. 
EFrance, kunezinhlangano ezimbili ngalokhu. 
I- "Association contre la Mutilation des Enfants" AME (inhlangano elwa nokusikwa kwezingane), futhi muva nje i- "Droit au Corps" (kwesokudla emzimbeni). 
Ukunwetshwa kwezicubu kudala kwaziwa ukukhuthaza i- mitosis, kanti ucwaningo lukhombisa ukuthi izicubu zomuntu ezivuselelwe zinezimpawu zesicubu sokuqala. [1]Ngokungafani namasu ajwayelekile wokunwetshwa kwesikhumba, noma kunjalo, inqubo yokubuyiselwa kwejwabu ngokuhlinzwa ingathatha iminyaka eminingana ukuphothulwa. 
Iziguli ezenze i-penectomy engaphelele ngenxa yokuxilongwa komdlavuza womthondo zibike imiphumela efanayo yezocansi ngaphambi kokuhlinzwa. [1]Abelaphi bezokwelapha nabachwepheshe bayatholakala kuzwelonke e-United States futhi bangafinyeleleka ngezinsizakalo zomdlavuza ezikhethekile.Odokotela abaningi abahlinzayo noma izibhedlela bazohlinzeka lolu lwazi ngokusebenza.Iminyango yezinsizakalo zezempilo kahulumeni wasekhaya ingakwazi ukunikeza izeluleko, amagama, nezinombolo zokuxhumana. 
Umdlavuza, isibonelo, kwesinye isikhathi kudinga ukuthi kususwe ingxenye noma wonke umthondo. 
[1] Inani lobudoda elikhishiwe lincike ebucayi bomdlavuza.Amanye amadoda asuswe kuphela ichopho lomthondo.Kwabanye abanomdlavuza osuthuthuke kakhulu, wonke umthondo kufanele ususwe. 
Ezimweni ezingavamile, ukusokwa okushintshiwe nakho kuholele ekupheleleni okuphelele noma okuyingxenye, njengoDavid Reimer. 
Ngenxa yokutholakala komdlavuza odinga ukususwa ngokwengxenye noma okuphelele kwenduku, ukusekelwa kwabantu abakhishwe ipipi kungaba nzima ukuthola endaweni.Amanethiwekhi wokusekelwa kwewebhusayithi ayatholakala.Isibonelo, iwebhusayithi ye-American Cancer Society's Cancer Survivors Network inikeza imininingwane yokuthola amanethiwekhi wokusekela.I-Phalloplasty nayo iyindlela yokwakha kabusha ipipi. 
Ukugcizelela ukususwa kwawo womabili umthondo namasende, izitho zocansi zesilisa zangaphandle.Kwehlukile ekuthena, okungukukhishwa kwamasende kuphela, yize amagama kwesinye isikhathi esetshenziswa ngokungafani.Imiphumela engaba khona yokwelashwa ngokuthwebula inkulu kakhulu kunaleyo ehambisana nokuthena, njengoba ukukhishwa kwenduku kuphakamisa uchungechunge olwehlukile lwezinkinga.Kunezinhlobo ezahlukahlukene zezizathu zenkolo, zamasiko, zokujezisa, nezomuntu uqobo zokuthi kungani omunye engakhetha ukuzithena yena noma omunye umuntu.Ukucwaswa okuvunyelwayo kungabonakala njengendlela yokuguqulwa komzimba okuthuthukisa ukuxhumana komamukeli nomphakathi noma ukuzizwela.Ngokuqhathanisa, ukuthenwa okungavunyelwene, njengalokho kwenziwa ngesijeziso noma ngengozi, kungahle kube yisitho sangasese.Ukwelashwa komuntu osikiwe kuyahluka kuya ngokuthi inqubo ibivumelana noma cha. 
Ukuthenwa liyasetshenziswa njengesifenqo ukuba ubheke ukulahlekelwa zomuntu ngobudoda.Indoda kuthiwa iyacwaswa uma ilahlekelwa, noma incishwa, isiko ngokwesiko elihlotshaniswa nokuba yindoda, njengamandla noma ukuzimela. 
Kunezindlela ezahlukahlukene zokusika. 
Kokubili ipipi namasende kungasuswa ngasikhathi sinye kusetshenziswa into ebukhali, njengommese noma insingo noma izinkemba.Le ndlela ivame ukusetshenziswa odokotela abahlinzayo kwabesifazane abangama- transgender noma abadala benza amasiko noma amasiko enkolo.Izibopho zemithambo ezingacindezeli zingasetshenziswa futhi ekuhlinzeni kwezokwelapha ukunqamula ukujikeleza kwegazi nokunciphisa ukopha. 
Ngenye indlela, ipipi namasende kungasuswa ngezigaba ezihlukene ngesikhathi. 
Odokotela abahlinzayo bezokwelapha basebenzisa le ndlela lapho benza ukuhlinzekwa kwabesifazane abadlulayo abafuna ukuthi izitho zabo zangasese zisuswe ngaphezu kokuhlinzwa okuningi kokuphindisela ocansini (owesilisa nowesifazane), kunokuba kuhlalwe kanye.Kwelinye icala elibikiwe, owesifazane ozijula nobabili usebenzise le ndlela kuye, okokuqala ekhipha amasende akhe futhi kamuva nesitho sakhe sangasese, njengoba engakwazanga ukuthola ukuhlinzekwa okuqinisekisa ubulili endaweni yezokwelapha.Esinye isibonelo esasihilela owesifazane odlulayo one-schizophrenia eqinisa kancane intambo ezungeze isitho sakhe sangasese ukuze anqamule ukuphuma kwegazi. 
Imiphumela yesikhashana emfushane yokuthwebula ibandakanya ukopha, kanye nokutheleleka.Ngokomlando, ukufa nakho kwakuyinkinga eyayingaba khona, yize ukusabalala kuphikiswa. 
I-Biofiltration iyindlela yokulawula ukungcoliswa kusetshenziswa i- bioreactor equkethe izinto eziphilayo ukuze ithwebule futhi yonise ukungcola ngokwebhayoloji.Ukusetshenziswa okuvamile kufaka phakathi ukucubungula amanzi angcolile, ukuthwebula amakhemikhali ayingozi noma usilika ophuma emanzini, kanye ne- microbiotic oxidation yokungcola emoyeni. 
Ama-biofilters amaningi asebenzisa imidiya enjengesihlabathi, idwala elichotshoziwe, amatshe omfula, noma uhlobo oluthile lwepulasitiki noma impahla ye-ceramic emise ubuhlalu obuncane namasongo. 
Baku ( US : / b ɑː k u, B ɑː k u /, UK : / b AE k u, B AE k u / ; Azerbaijani [bɑˈcɯ] ( </img> ) inhloko -dolobha nedolobha elikhulu kunawo wonke e- Azerbaijan, kanye nedolobha elikhulu kunawo wonke oLwandle iCaspian kanye nesifunda saseCaucasus.I-Baku itholakala 28 metres (92 ft) ngaphansi kwezinga lolwandle, okuyenza ibe inhloko-dolobha kazwelonke elele emhlabeni wonke futhi ibe idolobha elikhulu kunawo wonke emhlabeni elingaphansi kwezinga lolwandle.I - Baku isogwini oluseningizimu yeNhlonhlo ye - Absheron, eduze kweBaku of Baku.Ekuqaleni kuka-2009, inani labantu basedolobheni lase-Baku lalilinganiselwa kubantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezimbili.Ngokusemthethweni, cishe ama-25% azo zonke izakhamuzi zezwe zihlala endaweni yedolobha lase- Baku.I-Baku iyidolobha elilodwa kuphela e-Azerbaijan. 
Lapho iZimbabwe ibuyela kumdlalo weTest ngomnyaka ka2011, uTaibu wakhethwa ukuthi adlale kumidlalo yeTest eyodwa leqembu leBangladesh, Pakistan kanye leNew Zealand lanxa ekhulume amazwi ahlabayo ngokuphathwa kwekhilikithi.Ushaye isigamu sekhulu ku-Test ngayinye kwemithathu. 
U-Taibu ube ngumdlali wesihlanu waseZimbabwe ukuthola ama-run angu-3,000 ngesikhathi efaka ama-run angu-53 (74) edlala neKenya e- Eden Gardens, e- Kolkata ngesikhathi seNdebe Yomhlaba ka-2011 ngomhla zingama-20 kuNdasa wezi-2011.Yena kanye no- Stuart Matsikenyeri baqophe umlando wokubambisana kuma-ODI ngewikhethi yesithupha ye- Zimbabwe (188) 
Ngomhla ziyi-10 kuJulayi 2012, uTaibu wabiza isikhathi somsebenzi wakhe oneminyaka engu-29.Uthe uzokwenza umsebenzi webandla kuphela.UTaibu utshele uZimeye ukuthi: “Ngizwa sengathi ubizo lwami lwangempela manje lulele ekwenzeni umsebenzi weNkosi, futhi nakuba nginenhlanhla futhi ngiziqhenya ngokudlalela izwe lami, isikhathi sesifikile sokuthi ngigxilise ingqondo yami yonke kuleyo ngxenye yempilo yami. impilo.” 
Ushaye ama-run angu-1,546 kuma-Test wabamba angu-57 nezintini ezinhlanu, ngesikhathi enza ama-run angu-3,393 kuma-ODI abambe angu-114 kanye nezigingqi ezingu-33.Uqeda engowesine oshaye ama-run amaningi e-Zimbabwe kuma-ODI kanye nesibili ukuxoshwa njengonompempe, ngemuva kuka- Andy Flower . 
Ngemva kokuthatha umhlalaphansi uTaibu wathuthela eLiverpool, eNgilandi . 
Wajoyina i-Hightown St. Mary's Cricket Club ngo-2016 njengomqeqeshi-umqeqeshi-ukuthuthukiswa-isikhulu esigabeni sesibili se- Liverpool & District Cricket Competition . 
[1]Ngesikhathi ebhala umlando wakhe wabona ukuthi kuzomele abuyele eZimbabwe.NgoJuni 2016 wamukele indima yokuba ngumxhumanisi weZimbabwe Cricket of selectors and development officer, ekhuthazwa nguPeter Chingoka .UBrendan Taylor noKyle Jarvis bashiya izivumelwano zesifunda ngoSepthemba 2017 ukuze bayodlalela iZimbabwe futhi, izithelo zemizamo kaTaibu yokubayenga ukuthi babuye. 
Ngo-2019, uTaibu wabhala incwadi enesihloko esithi 'Umgcini Wokholo', lapho ekhuluma ngesimo senhlalo nepolitiki eZimbabwe, ukushaywa kwakhe esemncane, umbono wakhe ngemva kokubona abadlali bekhilikithi abamhlophe ababenenhlanhla kanye nezinsongo ngokuthola izithombe zezidumbu.Ubengumqeqeshi ongakholakali 
UTatenda Taibu (owazalwa zi-14 kuNhlaba 1983) wayengumdlali wekhilikithi waseZimbabwe owayengukapteni weqembu lesizwe lekhilikithi laseZimbabwe.Uyena wicket-umgcini -batsman.Kusukela mhla ziyisi-6 kuNhlaba wezi-2004 kuya kumhla zi-5 kuMandulo wezi-2019, ubephethe irekhodi lokuba ukaputeni omncane kunabo bonke emlandweni ngesikhathi engukaputeni weqembu lakhe libhekene ne- Sri Lanka kwaze kwaba yilapho u- Rashid Khan wase- Afghanistan ethatha irekhodi. 
[1] 
NgoJulayi 2012 uTaibu, oneminyaka engu-29 kuphela, wanquma ukuyeka ukudlala ikhilikithi ukuze agxile emsebenzini wakhe esontweni.NgoZibandlela wezi-2018, kwabikwa ukuthi usebuyela emdlalweni wekhilikithi.Kamuva ngayo leyo nyanga, wadlalela ikhilikithi yesigaba sokuqala seBadureliya Sports Club emqhudelwaneni wePremier League ka -2018-19 eSri Lanka. 
UTaibu waqala umdlalo wakhe wokuqala wekhilikithi eneminyaka engu-16 ubudala, futhi waqala ukudlala eqenjini lesizwe laseZimbabwe ngo-2001, eneminyaka engu-18.Ngo-2003, waqokwa njengephini likakaputeni ku- Heath Streak ohambweni lweqembu lase- England, futhi waqokwa ukapteni kazwelonke ngo-Ephreli 2004, okumenza waba ukapteni omncane kunabo bonke emlandweni we-Test, kwaze kwaba yilapho u-Rashid Khan wase-Afghanistan ethatha irekhodi ngo-2019.URashid Khan wayemncane ngezinsuku ezingu - 8 kuTaibu ngenkathi engukaputeni we - Afghanishtan ibhekene neBangladesh . 
Wabuyela eqenjini laseZimbabwe ochungechungeni olubhekene ne-India A ngoJulayi 2007, wabhalisa iminyaka eyikhulu.Ngenyanga elandelayo iZimbabwe isingathe iNingizimu Afrika ngochungechunge lwemidlalo emithathu ye-ODI futhi emdlalweni wokugcina u-Taibu washaya i-career best 107 engaphumanga.Bekuyikhulu lokuqala le-ODI ngumuntu waseZimbabwe ebhekene neNingizimu Afrika. 
Ngo-2010 uTaibu uqhubekile nokwenza kahle wathola amaphuzu angu-73 bedlala neNingizimu Afrika njengoba iZimbabwe iphume yonke ku-268.Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bajahe ingqikithi ngokukhululeka ngoHashim Amla no- AB de Villiers abashaye amakhulu eminyaka. [1] 
Ushaye ama-runs angu-98 eqenjini lakhe ku- ICC World Cup 2011 njengoba iqembu labo lanqoba ngama-run angu-175 lidlala neCanada eNagpur.U-Taibu udlale i-innings encomekayo esimweni okumele siwine kwiNdebe yoMhlaba. 
Isi-Azerbaijani savela egatsheni laseMpumalanga le- Oghuz Turkic ("Western Turkic")esasakazekela eCaucasus, eMpumalanga Yurophu,nasenyakatho ye-Iran, eNtshonalanga ye-Asia, ngesikhathi sokufuduka kweTurkic yasendulo . [4] IsiPheresiya nesi- Arabhu saba nomthelela olimini, kodwa amagama esi-Arabhu asakazwa ngokuyinhloko ngomxhumanisi wemibhalo yasePheresiya. [5]Isi-Azerbaijani, mhlawumbe silandela isi-Uzbek, ulimi lwesiTurkic isiPheresiya nezinye izilimi zase-Iranian eziye zaba nethonya elinamandla kulo—ikakhulukazi ku- phonology, syntax, nesilulumagama, kancane ku-morphology. 
Ulimi lwesiTurkic lwase-Azerbaijan kancane kancane lwathatha indawo yezilimi zase-Iranian endaweni manje eyinyakatho-ntshonalanga ye-Iran, kanye nezilimi ezihlukahlukene zeCaucasus nezilimi zase-Iranian ezikhulunywa eCaucasus, ikakhulukazi isi- Udi nesi- Azeri Esidala.Ekuqaleni kwekhulu le-16, lase liwulimi oluvelele kule ndawo. 
Kwakuwulimi olukhulunywayo enkantolo yamaSafavids, Afsharid namaQajars. 
Phakathi kuka c.Ngo-1900 nango-1930, kwakunezindlela eziningana ezincintisanayo zokuhlanganiswa kolimi lwesizwe endaweni manje eyi-Azerbaijan Republic, eyaduma izazi ezinjengoHasan bey Zardabi kanye noMmmad agha Shahtakhtinski.Ngaphandle komehluko omkhulu, wonke ayehlose ikakhulukazi ukwenza kube lula kubantu abangafundile ukufunda nokuqonda izincwadi.Bonke bakugxekile ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kwezakhi zesiPheresiya, isi-Arabhu, nesi-Europe kokubili ngolimi lwezwi nelokubhala futhi bafuna isitayela esilula nesithandwa kakhulu. 
Ukunqoba kweRussia iTranscaucasia ngekhulu le-19 kwahlukanisa umphakathi wezilimi ezifundeni ezimbili; iSoviet Union yathuthukisa ukuthuthukiswa kolimi kodwa yalubuyisela emuva kakhulu ngokushintsha kombhalo okubili okulandelanayo - kusukela kusiPheresiya kuya kusiLatini bese kuya kumbhalo wesiCyrillic - kuyilapho ama-Iranian Azerbaijani aqhubeka nokusebenzisa umbhalo wesiPheresiya njengoba ayehlale enza.Naphezu kokusetshenziswa kabanzi kwesi-Azerbaijani e- Azerbaijan Soviet Socialist Republic, yaba ulimi olusemthethweni lwase-Azerbaijan kuphela ngo-1956. [2] Ngemva kwenkululeko, iRiphabhulikhi yase-Azerbaijan yanquma ukushintshela embhalweni wesiLatini olungisiwe. 
Ukuthuthukiswa kwezincwadi zesi-Azerbaijani kuhlotshaniswa eduze ne-Anatolian Turkish, ebhalwe ngombhalo we-Perso-Arabic . 
Izibonelo zedethi yokuqoqwa kwayo eya ekhulwini le-14 noma ngaphambili.U-Kadi Burhan al-Din, u-Hesenoghlu, no- Imadaddin Nasimi basize ekusunguleni isi-Azerbaiijani njengolimi lokubhala ngekhulu le-14 ngokusebenzisa izinkondlo neminye imisebenzi.Umbusi nembongi u- Ismail I wabhala ngaphansi kwegama elithi Khatā'ī (elisho "isoni" ngesiPheresiya ) phakathi nekhulu leshumi nanhlanu. [3] [4] Phakathi nekhulu le-16, imbongi, umbhali nomcabango uFuzûlî wabhala ikakhulukazi ngesi-Azerbaijani kodwa wabuye wahumushela izinkondlo zakhe olimini lwesi-Arabhu nesiPheresiya . [3] 
U-Mohammad-Hossein Shahriar ungumuntu obalulekile ezinkondlweni zase-Azerbaijani. 
Umsebenzi wakhe obaluleke kakhulu u- Heydar Babaya Salam futhi uthathwa njengohamba phambili wezincwadi zesi-Azerbaijani futhi wazuza ukuthandwa emhlabeni okhuluma isiTurkic.Yahunyushelwa ezilimini ezingaphezu kuka-30. 
Maphakathi nekhulu le-19, izincwadi zesi-Azerbaijani zazifundiswa ezikoleni zaseBaku, eGanja, eShaki, eTbilisi naseYerevan.Kusukela ngo-1845, iye yafundiswa naseSaint Petersburg State University eRussia.Ngo-2018, izinhlelo zolimi lwesi-Azerbaijani nezincwadi zinikezwa e-United States emanyuvesi amaningana, okuhlanganisa i- Indiana University, UCLA, kanye neNyuvesi yaseTexas e-Austin .Iningi, uma kungezona zonke izifundo zolimi lwesi-Azerbaijani ezifundisa isi-North Azerbaijani esibhalwe ngombhalo wesiLatini hhayi isi-South Azerbaijani esibhalwe ngombhalo we-Perso-Arabic. 
Azerbaijani ( /ˌ AE z ər b aɪ dʒ AE n i, - ɑː n i / ) noma Azeri ( /z AE ɛər i, ɑː -, I-ə -/ ), ebizwa nangokuthi i- Azeri Turkic noma i- Azeri Turkish, iwulimi lwesiTurkic olukhulunywa ikakhulukazi abantu base -Azerbaijani, abahlala ikakhulukazi eRiphabhulikhi yase-Azerbaijan lapho kukhulunywa khona izinhlobonhlobo zaseNyakatho Azerbaijani, nasesifundeni sase- Azerbaijan e-Iran, lapho kukhulunywa khona izinhlobonhlobo ze-South Azerbaijani.Nakuba kunezinga eliphezulu kakhulu lokuqondana phakathi kwazo zombili izinhlobo zesi-Azerbaijani, kunomehluko omkhulu kuphonology, lexicon, morphology, syntax kanye nemithombo yamagama emalimboleko. 
Zombili izinhlobo zesi-Azerbaijani zingamalungu egatsha le-Oghuz lezilimi zesiTurkic.Uhlobo olujwayelekile lwesi-Azerbaijani saseNyakatho (esikhulunywa eRiphabhulikhi yase-Azerbaijan nase-Russia) lususelwe kulwimi lwesigodi lwase-Shirvani, kuyilapho i-Iranian Azerbaijani isebenzisa ulimi lwesigodi lwesi- Tabrizi njengezinhlobonhlobo zalo ezidumile.Kusukela i-Republic of Azerbaijan yakhululeka ngaphansi kweSoviet Union ngo-1991, inyakatho ye-Azerbaijani isebenzisa umbhalo wesiLatini.I-Iranian Azerbaijani ngakolunye uhlangothi ibilokhu isebenzisa futhi isaqhubeka nokusebenzisa umbhalo we- Perso-Arabic . -Azerbaijan luhlobene kakhulu ukuba Gagauz, Qashqai, Crimean Tatar, Turkish futhi Turkmen, ukwabelana ntshashintshe ka intelligibility mutual ngamunye lezo zilimi. 
Ngokomlando lolu limi lwalubizwa ngabantu balo bomdabu ngokuthi Türki okusho ukuthi "Turkic" noma isi- Azərbaycan türkcəsi okusho ukuthi "Azerbaijani Turkish".Ngaphambi kokusungulwa kwe- Azerbaijan Democratic Republic, eyamukela igama elithi "Azerbaijan" ngezizathu zezombangazwe ngo-1918, igama elithi "Azerbaijan" lalisetshenziselwa kuphela ukukhomba isifunda esiseduze sasenyakatho-ntshonalanga ye-Iran .Ngemva kokusungulwa kwe- Azerbaijan SSR, [1] ngomyalo womholi weSoviet u- Stalin, "igama lolimi olusemthethweni" lwe-Azerbaijan SSR "lashintshwa kusukela eTurkic kuya ku-Azerbaijani". [5] 
It was started by Hasan bey Zardabi, a journalist and education advocate.[1] Following the rule of the Qajar dynasty, Iran was ruled by Reza Shah who banned the publication of texts in Azerbaijani. Modern literature in the Republic of Azerbaijan is based on the Shirvani dialect mainly, while in Iranian Azerbaijan it is based on the Tabrizi dialect. 
Igama elithi " Izwi Lokuhlakanipha " yigama elivamile lengxenye ka-1833 ye- Doctrine and Covenants, incwadi ecatshangelwa amasonto amaningi eNhlanganweni Yabangcwele Bezinsuku Zokugcina ukuthi iqukethe izambulo ezivela kuNkulunkulu.Futhi igama lekhodi yezempilo esekelwe kulo mbhalo, owenziwa iSonto LikaJesu Kristu Labangcwele Bezinsuku Zokugcina (i-LDS Church) kanye nama- bandamentalists amaMormon, futhi ngezinga elincane, amanye amahlelo Abangcwele Bezinsuku Zokugcina.EBandleni le-LDS, ukuhambisana neZwi Lokuhlakanipha okwamanje kuyisidingo sokuqala sokubhapathizwa, ukukhonza emsebenzini wesikhathi esigcwele wobufundisi, ukuya ezikoleni zesonto, kanye nokungena emathempelini esonto ; nokho, ukwephulwa kwekhodi akubhekwa njengezizathu zokuhoxiswa kobulungu noma esinye isinyathelo sokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe . 
isingeniso; uhlu lwezinto okungafanele zidliwe, okuhlanganisa iwayini, isiphuzo esinamandla, ugwayi kanye "neziphuzo ezishisayo"; uhlu lokudla okufanele kusetshenziswe, okunye kube nokulinganiselwa okuthile; kanye isithembiso saphezulu kulabo abalandela iziqondiso. 
Phakathi kwezinto isambulo esikhomba ukuthi akufanele zidliwe, eyokuqala “iwayini noma isiphuzo esinamandla”, esambulo sithi akufanele sidakwe.(Ngaphandle kuka-kuvunyelwe ukusetshenziswa "iwayini okumsulwa yezithombe zakho" njengengxenye isakramente mthetho, nakuba LDS Church namuhla ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi esikhundleni iwayini . ) 
Isambulo sibuye seluleke ngokumelene nokusetshenziswa kukagwayi kanye "neziphuzo ezishisayo". 
Isambulo seZwi Lokuhlakanipha futhi siphakamisa ukusetshenziswa okufanele kwezinye izinto ezinqatshelwe.Nakuba “iziphuzo ezinamandla” akufanele zidliwe, zifanelekile uma zisetshenziselwa “ukugeza imizimba yenu”; ngokufanayo, nakuba ukungenwa komuntu ugwayi kwenqatshelwe, ugwayi kuthiwa “uyikhambi lemivimbo nazo zonke izinkomo ezigulayo, okufanele usetshenziswe ngokwahlulela nangekhono”. [2] 
Uhlu lokudla nezinto ezikhuthazwa yisambulo luhlanganisa “imifino enempilo [kanye] nazo zonke izithelo ngesikhathi sazo” kanye “nalokho okuthela izithelo, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi kusemhlabeni noma phezu komhlabathi”.Liphinde linqume ukusetshenziswa “konke okusanhlamvu” okuchazwa ngokuthi “udondolo lwempilo, hhayi olwabantu kuphela kodwa nezilwane zasendle”.Ibhali nokunye okusanhlamvu kunconywa ukuthi kusetshenziswe ekwenzeni "iziphuzo ezithambile". 
Umbhalo awukukhuthazi “isiphuzo esinamandla” newayini (kwezinye izimo lokhu kuhlanganisa iwayini lesakramente, eliye lathathelwa indawo amanzi esakramente kwamanye amahlelo), ukusetshenziswa okungezona kokwelapha kukagwayi, “iziphuzo ezishisayo”, kanye nenyama esetshenziswa ngaphezu kokuthi “kancane kancane. ".Umbhalo uncoma futhi ukusetshenziswa kwamakhambi, izithelo, nokusanhlamvu, kanye "neziphuzo ezithambile" ezisekelwe okusanhlamvu.Njengoba kwenziwa iBandla le-LDS, awukho umkhawulo oqinile ophathelene nokudliwa kwenyama, kodwa zonke iziphuzo ezidakayo azivunyelwe, kuhlanganise nobhiya .Isonto le-LDS lihumusha "iziphuzo ezishisayo" njengokusho ikhofi netiye . 
[1] 
IZwi Lokuhlakanipha lithi lihlanganisa "isimiso esinesithembiso".Isethembiso esanikezwa labo abalandela iseluleko sezwi lokuhlakanipha simi kanje: 
Futhi bonke abangcwele abakhumbula ukugcina nokwenza lamazwi, behamba ngokulalela imiyalelo, bayothola impilo enkabeni yabo nomnkantsha emathanjeni abo ; futhi bayothola ukuhlakanipha kanye nengcebo enkulu yolwazi, ngisho ingcebo efihliwe; futhi bayogijima futhi bangakhathali, futhi bayohamba futhi bangadangali.Futhi mina, iNkosi, ngibanika isethembiso, ukuthi ingelosi ebhubhisayo iyodlula kubo, njengabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, futhi ingababulali. 
Nakuba okokuqala kwakuyizincomo kuphela, kwenziwa umyalo kamuva. 
Lokhu kwanikeza abangcwele isikhathi sokuzivumelanisa nezimiso ezintsha.Ekuqaleni, ukuthobela izincomo kanye nokwenqatshelwa kweZwi Lokuhlakanipha kwakungathathwa njengempoqo: lizisho ngokusobala ukuthi “alikho ngomyalo noma ukuphoqelelwa”.Nokho, ngo-February 1834, uJoseph Smith wenza isiphakamiso phambi komkhandlu omkhulu webandla esasithi, “Alikho ilungu elisemthethweni kuleli Bandla elifanele ukuba nesikhundla ngemva kokuba lifundiswe izwi lokuhlakanipha ngokufanele; futhi yena, ilungu elisemthethweni., ukudebeselela ukuhambisana nokuwuthobela." [1]Lesi sinqumo samukelwe ngazwi linye wumkhandlu. 
Ngiyaqonda ukuthi abanye abantu bayazithethelela ekusebenziseni itiye nekhofi, ngoba iNkosi ithe kuphela “iziphuzo ezishisayo” ekwambulweni kweZwi Lokuhlakanipha. . . . 
Itiye nekhofi ... yilokho iNkosi eyayikusho lapho Ithi "iziphuzo ezishisayo". 
Icala "lokungaligcini iZwi Lokuhlakanipha" lalingelinye lamahlanu elabekwa uDavid Whitmer ngo-April 13, 1838, okwaholela ekukhishweni kwakhe ebandleni.Noma kunjalo, amarekhodi angaleso sikhathi abonisa ukuthi uJoseph Smith wayengeyena, yena, umbukeli oqinile.USmith uqoshwa ngezikhathi ezahlukene ephuza itiye, [2] ubhiya, [3] kanye newayini. 
[4]Kunombiko abuye abhema ugwayi: ngokuka- Amasa Lyman, ilungu lobuMongameli Bokuqala ngaphansi kukaSmith, uSmith wake waqeda ukushumayela intshumayelo yeZwi Lokuhlakanipha futhi ngokushesha ngemva kwalokho wagibela emigwaqweni ebhema isiga. [5]NgokukaLyman, lesi kwakungesinye sezimo eziningi lapho uSmith “azama khona ukholo lwabaNgcwele ... ngezici zakhe”. 
(Omunye umhlaziyi wesimanje uye wasikisela ukuthi lokhu kungenzeka ukuthi kwenziwa nguSmith ukuze aqinisekise ukuthi ukholo lwabalandeli bakhe lwalusekelwe enkolweni Yobungcwele Bezinsuku Zokugcina hhayi ebuntwini noma kubuholi bukaSmith. [6] 
Ngo-August 19, 1835, u- Almon W. Babbitt walethwa phambi komkhandlu omkhulu wesonto ngamacala amathathu.Ecaleni "lokungagcini Izwi Lokuhlakanipha", uBabbitt wathi "uthathe inkululeko yokwephula iZwi Lokuhlakanipha, esibonelweni sikaMongameli uJoseph Smith, omNcane, nabanye, kodwa wavuma ukuthi kwakungalungile. " [1] 
Ngemva kokufa kukaSmith, kwavela amaqembu amaningana enhlangano ye-Latter Day Saint.Iqembu elikhulu kulawa, IBandla likaJesu Kristu Labangcwele Bezinsuku Zokugcina (LDS Church), laliholwa nguBrigham Young .Engqungqutheleni kawonkewonke yebandla eyayingoSepthemba 9, 1851, uYoung wabiza ababekhona ukuthi “bayeke ukusebenzisa” izinto ezishiwo eZwini Lokuhlakanipha: 
Nakuba uYoung akhuthaza amaMormon ukuthi alandele ikhodi yeZwi Lokuhlakanipha, isonto lalibabekezelela labo abangalilandeli.Ngo-1860, weluleka labo abahlafuna ugwayi emihlanganweni yesonto ukuba okungenani bahlakaniphe futhi bangabi ngokweqile, kodwa abazange bakhokhise abasebenzisi ngesono. [1]Nokho, ngo-1870 wawuqeda umkhuba wokuhlafuna nokukhafula ugwayi eTabernakele laseSalt Lake . 
IZwi leNhlakanipho lithi “inyama yezilwane neyezinyoni zezulu . . . kufanele isetshenziswe kancane” nokuthi “kuyamthokozisa [uNkulunkulu] ukuba ingasetshenziswa ebusika kuphela., noma amakhaza, noma indlala.Ngokungafani nemithetho emelene nogwayi, utshwala neziphuzo ezishisayo, nokho, ukuthobela lo mthetho akukaze kwenziwe kube isibopho. 
Abaholi abaningi beSonto LDS baveze imibono yabo ngendaba yenyama.Ngo-1868, umongameli wesonto uBrigham Young weluleka, "Inyama kufanele isetshenziswe kancane, endlaleni nasemakhazeni." [1] Ngo-1868, umphostoli uGeorge Q. Cannon wathi, "Sitshelwa ukuthi inyama yanoma yiluphi uhlobo ayifaneleki kumuntu ngesikhathi sasehlobo, futhi kufanele idliwe kancane ebusika." [2] Kusukela ngo-1897 kuya ku-1901, umphostoli owayengumongameli wesonto uLorenzo Snow ngokuphindaphindiwe wakugcizelela ukubaluleka kokudla inyama ngokuyonga, efundisa ukuthi amalungu esonto kufanele agweme ukudla inyama ngaphandle kwalapho kunesidingo esikhulu, nokuthi lokhu kufanele kubonakale ngokulandela imfundiso kaSmith yokuthi izilwane. banemimoya. [3] Ngo-1895, u-Snow wathi, "Ngaphandle kokuthi indlala noma amakhaza ahlasele kufanele sikugweme ukusebenzisa inyama." [4] Umpostoli uGeorge Teasdale wafundisa into efanayo, futhi wabamba ukuthi ukudla ingulube kwakuwukwephula okukhulu kweZwi Lokuhlakanipha kunokuphuza itiye noma ikhofi. [3] Lapho uJoseph F. Smith elandela u-Snow njengomongameli webandla ngo-1901, wayeshumayela njalo ngokumelene “nokubhujiswa okungadingekile kokuphila”, futhi wagcizelela umusa ezilwaneni kanye nobuphathi obubalulekile abantu abanabo kubo . 
Naphezu kwalezi zitatimende, ukuvimbela ukusetshenziswa kwenyama akwenziwanga imfuneko ecacile yokufaneleka eSontweni le-LDS njengoba izindinganiso zokuthobela iZwi Lokuhlakanipha zenziwa zaba yisisekelo semfundiso nokusebenza kweSonto le-LDS ekuqaleni kwekhulu lama-20. 
[1]Ukugcizelelwa okwengeziwe kweZwi Lokuhlakanipha kwenzeka ngesikhathi sobumongameli buka- Heber J. Grant, umgqugquzeli weZwi Lokuhlakanipha osenesikhathi eside eshiseka.Nakuba uGrant engazange enze ukuvimbela ukudliwa kwenyama kube yingxenye ecacile yezinga, waqhubeka ekuhumusha njengengxenye yeseluleko seZwi Lokuhlakanipha.Ngo-1937 General Conference, eneminyaka engu-80 ubudala, uGrant wathi usebenze amahora amaningi "ngaphandle kokukhathala futhi ngaphandle kokuzwa nokulimala okuncane".Wathi impilo yakhe enhle kakhulu, ngokwengxenye, ibangelwa ukudla inyama encane kakhulu. 
Selokhu uGrant esengumengameli wehlile ukugcizelelwa kokunciphisa ukudliwa kwenyama kodwa sekukhona abaholi bebandla abake bafundisa ngale ndaba.Enkulumweni yenkomfa kawonkewonke ye-LDS ka-1948, umphostoli uJoseph F. Merrill wagcizelela ukubaluleka kokungayidli inyama “njengokukhululeka njengoba kwenza abaningi baseMelika”. 
[1] Ngo-1950, umphostoli kanye nososayensi wezitshalo uJohn A. Widtsoe wabhala, mayelana nokudliwa kwenyama, "labo abafisa ukuphila kahle futhi bathole umvuzo othenjisiwe oshiwo eZwini Lokuhlakanipha kumele balalele wonke umthetho, hhayi nje ingxenye yawo njenge ihambisana nokuthanda kwabo noma isifiso sabo sokudla, noma umbono wabo wencazelo yawo." [2]Muva nje ngo-2012, umkhulumeli wesonto osemthethweni uMichael Otterson uthe "isonto liphinde lakhuthaza ukunqanda ukusetshenziswa kwenyama esikhundleni sokusanhlamvu, izithelo nemifino. [3]Kuze kube namuhla, le LDS yeSonto hymnal kuhlanganisa ingoma nalokhu okulandelayo isosha esihlatshelelwayo: 
Leli vesi lenze abanye babuze ukuthi inyama kufanele yini idliwe ehlobo. 
Inyama inama-kilojoule amaningi kunezithelo nemifino, abanye abantu abangayidinga ambalwa ehlobo kunobusika.Futhi, ngaphambi kokuba kugcinwe izithelo nemifino, ngokuvamile abantu babengenakho okunye ukudla okwanele ababengakudla ebusika.Inyama eyonakele ingabulala uma idliwe, futhi ezikhathini zangaphambili inyama yonakala kalula ehlobo kunobusika.Izindlela zesimanje zesiqandisi manje zenza kube nokwenzeka ukulondoloza inyama kunoma iyiphi inkathi.Igama eliyisihluthulelo mayelana nokusetshenziswa kwenyama kancane . 
[1] 
Konke okusanhlamvu kuhle ukudla komuntu; njengesithelo somvini; lokho okuthela isithelo, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi kusemhlabeni noma phezu komhlaba— 17. 
Nokho, ukolweni ungowabantu, namabele ngenkabi, namabele abe ngeyehhashi, namabele abe ngeyezinyoni, nengulube, nezilwane zonke zasendle, nebhali ngezilwane eziwusizo, neziphuzo ezithambile, njengezinye. okusanhlamvu. 
NgokukaJoseph Smith, umsunguli wenhlangano yabaNgcwele beSuku Lokugcina, Izwi Lokuhlakanipha latholwa ngo-1833 njengesambulo esivela kuNkulunkulu.Ngemva kokushona kukaSmith, uBrigham Young wathi lesi sambulo sanikezwa ngenxa yezinkinga okuhlangatshezwane nazo ngenkathi kuqhutshwa imihlangano ekhaya lomndeni wakwaSmith: 
Isambulo siphakamisa ukuthi iziphuzo ezithambile ezenziwe ngebhali (ezifana nobhiya ) zingase zivunyelwe.Kamuva nje ngo-1901, abaphostoli uBrigham Young, Omnci. kanye noJohn Henry Smith baphikisana ngokuthi isambulo sasingavimbeli ubhiya. [2] Kodwa-ke, abaholi beBandla le-LDS manje bafundisa ukuthi ukuphuza noma yiluphi uhlobo lotshwala, kuhlanganise nobhiya, kwephula iZwi Lokuhlakanipha. [3] [4] [5] 
Epheshaneni elabhalwa ngo-1930 elithi The Word of Wisdom, umphostoli uJohn A. Widtsoe wafundisa ukuthi ufulawa ocolile wawuphambene neZwi Lokuhlakanipha. [1]Nokho, isonto alikaze likwenqabele ukusetshenziswa kukafulawa ocolisisiwe. 
Ukubambelela ezimisweni zeZwi Lokuhlakanipha akwenziwanga imfuneko yokungena emathempelini eBandla le-LDS kuze kube ngu-1902.Nokho, nangaleso sikhathi, umongameli webandla uJoseph F. Smith wakhuthaza omongameli besiteki ukuthi babe nenkululeko emadodeni amadala ayesebenzisa ugwayi kanye nezalukazi ezaziphuza itiye. [1]Kulabo abephula lesambulo, ikakhulukazi kwakuyizidakwa ezazingafakwa ethempelini. 
[1]Ngasekuqaleni kwekhulunyaka, izimemezelo zeZwi Lokuhlakanipha azizange zilandelwe ngokuqinile ngabaholi bebandla abaphawuleka kangaka.U-Anthon H. Lund, Umeluleki Wokuqala kubuMongameli Bokuqala, uphuze ubhiya newayini; umphostoli uMatthias F. Cowley waphuza ubhiya newayini; UCharles W. Penrose, owaphinde wasebenza njengoMeluleki Wokuqala kubuMongameli Bokuqala, waphuza iwayini; Umongameli jikelele Wenhlangano Yabesimame Ekhululekile u-Emmeline B. Wells waphuza ikhofi; kanye nomongameli wesonto uGeorge Albert Smith baphuze i- brandy ngezinhloso zokwelapha. [1]Ngo-1921, umongameli webandla u- Heber J. Grant wenza ukubambelela ezimisweni zeZwi Lokuhlakanipha kwaba yisidingo esiphelele sokungena ethempelini. [1] 
Namuhla, ukubambelela ezimisweni zeZwi Lokuhlakanipha kuyadingeka ekubhapathizweni [1] kanye nasekungeneni emathempelini eBandla le-LDS. [2]Isazi-mlando se-BYU, uThomas G. Alexander, siveza ukuthi nakuba iZwi Lokuhlakanipha lokuqala “njengesimiso esinesithembiso” lanikezwa ngesambulo, abukho ubufakazi bokuthi noma yimuphi umholi webandla uye wafuna isambulo esisha esihlukile, noma isiqinisekiso esingokomoya sokushintsha. Izwi Lokuhlakanipha lisuka “esimisweni esinesithembiso” liya emyalweni. 
Okuwukuphela kwencazelo esemthethweni “yeziphuzo ezishisayo” ( Im&Vu 89:9 ) Ezwini Lokuhlakanipha isitatimende esashiwo abaholi beBandla bakuqala ukuthi igama elithi “iziphuzo ezishisayo” lisho itiye nekhofi. 
Amalungu akufanele asebenzise noma iyiphi into equkethe izidakamizwa ezingekho emthethweni.Akufanele futhi amalungu asebenzise izinto ezilimazayo noma ezakha umkhuba ngaphandle kokunakekelwa udokotela onekhono. [1] 
Lapho bebuthene ndawonye kuleli gumbi ngemva kokudla kwasekuseni, okokuqala bakwenza kwakuwukukhanyisa amapayipi abo, futhi, ngenkathi bebhema, bakhuluma ngezinto ezinkulu zombuso, futhi bakhafulela igumbi lonke, futhi ngokushesha nje lapho ipayipi seliphumile. emilonyeni yabo kwakuzothathwa ugwayi omkhulu.Ngokuvamile uma umPhrofethi [uJoseph Smith] engena ekamelweni ukuze anikeze imiyalelo yesikole wayezithola esefuleni lentuthu kagwayi.Lokhu, kanye nokukhononda komkakhe ngokuhlanzwa phansi okungcole kangaka, kwenza uMprofethi wayicabangisisa lendaba, wabe esebuza eNkosini mayelana nokuziphatha kwabadala ekusebenziseni ugwayi, nesambulo esaziwa ngokuthi iZwi likaMoya.Ukuhlakanipha kwaba umphumela wokubuza kwakhe. 
Abaholi beBandla le-LDS beluleke amalungu ebandla ukuthi akumele abe nezincazelo zawo siqu, noma abe ngokweqile ekugcineni iZwi Lokuhlakanipha.Omunye umholi wesonto waxwayisa ngokuqondile ukuthi ukwengeza izimfuneko ezengeziwe ezingagunyaziwe, ekugcizelela ngentshiseko eyeqisayo, noma ukuyenza “ukuzijabulisa kwevangeli” kuwuphawu lokungavuthwa ngokomoya futhi ngezinye izikhathi ukuhlubuka. [1] 
isicelo esidumile 
Ucwaningo lwango-2019 lwezimo zengqondo phakathi kwamaMormon e-US lwathi ingxenye yesine kuya kwengxenye yabantu abanjalo bahumusha Izwi Lokuhlakanipha ngendlela ehlukile nencazelo esemthethweni yeBandla le-LDS ngandlela thize. 
Ngokuvamile, amalungu eBandla le-LDS abheka ukuvinjelwa "kwiziphuzo ezishisayo" njengokumboza ikhofi netiye, noma ngabe iziphuzo ziyashisa noma cha. [1] Ngokuvamile kucatshangwa ukuthi akukho ukuvinjelwa kokuphuza amanzi ashisayo, itiye le-herbal, ushokoledi oshisayo, izinto ezithatha indawo yekhofi njenge- Postum noma iziphuzo ze- malt ezifana ne-Ovaltine noma i- Milo.Amanye amalungu akhetha ukuzivimbela ekuphuzeni noma yisiphi isiphuzo esiqukethe i- caffeine . 
Udaba osekukudala lukhona phakathi kwamalungu eBandla le-LDS ukuthi kuvumelekile yini ukungenisa iziphuzo ezine- caffeine okungelona ikhofi noma itiye.Ngo-1918, uFrederick J. Pack, uprofesa wamaMormon eNyuvesi yase-Utah, washicilela isihloko kumagazini wesonto osemthethweni lapho ecabanga ukuthi ngenxa yokuthi i- Coca-Cola iqukethe i- caffeine, ekhona futhi itiye nekhofi, amaMormon kufanele agweme. I-Coca-Cola ngendlela efanayo ukuthi bagweme iZwi Lokuhlakanipha "iziphuzo ezishisayo". 
[1]Kusukela esihlokweni sikaPack, amaMormon amaningi akholelwa ukuthi isizathu sokuvinjelwa kwetiye nekhofi wukuba khona kwe-caffeine eziphuzweni.Nokho, isonto alikaze lisho ukuthi lesi yisizathu sokuvinjelwa. 
Ibandla alinaso isikhundla esisemthethweni mayelana nokuphuzwa kweziphuzo ezine-caffeine, ngaphandle kwesitatimende esivamile sokuthi iZwi Lokuhlakanipha alisho ngokuqondile.Ku-2012, ekuphenduleni umbiko mayelana neMormonism ku-NBC's Rock Centre noBrian Williams, owathi abathembekile be-LDS babenqatshelwe ukuphuza i-caffeine, isonto labhala: 
IZwi Lokuhlakanipha lashicilelwa okokuqala njengohlaka oluzimele lodwa ngoZibandlela 1833.Ngo-1835, yafakwa njengeSigaba LXXX kuhlelo lokuqala lweMfundiso neziVumelwano . 
Naphezu kwalokho okubikiwe, isambulo seBandla sichaza imikhuba yezempilo (Imfundiso Nezivumelwano 89) asikhulumi ngokusetshenziswa kwecaffeine.Iziqondiso zezempilo zeSonto ziyakwenqabela uphuzo oludakayo, ukubhema noma ukuhlafuna ugwayi, “neziphuzo ezishisayo”—okufundiswa abaholi beSonto ukubhekisela ngokuqondile etiyeni nekhofi. [1] 
Esikhathini esidlule, abaholi bamasonto abaningi bebengakukhuthazi ukusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo enjalo.Isibonelo, ngo-1922, umongameli webandla u- Heber J. Grant weluleka abaNgcwele Bezinsuku Zokugcina: 
Ngeke nginikeze noma yimuphi umyalo, kodwa ngizowucela njengomuntu siqu, umusa womuntu ngamunye kimi, ukuvumela i-coca-cola [ yedwa.Ziningi ezinye izinto ongazithola emithonjeni yesoda ngaphandle kokuphuza lokho okulimazayo.INkosi ayifuni ukuthi usebenzise noma yisiphi isidakamizwa esizakhela isifiso sokudla. 
Ngemva kweminyaka emibili esho lesi sitatimende, uGrant wahlangana nommeleli we -Coca-Cola Company ukuze baxoxe ngokuma kwebandla nge-Coca-Cola; ekupheleni komhlangano wabo wesibili, uGrant wathi "unesiqiniseko sokuthi anginaso nencane isifiso sokuncoma ukuthi abantu bayishiye yodwa i-Coca-Cola uma inani [le-caffeine e-Coca-Cola] lingenabungozi, bathi yikho." [1]UGrant akazange aphinde akhulume ngokumelene nokusetshenziswa kweziphuzo ze-cola.
