Ngokuphathelene neziphuzo ze-cola, iBandla alikaze lithathe isikhundla ngokusemthethweni kule ndaba, kodwa abaholi beBandla baye beluleka, futhi manje seluleka ngokuqondile, ngokumelene nokusetshenziswa kwanoma isiphi isiphuzo esiqukethe izidakamizwa ezilimazayo ngaphansi kwezimo ezingase zibe khona. umphumela ekuzuzeni umkhuba.Noma yisiphi isiphuzo esinezithako eziyingozi emzimbeni kufanele sigwenywe. [1] 
Ukubambelela 
ainunnisa "Cissie GoolZ Z Wazalwa enguZainunnisa Abdurahman 6 Novemba Washona ngomhla ka 1 Julayi 1963 (eneminyaka engu 65) Abazali u-Abdullah Abhurahman (ubaba) Umsebenzi: Umthetho, ukulwa nobandlululo kwezepolitiki kanye nomholi wamalungelo abantu. 
Abdullah Abdurahman nomkakhe uHelen James Potter. [1] Washada noDkt. AH Gool, aba naye nezingane ezintathu: uMarcina, nodokotela uRustum noShaheen. 
Amareferensi 
UZainunnisa "Cissie" Gool (6 Novemba 1897 - 1 Julayi 1963) wayengumholi olwa nobandlululo kwezepolitiki kanye nosebenzela amalungelo abantu eNingizimu Afrika. 
Wayeyindodakazi kadokotela ovelele nosopolitiki u-Abdullah Abdurahman nomama uHelen Potter James. 
UGool wasungula iNational Liberation League futhi wasiza ekwakheni i-Non-European United Front (NEUF). 
Wayaziwa futhi ethandwa njenge-"Jewel of District Six" kanye "noJoan of Arc" ngabantu baseNingizimu Afrika njengompetha wabampofu. [1] 
UZainunnisa Gool wazalwa ngomhla ka 6 Novemba 1897 ezalwa ngu-Abdullah Abdurahman, umholi we-African Peoples Organisation (APO) ayesize ukuyisungula ngo-1902 futhi waba ngowokuqala omnyama waseNingizimu Afrika ukuqokelwa eMkhandlwini waseKapa ngo-1904, [1] kanye noHelen Potter James. [2] 
U-Gool uvela emkhakheni wezidlamlilo kanti futhi wafundiswa yibo bobabili u-Olive Schreiner kanye no- Mahatma Gandhi. 
U-Gool kanye nodadewabo, u-Rosie, bafunda e-Trafalgar High School e-District Six eKapa [1] eyasungulwa nguyise, umgqugquzeli wenqubo yokulingana emfundweni kahulumeni. 
Inhloko yesikole kwakunguHarold Cressy owayegqugquzelwe nguyise. 
Waqeda imfundo yakhe yaesekondari ngezifundo ze-correspondence eLondon University. 
Ngale khwalifikheshini, uGool wabhalisela ukuba ngowesifazane wokuqala woMkhaladi ukuthola iziqu ze-masters eYunivesithi yaseKapa kwathi ngo-1962, waba ngowokuqala wesifazane onguMkhaladi ukuba neziqu zomthetho eNingizimu Afrika futhi waba ngowokuqala ukubizelwa eCape Bar. [2] 
Kusukela ngo-1938 ukuya ku-1951, uCissie wamela iSifunda iDistrict Six eMkhandlwini weDolobhakazi laseKapa, futhi iminyaka eminingana kwakunguye yedwa owesifazane (kanye nowesifazane wokuqala omnyama) osebenza eMkhandlwini Wedolobha. 
Ngo-1949, wakhethwa njengosihlalo wekomidi lezempilo lomkhandlu wedolobha, [1] owesifazane wokuqala omnyama ezweni ukuba asebenze kuhulumeni wasekhaya..Wayaziwa ngokuthi "Igugu Lesifunda se-District Six" wamela abantu baleso sifunda emkhandlwini kwaze kwaba sekufeni kwakhe ngo-1963, ngisho noma wayebizwa ngokuthi yiKhomanisi ngaphansi koMthetho Wokucindezelwa KobuKhomanisi. [2] 
U-Annie Silinga wayeyimithetho yaseNingizimu Afrika emelene namapasi futhi eyisishoshovu sezombusazwe esimelene nobandlululo. 
Waziwa ngeqhaza lakhe njengoMongameli we- African National Congress Women’s League yaseKapa, umholi wemashi yokungadluli kwamapasi ngo-1956 owaya e-Union Buildings ePitoli, eNingizimu Afrika futhi nguyena yedwa owesifazane wase-Afrika ecaleni lokuvukela umbuso ngo-1956 eNingizimu Afrika. [1] 
Umkhankaso Wokuphikisa IMashi Yabesifazane (Iningizimu Afrika) 
Abesifazane Abadumile abangu-60 — Abantu ngemuva kweMashi Yabesifazane yango-1956 ePitoli 
U-Annie Silinga wazalwa ngo-1910 eNqqamakwe esifundeni saseButterworth e-Transkei,eyaziwa manje ngokuthi yi- Eastern Cape, lapho aqeda khona iminyaka embalwa esikoleni samabanga aphansi. 
USilinga wakhulela e-Transkei ngesikhathi sokuchuma, lapho umhlaba wawuvumela ukulima futhi izinkomo zazikhona ukudla ngokukhululeka. 
Kodwa-ke, ukwanda kwenani labantu kwaholela ekugugulekeni komhlabathi kanye namadlelo adala ubumpofu endaweni. 
Ngo-1937, izimo zase ziwohlokile kwaze kwafika lapho uSilinga esephelelwe ithemba, efisa ukuthutha. 
"Izingane" zakhe, esho, "zazifa e-Transkei." [1] Ngo-1937, lapho eneminyaka engu-27, uSilinga wathuthela eKapa lapho umyeni wakhe uMatthew esanda kuzuza umsebenzi, enethemba lokuthola izikhungo zezokwelapha ezingcono. 
EKapa, ngokokuqala ngqa, uSilinga, umyeni wakhe kanye nezingane zabo ezinhlanu bangahlala ndawonye njengomndeni. 
Emsebenzini wakhe wangaphambili ezimayini zaseGoli, indawo yokuhlala ayizange inikezwe imindeni yabasebenzi basezimayini futhi imithetho yenqatshelwe abesifazane ukuthi bahlale lapho isikhathi eside. 
Ngemva kweMpi Yezwe II, uSilinga nomyeni wakhe bathuthela elokishini lase-Langa. 
Nakuba uSilinga waboshwa izikhathi eziningi, yena nomndeni wakhe bahlala kwaLanga lapho afela khona ngo-1984 [2] 
Ngemva kokuthuthela kwaLanga, ngemva kweMpi Yezwe II, uSilinga waqala ukuya emihlanganweni lapho kwakuxoxwa ngalezo zinyathelo zokuthuthukisa izimo zomphakathi. 
Ngo-1948, eseneminyaka engu-38, wajoyina ibutho elibizwa ngeLanga Vigilance Association (LVA). 
I-LVA yayifuna ukulwela ukuthuthukiswa kwezimo zokuphila kwaLanga nokuvikela izakhamuzi emithethweni emelene nobandlululo. 
Ngo-1952, wajoyina i-ANC, wajoyina i-African National Congress (ANC). 
Ngokushesha ngemva kokujoyina i-ANC, wabamba iqhaza emithethweni emelene namapasi emkhankasweni wenhlangano ye-Defiance Campaign ka-1952 lapho aboshwa futhi wadonsa isigwebo esifushane ejele ngenxa yokungalaleli umphakathi. 
Wadonsa isigwebo ejele nengane yakhe enezinyanga eziyisithupha. [2] [1] 
Ngo-1953, uSilinga, ngaleso sikhathi owayeyilungu le-ANC Women’s League (ANCWL), wayeyingxenye yeqembu elalihlela umhlangano wokuqala we-Federation of South African Women (FSAW), ukubopha intukuthelo yabesifazane ngokumelene nokundlula komthetho mayelana nodaba lwamapasi. 
Leqembu laliholwa nguRay Alexander, ukhomanisi kanye nowenyunyana yabasebenzi, futhi lalihlanganisa uGladys Smith we-Cape Housewives' League, uKatie White weKomidi Lokudla Lwabesifazane, kanye noDora Tamanda we-ANCWL kanye neQembu LamaKhomanisi laseNingizimu Afrika. 
Engqungqutheleni yokuqala, eyayibanjelwe eGoli ngo-April 1954, uSilinga wakhethwa njengengxenye ye-FEDSAW National Executive Committee [2] Kuwo lo mhlangano lapho Umqulu Wabesifazane wabhalwa khona abesifazane bezinhlanga ezahlukene. 
Ngo-1954, phakathi komhlangano we-FEDSAW embukisweni waseKapa, uSilinga wamemezela: "Angisoze ngathwala ipasi, ngizothwala elifana nelika Nksz (Susan) Strijdom kuphela. 
Ungowesifazane nami nginguye. 
Awukho umehluko.” [1] Ngemva kokwephula umthetho wamapasi kanye nezikhalazo ezimbalwa ezingaphumelelanga, wadingiselwa e-Transkei ngo-1956. 
Wabuya ngokungekho emthethweni ukuze abenezingane zakhe kanye nomyeni wakhe kwaLanga. 
Ngo-1957, uSilinga wadlulisela icala lakhe ngempumelelo ngezizathu zokuthi ukuhlala kwakhe iminyaka engaphezu kwa-15 eKapa kumnika igunya lokuhlala lapho. [1] 
Ngomhla ka-9 kuNcwaba 1956, uSilinga wahola abesifazane abayi-20 000 ababehlelwe yi-FEDSAW abamasha baya ehhovisi lakangqongqoshe ePitoli beyobhikisha ukukhishwa kwamapasi. 
USlinga waboshwa kanye nabanye abaholi be - FEDSAW uLilian Ngoyi noHelen Joseph, kanye nabaholi be-ANC u-Oliver Tambo noNelson Mandela. 
Uhulumeni wobandlululo wabeka uSilinga nezinye izishoshovu icala lokuvukela umbuso. 
Isigaba sokuqala sokuqulwa kwecala lokuvukela umbuso saqhubeka kwaze kwaba nguZibandlela ka-1957, lapho umbuso wasula amacala ababebekwe abamangalelwa abangu-61. 
USilinga ungomunye walabo abakhululwa. 
Ngo-1958, uSilinga wakhethwa njengomongameli we-ANCWL yaseKapa ngo-1958. [2] Ngo-1960 kwaba nezibhelu zokulwa nomthetho wamapasi kwaLanga naseSharpeville . 
Uhulumeni wobandlululo wamemezela isimo esiphuthumayo uSilinga wabangomunye wabantu ababoshwa. 
I-ANC yavalwa njengenhlangano yezepolitiki ngo-1960. 
Ekubuyeni kwakhe ejele, waba nesandla ekusungulweni kwe-Women's Front, futhi wenziwa umlandeli we-United Democratic Front ngo-1983. 
USilinga wahlala kwaLanga impilo yakhe yonke futhi washona engazange athwale ipasi ngo-1984. 
Yize angcwatshwa ethuneni labampofu elingaphawuliwe, umdwebi u- Sue Williamson, ngesicelo somndeni ka-Annie Silinga, udale isiqephu azosibeka ethuneni lakhe emathuneni akwaLanga. 
Lithwalana nokukhala kwempi kaSilinga: "Angisoze ngathwala ipasi!" [1] 
USilinga ukhunjulwa njengomunye wabaholi emkhankasweni wokulwa kwamapasi ngesikhathi sobandlululo eNingizimu Afrika . 
Ngaphandle komsebenzi wezepolitiki, uSilinga ukhunjulwa ngomlingiswa wakhe ongenabugovu, sebeqale inkulisa kanye noWinnie Seqwana elokishini laseLanga. [1] Umgwaqo ePhillipi, eKapa uqanjwe ngemva kwa-Annie Silinga. 
Ku- baseball, isisekelo esintshontshiwe senzeka lapho umgijimi edlulela esisekelweni angenalungelo laso futhi umshayi magoli osemthethweni enquma ukuthi okuthuthukisiwe kufanele kufakwe esenzweni somgijimi.Abanompempe banquma ukuthi umgijimi uphephile noma uphumile esisekelweni esilandelayo, kodwa umshayi magoli osemthethweni ulawula embuzweni wesikweletu noma wokusolwa ngokuthuthukiswa ngaphansi koMthetho 10 (Imithetho Yokuthola Amaphuzu) yeMithetho Esemthethweni ye-MLB. [1] 
Isisekelo esintshontshiwe sivamise ukwenzeka lapho umgijimi oyisisekelo eqhubekela kusisekelo esilandelayo kuyilapho umgadli ephonsa ibhola ku- plate yasekhaya. 
Ezibalweni ze - baseball, izisekelo ezebiwe zichazwa ngokuthi SB.Imizamo yokweba eholela ekutheni i-baserunner iphume ibanjwe intshontsha ( CS ). 
Isamba salezi zibalo imizamo yokweba.Ukweba okuphumelelayo njengephesenti lengqikithi yemizamo yokweba kubizwa ngokuthi izinga lempumelelo. 
UNed Cuthbert, edlalela i- Philadelphia Keystones ngo-1863 noma ngo-1865, ubengumdlali wokuqala ukweba isisekelo kumdlalo we-baseball, nakuba igama elithi stolen base lingasetshenziswanga kwaze kwaba ngu-1870.Okwesikhathi esithile ekhulwini le-19, izisekelo ezebiwe zanikezwa ikhredithi lapho i-baserunner ifinyelela isisekelo esengeziwe sokushaywa kwesisekelo komunye umdlali. [1] Isibonelo, uma umgijimi kusisekelo sokuqala efinyelele isisekelo sesithathu kokukodwa, kubalwa njengokutshontsha.Ngo-1887, uHugh Nicol wabeka irekhodi le-Major League elisamile elinezisekelo ezebiwe ezingu-138, eziningi zazo ebezingeke zibalwe ngaphansi kwemithetho yesimanje.Imithetho yesimanje yokweba yasetshenziswa ngokugcwele ngo-1898. 
Kusukela ngo-2019, i-Takealot inenkontileka yabashayeli abangaphezu kuka-4,500 XNUMX futhi iletha ngaphezu kwezigidi eziyi-1.6 ngenyanga. 
Njengamanje i-Takealot.com inezikhungo zokusabalalisa eNtshonalanga Kapa, KwaZulu-Natal naseGauteng, isamba esingu-75 000 m 2.Isikhungo sayo saseGoli sigcina imikhiqizo ecishe ibe yizigidi ezi-4 nganoma yisiphi isikhathi futhi sithumela amaphasela ayi-10 000 njalo ngehora. 
Ngo-Ephreli 2019 i-takealot.com yavula uchungechunge lwayo lokuqala lwamaphoyinti eqoqo, olubizwa ngokuthi i-Takealot Pickup Points.Enye inketho yokulethwa, amakhasimende ayakwazi ukuqoqa futhi abuyisele ama-oda noma yiluphi usuku lweviki.Kusukela ngoMashi 2020, ngaphezu kwama-50 Takealot Pickup Points atholakala kuzo zonke izifundazwe eziyi-9 zaseNingizimu Afrika.I-Takealot Midrand (N1 Bridge) eyi-1 177 m2 Pickup Point idlula umgwaqo omkhulu omatasatasa wase-Afrika, futhi ikwazi ukusekela amaqoqo angaphezu kuka-7 000 ngosuku. 
I-Takealot.com (yenziwe isitayela njenge-takealot.com [1] ) iyinkampani yaseNingizimu Afrika ye- e-commerce ezinze eKapa, eNingizimu Afrika .Njengomthengisi omkhulu wezwe we-inthanethi, takealot.com isize ukukhulisa ukuthenga ku-inthanethi eNingizimu Afrika, futhi yaba umthengisi wasendaweni wokuqala ukuba nengxenye ku-Black Friday. 
Ngo-Okthoba 2010, owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu kwa-MWEB uKim Reid kanye nenkampani yokutshala izimali ezinze e-US i- Tiger Global Management bathola ibhizinisi elikhona laseNingizimu Afrika le-ecommerce i-Take2, baliqamba kabusha ngokuthi takealot.com.I-Takealot.com yethulwe ngokusemthethweni emphakathini ngoJuni 2011.[1] 
Ngo-2014, i-takealot.com yethule ngempumelelo insizakalo yayo yokulethwa kokudla lapho kudingeka khona ngemva kokuthola uMr Delivery (oqanjwe kabusha ngokuthi Mr D Food ) kanye ne-Superbalist.com, idizayini ekhethiwe kanye ne-e-tailer yemfashini.Ngawo lowo nyaka, i-takealot.com yamemezela ukuthi kuzohlanganiswa i-Kalahari.com, inkampani ye-ecommerce ephethwe yi-Naspers.Ukuhlanganiswa kwaqedwa ngempumelelo ngoMeyi 2015. 
Ngonyaka wezi-2017 i-Naspers yenyusa utshalomali lwayo lwaya ku-96% ngemva kokuthola ingxenye ye-Tiger Global Management ngokugcwele.Ngo-Okthoba 2018, i-Superbalist.com kanye ne-Spree (nayo eyingxenye yephothifoliyo ye-Naspers) bahlanganisa amabhizinisi ngaphansi komkhiqizo we-Superbalist.com, neqembu le-Takealot eliphethe u-49% webhizinisi elisha nokulawula ukuphatha. 
NgoJuni 2011, i-takealot.com yathenga ingxenye encane engu-40% kuMnuz Delivery, isevisi yokulethwa kwezindawo zokudlela eziningi, njengoba inkampani yayifuna ukuzakhela ubuchwepheshe bayo bezinto zasendlini ngaphansi kophiko lwe-Takealot Delivery Team.NgoJanuwari 2013, i-takealot.com yathola ingxenye yokulawula kuMnuz Delivery. 
I-A2X Markets yasungulwa nguSean Melnick, u-Ashley Mendelowitz kanye noKevin Brady, abantu abanolwazi lwezimakethe zezimali nobuchwepheshe.Umgomo wabo bekuwukudala ukuhwebelana okusha kweNingizimu Afrika ukuze kulethe ukuncintisana okunempilo eMakethe yaseNingizimu Afrika. 
A2x kuyinto MTF bokuzisholo stock exchange ukuthi waklonyeliswa ilayisensi yokuqhuba ukushintshana i-Financial Services Board, manje uMkhakha wezeziMali nenkambiso Authority ( FSCA ) ngo-Ephreli 6 2017 Ngomhla ziyisi-6 kuMfumfu wezi-2017, i-A2X iqale ngo- [1] ngezinhlu ezi-3 ze-African Rainbow Capital, Peregrine Holdings and Coronation Fund Managers kanye nesamba semakethe esihlanganisiwe samabhiliyoni ayi-R14. 
Namuhla, iSanlam ingumnikezeli wezinsizakalo zezezimali ezihlukene onomkhiqizo obanzi ohlinzeka ngokuphakela zonke izingxenye zemakethe.Leli qembu likhule ngokuqhubekayo endaweni yalo kanye nasemhlabeni jikelele - manje selitholakala emazweni angama-33 ase-Afrika nase-India, Malaysia, UK kanye ne-Ireland, i-USA, Australia kanye ne-Philippines. 
Ngo-2018, iSanlam yaphetha ngokuthola kwayo i-SAHAM Finances engu-$1.1 billion.Ukwengeza, leli qembu limemezele imininingwane yesivumelwano salo se-BEE sika-R11 billion, esizokwenza ukuthi inyuse ubunikazi bamasheya abansundu bufinyelele ku-18% kanye nobunikazi bomnotho abamnyama bufinyelele ku-35%. 
I-Sanlam kusukela ngo-1993 ibe nesandla ekufukulweni kwabantu abamnyama kwezomnotho okubanzi (B-BBEE) ngokusebenzisana kweqembu no-Ubuntu-Botho Investments. 
Ubambiswano lwe-Ubuntu-Botho B-BBEE luholele ekutheni i-consortium ebanzi yokuhlomisa abantu abamnyama ithenge amasheya angu-10% kwaSanlam kulokho okwakuzoba enye yemisebenzi yokufukula abantu abamnyama efinyelela kude eNingizimu Afrika kuze kube manje. 
ISanlam yiqembu lezinsizakalo zezezimali zaseNingizimu Afrika elikomkhulu eBellville, Western Cape, eNingizimu Afrika.I-Sanlam yinkampani yomshwalense enkulu kunazo zonke e-Afrika.Isohlwini lweJohannesburg Stock Exchange, iNamibian Stock Exchange kanye ne - A2X .Yasungulwa ngo-1918 njengenkampani yomshwalense wempilo,Sanlam Group isithuthuke yaba yibhizinisi lezinsizakalo zezezimali ezihlukene. 
Amabhizinisi ayo amahlanu ahlanganisa iSanlam Personal Finance, Sanlam Emerging Markets, Sanlam Investments, Sanlam Corporate kanye neSanlam. 
Imikhakha yaleli qembu yobungcweti ihlanganisa umshwalense (wempilo nowejwayelekile), ukuhlela izimali, impesheni yomhlalaphansi, ama-trust, izincwadi zefa, umshwalense wesikhashana, ukuphathwa kwempahla, ukulawula ubungozi kanye nemisebenzi yezimakethe ezinkulu, ukutshalwa kwezimali kanye nengcebo. 
Iqembu lisebenzela eNingizimu Afrika, Namibia, Botswana, Swaziland, Zimbabwe, Mauritius, Malawi, Zambia, Tanzania, Rwanda, Uganda, Kenya, Ghana, Nigeria, Mozambique, India, Malaysia nase-UK, futhi inentshisekelo yebhizinisi i-US, Australia, Burundi, Lesotho kanye nePhilippines.Inesandla kochwepheshe bomshwalense omncane, iMicro-Ensure Holdings Limited ese-UK, enomlando e-Afrika yonkana kanye ne-India ehlinzeka ngamaklayenti abhalisile angaphezu kwezigidi eziyi-10. 
Ukuthola kwayo i-SAHAM Finances ngo-2018 kuyenze yaba ngumdlali wezezimali omkhulu kunawo wonke e-Afrika okungewona amabhange futhi kuyinikeze ithuba lokuchayeka eMorocco, Angola, Algeria, Tunisia, Niger, Mali, Senegal, Guinea, Burkina Faso, Cote D'Ivoire, ITogo, Benin, Cameroon, Gabon, Republic of the Congo, Madagascar, Lebanon kanye neSaudi Arabia. 
I-Santam Insurance - imigqa yendabuko kanye nebhizinisi eliphakathi nendawo I-MiWay kanye ne-Centriq – umshwalense wesikhathi esifushane oya kumakhasimende ngokusebenzisa isiteshi sokusabalalisa esiqondile I-Santam Re – i-reinsurance ezimakethe ezisafufusa 
I- S uid- A frikaanse N asionale T rust en A ssuransie M aatskappij Beperk (South African National Trust and Assurance Company Limited), i- Santam, yabhaliswa mhla zingama-28 kuNdasa 1918.Kwabe sekuthathwa isinqumo sokuguqula umnyango wokuqinisekisa impilo ube inkampani ehlukile, kwathi i- S uid- A frikaanse N asionale L ewens A ssuransie M aatskappij Beperk (South African National Life Assurance Company Limited), i-Sanlam, yabhaliswa mhla ziyisi-8 kuNhlangulana 1918.I-Sanlam, inkampani engaphansi kwayo, kamuva yaba inhloko yalo msebenzi, kuyilapho u-Sanlam elokhu egxile kumshwalense wesikhashana. 
Ngokuhamba kweminyaka, ukugxila kwe-Sanlam kancane kancane kwasuka kumshwalense wempilo evamile kwaba ukuhlinzeka ngemikhiqizo namasevisi ezezimali anhlobonhlobo.Ngo-1998 i-Sanlam demutualised, ifaka ohlwini lwe- Johannesburg Stock Exchange (JSE) Ltd kanye ne- Namibian Stock Exchange .Lokhu kwashintsha i-Sanlam yasuka enkampanini ehlangene yaba inkampani yomphakathi enemali enkulu yamasheya, okuyiSanlam Life Insurance Ltd.Ngesikhathi esifanayo inkampani ehlukile, iSanlam Ltd, yafakwa njengenkampani engumzali weqembu lamabhizinisi akwaSanlam.Leli qembu laphinde lahlelwa kabusha laba amabhizinisi amaningana azimele ngaphakathi kwesakhiwo sebhizinisi likahulumeni. 
I-Santam yiqembu lezinsizakalo zezezimali zaseNingizimu Afrika futhi elinentshisekelo yebhizinisi eMalawi, Tanzania, Uganda, Zimbabwe naseZambia.Ihhovisi elikhulu likaSantam litholakala eBellville eNtshonalanga Kapa, eNingizimu Afrika.Le nkampani isohlwini lweJohannesburg Stock Exchange (JSE) futhi iyinkampani yomshwalense wesikhathi esifushane omkhulu waseNingizimu Afrika. 
I-Suid-Afrikaanse Nasionale Trust en Assuransie Maatskappy (South African National Trust and Assurance Company Limited) (Santam) yasungulwa zingama-28 kuNdasa 1918.Ngemva kwenyanga eyodwa I-South African Life Assurance Company (i- Sanlam ) yasungulwa njengengxenye egcwele ye-Santam ukuze igxile ekuqinisekiseni ukuphila kuyilapho i-Santam isagxile kumshwalense wesikhashana.Iqembu lezezimali i-Sanlam linenzalo esebenzayo engu-61.5% ku-Santam kusukela zingama-31 kuZibandlela wezi-2016. : 23 
Kusukela ngomhla ka-1 Mashi 2017, abaphathi abakhulu be-Santam baqukethe: : 74 
Ngezansi kunabanikazi bamasheya abakhulu beqembu kusukela mhla zingama-31 kuZibandlela wezi-2017 : 126 
I-Ozow ngaphambilini eyaziwa ngokuthi i-i-Pay, iyisiqalo se- fintech esizinze eNingizimu Afrika. 
Le nkampani ihlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zokukhokha nge-inthanethi kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika yonkana i- Afrika. 
Le nkampani inikeza abathengi izinsizakalo zamahhala zamakhadi lapho bethola khona ukufinyelela kuma-akhawunti abo besebenzisa ibhange le-inthanethi.I-Ozow isebenzisa isango lokukhokha ukuze inikeze amakhasimende izinkokhelo.Akukho ukubhaliswa okudingekayo futhi konke amakhasimende akudingayo iphrofayela yasebhange ye-inthanethi. 
Amakhasimende akhokha nge-Ozow akhokhela umthengisi kuphela.Azikho ezinye izinkokhelo. 
Azikho izimbuyiselo ezikhokhiswayo ezinkokhelweni.Abathengisi bathola izinkokhelo ngokuqondile ebhange lekhasimende noma kuma-akhawunti esikweletu.Amakhadi esikweletu awadingeki.Abathengisi futhi bathola izaziso zemisebenzi. 
Le nkampani ihlinzeka ngamabhizinisi e-inthanethi, ama- NGO kanye Nezinhlangano Ezingenzi Nzuzo ezisebenza ngaphansi kwesigidi sezigidi zamarandi ezinkokhelweni zanyanga zonke ezingabizi mali yokucubungula izinyanga eziyi-12. 
NgoSepthemba 2020 inkampani yakhulula i-Ozapp uhlelo lokusebenza lwewebhu oluvumela amakhasimende ane-akhawunti yasebhange noma indawo ye-e-Wallet ukuthi asebenze ngaphandle kwekhadi esebenzisa inkokhelo yekhodi ye-QR.Inkampani iphinde yakhipha i-Ozow PIN eyenza kube lula ukuthengiselana kwe-nEFT isebenzisa inqubo yokukhokha enezinyathelo ezine. 
U-Ozow uqinisekiswe yi-Thawte.I-Ozow ihlinzeka ngengqalasizinda yenethiwekhi yokucubungula izinkokhelo ze-inthanethi zabathengisi namakhasimende. 
U-Ozow ubhaliswe njengo-Systems Operator kanye Nomhlinzeki Wenkokhelo Ovela eceleni ne-Payments Association of South Africa (''PASA'').I-Ozow isebenzisa izindinganiso zokuphepha ze-PCI DSS kuplathifomu yayo ye-EFT ezenzakalelayo.NgoNovemba 2018, u-Ozow wamenywa emhlanganweni we-PASA EPC Risk Subcommittee, usihlalo wayo u-Vinu Thomas, ukuzodingida amazinga afanelekile angase ashaywe yi-PASA kanye ne- South African Reserve Bank (SARB) ukuze kuncishiswe ubungozi obuhlobene nokukhuhla isikrini. 
I-PASA ihlonze u-Ozow njengomhlinzeki wesevisi we-EFT ozenzakalelayo lapho i-PASA ingakwazi ukusebenzelana naye ukuze yakhe izinqubo ezingcono kakhulu mayelana nalokhu.Umbono we-PASA wawuwukuthi amazinga e-PCI DSS angasetshenziswa njengesisekelo samazinga okuphepha ezikhungweni ezizibandakanya ekukhunjweni kwesikrini, ngezithuthukisi ezengeziwe ze-EFT-specific (ezokwaziwa nge-PCI DSS+). 
Isungulwe ngo-2014 i-Ozow inendlunkulu eGoli naseKapa, eNingizimu Afrika. Inkampani yethulwe ekupheleni kuka-2016.Yasungulwa ngokuhlanganyela nguThomas Pays, Mitchan Adams kanye noLyle Eckstein.I-Ozow isungule futhi njengamanje isebenzisa isango lokukhokha le-inthanethi elizenzakalelayo le-Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT) eNingizimu Afrika naseNamibia . 
I-Ozow ifinyeleleka yibo bonke abanephrofayela yasebhange ye-inthanethi futhi ivumela izinkokhelo ezisheshayo kuwo wonke amadivayisi ahlakaniphile eselula nawedeskithophu.NgoMashi 5, 2020 inkampani yaphula ingqophamlando ka-R10 billion ekuhwebeni okusetshenziwe. 
Phakathi nobhubhane lwe-COVID-19 inkampani yahlangabezana nesidingo esikhulu sezinsizakalo zayo njengoba abantu abaningi babefuna ukuthenga igilosa yabo ku-inthanethi. 
NgoSepthemba 2020 ngo- Black Friday inkampani yalungisa u-R1 bhiliyoni ekuthengiseni ngalolu suku. 
Inkokhelo eyodwa enkulu kunazo zonke ecutshunguliwe yayingu-R500 000. 
Abatshalizimali abakhulu e-Ozow bahlanganisa iKalon Venture Partners, Vunani Capital kanye neBuffshelfco 33 (Pty) Ltd. 
Naspers Limited iyi -South African sezizwe ezihlukahlukene inkampani eliyifa ikomkhulu e Cape Town, nezithakazelo e ukushicilela, okudayisa inthanethi futhi ibhizinisi dolobha nokutshala izimali emkhakheni umthengi inthanethi.Umnikazi wamasheya oyinhloko we-Naspers yinkampani ephethwe yi-Dutch esohlwini lwe- Prosus, ephethe cishe u-49% wabazali bayo njengengxenye yobunikazi obuhlukahlukene. 
Yasungulwa ngo-1915 ngummeli u-WA Hofmeyr, iNaspers kwakuyinkampani yokushicilela enkulu kunazo zonke eNingizimu Afrika phakathi nekhulunyaka lama-20 enentshisekelo kuwo wonke amaphephandaba, omagazini nezincwadi.Ngeminyaka yawo-1980 inkampani yaqala ukuhlukahluka, yethula insizakalo kamabonakude ekhokhelwayo futhi yatshala imali ezimakethe ezingaphandle kweNingizimu Afrika okokuqala ngqa. 
Ngo-2001, i-Naspers yatshala imali kusenesikhathi enkampanini yobuchwepheshe yaseShayina i- Tencent futhi yagxila kakhulu emkhakheni we-inthanethi wabathengi bomhlaba.Ngo-2019, i-Naspers yafaka kuhlu lwebhizinisi lokutshalwa kwezimali ku-inthanethi emhlabeni wonke i-Prosus (kuhlanganise ne-31% yezabelo ku-Tencent) ku-Euronext Amsterdam. 
I-Naspers njengamanje inamasheya angu-56.92% e-Prosus futhi ingumnikazi ngokuphelele we- Media24 (inkampani enkulu yokushicilela e-Afrika), i-Takealot.com (umdayisi omkhulu we-inthanethi waseNingizimu Afrika) kanye ne-Naspers Foundry, isikhwama semali esigxile eNingizimu Afrika. 
Ngo-1914, iqembu ovelele Cape amaBhunu isinqumo emhlanganweni Stellenbosch ukwakha inkampani ukushicilela ukuthi shoka namaBhunu ubuzwe ku -Union of South Africa.Lo mhlangano uholela ku-WA Hofmeyr, ummeli owaziwayo waseKapa kanye nomgqugquzeli weNational Party ; wasungula iDe Nasionale Pers Beperkt (National Press Ltd) ngo-1915 njengomshicileli wamaphephandaba nomagazini.Igama lenkampani lalivame ukufushaniswa libe yi-Naspers ( De Nas ionale Pers Beperk ), isivumelwano sagcina sesisetshenziswa ngisho nayinkampani ngokwayo. 
I-Naspers yethulwa ngokwesekwa nguJannie Marais, umlimi ovelele waseStellenbosch, Jan Christiaan Smuts, Louis Botha, kanye nomongameli ongumsunguli we-National Party u- JBM Hertzog.U-Naspers wayesekela kakhulu i-National Party futhi waqala ukushicilela ulimi lwesiBhunu nsuku zonke i- De Burger (kamuva eyaqanjwa kabusha ngokuthi i- Die Burger ) ngoJuni 1915, yalandelwa umagazini wayo wokuqala, i- De Huisgenoot (kamuva eyaba yi-Die Huisgenoot ) ngo-1916. 
NgoMashi 2021, uSwiggy wamisa i-Health Hub yonkana e- Chennai, e- Tamil Nadu . 
NgoJuni 2021, i-Swiggy ne-ANRA Technologies bahlangana ndawonye ukuze bethule izivivinyo zokulethwa kwe-drone e-India. 
Ngo-2015, inkampani yaqala ukuheha abatshalizimali bangaphandle.Esokuqala kwaba ukutshalwa kwezimali kuka-$2 million okuvela kwa-Accel kanye ne-SAIF Partners, kanye nokutshalwa kwezimali okwengeziwe okuvela e- Nowest Venture Partners . [1]Ngonyaka olandelayo, u-Swiggy wanyusa amaRandi ayizigidi eziyi-15 kubatshalizimali abasha nabakhona, okuhlanganisa iBessemer Venture Partners kanye neHarmony Partners. 
Ngo-2017, uNaspers wahola uxhaso lwezigidi ezingama- $ 80 kuSwiggy. [1]U-Swiggy uthole u-$100 million ovela e-China-based Meituan-Dianping and Naspers ngo-2018 futhi uxhaxha lwezimali ezitshaliwe lwakhuphula inani lenkampani lafinyelela ngaphezu kwesigidigidi esingu-$1. [1] 
NgoFebhuwari 2019, u-Swiggy wathola ukuqalisa kwe-AI esekwe e-Bangalore i-Kint.io. 
Ngo-Ephreli 2020, u-Swiggy uthole imali elinganiselwa ezigidini ezingama-43 zamaRandi ebiza inkampani ngama-dollar ayizigidi eziyizinkulungwane ezingama-3.6. 
U-Swiggy uthole ukudla kwase-Asia okusekelwe e-Bangalore e- 48East ngo-2017.U-Swiggy kamuva wathola i- Scootsy Logistics ese -Mumbai, isevisi edonsa kanzima yokulethwa kokudla nemfashini, futhi kamuva wayivala.Ithole isiqalo sokulethwa kobisi esise-Mumbai i- SuprDaily kuyo yonke imali.Ngo-2019, inkampani yatshala imali engu-Rs. 
31 crore e-Mumbai-based ukudla okulungele ukudliwa i-Fingerlix. 
Le nkampani iqoqe amaRandi ayizigidi ezingu-800 ku-Series J uxhaso oluyindilinga oluvela ku-Falcon Edge Capital, i-Goldman Sachs, i-Think Capital, i-Amansa Capital, ne-Carmignac, kanye nabatshalizimali abakhona i-Prosus Ventures kanye ne-Accel ebiza i-Swiggy cishe ku-$4.9 billion. 
Swiggy kuyinto India sika ngobukhuluukudla online ukuhleleka kuka kanye ukulethwa platform, eyasungulwa ngo-July 2014. 
I-Swiggy izinze e- Bangalore, e- India, futhi kusukela ngo-September 2021, isebenza emadolobheni ase-India angu-500.Ekuqaleni kuka-2019, i-Swiggy yanda ekulethweni komkhiqizo ojwayelekile ngaphansi kwegama elithi Swiggy Stores. 
U-Swiggy usebenzisane no- Burger King ukuze banikeze izinsiza zokulethwa.Iphinde yasebenzisana ne- Google Local Guide ukuze kube lula ukubuyekezwa kwamakhasimende, kanye ne- Sodexo ukuze amakhasimende akwazi ukukhokha ngamakhadi okudla.U-Swiggy usebenzisane ne-Indifi Technologies ukuze enze uhlelo lokuxhasa ngezimali izindawo zokudlela zozakwethu.U-Swiggy wethule i-wallet yedijithali, i- Swiggy Money, ngokubambisana ne-ICICI Bank. 
Inkampani ye-Swiggy ne-drone i-ANRA Technologies isiqalile ngezivivinyo zabo zokulethwa kwe-drone e-India, njengokusho kwesimemezelo sakamuva. 
NgoSepthemba 2019, i-Swiggy yethula insizakalo yokulanda/yokwehlisa i-Swiggy Go.Isevisi isetshenziselwa izinto eziningi ezihlukahlukene, okuhlanganisa ilondolo kanye nokulethwa kwamadokhumenti noma amaphasela kumakhasimende ebhizinisi namakhasimende adayisayo. [1] 
Ngo-2013, abasunguli ababili, uNandan Reddy kanye no-Sriharsha Majety, baklame iwebhusayithi ye-e-commerce ebizwa ngokuthi i-Bundl ukuze kube lula ukuhlinzeka ngeposi nokuthunyelwa ngaphakathi kwe-India.I-Bundl yamiswa, futhi yaqanjwa kabusha ukuze ingene emakethe yokulethwa kokudla.Ngaleso sikhathi, umkhakha wokulethwa kokudla wawunesiphithiphithi njengoba iziqalo ezimbalwa eziphawulekayo, ezifana ne- Foodpanda (kamuva eyatholwa yi- Ola Cabs ), i-TinyOwl (kamuva eyatholwa yi- Zomato ) kanye ne-Ola Cafe (kamuva yavalwa) yayidonsa kanzima. [1] [2] UMajety noReddy bakhulume no-Rahul Jaimini, owayekade eno- Myntra, futhi basungula i-Swiggy kanye nenkampani ephethe umzali i-Bundl Technologies ngo-2013. [2] Le nkampani yakha inethiwekhi yokulethwa ozinikele futhi yakhula ngokushesha, ngokuyinhloko iqhutshwa ukugxila ku-logistics kanye nokuvala izinsiza ezibalulekile. 
NgoMeyi 2020, uSwiggy wadiliza abasebenzi abayi-1100 ngesikhathi sobhadane lwe-COVID-19. 
Ngo-Agasti 2020, inkampani yethula inkundla yabo yokulethwa kwegrosa ebizwa nge-InstaMart. 
Ngo-2021, inkampani yamemezela ukuthi izokhokhela izindleko zokugoma kubalingani bayo bokulethwa. 
I-Zomato ( /z oʊ m ɑː t oʊ / ) iyinkampani ehlanganisa indawo yokudlela yamazwe ngamazwe yaseNdiya kanye nenkampani eletha ukudla eyasungulwa ngu-Deepinder Goyal no-Pankaj Chaddah ngo-2008.I-Zomato inikeza ulwazi, amamenyu kanye nokubuyekezwa komsebenzisi kwezindawo zokudlela kanye nezinketho zokulethwa kokudla ezivela ezindaweni zokudlela zozakwethu emadolobheni athile.NGO KWA-2019 , isevisi itholakala emazweni angu-24 nasemadolobheni angaphezu kuka-10,000. 
I-Zomato yasungulwa njenge- Foodiebay ngo-2008, futhi yaqanjwa kabusha ngokuthi i- Zomato ngo-18 January 2010 njenge-Zomato Media Pvt. Ltd.Ngo-2011, lanwetshwa kulo lonke elaseNdiya laya eDelhi NCR, Mumbai, Bangalore, Chennai, Pune kanye ne- Ahmedabad.Ngo-2012, yandisa ukusebenza kwamanye amazwe emazweni amaningana, kuhlanganise ne- United Arab Emirates, i- Sri Lanka,Qatar, - United Kingdom, - Philippines, kanye neNingizimu Afrika .Ngo-2013, kunwetshwe kwaze kwaba se- New Zealand, Turkey, Brazil nase- Indonesia, ngewebhusayithi nezinhlelo zokusebenza ezitholakala ngesi- Turkish, isiPutukezi, isi- Indonesian nesiNgisi .Ngo-April 2014, yethulwa ePortugal, okwalandelwa ukwethulwa eCanada, Lebanon nase- Ireland ngo-2015. 
I-Ackermans iwuxhaxha lwezitolo ezidayisa izingubo zaseNingizimu Afrika. 
Yasungulwa ngo - 1916 eWynberg, eKapa, i - Ackermans inezitolo ezingaphezu kuka - 700 kulo lonke elaseNingizimu Afrika, kuhlanganise naseNamibia, Botswana, Lesotho, eSwatini naseZambia, futhi ikomkhulu layo liseKuilsriver ngaseCape Town.Ngo-2015 i-Ackermans ikleliswe isibili ngesitolo sezingubo ezinhle kakhulu yiSouth African Consumer Satisfaction Index. 
I-Ackermans yaqala ngo-1916 lapho uGus Ackerman evula isitolo sokuqala ngqa eWynberg, eKapa, eNingizimu Afrika 
Ngo-1960, i-Ackermans yathengiswa kwabakwaGreatermans. 
ngo-1970, i-Ackermans yadayiselwa u- Edgars owagcina isikhundla sakhe sesaphulelo samanani esiyimpumelelo. 
Ngo-1984, u- Pepkor wathola ama-Ackermans.Ngaleso sikhathi, bekunezitolo ezingama-34 ezweni lonke. 
Ekuqaleni kwekhulunyaka i-Ackermans yakhula yaba izitolo ezingaphezu kuka-200 kulo lonke elaseNingizimu Afrika.Ekupheleni konyaka wezimali ka-2002/2003 izitolo zethu zase zingu-284. 
Namuhla, njengoba kunezitolo ezingaphezu kuka-450 eNingizimu ne-Afrika, leli bhizinisi kulindeleke ukuthi lidlule izigidigidi ezi-R5. 
[2] 
I-Kulula yinkampani ephethwe ngokugcwele ye- Comair Ltd, futhi esebenza ngezindiza njenge- franchisee ye- British Airways.I-Kulula.com, inkampani yeBritish Airways iSouthern Africa kanye neComair Ltd yamisa ukusebenza ngoJulayi 2020 ngenxa yezinkinga zezimali ezidalwa ubhubhane lwe-COVID-19.Kokubili i-Kulula kanye ne-British Airways franchise ephethwe yi-Comair ihlela ukuqala kabusha ukusebenza ngoDisemba 2020. 
Kusukela ngoMashi 2019, Kulula ukusebenzisa lezi zindawo ezilandelayo: 
I-Comair I-Kenya Airways [1] I-KLM 
I-Boeing 727-200 I-Boeing 737-200 McDonnell Douglas MD-82 [1] 
I-Kulula isiyaziwa ngamabhanoyi ayo ahlukile, anemibala egqamile, futhi avame ukuhlekisa.Enye yezindiza zayo zangaphambili, eyaziwa nge- Flying 101, yayimbozwe inganekwane echaza izingxenye ezihlukene zendiza. 
I-Kulula.com ( ebhalwe ngokuthi kulula.com ) futhi evame ukubizwa ngokuthi i- Kulula iyinkampani yezindiza yaseNingizimu Afrika ebiza kancane, esebenza emizileni emikhulu yasekhaya esuka e - OR Tambo International Airport kanye nase Lanseria International Airport, zombili zisebenzela idolobha laseGoli .Ikomkhulu lale nkampani yezindiza liseBonaero Park, Kempton Park, Ekurhuleni, eGauteng.Igama elithi 'Kulula' livela ezilimini zesiNguni zesiZulu nesiXhosa, okusho ukuthi Kulula. 
I-Kulula isebenzisa uhlelo lokundiza njalo lwe-Avios, oludalwe ekuhlanganisweni kwezinhlelo ze- Air Miles, i-BA Miles kanye ne-Iberia Plus Points ngomhla ziyi-16 kuLwezi wezi-2011.Ukuhlelwa kabusha ngo-2015 kwasho ukuthi zonke izinhlelo zokwethembeka ezingaphansi kwe-IAG ezisebenzisa i-Avios, okuhlanganisa i-Avios Travel Reward Programme, Iberia Plus kanye neBritish Airways Executive Club zidluliselwe ku- Avios Group, inkampani ephethwe yi-IAG. 
I-Kulula inikeza ukudla neziphuzo njengohlelo lokuthenga ebhodini.[1] Iphephabhuku lendiza lendiza, khuluma, linabafundi abayizi-200,000 ngenyanga. 
I-Kulula yasungulwa ngoJulayi 2001 futhi yaqala ukusebenza njengenkampani yokuqala ethwala izinto ezingenasidingo eNingizimu Afrika ngo-August walowo nyaka.Inhloso eshiwo bekuwukubeka kulula.com njengokungaphezu nje kohlobo lwendiza, kodwa ukufaka phakathi ukubhuka, ukukhokha nokwenza 'isipiliyoni esiphelele sokuvakasha' sithengeke. 
Ngo-2010, uKulula waphoqwa yiFIFA ukuba amise umkhankaso owawuzichaza ngokuthi "Unofficial National Carrier of the You-Know-What",[1] okwenzeka "Hhayi ngonyaka ozayo, hhayi ngonyaka odlule, kodwa endaweni ethile. phakathi", [2] ngokusobala ibhekise kwiNdebe Yomhlaba yeFIFA ka-2010 eyayiseNingizimu Afrika ngaleso sikhathi.Esinye isikhangiso simemezele "izindiza ezingabizi [kuya] kuwo wonke umuntu ngaphandle kuka- Sepp Blatter " (umongameli we-FIFA), onikezwe isihlalo samahhala "isikhathi salokho okwenzekayo njengamanje". [3] 
NgoJulayi 2012 kulula yamemezela ukuthi ibisebenzisa iBoeing 737-800 yokuqala entsha eyisikhombisa , ezintathu zizosebenza ngaphambi kokuphela kwalowo nyaka, kanti ezine ezisele zizolethwa ngo-2015 no-2016. 
I-Kulula.com kanye nenkampani engabazali i-Comair bamisa ukusebenza ngasekupheleni kuka-March 2020 ngenxa yezinkinga zezimali ezibangelwe ubhubhane lwe-COVID-19.Inkampani yezindiza ihlela ukuqala kabusha ukusebenza ngoDisemba 2020. 
Ngo-2012, Mann wabekwa icala nantathu felony okukhwabanisa, ngezinsolo zokuqola iSouth idolobha muhle Uhlelo ngenkathi ezisebenza inkampani yakhe ingcebo MannEdge Properties ngo-2008 no-2009 Abashushisi basehlisa isigwebo saba ngamacala amahlanu ngo-August 2013, kwathi kamuva ngalowo nyaka uMann akazange aphikise amacala amahlanu.Wagwetshwa iminyaka emihlanu evivinywa futhi wayalelwa ukuba akhokhe inhlawulo engu-$10,000 kanye nokubuyiselwa.UMann utshele iNew York Times ngo-2021 ukuthi ukugwetshwa kwabe sekuhoxiswa. 
UMann usungule inkampani ekhiqiza amavidiyo iDhar Mann Studios ngo-2018. 
Isitudiyo sikhiqiza amafilimu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njenge-YouTube.Ngesikhathi uMann eqala isiteshi se-YouTube ngo-2018, umphumela waso wawuhlanganisa amavidiyo akhuthazayo, futhi ukugxila kwesiteshi kamuva kwashintshela emidlalweni yokuziphatha.Ngo-2021, uMann waqala inkontileka ne- Creative Artists Agency . [1] 
New York Times profile of Mann echazwe zamavidiyo wakhe ngokuthi "Ukulandisa ezifika ngesikhathi eziphathelene amaphoyisa ayiziswana Karens futhi Covid-19 Ababefihla" kucocwa fashion "1980 ngemva kwesikole Okukhethekile kanye zemfundo amafilimu esifushane '50s", siphawula zabo ngokuvamile "amancane futhi absolutist" ifilosofi yokuziphatha kanye nezihloko ze- clickbait ngokusobala.UVulture wawabiza ngokuthi amavidiyo "okuzizwa kahle" ahloselwe "ukukhuthaza abantu ukuthi bahlonipheke omunye komunye." 
Ku-2014, uMann wayesebudlelwaneni nosomabhizinisi uLilly Ghalichi, owaziwa ngokubamba iqhaza ochungechungeni lwethelevishini olungokoqobo Shahs of Sunset.UMann wahlangana nengoduso yakhe uLaura Avila ngonyaka ka-2015. 
Ndawonye, umbhangqwana uphatha i-LiveGlam, inkampani yezimonyo eyasungulwa nguMann ngo-2015.Laba bashadikazi baba nengane yabo yokuqala ngo-2020.Kamuva ngalowo nyaka, bathenga isithabathaba somuzi eCalabasas, eCalifornia phambilini esasiphethwe umsakazi wezindaba uKhloé Kardashian.Ngo-2021, lo mbhangqwana wazala ingane yesibili. 
Izinkomba 
UDhar Mann (owazalwa ngoMeyi 29, 1984) ungusomabhizinisi waseMelika.UMann usungule iDhar Mann Studios, ekhiqiza amafilimu amafushane ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njenge-YouTube, ngo-2018. 
Ngo-2010, uMann kanye nomthengisi wamasheya uDerek Peterson bathola umbiko obalulekile kwabezindaba ngokusungula isitolo se-weGrow, esasithengisa ama- hydroponics akhangiswe ukutshala insangu yezokwelapha.I-weGrow yavalwa eminyakeni emibili kamuva phakathi kwamacala phakathi kozakwethu bebhizinisi.Ngemva konyaka, ngo-2013, uMann wabekwa icala ngezinsolo zokukhwabanisa idolobha lase- Oakland, eCalifornia ngenkathi eqhuba inkampani yakhe yezindlu iMannEdge Properties. 
UDharminder Mann wazalwa ngoMeyi 29, 1984, indodana kaSurinder no-Baljit Singh, abasuka eNdiya baya e- United States .Abazali bakaMann bangabanikazi be-Friendly Cab, umqhubi wetekisi ozinze e- Oakland, eCalifornia .I- East Bay Express yabika ngo-2015 ukuthi umndeni wakwaSingh "uphethe iphothifoliyo ebanzi yezindawo ezithengiswayo e-Oakland". 
UMann ukhumbula ekhulela efulethini elinekamelo elilodwa e-Bay Area elalihlala neminye imikhaya emithathu.Njengoba abazali bakhe babegxile ekuphatheni inkampani yabo, kunokuba "banginike isikhathi sabo, banginika imali yokwenza izinto."Lapho eneminyaka eyishumi nesishiyagalolunye, waqala inkampani yezindlu ezithengiswayo, futhi wasungula ezinye, ngokuvamile ezihlulekayo, izinkampani phakathi neminyaka eyishumi, okuhlanganisa amabhizinisi ezinsizeni zokuqasha izimoto zikanokusho kanye nokubuyisela imali yezindlu . 
UMann wasungula i- weGrow, umthengisi wama- hydroponics akhula insangu, nowayengumthengisi wamasheya uDerek Peterson ngoJanuwari 2010.UMann noPeterson baqashe isitolo esise- Oakland, eCalifornia ukuze badayise imishini ye-hydroponics, futhi bahlose ukuvula ama-franchise kwezinye izifundazwe eziyisishiyagalombili. 
Ekuqaleni kuka-2011, isitolo se-weGrow savalwa, uPeterson efaka amacala ngokumelene nenkampani ecaphuna izikweletu ezingakhokhiwe futhi esola uMann ngokwenza "uhlelo lwe-hydroponzi" kunhlolokhono kaMama Jones.Umkhulumeli kaMann wabe esesola uPeterson ngokuqamba lezi zinsolo eziphindiselela ngesinqumo sikaMann sokwehlisa ubudlelwano babo, [1] futhi uMann waphumelela ekumangaleleni uPeterson ngenkokhelo yemali kanye namasheya enkampanini kaPeterson. 
I-GTunnel iwuhlelo lwe-Windows oluthuthukiswe yi- Garden Networks ehlela iseva elibamba le-HTTP noma le- SOCKS lendawo elidonsa ithrafikhi ngepulazi labo leseva ngaphambi kokuba lifinyelele lapho liya khona. 
I-GTunnel ivikela ubumfihlo babasebenzisi be-inthanethi kanye nenkululeko yokukhuluma ngalezi zindlela: 
Inguqulo ye-GTunnel 1.1 inikeza imodi evamile, okuyimodi yokusebenza eyinhloko futhi inikeza ukusebenza okungcono kakhulu kokudluliswa kwedatha ngokuxhuma kumaseva angemuva ngokuqondile, imodi ye-Skype, kanye nemodi ye-Tor edlula kumakhompyutha kule nethiwekhi ye-P2P.I-GTunnel futhi inokusetshenziswa kubonwa okuthuthukisiwe okufaka amagrafu ethrafikhi esikhathi sangempela. 
UMama Motlalepula Chabaku wayeyilungu eliphezulu lomphakathi futhi eyisishoshovu esaziwayo, umama wesizwe nonobuntu. 
Wayengomunye wamalungu asebenza ngaphansi kobuholi bukaLillian Ngoyi owahola iMashi Yabesifazane yango-1956 eyayinabesifazane abangu 20 000 abamashela ekomkhulu lombuso eUnion Building ePitoli, bebhikishela imithetho yokucindezelwa ngumbuso wobandlululo ngokuthi abesimame baphathe amapasi. 
UMama Chabaku usebenze kumaphalamende amabili esifunda saseNingizimu Afrika eGauteng [1] naseFree State eNingizimu Afrika; wabanedumela elandulela ukusebenza kwakhe emphakathini nasemhlabeni jikelele. 
Wayaziwa ngabaningi ngomdlandla wakhe, umuzwa wakhe oqinile wokusebenzela umphakathi kanye nozwelo lwakhe. 
Wafakela isiqephu esithi "Going up the mountain"(Ukukhuphuka intaba) ku-anthology yango-1984 ethi Sisterhood Is Global: The International Women's Movement Anthology, ehlelwe nguRobin Morgan . [2] Ugqozi lwakhe olukhulu eminyakeni yakhe ephambili kwakuyimvelo namandla okwelapha ngamakhambi emvelo. 
Wabuya waba yisazi sezitshalo zemvelo ze-horticulture emadolobheni futhi wasebenzisa isikhathi sakhe esiningi efundisa imiphakathi yaseSoweto, eNingizimu Afrika ngokutshala kanye namakhambi emvelo. 
Washona ngomhla ka11 Meyi (uNhlaba) ngo 2012 [3] esekhaya lakhe eRockville eSoweto. 
Umlando wakhe ngemfundo 
Amazwe awahambele 
Uhambe kuzo zonke izifundazwe zaseNingizimu Afrika, eNamibia, eLesotho, eBotswana, eMozambique, eZimbabwe kanye naseKenya. 
Uhambe kakhulu e-USA, ekhuluma, eshumayela, efundisa futhi eqhuba imihlangano yokucobelelana ngolwazi mayelana noBudlelwane Babantu futhi waya nakumakhonferense emazweni angu 29 eYurophu, eCaribbean, eNingizimu Melika, eCanada nase-Afrika. 
NgoJanuwari 1987, waya e-Oslo Norway ukuyokhuluma "Ngamalungelo Abantu" eNingizimu Afrika. 
Waya e-Israel, eJordan, eCanada, eSyria, eBrazil, eBermuda, eJapan nase-Cuba. 
NgoSeptemba 1994 waya eBern's eSwitzerland ukuyothamela Inkomfa YokuQala Yamazwe Omhlaba YaBongameli besifazane Bezishayamthetho Zikahulumeni. 
NgoSeptemba 1995 waya eNgqungqutheleni Yesibili Yezizwe Ngezizwe Yabengameli besifazane Bezishayamthetho Zikahulumeni eTokyo, eJapane. 
Ukuhambela Amakhonferense Ezizwe Ezihlangene 
I-United Nations Institute for Training and Research eNorway ngo-1980 mayelana ne-"Women in Changing Societies" I-United Nations ye-Mid-decate for Women and Women's Conferences Phakathi neminyaka Eyishumi Yabesifazane ka 1975-1980 eCopenhagen Denmark. 
Imiklomelo nezicaphuno 
E-Bloemfontein Annual Springs Business Breakfast wakhethwa ngazwi linye Njengomuntu Wonyaka "ngo-1995. 
Mhla ka 27 Mashi (kuNdasa) 1996 waklonyeliswa ngendondo ehlonishwayo ye-Afrikaans Language Cultural Association - Ladies Award. 
Mhla ka 17 Epreli (kuMbasa) 1996 wavotelwa ngazwi linye njengesakhamuzi sonyaka saseBloemfontein".

UMama uMotlalepula Chabaku wafunda kulezi zikhungo zemfundo ezilandelayo: 
E-Elizabethtown College - i-Elizabethtown Pennsylvania USA lapho aqeda khona iBachelor of Liberal Studies Degree ngo-1981 E-North Carolina A kanye ne-T State University - Greensboro North Carolina USA lapho aphothula khona i-Master's of Science Degree in Education Adult ngo-1984. E-North Carolina A kanye ne-T State University - Greensboro North Carolina e-USA lapho aphothule khona i-Master of Science Degree in Guidance and Counselling egxile kwi-Agency Counselling ngo-1985. E-General Board of Discipleship United Methodist Church - Nashville Tennessee USA lapho aqeda khona isifundo esikhethekile sonyaka owodwa nge-African Spirituality ngo-1991. 
E-St Cyprian Anglican School - Sophiatown South Africa 1953-1955 E-Christ the King School Sophiatown South Africa 1955-1957 EThusang Community School - White City Jabavu Soweto South Africa 1960-1962 KuMkhandlu Wedolobha LaseGoli, Umnyango Wezindaba we-Non-European Department, Isigaba Sophiki Lwentsha - Johannesburg eNingizimu Afrika 1963-1974 E-Christian Institute of South Africa - eNingizimu Afrika 1974-1976 E-USA Mission Interpreter for the United Presbyterian Church – Raleigh North Carolina USA Septemba1979 – Juni 1980 Umsizi woMfundisi e-Concord Presbyterian Church - Wilmington Delaware USA Disemba - Julayi 1981 Umfundisi, isazi samazwe ngamazwe kanye noMeluleki eResidencd eBennett College - Greensboro North Carolina USA Septemba1991-August 1993 Usebenze njengoNomsebenzi Womphakathi e-Raleigh Board of Missions and Church Extension of the United Methodist - Raleigh North Carolina USA 1994 E-United Methodist Minister wamabandla amathathu - iRandolph Country North Carolina USA Juni 1985 - Juni 1988 UMfundisi WamaWeseli WamaBandla amathathu - ICatawba North Carolina e-USA Juni 1988 - Juni 1991 UMfundisi WamaWeseli WamaBandla amahlanu aseWeseli ngaphansi kwe-Vanguard Mission yeBandla lamaWeseli - Heidadal Circuit Bloemfontein eNingizimu Afrika, ngoJanuwari 1993 - Meyi 1994 USomlomo ePhalamende lase-Orange Free State - Bloemfontein eNingizimu Afrika ukusukela ngoMeyi 1994 - Januwari 1998 Ilungu eliphelele lesiShayamthetho saseFreyistata – eeBloemfontein eNingizimu Afrika ukusukela ngoMeyi 1994 – Epreli 1999 ILungu loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezifundazwe ePhalamende Likazwelonke eKapa njengesithunywa esiphelele sesiFundazwe saseFreyistata – eBloemfontein eNingizimu Afrika ukusukela ngoMashi 2000 - Epreli 2004 Ilungu lesiShayamthetho saseGauteng ukusukela ngo-April 2004 - April 2009 
ILungu Lesigungu Esiphezulu Sesifundazwe seNhlangano Yokuhlela Umndeni yaseNingizimu Afrika UMongameli Kazwelonke Wezwi Labesifazane (iVoice of Women - VOW) inhlangano yabesifazane yezinhlanga ezehlukene Umxhumanisi Wohlelo, AmaKlabhu Entsha Yenhlangano YeNingizimu ne-Afrika ILungu ElinguMsunguli Wenhlangano Yabesifazane Abamnyama eNingizimu Afrika kanye neLungu Lephaneli Yemithombo yosizo Uthisha Wesikole, Usonhlalakahle, uSihlalo weKomidi Lonyaka Wabesifazane Wamazwe Omhlaba eNingizimu Afrika, ILungu Eliphethe LeSikole SaseMoroka kanye Namabhodi Esikole Samabanga Aphakeme saseMolapo, Umuntu Wemithombo yosizo (Resource persons) kanye Nomsebenzi Womphakathi we-Christian Institute of South Africa kuze ukufikela kumhla ka 30 kuJuni 1976. Umeluleki kwi-Lifeline for Crisis Counselling, Umeluleki weNhlangano Yabesifazane Yamabandla Azimele Ase-Afrika, i-Women's Association of African Independent Churches (WAAIC) 
Ubulunga 
ILungu Elingumsunguli, Inhlangano Yabesifazane Abansundu yaseNingizimu Afrika, iBlack Women's Federation of South Africa kanye neLungu Lephaneli yayo Yemithombo yosizo i-Resource Panel Ilunga eliphezulu le-African National Congress (ANC) kusukela kumhla ka 2 kuFebruwari (uNhlolanja) 1949 Anglican Church of the Province in South Africa Ilungu Eliphezulu Lebandla LamaWeseli laseNingizimu Afrika ILungu loMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wabesifazane base-Afrika, iNational Council of African Women Ilungu LeKomidi Elidlule, IKomidi Lenhloso Jikelele leSikhungo Se_Institute of Race Relations Institute of Race Relations I-Association Member Drama Board of Great Britain (Impilo yakhe yonke) I-Young Women's Christian Association (YWCA) – Phahameng Bloemfontein eNingizimu Afrika Inhlangano Yabasebenzi Bezenhlalakahle YaseNingizimu Afrika i South African Black Social Workers Association (SABSWA) ISANTA Care Group eMangaung Bloemfontein eNingizimu Afrika I-South African Red Cross I-KONTAK – Inhlangano Yabesifazane Yamasiko Ahlukene yobudlelwano obungcono babantu, iMulticulturl Women's Organisation for better human relationships. 
Le ndawo ibihlonishwa kusukela ngeNkathi Ephakathi. 
Abesifazane bendawo base-Taraz Oasis basathandazela izingane nomndeni ojabulayo. 
Kuwumkhuba kwabasanda kushada e-Taraz ukuthi inyunyana yabo ibusiswe yizithandani ezingasekho. 
Isiko labo lilingisa inganekwane. 
Ngemva komcimbi iphathi yomshado ilandelela uhambo luka-Karakhan olusuka e-Taraz luya endaweni okwashonela kuyo ingoduso yakhe. 
Uhambo luqala eKarakhan Mausoleum e-Taraz luphele e-Aisha Bibi, endaweni ngayinye umakoti nomkhwenyana bahlonipha izithandani ezifile futhi bacele isibusiso sabo. 
U-Aisha-Bibi ( Kazakh) uyi-mausoleum yekhulu le-11 noma le-12 yowesifazane ohloniphekile etholakala edolobhaneni lase-Aisha Bibi, 18 km (11 mi) entshonalanga yase- Taraz, Kazakhstan kuSilk Road . 
Idume endaweni njengesikhumbuzo sothando nokwethembeka. 
umklamo 
Ngokusho kwenganekwane, i-mausoleum yakhiwe umbusi we-Karakhanid Dynasty ngengoduso yakhe enhle u-Aisha-Bibi, indodakazi yembongi yamaSufi uKhakim-Ata . 
I-Mausoleum sika yezakhiwo amafomu kanye umhlobiso asikhumbuza esihle lace. 
Isakhiwo sonke simbozwe ngamathayili e- terracotta aqoshiwe esebenzisa amaphethini e-geometric ezimbali ahlukene angama-60 kanye ne-calligraphy eyenziwe ngesitayela. [1] U-Aisha Bibi uyinzalo eqondile yesitayela ye- Samanid Mausoleum e- Bukhara . [2] 
U-Aisha Bibi uyingxenye yesakhiwo esikhudlwana. 
Amamitha ayishumi ukusuka kude kune-mausoleum yesibili ebizwa ngokuthi yi-Babaji Khatun ("indlovukazi ehlakaniphile"), futhi ngaphesheya komgwaqo kunomhume we-limestone ongcwele. 
Kanye nendawo engadini nendawo yokupaka bakha itshe lesikhumbuzo likazwelonke. 
Isakhiwo sibekwe onqenqemeni olubheke i-oasis yase-Taraz ukusuka entshonalanga. 
I-mausoleum yonke imbozwe ngamaphaneli e-terracotta asiza ukudala inkohliso yobuningi obujwayelekile ekwakhiweni kwe-Islamic. 
Umhlobiso we-terracotta ubuye usebenzise ukukhanya nesithunzi kunombala, isitayela sangaphambi kwe-Mongol. 
Ngokusebenza, lolu hlobo lomhlobiso luhlakaza ukukhanya ukuze umbukeli angaphuphutheki njengoba angase asuke odongeni olunombala okhanyayo elangeni eligcwele. 
Amakholomu ekhoneni akheke ngemuva kwamakholomu okhuni asetshenziswa kakhulu ekwakhiweni kwe-Soghdian pre-Islamic. 
Kukhona ibhande le-calligraphy endaweni yokuvinjelwa kukholamu ngayinye. 
Ngokuvamile bachaza ubuhle buka-Aisha Bibi nothando nje jikelele. 
Enye yama-distich amadala ifundeka kanje: “Ikwindla. . . 
Amafu. . . 
Umhlaba muhle". 
USauran clay wayevame ukwenza izitina kukokubili okwangempela nokubuyiselwa kwe-Aisha Bibi.[1] 
Umlando 
I-Mausoleum kaBibi Khanum eduze ku-Aisha Bibi 
Lentokaza enhle eneminyaka engu-16 ududala, u-Aisha-Bibi, ubenehora elilodwa kusukela ekuhlanganeni nesithandwa sakhe. 
Wayethandana no-emir kaTaraz futhi wayefuna ukumshada, ngokuphambene nezifiso zikayise, ngakho washiya ikhaya lakhe e-Otrar nomhlengikazi omanzi. 
Ngasekupheleni kohambo lwabo, labesifazane bobabili bema ogwini emfuleni wase-Assa ukuze bageze. 
Ngenkathi ephuma emfuleni, wathatha izingubo zakhe futhi walunywa yinyoka leyo eyase ingene ezingutsheni zakhe, esasemanzini. 
Ukulunywa kwakubulala futhi wafa emva kwalokho.Le-Emir yayibuyela kusukela kumishini yezempi ezohlangana naye kodwa kwase kwephuze kakhulu. 
Wathi makwakhiwe ithuna kumkhumbula nothando lwabo lwaphakade. 
Isazi semivubukulo saseRussia uV. V. Bartold ube usosayensi wokuqala ukuqopha nokufunda ngo-1893.[1] I-Soviet Union yakha igobolondo lengilazi elivikelayo ukuze kulondolozwe itshe lesikhumbuzo (c 1960) futhi wayisebenzisela ukufundisa abafundi eTaraz nezokuvakasha . 
Ngo 2000, iRiphabhulikhi ye-Kazakhstan yakhokhela u-Nishan Rameto ukubuyisela i-Aisha Bibi futhu wakha ingqalasizinda yepaki elizungezile.[2] Shoqan Walikhanov wapenda itshe lesikhumbuzo emsebenzini wakhe ngo-1856. 
Bhekafuthi 
U-Samanid mausoleum 
Amanothi 
Ireferensi 
Ukufunda okwengeziwe 
URay Alexander Simons, uHelen Joseph, uLilian Ngoyi kanye noFlorence Mkhize basungula iFederation of South African Women (FSAW) ngo-April 1954 futhi wakhethwa ukuba abe nguNobhala Jikelele wenhlangano. 
Nakuba, ngoSeptemba 1954, wafakwa ngaphansi kochungechunge lwemiyalelo yokuvinjelwa ukusebenza eyakhishwa ngu-CR Swart okwamphoqa ukuthi ashiye phansi i-(FSAW). 
Ngawo lowo nyaka, uSimons wakhethwa njengomunye wabamele abaNsundu abathathu ephalamende laseNingizimu Afrika. 
Nakuba umyalelo wokuvinjelwa wawumenqabela ukuthi athathe isihlalo sakhe, waqhubeka waya ephalamende wadudulwa yiphoyisa le-security. 
Wamangalela isenzo futhi wathola isinxephezelo esasibandakanya izindleko zomkhankaso wakhe wokhetho. [1] 
Ngo-1965, yena nomyeni wakhe uJack Simons babalekela eLusaka, eZambia . 
UJack wathola isikhundla sokuba uthisha eManchester University wathuthela eNgilandi. 
Babuyela eZambia ngo-1967 bazakhela ikhaya ukuze bavakashelwe izingane zabo ezintathu. 
Ngesikhathi esekudingisweni eZambia, uRay wabhala ngokuhlanganyela incwadi ethi Class and Colour in South Africa, 1850–1950 noJack Simons futhi wasebenzela i-International Labour Organisation kanye ne- African National Congress (ANC) eyayivaliwe eNingizimu Afrika. 
Bahlala eZambia iminyaka engu-25 phakathi kuka-1965 no-1990. [1] [2] Ekudingisweni kwakhe ngo-1986, wakhethwa njengoMongameli Ohloniphekile weNyunyana Yabasebenzi iFood and Allied Workers Union. 
Babuya ekudingisweni ngo ngo 1990 [3] 
Impilo yakhe siqu 
URay Alexander washada no-Eli Weinberg ngesikhathi u-Eli eseyibamba likaNobhala wekomidi lendawo leSouth African Trades and Labour Council . 
Bahlukana ngo-2 May 1940. [1] Ngo-1941, washada no- Jack Simons, umfundisi eNyuvesi yaseKapa kanye nozakwabo oyiKhomanisi. 
Babanabantwana abathathu: uMary, uTanya noJohan. [2] Washonela eKapa mhla ka 12 kuSeptemba 2004 eneminyaka engu-91. [3] 
Imiklomelo kanye naziwa ngakho 
Waklonyeliswa ngendondo yeSitwalandwe Medal ngo-2004 yi-African National Congress . [1] I-Ray Alexander Simons Memory Centre kanye ne-Heritage Square eGuguletho yakhiwa futhi yethulwa yiPhini likaMongameli waseNingizimu Afrika, uKgalema Mothlante mhla ka 6 kuNovemba 2010. [2] 
NgoNdasa (Mashi) ku 2011, izwe laseSierra Leone lakhipha isitembu sokumhlonipha, limetha njengomunye wamaQhawe Omlando wase-Afrika, Legendary Heroes of Africa . [1] 
Amareferensi 
URay Alexander Simons (Nee Alexandrowich; (31 Disemba 1913 - 12 Septemba 2004) wayeyiKhomanisi, laseNingizimu Afrika, okwakuyisishoshovu esilwa nobandlululo, umkhankasi kanye unosozinyunyana owasiza ekubhaleni i-Charter yabesifazane . 
Wathuthela eKapa ngo-1929 ebalekela ukuhlukunyezwa kwamaJuda namaKhomanisi. 
Isiqalo sempilo yakhe 
USimons wazalelwa eVarklia (Varakļāni), Latvia enguRachel Ester Alexandrowich ngomhla ka 31 Disemba 1913. 
Wayengomunye wabantwana abayisithupha bakaSimka Simon noDobe Alexandrowich. [1] Ubaba wakhe wayenguthisha wolimi lwesiRashiya, ulimi lwesiJalimane kanye nemetemetikisi. 
Wayephinde agijime i- cheder lapho abafana bamaJuda babefunda khona i-talmud futhi balungise i-bar mizvah yabo. 
Wayehlala emzini ocebile ogcwele izincwadi ezamvezela inqubo ye-socialist kanye ne-idiyoloji yobukhomanisi. 
Uyise washona eneminyaka engu-12. 
Umngane wakhe omkhulu, u- Leib Jaffe, waba nomthelela ekucabangeni kukaRay ngemibono yesoshalizimu kanye nokuqwashisa ngokugqugquzela ukuqhubela phambili amalungelo abasebenzi. [2] Ukushona kukayise kwabangela uSimons ukuba angakholelwa kuNkulunkulu . [1] 
Lapho eneminyaka engu-13, wajoyina i- Latvian Communist Party esebenza ngomshoshaphansi [1] Lapho uSimons eneminyaka eyishumi nane, wamenywa ukuba abambe iqhaza engxoxweni ngeBalfour Declaration eyaphethwe inhlangano yendawo yeZionist. 
Wenqaba ngoba ekholelwa ukuthi ukulwa nokuphikisana namaJuda kufanele kube yingxenye yemizamo yeningi labantu yokufeza uhlelo olusha lomhlaba lapho bonke abantu bazokhululeka, okubandakanya namaJuda. 
Ngenxa yokuhlukunyezwa kwamaJuda eVarakļāni, wathunyelwa eRiga ukuze aqhubele phambili izifundo zakhe ekolishi letheknikhali le-ORT futhi wahlala nomngane wakhe omkhulu uLeah. [2] [3] 
Idolobha leKapa 
Ngemva kokuba uLeah eboshelwe imisebenzi yakhe yezepolitiki, umama wakhe wayekhathazekile futhi ngokushesha wahlela ukuba uSimons ahlale nodadewabo esikebheni saseGerman East Afrika Liner, e-Ubena . 
Wasuka eVaraklan mhla ka 17 kuMfumfu (Okthoba) 1929 futhi wafika eKapa wahlangana nodadewabo esikhumulweni semikhumbi mhlaka 6 Novemba 1929, ngosuku olwalundulela unyaka weRivolushini YaseRussia . [1] Ezinsukwini ezinhlanu efikile mhla ka 11 kuNovemba 1929, wahlangana noCissie Gool nomngane wempilo yakhe yonke uJohn Gomas futhi wajoyina iQembu LamaKhomanisi laseNingizimu Afrika (CPSA). 
Ngaleso sikhathi, uSimons wayeneminyaka engu-16. [2] 
[1] Wangenela kakhulu emibhidlangweni yezinyunyana ngemuva kokuxoshwa emsebenzini ngenxa yokuya kwakhe engqungqutheleni yokusungula i- Anti-Fascist League . [2] USimon wakhethwa njengosihlalo weKomidi Lesifunda LaseKapa LeQembu LamaKhomanisi ngoJanuwari 1931. [3] U-Simon wayesebenza esitolo sezingubo futhi ephelekezela u-James Schuba ayehlangana naye emhlanganweni weqembu lamakhomanisi ngezimpelasonto ukuze avakashele izisebenzi zasezikhumulweni zemikhumbi nasemathekwini. 
[4] Ngemuva kweminyaka emithathu efikile, wakhethwa ukuba abe nguNobhala Wenyunyana Yabasebenzi iCommercial Employees Union eKapa. Ngo-1935, walahlekelwa umsebenzi wakhe esitolo sezingubo futhi waba ngumgqugquzeli ngokuphelele we- Non-European Railway and Harbour Workers' Union [5] Waphinde waba nguNobhala weQembu LamaKhomanisi iminyaka emibili, ukusukela ngo-1934 ukuya ku-1935. [6] 
USimons wasungula iFood and Canning Workers Union (FCWU) ngokugqugquzela amakhaladi, abantu abamnyama kanye nabasebenzi abamhlophe neyayaziwa ngokusebenza kahle kwayo kanye nokuba yizidlamlilo. 
Le nyunyane yasabalala embonini yokufaka izithelo emathinini yaseBoland ukuya ogwini olusentshonalanga phakathi kwemiphakathi edobayo. 
Waba nguNobhala Jikelele waleyo nhlangano. 
I-FCWU yadlala indima ebalulekile kuKhongolose Yabasebenzi iSouth African Congress of Trade Unions yaseNingizimu Afrika ngeminyaka yawo-1950. [1] [2] Ngokusebenzisa umthetho we-Suppression of Communism Act ka-1950 ukuvala iqembu lamaKhomanisi ngo-1953, wayalwa ukuba ashiye isikhundla ngonyaka olandelayo. [3] 
U-Yvonne Mokgoro (wazalwa mhla ka 19 kuMfumfu - Okthoba 1950) wayengumahluleli wangaphambili weNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika kanye nonkosikazi kaJob Mokgoro . [1] 
Umlando ngomsebenzi 
UMokgoro waqokwa ebhentshini ngo-1994 nguNelson Mandela . 
UMokgoro uyilungu lebhodi leSikhungo Samalungelo Abantu i-Centre for Human Rights eNyuvesi yasePitoli futhi unguSihlalo wamanje weKhomishana ye-South African Law Reform Commission . [1] [2] 
Wafunda eNyuvesi yaseNorth-West lapho athola khona iziqu ze-B.luris ngo-1982, wathola iziqu ze-LLB eminyakeni emibili kamuva, kanye ne-LLM ngo-1987. 
Ubuye wafunda e-University of Pennsylvania Law School e-US, lapho aklonyeliswa khona ngenye i-LLM degree. 
Ukwamukelwa nokubongwa 
Phakathi kwenqwaba yezindondo anikezwe zona kubalwa indondo yeHuman Rights Award eyanikezwa yiBlack Lawyers Association, (1995) i-Oude Molen Reserve Order of Merit (1995/1996), iLegal Profession's Woman Achiever Award yiCentre for Human Rights, University of Pretoria (2001), University of the North School of Law Excellence Award (2003), i-Kate Stoneman Democracy Award (2003), i-Tshwane Outstanding Service Award (TOSA) ngo-2006 kanye ne-James Wilson Award yi-University of Pennsylvania Law School ( 2008). 
Amareferensi 
UZukisa Laura Lumka Tshiqi ( née Qingana ; owazalwa zingama-11 kuMasingana - Januwari 1961) uyijaji Lenkantolo Yomthethosisekelo yaseNingizimu Afrika futhi wake wasebenza eNkantolo Ephakeme Yokudluliswa Kwamacala yezwe i-Supreme Court of Appeal futhi njengejaji elibambile eNkantolo Yomthethosisekelo. [1] [2] [3] 
Isiqalo sempilo yakhe 
Tshiqi wazalelwa edolobhaneni eCefane, ingxenye yedolobha laseNgcobo, e-Eastern Cape, ngo-1961 [1] Wathola i-B Proc eNyuvesi yaseWitwatersrand kanye nediploma esezingeni eliphezulu kwezomthetho wezabasebenzi eNyuvesi yaseRand Afrikaans . 
Ngemuva kwalokho wasebenza njengommeli. 
UTshiqi wenziwa ibamba lejaji eNkantolo ePhakeme eSouth Gauteng ngo-2003 futhi waqokwa unomphela ngo-2005. [1] Wakhushulelwa eNkantolo Ephakeme Yokudluliswa Kwamacala ngo-2009 futhi wasebenza eNkantolo YoMthethosisekelo ngo-2014-15 njengejaji elibambile. [2] Wafaka isicelo sokuthola isikhundla ngokugcwele eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ngo-2015 kodwa abahlaziyi babemthatha njengekhandideti yezinga eliphansi, isikhundla sathathwa nguNonkosi Mhlantla . 
Amareferensi 
I-Absa yasungulwa ngo-1991 ngokuhlanganiswa kwabahlinzeki bezinsizakalo zezezimali i-United Bank (South Africa), i-Allied Bank (iNingizimu Afrika), i- Volkskas Bank Group kanye nezithakazelo ezithile zeSage Group.Ngonyaka olandelayo, i-Absa yathola wonke amasheya eBankarp Group eyayihlanganisa iTrustbank, iSenbank neBankfin.Eminyakeni yokuqala yale nyunyana, ibhange ngalinye lalisebenza ngaphansi kwegama lalo.Ngo-1998, zahlanganiswa zaba uhlobo olulodwa.Ngemva konyaka, i-Absa yamukela umazisi omusha wenkampani futhi igama lashintshwa laba i-Absa Group Limited. 
NgoMeyi 2005, iBarclays Bank yase-United Kingdom yathenga amasheya angu-56.4% e-Absa. 
Ngo-2013, leli qembu lathola yonke imali ekhishiwe ye-Barclays Africa Limited futhi lakhipha ama-Candleation Shares ayi-129,540,636 ku-Barclays Africa Group Holdings Limited (inkampani engaphansi kwe-Barclays ephethwe ngokuphelele) ngaleyo ndlela kwenyusa ukuba namasheya kwe-Barclays plc kuya ku-62,3%.Ama-Cactionation Shares afakwe ohlwini lwe-JSE kusukela ekuqaleni ukuhweba zingama-31 kuJulayi 2013.Igama lishintsha lisuka ku-“ABSA Group Limited” liye ku-“Barclays Africa Group Limited” lamenyezelwa mhla zingama-22 kuNtulikazi wezi-2013, laqala ukusebenza mhla zi-2 kuNcwaba wezi-2013. 
Ngo-2017, uMvikeli woMphakathi waseNingizimu Afrika, u- Busisiwe Mkhwebane, wathola ukuthi ukutakulwa kuka-R1.125 billion owatholwa yi-Bankorp Group eyandulela i-Absa phakathi kuka-1985 no-1992 eBhange loMbuso kwakungekho emthethweni, wabe esephakamisa ukuthi u-Absa uphoqwe ukubuyisela u-R2. 25 billion, okuyimali elingana nale mali.Umbiko wabekwa eceleni yiNkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli, ithole ukuthi "Umvikeli womphakathi akazange aziphathe ngendlela ebingalindelwa kumuntu osehhovisi lomvikeli womphakathi."Inkantolo uhlolwa ezinye izindleko icala mathupha emelene Mkhwebane ngenxa yokuziphatha kwakhe, umyalo wasisekela le Court of South Africa yoMthethosisekelo ngoJulayi 2019. 
NgoNdasa wezi-2018, iBarclays Africa yamemezela ukuthi igama leqembu lizobuyela ku-Absa Group Limited, kusukela mhla zingama-30 kuNhlaba wezi-2018.Inkampani yenze kabusha igama ngo-2018, okubandakanya ilogo entsha neziqubulo. 
Kusukela ngo-Okthoba 2019, ngokusho kweClub of Mozambique, i-Absa Group Limited yayinempahla engaphezu kwezigidigidi ezingama-91 zamaRandi.I-Barclays Bank Plc inamaphesenti angu-14.9 e-Absa Group Limited, amasheya ayo asohlwini lwe- JSE Limited.I-Absa Bank Kenya Plc kanye ne- Absa Bank Botswana Limited bayaqhubeka nokubalwa ezimakethe zabo zesitoko. 
Ngezansi kunabanikazi bamasheya abakhulu be-Absa Group abayi-10 kusukela mhla ziyi-15 kuMasingana wezi-2019: 
I-Finweek Bank Charges Reports kusukela ngo-2008 kuya ku-2010 ithole ukuthi i-Absa Group Limited iyibhange elibiza kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika.Izinkokhelo ze-Pay-as-you-transact (PAYT) zikhuphuke ngo-82% kusukela ngo-2005 kuya ku-2010. 
Umbiko ka-2012, i-Finweek Bank Charges Report uklelise i-Gold Value Bundle yakwa-Absa njengenketho yephakheji eshibhe kunawo wonke phakathi kwamabhange amane aqhathaniswa.Lo mbiko uphinde waveza ukuthi uhlelo lwakwa-Absa lwe-PAYT lwehle ngo-25%, okushiya isithathu ngokushibhe kakhulu ezilinganisweni. [1] 
I-Absa Group Limited (ABGL) (phambilini eyayaziwa ngokuthi i- Barclays Africa Group Limited ), futhi ekuqaleni i-Amalgamated Banks yaseNingizimu Afrika, iyiqembu lezinsizakalo zezezimali ezizinze eNingizimu Afrika , elihlinzeka ngamabhange omuntu siqu nawebhizinisi, amakhadi esikweletu, amabhange ezinkampani kanye nokutshalwa kwezimali, ingcebo nokuphathwa kokutshalwa kwezimali., kanye nesiqiniseko sebhange. 
I-ABGL inamasheya amaningi emabhange ayi-11 atholakala eBotswana, Ghana, Kenya, Mauritius, Mozambique, Seychelles, South Africa, Tanzania (amabhizinisi amabili), Uganda naseZambia. 
Iqembu ligcina amahhovisi abamele eNamibia naseNigeria. 
Iphinde ibe nehhovisi lamazwe ngamazwe eLondon, elavulwa ngoSepthemba 2018.Ngo-2019, i-Absa Group yavula elinye ihhovisi lamazwe ngamazwe eNew York City. 
Ingemuva 
UKhampepe wazalelwa eSoweto . Uthole iB Proc eNyuvesi yaseZululand kanye neziqu zeLLM eHarvard Law School . 
[1] Wamukelwa njengommeli ngo nyaka wezi-1985 futhi wasebenza e- Bowman Gilfillan Enkampanini ezimele, egxile kwezomthetho wezabasebenzi. [2] Ngo nyaka we-1995 waqokwa njengelungu leKhomishini YamaQiniso Nokubuyisana . [2] Kusukela ngo-1999 ube yiPhini likaMqondisi Kazwelonke Wophiko Lwezokushushiswa Komphakathi ophikweni Lwezokushushisa Likazwelonke . 
Ama-aphoyintimenti 
Ngo nyaka wezi -2000 uKhampepe waqokwa njengomehluleli enkantolo enkulu yase Transvaal Provincial Division , [1] (manje eyaziwa ngokuthi iGauteng Division ). 
Ngo nyaka wezi - 2007 uphinde waqokelwa eNkantolo yokuDluliswa kwamaCala kwezabaSebenzi, kwathi ngonyaka wezi - 2009 waqokwa eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo nguMengameli Jacob Zuma . [2] Ngo nyaka wezi -2021 waqokwa njengebamba lejaji eliyinhloko enkantolo enkulu. 
References 
U-Kibbe wazalelwa e-Unionville, eNevada. 
Wayeshade noGeorge Kibbe, futhi waba nendodana egama layo linguGeorge Ellis Kibbe.Ubehlala e-Oakland. 
Kibbe wafunda imithi iminyaka eminingi, ekugcineni kokuqeda udokotela degree at -Johns Hopkins University. 
U-Kibbe wagijimela isihlalo eMkhandlwini waseCalifornia ngo-1918.Le ngxenye yomzamo ohleliwe wezishoshovu zamalungelo abesifazane e-California wokuba nowesifazane angenele isikhundla eMkhandlwini kuzo zonke izifunda esifundazweni. 
U-Kibbe wayengudokotela. 
U-Kibbe wayeyi- suffragist eyaziwayo yaseCalifornia eyayivame ukufundisa ngesihloko sokufaneleka kwabesifazane. 
Ngo-1904 u-Kibbe wasebenza njengomongameli we-Forty-First District Political Equality Club.Ubuye wasebenza ebhodini eliphezulu leCalifornia Equal Suffrage Association.U-Kibbe waya eminingana yemibuthano lapho ezwa khona uSusan B. Anthony ekhuluma kuhlanganise nowodwa owawuseSan Francisco ngo-1905.Kulowo mbuthano uhlele nabanye abaningi abahlukunyezwayo okubalwa kubo uMary Sperry.Ngo-August 1911 wanikeza inkulumo e-Oakland mayelana nokuchitshiyelwa kwelungelo lokuvota eCalifornia ngalowo nyaka.Isazi saseCalifornia uSelina Solomons uncome ubushoshovu bakhe encwadini yakhe ethi, How We Won the Vote in California. 
USisi Virginia Khampepe (owazalwa mhla ka 8 kuMasingana - Januwari 1957 [1] ) uyijaji laseNingizimu Afrika okwamanje elisebenza eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo yaseNingizimu Afrika. [1] 
Umlando wakhe 
UKhampepe wazalelwa eSoweto. Wathola iB Proc eNyuvesi yaseZululand kanye neziqu zeLLM eHarvard Law School. 
[1] Wamukelwa njengommeli ngo-1985 futhi wasebenza e-Bowman Gilfillan ku-private practice, egxile kwezomthetho wezabasebenzi. [2] Ngo-1995 waqokwa njengelungu leKhomishini YamaQiniso Nokubuyisana. Ukuqokwa 
Ngo-2000 uKhampepe waqokwa njengejaji leTransvaal Provincial Division le-High Court, [1] (manje eyaziwa ngokuthi iGauteng Division). 
Ngo - 2007 uphinde waqokelwa eNkantolo yokuDluliswa kwamaCala kwezeMisebenzi, iLabour Court, kwathi ngo- 2009 waqokwa eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo nguMengameli uJacob Zuma . [2] Ngo-2021 waqokwa njengebamba lejaji eliyinhloko enkantolo enkulu. 
Amareferensi 
I-DHL International GmbH ( DL ) [1] iyisithunywa samazwe ngamazwe, ukulethwa kwamaphakheji kanye nesevisi yeposi ecacile, okuyingxenye yefemu yezokuthutha yaseJalimane i- Deutsche Post.Le nkampani iletha amaphasela angaphezu kwezigidigidi eziyi-1.5 ngonyaka. 
Le nkampani yasungulwa eSan Francisco, e-USA, ngo-1969 futhi yandisa insizakalo yayo emhlabeni wonke ngasekupheleni kwawo-1970.Ngo-1979, ngaphansi kwegama le-DHL Air Cargo, inkampani yangena eziqhingini zaseHawaii ngesevisi yezimpahla eziphakathi kweziqhingi isebenzisa izindiza ezimbili ze-DC-3 kanye ne-DC-6 ezine.U-Adrian Dalsey kanye no- Larry Hillblom bengamele mathupha imisebenzi yansuku zonke kwaze kwaba yilapho ukuqothuka kwayo ekugcineni kuvala iminyango ngo-1983. 
Esiqongweni sayo, i-DHL Air Cargo iqashe abasebenzi abangaphezu kwekhulu, abaphathi nabashayeli bezindiza. 
Ngo-1998, iDeutsche Post yaqala ukuthola amasheya ku-DHL. 
Ifinyelele inzalo yokulawula ngo-2001, futhi yathola wonke amasheya asele ngo-December 2002.Inkampani yabe isingenisa i-DHL esigabeni sayo se-Express, ngenkathi inweba ukusetshenziswa komkhiqizo we-DHL kwezinye izigaba ze-Deutsche Post, amayunithi ebhizinisi, nezinkampani ezingaphansi kwayo.Namuhla, i-DHL Express yabelana ngohlobo lwayo lwe-DHL namayunithi ebhizinisi afana ne- DHL Global Forwarding kanye ne- DHL Supply Chain.Yathola ukusimama e-United States lapho ithola i- Airborne Express . 
Imiphumela yezezimali ye-DHL Express ishicilelwe embikweni wonyaka we-Deutsche Post AG.Ngo-2016, imali engenayo yalolu phiko inyuke ngo-2.7% yaya ku-€14 billion.Imali engenayo ngaphambi kwenzalo nezintela (EBIT) ikhuphuke ngo-11.3% ngo-2015 yaya ku-€1.5 billion. 
Isikole samabanga aphezulu iJ. Frank Dobie yisikole samabanga aphezulu sikahulumeni esiseHouston, eTexas .Yasungulwa ngo-1968, yaqanjwa ngomlobi waseTexas onegama elifanayo. 
Ihlala amabanga 10-12.Kusanda kuvulwa isikhungo seBanga Lesishiyagalolunye ukusiza ngokutheleka kwabafundi. 
Yisikole esikhulu kunazo zonke esifundeni sasePasadena Independent School.Ama-mascots esikole angama-Longhorns futhi imibala esemthethweni inombala osawolintshi nomnyama, efana naleyo yaseNyuvesi yaseTexas e-Austin . 
Amaqembu e-Dobie High School's Academic Decathlon athatha ekhaya ubuqhawe kazwelonke ngo-1992 nango-1996, futhi elesibili esizweni ngo-2011. 
Ngo-2016, umfundi we-Dobie High School u-Jaylon Bolden wawina indawo yesithathu ku-National Speech and Debate Association Tournament in Dramatic Interpretation. 
Ngo-2017, umfundi we-Dobie High School u-Ariana Uriah Okhuozagbon wawina indawo yesine ku-National Speech and Debate Association Tournament in Original Oratory. 
Isikole samabanga aphezulu iDobie ekuqaleni besiku-11111 Beamer Rd. 
Kodwa-ke, izinkinga zokugcwala esikhungweni se-Beamer kanye nenani labantu elikhula ngokushesha endaweni yaseSouth Belt kuholela izikhulu zedolobha nabavoti ukuthi baphumelele ibhondi engu-$199.05 million ngoFebhuwari 2000.Lokhu kufaka indawo ezokwakhiwa e-10220 Blackhawk Blvd eyavulwa ngo-2003. 
Indawo ye-Beamer yasekuqaleni manje isihlala i-Beverly Hills Intermediate School. 
Ngo-2014, i-PISD yamemezela izinhlelo zokwakha isikhungo sebanga lesi-9 ukuze kwehliswe ukuminyana e-Dobie High.Ngo-2015, isifunda sembula izinhlelo zokuklama zesikhungo sebanga lesi-9, kanye nokubhidlika kwenzeka ngo-August 2016.Ikhempasi yeBanga Lesishiyagalolunye lase-Dobie yavula iminyango yayo ngoJanuwari 9, 2018 futhi umcimbi wokulinikezela waba ngo-December 6, 2018. 
Imidlalo yokugijima e-Dobie High School ihlanganisa: 
I-Dobie High School iphinde inikeze amakilabhu nezinhlangano ezihlukahlukene ezihlanganisa: 
IPonoka County iyisifunda sikamasipala e- Alberta, eCanada. 
Ihlanganisa ingqikithi yase-Alberta yasemaphandleni". [1] 
Isikhulu esiphezulu sokuphatha (CAO) sasePonoka County nguCharlie Cutforth.Amalungu amahlanu omkhandlu, uNancy Hartford, Bryce Liddle, Mark Matejka, Paul McLauchlin, kanye noDoug Weir, bakhethwa ngo-Okthoba 21, 2013.UKhansela u-Paul McLauchlin, ophuma ku-electoral Division 4, uqokwe esikhundleni somhlangano wenhlangano ka-2013. 
IPonoka County yasungulwa ngo-January 1, 1952. [1]Izikhulu zokuqala zikahulumeni kulesi sifunda kwakunguMnu. Bruce Ramsey, owaqondisa izindaba zikamasipala, uMnu. 
Peter McDonald njengonobhala - umgcinimafa, kanye noMnu. LG Saunders owayeyinhloko yohlelo lwesikole.Idolobhana lithole igama lalo egameni elithi Blackfoot elithi Elk. 
Ku- Census of Population yango-2016 okwenziwa yiStatistics Canada, iSifundazwe sasePonoka saqopha inani labantu abayizi-9,806 abahlala ezindlini ezingama-3,535 kwezingu-4,199 sezizonke, I-10.7% ishintshile ukusukakubantu bayo bango-2011 abangu-8,856.Ngendawo 2,814.26 km , ibinokuminyana kwabantu 3.5/km ngo-2016. 
NgoCensus ka- 2011, iSifundazwe sasePonoka sasinabantu abangu-8,856 abahlala ezindaweni ezingu-3,172 zezindawo zokuhlala eziphelele ezingu-3,669, ushintsho olungamaphesenti angu-2.5% kubantu bakhona bango-2006 abangu-8,640.Ngomhlaba ongu- 2,807.94 km , ibinokuminyana kwabantu 3.2/km ngo-2011.Kulandela ukufakwa kuka-Ponoka ngo-2011, i-Statistics Canada yalungisa inani labantu base-Ponoka County ngo-2011 lehla ngabantu abangu-5 laya ku-8,851. 
Tendai (天台宗, Tendai-shū), also known as the Tendai Lotus School (天台法華宗 Tendai hokke shū, sometimes just "hokke shū") is a Mahāyāna Buddhist tradition (with significant esoteric elements) officially established in Japan in 806 by the Japanese monk Saichō (posthumously known as Dengyō Daishi).[1]The Tendai school, which has been based on Mount Hiei since its inception, rose to prominence during the Heian period (794-1185).It gradually eclipsed the powerful Hossō school and competed with the rival Shingon school to become the most influential sect at the Imperial court. 
Ngesikhathi sikaKamakura (1185-1333), uTendai wayesephenduke enye yezindlela ezivelele zobuBuddha baseJapane, enamathempeli amaningi kanye nezindawo ezinkulu zokuhlala. 
Phakathi nenkathi ye-Kamakura, amakholi ahlukahlukene ashiye uTendai (ebona ukuthi ikhohlakele) ukuze asungule izikole zabo "ezintsha" noma " Kamakura " zamaBuddha ezifana Jōdo-shū, Nichiren-shū futhi Sōtō Zen . [1]Ukucekelwa phansi kwethempeli eliyinhloko le- Enryaku-ji ngu- Oda Nobunaga ngo-1571, kanye nokushintshwa kwezindawo zenhloko-dolobha kude ne- Kyoto kuya e- Edo, kwenze buthakathaka ithonya likaTendai. [2] 
NgesiShayina nesiJapane, igama layo liyafana nethi Tiantai, isikole saso esingabazali sobuBuddha baseShayina .Womabili amasiko agcizelela ukubaluleka kweLotus Sutra futhi ahloniphe izimfundiso zama-patriarch aseTiantai, ikakhulukazi uZhiyi.NgesiNgisi, i- Romanization yaseJapane ihlukanisa izici eziyingqayizivele zesiko lesiJapane.NgokukaHazama Jikō, isici esiyinhloko sikaTendai "ukukhuthaza kwayo ubuBuddha obuphelele...umbono wokuthi zonke izimfundiso zikaBuddha aziphikisani futhi zingahlanganiswa ohlelweni olulodwa oluphelele futhi oluphelele." [1] 
Tendai Passion Ndoro (owazalwa 15 Meyi 1988) is a Zimbabwean footballer.Udlala ngoba Al-Orouba ku Oman Professional League kanye Zimbabwe eqenjini lesizwe njengoba isikhungo phambili. 
UNdoro waqala umsebenzi wakhe neChicken Inn yaseZimbabwe ngo-2011.Ngemuva kweminyaka emibili, uNdoro waqeda ukugijima kuqembu laseNingizimu Afrika iBlack Aces kodwa ngokushesha wabuyiselwa kuChicken Inn ebolekiswe isizini yonke ka-2013.Ngo-2014, ujoyine isikwati seBlack Aces ngokusemthethweni futhi ngemuva kwalokho wadlala imidlalo engu-41 washaya amagoli angu-14 kumasizini amabili ngaphambi kokuthi ahambe ngo-2015 wajoyina i- Orlando Pirates. 
Ngesizini ka-2017-18 ubonakale emaqenjini amathathu - Orlando Pirates, Al Faisaly, ne-Ajax Cape Town, ephula imithetho yeFIFA.Ngenxa yalokhu, i-Ajax Cape Town kudingeke ukuthi idliwe yimidlalo emithathu yeligi ebibonakale kuyona okuholele ekutheni igawulwe yizembe kuSouth African Premier League. 
Ngomhla zingama-27 kuZibandlela wezi-2019, u-Al-Orouba wase- Oman wamemezela ukuthi usesayine uNdoro. 
UTendai Mzungu (owazalwa zingama-28 kuFebhuwari 1986) ungumdlali webhola lezinyawo wase-Australia owake wadlalela iFremantle Football Club kanye neGreater Western Sydney Giants ku- Australian Football League (AFL).UMzungu ubemele iPerth Football Club kuWest Australian Football League ( WAFL ) ngaphambi kokuthi abuthelwe kuFremantle ekupheleni kwesizini ka- 2010, futhi waqala ukubonakala kuleli qembu ngesizini elandelayo . 
[1]Ufunde e- Kent Street Senior High School, futhi wadlala ibhola le-ateur le-Trinity Aquinas Football Club. [2]Ewela endaweni yokuqasha yePerth Football Club ku-WAFL, uMzungu udlale okokuqala eqenjini ngo-2006. [3]Udlale imidlalo engu-72 eminyakeni engu-5, wawina umklomelo we-Butcher Medal Perth ongcono kakhulu nolunge kunawo wonke ngo-2010, [4] futhi wavotela amavoti angu-20 ku-2010 Sandover Medal . 
UMzungu wenze kahle kuFremantle emidlalweni yangaphambi kwesizini ka-2011 yeNAB Cup kanti kuthiwa uzovala isikhala sikaRoger Hayden owayelimele emuva kukaFremantle. [1] Nokho, emdlalweni wokugcina kaFremantle wangaphambi kwesizini ulimaze umsipha wedolo [2] Wabuyela ebholeni emasontweni ayi-10 kamuva, ukuze aqokwe ngokuqondile ku-AFL, kunokuba akhethwe ePerth ku-WAFL. 
[3]Umdlalo wakhe wokuqala kuFremantle wawusemdlalweni womzuliswano wesi- 9 e-AAMI Stadium bebhekene Port Adelaide, uFremantle awunqobe ngamaphuzu angama-52.Uqokwe njengomdlali obambele [4] futhi wadlala kuphela ikota yokugcina, ethatha indawo kaHayden Ballantyne owahlushwa ithanga eliboshiwe ( quadriceps contusion ). [5] 
UTendai Mzungu wadlalela iFremantle ngo- 2013 AFL Grand Final ebhekene no- Hawthorn, i-Grand Final yokuqala kaFremantle emlandweni wabo.Ngesiwombe sesibili uMzungu ushayele uFremantle igoli lokuqala kulo mdlalo. 
Wakhishwa ohlwini ekupheleni kwesizini ka-2016, nokho, wabhalwa Greater Western Sydney ku- 2017 rookie okusalungiswa.Ngemuva kokudlala imidlalo emine yeGreater Western Sydney, uMzungu umemezele ukuthi uzothatha umhlalaphansi kulandela ukuphuma kwabo okokugcina kwisizini ye- 2017 AFL. 
UMzungu ube ngumgijimi weqembu leFremantle futhi waba ngumqeqeshi wokuqala we-Next Generation Academy kusukela ngesizini ye-AFL ka-2018. 
UBiti waphinda wakhethwa ukuthi abe sedale lephalamende eHarare East ngokhetho lukaMarch 2008 .Ngokwemiphumela esemthethweni, uthole amavoti angu-8,377 eqhathaniswa nezi-2,587 ku- ZANU-PF.Esikhathini esilandela ukhetho, wahlala ngaphandle kweZimbabwe (ikakhulukazi eNingizimu Afrika), kanye noTsvangirai, phakathi kwesimo sangemva kokhetho esabonakala ngodlame olubi olubhekiswe kubalandeli beMDC. [2] 
UBiti wabuyela eZimbabwe mhla zili-12 kuNhlangulana 2008 waboshwa ngokushesha esikhumulweni sezindiza eHarare.Engakasuki eGoli uBiti uthe usezwile ukuthi uzabotshwa, kodwa uthi icala lakhe linye elokulwela intando kazulu wathi kumele abuye ukuze aphatheke kubandla leMDC. [1]Ngemva kokubotshwa kukaBiti, isikhulumeli samapholisa uMnu Wayne Bvudzijena uthe uzabetheswa icala lokuvukela umbuso kugwalo lweMDC olumayelana lokuguqula uhulumende. [2]Ugwalo lolu, obelubizwa ngokuthi, “The Transition Strategy” okuthiwa lwalotshwa nguBiti mhlaka 25 March, [3] lugoqela amacebo okuqilibezela ukhetho kucele leMDC. 
[3] [4]UBvudzijena uthe uBiti uzophinde abekwe icala lokukhuluma izitatimende ezingamanga "ezihlukumeza umbuso" ngenxa yokumemezela kwakhe imiphumela yokhetho ngaphambi kokuthi ikhishwe yiKhomishana yoKhetho. [2] [3]Umeli weMelika uMnumzana James McGee utshengise ukukhathazeka okukhulu emele uhulumende weMelika esithi ugwalo olukhulunywayo luyinkulumo engaphikiswanga ngenhlelo lezinjongo zeMDC; ngokusho kukaMcGee, enye inguqulo, eyedlulele kakhulu yombhalo yayikhona, kodwa yenziwa. [2]Igqwetha likaBiti laye lathi indaba ekhulunywayo yimgunyathi. 
Mhla zili-13 kuNhlangulana amagqwetha kaBiti athi kabavunyelwanga ukuhlangana laye, base befaka isicelo esiphuthumayo emthethwandaba weHigh Court ngelanga elifanayo.Ibandla leMDC lithi likhathazeke kakhulu ngenhlalakahle kaBiti laze lathumela ithimba enkambeni zamapholisa eHarare likhangelele ukuthola ukuthi ubotshwe ngaphi. [1]Uvele enkantolo ngomhlaka-14 Juni. 
Umuzi kaBiti wapeqululwa ngamapholisa mhlaka 16 June, lanxa amapholisa engazange akhiphe lutho endlini. [1] [2]Ummeli wakhe, uLewis Uriri, uthe uBiti uphenywe imibuzo amahora angama-24 agcwele ngemuva kokuboshwa kwakhe; Uriri uphinde wathi uzadinga idale leHigh Court ukuthi uBiti akhulule uBiti esithi ubotshwe okwedlula amahola angamatshumi amane lasitshiyagalolunye engalacala. [1] 
UBiti uphinde wavela emthethwandaba mhlaka 18 June; nokho-ke lokhu kulalelwa kwahlehliselwa ngakusasa ngoba amandla ehlulekile, okusho ukuthi ukulalelwa kwakungaqoshwa. [1]Ubekwe icala ngoJuni 19. [2] [3]Ubhekane namacala amane: "ukuvukela umbuso, ukukhuluma amanga ahlukumeza umbuso, ukuthuka uMongameli Mugabe kanye nokudala ukungezwani phakathi kwamasosha". . 
[2] Abatshutshisi baphikisene ngokuphiwa kukaBiti ibheyili bebona ukuthi amacala abekwe wona mabi kakhulu okokuthi angagwetshwa.Abamangalelwa bafake isicelo sokuthi amacala ahoxiswe, kodwa ngomhlaka-20 Juni imantshi uMishrod Guvamombe wasichitha lesi sicelo, wathi ukholelwa ukuthi kukhona "okuzwakalayo ukusola ukuthi ummangalelwa wenze leli cala".UBiti uzophinde avele enkantolo ngomhlaka-7 Ntulikazi, uGuvamombe wayalela ukuthi ahlale esitokisini kuze kube yileso sikhathi. [3]
