Le nkulumo yaholela ekuvukeleni okukhulu kwe-National Party, ebisiphelelwe amandla okhethweni lwango-2002 .Kusukela ku-28% okhethweni lwenyanga ngaphambi kwenkulumo, iNational Party yeqa ku-45% emasontweni amabili ngemuva kwayo: amaphuzu ayishumi ngaphambi kwezabasebenzi. 
Ukuvota kwabonisa ukuthi amaMāori amaningi ayenethezekile ngenkulumo kaBrash, futhi Iqembu Lesizwe layisekela ngemva kwayo, kodwa uGeorgina te Heuheu wasuswa njengomkhulumeli wesifazane weNational Māori Affairs ngemva kokuyigxeka.Kube neqhaza elikhulu ekusunguleni igama likaDon Brash, obesanda kuba ngumholi weqembu. 
Emuva kwenkulumo, isikhalo sikaBrash esithi "angidingi uhlanga" sathathwa ngolunye uhlangothi loqhekeko lwezepolitiki, umfelandawonye ophethe iLabour - Progressive.Kwenziwa ucwaningo lwezinhlelo zikahulumeni ukuze kubonakale ukuthi azikho yini izinhlelo ezithinta izinhlanga lapho izinhlelo ezihambisana nezidingo zizokwanela. 
URuvarashe Christabel Chinyemba (owazalwa ziyisi-6 kuNdasa 1992) ungumdlali wekhilikithi owake waba ngowesifazane waseZimbabwe.Wamela iZimbabwe kumdlalo wokuhlungela iNdebe Yomhlaba wonke yekhilikithi ka-2008. 
Sokollu Mehmed Pasha, Ottoman Grand Vizier of Rumelia UStevan Moljević, usopolitiki 
URudo ( Serbian Cyrillic ) yidolobha nomasipala oseRepublika Srpska, inhlangano yase Bosnia nase Herzegovina.Kusukela ngonyaka ka-2013, inesibalo sabantu abayi-7,963, kanti idolobha laseRudo linabantu abayi-1,949. 
Idume kuwo wonke amaRiphabhulikhi aseYugoslavia njengendawo yokuzalwa ye- 1st Proletarian Brigade eyakhiwe ama- Yugoslav Partisans. 
Idolobha laseRudo lasungulwa ngo-1555 nguSokollu Mustafa Pasha, isihlobo esiseduze sika-Ottoman Vizier Sokollu Mehmed Pasha.I-mosque yamatshe, ibhuloho phezu kwe-Lim, i- hamam, inn, i- mekteb (isikole), i- tekke, ezinye izitolo nezindlu zakhiw.Kwashiwo ngu- Evliya Çelebi (1611-1682). [1] Yambozwa yizikhukhula ngo-1896, yabe isinwetshwa yaba yindawo yokuhlala yasemadolobheni. [2] Ngemva kokuwa kweRiphabhulikhi yase-Užice kanye nesikhathi esichithwe edolobhaneni lase- Drenova umholi wama- Yugoslav Partisans wafika e-Rudo ngomhla zingama-21 kuZibandlela 1941I- 1st Proletarian Brigade of the Yugoslav Partisans yasungulwa eRudo ngomhlaka-22 Disemba 1941.Itshe lesikhumbuzo elinikezelwe ku-Brigade lakhiwa ngo-1961, nomnyuziyamu owabe wavulwa ngemva kweminyaka eyishumi. 
Abasebenzi 
I-XEW-AM iyisiteshi somsakazo eMexico City, eMexico, esisakaza nge- AM frequency ka-900. kHz; ibhalwe ngokuthi W Radio.i-XEW-AM isebenza njengesiteshi sokuqala sezinye iziteshi ze-"W-Radio" ezizungeze i-Mexico eziphatha ezinye zezinhlelo zayo. 
Uhlelo oluku-XEW-AM luphinde lusakazwe esiteshini somsakazo saseMexico City FM i-96.9 XEW-FM. 
I-XEW yaqala ukusakazwa okujwayelekile ngo-20:00 CST ngoSepthemba 18, 1930.Ukusakaza kusuka ekamelweni (kamuva okwaba isitudiyo esifanele) e-Olympia Cinema ngo-16 September Street e-Mexico City, ekuqaleni kwakune-5 kuphela. kW amandla okudlulisa, nakuba lokhu kunyuswe kwaba ngu-50 kW ngo-1934.Ngokufakwa kwama-transmitter amasha, amandla aba ngama-250 kW ngo-1935 futhi yahlala lapho iminyaka engaphezu kuka-80, okwenza i-XEW-AM yaba isiteshi somsakazo se-AM esinamandla kunazo zonke eNyakatho Melika.NgoFebhuwari 10, 2016, i-XEW-AM yagunyazwa ukuthi ithuthele isihambisi sayo endaweni ese-Los Reyes Acaquilpan, kuMasipala wase-La Paz, eSifundazweni SaseMexico futhi yehlise ugesi ube ngama-watts angu-100,000. 
Bekuyisiteshi sokuqala sase-Mexico City e- Emilio Azcarraga Vidaurreta 's Chain of the Americas, eyandulela i- Televisa yanamuhla umsakazo wayo osengumnikazi we-XEW-AM.I-XEW-AM ekuqaleni ibisebenzisana ne- NBC Radio Networks (NBC kanye neBlue ); iziteshi zayo ezizayo zizoba nobudlelwano namanethiwekhi ezimbangi, i-XEQ-AM ne- CBS kanye ne- XEX-AM ne- Mutual.Njengoba umsakazo e-Mexico uthuthuka ngokukhula kwezwe kanye neziteshi zomsakazo eziningi ezisayiniwe, i-XEW-AM yaba isikhulu kunethiwekhi yomsakazo enkulukazi yezwe.Iziteshi zomsakazo eziningi nethelevishini zithole izimpawu zazo zocingo emsakazweni nakumabonakude we-XEW, zonke zixhumene neTelevisa ngesikhathi esisodwa. 
Imvamisa ye-FM, i-96.9, ithole imvume yayo ngo-Ephreli 28, 1962; ayizange yethulwe kwaze kwaba ngawo-1970, futhi ekupheleni kwaleyo minyaka eyishumi, yayiphethe ifomethi ye-disco.Ngo-1981, kwase kushintshelwe ku-"Rock Stereo". 
NgoSepthemba 9, 1985, yaqanjwa kabusha ngokuthi "WFM" ngefomethi ye-English ye-rock ne-pop, okuwumncintiswano oqondile we-XHSON-FM (ngaleso sikhathi eyaziwa ngokuthi "i-Rock 101").Phakathi kwama-DJ ahambisana nesiteshi kwakukhona u-Alejandro González Iñárritu, uMartha Debayle noCharo Fernández . 
Ngemva kweminyaka engu-14, ku-1999, isiteshi sashintsha igama kanye nefomethi ku- "W Radical", eqondiswa inhloko yangaphambili ye-"Rock 101", uLuis Gerardo Salas, i-airing electronic music and eurodance .Ngo-2001, yabuyela efomeni yayo yangaphambili ye-WFM nesiqubulo esithi "Frecuencia Adictiva", kodwa ngasekupheleni kuka-2002, ngemuva kwenhlangano yeTelevisa Radio nePRISA, kwanqunywa ukuba kufakwe uhlelo olufanayo ku-AM naku-FM, ngaleyo ndlela i-XEW-FM. yaba inkundla yezindaba nezingxoxo, nakuba izinhlelo zomculo zisengazwakala ngobusuku nangezimpelaviki lapho imidlalo ingekho ehleliwe. 
Ngomhla ziyi-12 kuMfumfu wezi-2018, iWest yafika e- Uganda futhi yaqala kabusha umsebenzi we-albhamu kusitudiyo esimise okwedome esakhiwe e-Chobe Safari Lodge e- Murchison Falls National Park.IWest yafika nabantu ababalelwa ku-50 futhi yaqopha izinsuku ezinhlanu.Udlale umculo omusha, okuhlanganisa nesitudiyo esirekhodiwe se-remix ethi "We Got Love", yeqembu lezingane zesikole zase-Uganda ezingaba ngu-100 ngesikhathi somcimbi wokupha.Engxoxweni yango-Okthoba 21, 2018, umrepha waseMelika uQuavo uthe u- Migos wakhe abathathu uqophe i-albhamu.NgoNovemba 2018, kulandela ukudlala kwe-Kids See Ghosts no-Kid Cudi kumrepha waseMelika u- Tyler, i-Creator 's Camp Flog Gnaw Carnival, u-West wabhala ku-Twitter ukuthi unomuzwa wokuthi u- Yandhi akaqediwe, nokuthi "wayezomemezela idethi yokukhululwa uma isiqedile, " ibambezela i-albhamu unomphela. 
Jesus Is King yicwecwe lesishiyagalolunye lomculi waseMelika uKanye West.Ikhishwe ngo-Okthoba 25, 2019, ngomculo OKUHLE futhi yasatshalaliswa yi- Def Jam Recordings.I-albhamu ilandela indikimba yobuKristu, ehlukile emsebenzini wakhe ojwayelekile. 
UWest wakuchaza ngokuthi "inkulumo yevangeli ".Ihlanganisa ukubonakala kwezivakashi ezivela ku- Clipse, Ty Dolla Sign, Kenny G, Fred Hammond, Ant Clemons, kanye ne- Sunday Service Choir.Ukukhiqizwa kufakwe kusukela eNtshonalanga, Federico Vindver, Angel Lopez, BoogzDaBeast, kanye neTimbaland, phakathi kwabanye. 
U-West waqala ukuqopha i-albhamu ngo-Agasti 2018, ekuqaleni wayimemezela ngokuthi Yandhi.I-albhamu iphuthelwe izinsuku ezimbili zokukhishwa kokuqala ngoSepthemba nangoNovemba 2018 ngaphansi kwesihloko sokuqala, ngaphambi kokuba ibambezeleke unomphela ngenxa yokuvuza.U-West wayesungule iqembu lakhe levangeli i - Sunday Service Choir ngoJanuwari 2019, ecula izingoma zevangeli kanye namakhava ezingoma ezivela ku-discography yaseNtshonalanga.Ingoma ethi " Amanzi " yenziwe bukhoma ngaphambi kokukhishwa yiqembu. 
Ngo-Agasti 2019, u- Yandhi wamenyezelwa kabusha njengeNkosi uJesu, kodwa waphuthelwa izinsuku ezimbili zokukhululwa ezazihlelelwe ngasekupheleni kukaSepthemba 2019 ngaphansi kwesihloko esisha. 
Ukukhishwa kokugcina kwe- Jesus Is King kwenzeka kanyekanye nalokho kwefilimu yekhonsathi enegama elifanayo, okuhlanganisa nenani lamathrekhi njengengxenye yeculo.Izingoma ezithi " Landela uNkulunkulu " kanye nethi " Kuvaliwe ngeSonto " zombili zikhishwe ngoNovemba 2019, zaba phezulu kwama-20 e-US Billboard Hot 100 .I-albhamu ithole ukubuyekezwa okuxubile kubagxeki bomculo, abaningi babo beqhathanisa phakathi kwayo ne-albhamu eyedwa yaseNtshonalanga, Ye (2018).Abanye abagxeki bayincoma indlela eyaqanjwa ngayo, kuyilapho abanye bezwakalisa imizwa engemihle mayelana nezosha kanye nokungavumelani kwemibono. 
U-Jesus Is King uzuze imiklomelo ye-Top Christian Album kanye ne-Top Gospel Album kuma- Billboard Music Awards ka-2020 kanye ne- Best Contemporary Christian Music Album kuma- Grammy Awards angama -63 ngo-202.Imile njengerekhodi laseNtshonalanga elihlanganisa i-albhamu yesishiyagalolunye ilandelana ukuze iqale phezulu ku-US Billboard 200. 
Ngaphezu kwalokho, iWest yephule amarekhodi amaningana e- Billboard charts.I-albhamu ibihamba phambili eshadini kwamanye amazwe ayisishiyagalolunye, okuhlanganisa i-Australia neCanada, ngenkathi ifinyelela izikhundla ezinhlanu eziphezulu e-Czech Republic, eFinland, e-Ireland, eNetherlands, eSweden nase-United Kingdom.Inikezwe isitifiketi segolide nesiliva e-United States nase-UK yiRecording Industry Association of America (RIAA) kanye neBritish Phonographic Industry (BPI), ngokulandelanayo.I-albhamu engumngane, uJesu Uyazalwa, yakhululwa ngoDisemba 2019 yiKwaya Yenkonzo YangeSonto. 
Kuwo wonke uMeyi nangoJuni 2018, ama-albhamu amahlanu anamathrekhi ayisikhombisa akhiqizwe uWest epulazini lakhe eliseJackson Hole, eWyoming akhululwa ngokulandelana njengeWyoming Sessions.I-albhamu yesithathu yesitudiyo somrepha waseMelika u-Pusha T u- Daytona ikhishwe kuqala, kwalandelwa i-albhamu yesitudiyo yesishiyagalombili ye-West ethi Ye, i-albhamu yestudiyo ehlangene yase-West ethi Kids See Ghosts, nomrepha waseMelika u- Kid Cudi njenge- Kids See Ghosts, umrepha waseMelika uNas ' i-albhamu yeshumi nambili ethi Nasir, kanye Icwecwe lesibili lesitudiyo somculi waseMelika uTeyana Taylor i-KTSE ; wonke ama-albhamu akhishwe ngo-2018. 
UMuvhango wumdlalo owuchungechunge kamabonakude waseNingizimu Afrika, owakhiwe nguDuma Ndlovu . 
Isakazwa esiteshini sikamabonakude somphakathi i- SABC 2, futhi inababukeli abalinganiselwa ku-4 million nsuku zonke.Isiqephu sokuqala sasakazwa ngomhlaka-7 Ephreli 1997. 
Kwakuwumdlalo kamabonakude wokuqala wolimi lwesiTshivenda kodwa kamuva waba ngezilimi eziningi ukuze kuboniswe ukuthi izilimi namasiko aseNingizimu Afrika kufanele asetshenziselwe ukuhlanganisa kunokuhlukanisa.UMdali kuMuvhango ngum Zulu ngokozalo, kodwa angakhuluma futhi ngokuqephuza ngazo zonke izilimi zaseNingizimu Afrika. 
The show is built on a premise that " umuntu ngumuntu ngabantu " meaning that we exist within a context.Uhlelo lunezindaba eziqinile ezigxile emndenini ezifuna ukukhuluma ngokungqubuzana phakathi kwezindlela zendabuko nezesimanje.AbakwaVhakwevho bangababheki bezinto zendabuko kanti indawo yaseGoli igxile ezindleleni zesimanje. 
Ngo-2006 lolu chungechunge lwaqokwa njengendondo yeSouth African Film and Television Award emdlalweni owuchungechunge ohamba phambili. 
U-Elsie Rasalanavho kanye no-Maumela Mahuwa yibona abalingisi asebenesikhathi eside kulo mdlalo.Selokhu baqala ukuvela kuMuvhango ngo-1997. 
Balandelwa uDingaan Khumalo noGabriel Temudzani, asebebekhona kusukela ngo-2000.U-Elsie Rasalanavho ulingisa indawo kaVho-Mukondeleli Mukwevho, uDingaan Khumalo ubambe indawo kasomabhizinisi uJames Motsamai, uGabriel Temudzani indawo yeNduna u-Azwindini Mukwevho, iNduna yakwaThathe kanti uMaumela Mahuwa ubambe indawo kaMongikazi uSusan Mukwevho, unkosikazi omkhulu kaThathe. iNduna yakwaThathe. 
Lo mbukiso wenzelwa eGoli naseVenda.EGoli uJames Motsamai, Khakhathi Mulaudzi, Gugu Nkosi-Zikalala, Imani Nkosi, Hangwani Mukhwevho, Rendani Mukhwevho, imindeni yabo nozakwabo babhekene nezindaba zokucwasana, idrama nodlame ezinkampanini.KwaVenda umndeni wakwaMukhwevho uhola abantu baseThathe ekubeni kukhona iminkenke emndenini wabo. 
Umlingisi Iqhaza Dingaan Khumalo James Motsamai Gabriel Temudzani Azwindini Mukwevho Maumela Mahuwa Susan Mukwevho Zonke Mchunu Imani Nkosi Bukamina Cebekhulu Gugu Zikalala MacDonald Ndou KK Mulaudzi Nat Ramabulana Tenda Mudau David Sebe Vho-Gizara Mukwevho Regina Nesengani Vho-Masindi Mukwevho Elsie Murabeli Rasalanavho Vho-Mukondeleli Mukwevho Azwimbavhi Rambuda Mpho Mudau Humburani Tsharani Mulimisi Kingsley Ramabulana Vhangani Ramasha Sydney Ramakuwela Mulalo Mukwevho Inocentia Makapila Rendani Mukwevho Connie Sibiya Hangwani Mukwevho Tebatso Mashishi Kgosi Mulaudzi USharon Seno Marang Phala Vhavhudi Lidzengu Vutsilo Mukwevho Eunice Mabeta Vho-Makhadzi Mukwevho Angela Atlang Itseng Tebogo Thobejane Belinda 
Manje usengumlingisi ophambili kuMuvhango futhi wethula uhlelo lwephephabhuku iLa Famila, nalo elidlala kuSABC2 . Ungumethuli wohlelo iLa Familia kaShandukani Nesengani, eqala ngeSeason 3 ngo-2010. 
UGabriel washada noRefilwe Temudzani ngo-2013. 
Uwine imiklomelo ebalulekile ngeqhaza lakhe elithi The Dog and The Night of Horror. 
UGabriel Temudzani (owazalwa 10 February 1980 ) ungumlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika kanye nomsakazi we-TV. 
Waziwa indima yakhe yesiKhulu esiPhezulu Vhafuwi Azwindini kusukela 2000, kwi opera TV ewuchungechunge kuMuvhango kwaboniswa i-SABC 2, lapho ubelokhu kumdlali kusukela 2000. [3] [4] 
UTemudzani wazalwa ngo-1980 wakhulela eTshivhilidulu endaweni yaseNzhelele, eVenda. 
Ngo-1995, waqala umsebenzi wakhe wokulingisa futhi wenza isikrini sakhe sokuqala sokulingisa ngo-2000. 
Uke walingisa efilimini ethi A Diamond and Destiny ngo-2003, mayelana nokutholwa kwegolide nedayimane eKimberly.Ngo-2009, wabamba iqhaza eliphambili efilimini ethi Night Drive. 
Eshashalazini uke wabonakala ohlelweni i- Dog and The Night of Horror, awina ngalo indondo ye-Vita. 
USuzanne Marie Somers ( née Mahoney ; owazalwa ngo-Okthoba 16, 1946) ungumlingisi, umbhali, umculi, usomabhizinisi kanye nomkhulumeli wezempilo waseMelika.Ubonakale endimeni kamabonakude kaChrissy Snow ku- Three's Company nanjengoCarol Foster Lambert on Step by Step. 
NgoJanuwari 9, 2007, i-Associated Press yabika ukuthi umlilo wequbula eSouthern California ucekele phansi ikhaya likaSomers eMalibu. 
Kamuva Somers baba nombhali uchungechunge zokuzisiza izincwadi, kufaka phakathi Ageless: The Naked Iqiniso Bioidentical hormone (2006), mayelana bioidentical yokwelapha hormone.Ukhiphe ama-autobiographies amabili, izincwadi ezine zokudla, kanye nencwadi yezinkondlo. 
USomers ugxekwe ngemibono yakhe kwezinye izifundo zezokwelapha kanye nokumela kwakhe i- Wiley Protocol, ebizwa ngokuthi "ayinabufakazi ngokwesayensi futhi iyingozi".Ukukhuthazwa kwakhe kwezinye izindlela zokwelapha umdlavuza uthole ukugxekwa yi- American Cancer Society . [3] 
Uzalelwe uSuzanne Marie Mahoney eSan Bruno, eCalifornia, uSomers wayengowesithathu kwezingane ezine emndenini wamaKhatholika ase-Irish-American.Unina, uMarion Elizabeth (née Turner), wayengunobhala wezokwelapha, kanti uyise, uFrancis Mahoney, wayeyisisebenzi futhi esebenza engadini.Lapho uSuzanne eneminyaka eyisithupha ubudala uyise waba umlutha wotshwala.Ubaba kaSomers wayembiza ngamagama amphoxe. 
U-Somers wafunda eCapuchino High School Wabuye wathi wayengumgqugquzeli we-cheerleader e-Mercy High School e- Burlingame, e-California, futhi wamukelwa e- San Francisco College for Women, ikolishi eliphethwe yi-Catholic Society of the Sacred Heart order.USomer washada noBruce Somers ngo-1965, eneminyaka engu-19, futhi baba nendodana, uBruce Jr., ngoNovemba 1965. 
Lowo mshado waphela ngo-1968. 
USomer unabazukulu abathathu, uCamelia, uViolet noDaisy Hamel-Buffa. 
U-Somers kwatholakala ukuthi unomdlavuza webele wesigaba II ngo-Ephreli 2000, futhi wahlinzwa i- lumpectomy ukuze asuse umdlavuza okwalandelwa ukwelapha ngemisebe, kodwa wanquma ukuyeka ukwelapha ngamakhemikhali ngenxa yokukhishwa kwe-mistletoe ebilile ebizwa ngokuthi i-Iscador. 
Capuchino High School kuyisikolo esiphakeme e San Bruno, California, United States.Isikole sizungezwe idolobha laseMillbrae kuwo wonke amagumbi ngaphandle kwekhona elilodwa.Kungesinye sezikole eziphakeme eziyisikhombisa esifundeni saseSan Mateo Union High School, okuyingxenye yeHhovisi Lezemfundo Lesifunda saseSan Mateo. 
Izakhamizi ze-SMUHSD zagunyaza i-Measure D ngoNovemba 2000, eyagunyaza uxhaso lwezimali lokulungiswa kwezikole nokwenza zibe zesimanjemanje.ICapuchino inophiko lwesayensi olulungisiwe, inkantolo entsha yemimoya kanye nesakhiwo sokudla, kanye namakilasi amasha amaningana asondelene nesakhiwo esisha sokuphatha. 
Izimali ze-Measure M zagunyazwa abavoti be-SMUHSD ngo-2006 okwathi ngokwengxenye baxhasa ngezimali ukwakhiwa kwebhilidi elisha lezobuntu, ezobuciko, nesayensi (HASB) kanye nokulungiswa kabusha kwetiyetha.Ngo-April 2012 kwaqedwa i-HASB entsha futhi abafundi bangena ukuze baqedele unyaka wabo wesikole. 
Lesi sikole kade saziwa ngomculo nezinhlelo zedrama. 
U-Ralph Bredenberg (1918-2009) waba umqondisi webhendi ngo-1953 futhi wakha ibhendi ehamba phambili eyayidlala emiqhudelwaneni eminingi, futhi wabonakala ku-Tournament of Roses ePasadena, eCalifornia kanye nombukiso wokuqala kamabonakude ovezwe kuzwelonke. kaJohn F. Kennedy eWashington, DC ngoJanuwari 20, 1961. [3] 
Imbangi kaCapuchino yiMills High School eMillbrae. 
UCapuchino usenesikhathi eside enomnyango wezokusubatha ovelele.Iqale yancintisana kuPeninsula Athletic League, esukela eJefferson High School eDaly City yaya eLincoln High School eSan Jose.Njengoba kwakhiwa izikole eziningi eziphakeme ngeminyaka yawo-1950s nasekuqaleni kwawo-1960, iMid-Peninsula yasungulwa ukuze ifake izikole eziyisikhombisa eziphakeme zeSifunda Sesikole Samabanga Aphakeme saseSan Mateo.ICapuchino ibibusa umqhudelwano weligi eminyakeni edlule, ikakhulukazi ebholeni, ibasketball, ukubhukuda, i-wrestling, i-track, nethenisi.Ngasekupheleni kwawo-1950 isikole sawina umqhudelwano weligi ebholeni lase-varsity, i-basketball, ne-baseball, isikhathi esivame ukubizwa nge-"The Golden Age of Sports." [1] Abadlali bebaseball beCapuchino uWally Bunker noKeith Hernandez bobabili baqhubekile nomsebenzi kuMajor League baseball . 
[2] 
Ngawo-1990s, iqembu le-softball lamantombazane eCapuchino lawina imiqhudelwano emihlanu elandelanayo yeCentral Coast Section (CCS) (1993-1997), futhi labekwa isifundazwe izikhathi ezintathu ngalesi sikhathi.ICapuchino iphinde ibe nerekhodi le-32-9 Central Coast Section Playoff, eyinikeza iphesenti eliwina isibili kuzo zonke izikole ezikulesi sigaba. 
Isikole siphinde sinikeze amakilasi e-ROP (Regional Occupational Programme) mahhala.Lokhu kufaka i-CompTIA A+ Certification (noma idizayini yesistimu yekhompyutha), isitifiketi se-CCNA (Cisco Networking Academy), kanye nelebhu ye-Art of Video ethuthukisiwe. 
Izikolo ze-SAT zango-2014–2015 Isilinganiso Sokufunda Esibalulekile Isilinganiso sezibalo Isilinganiso sokubhala I-Capuchino High 495 508 487 Isifunda 544 570 544 Ezweni lonke 489 500 484 
Inkomba Yokusebenza Kwezemfundo yango- 2013 2009 base API I-API yokukhula ka-2013 Ukukhula kwe-API kusukela ngo-2009 kuya ku-2013 714 791 77 
USteve Oppermann, 1958, owayengungcweti wePGA Tour ULuana De Vol, 1960, umculi we-opera UBill Neukom, ngo-1960, Umphathi Omkhulu Womlingani Wemidondoshiya yaseSan Francisco UBillee Patricia Daniels, 1961, owayengumdlali we-Olympian [2] 
Izinkomba 
Ikhampasi engokomzimba, ngosayizi, ngaphambili kwakuyi-Spanish Rancho del Capuchino.Isikole savulwa ngoSepthemba 1950. 
Ekuqaleni kwakunesakhiwo esisodwa esinezitezi ezimbili kuphela ekhempasini; ngo-1953 iningi lekhampasi laqedwa.Kwakhiwa ihholo elinezihlalo ezingu-1 000 ngo-1959, lihambisana nethiyetha encane yesikole.Ngonyaka wezifundo ka-1961-62, ngaphambi nje kokuphothulwa kweSikole Samabanga Aphakeme sase-Crestmoor, ukubhaliswa kwabafundi kwedlula i-1,800 futhi cishe yonke indawo etholakalayo yasetshenziselwa amakilasi. 
Ngo-1963, i- KPIX (Channel 5) yathwebula izigcawu, okuhlanganisa ne-pep rally, esikoleni ngohlelo lwayo lwamasonto onke lwe- High School Salute.Umsakazi u- Dick Stewart uphinde waxoxisana nabafundi nobuhlakani ezitudiyo ze-KPIX ngesikhathi sokusakaza. 
Ngo-1976, umfundi uPaula Baxter walahleka ngemuva kokuphuma esikoleni samabanga aphezulu kulandela ukuzilolonga.Isidumbu sakhe, ebesigwaziwe sanukubezwa ngokocansi, satholwa ngemuva kwezinsuku ezimbili ngemuva kwesonto eMillbrae. 
Ngo-1998, abafundi bahamba izinkulungwane zamakhilomitha befunda nge- Civil Rights Movement. 
Izikolo ze-SAT zango-2014–2015 Isilinganiso Sokufunda Esibalulekile Isilinganiso sezibalo Isilinganiso Sokubhala Mills High 545 592 543 Isifunda 544 570 544 Ezweni lonke 489 500 484 
Inkomba Yokusebenza Kwezemfundo yango- 2013 2009 Base API 2013 Growth API Ukukhula kwe-API kusukela ngo-2009 kuya ku-2013 846 871 25 
IMills inemidlalo eminingi ehlukahlukene unyaka wonke wesikole. 
Ekwindla, imidlalo yilena: Ithenisi Yamantombazane, Igalofu Yamantombazane, Ipolo Yamanzi, I-Cross Country, Ibhola Lezinyawo, kanye ne-Volleyball. 
Imidlalo yasebusika ihlanganisa: I-basketball, Soccer, kanye ne-Wrestling. 
Imidlalo yasentwasahlobo ihlanganisa: I-Badminton, i-baseball, igalofu yabafana, i-Softball, Ukubhukuda, Ithenisi Yabafana, kanye ne-Track and Field. 
Mills High School kuyinto yomphakathi esikoleni esiphakeme e Millbrae, California, omunye eziyisikhombisa San Mateo Union High School District. 
Mills yasungulwa ngo-1958. 
Isikole samabanga aphezulu iMills siqanjwe ngokuthi iCalifornia Distinguished School izikhathi ezintathu (1988, 1996, 2009). 
Ngo-2012, uMills wanikezwa imvume yeminyaka eyisithupha nge- Western Association of Schools and Colleges. 
IMills inezifundo zokubekwa Okuthuthukile. 
Ahlanganisa: 
Ngo-2015 ikleliswe endaweni yama-225 yesikole samabanga aphezulu esihamba phambili ezweni yi- Newsweek.Ngo-2013 yayikleliswe endaweni yama-519 kuzwelonke yi- US News & World Report. 
IMillbrae yidolobha elisenyakatho yeSan Mateo County, California, United States.Ngasenyakatho-mpumalanga yayo kuneSikhumulo Sezindiza Samazwe Ngamazwe SaseSan Francisco, iSan Bruno isenyakatho-ntshonalanga, kanye neBurlingame eningizimu-mpumalanga yayo.Izungezwe yiSan Andreas Lake eningizimu-ntshonalanga.Inani labantu lalingama-21,536 ekubalweni kwabantu kwango-2010. 
Abantu base- Ohlone sebehlale e- Bay Area amakhulu eminyaka. 
Amadolobhana aseduze nendawo manje okuthiwa yi-Millbrae atholakala ngasosebeni lwe- San Bruno Creek, futhi aziwa ngokuthi i- Urebure ne-Siplichiquin .Idolobhana lesithathu eliseduze—elingaziwa igama lalo—libizwa ngokuthi i- CA-SMA-299.Abantu bendawo base-Ohlone namuhla babizwa ngokuthi iRamaytush Ohlone, nokho leli gama liyigama lolimi elivele kamuva nje. 
Ngaphambi kwekoloni, i-Ohlone ayizange isebenze njengeyunithi eyodwa ehlanganisiwe; bona ezikhonjwe ngaphezulu nge isizwe sabo zendawo emzaneni kuka ne isizwe sonkana.Izizwe ezimbalwa zasendaweni ezazihlala endaweni ngaphambi kokwenziwa kwamakholoni zahlangana nabantu besimanje baseRamaytush kulandela ukwehla okukhulu kwenani labantu bakhona ngeminyaka yawo-1800s. 
Ngo-1827, u-sub-lieutenant u-José Antonio Sánchez, owayesebenza e- Presidio, wanikezwa imvume ngumbusi waseMexico u- José María de Echeandía ukuba athathe i-rancho "ngokwezinjongo zokulima", njengendawo yokuklama i-Mission Dolores kanye ne-Presidio yaseSan Francisco.I-Sixteen Mile House yasekuqaleni, indawo yokudlela yomlando nendawo yokuphumula, yayiyisixhumanisi esiqondile ezinsukwini zokuqala zikaMillbrae.I stop ukuphumula lakhiwa ngo-1872 ngu-amalungu omkhaya Sánchez, landholders okuqala eNhlangano Rancho Buri Buri, okuyinto ngesikhathi esisodwa sakhiwe izingxenye banamuhla Millbrae futhi Burlingame . 
I izinganekwane we Ohlone (Costanoan) American aboMdabu abantu Northern California zihlanganisa ekudalweni izinganekwane kanye nezinye ezilandisayo lasendulo eziqukethe ezakha inkolelo izinhlelo zabo ezingokomoya futhi zefilosofi, ekukhulelweni yabo emhlabeni jikelele.Izinganekwane zabo zichaza izidalwa ze-anthropomorphic ezingaphezu kwemvelo ezinamagama ezinyoni zesifunda nezilwane, ikakhulukazi ukhozi, iCoyote engukhokho wesintu nomoya wobuqili, kanye nomzwilili. 
Izinganekwane zamaChochenyo zichaza "Abantu Bokuqala" noma "Abantu Bakuqala" njengezidalwa ze-anthropomorphic ezingaphezu kwemvelo ezinamagama ezinyoni zesifunda nezilwane.Ezinganekwaneni ezihlukene ezirekhodiwe, i-Coyote yayingumuntu ophakeme kakhulu: 
UCoyote wayengumkhulu, umngane kanye nomeluleki weqhawe lenganekwane likaChochenyo, iKaknu.U_-Kaknu wayengesinye isidalwa esingokwemvelo, esichazwa njengenyoni edla ezinye, esicishe sifane kakhulu ne- peregrine falcon . [1] 
"Ekugcineni lapho uKaknu engasafuni ukulwa namuntu, waphenduka ijuba wangena emhlabeni".U-Kaknu wagxumela emhlabeni ngokugoqa amaphiko akhe, wahamba wayobhekana "noMzimba Wetshe" obizwa ngokuthi uWiwe.Umzimba Wetshe wawuyinkosi engaphansi komhlaba, echazwa njengendoda enomzimba wamatshe, eyayiphakela abantu izinceku zayo.Indawo yakhe yayihlakazeke ngamathambo.I-Body of Stone yabamba abaningi "abantu" bakaKaknu ekuthunjweni futhi basiza u-Kaknu empini enkulu.Ngenkathi uKaknu edubula uMzimba Wetshe entanyeni nasenkabeni ngayo yonke imicibisholo yakhe, uMzimba Wetshe wafa futhi waqhuma waba yizicucu, futhi waba wonke amadwala ahlakazeke emhlabeni wonke.I-Kaknu yenza ukuthula nabantu kulo mshoshaphansi owake waba nobutha. 
[1] 
Ngokusho kwabakwaChochenyo ukufa kwadalwa nguCoyote ukuze abantu bathole ukudla okwanele kodwa lokhu kwakusho."UKaknu kwadingeka athathe umgwaqo oya ezweni labafileyo... abantu balandele isibonelo sakhe." [1] 
Inganekwane yamaChochenyo (Chocheño) yase- San Francisco Bay Area inomuntu oqinile wesiko leqhawe okuthiwa u-Kaknu, umzukulu ka-coyote, ongumuntu othanda abantu futhi ofana ngokuseduze nefalcon yeperegrine. 
Ngokusho kwamaChochenyo, iZwe Labafileyo lalinomgwaqo owodwa kuphela futhi indoda eyamukela imimoya engenayo.Kukhona igwebu elimhlophe njengolwandle, ngaphambi kwalokhu kukhona izingcezu ezimbili zentuthu nezinkuni ezivuthayo namatshe amabili ayizigodi, elinye ligcwele amanzi, elinye linoshukela, lapho imimoya ingaphuza futhi idle, ngaphambi kokuba ingene egwebu.Izinkuni ezivuthayo ziyisixwayiso, uhlobo lwesixwayiso olungachazwanga. 
Lezi zinganekwane ziye zabizwa ngokuthi izingcezu zezindaba ezingaphelele ekudalweni komhlaba. 
Babelana ngezinto ezithile nabantu abangomakhelwane eCentral naseNyakatho yeCalifornia, njengezinganekwane zeMiwok .Abantu baseBay Miwok nabo babekholelwa ukuthi umhlaba waqala ngamanzi azungeze intaba ende kunazo zonke esifundeni, iMount Diablo.Izinganekwane ze-Ohlone ziqukethe ukufana okuningi kwezinganekwane zaseYokuts kanye ne- cosmogony . 
Izinkomba 
Inganekwane eyodwa yokudalwa kwe-Ohlone iqala ngokushabalala kwezwe langaphambili: Lapho libhujiswa, umhlaba wawumbozwe ngokuphelele ngamanzi, ngaphandle kwesiqongo esisodwa, i- Pico Blanco (enyakatho yeBig Sur ) enguqulweni yeRumsien (noma iMount Diablo in the inguqulo ye-northern Ohlone) okwakumi kuyo iCoyote, i-Hummingbird, noKhozi.“Ngesikhathi amanzi ephakama ema ngezinyawo” ukhozi lwabathwala bonke baya eSierra de Gabilin (eduze kwaseFremont) lapho balinda khona “ukuba ehle amanzi” nomhlaba wome.UCoyote uthunywe ukuthi ayophenya athole komile manje. 
Ngemva kukazamcolo, ukhozi lwaholela uCoyote entombazaneni enhle ngaphakathi noma emfuleni futhi wamyala ukuthi "uzoba umkakho ukuze abantu baphinde bavuswe."Ukhozi lwanikeza uCoyote umyalelo wokuthi angamkhulelisa kanjani esiswini sakhe.Lo nkosikazi wokuqala wakhulelwa ngokudla izintwala zikaCoyote, kodwa wesaba waqala ukugijima.I-Coyote ayikwazanga ukumncenga noma ukuyinciphisa ijubane, yagijima yaya olwandle neCoyote imjaha yabe isigxumela olwandle yaphenduka izenze noma izimfanzi. 
[1] 
UCoyote washada unkosikazi wesibili futhi kulokhu waba nezingane ezaba ngabantu base-Ohlone. 
Lena yindlela “abantu abaphinde bavuka ngayo”.I-Coyote yafundisa isintu ubuciko bokuphila. 
I-Ohlone College (i- Ohlone noma i- OC ) ikolishi lomphakathi elinekhampasi yalo enkulu eFremont, eCalifornia kanye nekhampasi yesibili eNewark.Iyingxenye yeCalifornia Community College System.Isifunda sase-Ohlone Community College sisebenzela amadolobha aseFremont naseNewark, kanye nezingxenye ze- Union City. 
I-Ohlone fields amaqembu emidlalweni engu-7 yase-varsity (abesilisa aba-5, abesifazane abayisi-6) okuhlanganisa ukubhukuda, i-baseball, i-basketball, ibhola likanobhutshuzwayo ne-polo yamanzi, futhi uyilungu le-CCCAA (California Community College Athletics Association) kanye neNkomfa yasoGwini. 
I-Learning Alliance for Bioscience (LAB) Programme iwuhlelo oluxhaswa ngezimali yiNational Science Foundation olubeka abafundi bezikole zamabanga aphezulu abavela kubantu abangamelweli kahle endleleni yokufunda ukuze balungiselele amadigri ekolishi ku-biotechnology. 
Umsakazo we-KOHL ube ngumsakazi wabantu abagqamile njengesishoshovu samalungelo abantu u- Bobby Seale kanye nomlingisi uRita Moreno. 
Lapho bephothula uhlelo lwe-Respiratory Therapist abathweswe iziqu bafaneleka ukuhlalela Ukuhlolwa Kwelayisense Yesifunda SaseCalifornia Yomsebenzi Wokunakekela Ukuphefumula (RCP).Uma Isiqinisekiso Se-RCP sesitholakele abathweswe iziqu bayafaneleka ukubhalisela Izivivinyo Zomsebenzi Wezinga Eliphakeme ( RRT ) zeBhodi Likazwelonke Lokunakekelwa Kokuphefumula . 
iAlumni 
UGlenn Dishman (owazalwa ngo-1970), umgadli we-baseball kanye nomqeqeshi wokuphonsa UBrian Dunning (owazalwa ngo-1965), umbhali ULarry Johannessen (1947-2009), umbhali Tiffany Liou, intatheli U-Lev Kirshner (owazalwa ngo-1969), umdlali webhola kanye nomqeqeshi UKenney Mencher (owazalwa ngo-1965), umdwebi U-Anjuli Papineau, umdlali webhola lezinyawo kanye nomculi womphefumulo UGary Plummer (owazalwa ngo-1960), umdlali webhola waseMelika UDina Ruiz Eastwood (owazalwa ngo-1965, umlingisi wethelevishini, ihange lezindaba laseSalinas-Monterey) 
Yasungulwa njengeCalifornia Community College ngo-1965 kulandela ukuvunywa kwabavoti, i-Ohlone College isebenzela amadolobha aseFremont neNewark kanye nezingxenye ze-Union City esifundeni esiseningizimu-mpumalanga yeSan Francisco Bay.Isifunda sase-Ohlone Community College siyisifunda sekolishi elilodwa elinamakhampasi amabili kanye nekhampasi ye-e ephumelelayo. 
Iqanjwe ngokusemthethweni i-Ohlone College ngoJuni 18, 1967, igama lalesi sikhungo lihlonipha abantu base- Ohlone , izindawo zabo ezingagunyaziwe ezihlanganisa indawo yaseFremont neNewark lapho isikole sasungulwa khona, kanye nengxenye enkulu yendawo ezungezile yaseSan Francisco Bay, eyayiphethwe abantu base-Ohlone. amakhulu eminyaka ngaphambi kokufika kwabaseYurophu. 
IBhodi Labaphathiswa lakhethwa ngo-1966, elabe seliqasha umongameli owasungula, uDkt. Stephen Epler, ngoJuni 1966. [1] Ikolishi lavulwa ekwindla ngo-1967 eSerra Center, indawo yesikhashana eWashington Boulevard.Ekugcineni ikolishi laphumela emphakathini ngebhondi engu-$10 million kwathi ngo-1972 laqala ukwakhiwa kwekhempasi entsha yase-Ohlone College eMission Boulevard eFremont. 
U-Ernest J. Kump uklame izakhiwo zokuqala eziyisishiyagalolunye ezakha idolobhana lezemfundo.Izakhiwo ezengezwe kamuva kulesi sikhungo zihlanganisa isikhungo sobuciko obudlalwayo, isikhungo sobuchwepheshe, isikhungo sokuthuthukisa izingane kanye nesikhungo sosizo lwabafundi. 
Ikhampasi yesibili yakhiwa eNewark, CA, I-Ohlone College Newark Center for Health Sciences and Technology, eyavulwa ngo-2008. 
Kubandakanya uDkt. Epler, u-Ohlone ube nomongameli abayisikhombisa kuphela emlandweni wawo weminyaka engama-45+.Umongameli wamanje nguDkt Eric Bishop. 
IsiKhuhluzo esinanacala ayisi-6 okuhhadlazisa 
IziKhuhluzi zikhiqiza imiHlafuzi emincane ekugcineni kunamaphakathi nendawo. 
Lokhu kuvumela isiKhuhluzwa ukuthi sincibilike ngezindlela ezingafani ezahlukile kunalapho zinohlonze olulinganayo olukhiqizwe umushume womushini wokukhuhluza ukudla . 
Amazambane aKhuhluzwe ngesandla, njengesibonelo, ancibilika ndawonye kalula kuThosi wamaZambane kunezingcezu zamazambane ezikhuhluzwe ngomushini. 
EmCulweni 
EJameyikha naseBhelize, iziKhuhluzi zisetshenziswa njengensimbi yomculo yendabuko [1] (kanye neziGubhu, iFife, nezinye izinsimbi) uma kwenziwa ikumina, ijonkanu, kanye nemento kwezinye izikhathi . 
UmLando 
Isikhuhluzi sikaJibini sesimanje salunjwa eFilanci ngeminyaka ye-1540 ilunjwa nguFrançois Boullier. 
Umklamo wakhe wephwuthi wawuhloselwe ukuguqula uJibini oqinile ube into edlekayo. [1] 
Izahluki 
IziNgoqelela izikhuhluzi zemishini ezibucayi. 
Lezi izinxakanxaka zizungeza ngokuphenduka kwesihleke ukukhiqiza ummombo noma izingoqela. 
IziThombe 
IBhensi UMhliba umTayiba Izikhuhluzi eziningi IPhoselayini noma isikhuhluzi saGaliga IsiKhuhluzi seshalakhini Isikhuhluzi sikakhukhunathi e-Indo-Pacific 
IsiKhuhlo esinxane esikhombisa isiCezuli seMifino 
Usomahlaya uMitch Hedberg wenze ihlaya lapho athi igama eliwumqondophikisa le-cheese grater (isiKhuhluzi sikaJibin) kwakuyoba "umoni wesipontshi". [1] U-Kevin Eastman, owabamba iqhaza ekusungulweni kwamaTeenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, wathola umqondo wezivikeli mzimba zikaShredder ezisusela kwizikhuhluzi zikaJibin ezinkulu azibone ngeso lengqondo ezingalweni zeHilikiqi elizisebenzisa njengezikhali. 
Ekuqaleni wayebizwa "ngoMkhuhluzi", uShredder waziwa njengeHilikiqi eliyinhloko kuTMNT. [2] Abalandeli bezemidlalo baseWisconsin bavame ukubizwa ngokuthi amaJibini, kanti abanye bagqoka izigqoko zikaJibini. 
Ngo-2013, abalandeli bezemidlalo baseChicago naseMinnesota baphendula izimbangi zabo ngokugqoka izingubo zemifaniswano zemikhuhluzi. [3] 
Umushini wokukhuhluza ukudla – umshininyana onemishumi wezikhuhluzi IMandoline Oloshigane ISuluform Thamisi Isikhuhluzinsipho 
Amaphatho 
Brad Fredericks.

IsiKhuhluzi, sibuye saziwe ngokuthi isiHlafuzi, isitsha sasekhishini esisetshenziselwa ukugaya ukudla kube yizicucu ezincanyane. 
IsiKhuhluzi sesimanje salunjwa ngu-François Boullier ngeminyaka ye-1540s, ngenhloso yokugay uJibini . 
Ukusetshenziswa 
Isikhuhluzi sikaJibini 
kunezinhlobo ezining zeziKhuhluzi zifaka nobukhulu obahlukahlukene zeziKhuhluzi, ngakho-ke zingasiza ekulungiseni ukudla okuhlukahlukene. 
Ngokuvamile zisetshenziselwa ukukhuhluza uJibini kanye namakhasi kaLamula noma eWolintshi (ukukhiqiza uMhlibi ), kanti futhi zingasetshenziswa ukuKhuhluza okunye ukudla okuthambile. 
Zivame ukusetshenziswa ekulungiseni isinkwa somchachambiso esinoJibini, i- Welsh rarebit, isaladi lamaqanda, nezinye izipheko eziqukethe isoso kaJibini njengeziHashuki noJibini, uJibini wesishimanqi klabishana . 
KwiziPheko zamaSlavikhi, iziKhuhluzi zivame ukusetshenziselwa ukuKhuhluza amaZambane ukulungiselela iziPheko, okufaka phakathi idraniki, ibramborak noma ibabka yamaZambane . 
Emazweni ashisayo iziKhuhluzi nawo zisetshenziselwa ukuKhuhluza inyama kakhukhunathi. 
Ezwenikazi laseNdiya, isikhuhluzi sisetshenziselwa ukulungisa isilandeli kudla esithandwayo, Gajali KaHalwa . 
ImZinyambo IsiKhathi eyayiphila kuso: UNgasemaphethelweni enkathi yomcako–recent[1] PreꞒ Ꞓ O S D C P T J K Pg N UmZinyambo (Carcharias taurus) Scientific classification Ubuzwe: IsiLwane UmHibatho: INcekwa UbuNgqwangangqwanga: Okhehleluqhwaga UHlelo olukhulu: OShaka UHlelo: Omakelele UmNdeni: ImZinyambo J. P. Müller & Henle, 1839 
UmZinyombo uwodwana endleleni ozingela ngayo. 
Ukwazi ukugobela umoya ngaphezulu kobusa bamanzi uphinde iwugcine esiswini sawo. 
Lokhu kuwuvumela ukuthi ube buhelesi futhi isondele kwisilo sawo icishe ngaphandle kokunyakazi. 
Emini, umZinyombo uyafundamana , kodwa ebusuku, uyakhupheza uqhubeke nokuzingela kwawo. [1] Isisekelo sawo izinhlanzi ezincane, imigqelwane kanye neTsakayinki. 
Ngezinye izikhathi ziye izingele ziyiqembu (insungulo), futhi yaziwa ngokuhlasela izikhukhulo zokudoba ezigcwele . 
Ukuzalana 
ImZinyombo ikhiqiza imibungu emibili kuphela, eyodwa esibelethweni ngasinye. 
Imibungu emikhulu futhi enamandla kunayo yonke idla lena emincane esibelethweni ( ubuzimuzimu bemibungu ) ngaphambi kokuba umdlwane ngamunye osaphila uzalwe. [1] Izalana kancane kunabo bonake oshaka kanti futhi uyavukwa ngisho nakwingcindezelo encane eqhamuka kwinani lwabo, ngakho-ke ibalwa njenga leyo esengozini futhi ivikelwe kakhulu ebangeni eliwuhambayo. [2] 
ImZinyombo abaziwa ukuhlasela abantu. 
Uma umuntu engase awuchukuluze umZinyombo, ungase uziphindiselele ngenhloso yokuzivikela. 
ImZinyombo ayisiyona imihhahhameli, kodwa ukuhlupha abatshuzi abadoba ngemikhonto. 
EMelikha, abatshuzi bajwayele ukuvakashela izimvithi zemikhumbi eMpini Yomhlaba yesibili ukuze batshuze noshaka abenza lezi izimvithi ikhaya labo. [1] 
Ukongiwa kwemZinyombo 
Umbiko wakamuva ovela kwi-PEW Charitable Trusts uphakamisa indlela entsha yokuphatha esetshenziselwa izilwane ezincelisayo ezinkulu esezike zahlaselwe ukuncipha ngokwenani ebukeka yethembisa nakOshaka. 
Ngenxa yobunsimbi boShaka, izindlela ezijwayelekile zokuphatha iziNhlanzi, njengohlelo lwesihlengelavuno, angeke lunele ukuvuselela noma ukwandisa izibalo zoShaka. 
Ezinye zezindlela eziqinile ezisetshenziselwa ukulwa nokuncipha kwezibalo zezilwane ezinkulu ezincelisayo zingase zibe nenekoShaka, okunbandakanya nezinqumiselelo ekugcinweni kwizinhlobo zoShaka ezisengcupheni yokushabalala kanye nokulawulwa kohwebo uMhlaba jikelele. [1] 
Izinhlobo zoShaka 
Amazinyo omZinyambo omazinyo agxamalazile. 
Lomndeni uqukethe izinhlobo ezintathu zoShaka asebashabalala, kanye nezinhlobo eziningi esezashabalala kwizizalo ezimbalwa. 
Ukuhlaziywa kwakamuva koDlelo lofuzo lesikhiqizi mandla amalunga asaphila sekuthungulule ukuthi amalunga amabili asaphila awasilo ozalo olulodwa. 
Kepha asuselwa Ngakho-ke lo mndeni kwizizalo ezahlukahlukene futhi udinga ukubuyekezwa. [1] 
Zisencupheni yokushabalala (VU) Lolu uQunalo kucatshangwa ukuthi lisobungozini obukhulu bokushabalala endle.

ImZinyambo, ebuye yaziwe ngokuthi abatatamisi abampunga noma omahlikihliki, bangoshaka abawomakelele kumndeni womZinyambo. 
Itholakala emHlabeni jikelele emanzini apholile nasemanzini ashisayo. 
Lolu uQunalo oluthathu lutholakala kwizizalo ezimbili. 
Amazinyo awumhohombe, futhi abukhali omZinyambo (wohlobo UmZinyambo omazinyomancane). 
Umzimba uvame ukuba nsundu futhi uhwanqazeke kuhlangothi olungenhla. 
Lezi izihwanqeko ziyanyamalala nokukhula kwemZinyambo. 
Amazinyo ayo afana neNaliti enzelwe khona ukuxhoma iziNhlanzi, okuyisona isilo sayo esikhulu. 
Amazinyo awo amhohombe, acijile, abukhali , bese eba nezinhlangothi ezibushelelezi, kwesinye isikhathi bese eba nondane olulodwa noma ezimbili manxa womabili. [1] ImZinyambo inesigwedle somqolo sesibili esikhulu. [2] ImZinyambo ingakhula ize ifinyelele ebudeni obungamamitha ama-3.2 ubude (amafithi ayi-10), kanti futhi abadala abaningi bangaba nesisindo esingamakhilo ama-200. 
Umumo weminyaka ephilwa ubulili bobubili ulinganiselwe kwisi-7 kuphela, nakuba zingaphila isikhathi eside ekufukamelweni. 
INdawo kanye nemvelaphi 
Igama elithi umZinyambo liqhamuka egameni elithi ukunyambalaza, okuyinto ezijwayele ukuyenza lapho zihambela emsebeni, kanti futhi zijwayele ukubonakala zibhukuda maphansi nolwandle ekugagaseni; kwesinye isikhathi, basondela maduzane nosebe. 
Bajwayele ukutholakala emanzini afudumele futhi angashintshi-shintshi emhlabeni jikelele, ngaphandle kwasePhasifikhi yaseMpumalanga. [1] Baphinde bajwayele uLwandle iMedithereniyeni kanye ne-Adriatic ekujuleni okusukela kuma- 20 kuya kuma- 200 amamitha (ama-66 kuya kuma- 656 wamafithi) ngezinye izikhathi nangaphezulu. [2] 
Uchungechunge lukaMandelbrot, okumkhawulo walo uyimpindampindwano enomumo wesici wesinye (1), ne-Hausdorff dimension yesibili (2). 
Impindampindwano ekhula ngendlela efuza okwezihlahla 
Isihlahla sempindampindwano esiqhekeka izikhathi eziyishumi nanye 
Ukungena emkhawulweni wochungechunge lukaMandelbrot 
Kumchazazibalo, impindampindwano iyisigaba sobundawo buka-Euclid obunobukhulu bempindampindwano ebudlula ngokuqinile ubukhulu bayo bobumumo. 
Izimpindampindwano zivela zifana noma zinkulu kangaki, njengoba kuboniswe ngenhla ekukhuliseni okulandelanayo kochungechunge lukaMandelbrot . [1] [2] [3] [4] Izimpindampindwano zivame ukubonisa ukuphindaphinda komumo okufanayo ziqhubeka ukuncipha, okuyisici esibizwa ngokuthi ukuzifanisa, eyaziwa nangokuthi ukulingana okukhulayo noma ukulingana okusumbulukayo; uma lokhu kuphindaphinda kufana ncamashi kulo lonke izinga lobukhulu, njengasebokobokweni likaMenger, [5] kubizwa ngokuthi ukuziphindaphindisa. 
Umchazabukhulu wezimpindampindwano ubalwa ngaphakathi kwegatsha lomchazazibalo lezinjulalwazi zokubala nokulinganisa. 
Umchazabukhulu (kusuka ku-Ancient Greek; geo- "umhlaba", -metron "isilinganiso"), nge- arithmetic, ungelinye lamagatsha amadala omchazazibalo . 
Uphathelene nezici zendawo ezihlobene nebanga, ukuma, ubukhulu, kanye nokuma okulinganiselwe kwezibalo. [1] uSoZibalo osebenza emkhakheni womchazabukhulu ubizwa ngokuthi uSoBukhulu. 
I-International Space Station izungeza uMhlaba kanye njalo emizuzwini engama-92, indizela cishe ngama-kilomitha angama-400 phezu kokhumbi lolwandle. 
Imizulane emibiliemkhathingeni enesisindo esihlukene izungeleza umnyombo wonyanta. 
Ubukhulu bayo obuqhathaniswayo nohlobo lwayo lokuzungeza bufana nozungezohlelo oluphakathi kukaNochoko noCharon 
Ngokusebenza kwezasemkhathingeni, uZungezohlelo wumkhondo (noma indlela) ogobayo wento ethize njengomkhondo womzulane ozungeza inkanyezi ethize. 
Ngaphakathi kweChwe iziNxelesi zilandela lolo hlobo lwemikhondo egobayo noma ekhumbelayo, phecelezi izinzungezo ("orbits") kuzungezwa iNdeni. 
Ngokwejwayelekile, uzungezohlelo luchaza umkhondo ovamisile ukuphinda endleleni ethize, kepha lungachaza nezindlela ezingaphindelwayo. 
Lesi sithombe sibonisa imibikombani engenayo ohlelweni lombikombani; abasebenzisi balo bangabona imibikombani emisha benze futhi nezenzo ezithile, njengokufunda, ukususa, ukulondoloza, noma ukuyiphendula le milayezo. 
Emuva kwesikhathi umbikombani waphenduka ube yindlela esetshenziswa kakhulu ukuxhumana nabantu nokubathuma imininingwane nemilayezo. Manje, umbikombani uyisisekelo seningi lezinhlangano nemisebenzi emhlabeni, futhi uneqhaza elibalulekile kwezezifundo, ezokungcwebeleka, nezinye zezigaba zempilo nenhlalo yabantu eningini lamazwe omhlaba jikelele. Uphawu oluthi "ku", noma "at" ngesiNgisi, okuyingxenye yawo wonke amakheli ombikombani we-SMTP (inqubo yokuthumiselana imibikombani) 
Umfanekiso wesiGwinqa emthalakazini u-Messier 87. 
Ukulingiswa kwesiGwinqa esinomthalakazi osidlula emuva kwaso. 
isiGwinqa siyindawo emkhathingeni lapho unyanta unamandla kangangokuba akukho okwazi ukuphunyuka noma ukuphuma kuso, ngisho iziHoyana/izinhlayiyana noma iMiyonzi yomHonyazi ("electromagnetic radiation") njengokukhanya uqobo azikwazi ukuphumela esiGwinqeni. 
Umngcele lapho kungaphunyukwa khona wesiGwinqa ubizwa ngoMkhawulo wesiGwinya. 
Ledumahadi Ubude bezinkathi: Hettangian-Sinemurian, 200–195 Ma PreꞒ Ꞓ O S D C P T J K Pg N ↓ Umlando we-Ledumahadi mafube Ubuhlobo ngokofundondalo Umbuso: Animalia Isizwe: Chordata Igatsha Dinosauria Igatsha: Saurischia Igatsha: †Sauropodomorpha Igatsha: †Sauropoda Igatsha: †Lessemsauridae Inzalo: †Ledumahadi McPhee et al., 2018 Uhlobo lwesidalwa †Ledumahadi mafube McPhee et al., 2018 
i-Ledumahadi (okusho ukuthi "umdumo omkhulu" ngeSiSotho) inguhlobo lwezilwane zasemandulo oluthiwa lessemsaurid sauropodomorph eyatholwa esifundazweni saseFree State eMzansi Afrika. i-Ledumahadi mafube iyisidalwa sodwa esaziwa ukuba yingxenye yalolu hlobo lwe-Ledumahadi. Lesi silwane sabe sinemilenze emine.[1]

Ubukhulu 
Ubukhulu be-Ledumahadi buqhathaniswa nobomuntu 
I- Indian Premier League (IPL) iligi yekhilikithi yabesilisa ekhokhelwayo, ebangwa amaqembu ayishumi azinze emadolobheni ayishumi aseNdiya. 
Le ligi yasungulwa yiBoard of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) ngo-2007.[1] 
Ngo-2010, i-IPL yaba umcimbi wokuqala wezemidlalo emhlabeni ukusakazwa bukhoma ku-YouTube.[1][2] 
Sekube namasizini ayishumi nane omqhudelwano we-IPL. 
Abaphethe isicoco se-IPL njengamanje yiChennai Super Kings, ewina isizini ka - 2021.[1] 
IBhululu Isimo sokugcinwa Ayidinge kukhathalelwakwa (IUCN 3.1)[1] Ingqwangqwa uBuzwe: Isilwane uMhibatho: iNcekwa iSigaba: Izichiyosaku uHlelo: Izinkazule uMndeni: Imibokwane uZalo: Izingaqasi uMqhinkqo: IBhululu Igama IBhululu Bloch & J. G. Schneider, 1801 
IBhululu , elaziwa nangokuthi umbokwane omabhadu-bhadu, liwuhlobo lwezinhlanzi zasolwandle emndenini wombokwane . 
Amaphatho 
↑ Smith, D.G.; McCosker, J.; Tighe, K. (2019). 
"Gymnothorax favagineus". 
IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. 
2019: e.T195726A2408402. ↑ Lieske, E. and R. Myers, 1994. ↑ Kuiter, R.H., 1998. ↑ Kuiter, R.H. and T. Tonozuka, 2001. ↑ Fricke, R., 1999. ↑ Lieske, E. and R. Myers, 1994. ↑ Empty citation (help) ↑ Sommer, C., W. Schneider and J.-M. Poutiers, 1996. ↑ Lieske, E. and R. Myers, 1994. 
IBhululu liwumbokwane omkhulu ongafinyelela kumamitha ama-3 ubude, kodwa izifanekiso esivame ukuhlangana nazo zincane kakhulu. [1] Umzimba walo osesimweni senyoka unombala osizinda omhlophe kuya kophuzi onamachashaza amaningi amnyama ahluka ngobungako nangokuma kuya ngomuntu kanye nendawo ezihlala kuyo izilwane. [2] Ngakho-ke, imibokwane ehlala phezu kolwandle olunamanzi acwebile izoba namachashaza amancane amnyama kunalawo adungekile. 
Ukusabala kanye nendawo yokuhlala 
IBhululu liyisilwane esisabalele kuyo yonke indawo yolwandle oluchachambhile( yase-Indo-West Pacific) kusukela empumalanga yezwekazi iAfrika, okufakaphakathi noMtubakazi, kuze kufike ePapua New Guinea kuphinde kusuke eningizimu yeNihono (eJapan) kuyavala kuMzakathambho omkhulukazi. [1] [2] 
Lihlala kugange lwoMzikathambho. 
Emini, lihlezi lucashe emfantwini ngaphansi kwemitha eli-1 kuya kwangama-45 ukujula (3.3 no-148.5 wamafithi). [1] 
UMchazampilo 
IBhululu liyisidlanyama . Lishiya umbhudu walo ebusuku ukozingela izinyamazane ngakuMzakathambho. 
Isikhathi esiningi luthanda izinhlanzi ezincane kanye indawo yayo ebusuku ukuze iyozingela inyamazane yayo eduze kolwandle. 
Idla kakhulu izinhlanzi ezincane kanye nezihleke . [1] Ezindala zijwayele ukuba izihhahhamela endle. [2] 
Ibhululu kanye Imshunsundu eWorld Ocean Museum eKaliningrad 
gakolunye uhlangothi, abanye ongwaqa bavame ukuthula lapho bengaphambi kwe- *n* ekuqaleni kwegama lesiNgisi.Izibonelo zihlanganisa i-gnome, ummese, i-mnemonic, ne-pneumonia. 
Kwi-mathematics, ifomu le-italic n liwuphawu oluvame kakhulu lobuningi obuguquguqukayo obumela inombolo yemvelo.Iqoqo lezinombolo zemvelo libizwa ngokuthi N . {\displaystyle \mathbb {N} .} 
U-N, noma u-n, uhlamvu lweshumi nane ku-alfabhethi yesimanje yesiNgisi kanye ne-ISO basic Latin alphabet.Igama layo ngesiNgisi lithi en (elibizwa ngokuthi /ˈɛn/), ubuningi ens.[1] 
Enye ye-hieroglyphs evame kakhulu, inyoka, yayisetshenziswa ekubhaleni kwaseGibhithe ukumela umsindo onjengesiNgisi *, ngoba igama laseGibhithe elisho "inyoka" kwakungu-djet.Kucatshangwa ngabaningi [ngobani?] ukuthi abantu abangamaSemite abasebenza eGibhithe bavumelanisa ama-hieroglyphics ukudala izinhlamvu zokuqala, nokuthi basebenzisa uphawu olufanayo lwenyoka ukumela u-N, ngoba igama labo elisho "inyoka" kungenzeka ukuthi laqala ngalowo msindo.Kodwa-ke, igama lohlamvu ngesiFenike, isiHeberu, isi-Aramu nesi-Arabhu yi-nun, okusho ukuthi "inhlanzi" kwezinye zalezi zilimi.Inani lomsindo wohlamvu lalingu /n/—njengesiGreki, isi-Etruscan, isiLatini kanye nezilimi zanamuhla. 
⟨n⟩ represents a dental or alveolar nasal in virtually all languages that use the Latin alphabet, and in the International Phonetic Alphabet.A common digraph with ⟨n⟩ is ⟨ng⟩, which represents a velar nasal in a variety of languages, usually positioned word-finally in English.Often, before a velar plosive (as in ink or jungle), ⟨n⟩ alone represents a velar nasal.In Italian and French, ⟨gn⟩ represents a palatal nasal /ɲ/.The Portuguese and Vietnamese spelling for this sound is ⟨nh⟩, while Spanish, Breton, and a few other languages use the letter ⟨ñ⟩. 
Imfundiso (kusuka esiLatini: , okusho ukuthi "ukufundisa, ukufundiswa") ukuhlanganiswa kwezinkolelo noma indikimba yezimfundiso noma iziyalezo, izimiso ezifundisiwe noma izikhundla, njengengqikithi yezimfundiso egatsheni elithile lolwazi noma ohlelweni lwezinkolelo.I-etymological Greek analogue yi-"catechism".[1] 
Ngokuvamile igama elithi imfundiso lisikisela ngokuqondile izindikimba zezimiso zenkolo njengoba zimenyezelwe yisonto.Imfundiso ingabuye ibhekisele esimisweni somthetho, emasikweni omthetho ovamile, asungulwe ngomlando wezinqumo ezedlule. 
Leli gama liphinde lisebenze emcabangweni wenqubo esunguliwe ekusebenzeni okuyinkimbinkimbi empini.Isibonelo esivamile yimfundiso yezindlela lapho kusetshenziswa khona isethi ejwayelekile yamaqhinga, izinhlobo zamasosha nezikhali njengendlela yokuzenzakalelayo yohlobo lokuhlasela. 
Cishe yonke inhlangano yezempi inemfundiso yayo, ngezinye izikhathi ebhaliwe, ngezinye izikhathi engabhalwanga.Ezinye izimfundiso zempi zidluliselwa ngezinhlelo zokuqeqesha.Muva nje, emisebenzini yesimanje yokugcina ukuthula, ebandakanya kokubili imisebenzi yomphakathi neyempi, izimfundiso ezibanzi kakhulu (hhayi nje ezempi) manje ziyavela njenge-2008 United Nations peacekeeping operations' "Capstone Doctrine" ekhuluma ngemisebenzi ehlanganisiwe yomphakathi nezempi.[1] 
Ngokwencazelo, imfundiso yezepolitiki iyinqubomgomo, isikhundla noma isimiso esikhuthazwa, esifundiswe noma esisebenza mayelana nokuthola nokusetshenziswa kwamandla okubusa noma ukuphatha emphakathini.Igama elithi imfundiso yezepolitiki ngezinye izikhathi lihlonzwa ngokungeyikho nemibono yezepolitiki. 
Kodwa-ke, imfundiso ayinaso isici sokusebenza se-ideology.Ngokuyinhloko yinkulumo ecatshangelwayo, "ebhekisela kwisamba esihambisanayo sokugomela mayelana nokuthi isihloko esithile kufanele sibe yini" (Bernard Crick).Imfundiso yezepolitiki isekelwe kuqoqo lamagugu acaciswe ngokunengqondo, okungase kwandulele ukwakheka kobunikazi bezepolitiki ngokwabo. 
Ikhathalela ukuthambekela kwefilosofi ezingeni le-meta-theoretical.[1] 
Imfundiso yezomthetho iyinhlangano yemithetho ehlobene (ngokuvamile yomthetho ovamile futhi eyakhiwe isikhathi eside) ehlobene nomqondo wezomthetho noma isimiso.Isibonelo, imfundiso yokukhungatheka kwenhloso manje inezivivinyo eziningi nemithetho esebenzayo maqondana nomunye futhi ingaqukethwe ngaphakathi "kwibhubhu" lokukhungatheka.Emhlanganweni wenkantolo ummangalelwa angabhekisela emfundisweni yokuthethelelwa. 
Kungabonakala ukuthi igatsha lomthetho liqukethe izimfundiso ezahlukahlukene, nazo eziqukethe imithetho ehlukahlukene noma izivivinyo.Ukuhlolwa kokungenzeki kwesenzakalo esibalulekile kuyingxenye yemfundiso yokukhungatheka eyingxenye yomthetho wesivumelwano.Izimfundiso zingakhula zibe igatsha lomthetho; ukubuyiselwa kwemali manje kubhekwa njengegatsha lomthetho elihlukile esivumelwaneni nasekuhlukucaphuna okudingekayo] 
Ngokusho kwesazi sezokuhlalisana kwabantu uMervin Verbit, imfundiso ingaqondwa njengenye yezingxenye eziyinhloko zenkolo.Uhlukanisa imfundiso ngezigaba ezine: okuqukethwe, imvamisa (izinga elingathatha ngalo ingqondo yomuntu), ukuqina kanye nokubaluleka.Ngayinye yalezi ingahluka kusuka enkolweni eyodwa kuya kwenye, ngaphakathi kwalelo siko lenkolo.[1][2][3] 
Ukuhlonipha (/ˈrɛvərəns/) "umuzwa noma isimo sengqondo senhlonipho ejulile esinokwesaba; ukuhlonishwa".[1] Igama elithi "ukuhlonipha" osukwini lwanamuhla livame ukusetshenziswa ebuhlotsheni nenkolo.Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi inkolo ivame ukukhuthaza imizwelo ngokuqaphela unkulunkulu, amandla angaphezu kwawemvelo, nokungachazeki.Ukuhlonipha kuhilela ukuzithoba komuntu siqu ekuqapheleni ngenhlonipho okuthile okubonakala kukhulu kunomuntu. 
Ngakho-ke inkolo ngokuvamile iyindawo lapho kuhlonishwa khona. 
Kodwa-ke, ngokufana nokwesaba, ukuhlonipha kungumzwelo ngokwawo, futhi kungazwakala ngaphandle kwendawo yenkolo.[1]Ngenkathi ukwesaba kungabonakala ngokuthi "ukuzwela okukhulu kobukhulu," ukuhlonipha kubonakala kakhulu njengokuvuma ukusabela okungokoqobo kokuthile okuhle kakhulu ngendlela yomuntu siqu (yokuziphatha noma engokomoya), kodwa ngaphezu kwakhe" USolomoni uchaza ukwesaba njengokungenzi lutho, kodwa ukuhlonipha njengokusebenza, ephawula ukuthi umuzwa wokwesaba (okungukuthi, ukumangala) kusho ukukhubazeka, kanti imizwa yokuhlonipha ihlotshaniswa kakhulu nokuzibandakanya okusebenzayo kanye nomthwalo wemfanelo kulokho umuntu akuhloniphayo.[2][3] Imvelo, isayensi, izincwadi, ifilosofi, izazi zefilosofi ezinkulu, abaholi, abaculi, ubuciko, umculo, ukuhlakanipha, nobuhle ngamunye kungasebenza njengesikhuthazo nokugxila kokuhlonipha. 
U-Albert Schweitzer, owazuza uMklomelo Wokuthula KaNobel futhi ophethe iziqu ezine ze-PhD, wafuna iminyaka eminingi isisekelo sombono omusha wezwe.Ngolunye usuku, ngenkathi esesikebheni emfuleni eGabon, wamshaya ngamandla amakhulu nangokucaca: "Ukuhlonipha impilo" (NgesiJalimane: Ehrfurcht vor dem Leben). 
Ucwaningo olunzulu lukaKeltner noHaidt ngokwesaba lugxile ekubalulekeni kobukhulu nokuhlala ekubhekaneni nokwesaba. 
"Ubukhulu bubhekisela kunoma yini ebonwa njengenkulu kakhulu kunomuntu uqobo. "Indawo yokuhlala ibhekisela "Enqubweni yokulungisa izakhiwo zengqondo ezingakwazi ukufanisa okuhlangenwe nakho okusha".[1]Ucwaningo lwabo ngokwesaba, okuyingxenye yokuhlonipha, nokuthi kubonwa kanjani ngezindlela zokuziphatha, ezingokomoya, nezobuhle, lukhanyisa ukuqonda okukhulu kokuhlonipha.Ucwaningo lwabo lubuye luqukethe isifinyezo esiphelele salokho okuye "Kubhalwe ngokwesaba enkolweni, ifilosofi, ezenhlalo, kanye ne-psychology" kanye nokungeza kwabo "Izimo ezihlobene njengokuncoma, ukuphakanyiswa, kanye nokuhlangenwe nakho kwe-epiphanic".[1] 
U-Haidt (2000) uphawula ukuthi kusukela uMaslow (1964) afunda izinguquko okuhlangenwe nakho okungaletha kubunjalo babantu nasezimpilweni zabo zokuziphatha nezingokomoya, ucwaningo oluncane lwenziwe ukuhlola okuhlangenwe nakho okuphezulu nokuguqulwa kokuziphatha okuhlobene nemizwelo emihle yokuziphatha njengokubonga, ukuphakanyiswa, ukwesaba, ukunconywa, nokuhlonipha.[1][2]Umsebenzi kaHaidt kulezi zindawo uphakamisa ukuthi imizwa enamandla yokuhlonipha ingahlotshaniswa nokuhlangenwe nakho okuphezulu okuhambisana nokuguqulwa kokuziphatha, lapho, "Izikhathi ezinamandla zokuphakama ngezinye izikhathi zibonakala zicindezela inkinobho yengqondo 'yokubuyisela kabusha,' zisusa imizwa yokugxeka futhi ziyifake esikhundleni semizwa yethemba, uthando, nethemba, kanye nomuzwa wokuphefumulelwa kokuziphatha. "[3] 
Abaculi abakhulu ekudalweni kobuciko babo ngezinye izikhathi banikeza ifomu eliqondile ezinkolelweni ezithathwe emasikweni, amagugu, kanye nobunikazi beqembu obunikeza incazelo nenhloso yokuba khona.Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukuhlonipha imidwebo eveza lezi zici eziyinhloko zamasiko kunganikeza indlela yokunciphisa ukukhathazeka okukhona okulandela izikhumbuzo zokungagwenywa kokufa kwabantu.[1]Kuwo wonke umlando, amasiko aye ahlonipha ubuciko njenge "forum yokumela phakathi okuhlala njalo labo bantu abaphakanyiswe njengezifanekiselo zobuhle nokubaluleka okuhlala njalo. "[2] 
UThomas noSchlutsmeyer ku, "Indawo ye-Aesthetic ku-Experiential Personal Construct Psychology," babheka ukuhlonishwa ngokusebenzisa i-lens ye-experiential personal construct psychology (EPCP). 
ULeitner & Pfenninger, ngo-1994, bacabanga ngalolu hlobo lwe-psychology ku-"Sociality and optimal functioning." 
Ngaphansi kwalesi sambulela se-psychology, "Ukuhlonipha okuzwakalayo ekuxhumaneni okunenjongo phakathi kwabantu kungenye yokuqala ekuthuthukiseni umuzwa omkhulu wokuxhumeka nezwe kanye nabanye abaningi (abantu nabangewona abantu) kuwo. "Lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi ukuhlonishwa komuntu siqu. 
UThomas noSchlutsmeyer benza icala lokuhlonipha ekwelapheni: "Kwi-EPCP, ukuhlonipha, njengoba sishilo ngaphambili, kungumgomo wokwelashwa, uphawu lokusebenza kahle. "[1]Umelaphi kufanele ahloniphe isiguli futhi isiguli kufanele sifunde ukuhlonipha abanye kanye naso ukuze ukwelashwa kuphumelele. 
Isihloko sikaDavid Pugmire, "The Secular Reception of Religious Music" sihlola okuhlangenwe nakho okuyingqayizivele kokuhlonipha ngomculo.Ikakhulukazi ubheka ukuthi umculo wenkolo unekhono kanjani lokugxilisa imizwelo yokuhlonipha, ukwesaba, ukumangala, nokuhlonishwa kubantu bezwe abantula umongo wokuqonda ngokugcwele okudlulayo ngenkolo."Umculo ongcwele ubonakala unamandla amangalisayo phezu kwabangakholwa hhayi nje ukubasheshisa noma ukubathokozisa njengomunye umculo, kodwa futhi nokubenza, njengoba kuncane okunye okungakwenza, ngalokho okungabizwa ngokuthi imizwa yokuzinikela. 
"Ngisho noma kunjalo, uPugmire uthi i-secularist ayikwazi ukuqonda ngokugcwele isimo sobuciko obungcwele kufaka phakathi umculo ongcwele."Ukuveza kwayo okungangabazeki kungamholela kakhulu ekufinyeleleni kwemizwa, hhayi emizweni ngomqondo ophelele, okungukuthi, imizwelo enezinto ezifanele ezisekelwa izahlulelo ezifanele. "[1] 
Lesi sigaba sihlanganisa izihloko eziphathelene nemizwelo ethile.Ukuze uthole izihloko eziphathelene nezinye izihloko ezihlobene nemizwelo, bheka Isigaba: Imizwelo nezinye izigaba zayo ezingaphansi. 
Imizwelo yizinto ezibonwayo, ezivame ukuhlotshaniswa nemizwelo, isimo, ubuntu, nesimo.Izihloko eziphathelene nezimo ezithile ezingokomzwelo kufanele zibekwe ku-Category: Imizwelo noma kwesinye sezigaba zayo ezingaphansi. 
I-Psychology iyiqoqo lezemfundo, ezemitholampilo nezimboni eziphathelene nencazelo nokubikezela kokuziphatha, ukucabanga, imizwelo, izisusa, ubudlelwano, amandla kanye nama-pathologies 
Nasty C Igama lokuzalwa Nsikayesizwe David Jr. 
Ngcobo Ubezalwa (1997-02-11) 11 ngoNhlolanja 1997 (Iminyaka 25) Diepkloof, Soweto, Johannesburg, South Africa Umdabu Durban, Kwa-Zulu Natal, South Africa Izinhlobo Hip hop trap Abasebenzi Rapper Actor Singer songwriter record producer Amathuluzi Digital audio workstation sampler Isikhathi 2013–present Amaqembu Universal Music Africa Def Jam Recordings Africa Tall Racks Records Def Jam Amaviyo Tellaman Cassper Nyovest French Montana Boity Davido Ari Lennox Lil Keed Lil Gotit Emtee T.I. Shane Eagle Runtown Gemini Major Rowlene Dax Isizindalwazi nastyc.africa 
2016-2017: Bad Hair 
Ngo-11 kuNhlolanja 2016, uNgcobo wakhipha i-"Hell Naw" kamuva eyembulwa ukuthi iyingoma eyinhloko ye-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ezayo.[1] Ngo-23 kuMandulo, uNgcobo wabe esekhipha i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala, i-Bad Hair ngaphansi kwe-Mabala Noise Entertainment. 
Ngomsebenzi wobuciko we-albhamu, wathola abalandeli bakhe ku-Twitter ukuba bamthumele izithombe zabo ezibonisa izinkathi zabo zezinwele ezimbi, wabe esehlanganisa zonke izithombe ngendlela yobuciko ehlanganisa ubuso bakhe.[2] I-Bad Hair yafinyelela inani lokuqala kumachashi endawo e-iTunes futhi yaba yi-albhamu edlalwa kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika kungakapheli amahora angu-24.[3] UNgcobo wakhipha ifilimu yemizuzu engu-14 enezingoma ezintathu ezivela kuBad Hair eziqondiswa nguKyle Lewis. 
Ibhayisikobho emfushane eyayihlanganisa izingoma ezithi "Don't Do It'", "Good Girls and Snapchat Hoes" kanye ne "Phases" ezibonisa iRowlene, yaboniswa kwezentengiselwano emazweni amaningana kufaka phakathi iFrance, iJalimane, i-United Kingdom ne-United States, okwakungavamile kwi-video yase-Afrika.[4] 
Ngo-2 kuZibandlela 2016, uNgcobo wakhipha inguqulo eyandisiwe yeBad Hair ebizwa ngokuthi yiBad Hair Extensions.[1] I-Bad Hair Extensions yaveza izingoma ezine ezintsha kuhlanganise ne-single eyinhloko i-Allow enomculi we-rap waseMelika uFrench Montana. 
Ngokunqoba izindondo eziningi ngo-2016 nango-2017, uNgcobo wathola ukuqokwa kwakhe okukhulu kakhulu okwakuyi-2017 BET Award for Best International Act: Africa lapho alahlekelwa khona ku-Wizkid.[2] Waphinde waqokwa kuma-MTV Europe Music Awards ka-2017.[3] UNgcobo waba sesikhundleni sesithathu ku-MTV Base ka-2016: SA's Hottest MCs.[4] Ngo-2017 waphinde wabekwa esigabeni esifanayo, kulokhu endaweni yesine.[5] 
2018: Ukuhwebelana kwe-UMG kanye neStrings and Bling 
Ngo-16 kuNhlolanja, uNgcobo wasayina isivumelwano sokusakaza ne-Universal Music Africa ngokubambisana ne-Universal Music South Africa kanye nesivumelwano sokubhuka ithalenta ne-UMG Live Africa.[1][2] NgoNhlangulana 1, phakathi nokuhambela kwakhe eNigeria, wasayina isivumelwano sokusakaza ne-Universal Music Group Nigeria, ngaphambi kokukhululwa kwama-singles akhe, "Jungle" ne-"King" okubonisa umculi we-rap waseMelika u-A$AP Ferg, kwi-albhamu yakhe yesibili, i-Strings and Bling.[3][4] NgoNhlangulana 2018, ngesikhathi sokukhululwa kwabezindaba i-Premium Times, umphathi jikelele we-Universal Music Group Nigeria, u-Ezegozie Eze wathi "I-Strings and Bling" iyibufakazi bekhono, ubuciko nentshiseko ayiletha emdlalweni wakhe njalo ngesikhathi, futhi siyajabula ukuletha lo msebenzi omuhle kakhulu emakethe".[3] I-Strings and Bling yakhululwa ngo-6 kuNtulikazi 2018 kokubili ngezindlela zedijithali nezomzimba.[5][6] I-TimesLIVE yabiza i-Strings and Bling ngokuthi elinye lama-albhamu amahle kakhulu e-hip hop eNingizimu Afrika, futhi yabuye yafakwa ohlwini lwama-albhamu e-hip-hop kumagazini i-Tina.[7][8] Amanye ama-singles e-albhamu ahlanganisa i-"SMA" eveza i-Rowlene, kanye ne-single yokukhangisa i-"Gravy". 
Ngo-20 kuNcwaba 2018, uNgcobo wasungula isitayela sakhe sokurekhoda, iTall Racks Records.[1] Umculi wakhe wesikhathi eside uRowlene waba yisenzo sokuqala sokusayina ngaphansi kwelebula, eceleni kwakhe. 
UNgcobo waqala i-Ivyson Tour ngo-6 kuMfumfu 2018, eMelrose Arch eGoli. 
Uhambo lwemibukiso emihlanu elandelanayo (emine eNingizimu Afrika neyodwa eNamibia) lwaba yimpumelelo ngenani labantu ababekhona.[2] Ekupheleni kuka-2018 wabekwa ku-MTV Base: SA's Hottest MCs okwesithathu ngokulandelana, endaweni yesithathu.[3] 
Ngo-2019, uNgcobo waqokwa njengenxusa lenkampani yokuhlanza yabesilisa, i-Axe South Africa.[1] Ku-2019 Dstv Mzansi Viewers Choice Awards ingoma yakhe ethi "SMA (Vol. 
1)" eveza uRowlene yakhethwa njenge-Favorite Song Of the Year.[2] NgoLwezi 24, 2019, wathatha imiklomelo emibili ye-AFRIMA ehlanganisa i-Best African Rapper / Lyricist kanye ne-Best African Collaboration.[3] Waphinde wabekwa phezulu ku-MTV Base: SA's Hottest MCs for 2019, isikhathi sakhe sesine emgqeni esibekwe kulolo hlu.[4] 
2019–2021: I-Def Jam, i-Def Jam Africa ne-Zulu Man with Some Power 
UNsikayesizwe David Junior Ngcobo (owazalwa ngo-11 Nhlolanja 1997), owaziwa ngokuthi uNasty C, ungumculi we-rap waseNingizimu Afrika, umbhali wezingoma, nomkhiqizi we-rekhodi.[1] 
UNgcobo wenza ingxenye yesithathu yohambo lwakhe lwamakhonsathi, i-Ivyson Tour, eyaqala ngo-20 kuMandulo 2019, eKapa, eNingizimu Afrika.[1][2] Ngo-27 kuMandulo 2019, wakhipha i-"God Flow" enomculi we-rap ucrownedYung, i-single eyinhloko ye-albhamu yakhe yesithathu yesiteshi, i-Zulu Man with Some Power. 
Kubikwa ukuthi kwakukhona abaculi bamazwe omhlaba ababezovela ku-albhamu.[3][4] 
NgoNdasa 2020, i-Billboard yabika ukuthi uNasty C wasayina isivumelwano sokubambisana ne-Def Jam Records, ngokukhululwa kwe-single ethi "There They Go" njengokuqala kwakhe ngaphansi kwelebula.[1] 
NgoMbasa 2020, uNasty C wakhipha i-EP ebonakalayo i-Lost Files, enezingoma ezivezwe kuma-video wokudlala ku-YouTube. 
Uchaze umqondo we-EP ethi: "Ziyingoma ezingazange zikhokhele amaphrojekthi athile, izingoma ezagcina zifana nemibono nje". 
Ngo-14 kuNhlaba, i-EP yafakwa ku-Apple Music.[1] 
Ngo-20 kuNhlaba 2020, uNasty C waqala ukudlala indima ye-cameo ochungechungeni lwe-Netflix lwezingxenye eziyisithupha lwe-Blood & Water, edlala indima kaZhero.[1] Ngo-28 Nhlabaku 2020, uNasty C wasayina isivumelwano ne-Universal Music Group flagship i-Def Jam Africa.[2] NgoNhlangulana 5, uNasty C wahlangana nomculi we-rap waseMelika uT.I. ngengoma yokubhikisha ethi "They Don't". 
Imali etholakala engomeni izuzisa izinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo i-Until Freedom and Solidarity Fund, enezingoma ezibhekisela ekubulaweni kukaGeorge Floyd.[3] Ngo-25 Nhlangulana, wakhipha i-mixtape yokubambisana no-DJ Whoo Kid, enesihloko esithi Zulu. 
Ngemuva kokuhlehliswa kaningana, ngo-6 August 2020, uNasty C wathatha imithombo yakhe yezokuxhumana futhi wamemezela ukuthi i-albhamu yakhe eyayilindelwe kakhulu i-Zulu Man with Some Power izokhululwa phakathi nenyanga ka-Agasti. 
Wakhipha uhlu lwezingoma ezingu-20 ezibonisa abaculi bamazwe omhlaba nabaseNingizimu Afrika, kuhlanganise noLil Keed, u-Ari Lennox, uLil Gotit, u-TI, u-Tellaman noRowlene. 
I-albhamu yakhululwa ngo-28 kuNcwaba 2020.[1][2] NgoLwezi 2020, uNasty C wawina umklomelo we-Best Male Rap Act emkhosini we-African Muzik Magazine Awards 2020.[3] NgoZibandlela 2020, waba sesikhundleni sesithathu ku-MTV Base: uhlu lwe-SA's Hottest MCs, isikhathi sakhe sesihlanu ngokulandelana ukuvela kulolo hlu.[4] 
NgoNhlangulana 2021, wakhipha ingoma enesihloko esithi "Best I Ever Had".[1][2] Emkhosini wesithupha we-All Africa Music Awards, wathola izicelo ezintathu zokubhala izingoma zonyaka, umculi wesilisa ongcono kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika kanye nomculi we-rap / wezingoma wase-Afrika ongcono kakhulu.[3] Waphinde waba ngowesithathu ku-2021 MTV Base: uhlu lwe-SA's Hottest MCs, isikhathi sakhe sesithupha ngokulandelana kulolo hlu.[4] 
NgoNhlaba 2022, waqala i-Ivyson Army Tour eyaqala ngoNhlaba 7 (Bloemfontein); lolu hambo lwahlanganisa izinsuku ezinhlanu ezaqala ngo mhlaka 7 kuNhlaba kuze kube ngu mhlaka 4 kuNhlangulana 2022.[1] 
NgoNhlangulana 2022, wafika endimeni yochungechunge lwe-Disney+ i-Kizazi Moto: Generation Fire.[1][2] 
One Kid a Thousand Coffins (2013)[1][2] L.A.M.E (2014) Price City (2015) Zulu (2020)[3] 
C L.A.M.E (2014)[1][2] Lost Files (2020)[3]

Unyaka Umkhosi Wemiklomelo Umklomelo Umsebenzi/Isitsha Umphumela 2015 South African Hip Hop Awards 2015 Umfundi Omusha Ongcono Kakhulu[1] Yena uqobo Uwinile 2016 South African Hip Hop Awards 2016 Umlobi Wezingoma Zonyaka[2] Yena uqobo Isiphakamiso 2017 16th Metro FM Music Awards Umculi Omusha Ongcono Kakhulu[3] Bad Hair Extensions Uwinile I-albhamu Engcono Kakhulu Yesilisa[3] Bad Hair Extensions Uwinile I-albhamu ye-Hip Hop Engcono Kakhulu[3] Bad Hair Extensions Uwinile Ingoma Yonyaka[3] Hell Naw Uwinile BET Awards Umdlalo Wamazwe Omhlaba Ongcono Kakhulu: I-Afrika[4] Yena uqobo Isiphakamiso 2021 SAMAs 27 I-albhamu ye-Hip Hop Engcono Kakhulu IZulu Man with Some Power Uwinile MTV Africa Music Awards 2021 Umculi we-Hip hop ongcono kakhulu Kuslindiwe

NgoNdasa 2020, uNasty C wasayina isivumelwano sokubambisana ne-Def Jam Records, futhi wakhipha i-single yakhe yokuqala esemthethweni yase-United States ngemuva kokujoyina i-Def jam, "There They Go", eyamenza waziwa emhlabeni wonke, wabe esekhipha i-albhamu yakhe yesithathu ngo-28 kuNcwaba 2020, kanye ne-albhamu yokuqala ku-label enesihloko esithi Zulu Man with Some Power (2020). 
1997–2015: Ukuphila kwasebuntwaneni nama-mixtapes okuqala 
UNsikayesizwe David Junior Ngcobo wazalwa ngo-11 February 1997 eDiepkloof, idolobha laseSoweto, eGoli. 
Ngemuva kokushona kukanina owaba engozini yemoto ebulalayo ngenkathi enezinyanga ezingu-11, wathuthela eThekwini, eKwa-Zulu Natal ukuze akhuliswe nguyise, uDavid Maviyo Ngcobo, ongumphathi wezisebenzi.[1] Unomfowabo omdala, uSiyabonga Ngcobo, owamthonya ukuba enze i-rap njengoba efunda izinto eziyisisekelo zokukhiqiza umculo kuye eneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye. 
UNgcobo wafunda eStrelitzia Secondary School eLotus Park, eThekwini lapho aqeda khona ibanga lakhe le-12.[2] 
Lapho eneminyaka eyishumi nane, uNgcobo wakhipha i-mixtape yakhe yokuqala ethi One Kid, a Thousand Coffins ngo-14 kuNhlaba 2012.[1] Khona-ke wakhipha i-EP yakhe yokuqala i-L.A.M.E (Levitating Above My Enemies) ngo-4 kuMbasa 2014.[2] Ngonyaka olandelayo ngo mhlaka 10 kuNhlolanja, wakhipha i-mixtape yakhe yesibili i-Price City eyakhiqiza ingoma ephumelelayo ethi "Juice Back" eyamphakamisa ukuvelela kwakhe.[3] "Juice Back" kamuva yaveza i-remix ekhiqizwa uGemini Major ehlanganisa umculi uDavido nomculi we-rap uCassper Nyovest ngo-20 kuLwezi 2015. 
"I-XXX" ivame ukusetshenziselwa ukuchaza izinto ezingcolile zobulili. 
Izithombe zobulili ezingcolile (ngokuvamile zifushaniswa zibe yizithombe zobulili noma izithombe ezingcolile) ziwukubukwa kwezindaba zobulili ngenhloso ekhethekile yokuvusa ubulili.Kungase kudlalwe umehluko phakathi kwezobuciko obucacile noma obunzima obungcolile, kanye nezithombe zobulili ezingcolile.Izithombe zobulili ezingcolile zingase ziboniswe emithonjeni ehlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi omagazini, ama-animation, ukubhala, amabhayisikobho, ama-video, nemidlalo ye-video. 
Leli gama alihlanganisi imibukiso ebukhoma njengombukiso wezocansi kanye ne-striptease.Izihloko eziyinhloko zemidwebo ye-porn yanamuhla ngamamodeli we-porn, abenza izithombe ezingashintshi, kanye nabadlali be-porn abahlanganyela ezenzweni zobulili eziqoshiwe. 
Amaqembu ahlukahlukene emphakathini aye abheka ukuvezwa kwesimo sobulili esibi, esiluthayo, nesingcolile, ezibiza ngokuthi izithombe zobulili ezingcolile, futhi ezama ukuzincisha ngaphansi kwemithetho yezinhlamba, zihlaziye noma zenziwe ngokungemthetho.Izizathu ezinjalo, ngisho nencazelo yezithombe zobulili ezingcolile, ziye zahluka ezimweni ezihlukahlukene zomlando, zamasiko, nezesizwe.Ngasekupheleni kwekhulu le-19, amabhayisikobho ahlukahlukene kaThomas Edison agxekwa njengamahlazo e-United States, kuyilapho i-Le Coucher de la Mariée ka-Eugene Pirou yathandwa kakhulu eFrance.Isimo sengqondo somphakathi ngokuqondene nengxoxo nokwethula ubulili siye saba nokubekezelelana kakhulu emazweni aseNtshonalanga, futhi izincazelo ezingokomthetho ze-hose ziye zalinganiselwa kakhulu, kusukela ngo-1969 nge-Blue Movie ka-Andy Warhol, ibhayisikobho yokuqala yabantu abadala ebonisa ubulili obucacile ekukhululwe emidlalweni ebanzi e-United States. 
Kwalandela i-Golden Age of Porn (1969X1984), lapho amabhayisikobho angcolile asezingeni eliphezulu aba yingxenye yesiko elivamile.[1][2][3] 
Amagama ayinhloko aseshwa ku-inthanethi ukuze kutholakale izithombe zobulili ezingcolile. 
Imboni ekhulayo yokukhiqiza nokusetshenziswa kwezithombe zobulili ezingcolile yasungulwa engxenyeni yokugcina yekhulu lama-20. 
Ukungeniswa kwe-video yasekhaya kanye ne-Intanethi kwabona ukuchuma embonini yezocansi yomhlaba wonke ekhiqiza izigidigidi zama-dollar minyaka yonke.[4] Izithombe zobulili ezingcolile ezidayiswayo zenza imali engaphezu kwezigidi eziyizinkulungwane ezingama-US $ 2.5 e-United States kuphela, kufaka phakathi ukukhiqizwa kwemithombo yezindaba ehlukahlukene nemikhiqizo nezinsizakalo ezihlobene nayo.[5] Imboni yezocansi iphakathi kwama-$10 ayizigidi eziyizinkulungwane ezingu-12 e-US. 
Ngo-2006, imali etholakala emhlabeni wonke yezithombe zobulili ezingcolile yayingu-$97 billion.[6][7] Lo mboni uqasha izinkulungwane zabadlali kanye nabasebenzi abasekelayo nabakhiqiza. 
Iphinde ilandelwe yizincwadi ezikhokhelwayo zezimboni namaqembu ezentengiselwano, imibukiso yemiklomelo efana ne-AVN Awards, kanye nemithombo yezindaba, izinhlangano ezizimele (amaqembu ezinja), ama-ejensi kahulumeni, nezinhlangano zezombusazwe.[8] Ama-video ahilela okuqukethwe okungavunyelwe kanye nokushushumbisa ubulili be-cyber kuye kwabekwa kumawebhusayithi athandwayo ezithombe zobulili ezingcolile ngekhulu lama-21.[9][10][11][12] 
NgoJuni 2020, uTshegofatso Pule watholwa egwaziwe elenga esihlahleni eDurban Deep, eRoodepoort, eGoli . 
UPule, owesifazane waseNingizimu Afrika oneminyaka engu-28 ubudala, wayenezinyanga eziyisi-8 ekhulelwe ngaleso sikhathi. [1] 
Ngemuva kophenyo, amaphoyisa athole ukuthi isoka lakhe, uNothuthuko Shoba, yilona elibe necala lokubulala ngokuqasha umshayi wesibhamu ukuba ambulale. 
[1] UShoba walahlwa yicala lokwakha itulo lokubulala namanye ahlobene nawo ngoMashi 2022. 
Ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezedlule, ngoJanuwari, umculi wengoma uMuzikayise Malephane wethula ubufakazi ngohlelo lwakhe noShoba lokubulala uPule. UMalephane walivuma icala lokubulala ngoFebhuwari 2021. [2] 
Izinkomba 
U- Randall Abrahams (owazalwa (1969-07-26 )), ungumdlali we-TV waseNingizimu Afrika, umbhali kanye futhi nomsakazi owaziwa kakhulu ngokuhlulela ama- Idols SA lapho athola khona isiteketiso 'Ijaji Elibi'. 
Wayenalolu hlelo kumasizini angu-17 okuqala. [1] 
Ngo Febhuwari ka 2022, abadidiyeli be- Idols South Africa bakhipha isitatimende sokuthi u-Abrahams ngeke asaabuye njengejaji la se idols. [1] 
NgoMeyi ka 2022, u-Abrahams wafakwa njengesikhulu esiphezulu sePrimedia Broadcasting . 
1 2 Madibogo, Julia. 
"Idols SA bids farewell to Randall Abrahams and Unathi Nkayi" (in en-US) (Press release). https://www.news24.com/citypress/trending/idols-sa-bids-farewell-to-randall-abrahams-and-unathi-nkayi-20220122. 
Retrieved 2022-02-25. 
2016–2017: Bad hair 
Ngomhla ziyi-11 kuNhlolanja wezi-2016, uNgcobo wakhipha iculo elithi " Hell Naw " okwavela ukuthi iyona ehamba phambili kwi-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ezayo. NgoMandulo 23, uNgcobo wabe esekhipha icwecwe lakhe lokuqala elithi, Bad Hair ngaphansi kweMabala Noise Entertainment. 
Ngomsebenzi wobuciko we- albhamu, uthole abalandeli bakhe ku- Twitter ukuthi bamthumelele i-imeyili izithombe zabo ezibonisa izikhathi zabo zezinwele ezimbi, wabe esehlanganisa zonke izithombe ngendlela yobuciko ehlanganisa ubuso bakhe. Izinwele Ezimbi zifinyelele inombolo yokuqala kumashadi endawo e- iTunes futhi yayiyi-albhamu esakazwa kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika phakathi namahora angu-24. UNgcobo ukhiphe ifilimu yemizuzu engu-14 enezingoma ezintathu zeBad Hair eqondiswe nguKyle Lewis. 
Ifilimu emfishane ebihlanganisa izingoma ezithi "Don't Do It'", "Good Girls and Snapchat Hoes" kanye nethi "Phases" ehambisana no-Rowlene, ibithengiswa emazweni amaningana ahlanganisa i-France, i-Germany, i-United Kingdom ne-United States, ebingavamile. okwevidiyo yase-Afrika. [1] 
Ngomhla zi-2 kuZibandlela wezi-2016, uNgcobo ukhiphe inguqulo enwetshiwe Yezinwele Ezimbi ebizwa ngokuthi Izandiso Zezinwele Ezimbi . I-Bad Hair Extension ifake izingoma ezine ezintsha okuhlanganisa neyodwa ehamba phambili ethi Vumela ehambisana nomrepha waseMelika u- French Montana . 
Ekuzuzeni izindondo eziningi ngo-2016 nango-2017, uNgcobo uthole ukuqokwa kwakhe okukhulu kakhulu okwakungowe- 2017 BET Award for Best International Act: Africa lapho ehlulwe khona nguWizkid . Uphinde waqokelwa kuma- MTV Europe Music Awards ka-2017 . UNgcobo ukleliswe endaweni yesithathu kuma- MTV Base: SA's Hottest MCs ka-2016. 
Mhla ziyi-16 kuNhlolanja, uNgcobo wasayina isivumelwano sokusabalalisa ne-Universal Music Africa ngokubambisana ne-Universal Music South Africa kanye nesivumelwano sokubhukha ithalente ne-UMG Live Africa. Ngomhla ka-1 kuNhlangulana, ngesikhathi evakashele eNigeria, usayine isivumelwano sokusabalalisa ne- Universal Music Group Nigeria, ngaphambi kokukhishwa kwangaphambili kwezingoma zakhe, "Jungle" kanye ne "King" ehambisana nomrepha waseMelika u- A$AP Ferg, kusukela ku-albhamu yakhe. i-albhamu yesibili, Izintambo kanye ne-Bling . NgoNhlangulana 2018, ngesikhathi sokukhishwa kwabezindaba nge- Premium Times, umphathi jikelele we- Universal Music Group Nigeria, u-Ezegozie Eze wathi " Izintambo kanye ne-Bling ziwubufakazi bekhono, ubuciko kanye nothando aluletha emdlalweni wakhe njalo, futhi sijabule ngokuletha lo mzimba omuhle kakhulu womsebenzi emakethe". 
I-Strings ne-Bling yabe isikhishwa ngomhla ka-6 kuNtulikazi 2018 kuzo zombili izakhiwo zedijithali nezomzimba. ITimesLIVE iqanjwe ngokuthi uStrings noBling ngelinye lama-albhamu e-hip hop ahamba phambili eNingizimu Afrika, yaphinde yafakwa ohlwini lwama-albhamu e-hip hop ephephabhukwini iTina . Ezinye izingoma ze-albhamu zifaka phakathi i-"SMA" ehambisana no-Rowlene, kanye neyokukhangisa ethi "Gravy". 
Ngomhla zingama-20 kuNcwaba wezi-2018, uNgcobo usungule ilebuli yakhe yokuqopha, iTall Racks Records. Umculi wakhe wesikhathi eside u-Rowlene ube yisenzo sokuqala ukusayina ngaphansi kwelebula, eceleni kwakhe. 
UNgcobo uqale i-Ivyson Tour ngomhla ziyisi-6 kuMfumfu wezi-2018, eMelrose Arch eGoli . 
Uhambo olunemidlalo emihlanu ilandelana (emine eNingizimu Afrika nowodwa eNamibia) lwaba yimpumelelo njengoba kwagcwala inani lababekhona. Ekupheleni kuka-2018 ukleliswe kuMTV Base: SA's Hottest MCs okwesithathu kulandelana, walala endaweni yesithathu. 
Ngonyaka ka-2019, uNgcobo uqokwe njengenxusa lenkampani yokulungisa amadoda, i- Ax South Africa. Emkomelweni we-Dstv Mzansi Viewers Choice Awards ka-2019 ingoma yakhe ethi "SMA (Vol. 
1)" afaka kuyo u-Rowlene yaqokwa ngeFavourite Song Of the Year. NgoLwezi 24, 2019, wagoduka nezindondo ezimbili ze- AFRIMA ezihlanganisa i-Best African Rapper/Lyricist kanye ne-Best African Collaboration. Uphinde wakleliswa phezulu kuMTV Base: SA's Hottest MCs ka-2019, okwesine kulandelana ekleliswe kulolu hlu. 
UNsikayesizwe David Junior Ngcobo (owazalwa zi-11 kuNhlolanja 1997), owaziwa ngelikaNasty C, ungumdlali we-rapper waseNingizimu Afrika, umbhali wamaculo, kanye nomdidiyeli wokuqopha. 
UNgcobo wenze ingxenye yesithathu yohambo lwakhe lwekhonsathi, i-The Ivyson Tour, eqale mhla zingama-20 kuMandulo wezi-2019, eKapa, eNingizimu Afrika . Ngomhlaka 27 kuMandulo 2019, wakhipha i-"God Flow" ehambisana nomrepha u-crownedYung, ingoma ephambili ye-albhamu yakhe yesithathu eyayisazolandela, ethi Zulu Man with Some Power . 
Kubikwa ukuthi kunabaculi bakwamanye amazwe abazovela kule albhamu. 
NgoMbasa 2020, iBillboard yabika ukuthi uNasty C usayine isivumelwano sokusebenzisana neDef Jam Records, ngokukhululwa kwengoma ethi "There They Go" njengesiqalo sakhe ngaphansi kwelebula. 
NgoNdasa 2020, uNasty C ukhiphe i-EP Lost Files ebonakalayo, enezingoma ezethulwa kuziqeshana zokusebenza ku-YouTube. 
Uchaze umqondo we-EP ethi: "Yizingoma ezingaphumelelanga ezinhlelweni ezithile, izingoma ezigcine ziyimibono nje". 
Ngomhla ziyi-14 kuNhlaba, i-EP yalayishwa ku- Apple Music . 
Ngomhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba wezi-2020, uNasty C waqala ukulingisa ngendima yokuqala ochungechungeni olunezingxenye eziyisithupha lwe- Netflix yase-Afrika yabantu abadala abasebasha ethi, Igazi & Amanzi, edlala indawo kaZhero. Ngomhla zingama-28 kuNhlaba 2020, uNasty C wasayina neqembu eliphambili le- Universal Music Group i- Def Jam Africa . Ngomhla zi-5 kuNhlangulana, uNasty C wahlanganyela nomrepha waseMelika u- TI engomeni yombhikisho ethi "Abakwenzi". 
Inzuzo evela engomeni izuzisa izinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo i-Until Freedom and Solidarity Fund, ngamagama asho ukubulawa kuka-George Floyd . Ngomhla zingama-25 kuNhlangulana, wakhipha i-mixtape ngokuhlanganyela no- DJ Whoo Kid, enesihloko esithi Zulu . 
Ngemuva kokuhlehliswa kaningana, ngomhlaka-6 kuNcwaba 2020, uNasty C ungene ezinkundleni zokuxhumana wamemezela ukuthi i-albhamu yakhe elindelwe ngabomvu ethi Zulu Man with Some Power izophuma kungakapheli inyanga kaNcwaba. 
Ukhiphe uhlu lwezingoma ezihlanganisa izingoma ezingu-20 ezihlanganisa abaculi bamazwe ngamazwe nabaseNingizimu Afrika, okuhlanganisa uLil Keed, Ari Lennox, Lil Gotit, TI, Tellaman kanye noRowlene. 
I-albhamu ikhishwe zingama-28 kuNcwaba 2020. NgoLwezi 2020, uNasty C wawina indondo yeBest Male Rap Act emcimbini we-African Muzik Magazine Awards 2020. NgoZibandlela wezi-2020, wakleliswa endaweni yesithathu ohlwini lwe-MTV Base: SA's Hottest MCs, okwesihlanu kulandelana ukuphuma kulolo hlu. 
NgoNhlangulana 2021, wakhipha ingoma eyodwa enesihloko esithi "Best I Ever Had". Emcimbini wesi-6 wama- All Africa Music Awards, uthole izindondo ezintathu zoMqambi Wezingoma Wonyaka, I-Best Male Artist in Southern Africa kanye ne-Best African Rapper/Lyricist. Uphinde wakleliswa endaweni yesithathu ohlwini lwe-MTV Base: SA's Hottest MCs ka-2021, okwesithupha kulandelana kulolu hlu. 
NgoNhlaba 2022, waqala i-Ivyson Army Tour yaqala ngoNhlaba 7 ( Bloemfontein ); ukuvakasha kuhlanganisa nezinsuku ezi-5 eziqale kuNhlaba 7 kuze kube nguNhlangulana 4, 2022. 
NgoNhlangulana 2022, wathola indima yochungechunge lopopayi lwe- Disney+ Kizazi Moto: Generation Fire . 
Ngemuva kokukhipha ama- mixtape amathathu, eyodwa ethi "Undisputed" kanye nama- EP amabili, uNgcobo ukhiphe i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala ethi Bad Hair (2016), kanye neStrings and Bling (2018) eyayihlotshaniswa futhi yasekelwa uhambo lwakhe lokuqala, I-Ivyson Tour . 
Ingane Eyodwa Inkulungwane yamabhokisi (2013) [1] IZInyonga (2014) I- Price City (2015) IsiZulu (2020) 
C LAME (2014) [1] Amafayela Alahlekile (2020) 
Ubemncane kunabo bonke abathola indondo kuma- South African Hip Hop Awards ka -2015, okuyi-Best Freshman Award.
