NgoMasa 2020, uNasty C wasayina isivumelwano sokusebenzisana neDef Jam Records, futhi wakhipha ingoma yakhe esemthethweni yase-United States ngemuva kokujoyina iDef Jam, "There They Go", eyamenza waziwa umhlaba wonke, wabe esekhipha i-albhamu yakhe yesithathu ngoNcwaba 28, 2020., neyokuqala enkampanini esihloko sithi Zulu Man with Some Power (2020). 
UNsikayesizwe David Junior Ngcobo wazalwa zi-11 kuNhlolanja 1997 e- Diepkloof, endaweni yaseSoweto, eGoli . 
Emuva kokudlula emhlabeni kukaMama wakhe owabandakanyeka engozini yemoto enezinyanga ezingu-11, wathuthela eThekwini, KwaZulu-Natal eyokhuliswa nguyise, uMnumzane David Maviyo Ngcobo, oyimenenja kwezabasebenzi . Unomfowabo omdala, uSiyabonga Ngcobo, okunguyena owamgqugquzela ekurepheni njengoba afunda kuyena adidiyelwe wumculo eneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye. 
UNgcobo ufunde eStrelitzia Secondary School eLotus Park, eThekwini lapho ephothule khona ibanga le-12. [1] 
Lapho eneminyaka eyishumi nane, uNgcobo wakhulula i- mixtape yakhe yokuqala ethi One Kid, A Thousand Coffins ngomhla ziyi-14 kuNhlaba wezi-2012. Wabe esekhulula i- EP LAME yakhe yokuqala (i-Levitating Above My Enemies) ngomhlaka-4 Ephreli 2014..Ngonyaka olandelayo ngo-10 kuNhlolanja, wakhipha i-mixtape yakhe yesibili ethi Price City eyakhiqiza ingoma ephumelelayo ethi "Juice Back" eyaphakamisa ukuvelela kwakhe. I-"Juice Back" kamuva yaveza i-remix ekhiqizwe yi- Gemini Major ehlanganisa umculi uDavido nomrepha uCassper Nyovest ngo-20 kuLwezi 2015. 
I- Kwela Umculo wasemgwaqeni osulwe ku-pennywhistle waseNingizimu Africa[1] onamaphinifa e-jazzy kanye nesigqi esihlukile, esifana ne-skiffle. 
Yavela e,sindweni wemarabi futhi yaletha umculo waseNingizimu Afrika ukugqama emhlabeni wonke ngeminyaka yawo-1950 
Umculo unezinpande zawo eningzimu ye-Afrika kodwa kamuza ukuzivumelanisa nalokhu kanye nezinye i-idioms eziningi zesintu zase-Afrika baye bagcwala umculo waseNtshonalanga (lalela ama-albhamu a-A Swingin 'Safari yi-Bert Kaempfert Orchestra(1962) noGraceland nguPaul Simon (1986), ukunikeza umculo wanamuhla waseNingizimu Afrika, ikakhulukazi i-jazz, okuningi yomsindo wayo ohlukile kanye ne-lilting swagger. 
I-Piranha's 1982 UK Top Ten hit 'Tom Hark' yayisekelwe ingoma yangaphambilini kaKwela ka-1950. 
Izinkomba

Esinye isizathu sokusetshenziswa kwe-pennywhistle ukuthi ishibhile futhi iyaphatheka, kodwa futhi iboleka njenge-solo noma insimbi ye-ensemble. 
Ukuthandwa kwe- pennywhistlekungenzeka ukuthi kwakusekelwe eqinisweni lokuthi ama-flutes we izinhlobo ezahlukene sekuyisikhathi eside izinsimbi zendabuko phakathi kwabantu bezingxenye ezisenyakatho kakhulu ze INingizimu Afrika, kanye ne-pennywhistle ngaleyo ndlela yenza ukuguqulwa okusheshayo kwezingoma zesintu zibe umculo omusha othonywe yi-marabi 
Incazelo ejwayelekile yegama elithi "khwela" ukuthi lithathwa esiZulu elithi "Climb", noma kunjalo elokishini slang iphinde yabhekisela kumaveni amaphoyisa, i"khwela-khwela". Ngakho, kungaba isimemo sokuba joyina umdanso, kanye nokukhonza njengesixwayiso. 
Kuthiwa izinsizwa ezazidlala isentiwhistle emakhoneni emigwaqo nayo yasebenza njengokubheka ukuxwayisa labo abazijabulisa ku-shebeens yokufika kwe amaphoyisa[1]. 
Abantu abamhlophe, bengazi ngencazelo yayo, bese becabanga ukuthi ubhekise emculweni uma bebezwa abantu bememeza bethi "Lapha kuza kwela, kwela!" bexwayisa ngokuba khona kwamaphoyisa. Umculo weKwela wathonywa ukuhlanganisa umculo wabafuduki baseMalawi eNingizimu Afrika, kanye imisindo yendawo yaseNingizimu Afrika. eChichewa, igama elithi Khwela linencazelo efanayo kakhulu neNingizimu Incazelo yase-Afrika: "ukukhuphuka". Umculo wathandwa eNingizimu Afrika wabe eselethwa eMalawi, lapho abaculi baseMalawi besikhathi samanje nabo sebeqalile ukukhiqiza umculo kaKhwela[2]. 
Nakuba kuye kwaqinisekiswa ukuthi umculo kaKhwela usebenzisa kuphela inqubekela phambili ye-chord I-IV-I -V.,[1] abanye bagcina ngokuthi ayikho inqubekela phambili eqondile ye-Khwela chord, nokuthi i-I-IV-V-I ne-I-IV-V yi ikakhulukazi ukusabalala.[2] 
Abaculi abafana noLemmy Mabaso babedume ngabaculi babo amakhono pennywhistle, futhi uSpokes Mashiyane wayengomunye kakhulu evelele ngezingoma zakhe ze-kwela pennywhistle[1]. Abanye abaculi zihlanganisa The Skylarks, Jack Lerole, Aaron Lerole, The Solven Whistlers, Kippie Moeketsi, Donald Kachamba noGwigwi Mrwebe. 
I-Amapiano ( isiXhosa esisho "the pianos " [1] ) isitayela somculo we- house esavela eNingizimu Afrika [2] ngo-2012. 
Kuyingxube ye- deep house, i-jazz kanye nomculo wokuphumula obonakala ngama-synths, ama-airy pad nama-bassline abanzi. [3] Ihlukaniswa ngamaculo opiyano aphakeme kakhulu, olayini be- Kwaito basslines, izigqi ze-low tempo 90s zaseNingizimu Afrika nezingoma ezivela kolunye uhlobo lwasendaweni lwe-house eyaziwa ngokuthi i- Bacardi . [4]

"2019 The Year Of The Yanos, How Amapiano Blow up" (htt ps://www.zkhiphani.co.za/2019-the-year-of-the-yanos-how-amapiano-blow-up/). 
Nakuba lolu hlobo lomculo lwathola ukuduma eKatlehong, ilokishi elisempumalanga yeGoli, kuningi okungaqondakali kanye nenkulumompikiswano mayelana nemvelaphi yalo, kulandisa okuhlukahlukene kwezitayela zomculo emalokishini aseGoli - Soweto, Alexandra, Vosloorus nase Katlehong . 
Ngenxa yokufana kohlobo ne-Bacardi, abanye abantu bathi lolu hlobo lwaqala ePitoli . [1][2][3]Ama-akhawunti ahlukahlukene okuthi ubani owakha uhlobo oludumile akwenza kube nzima ukukhomba ngokunembile umsuka walo. [4] 
Isici esibalulekile sohlobo ukusetshenziswa "kwesigubhu se-log", ukusetshenziswa kwayo okubangelwa umculi we-amapiano MDU a.k.a TRP. 
Iphayona le-Amapiano uKabza De Small uthe: 
Angazi ukuthi kwenzekani. 
Angazi ukuthi wacabanga kanjani isigubhu se-log. 
Umculo we-Amapiano uhlale ekhona, kodwa nguye owaqhamuka nomsindo wesigubhu se-log. 
Laba bafana njengokuzama. 
Bahlala behlola ama-plug-ins amasha. 
Ngakho lapho uMDU ecabanga, wagijima nayo.[1] 
Abaculi kanye no-Dj 
Ukuze uthole uhlu lwabakhiqizi be-amapiano, abacula kanye nama-disc jockeys, bona: Amapiano musicians. 
Ngo-2019, lolu hlobo lwathola ukuthandwa okukhulayo ezwenikazi lonke lase- Afrika ngokwanda okuphawulekayo kokusakazwa kwedijithali nempumelelo yamashadi emazweni akude nemvelaphi yawo yaseNingizimu Afrika. [1] 
Umsebenzi kaSipho womculo waqala lapho esungula iqembu elibizwa ngokuthi iThe Beaters nabangane bakhe ababili uSelby Ntuli kanye no-“Om” Alec Khaoli, eneminyaka engu-15 kuphela ubudala. 
Ngemuva kokuvakashela iZimbabwe (Rhodesia) ngo-1974, nokunikezela ingoma ethi "Harari" kubantu balelo dolobha, leli qembu ngokuhamba kwesikhathi lashintsha igama lesiteji laba yiHarari - futhi lathola ukuhlonishwa njengenye yezenzo eziphumelele kakhulu ezazibusa abantu bendawo. inkundla yomculo ngeminyaka yawo-70s "nokuzwakala kahle kwe-Afro-rock okunongwe ngokuzwakalayo kwe-boogie woogie space jabs", "ukudlidliza ngokushaywa ku-toto, isigubhu se-conga kanye nokuphefumula okudonsa umtshingo nama-pennywhisltes". . 
Ngo-1978, iHarari yamenywa ukuba iyocula e-USA nozakwabo womculi uHugh Masekela, kodwa umholi waleli qembu uSelby Ntuli washona eshiya uSipho njengomholi omusha. 
Ngaphansi komculi omusha, leli qembu laqhubeka nokweseka futhi lasekela abaculi abadumile abafana noPercy Sledge, Timmy Thomas, Letta Mbula, Brook Benton, noWilson Pickett ohambweni lwabo lwaseNingizimu Afrika. 
Ngo-1982, leli qembu lahlukana linikeza uSipho ithuba lokusungula umsebenzi wakhe eyedwa okumenza abe ngomunye wezingqalabutho ze-pop yaselokishini ngesikhathi egibele igagasi lomculo we-disco. 
Ngomhla zi-2 kuLwezi -2021 uSipho ugubha usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa lwama-70. 
Usaqhubeka nokwenza njalo. 
USipho " Hotstix " Mabuse (owazalwa eGoli, 2 ngoNovemba 1951) ungumculi waseNingizimu Afrika. 
USipho ukhulele eSoweto . 
Umama wakhe wayengumZulu kanti uBaba wakhe wayengumTswana . 
USipho nebhendi yakhe babephethwe nguSolly Nkuta. Wayeka isikole ngabo-1960, [1] uMabuse waqala eqenjini le- Afro-soul iBeaters phakathi nawo-1970. igama leqembu labo baliguqule emuva kohambo lwaseZimbabwe bathi yiHarari. 
Lapho bebuyela ezweni lakubo eNingizimu Afrika baqala umculo wesitayela saseMelika i- funk, soul, ne -pop, oculwa ngesiZulu nesiSuthu kanye nesiNgisi. 
Useke waqopha futhi wakhiqizela, phakathi kwabanye, uMiriam Makeba, uHugh Masekela, uRay Phiri noSibongile Khumalo . 
UMabuse ubuyele esikoleni eneminyaka engu-60, waphothula umatikuletsheni (grade 12) ngo-2012 ePeter Lengene Community Learning Centre. [1] Uthe uzimisele ngokudlulela ekolishi enze izifundo ze- anthropology . 
UMengameli Jacob Zuma umncomile ngokusinika “ugqozi kithina sonke ngokusikhombisa ukuthi umuntu akamdala kakhulu ukuthi angakwazi ukufunda”. [2] 
Umbono weciko womnyondo udonsa uTho enkanyezini futhi uyifake phakathi kwesiGwinqa 
Izwe lasendulo 
Imvelo nokusebenza komnyondo kwahlolisiswa ongoti abaningi basendulo. 
EGrisi, u- Arisitotile wayekholwa ukuthi izinto ziwela eMhlabeni ngoba uMhlaba wawuyinkaba yomkhathilibe futhi wawuhehela kuwo sonke isisindo esisemkhathilibeni. 
Wabuye wacabanga nokuthi ijubane lento ewayo kufanele likhuphuke nobunzima bayo, isiphetho kamuva esavezwa ukuthi singamampunge. [1] Nakuba umbono ka-Arisitotile wamukelwa kabanzi kulo lonke elaseGrisi yasendulo, kwakunezinye izingqandavu ezifana noPlutarch owabikezela ngokunembile ukuthi iwonga lomnyondo lalingeyona ingqayizivele eMhlabeni kuphela. [1] 
Nakuba ayengawuqondi umnyondo ngengesiphoqi isazi sefilosofi esingumGreki sasendulo u- Akhimedesi wasungula umnyombo womnyondo kanxantathu. [1] Wabuye wabeka umbono wokuthi uma izisindo ezimbili ezilinganayo zingenawo umyombo ofanayo womnyondo, khonake umnyombo womnyondo walezi zisindo ezimbili uyoba maphakathi nomugqa ohlanganisa iminyombo yazo yomnyondo. [1] 
Endiya, isazi sezibalo nesazi sezinkanyezi u- Aryabhata uqale wahlonza Umnyondo ukuze achaze ukuthi kungani izinto zingaxoshwa eMhlabeni isiphoqi somyonkumbela (centrifugal force) . 
uHlakahlisombulu ( AI ) ubuhlakani obuboniswa izinguxa, obuphambene nobuhlakani bemvelo obuboniswa izilwane nabantu . 
Igama elithi "uHlakahlisombulu" ngaphambilini lalisetshenziselwa ukuchazisa izinguxa ezilingisa amakhono "omuntu" okuqonda ayamaniswa nengqondo yomuntu, afana "nokufunda" kanye "nokuxazulula izinkinga". 
Abacwaningi abakhulu boHlakahlisombulu sebayinqabile lencasiselo futhi manje bachazisa uHlakahlisombulu ngokwenhluzeko nokwenza Izinto ezihluzekile, okuyincaziso enweba ukuchazwa kobuhlakani. [lower-alpha 2] 
Izinhlelo zokusebenza zohlakahlisombulu zihlanganisa izinjini zokuhlwaya ezithuthukisiwe zolwebu (isb., Google ), izinhlelo zezincomo (ezisetshenziswa i- YouTube, i-Amazon ne- Netflix ), ukuqonda inkulumo yomuntu (njenge- Siri ne- Alexa ), izimoto ezizishayelayo (isb., Tesla ), ukwenza izinqumo okuhlelelekiwe kanye nokuncintisana ezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu ezinhlelweni zomfeketho wamaqhinga-su (ezifana noThimba nomHaqo ). [2] Njengoba izinguxa ziba nekhono ngokwengeziwe, imisebenzi ebhekwa njengedinga "ubuhlakani" ivamise ukususwa encazelweni yoHlakahlisombulu, into eyaziwa ngokuthi umphumela wohlakahlisombulu[3]. [5] 
uHlakahlisombulu wasungulwa njengomkhakha wezemfundo ngo-1956, futhi eminyakeni kusukela lapho iye yabhekana namagagasi ambalwa ethemba, [6] [1] okulandelwa ukudumala nokulahlekelwa uxhaso (okwaziwa ngokuthi " ubusika bohlakahlisombulu "), [2] [3] kulandelwa izindlela ezintsha, impumelelo kanye noxhaso oluvuselelwe. [1] [10] Ucwaningo lohlakahlisombulu luye lwazama futhi lwalahla izindlela eziningi ezihlukene kusukela ekusungulweni kwalo, okuhlanganisa ukulingisa ubuchopho, ukumodela ukuxazulula izinkinga zomuntu, ukucabanga okuhlelekile, isizindalwazi esikhulu solwazi kanye nokulingisa ukuziphatha kwezilwane. 
I- didrachma yecwebe yaseCrete eveza u- Talos, i- automaton yasendulo kwezinganeko enobuhlakani mbulu 
Izidalwa mbulu ezinobuhlakani zavela njengezinsiza zokuxoxa izindaba endulo, [1] futhi zaziwulwangu lwezinganeko, njengaku- Frankenstein kaMary Shelley noma i- RUR kaKarel Čapek. [17] Laba balingisi kanye neziphetho zabo baphakamisa izingqinamba ezifanayo nalezo okuxoxwa ngazo emicondozweni yohlakahlisombulu . [18] 
Ukufundwa kokuhluza Izinto kwenguxa noma "okuhlelekile" kwaqala ngezazi zefilosofi nezibalo endulo. 
Ukucwaninga umhluzamqondo wezibalo kwaholela ngokuqondile kumbono wokucikiza ka- Alan Turing, owasikisela ukuthi inguxa, ngokushudula izimpawu ezilula njengokuthi "0" kanye "no-1", ingafefenyeka noma yisiphi isenzo esingacatshangwa seziphumo zezibalo. 
Lo mbono wokuthi iziCikizi zezibhangqiwe zingafefenyeka noma iyiphi inqubo yokuhluza okuhlelekile waziwa ngokuthi isihlawumbiselo sika-Church noTuring . [19] Sona, kanye nokuvubukulwa kwe- neurobiology, umbono wokwaziswa, kanye ne- cybernetics, kwaholela abacwaningi ukuba bacabangele ukuthi kungenzeka yini ukwakha ubuchopho be-elekthronikhi. [1]Umsebenzi wokuqala manje owaziwa ngokuthi uhlakahlisombulu kwakungumklamo ihlelekile "weziNzwa ezimbulu" ze-Turing complete owenziwa nguMcCullouch no- Pitts ngowe-1943. 
Igama elithi "irobhothi" (IsiThununu) ngokwalo laqanjwa nguKarel Čapek emdlalweni wakhe we-1921 othi RUR, isihloko esimele "Amarobhothi Aphelele KaRossum". 
Izidalwa mbulu ezikwazi ukucabanga ziye zavela njengezilekeleli zokuxoxa izindaba kusukela ezikhathini zasendulo, [1] futhi bezilokhu ziyisihloko ephikelelayo ezinganekweni zesayensi . [18] 
Umgqigqo ovamile kule misebenzi waqala nge- Frankenstein kaMary Shelley, lapho umuntu odalwayo eba usongo kubaphathi bakhe. 
Lokhu kuhlanganisa imisebenzi efana neka- Arthur C. Clarke nekaStanley Kubrick ka- 2001: I-Space Odyssey (bobabili ngo-1968), kanye ne- HAL 9000, isiCikizi esibulalayo esilawula umkhumbi-mkhathi we- Discovery One, kanye ne -The Terminator (1984) kanye ne -The Matrix (1999) ). 
Ngokuphambene, izithununu ezithembekile ziyivelakancane njengoGort ovela ku -The Day the Earth Stood Still (1951) kanye noBishop wakwa Aliens (1986). [234] 
U- Isaac Asimov wangenisa Imithetho Emithathu Yezithununu ezincwadini nasezindabeni eziningi, ikakhulukazi kuchunge lwe-"Multivac" olumayelana nesicikizi esinobuhlakani obuphezulu esibizwa ngalelogama. 
Imithetho ka-Asimov ivame ukuvezwa Uma kunezingxoxo zemicondozo yezinguxa; [235] nakuba cishe bonke abacwaningi bohlakahlisombulu bejwayelene nemithetho ka-Asimov, ngokuvamile babheka imithetho njengento engenamsebenzi ngezizathu eziningi, esinye sazo ukuthinziyela kwayo. [236] 
I- Transhumanism (ukuhlanganiswa kwabantu nezinguxa) iyahlaywa ku- Ghost in the Shell ye-manga kanye nochunge lwenganeko zesayensi i- Dune . 
Kunemisebenzi embalwa esebenzisa uhlakahlisombulu ukuze isiphoqe ekubhekaneni nemibuzo eyisisekelo yakuthi yini okusenza sibe ngabantu, ngokusibonisa izidalwa mbulu ezikwazi ukuba nemizwa, futhi kanjalo nokuhlupheka. 
Lokhu kuyabonakala ku- RUR ka- Karel Čapek, nemibukelo i- AI Artificial Intelligence kanye ne- Ex Machina, kanye nencwadekwane ethi Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep (ingabe izimomothu ziphupha Ngezimvu Zamazuba?, nguPhilip K. Dick . 
U-Dick ubheka isu lokuthi ukuqonda kwethu ukuzithoba komuntu kuguqulwa ubuchwepheshe obudalwe ngohlakahlisombulu. [237] 
Umfanekiso weNzawu enamaphiko, ephafuza umlilo odwetshwe ngu- Friedrich Justin Bertuch ngo-1806 
IziNzawu zaseShayina zenkathi ka- Qing ezigwedwe e -Nine-Dragon Wall, Beihai Park, Beijing 
Iminsalo emise okweNzawu emikhunjini e- Ystad, e-Sweden efana nemikhumbi emide yamaViking 
INzawu iyisidalwa esihuquzelayo sasezinganekwaneni esivela kumlando wamasiko amaningi emhlabeni jikelele.

umZilafasimbe [lower-alpha 2] uwumthalakazi ohlanganisa uhlelo lozungezolanga lethu, unegama elichaza ukuvela komthalakazi uma uwubuka eMhlabeni : inkatha owufasimba wokukhanya obonakala esibhakabhakeni sasebusuku eyakhiwe izinkanyezi ezingahlukaniseki ngeso lenyama . . 
Igama elithi umZilafasimbe lihunyushwe ngesiLatini via lactea, kusukela kusiGreki γαλακτικός κύκλος ( galaktikos kýklos ), okusho ukuthi “indlela yobisi”. Emhlabeni, umZilafasimbe ubonakala njengomthende ngoba uhlaka lwawo olumise okwendingilizi lubhekwa kusuka ngaphakathi. 
I- ASIMO (2000) ku- Expo 2005 
izithununu zokushisela okuqondisiwe ezisetshenziswa emkhando ziwuhlobo lwezithununu zezimboni 
Igama elithi isithununu lingabhekisela kukho kokubili izithununu ezingokoqobo nezenzi zendwalazo yamahlelokusebenza, kodwa lezi zakamuva zivame ukubizwa ngokuthi iziThunu . [1] Akukho ukuvumelana ngokuthi iziphi izinguxa ezifaneleka ukuba izithununu kodwa kunokuvumelwano jikelele phakathi kwezingcweti, kanye nomphakathi, ukuthi izithununu zithambekele ekubeni namanye noma wonke amakhono nemisebenzi elandelayo: ukwamukela ukuhleleliswa kwamazuba, ukucubungula imininingo noma imibono ebonakalayo ngamazuba, ukugidinga ngokuhleleleka ngokwezinga elithile, ukuhambahamba, ukugidinga izingxenye zazo ezibonakalayo noma izinqubo ezibonakalayo, zizwa futhi zithonye indawo ezikuyo, futhi zibonise ukucondoza kobuhlakani, ikakhulukazi ukucondoza okulingisa abantu noma ezinye izilwane. [1] [2] Okuhlobene nesicabango sesithununu umkhakha womchazampilo womdidiyelo, ocwaninga izinto ezinemvelo eqhathaniswa kakhulu nezinto eziphilayo kunezinguxa. 
Injini yomjaho iHonda F1 . 
INguxa isimiso esiphathekayo esisebenzisa isidlakalasi ukuze sifake iziphoqi nokulawula umdiki ukwenza umsebenzi. 
Izazi zefilosofi engokwemvelo zeMveselelo zihlonze iziNguxa eyisithupha ezilula okwakuyizilekeleli eziyisisekelo ezifaka umthwalo kumdiki, futhi zabala isilinganiso sesiphoqi esiwumphumela ngesiphoqi segalelo, namuhla okwaziwa ngokuthi uMenzelelo wobuNguxa . [1] 
Young Stunna Igama lokuzalwa Sandile Msimango Ubezalwa Daveyton, Gauteng, South Africa Umdabu South Africa Izinhlobo Amapiano Abasebenzi Singer Amathuluzi Vocals Isikhathi 2021–present Amaqembu Piano Hub Amaviyo DJ Maphorisa Kabza De Small Blxckie Sizwe Alakine 
USandile Msimango odume ngelikaYoung Stunna ungumculi waseNingizimu Afrika. 
Udume ngezingoma ezithi “Bopha” nethi Adiwele. 
Uphinde wasebenza kakhulu nabadidiyeli bamarekhodi uDJ Maphorisa noKabza De Small . 
Ufunde eBenoni West Primary naseLee Rand High School eBenoni. 
Uphothule u-matric e-Unity Secondary School eDaveyton. [1] 
UStunna osemncane wazalelwa eDaveyton, eNingizimu Afrika futhi wakhulela emndenini wamaKristu futhi wayevame ukucula ekwayeni yesonto. 
Unina wayengumculi futhi uyise wayenendawo yokucima ukoma eyayine-jukebox. 
Ukuchitha isikhathi ethaveni ngezimpelasonto kumveze kuzo zonke izinhlobo zezinhlobo zomculo okubalwa kuzo iRnB neKwaito . [1] 
Ngasekupheleni kuka-April 2022, i-Stunna yavezwa u- Spotify ku-Spotify documentary ethi Freedom Sounds: From Kwaito to Amapiano . [4] 
Waqala ukwenza umculo eneminyaka engu-13 futhi wathatha isinqumo sokuphishekela umculo njengomsebenzi. 
Ekuqaleni wayengumculi we-hip-hop kusukela ngo-2012 ngaphambi kokushintshela ku- amapiano . 
Wathola igama elithi Young Stunna kubalandeli bakhe eDaveyton lapho akhulela khona. [1] Waduma ekuqaleni kuka-2021 njengengxenye yohlu lwehabhu lepiyano-lapho edlala ku-Felo Le Tee kanye nethi Mellow & Sleazy's smash amapiano hit, “ Bopha ”. [2] 
Ngo-Okthoba 2021, wakhipha i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala, ethi, Notumato ehlanganisa abaculi baseNingizimu Afrika u- DJ Maphorisa, Blxckie, Sizwe Alakaine, noKabza De Small. [3] Ingoma yakhe ethi " Adiwele " ifinyelele kunombolo 1 emsakazweni wonke waseNingizimu Afrika njengoba isibalo saba yizigidi ezingama-23.4. [2]

↑ List of Wikipedias ↑ Empty citation (help) ↑ Proposals for closing projects/Closure of Zulu Wikipedia 
I- Wikipedia yesiZulu wuhlelo lwe- Wikipedia yolimi lwesiZulu, INgqoqelolwazi yamahhala, enokuqukethwe okuvulekile. 
Yaqala ngoLwezi 2003, yakhuphukela kuzibhalwa ezingama-186 kusukela ngoMeyi 13, 2009, futhi yafinyelela ku-766 ngo-April 25, 2016, okuyenza yaba uhlelo lezilimi lwama-247 olukhulukazi lwe-Wikipedia (ukwehla kusuka ku-221 ngosuku lwangaphambilini). [1] 
Inezibhalwa eziyizinkulungwane ezingama- 10,594 kusukela ngo- October 2022 kanye nabasebenzisi ababhalisiwe abasebenzayo abangama- 34 . 
Nakuba bekuyiWikipedia yesithathu yolimi lwase-Afrika ukufinyelela izihloko eziyi-100, [1]inqubekelaphambili ibihamba kancane, futhi isidlulwe yinqwaba yezinye izilimi zase-Afrika. 
Njengoba isiZulu siqondakala kakhulu nesiXhosa, zombili okuyizilimi zesiNguni, kuyenzeka ukuthi izihloko ezikushicilelo lwesiZulu zihunyushelwe kalula esiXhoseni ukuze zisetshenziswe iWikipedia yesiXhosa . 
Imizamo efanayo ye-trans-wiki yenziwe ezinhlelweni zolimi lwesi-Scandinavia, njengesi- Swedish, isi- Norwegian, nesi- Danish ngethuluzi lokusebenzisana le- Wikimedia le- Skanwiki . 
NgoMasingana 2012, kwahlongozwa ukuba iWikipedia yesiZulu ivalwe. 
Lesi siphakamiso sachithwa ngoMashi 2012. [1] 
Igumbi labaCikizi besikhungo se-NACA (1949) 
Igama elithi " umCikizi ", elalisetshenziswa kusukela ekuqaleni kwekhulu le-17 (ukubhalwa kwalo kokuqala kusukela ngo-1613), [1] lalisho "umuntu ocikizayo": umuntu obalisisa izibalo, ngaphambi kokuba iziCikizi zamazuba zitholakale ezitolo. 
U- Alan Turing wachazisa "isiCikizi esingumuntu" njengomuntu "okufanele alandele imithetho engaguquki; akanalo igunya lokuchezuka kuyo nganoma iyiphi imininingwane." [2] Amathimba abantu, ngokuvamile abesifazane kusukela ekupheleni kwekhulu leshumi nesishiyagalolunye kuya phambili, ayesetshenziselwa ukwenza izibalo ezinde futhi ezivame ukukhathaza; umsebenzi wahlukaniswa ukuze lokhu kwenziwe ngokuhambisana. 
Izibalo ezifanayo zazivame ukwenziwa ngokuzimela ngamaqembu ahlukene ukuze kuhlolwe ukunemba kwemiphumela. 
Ngisho nezingane ezincane kakhulu zenza imigcanso elula ukuze zifunde ngezwe nokuthi izinto zisebenza kanjani. 
UmGcanso uyinkambiso egunundelwa ukusekela noma ukuphikisa isihlawumbiselo, noma ukunquma ukusebenza noma ukuba iqiniso kwento engakalingwa. 
Imigcanso iphana ngokuqonda ngembangela-nomphumela ngokubonisa ukuthi yimuphi umphumela owenzeka lapho isici esithile sithonywa. 
Imigcanso iyahlukahluka kakhulu ngomgomo nobukhulu kodwa njalo incike enqubweni ephindekayo kanye nasekuhlaziyeni okuhluzekile kwemiphumela. 
Kukhona futhi izifundo eziyimigcanso yemvelo . 
Ingane ingase yenze imigcanso eyisisekelo ukuze iqonde ukuthi izinto ziwela kanjani phansi, kuyilapho amaqembu ososayensi engathatha iminyaka yophenyo oluhlelekile ukuze athuthukise ukuqonda kwawo Isimongotho. 
ImiGcanso nezinye izinhlobo zemisebenzi eyenziwa ngezandla zibaluleke kakhulu ekufundeni kwabafundi ekilasini lesayensi. 
Imigcanso ingakhuphula amaphuzu okuhlolwa futhi kusize umfundi ukuthi ahlanganyele kakhulu futhi akuthakasele akufundayo, ikakhulukazi uma kusetshenziswa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. [1] Imigcanso ingahluka kusukela ekuqhathaniseni komuntu siqu nalokho kwemvelo (isb. ukunambitha ushokoledi ohlukahlukene ukuze uthole oyintandokazi), kuya kokulawulwa kakhulu (isb. ukuhlolwa okudinga izinguxa eziyinkimbinkimbi okuqondiswa ososayensi abaningi abanethemba lokuthola ulwazi mayelana nezinhlayiya ezingaphansi kwechwe). 
Ukusetshenziswa kwemugcanso kwehluka kakhulu phakathi kwenzululwazi yemvelo neyomphakathi . 
ImiGcanso ivame ukufaka izilawuli, eziklanyelwe ukunciphisa imithelela yokuhluka ngaphandle kokuhluka okukodwa okuzimele . 
Lokhu kukhulisa ukwethembeka kwemiphumela, ngokuvamile ngokuqhathanisa phakathi kwezilinganiso zokulawula nezinye izilinganiso. 
Izilawuli zesayensi ziyingxenye yendlelasu yenzululwazi . 
Ngokufanelekile, zonke izinto eziguquguqukayo emgcansweni ziyalawulwa (zibalwa izilinganiso zokulawula) futhi azikho ezingalawuleki. 
Emigcanswei enjalo, uma zonke izilawuli zisebenza njengoba kulindelekile, kulula ukuphetha ngokuthi umgcanso usebenza njengokuhlosiwe, nokuthi imiphumela ingenxa yomthelela wokuhluka okuhloliwe. 
Usozinkanyezi u David Scott wenza uvivinyo lomnyondo emnyangweni ngesando nosiba 
ka- Andreas Cellarius, ebonisa ukunyakaza kweplanethi emigudwini ye-eccentric kanye ne- epicyclical . 
IsiHlawumbiselo siyincazelo ephakanyiswayo yesimongotho. 
Ukuze isihlawumbiseli sibe isihlawumbiselo sesayensi, indlelasu yesayensi sidinga ukuva umuntu akwazi ukusihlola . 
Ososayensi ngokuvamile basekela izihlawumbiselo zesayensi ekuqapheleni kwangaphambili okungenakuchazwa ngokwanelisayo ngemibono yesayensi ekhona. 
Nakuba igama elithi "isihlawumbiselo" nelithi " umbono " evame ukusetshenziswa ngokufanayo, isihlawumbiselo sesayensi asifani nombono yesayensi .. 
Isihlawumbiselo esisebenzayo siyisihlawumbiselo esamukelwe okwesikhashana esiphakanyiselwe ucwaningo oluqhubekayo [1] ngokwenqubo esungula ngokuqagela noma umcabango ofundile. [2] 
UThomas Edison ngegilamafoni . 
U-Edison wayengomunye wabaqambi abaphumelela kakhulu emlandweni, ephethe amalungelo obunikazi ayi-1,093 ase-US egameni lakhe . 
UkuCandulula isenzo sokugununda amasu umphumela waso okuba ukungeniswa kwezimpahla noma izinkonzo ezintsha noma ukuthuthukiswa kokunikezwa kwezimpahla noma izinkonzo. [1] I-ISO TC 279 kundinganiso-ISO 56000:2020 [2] ichasisa ukucandulula ngokuthi “yinto entsha noma eguquliwe efezekisa noma esabalalisa kabusha ukuba igugu”. 
Abanye banezincasiselo ezahlukene; isici esivamile ezincasiselweni ukugxila ebusheni, ekuthuthukisweni, nasekusabalaleni kwamasu noma ubuchwepheshe. 
Lezi ezinye zezinhlobo ezahlukene zemininingo. 
Lezi ngezinye zezinhlobo ezahlukene zemininingo. 
Ekuphishekeleni ulwazi, imininingo iyiqoqo lamanani ahlukene adlulisa ukwaziswa, achaza ubuningi, izinga, iqiniso, izibalo, eminye imivo eyisisekelo yencazelo, noma uhide lwezimpawu ezingase zikhumushwe ngokuqhubekayo . 
Umniningo uyisimo ngasinye eqoqweni lemininingo. 
Imininigo ngokuvamile ihlelwa yaba izinhlaka ezifana namacansi anikeza umongo nencazelo eyengeziwe, futhi zingase zisetshenziswe njengemininigo ezinhlakeni ezinkulu. 
Imininingo ingasetshenziswa njengeziguquki enqubweni yokucikiza . [1] [2] Iminingo ingase imelele amasu ayizicabango noma izilinganiso eziphathekayo. [3] Imininingo ivame ukusetshenziswa ocwaningweni lwesayensi, ezezimali, cishe nakuzo zonke ezinye izinhlobo zemsebenzi engokwenhlangano yabantu. 
Izibonelo zamaqoqo emininingo zifaka izintengo zesitoko, amazinga obugebengu, amazinga okungasebenzi, amazinga emfundo, nemininingo yokubalwa kwabantu . 
Imininingo imelela amaqiniso angahleliwe kanye nezibalo ezingasetshenziswa ngendlela eyenza kugcinwe ukwaziswa okuwusizo kuwo. 
Izinhlobo ezahlukahlukene zemininingo engabonwa ngesilekeleli esiyisiCikizi 
Izinhlobo ezahlukahlukene zemininingo ezibonwa kuphela ngesiCikizi 
IPhicamvelo igatsha lenjulalwazi lokufunda isimo esiyisisekelo sengempela, izimiso zokuqala zobukhona, umhlonzo noshintsho, umkhathi nesikhathi, imbangela, indingeko, kanye nokuNgenzeka. [1] Lihlanganisa imibuzo emayelana nesimo sempaphamo kanye nobudlelwano phakathi kwengqondo noTho, phakathi kwesiqa nesithonga , naphakathi kokungase nokoqobo . 
[2] Igama elithi "iPhicamvelo" livela emagameni amabili esiZulu, lapho ehlangene, ngokwezwi nezwi asho "okuphica noma okungaqondwa abantu noma imvelo, Izinto ezibonakala ziphica abantu lapho bezama ukuziqonda, okungale kwemicabango engokwemvelo, kwelinye izinga". [3] 
iPhicamvelo licwaninga imibuzo ehlobene nokuthi kuyinto enjani ukuba okuthile kube khona nokuthi yiziphi izinhlobo zobukhona ezikhona. 
Iphicamvelo lifuna ukuphendula, ngendlela engaqondakali nejwayeleke ngokugcwele, imibuzo ethi: [1] 
Yini ekhona iNjani leyonto 
Izihloko zophenyo lwephicamvelo zihlanganisa ubukhona, izinto kanye nezakhi zazo, umkhathi nesikhathi, imbangela nomphumela kanye nokungenzeka . iPhicamvelo lithathwa njengelinye lamagatsha amane ayinhloko enjulalwazi kanye nomChazalwazi, umhluzangqondo, kanye nezemicondozo . [1]

INgqoqelolwazi iyincwadi yamaphatho noma iqoqovane elinikeza izifinyezo zolwazi olujwayelekile noma olukhethekile emkhakheni othile noma isifundo. [1] Izingqoqelokwazi zihlukaniswe zaba izibhalwa noma izifako ezihlelwe ngokwabosonhlamvu bamagama ezihloko [2] noma ngeminxa yezihloko, noma-ke akhongcoziwe futhi ayahlwayeka ngofikelelo olungahleliwe. 
[2] Ngokuvamile, izibhalwa zengqoqelolwazi zigxila ekwazisweni okuyiqiniso okumayelana nendaba eshiwo esihlokweni sesebhalwai; lokhu akufani nezifako zesichazamazwi, ezigxile ekwazisweni kolimi okumayelana namagama, njengemsuka yawo, incazelo, ukuphimisela, ukusetshenziswa, kanye nezinhlobo zohlelo lolimi . Ugazolo 
Ugabha lamafutha omnqumo asetshenziswa ekudleni

Umchazathixo uwukucwaningwa okuhlelekile kwesimo esingcwele futhi, kabanzi, kwezinkolelo zenkolo. . 
Ezombusazwe iqoqo lobuqhebeqhebe obuyamaniswa nokwenza izinqumo ngamaqembu, noma ezinye izinhlobo zobudlelwane bamandla phakathi kwabantu, njengokusabalalisa izinsiza noma ubulomo .

Izilwane ezincelisayo iqembu lezilwane ezinomgogodla ezakha isigaba seziNcelisayo (Mammalia), elibonakala ngokuba khona kwezindlala ezingamabele ezikhiqiza ubisi kwabesifazane ukuze bondle (ukuncelisa) izingane zabo, nange- neocortex (isifunda sobuchopho), uboya noma unwele, namathambo amathathu angaphakathi kwendlebe .

Ekujinjweni komchazampilo, isigaba uqhiwu lobungqwangqwa (taxonomic rank), Kanye nomuvo wobungqwangqwa, ingqwanye, kulolo qhiwu. 
Kumchazampilo, elithi umbuso (elishumusha elesilathini : regnum, plural regna ) lisho uqhiwu lobungqwangqwa lwesibili oluphezulu, ngaphansi nje kwesidlangala. 
Ngokobungqwangqwa bomchazampilo, isidlangala, siwuqhiwu lobungqwangqwa oluphakeme lwazo zonke iziphili Uma zihlanganiswa ndawonye. 
Uhlelo lungolunye uqhiwu lobungqwangqwa kwayisiphohlongo amakhulu obungqwangqwa buka-Linnaeus. 
Umndeni olunye uqhiwu lobungqwangqwa kwayisiphohlongo amakhulu obungqwangqwa buka-Linnaeus . 
Kumchazampilo, ingqwangqwa ucwaningo lwenjulalwazi lokwetha, ukuchasisa kanye nokujinja amaqembu eziphili ngokusekelwe ezicini zazo ezifanayo. 
UQhiwu olukhulu: isidkangala, umbuso, umhibatho, isigaba, uhlelo, umndeni, uzalo, kanye nemiqhinqo, ezisetshenziswa kwimpungushe ebomvu, Vulpes vulpes . 
Kumchazampilo, umhibatho izinga lokujinja uqhiwu lobungqwangqwa olungaphansi kombuso nangaphezulu kwesigaba . 
Uketshe (lihumusha elesiLatin, lympha, elisho ukuthi "amanzi",) [1] linguketshezi olugeleza ohlelweni loketshe, uhlelo olwakhiwe imithambo yeketshe kanye nama- namaqhuzu oketshe afana- nohlelo lwemithambo ngendlela yokusebenza, ewukubuyisela uketshezi olusuka ezicutshini ukuze lujikeleziswe kabusha. . 
Umfanekiso wokhethe omele kokubili ukwahlulela nokushayimthetho okuyizici zomthetho . 
Amanzi awumusi nawuketshezi ayizinhlobo ezimbili ezahlukene zesiqa esisodwa (esicwebile): amanzi. 
Umxube, noma umxube wevanga noma isiqa esiwumxube, isiqa esakhiwa amachembe amaningi afanayo aqukethe amachwe avela enhlweni engaphezu kweyodwa ahlanganiswe ndawonye isibhonqi zevanga. 
Ukwakheka kwethonsi eliyindilinga lamanzi awuketshezi kunciphisa indawo engaphezulu, okuwumphumela wemvelo womhilizo wasebusweni oketshezini. 
Ukusuka kwesobunxele kuye kwesokudla: iziqungo ezintathu ( ibehlezani losoklele, i- Inconel, insimbi ) nezinkimbi ezintathu ezicwebile ( isinTsazayiya, isAlumbe, umgethe )

UMolefi Nathanael Oliphant (6 Mashi 1952) ungumqondisi wezemidlalo zikanobhutshuzwayo waseNingizimu Afrika . 
UMolefi usebambe izikhundla ezehlukene ezinhlakeni zebhola zasekhaya nezangaphakathi, okubalwa kuzo iNational Olympic Committe of South Africa, Council of Southern African Football Association ( COSAFA ) kanye ne-International Federation of Football Association ( FIFA ). 
UMolefi ubengomunye wababambe iqhaza elikhulu ekuletheni iNdebe Yomhlaba yeFIFA ka -2010 eNingizimu Afrika.

Ishathi lenqubo yomkholezima ( umkholezima ka- Euclid ) wokuqaqulula isihlukanisi esivamile esikhulu kunazo zonke (gcd) samanani amabili u-a no- b ezigcemeni ezinegama elithi A no-B. Umkholezima iqhubeka ngokususa okulandelanayo ngamaluphu amabili: UMA ukuhlolwa B ≥ A kuveza okuthi "yebo" noma “iqiniso” (ngokunembe kakhudlwana, inombolo engu - b esigcemeni B inkulu noma ilingana nenombolo a endaweni A) BESE, umkholezima ucacisa u-B ← B − A (okusho inombolo b − a ithatha indawo yendala b ). 
Ukufunda kwenguxa ( ML ) umkhakha wophenyo onikezelwe ekuqondeni nasekwakheni izindlelasu 'ezifundayo', okungukuthi, izindlelasu ezikhulisa imininingo ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukusebenza kwemisebenzi ethile. [1] 
Uxhoxho lokufikelela liwuhlobo loxhoxho lwezokuxhumana oluxhuma ababhalisile kumhlinzeki ngenkonzo wabo oseduze . 
Iselusi limi senguxa sesiCikizi soqwembe olulodwa se- W65C816S, esiveza ukuqaqwa komkitizo, kanye nombhaliswa wokuhidanisa nokulahlwa kwenkumbulo. 
Umkitizo wenhleleliso yesicikizi olulula obhalwe ngolimi lokuhlelelisa C . 
Umhlelelisi wesicikizi, ngezinye izikhathi obizwa ngokuthi umthuthukisi wehlelolusebenza, unjiniyela wehlelokusebenza, umhlelelisi noma umkitizo, umuntu okhanda izinhleleliso zesiCikizi - ngokuvamile zehlelokusebenza lesicikizi esikhulu. 
IsiLimela esaziwa nangokuthi M 45 namanye amagama ngamasiko ahlukene, singukunyonta ''(asterism)'' kanye nesixheke sezinkanyezi elivulekile esiqukethe izinkanyezi ezineminyaka ephakathi, ezishisayo zohlobo lwe-B enyakatho-ntshona yesishomo iTaurus . 
Isicabango sondwebi somhonyezi, onemigqa yewonga 
Isiyabizo senzuko yinoma isiphi isiyabizo esimelela omunye umngakonani, okungukuthi, esifana nomunye umngakonani. 
Inkanyezi yinto esemkhathini ebandakanya imbulunga ekhanyayo yonyazani ehlanganiswe ndawonye umnyondo . 
Izingcezu zenjoloba eshisiwe esikhungwini soCwaningo noCandululo e- Hutchinson, e-France. 
Ukugqoba intwentshe esihlahleni, ukuze isetshenziswe ekukhiqizeni injoloba 
Umthalakazi uhlelo lwezinkanyezi, izinsalela zezinkanyezi, uhowo lwenqekei, uthunqathunqa, injelwane, zonke ezihlanganiswe ndawonye umnyondo .

Isilinganiso samazinga okushisa omoya osebusweni bomhlaba ukusuka ngowezi-2011 kuya kowezi-2021 uma aqhathaniswa nesilinganiso sango-1956-1976 
Ukugwamandwa kombuso uhlobo lwenkohlakalo yezombangazwe ehlelekile lapho izimfuno zabathile ziba nethonya elikhulu ezinqubweni zombuso zokuthatha izinqumo ukuze kuzuze bona. 
Umfanekiso wezezibhangqiwe umfanekiso owakhiwa izici zesithombe, ezaziwa nangokuthi imiqavo, ngasinye sinenani elilinganiselwe, elilubandlu esinokuqina nezinga elithuthu okumelelwa izibalo okuyiziphumo zensebenzo yaso yemiyinge emibili ephakelwa njengokufakwayo ngezixhumanisi zaso zesikhala ezichazwe ngokuthi x, y amachopho ka-x kanye namachopho, ngokulandelanayo. [1] 
Iklabishi, elihlanganisa izinhlobo eziningana zesilinywa se- Brassica oleracea, isitshalwa kabili esinamaqabunga aluhlaza, abomvu (abukhwebezane), noma amhlophe (aluhlaza okotshani), esilinywa njalo ngonyaka njengesilimo semifino ngenxa yamakhanda aso amaqabunga aminyene. 
UmBumane ( Brassica oleracea ) isitshalo esiwumfino esidliwayo emndenini weklabishi (umndeni wakwa-Brassicaceae, uzalo lwe- Brassica ) esinekhanda elikhulu eliqhakazayo, isiqu kanye namaqabunga amancane ayamaniswa naso adliwa njengesilimo . 
Isiqavithi esiwumsizi wendwalazo 
Umkleshe ( Spinacia oleracea ) isitshalo esiqhakazayo samaqabunga ayimifino esidabuka enkabeni nasentshonalanga ye-Asia . 
Insimbi iyinhlwa yevanga enophawu u- Fe kanye nenani lobuchwe elingama- 26. 
" Inguxa yokuCikiza nobuHlakani " yiphepha elincane elibhalwe ngu- Alan Turing ngesihloko sohlakahlisombulu . 
Isithunu soxhakaxholo, isithununu solwebu, IsiThununu noma kalula nje isithunu, ihlelokusebenza eliqhuba imisebenzi ehlelelekiwe ( imibhalo ) kuxhakaxholo, ngokuvamile ngenhloso yokulingisa imiqebetho yabantu kuxhakaxholo, njengokuthumela imiyalezo, ngomlinganiso omkhulu.

Izakhiwo zezitolo, amahhotela, nezindawo zokuhlala ziyizinhlobo ezivamile zempahla 
Impahla esisulu igama elisemthethweni lobunikazi bempahla yizinhlangano ezisemthethweni ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni . [1] 
IChwenzi entuhlambili liwumxube wevanga onesicabayo i-ClO 2 otholakala njengohowo oluphuzi-sakuhlaza ngaphezu kuka-11. °C, njengoketshezi olubomvu sansundu phakathi kuka-11 °C kanye -59 °C, futhi njengemincwebe elundwa egqamile ngezansi −59 °C. Ngokuvamile iphathwa njengesincibilikisi esinamanzi. 
Ixhwe liyinhlwa yevanga enophawu Xe kanye nenani lobuchwe elingama- 54. 
Liwuhowo olusiluthe, elingenambala, elingenaphunga elitholakala kumoyambulunga womhlaba ngamanani amancane. [1] Nakuba ngokuvamile ingasabeli, ingabhekana nokusabela kweziqa okumbalwa njengokwakheka kwe- xenon hexafluoroplatinate, inhlanganisela yokuqala yegesi ehloniphekile ezokwenziwa. [2] [3] [4] 
Izimbulu, noma abantu abayizihuquzi, izidalwa eziqanjiwe ezivela ezinganekwaneni, izinganeko, nasemibonweni yephako. 
Isicabangelo somdwebi esiqhathanisa izimbulu nabantu 
IBhangengodla, noma ibhange-ngodla, noma iGunya lezezimali, isikhungo esiphethe izindaba zenkece kanye nequbomgomo yemali yezwe noma ubumbano kwezemali, futhi liqondisa uhlelo lobhanga kwezentengiselwano. 
Igcikiva likaNecker nokhamba lukaRubi zombili zingashwayizwa ngezindlela ezingaphezu kweyodwa. 
iBehlezani inhlwa yevanga enophawu elithi Be kanye nenani lobuchwe lesi- 4. 
Liyinqimbi empunga, eqinile, engasindi kanye nengqubathi yoMhlaba entekenteke . 
Iyinhlwa e- divalent etholakala ngokwemvelo kuphela ngokuhlangana nezinye izinhlwa ukwenza izimbiwa. 
Amatshe ayigugu aphawulekayo anebehlezani eliphezulu ahlanganisa i- beryl (i- aquamarine, i- emerald ) ne- chrysoberyl . 
Liyivelakancane kumkhathilibe, ngokuvamile etholakala njengomkhiqizo wokusakazeka kwamanuclei echwe amakhulu ahlangane nemisebe yomkhathi . 
Ngaphakathi kweminyombo ezinkanyezi, i-beryllium iyancipha njengoba ihlanganiswa ibe izakhi ezisindayo. 
I-Beryllium yakha cishe amaphesenti angu-0.0004 ngesisindo soqweqwe lomhlaba. 
Ukukhiqizwa kwe-beryllium yaminyaka yonke emhlabeni okungamathani angu-220 ngokuvamile kukhiqizwa ngokukhipha i- beryl yamaminerali, inqubo enzima ngoba ibhondi ye-beryllium ibopha kakhulu umoya- mpilo . 
IsiNimbi siyinhlwa yevanga enophawu u - Ni kanye nenàni lobuchwe elingama- 28. 
Iyinkimbi ecwebezelayo esamhlophe-cwebe enombala osagolide kancane. 
IsiNimbi siyinkmbi eqinile futhi eguquguqukayo . 
Isinimbi esicwebile siyasabela ngokwevanga kodwa izingcezu ezinkulu ziyaphuza ukusabela ngomoya ngaphansi kwezimo ezijwayelekile ngenxa yokuthi ungqimba lwe- passivation lwe - nickel oxide lwakha phezulu oluvimbela ukugqwala okuqhubekayo. 
Noma kunjalo, i-nickel yomdabu emsulwa itholakala oqweqweni Lomhlaba ngamanani amancane kuphela, imvamisa emadwaleni e- ultramafic, [1] [2] nangaphakathi kwama-meteorite amakhulu e -nickel–iron ayengavezwanga komoyampilo lapho engaphandle komkhathi woMhlaba.

UmBohlwai uyinhlwa yevanga enophawu B kanye nenani lobuchwe eliyisi- 5. 
Esimwenisawo esiwumncwebe uyinkimbi eshwabezelayo, emnyama, ecwebezelayo; esimweni sayo se -amorphous iyimpuphu ensundu. 
Njengenhlwa elula kakhulu yeqembu lombohlwa unezinzuba ezintathu ze- valence zokukhanda umnanazuba, okuohumela emixubeni eminingi efana nesimunyane somohlwa, i-mineral sodium borate, kanye namakristalu aqinile e- boron carbide ne -boron nitride . 
INkanyihwe iyinhlwa yevanga enophawu Ne elinenani lobuchwe i- 10. 
Kuyigesi esezingeni eliphezulu . [1] INkanyihwe iwuhowo lwekhethelo. INkanyihwe iwuhowo oluchwenye olungenambala, naphunga, olungasebenzi ngaphansi kwezimo ezijwayelekile, olunesiluthe somoya esicishe sibe okubili kokuthathu. 
Yatholwa (kanye ne- krypton kanye ne- xenon ) ngo-1898 njengenye yezinto ezintathu ezisalayo ezingavamile ezinert ezisele emoyeni owomile, ngemva kokukhishwa kwe -nitrogen, umoya- mpilo, i- argon kanye ne -carbon dioxide . 
U-Neon ube ngowesibili kulawa magesi amathathu angavamile ukutholwa futhi waqashelwa ngokushesha njengento entsha evela ku-spectrum yayo ebomvu ekhiphayo . 
Igama elithi neon lisuselwa egameni lesiGreki elithi, νέον , uhlobo oluyingxenye yobunye be- νέος ( neos ), okusho ukuthi 'okusha'. 
I-Neon iyi- inert yamakhemikhali, futhi awekho ama-neon compounds angashajwayo aziwayo. 
Inhlanganisela ye-neon eyaziwa njengamanje ihlanganisa ama-athomu e-ionic, ama-molecule ahlanganiswe amandla e- van der Waals kanye nama- clathrates . 
UMnyango wezokuXhumana nezobuChwepheshe bezeziBhangqiwe ( owake waba uMnyango wezokuXhumana neziNkonzo zePosi kanye noMnyango wezokuXhumana ) ungomunye weminyango kahulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika . 
Isiphandla seNingizimu Afrika siwumqwamba oyinhloko weNingizimu Afrika . 
UMunge iduna elingokwemvelo elingaphakathi futhi elinkulu kwamabili ayizinyanga zikaNotshezi, [1] elinye nguZimvalo. 
UZimvalo iduna elingokwemvelo elincane futhi elingaphandle kwamabili ayizinyanga zikaNotshezi, elinye nguMunge . 
Isigaba Sesithoba soMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika siqinisekisa ukulingana phambi komthetho kanye nenkululeko ekubandlululweni kwabantu baseNingizimu Afrika. 
Leli lungelo lokulingana liyilungelo lokuqala elisohlwini loMqulu Wamalungelo . 
Uvimbela kokubili ukucwaswa nguhulumeni kanye nokucwaswa ngabantu abazimele; nokho, uphinde uvumele ukuthi kuthathwe izinyathelo zokuqinisekisa ukuze kulungiswe ukucwasa okungalungile okwedlule. 
Isifakazelo sokuzalwa siyisiqoshwa esimqoka esiqopha ukuzalwa komuntu . 
Isifakazelo somshado kuyisitatimende esisemthethweni sokuthi abantu ababili bashadile . 
Isifakazelo sokufa sika- Eddie August Schneider (1911-1940), esakhishwa eNew York . 
Izithwebuli zokudlozabukhoma 
Isidlavela (noma idolobha) liyindawo yokuhlala yabantu enobungako obuphawulekayo. [1] [2] [lower-alpha 1] Ingachasiswa njengendawo okuhlalwa kuyo unomphela neminyene enemingcele echasiswe ngokusegunyeni, amalungu ayo asebenza ngokuyinhloko emisebenzini okungeyona eyezolimo. 
Umbukiswano wezindlelasu ezehlukene zokuzuza imininingwane ezindaweni zesizindamniningo. 
Ibalazwe lesicabango sokusetshenziswa kobuchwepheshe boKwaziswa nokuxhumana (uKwaziswa) kwinhlolokhono yezemfundo ngokwe-International Federation of ICT (i-IFGICT) 
Ubuqhashiya besidlakathi baseNingizimu Afrika noma Inkinga yamazuba yaseNingizimu Afrika, inkathi eqhubekayo yokucinywa kwamazuba ezweni lonke. 
IsAmoshi siyinhlwa yevanga edidiyelwe eyonzayo enophawu -Am nenani lobuchwe elingama- 95. 
IChumumbi liyinhlwa yevanga e- transuranic, eyonzayo elinophawu Cm kanye nenombolo ye-athomu engu- 96. 
ImBeke iyinhlwa yevanga egabantuva- (transuranic) neyonzayo enophawu Bk kanye nenombolo ye-athomu engu- 97. 
UmNgcalife uyinhlwa yevanga eyonzayo enophawu Cf kanye nenombolo ye-athomu engu- 98. 
IsEntshenye iyisici sokwenziwa esinophawu u-Es kanye nenombolo ye-athomu engu- 99. 
Ubuso bombijongo benhlaka 
UBhanqanyezi yindikimba eyiqhwa, yohlelo lukanozungezilanga efudumalayo futhi eqala ukukhipha uhowo lapho idlula eduze neLanga, inqubo ebizwa ngokuthi ukutshokuhowo. 
IShabalalalmbi yinhlwa yevanga enophawu Fr nenani lobuchwe elingama- 87. 
UmCanga yinhlwa yecanga enophawu Cs nenani lobuchwe elingama- 55. 
IsiVuve (uphawu: V ) singumuvo noma ucezu lwesidlakathi samazuba, umehluko ongaba khona ( ubuvuve ), nesiphoqi somdikanzuba e(lectromotive force) ngokwe- International System of Units (SI) . [1] 
Ubuvuve, obaziwa nangokuthi ingcindezi yamazuba, noma umehluko ongaba khona (wamazuba), bungumehluko wamandla wamazuba phakathi kwezinto izimbili. 
Umzuba uyinkundla engokoqobo ezungeza izinhlayiyana ezileleswe ngamazuba futhi esebenzisa amandla kuzo zonke ezinye izinhlayiyana ezileleswayo kuleyonkundla, ngokuziheha noma ngokuzixosha. [2] 
Isithombe esimbalanyali sabantu ababili abathathwe ngebangacuphi elide lemiyonzi yensibomvu (izinga lomchadamezo womzimba). 
Uzukhwithi ( UV ) uhlobo lwemiyonzi yenzubawonga enebangacuphi elisuka ku-10 nm [1] (elinomjinge ohambisanayo ongaba ngama-30 PHz ) ukuya ku-400 nm (750 THz ), elimfushane kunokukhanya okubonakalayo, kodwa yinde kunamagu-X . 
Ukugqwayiza kwesihoshamaza esiyisigamu-seza esiyonza amaza omsakazo, okubonisa imigqa yomzuba . 
Umbhoshongo wezokuxhumanade onezinhlobonhlobo zezihoshamaza eziyimicengezi yamakhongco esidlulisi chadaza ose-Frazier Peak, Ventura County, California . 
Ukusatshalaliswa okuvamile, ukuminyana kwamathuba avame kakhulu, kusetshenziswa kakhulu kwizibalomininingo ze-inferential . 
Unongo liwusempu olwazisayo lwento, umuntu noma uhlelo. 
Legama lisho ingxenye encane yento enkulu. Lisho into emelela okunye. 
UmConjambi uyinhlwa yevangaenophawu Co nenani lobuchwe elingama-27. 
NjengesiNimbi, umConjambi utholakala oqweqweni Lomhlaba kuphela esimweni esihlangene sevanga, ngaphandle kwezingxenye ezincane ezitholakala kumagqusho ensimbi yeqhumanyezi lemvelo . 
Inhlwa ekhululekile, ekhiqizwa ukuncibilika okunciphisayo, iyinkimbi eqinile, ecwebezelayo, empunga sabucwebe . 
IBima liyinhlwa yevanga enophawu u- Bi nenani lobuchwe elingama-83. 
Liyinkimbi yangemva koshintsho kanye nenye ye- pnictogens, enezakhi zesiqa ezifana nezelamani zayo isAsumu neSibidani eqenjini elincane le-15.. 
IBima lenhlwa yenzeka ngokwemvelo, futhi izimo zayo zeSibabuli ne -ntuhla ayinsimbi ebalulekile yokuhweba. 
Isici samahhala singama-86% aminyene njengomthofu . 
Iyinsimbi ephukayo enombala osiliva-mhlophe uma isanda kukhiqizwa. 
I-oxidation engaphezulu ngokuvamile inika amasampula ensimbi ukuphonswa kwe-rosy. 
Ukwehliswa okwengeziwe kwe-oxid ngaphansi kokushisa kunganikeza i-bismuth ukubukeka okukhazimulayo okucacile ngenxa yokuphazamiseka kwefilimu encane . 
I-Bismuth iyingxenye ye-diamagnetic kakhulu futhi ingeyodwa yezinsimbi ezisebenza kancane ezishisayo ezaziwayo. 
IsAsumu iyinhlwa yevanga enophawu As nenani lobuchwe elingama -33. 
IsAsumu sitholakala kwizimbiwa eziningi, ngokuvamile ahlanganiswe nesibabule nezinkimbi, kodwa futhi njengomncwebe oyisisekelo ocwebileyo. 
IsAsumu iyinhlangano ye- metalloid . 
Inama- allotropes ahlukahlukene, kodwa kuphela ifomu elimpunga, elinokubukeka kwensimbi, libalulekile embonini. 
Imvula ingamaconsi wamanzi ajiyile asuka kumhwamuko osemkhathini abese ewela phansi ngokuna . 
Imvula iyingxenye enkulu yomjikelezo wamanzi futhi iyona eletha amanzi amaningi ahlanzekile eMhlabeni. 
Ihlinzeka ngamanzi imikhando yamazubomjilimba, ukuchelela ngezitshalo, kanye nezimo ezifanele zezinhlobo eziningi zxhaxhaemvelo . 
Imvula ina emgwaqweni 
IsAlahwe iyinhlwa yevanga enophawu u -Ar nenani lobuchwe eliyi-18. 
Iseqenjini le-18 lecansi lezinhlwa futhi iwuhowo lwekhethelo. [1] IsAlahwe iwuhowo lwesithathu oliyinala kakhulu kumoyambulunga woMhlaba, ngenani elingu-0.934% (9340 ppmv ). 
Liyinala ngokuphindwe kabili kunomhwamuko wamanzi (olinganiselwa ku-4000 ppmv, kodwa uhluka kakhulu), ligcwele izikhathi eziphindwe ngama-23 kunomcalahle ontuhlambili (400 ppmv), futhi uvame izikhathi ezingaphezu kwama-500 kune- neon (18 ppmv). 
IsAlahwe liwuhowo lwekhethelo oliyinala kakhulu egobohleni lomhlaba, ehlanganisa u-0.00015% woqweqwe. 
IsAcagu siyinhkwa yevanga enophawu - Ac nenani lobuchwe elingama 89. 
Yaqala ukuhlukaniswa nguFriedrich Oskar Giesel ngo-1902. Izinhlwa ezitholakala phakathi kwesAcagu nelarencium, eziyiqembi lezinhlwa ezii-15 ecansini lezinhlwa , zibizwa ngokuthi uchunge lwesAcagu. 
IsAcagu kanye ne- polonium, i-radium, ne- radon, i-actinium ingenye yezinto zokuqala ezingezona eziyinhloko zomsakazo ezibekwe zodwa. 
IsiBidani siyinhlwa yevanga enophawu Sb nenani lobuchwe elingama-51. 
Liyinkimbithi empunga ecwebezelayo, itholakala emvelweni ikakhulukazi njenge- sulfide mineral stibnite (Sb 2 S 3 ). 
Izinhlanganisela ze-Antimony zaziwa kusukela ezikhathini zasendulo futhi zazincushuzwa ukuze zisetshenziswe njengomuthi nezimonyo . [1] Incazelo yokuqala eyaziwayo yalenkimbi eNtshonalanga yabhalwa ngowe-1540 nguVannoccio Biringuccio .

Ubumpumputhe bokucwasa ngokwebala 
ubumpumputhe bokucwasa ngokwebala kusho ukucwasa kanye nokubandlulula ngokwebala kanye ngokwehlanga ekutheni kube nobandlululo ngokwemibala nokungafani kwabantu abakhona la eningizimu indlela abantu abaphathwa ngayo ngenxa yobuhllanga kanye nemibala yabo okuxabanisa abantu futhi kubahlukumeze ngenxa yokutshenwa ukuthi akubona abala eningizimu noma bashaywe ngenxa yemibala yabo kanye nobuhlanga njengokubamba inkolelo yokuthi uhlanga noma ubuzwe bomuntu akufanele buthonye okuwukuthi indlela lowo muntu aphathwa ngayo emphakathini. . . 
ezinkathini ezendlule abantu baseningimu benza isivumelwano sokuthi leli gama kuzofanele lisetsenziswe njengaga lokugwema ukucwasa kanye nokubandlulula phakathi kwabantu basemzanzi abcwasana ngokwebala kanye ngokubuhlanga. 
ngonyaka ka-1896 kwaba khona uphikiswano lapho khona uJustice wabhala ngokuthi umthethosisekelo wukuleli awuboni ubandlululo phakathi kwemibala wathi zonke izakhamuzi ziyalingana ngokwamalungelo futhi phambi komthetho akekho umuntu ongaphezulu komunye sonke siyalingana noma ngabe umuntu enjani lokho akusho ukuthi lowo muntu akuyena owakuleli singabuntu sakhiwe ngezindlela ezahlukene. ungahunyushwa ngokuthi imithetho akumele ihlukanise abantu bezinhlanga ezahlukene. 
Ngombono ofanayo ngonyaka ka 1978 baphikisana ngocwaningo eliyimpumputhe lombala, bebhala ukuthi "ngeke ... sivumele ubumpumputhe bombala bube iqiniso lokuthi abaningi 'badalile. abalinganayo' esikhathini sokuphila kwethu baye baphathwa njengabaphansi ngokomthetho nayizakhamuzi ezikanye nabo." Nakuba ubutabane kwamukelwa njengokuziphatha komuntu okuvamile eShayina Yasendulo, [1] inzondo yabantu abathandana nabantu bobulili obufanayo yagxila ekupheleni kwe -Qing Dynasty kanye neRiphabhulikhi yaseShayina ngenxa yokusebenzelana neChristian West, [2] kanye nokuziphatha kobungqingili kwenqatshelwe ngo-1740 [3] Ngesikhathi se- Cultural Revolution, ubungqingili baphathwa nguhulumeni ngokuthi "ihlazo emphakathini noma uhlobo lokugula ngokwenqondo", futhi abantu ababengongqingili babhekana nokushushiswa kabanzi. 
Nakuba ibingekho imithetho emelene ngqo nobungqingili, eminye imithetho yasetshenziswa ukushushisa abantu abathandana nobulili obufanayo futhi "babekwa amacala okuhlukumeza noma ukuphazamisa ukuhleleka komphakathi." [4]

ukufunda ngemvelaphi yamagama 
Nakuba izimo zengqondo zobulili zibuyela emuva eGreece Yasendulo - kusukela ngekhulu lesi-8 kuya kwelesi-6 BC kuze kube sekupheleni kwenkathi yasendulo ( c. 600 AD ) - izazi ziye zabizwa nge -homophobia, futhi isetshenziselwa ukuchaza ukungabekezelelani kwabantu bobulili obufanayo kanye nongqingili okwakhula ngeNkathi Ephakathi, ikakhulukazi abalandeli benkolo yobuSulumane nobuKhrestu, [1] leli gama ngokwalo lisha. [2] 
Leli gama elisentshenziswa ukubiza laba athandana nobulili obufanayo laqhamuka nodokotela osebenza ngenqondo uGeorge Weinberg ngonyaka we-1960s. [1] [2] [3] U-Weinberg nguyena owaba ngowokuqala ukusebenzisa leligama.[4] Igama elithi ukuzonda abantu bobulili obufanayo laqala ukuvela ephephandabeni elalishicilelwe ku magazini yaseMelika yezithombe ezingcolile zobulili, i- Screw, ka-May 23, 1969, lapho leli gama lalisetshenziselwa ukubhekisa ekwesabeni kwamadoda anobulili obuhlukile ukuthi abanye bangase bacabange ukuthi bayizitabane[4]

[2] Kungase kube nesikhathi esimaphakathi lapho lalisetshenziswa khona ukuchaza labo okungenzeka babedla izambane likapondo kodwa bengenazo izimpande zomndeni noma inkuliso enhle. Kudoti wondlebe zikhanyilanga: amakhulu amane ngokweminya angatsheliwe kumlando wekilasi emelika usazi mlando uNancy Isenberg uhlanganise uhlu olude, kodwa olungacacile, lwamagama ahlekisayo asetshenzisiwe ukubhekisa kubantu abamhlophe abadla imbuya ngothi 
Lo mndeni ompofu omhlophe ovela e -Alabama wethulwa ngonyaka ka- 1913 ngokuthi "osaziwayo" ngoba baphunyukile emiphumeleni elimazayo yesifo se -hookworm, okuyinto, kanye ne -pellagra yayigcwele phakathi kwabamhlophe ababedla imbuya ngothi base-Southern ngenxa yokungahlanzeki kahle kanye nesenzakalo "sokudla ubumba" noma " ukudla okungcolile" ( geophagia ). 
Udoti omhlophe inhlamba eyinhlamba yobuhlanga nehlobene nezigaba [1] [2] esetshenziswa ngesiNgisi saseMelika ukuze kubhekiselwe kondlebe zikhanya ilanga abaswele, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni zasemaphandleni eningizimu ye-United States .Le ilebula ,isho isigaba senhlalo phakathi kwabamhlophe futhi ikakhulukazi izinga lokuphila elehlisiwe. [3],, Isetshenziswa njengendlela yokwehlukanisa "abahloniphekile nabakhuthele" "abampofu abahle" kumavila, "abangaqondi, abangabongi nabanengekayo" "abamhlophe ababi". 
Ukusetshenziswa kwaleli gama kunikeza abamhlophe bezinga eliphakathi naphezulu indlela yokuziqhelelanisa nobumpofu nokungabi namandla kwabamhlophe abaswele, abangakwazi ukujabulela lawo malungelo, kanye nendlela yokuphika ukuziphatha kwabo abakubonayo. [1] 
Leli gama liye lamukelwa kubantu abahlala emikhawulweni yenhlalakahle yomphakathi, ababonakala beyingozi ngenxa yokuthi bangase babe nezigebengu, ezingalindelekile,engeqageleki futhi ngaphandle kokuhlonipha igunya lezombangazwe, lezomthetho, noma lokuziphatha. [4] Nakuba leli gama lisetshenziswa kakhulu yizindawo zasemadolobheni neziphakathi nendawo ehlazisayo ngabamhlophe basemadolobheni nabasezingeni eliphakathi njengesibonakaliso sesigaba, [5] abanye abaculi abamhlophe bazichaza ngokuthi "udoti omhlophe", bakubheka njengebheji lokuhlonipha, futhi babungaze imibono ehlukene engavamile kanye nezinhlalo zangaphansi kokumhlophe. [1] [6] [2] [3] 
Izazi kusukela ngasekupheleni kwekhulu le-19 kuya ekuqaleni kwekhulu lama-21 zahlola izizukulwane zemindeni ezazibhekwa "njengezihlambalazi", njengomndeni wakwaJukes kanye nomndeni wakwaKallikak, womabili amagama mbumbulu emindeni yangempela. [1] 
ku-phenomenology amagama athi omunye kanye nomunye osisekelo akhomba omunye umuntu nokwehlukana kwabo.Enye ihlukile futhi iphambene nobuthina bethu kanye nokufanayo. ubudlelwano phakathi kobuntu nomuntu ukuhlobana kwezici ezibalulekile. isimo kanye nokulingana kobunye isimo sokuhluka nokungwajwayelekile kubumnini bomphakathi bomuntu kanye nobunikazi bobuqu isimo sokunye ukungahambisani komuntu kanye nezinkambiso zomphakathi.igama elithi okunye liphinde lichaze isenzo sokunephisa sokubizwa nokuchaza umuntu ngomuntu oyingxenye yesigaba esingaphansi komphakathi somunye 
igama elithi Omunye lichaza isenzo sokunciphisa sokubizwa nokuchaza umuntu njengomuntu ongowokuzalwa endaweni engaphansi, njengomuntu oyingxenye yesigaba esingaphansi komphakathi somunye. 
Umkhuba Wokungahlangani ungabandakanyi abantu abangahambisani nenkambiso yeqembu lomphakathi, okuyinguqulo yobuwena ngokufanayo, endaweni yomuntu, umkhuba wabanye abantu usho ukubakhipha kanye nokubasusa eqenjini lenhlalakahle baye emaphethelweni omphakathi, lapho izinkambiso zomphakathi ezivamile zingasebenzi kubo, ngenxa yokuba ngomunye. 
Ukulinganiswa kwamasiko kuyinqubo lapho iqembu elincane noma isiko lifike lifana neningi lomphakathi noma lihlanganise izindinganiso, ukuziphatha, nezinkolelo zelinye iqembu ngokugcwele noma kancane. [1] 
Izinhlobo ezehlukene ezokulinganisa amasiko zihlanganisa ukufanisa ngokugcwele futhi nokufanisa ngempoqo.Ukufanisa ngokugcwele iyo evame kakhulu phakathi kwazo zombili,ngoba kwenzeka ngokuzenzakalayo. 
Ngesikhathi sokulinganisa kwamasiko, amaqembu amancane kulindeleke ukuthi azivumelanise nezinqubo zansuku zonke zesiko elivelele ngolimi nokubukeka kanye nezici ezibaluleke kakhulu zenhlalomnotho ezifana ,nokungena emphakathini wendawo wamasiko nokuqashwa. [1] 
Iqembu elincane noma isiko lingena ngokuphelele esikweni elibusayo lapho izici ezichazayo zesiko ledlanzana zingaxabene kangako noma zinyamalale ngokuphelele; kuyilapho kwezinye izinhlobo zokutholwa kwamasiko njengokuhlanganiswa kwamasiko okutholakala kakhulu emiphakathini enamasiko amaningi, iqembu elincane emphakathini othile lamukela izici zesiko elibusayo ngokusanokuhlanganisa [1] [2] 
Omunye umbono wokwabiwa kwezamasiko ukuthi ukucela ukuba kugxekwe "kuyiphrojekthi ejulile yokugcinwa kwemvelo", naphezu kwezimpande eziqhubekayo, ukuthi "okokuqala ifuna ukulondoloza ku-formaldehyde okuqukethwe kwesiko elisungulwe futhi okwesibili izama [ukuvimbela] abanye ukuthi baxhumane nalelo. isiko". [1] Isibonelo, ifilimu i -Star Wars isebenzise izici ezivela ku -Akira Kurosawa ethi The Hidden Fortress, yona ngokwayo esebenzise izici ezivela ku -Shakespeare ; isiko ku-aggregate ngokungangabazeki ingcono esimweni ngasinye sokwabiwa. 
Ukuhlangana phakathi kwamasiko kukhiqize ukudla okufana ne -American Chinese cuisine, i-sushi yesimanje yaseJapani, kanye ne -bánh mì, ngakunye kwesinye isikhathi okuphikiswana ngakho ukuthi kukhombisa ingxenye yobunikazi bamasiko akhona. [1] 
Ukwabiwa kwamasiko ukungahloniphi isici noma izici zesiko noma ubuwena kumalunga avela kwelinye isiko noma ubuwena. [1] [2] [3] Lokhu kwnzeka kakhulukazi kumalunga wamasiko abusayo kumanye amasiko amancane . [4] [5] [6] Ngokwabagxeki balo mkhuba, ukwabiwa kwamasiko kuyahluka ekwandiseni, ukufana, noma ukushintshana kwamasiko okulinganayo ngoba lokhu kusetshenziswa kuyindlela yobukoloniyali . 
Lapho izici zamasiko zikopishwa zisuka esikweni elincane ngamalungu esiko, futhi lezi zici zisetshenziswa ngaphandle kwengqikithi yazo yamasiko yasekuqaleni - ngezinye izikhathi ngisho ngokumelene nezifiso ezishiwo ngokucacile zamalungu esiko lendabuko - umkhuba uvame ukutholwa kabi 
Ukwabiwa kwamasiko kuvezwe ngengobungozi kumaqembu amaningi ahlukile, [1] kuhlanganisa abantu boMdabu abasebenzela ukulondolozwa kwamasiko, [2] [3] labo abamele amalungelo empahla yengqondo eyiqoqo lamasiko adabuka, amancane, [4] [5] [6] kanye nalabo abake baphila noma abaphila ngaphansi kombuso wamakoloni. [7] [8] [9] Ukwaviwa kwamasiko kungabandakanya ukuxhaphaza amanye amasiko enkolo namasiko, izinyathelo zokudansa, imfashini, izimpawu, ulimi kanye nemiculo. amasiko awamelene noshintsho, ukucwasa amanye amasiko kuveza ukuyhi wena awuzimisele ngokufuna ukwazi amanye amasiko. 
Labo ababona lokhu njengokuxhaphaza amasiko kusho ukuthi izici zamasiko ziyalahleka noma zihlanekezelwe lapho zisuswa khona ezimeni zazo zamasiko eziyindabuko, nokuthi ukubukisa okunjalo kuwukungahloniphi noma kuwuhlobo lokudelela. [1] Izici zesiko ezingase zibe nencazelo ejulile yesiko lokuqala zingancishiswa zibe "imfashini" engavamile noma amathoyizi yilawo amasiko abusayo. [1] [2] [3] U-Kjerstin Johnson ubhale ukuthi, uma lokhu sekwenziwe, umlingisi, "ongaboni ukuthi ukucindezelwa uyakwazi 'ukudlala', okwesikhashana, okunye 'okungavamile', ngaphandle kokubhekana nanoma yikuphi ukucwaswa kwansuku zonke amanye amasiko abhekana nakho". 
[1] [2] [3] Abantu abagxekayo bayaqaphela ukuthi lo mbono uvamise ukuqondwa kabi noma usetshenziswe kabi ngumuntu wonke, nokuthi amacala "okwabiwa ngokwesiko" kwesinye isikhathi asetshenziswa kabi njengokudla kwesiko elihlukile noma ukufunda ngamasiko ahlukene, ubenalo ulwazi oluphusile ngamanye amasiko. [4] [5] Abantu abaningi bathi isenzo sokwabiwa kwesiko njengoba sichazwa ngokuvamile asihlanganisi ukulimala noma ukuhlukumeza komphakathi, noma igama alinakho ukuhambisana komqondo. [6] [7] Ukwengeza, leli gama lingabeka imingcele engenamthetho enkululekweni yobuhlakani, ukuziveza kwamaciko, liqinise ukuhlukana kwamaqembu, noma likhuthaze umuzwa wobutha noma wokukhononda esikhundleni senkululeko. 
Ukwabiwa kwamasiko kungabandakanya ukusetshenziswa kwemibono, izimpawu,izinto zobuciko, noma ezinye izici zesiko elibonakalayo elenziwe umuntu noma elingabonwa. [1] Njengomqondo onempikiswano ekusetshenzisweni kwawo, ukufaneleka kokwabiwa kwamasiko kube yinkulumo-mpikiswano enkulu. 
Abamelene nokwabiwa kwezamasiko babheka izimo eziningi njengokwabiwa okungalungile lapho isiko lesifundo kuyisiko elincane noma lingaphansi kwesimo senhlalo, sezombangazwe, sezomnotho, noma sezempi kusiko elibusayo [2] noma uma kunezinye izindaba ezihilelekile, njengomlando. yokungqubuzana kobuhlanga noma ngokobuhlanga . [3] U-Linda Martín Alcoff ubhala ukuthi lokhu kuvame ukubonakala kubantu abangaphandle kwamasiko abasebenzisa izimpawu zesiko elicindezelwe noma ezinye izici zamasiko, njengomculo, umdanso, imikhosi kamoya, izindlela zokugqoka, inkulumo, kanye nokuziphatha komphakathi lapho lezi zici zithathwa kalula futhi zisetshenziselwa imfashini, kunokuba ihlonishwe ngaphakathi komongo wayo wamasiko wasekuqaleni. 
Abamelene nabo babheka izindaba zobukholoniyali, umongo, kanye nomehluko phakathi kokwabiwa nokuhwebelana njengokubalulekile ekuhlaziyeni ukwabiwa kwamasiko. 
Baphikisa ngokuthi ukushintshana kwenzeka "nasendaweni yokudlala imbala", kuyilapho ukwaba kuhilela izingcezu zesiko elicindezelwe elikhishwa engqikithini yabantu ababekade becindezela labo abasuka kubo, futhi abangenawo umongo wamasiko ukuze bawuqonde kahle, hlonipha, noma sebenzisa lezi zici. [3] [4] 
UmVithu iwuhlobo lwesitshalo esiqhakaza izimbali esinezimbali eziningi kuzalo lwe Allium . 
UNongo lolimi olukhulu ( NLK ) lingunongo lolimi oluhlanganisa uxhoxho lwezinzwa olunezilinganisi eziningi (ngokuvamile amabhiliyoni ezisindo noma ngaphezulu), oluqeqeshwe ngenani elikhulu lombhalo ongegqabiwe kusetshenziswa ukufunda okuziqondisayo siqu . 
UNongo lolimi ithuba lokusabalalisa phezu kochungechunge lwamagama. 
[1] 
UHlakahlisombulu oluphehlayo noma uhlakahlisombulu olukhiqizayo liwuhlobo lwesimiso sohlakahlisombulu esikwazi ukukhiqiza umbhalo, izithombe, noma ezinye izinsizakusakaza ngokusabela lapho sitshelezelwa . [1] [2] 
UNongo lwe-GPT (GPQ) lokuqala 
UKhanyisile Mbau ungumlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika, umculi kanye nomethuli wezinhlelo zikamabonakude. 
UThulasizwe Siphiwe Dambuza (owazalwa ngezi-19 zika-Julayi ngonyaka ka-1998), owaziwa ngelikaLasizwe, ungusaziwayo wase Ningizimu Afrika, owaziwa ngokuba ngumlingisi, umethuli wezinhlelo zikamabonakude kanye nezika-YouTube . 
UBongekile Mildred Simelane (owazalwa ngenyanga kaMashi, zingu 25, ngonyaka ka-1994), owaziwa kakhulu ngelikaBabes Wodumo ungumculi waseNingizimu Afrika wohlobo lomculo owaziwa ngegqomu kanye nomdidiyeli wokucula. [1] 
Umshumanqa wakwa-McDonald ungenye yemishumanqa eyaziwa kakhulu emhlabeni.
